name: House-workshop in the Village.
summary: Charming, colourful. Type studio, three open areas. Large living room. Nice creation space. Small bedroom with one single bed. Huge backyard patio. Access to the yard. Quiet area downtown.
description: Charming, colourful. Type studio, three open areas. Large living room. Nice creation space. Small bedroom with one single bed. Huge backyard patio. Access to the yard. Quiet area downtown. In the ‘Village’ quarter, right in the Montreal town centre. Proximity to all the services : bars, cafés, groceries, shops, etc. Seven minutes by walk from the subway stations Beaudry and Papineau (and twelve from Berri-Uqam).
neighborhood_overview: In the ‘Village’ quarter, right in the Montreal town centre. Proximity to all the services : bars, cafés, groceries, shops, etc.
transit: Seven minutes by walk from the subway stations Beaudry and Papineau (and twelve from Berri-Uqam).

host.host_about:
Poète, performeuse, animatrice d’ateliers et chargée de cours, je suis diplômée au baccalauréat en éducation (2009) et à la maitrise en création littéraire (2014). Je fais présentement un doctorat en études et pratiques des arts (je travaille sur le récit de voyage au féminin).

Grosso modo je fais des livres et des spectacles, ce qui veut dire que je passe mes journées à lire, écrire, dessiner et répéter mes poèmes. Je sors souvent au musée, au cinéma et dans plein, plein d'évènements  littéraires (lectures, lancements, colloques, spectacles, tables rondes, micros ouverts, etc.).

Bonus: je connais les cafés, les microbrasseries et les librairies indépendantes de la ville par coeur!

Péesse: j'ai beaucoup voyagé et j'ai de nombreuses expériences avec couchsurfing et airbnb.

reviews.comments: Vero was out of town at my arrival so I didn't have the chance to meet her in person. I got the keys from the neighbor. The place was decent and clean. Amazing location close to everything.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Véro's for a couple of nights. Everything was as we expected. Although she was out of town, here boyfriend was there to receive us and show us around. He was very kind, and was available via phone for the duration of our stay. The apt is cute and clean, with character. The neighbourhood is interesting and has plenty of cafes, restaurants, bars, shops. Feels completely safe. Close to the centre and subway stations, making it very convenient. Completely recommended. 
Thank you Véro for letting us stay in your lovely place!
Vero was really good host! She prepared everything, and room was very clean! Also, neighbor was kind person :) I'll stay here again for sure when I come back to Montreal!

Vero welcomed us into her very cozy and comfortable home with open arms, and we gladly fell into this place of warmth and well-being. Her workshop-style home is colorful and full of board-games and books which kept us busy through the cold bleak storms of winter. She gave us great recommendations for local attractions (Drawn and Quarterly For the Win)  and Depaneur Cafe.

Overall a lovely stay. Vero is awesome, very helpful, and very attentive to the needs of her guests. 5 stars

We loved staying at Vero's place! Vero was super communicative with us. We didn't get to meet her because of holiday travels but her friend met us at her place and gave us a ton of recommendations for where to go and showed us how to use the keys. The area was really nice and close to all the fun neighborhoods. We had a short stay but we were able to walk to all the different neighborhoods suggested to us (even in the snow!) and check out a lot of independent book stores and really great coffee places. The apartment is exactly as pictured and a very nice place to stay for the weekend. We hope to come back and possibly stay at Vero's workshop in the Village again!

Appartement vraiment très agréable à vivre, cosy, avec une jolie cour intérieure, le métro à 5min à pied. Véronique a été très sympathique lors de nos échanges par mail. Nous recommandons chaudement la maison-atelier, ça a été un très beau séjour :)

name: Sunny Bondi Pad 200m from the beach
summary: This charming, sunny, and spacious 70 sqm 1 bedroom + study apartment is located in a quiet and leafy street only 200 meters away from iconic Bondi Beach.
space: This beautiful apartment with a Scandinavian feel can comfortably accommodate 2 adults and is in great condition.  The kitchen is sleek and convenient with European appliances and dishwasher.  The bedroom has a brand new king size bed and is spacious, bright and cosy. The designer bathroom features a bathtub and a separate shower + there is an internal laundry facility. The apartment also has a lovely and sunny private balcony to enjoy the leafy district views.
description: This charming, sunny, and spacious 70 sqm 1 bedroom + study apartment is located in a quiet and leafy street only 200 meters away from iconic Bondi Beach. This beautiful apartment with a Scandinavian feel can comfortably accommodate 2 adults and is in great condition.  The kitchen is sleek and convenient with European appliances and dishwasher.  The bedroom has a brand new king size bed and is spacious, bright and cosy. The designer bathroom features a bathtub and a separate shower + there is an internal laundry facility. The apartment also has a lovely and sunny private balcony to enjoy the leafy district views. The whole apartment is available to you, you'll have space to store your clothes in the bedroom. Feel free to use all of the equipment in the kitchen, too. You've got the place for yourself, but feel free to give us a call if you need anything while you are staying at our place.
access: The whole apartment is available to you, you'll have space to store your clothes in the bedroom. Feel free to use all of the equipment in the kitchen, too.
interaction: You've got the place for yourself, but feel free to give us a call if you need anything while you are staying at our place.
house_rules: Absolutely no smoking appartment, no worries, there is plenty of space on the balcony to do so (Ashtray provided).

host.host_about: I am French, in my thirties and I moved to Sydney 5 years ago with my husband to enjoy the Australian lifestyle! We are working-professionals respectively in Corporate Strategy and Marketing. We are easy-going and accessible and will do our best to make your stay as nice as possible.

reviews.comments: This place is as beautiful as it looks in the pictures. It is clean, tidy, well-decorated and makes you feel like home. The living room is nice and bright in the day and if you need a break from drinking in the bars and pubs at night (which are within walking distance by the way), the balcony is a nice place to relax too. Lucile has been super helpful and friendly in providing us with all the necessary details required for our stay. If there is one thing you need to know about this place, it is that the beds are really comfy! It's like sleeping in your favorite clean, old t-shirt. Be careful, you might find it hard to peel yourselves off the bed in the mornings. Thank you once again for sharing your beautiful home with us!
Wonderful and good location. Very helpful host and easy to communicate with. I would recommend staying there :)
We had the best time staying at Francois and Lucile's sunny bondi pad. It is so beautifully decorated, clean, tidy and in a great spot. Definitely recommend.
The host canceled this reservation 143 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice apartment and as it appears in photos. Flat was clean and conveniently located near bondi beach. Recommended!

wir hatten keine genaue Ankunftszeit ausgemacht, da uns gesagt wurde wir können jederzeit am Nachmittag kommen, wenn wir allerdings vor einer gewissen Uhrzeit kommen wäre Francois noch da. Das machte uns nichts aus also kamen wir an und er war noch da. Die Begrüßung war freundlich und zuvorkommend. Er hat uns alles wichtige gezeigt. Einzig komische Sachen, dass wir unser Bett selbst beziehen durften. naja. Darüber sieht man hinweg wenn man das tolle Apartment sieht mit der super Lage!
The host canceled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Absolutely flawless stay at Lucile and Francois apartment - perfect location in south Bondi! Everything was as described and the living room decor was awesome. Best bits - super comfy bed, spotless apartment and the balcony was ideal for relaxing in the afternoon! The beach is so close we were back and forth several times a day. Lucile was only a text away whenever something was needed - super friendly couple and a great Airbnb host.

Lucile and Francois were very good hosts. The apartment is stylish, well furnished and with a big balcony. Its only a few minutes walking from Bondi Beach and close to many restaurants. We had a fantastic time and I would definitely come back. Thanks a lot.

Amazing stay at Lucile and Francois apartment - perfect location which as close enough to the nightlife but still secluded enough to enjoy a quiet evening. The decor in the apartment was lovely and showed alot of personality. The furniture was clean and comfy, especially the beds, great for a sleep in. The beach is so close we were back and forth several times a day. Communication with the hosts was easy and there was a high level of contact for anything we needed. Loved the place.
Clean and comfy and within walking distance to everything in Bondi.lived it
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: grande chambres
summary: super belle chambres avec proprietaires retraitée pas trop loins des autobus et train.un quartiers paissibles .
description: super belle chambres avec proprietaires retraitée pas trop loins des autobus et train.un quartiers paissibles .

host.host_about: Bonjour je m appel Midiem Louis

reviews.comments: The shower head is amazing. I also like the beach themed decoration. Tonton est super gentil.

I stayed here for just one night and even though it was short and sweet, I still enjoyed my stay. The house is absolutely stunning. I spoke no French but the family still managed to communicate with me. They made me feel so welcome and comfortable.

We had car troubles and got to the house very very late, but the daughter of the house (I unfortunately did not catch her name) was kind enough to stay up and let us in. We only stayed one night and left in the morning but the  room was comfortable and as expected!

We were welcomed and given a key to come and go as we please. The place was pleasant, quiet, and comfortable. The temperature was well kept, we had a private restroom, and a sofa lounging area to use outside of our unit. A very nice home with a swimming pool in the back!

We didn't expect the location to be quite so far out of downtown but that's on me. It helps to have a car to make the trips rather than taking a bus or train.
Very comfortable room and bed and a very friendly and accommodating family home.
The ability to speak French is a big plus but Jamal speaks very good English and he helped us a lot.
We did enjoy our stay.

Louis's family is awesome!!! Everyone is so nice, the house is clean and new. I love everything. 
Thanks for your perfect hospitality!!!

name: Manly Lagoon & Beachside Apartment
summary: Stunning apartment, an easy 5 minute flat stroll along the lagoon to the famous Queenscliff & Manly beaches and cafe's. Beautifully appointed, with sweeping views over Manly lagoon and manicured gardens. Looking to relax? This is the place!
space: A beautiful 1 bedroom apt in one of the Northern Beaches premier apartment complexes. With stunning views from all windows of Manly lagoon and Manly Golf Course fairway, the bedroom adjoins a large separate dressing room/study which can accommodate your port-a-cot or blow up mattress if required and be closed off from the bedroom with the bi-parting doors.  Immaculate full bathroom (please note the shower is over the bath so for elderly or mobility restricted guests a hand rail can be provided).  Soaps, after sun mosituriser, body wash and shampoos are provided to minimise your luggage. The internal laundry includes a front load washer, a separate clothes dryer and two portable clothes line for delicates and all those beach towels! It is a security building with intercom and you may use the dedicated security underground car space. Lift access from the carpark direct to your floor for ease of getting to and from your car with luggage. For those not content to just laze on the beach all
description: Stunning apartment, an easy 5 minute flat stroll along the lagoon to the famous Queenscliff & Manly beaches and cafe's. Beautifully appointed, with sweeping views over Manly lagoon and manicured gardens. Looking to relax? This is the place! A beautiful 1 bedroom apt in one of the Northern Beaches premier apartment complexes. With stunning views from all windows of Manly lagoon and Manly Golf Course fairway, the bedroom adjoins a large separate dressing room/study which can accommodate your port-a-cot or blow up mattress if required and be closed off from the bedroom with the bi-parting doors.  Immaculate full bathroom (please note the shower is over the bath so for elderly or mobility restricted guests a hand rail can be provided).  Soaps, after sun mosituriser, body wash and shampoos are provided to minimise your luggage. The internal laundry includes a front load washer, a separate clothes dryer and two portable clothes line for delicates and all those beach towels! It is a security
neighborhood_overview: Beautiful beaches, coastal walks, great restaurants, cafe's, bars and nightclubs.  A 200 metre flat walk to the pedestrian and bike only access park, which is filled with joggers and family's,  which follows the lagoon for roughly 1km before depositing your feet on the sand at Queenscliff beach. I have lived in Queenscliff and Manly for 10 years and having travelled to many other countries, it is truly a slice of heaven...and i'm more than happy to share it with you!
transit: You can walk to all beaches, and you are a 15 minute walk along the beach to the Manly Ferry, or 4 mins on the bus.  The bus stops right in front of the complex and takes you to Manly or the city directly. Driving is a breeze
access: Queenscliff, Manly, Shelly and Freshwater Beaches are all a gentle 4 to 15 minute walk away depending on which beach you choose or the direction you head!
interaction: I will be there to get you settled and then will be on-site in another apartment should you have any questions or require some great tour tips for your stay.
house_rules: No parties, pets and a maximum of 3 guests. Allowances made for those with small children. Smoking not permitted inside any of the apartments, this is a building regulation which is monitored and enforced by on-site management. You may smoke on the terrace with all internal doors closed so as not to set off the smoke detectors or leave an unpleasant smell for the next guests:)  Apart from that, the only other rule is to relax and unwind!

reviews.comments:
Our stay at Leanne's Queenscliff apartment was perfect from the outset. Leanne greeted us upon arrival at the apartment, giving us a quick tour of the space and building facilities. After a long international flight it was a lovely warm welcome. The apartment was extremely clean, modern and well appointed, perfect for two people with plenty of space for suitcases. It is located in a new, secure building within easy walking distance to Freshwater and Manly beach, shops and restaurants. There is a bus stop right outside the apartment building, and only a 15 minute walk to the Manly ferry.
Leanne had kindly left us some pantry, fridge and bathroom supplies to get us started, we couldn't have asked for anything more! We spent many lovely evenings on the spacious balcony, enjoying the view of the garden looking out to the Manly lagoon.
Communicating with Leanne was easy prior to arrival, and she was always available for any questions during our stay. 
We highly recommend a stay at Leanne's beachside apartment. Thanks Leanne, we thoroughly enjoyed it!

Stayed in Leanne's Queenscliff apartment for 3 weeks during a 5 week work stay in Sydney. Apartment was absolutely first class, great location so close to Manly and surrounding beaches. Leanne was a fantastic host, meeting me on check in and showing me around. Couldn't fault anything about the apartment, lovely neighbours, secure parking. I would 100% recommend Leanne's apartment to anyone looking to enjoy Manly and the surrounding area. As a hostess, Leanne epitomised the Airbnb values.

Very friendly host that kept in touch throughout the booking phase as well as during the stay. Made everything easy which was great.The flat was ideal for a couple, very well laid out in a safe, quiet complex. Only 10 minute walk to Queenscliffe beach so ideal for someone looking to enjoy Manly and it's beach without being in the middle of everything.

Stayed at Leanne's apartment in Queenscliff for the second time in just over 4 months for a work trip. As with the previous stay, everything was very well organised and no stone left unturned to ensure my stay was as comfortable and stress-free as possible. Would highly recommend to any travellers looking for somewhere to stay in Queenscliff.

Just checked out after another 2 week stay in Lea's fantastic apartment. Both Lea and Rohan are great to deal with and nothing was ever an issue. This was my 3rd stay for work at their beautiful apartment. Only downside over the 2 weeks was the weather but good as the guys are, even that was beyond their control. 
Thanks a million for everything, Lea - don't expect to be back any time soon but if I do will certainly get in touch. 
Cheers,
Brian

name: Historic sundrenched apt of the Lower East Side
summary: Heart of the Lower East Side. Charming historic NYC sun drenched apartment with great light with 6 windows, best neighborhood in the city, restaurants, bars cafes, art galleries at your doorstep.
space: 1 bedroom apartment conveniently located in the heart of the Lower East Side of Manhattan on the historic Orchard St.  The apartment is surrounded by many bars,Cafes, restaurants, art galleries and night clubs. bedroom, full kitchen, living room. WiFi, Air conditioning There are four subway lines close by- very convenient  sleeps 3.
description: Heart of the Lower East Side. Charming historic NYC sun drenched apartment with great light with 6 windows, best neighborhood in the city, restaurants, bars cafes, art galleries at your doorstep. 1 bedroom apartment conveniently located in the heart of the Lower East Side of Manhattan on the historic Orchard St.  The apartment is surrounded by many bars,Cafes, restaurants, art galleries and night clubs. bedroom, full kitchen, living room. WiFi, Air conditioning There are four subway lines close by- very convenient  sleeps 3.
house_rules: must be respectful responsible of my place...

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: professional photographer

reviews.comments:
My friend and I had a great stay here! The location was absolutely perfect near lots of good bars/restaurants, and a quick walk to the train. I slept on the couch in the living room, which was plenty comfortable. My friend slept in the bed, and said that was cozy as well. Didn't get to meet Greg, but his friend gave us the keys and he was very friendly and helpful with local tips.

The bathroom was pretty tiny, and the building was old, but it's New York, so that's all to be expected. If you're looking for a modern and refined place, this might not be it. If you want a clean, comfortable place at a great price in a good location, you can't do much better than this. Would gladly stay here again.
Greg was great to communicate with and the stay was comfortable. No complaints!

simple and nice apartment,
perfect location to explore the city.

This place is the best place to stay.  My first time in NYC so I wasn't too sure about the location but it turned out to be all that I'd hoped for and more.  The building is like something out of a classic NY postcard and Orchard st is full of trendy bars restaurants and shops. I couldn't have asked for a better location.  The apartment is not as spacious as it looks in the photos but its a classic NY one bedder in the best part of the city.  I will 100% be staying here again in the future.  Greg is really good to deal with - I had to change my dates and he was very accommodating.  Awesome trip.
The reservation was canceled 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Perfect location (great neighborhood and walking distance to SoHo/Greenwich/Meatpack, close to subway). Greg is very flexible (our flight had a three hour delay and we arrived after midnight), replies fast to messages and easy to handle with. Comfortable bed, tiniest bathroom ever seen - apartment unfortunately somewhat filthy.

Loved the location. Right on the edge of Chinatown in a pretty trendy area with nice restaraunts and art galleries and its so close to the subway that the entire city is easily accessed from here. Greg was super helpful pointing out all the local spots, he even hooked us up with some passes he had to the top of the rock.

Nous avons passé une super semaine chez Greg! Le quartier est vraiment très chouette et nous nous sommes laissé tenter par plein de super bons petits restos juste en dessous de l'appartement. Greg et Mark ont été très réactifs dans les échanges de mails et très arrangeant pour que l'on passe le meilleur séjour possible. L'appartement est un peu de bric et de broc et la salle de bain pas très commode mais c'est tout à fait charmant et baigné de lumière. Merci Greg et à une prochaine fois!

Greg was an amazing host, everything went as planned. Truly understanding with times. The apartment is really nice, full of light, extremely well located. It's true that the building is a little old but as the apartment is clean, you enjoy the perfect NewYork experience. The neighborhood is vibrant. I will come back.

Greg was an amazing host! He was very easy to get in contact with and exceptionally quick and answering any of the queries we had. Unfortunately he wasn't personally able to be there for our trip but made sure that there was someone to meet us in the apartment when we arrived. Our visit went without a hitch. He was very flexible with times and made sure to accommodate our slightly late check out time.

The apartment was as described. It is just a few minutes walk from the metro, giving you easy access to the whole city. The living space is relatively small, but that was never a problem for us as the location of the apartment provided us with many activities within walking distance. The apartment was clean and relatively tidy. The bed was comfortable and the sheets were clean. One small problem we encountered was that the air conditioning wasn't working while we were there, however with the windows open there was enough of a breeze to maintain a comfortable temperature regardless.

Greg was so easy to communicate with and made the key pick up so easy.  His apartment was awesome!  It was in the perfect location.  I would most definitely want to stay at his place every trip I take to NYC!

La communication a été constante lorsque nécessaire.
Cet appartement est surtout remarquablement situé dans le Lower East Side juste à coté du super intéressant musée Tennement. Plein de cafés, resto et bars. Bonnes suggestions d'endroits à visiter.
Très beau séjour
Greg's place was great. Clean, easy to access, safe, and exactly like the description. Location was amazing - would recommend staying here.
It went very smoothly and Greg was always on call with recommendations and answers to any questions I had!

Great communication with Greg.
Authentic place in Lower East Side, lots of stairs up to the fourth floor so be prepared, but prime location.
Bathroom a tight squeeze, but hey it is New York
We stayed in the most happening neighborhood in lower Manhattan & had a blast, and it was quite possibly the perfect location to stay in New York.

Greg was such a generous host– went out of his way to make sure we had everything we needed. He was so flexible in terms of check in and check out times which was amazing. The place was clean and cozy. The location is perfect. Truly located in the heart of LES surrounded by a plethora of bars and restaurants. This place is a gem and I wish I could stay here for longer! 10/10 would recommend.

This was a true AirBnB. Greg felt more like a friend than a host and was very responsive via phone and text with any questions/issues. The apartment is in a great location; everything you need is nearby. If it's available, I'd book it again!
Great location and responsive host. Greg was very helpful and nice.
Greg is a great host - He was proactive with regards to communication and ensured a seamless experience. I would definitely stay at Gregs again.

Greg's apartment made this our best NYC stay yet. Amazing location, close to great coffee, food and bars, but away from the chaos. The subway is conveniently a 2 minute walk making it extremely accessible. The apartment itself is lovely, clean and as described. Would love to stay here again!

El anfitrión es encantador y estuvo pendiente en todo momento de que todo estuviera en orden.
Quizás lo único negativo es que las fotos son mejor de lo que el apartamento es, la escalera del edificio es muy fea y son 4 pisos :(... 
La zona está muy bien, pero es zona de salir....con lo que conlleva de ruidos. 
En general está correcto, pero sobre todo porque Greg es muy atento.

Greg's place is great, in super location near metros, loads of bars, cafes, restaurants, walking distance over to Brooklyn. Clean, cosy, lots of light, good place to relax in NYC. Would definitely stay again

Greg's place is the bomb. The neighborhood is great - food and bars everywhere, all within walking distance - both lively and cozy, close to the subway. The apartment is spacious for a one bedroom, lots of light, cool collection of books, well supplied. It's on the fourth floor and there's no elevator, so be prepared to break a sweat carrying your luggage up. Otherwise, it's a great place and great value. I would recommend it to friends, and would certainly stay there again.

I was going to stay in this place for 4 days. But i couldn't stay there for 10 mins and i left there. They were saying its historical building but it was a doty place and it was 4th floor but there wasn't an elevator so i couldn't bring my luggage up to 4th floor. 

They put white couch for sofabed in the picture but it was too stained and dirty so i couldn't even sit on it. The host person left the doorkey at some shop near by so i had to pick up the key from the shop. 
It was a disaster for staying that place because of disgusting environment. So i had to ask them for refund but the host refused it. 
This place destroyed my Ny trip all.
It's the worst place EVER!


私はこの家で四日間泊まる予定でした｡一晩も泊まらずに 出かけました｡歴史的の建物はすぐ倒れそうな物だったし､4回でｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰもないから荷物運びにくい場所です｡
写真で見える白いSOFAは実は染みで座れないほどすごく汚かったです｡本当に汚く使ってる家で､我慢できなくてﾘﾌｧﾝﾄﾞ申請しましたが､拒絶になって今紛争中です｡
この家でﾆｭよくの旅行は壊しました｡ここでは絶対泊まらないでください｡


나는 이 집에 4일간 묵을 예정이었다. 단 하루도 묵지 않고, 10분만에 집을 나오게되었다. 역사적이라는 건물은 다 쓰러져가는 건물이었고 4층이었는데 계단으로만 되어 었어 너무 짐을가지고 올라갈수도 없었다.
사진에서 보이는 하얀 소파베드는 실제로는 온갖 때와 얼룩으로 가득해서 도저히 앉을 수도 없었고, 사진과는 너무나도 다른 집이었다.
심지어 집주인은 실제 거기에 있지도 않고 근처에 있는 샵에 키를 맡겨두고 알아서 찾아가라는 식이었다.
정말 지저분하게 쓰는 집이어서 더이상 참을 수 없어 나와 환불 신청을 한 상태인데 집주인은 뻔뻔하게도 거절하여 분쟁상태이다.
이 집때문에 뉴욕여행을 다 망쳤네요. 여긴 절대 묵지 마세요!!

This is a great option if you want to stay in LES. It's walkable to many hip restaurants and bars as well as Soho, Nolita and the East Village. It's also a short trip to Brooklyn. Greg was very responsive even though he was on the West Coast at the time. Definitely a good value in NYC!
The flat is perfectly located in the trendy lower east side area and Greg managed to welcome us with really short notice so thanks for that.

Pros: 
-Great location if you are vacationing. 
-It is close to a few subway lines which is very convenient.
-The neighborhood is very fun. Tons of restaurants, bars, etc.
-Greg is super nice and helpful
-I thought the pillows were comfy.

Cons: 
-The bed is a Full but is listed as a Queen. This particularly was frustrating since this location having a Queen size bed was one of the "tie breakers" when I was determining where to stay.
-The floors were dirty, some rags in the kitchen were dirty, and the trash in the bathroom was full.
-It is a fourth floor walk up. The owner is very clear about this in the ad but it is still a con.
-He did let me know the bathroom is small, but I found this one to be abnormally small. You have to turn side ways to get from the door past the shower to the toilet.
-The trash is picked up every morning it seems between 2-4 AM. The windows need to be open to help regulate the temperature in the apartment. So it gets jarringly noisy for 5-10 minutes at a very bad time. Totally not the owners fault but it woke me up so I thought I would comment on that.

Greg’s place is great! It is very cozy snd was clean upon arrival. He is a great host and very responsive. He also had recommendations of fun places to go to around his apartment. It gets very bright in the bedroom early in the morning and was very hot which was really the only downfall. I would definitely recommend this place and would stay here again!

Location was great and the place is very close to some great restaurants. The place does the trick and is good overall but definitely on the small side. Greg greeted us with a bottle of champagne and helped us to get settled in. Overall we had a great time and I would recommend this place if you just want a simple place to sleep. Thank you Greg!

Greg’s place is amazing!  First, it is in one of the most happening places in New York City.  It is in Manhattan’s “Lower East Side” (LES) next to the historic Tenement Museum.  Guests staying at Greg’s place enjoy long bright sight-lines down two orthogonal  streets from the vantage point of being 5 stories up.  These long vistas are very rare in cities like NYC with its many tall buildings and are only available due to Greg’s (1) coveted corner location, (2) his 6 windows, and (3) highly-desired southeast orientation in the southeast portion of the city.

Professional photographers, good architects and other such artists conscientiously or subconsciously seek out long vistas and sight lines, lots of natural light, and other pleasing aesthetics when choosing or creating space.  Greg is no exception and his place clearly shows that talent.

The 6 windows bring those views and natural light into the main living space which uses 3 of them and the open kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom which enjoy the other 3.

Greg’s love of art and photography is apparent in the decor.  We found everything to be clutter-free and clean.  There were ample towels, sheets, supplies, and such, and the 5G Internet was very fast which I tested to be 57.4Mb/s down with an amazing 8ms of latency.

Greg’s LES location is walking distance to many shops, the subway, and restaurants, including vegan venues such as my favorite “byChloe.” Checking in was a snap and the late checkin/checkout times worked out perfectly as well.

One will be hard-pressed to find a better value in Manhattan that is so well connected and with as many pleasing views and natural light as Greg’s place.

I intend on checking for availability first at Greg’s place whenever I travel to NYC.  He is well deserving of his SuperHost status and 5-Star Rating.

The location is great. There are a lot of really good places to eat nearby, subways stops just a couple blocks away, and a Trader Joe's down the street. The Tenement Museum is quite close, and I truly enjoyed learning about it and having the chance to do a tour. Highly recommended. 

I had my wife and young son with me, and the space accommodated us well. I did have a little trouble sleeping with all the noise outside, but I grew accustomed to it after a couple days. Overall, a great place to stay!

Greg's place is charming, warm, small, but cozy. He was unavailable to check us in, but he was very responsive and told us ahead of time that his friend would meet us. The location is great. There are restaurants, bars, and shops all within walking distance. Subway lines are also close by for easy transportation to and from Penn Station. I'd note that the bed in the bedroom is a full size, not a queen. It didn't bother us. We weren't able to find linens or extra blankets for the sofa bed, but the temperature in the apartment was very warm so it also wasn't a problem. The apartment is beautifully decorated, but on the smaller side. The bathroom is especially small. There are also several flights of stairs and no elevator. Overall, we had a lovely stay. Thank you, Greg!
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
great location, stylin’ place with lots of light. the kind of apartment you just don’t want to leave ✨
Greg’s place was a great choice; really great location and easy to check in and out. The bathroom was small but no where near a deal breaker. Highly recommend!

Greg's home was small, and cute! It's in a great neighborhood, central to everything and super close to a lot of train lines. The communication was super- even though he was traveling out of the country he made our check in smooth. One issue we had was the amount of noise at night- bring ear plugs!

name: BONDI BEACH - Beach & Ocean Views
summary: Located just 5 mins from Sydney's most famous  beach with amazing views of the iconic Bondi Beach and ocean.  A short stroll to the surf, sand, cafes, bars, restaurants and all of Bondi's attractions. You will enjoy the peace and tranquility of the ocean at your door step whilst only being a few minutes from all the action.
space: I live in a 2 bedroom apartment with amazing views of Sydney’s iconic Bondi Beach and it's surrounds.   You will love your stay here in Bondi and enjoy the peace and tranquility of the ocean at your door step whilst only being a few minutes from all the action.
description: Located just 5 mins from Sydney's most famous  beach with amazing views of the iconic Bondi Beach and ocean.  A short stroll to the surf, sand, cafes, bars, restaurants and all of Bondi's attractions. You will enjoy the peace and tranquility of the ocean at your door step whilst only being a few minutes from all the action. I live in a 2 bedroom apartment with amazing views of Sydney’s iconic Bondi Beach and it's surrounds.   You will love your stay here in Bondi and enjoy the peace and tranquility of the ocean at your door step whilst only being a few minutes from all the action. The room features: • A Comfy double size bed • 2 x Bedside tables and lamps • Wardrobe • Desk and Chair  • Large living and dining area, with internet TV, DVD and Free WI-fi • Kitchen with all modern amenities (e.g. fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster, blender etc) • Balcony with beach and sweeping ocean views • Shared laundry with washing machine and dryer • Elevator I live in the apartment and I work mostly
neighborhood_overview: Living in Sydney is a treat. Before or after work you can have a surf and during the evenings or at weekends you can enjoy the nightlife at the hip bars or nightclubs Sydney has to offer.  There are lots of restaurants and small wine bars within walking distance.
transit: The building is on a quiet, leafy street and is only a 5 minute walk to the beach and a 20 minute walk to Bondi junction. There are regular bus services to Bondi Junction (where you can catch the train to the city and beyond) or continue on the bus into the city. The bus service operates 24 hr to and from the city.
access: The room features: • A Comfy double size bed • 2 x Bedside tables and lamps • Wardrobe • Desk and Chair  • Large living and dining area, with internet TV, DVD and Free WI-fi • Kitchen with all modern amenities (e.g. fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster, blender etc) • Balcony with beach and sweeping ocean views • Shared laundry with washing machine and dryer • Elevator
interaction: I live in the apartment and I work mostly in the evenings/night. I also play tennis some days/evenings, swim or catch up with friends. I am normally here in the mornings but mostly out in the evenings/nights.
house_rules: Leave shared areas clean after use Sorry, No Backpackers

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
I’m an Airbnb newbie, but I'm looking forward to sharing my home with holiday makers like you. As a host, I hope the accommodation meets your expectations during your stay as it's clean, safe, comfortable, functional and quiet.

I live in an apartment with amazing views of Sydney’s iconic Bondi Beach and it's surrounds. I work during the day and some evenings I play tennis or catch up with friends.

I'm a happy, energetic, organised and social person who enjoys life. Living in Sydney is a treat. Before or after work you can have a surf and during the evenings or at weekends you can enjoy the nightlife at the hip bars or nightclubs Sydney has to offer.

You will love your stay here in Bondi and enjoy the peace and tranquility of the ocean at your door step whilst only being a few minutes from all the action.
Airbnb makes travel so much more personal and allows everyone to get the ‘local experience’ so I’m really pleased at the prospect of playing a part in someone’s dream holiday!

I’m pretty enthusiastic about my little part of the world so always happy to give advice or point you in the right direction! 

Happy travels!

reviews.comments: Brendan is a great host and has a lot to offer, especially if you never been Sydney. His apartment is wonderful and quiet. Walking distance to shops and public transportation. Also the view of Bondi beach is spectacular from his apartment. I would most definitely stay here again if I came to Sydney again!

We spend good days at Bondi.
He offered us comfortable space. It was clean room, kitchen and bathroom.
He is helpful and kind. When we asked about Sydney and Bondi, he gave us a lot of information. It was really nice.
His place's location is amazing and convenient. You can see Bondi beach from his balcony and there are many shops around his house!! Also you can catch the bus to the city easily.
So we enjoyed there.
Thank you Brendan!!

The appartment is just few minutes from Bondi beach and above the Iceberg swim pool (amazing start of the day with a swim, before everyone comes in). It is situated on a hill, but the walk is worth the balcony view and chill.
Brendon was a great host. He is not in the flat during evenings, what provides privacy as well. 
Would highly recommend
Petra

Brendon and his Bondi unit was totally amazing!!! Perfect location right near Bondi beach and Bondi road. Comfy bed and amentites. Brendon was such a nice host, very friendly and helpful. Best host ever!!! Thank you so much for our lovely stay.
Clean, tidy and comfortable space close to the beaches and cafes of Bondi. Brendan is lovely and was very accomodating- would definitely recommend!

My sister and I️ stayed at Brendan’s for a few days and had a great time. Check in was easy and flexible, he waited for us despite my many plane delays. The place itself was very clean and comfortable, and we loved being able to make ourselves at home. Great proximity to Bondi Beach. Brendan was very helpful and kind. 10/10 would stay here again.

Brendan is a wonderful host. He will give you useful information. His flat is located from a 5-min walk from Bondi beach. But careful, the walk is steep when you come back from the beach ;) The coastal walk is very nice and a lot young people are gathering during summer time

Brendan was an excellent host,  his home is lovely and l felt very comfortable staying there. He goes out of his way to make you feel at home which l  appreciated very much. I would recommend his home and will be booking again with  Brendan next time l visit Sydney.
Brendan's is beautiful close to the beach and many shops and cafe yet still far enough to get a little peace and quiet from the liveliness of the scene.

Brendan is very thoughtful and also a great host who cares about your convenience, safety, and basically everything! He provided a lot of travel information and planned an itinerary for my short trip. His house is very clean and tidy! We feel very comfortable during the stay. We have a good talk too! Thanks again Brendan.

Brendan's place is positioned just a short walk from the beach and the iceberg pools. So if you are a beach goer it is a great place to stay. The apartment itself is presented neat & clean and Brendan supplies all the necessities you need for your stay and makes you feel very welcome. The apartment is clean and the fresh ocean air coming from the balcony is such a delight. I very much enjoyed sitting mindfully on the balcony having a quiet coffee watching the morning sun. Simple touches such as chocolates on your bed at arrival and on the coffee table in the evenings make for enjoyable appreciation. Thanks again Brendan you made our stay a special one. Keep up the great work

Good location and tidy place. Worth to stayed for 2 nights and we definitely love to enjoy the night view of Bondi beach from balcony. The host Brendan is very friendly to share place includes everything in Kitchen. It’s very helpful for us with 2 years old child. Also, Brendan spent time to drive us around the town and even to airport when we leave! It’s unexpected to have such a amazing guide.
Great location, easy to deal with host and clean apartment

I had a comfortable stay in Brendan’s well-kept apartment in South Bondi, which has a lovely balcony overlooking the beach. Brendan was a sociable, helpful and generous host, providing lots of advice on what to do and see during my time in Sydney and even driving me to the airport. There were unexpectedly some noisy renovation works going on in the building during my stay but they were obviously not the host’s fault. Thank you Brendan!

Very recommended place to stay at Bondi Beach. Only 7 minutes walk from the beach. Brendan is an amazing host with kind heart and very helpful. He gave us a list of places to visit in Bondi, we could not visit all of them though. But we really enjoy staying in Bondi beach for 2 days. Brendan also gave us a short tour to Bondi beach, when we checked in. His place is very clean and stylish. Thank you so much for everything, Brendan. Cheers, Joseph & Jenny.

Brendan’s flat is very comfortable and homely. He makes you feel very much at home and gives great suggestions about the locality. Great view across Bondi bay. Lots of amenities close by, but quiet location.
Brendan is easily one of the most nicest and hospitable hosts I’ve come across using AirBnB. His place was immaculate and contemporary. Highly recommended.

Brendan is a great host. His place is very clean and neat. He was very helpful explaining the public transportation and spots around Sydney. I would def stay here again and the location to Bondi Beach is only a 3 minute walk! Cheers Brendan!

Brendan was an outstanding host, was very generous with his time and recommendations, very kind and made me feel very welcome and comfortable in is home. Incredibly close to the action of Bondi and a lovely view from the deck

Nous sommes deux français venus en sac à dos pour l’Australie. Afin de se reposer après les longues heures de vol nous avons décidés de passer deux nuits dans cet Airbnb. Le repos fut total ! L appartement est très propre, calme et fonctionnel. Il  est également bien situé à 5 minutes à pied de la plage de Bondi. L’hôte Brendan été toujours a notre écoute et nous a donner les meilleurs conseils pour les visites . Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés ! Merci encore et à bientôt je l’espére

Apolline et Quentin

Great place in the heart in Bondi ! Beautiful views from the balcony. Short walk to the beach, restaurants, shops and transport. Brandon is a great host, made me feel very welcome and shared some great itinery ideas for my trip.

Brendan and his place get 10 stars from me!  His place is in the best location, and he is so cool to chat with.  
My flight landed REALLY early in the morning, and he allowed me to check in early too.  One of the nicest people I've ever met, and I've traveled the WORLD!
I was a solo traveler and he made everything convenient and easy for me. If you want a good Bondi Beach experience, B's place is perfect.
Location - great
Space - great
Bathroom - great and clean
Local tips - great
What a wonderful stay in Bondi! Brendan was a lovely host and the location is perfect - just off the main streets so it's quiet but so close to the beach and the coastal walk!

This is a lovely room with everything we need. We had a really great time in the city and the house. 

The place is clean and tidy, Brendan also well prepared in details, like the heater and chocolates. He also showed us around and gave us useful tips, even plans for days! 

The place is close to the beach, you can have a great view from the balcony. The place is also close to the bus, which can directly to Bondi Junction, and transfer to everywhere else. 

The kitchen is also welcome to use, also provides milk and bottled water.

Overall, it is a really nice place and we really enjoyed it! Highly recommend it✪ω✪

Brendan is a lovely host! Very helpful and super friendly. The place is in a wonderful location with a wonderful view. Brendan was very upfront about the lift being out of order while my Dad was staying with him and even offered an extra discount when we didn’t need it. He gave us local tips and made sure my Dad had everything he needed. Great experience - would thoroughly recommend Brendan’s place!
Staying at Brendan’s was great. Wonderful flat, lovely town, easy to get downtown. Brendan is a great host.

Brendan is a helpful, caring host and his apartment is comfortable and very clean and tidy.
Definitely recommended as a place to stay with views over Bondi Beach
I had a very comfortable stay! The place is in a great location, close to the beach and public transportation. I would definitely recommend his place to anybody looking to stay in Bondi Beach.
Excellent place to use as a launch pad for all of Bondi. Very clean and the view from the patio is excellent. The coffee and tea was a nice touch! Highly recommend.

I stayed at Brendan's place and had a wonderful stay. Brendan is very helpful, responsive and even took me to the tour around the neighborhood to familiar myself with the location. The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood but it is  just behind the main road leading to the beach, offering variety of cafes, bars and restaurants.  All you need to do is simply take a leisure walk. In terms of public transportation, there is a nearby bus stop at the main road that can connect you to the Bondi Train Station, and from here you can take train ride to the city. All in all, it is a convenient place for me!

Best place in Bondi for stay and top host.
Will stay again.

I stayed at Brendan's place for 3 nights and had a pleasant experience. The apartment is merely a few mins walk from the famous Iceberg pool and yet its super quiet in the evenings. 
Brendan was kind and helpful with great local tips. I would highly recommend to those who visit Sydney and look to spend time at Bondi.

Brendan was very accommodating and helpful with recommendations for spots to visit, and information on transport to his place. He was a wonderful host, and his place was clean and lovely. Highly recommended!
Very nice and gentle host, nice Bedroom, great view on the balcony and very close to the beach and Costal Walkway. Excellent value for the money.

I enjoyed the time at Brendan’s apartment. It was my best experience in Sydney. The apartment and room is clean and cozy. Very good located. And the view from the balcony during morning coffee or afternoon drink is amazing.
Brandan is a very good host, and a great person.

Brendan's spot is absolutely a DREAM! Just steps away from the beach, 333 bus line that goes to bondi junction toward the city, and tons of hip cafes that Bondi has to offer. Not to mention, Brendan is an extremely kind host. Our schedules didn't match up so I barely saw him, but it was lovely to meet him. Reviews talk about a big hill, which really isn't that big, so don't be deterred because of that. THANK YOU BRENDAN!
Nice host. Great view and location. Cozy room.
Brendan is a fantastic host. Place is in a great location just minutes walk from Bondi Beach. Place is spotless. Bed is really comfortable. Great value. Definitely recommended.

Great location - really close to the beach & bus. Clean, tidy, great decor & Fresh flowers were a great touch.

Brendan was a gracious host and fun to chat with. Made my stay very comfortable.
Awesome location, very clean and very kind host! Definitely recommended.

Brendan is great and his apartment and room is very comfortable. Perfectly located. Brendan is a walking book if you need a tip for a trip around. Was very kind and let us bring out bags earlier than a check in time and also was  activily helpful in general. Thank you Brendan!

Our 2 nights stay in Bondi Beach was nothing short of amazing, thanks to Brendan as he is such a fantastic host. 
Before arriving, he sent us some recommendations of things to do in Bondi, some nice restaurants, and also an easy to follow instructions for us to get to his house which was really helpful and courteous. He was also kind enough to send us to Bondi Junction when we were leaving, as he saw that we are carrying a huge luggage. My boyfriend left his bag at the house after we left to the CBD, Brendan was again very kind to send the bag to Bondi Junction train station for us.
Brendan's property is located at the heart of Bondi Beach, within 5 minutes walking distance to the beach and Bondi Icebergs, and is also very near to some amazing bars and cafes. His house is clean, and very cozy as well.
Phantastic location,  great host, stunning view on bondi, bright room.  Sincerely recommended

reviews.comments:
The  stay at Kazim' s appartment was a great experience for us.
We enjoyed the apartement and the view out of the kitchen a lot.
The flat is clean, cozy and warm.
The kitchen is very good equipped.
 We  felt like at home and at the living-room like to stay in a cinema. 
Thank you Kazim!

We had a wonderful time here! Kazim very kindly picked us up in Fatih and drove us to his place in Eyup. He drove around the neighborhood a bit to show us the good restaurants, staircase down, bakeries, and grocery stores. Then parked on the very steep slope and helped us carry our stuff up to the flat. The flat was clean and had fresh fruit and some extra supplies waiting for us. The internet was fast and the two bedrooms were comfortable. And there were amazing views from the windows and balconies. We were there for the month of May which was very comfortable to just leave the windows and doors open to enjoy the breeze. Our favorite thing though was getting to know the neighborhood. We frequented a bakery, butcher shop, and vegetable market on the main level and a bakery and grocery above us. Nobody speaks English in the area, but they were so friendly and made an effort to help and communicate with us. This place is perfect for getting to immerse in the culture of Turkey. Down at the lower level, buses come every couple minutes and provide a 20 minute trip to Eminonu (Fatih) or 9 minutes to Taksim Square. The only downside is that this would be a tough place for people with disabilities.
Хозяин очень доброжелателен, квартира чистая, нет никаких запахов. Хозяин даже помог нам занести чемоданы. Район спокойный, но до центра минут 25 -30 на автобусе, нет метро.
Kazim is much better than expected.

name: Historical Istanbul House @ Taksim
summary: Newly Restored Historical Istanbul Apartment with 3 m high ceilings and balcony. Our historical Flat situated at the hearth of the Istanbul, 5 min away from the Taksim Square and on a very calm and secure street.
space: New Restored Historical Istanbul Apartment with 3 m high ceilings and balcony. It is a great choice for a family stay or group of couples for an enjoyable vacation in our city. The apartment is the top choice for economy, comfort and style in short/long term and it is from owner not agency. It is on the first floor. If the flat is booked for your traviling dates,  i can recommend you this listing of mine: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/4939547   The big bedroom has a King-Size bed, a large wardrobe. The small bedroom has full sized bunk beds (90 cm x 200 cm). The living room is spacious and there are a pull out couch that opens to a comfy King-Size bed, a wooden dining table & 6 chairs and LCD-TV. The small bedroom has a balcony too. The ground is parquet and ceramic floor. The kitchen is fully equipped. There is hot water and free Wireless Internet during 24 h. The two bedrooms are newly equipped with air conditioners. neighborhood_overview: The apartment is clean and quiet centrally located in a safe neighborhood, very close to Taksim Square and to Istiklal Avenue (5 min. to walk) and offers great access to public transportation (Bus station 2 minutes to walk, Subway station 5 minutes to walk). Beyoglu is Istanbul’s most living and cosmopolitan quarter with a wealth of architectural styles, synagogues, Turkish baths, mosques, museums, traditional restaurants, cafés, antique shops and great nightlife. Istiklal Avenue, the more modern district of Istanbul built during the 19th century, is the hearth of Beyoglu. Close to all your needs : Pharmacy - 2 min Change office - 2 min Market - 2 min At the same street there are a lot of restaurants with fair prices. Istanbul Military Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Istanbul Lutfi Kirdar Convention and Exhibition Center - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Taksim Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi Ataturk Cultural Center - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi Cemal Resit Rey Concert Hall - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi Istiklal Avenue - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi I
transit: Bus station - 2 min Subway station - 5 min
access: The kitchen has full set of kitchen supplies, pans, plates, cutlery, cutting board, cooking set, kettle, coffee machine, etc... The dish washer, washing machine, iron and ironing board, hairdryer, a fan are also included in the apartment.  There is hot water and free Wireless Internet during 24 h. Bathroom: • Shower • Hairdryer • Towels • Toilette Paper • Soap • Washing machine • Iron&ironing board
house_rules: Our guests may smoke only on the balcony. Please take off your shoes at the front door. Please lock the doors and close the windows when you leave the flat. Please don´t touch the heat controller unit. You can leave your garbage on the street. We just ask our guests to be quiet after midnight.

host.host_about: I rent my apartment in Istanbul and my family help me by check-ins and check-outs.

reviews.comments: This apartment is spotlessly clean, very comfortable and in a great location, perfect if you want to stay near Taksim. The owners were extremly kind  and welcomed us with cold drinks on arrival. I will definetly be staying  stay here again when i come back to Istanbul.

I traveled here with my family, and had an incredible stay!  Alex was incredibly welcoming.  He greeted us openly, and gave us a great tour of the house.  He also gave us a nice explanation of Istanbul on the map.  We were so comfortable at the house.  The location is great and is walking distance to Taksim Square...where you can easily access the metro, and all of Istanbul.  We cannot wait to return and stay here again!  Thank you so much Alex for helping make our first trip to Istanbul one to remember!
Alexis was very nice and a really good host. the place is well located , spacious, and clean. I recommend it to anyone.

We stayed in this Apartment in august 2012. The owner himself met us at the apartment and was really kind and helpful, welcome us with a cold drink, very helpful if it´s 35 degrees outside, explained everything and took us on a small apartment tour to show us around. 

The apartment itself is very clean and comfy, equipped with everything you need and we really enjoyed our stay there. It is very close to Taksim Square, where you can reach the metro and start your journey to discover Istanbul. 
From Taksim Square the apartment is very easy to find, so you can easily take the Havatas bus transfer from both airports to go there.
There are a lot of small shops nearby where you can buy all things you might need during your stay and even if you don´t want to cook you can find good food at a good price.
I hope we can come back to Istanbul soon and if possible stay in this apartment again.

Ich kann nur jedem dieses Apartment empfehlen!
Alex war ein super Gastgeber und bei Fragen immer sofort erreichbar.
Die Wohnung war ganz nah an allen Hotspots und gleichzeitig ein guter Rückzugsort, wenn man sich erholen wollte.
Die Ausstattung war vom Feinsten und es fehlte an Nichts.
Beim nächsten mal wieder gerne!

Just want to confirm what the other guests commented about the flat.
My family and I stayed there for 8 days and we were very satisfied with the flat and location and of course the welcoming from Alex parents. The only thing we missed was internet access.

The house is located in a quiet area, away from the traffic noise, 5-10 minutes from Taksim, the main square in the east of Istanbul, where comes the funicular and 1 minute from a wonderful Turkish pastry!
The house is new, with tasteful furniture and very clean. The bathroom is nice and there's a beautiful shower, with water always hot!
The rooms are comfortable and brand new mattresses.
The kitchen is small but well equipped.
The bright living room has a sofa bed very clean.
The only minor flaw is internet, it takes 24 h 24 but only near the window or on the terrace.

L'abitazione è situata in una zona tranquilla, lontana dai rumori del traffico, a 5-10 minuti da Taksim, la piazza principale della zona orientale di Istanbul, dove arriva anche la funicolare e a 1 minuto da una meravigliosa pasticceria turca!
La casa è nuova, con arredamento di gusto e molto pulito. Bagno curato e doccia splendida, con acqua sempre calda!
Le camere sono confortevoli e i materassi nuovissimi.
La cucina è piccola ma ben attrezzata.
Il soggiorno molto luminoso e spazioso con divano letto molto pulito.
L'unica piccola pecca è internet, si prende 24 h su 24 ma solo vicino alla finestra o in terrazzo.

This apartment is spotlessly clean, and everything is just as described in the listings, with one big double-bed room, and one smaller room with bunk-beds..  It has obviously been recently renovated, and the kitchen and bathroom are very nicely fitted out.   I also enjoyed staying in a very non-touristy area (Sisli) just 10 minutes walk from Taksim square.  Downsides:  Internet wasn't working when I got there (seemed to be a problem from the company - fixed after a few days).  But really, no other downsides - a very nice place.

Alexis has been careful host, planning our arrival few weeks before. We have been welcomed by Alexis's dad and mom, charming persons. Our plane was leaving later than check out time proposed and Alexis fully agreed to give us extra time at the flat.

Newly renovated and furbished flat with a A-class bathroom only 5 minutes walk from Taksim, in a calm neighborhood.

Fully recommended.

Its been a pleasure staying at Alexis' place. The flat was perfectly clean and cozy. Its perfectly situated in Taksim - walking distance to all the hotspots in and around Beyoğlu. But since it is located in a quiet street, you can even sleep with the windows opened. Alexi and his family were very friendly, and helped us with all our questions. The flat is well equipped, everything we needed was there - even a dishwasher and a WiFi-connection were available. Five stars! Definitely going back there for our next trip to Istanbul!

Nice flat 10 min away from taksim square and 15 min from Istiklal Cd. Not Very convenient if you are looking to party. I would recommend to stay on sultanahmet side if you are more into the cultural things.
All furnitures were brand new. Alexis also provided all bath towels and bed sheets. Kitchen was fully equipped and bathroom very neat.
One thing to note is that I was expecting for some more personal advices from the owner. I asked for a list of restaurants or bars but never received it. 
Overall, it was a nice trip.

Great little apartment. Supplied with everything we would need and enough room for 5 people to stay comfortably.  Alex was very accommodating and allowed an early check in which was a life saver. Good location although many cabs didn't know the exact street but we soon knew where we were. Excellent!

I cannot think of a better place to stay in Istanbul. Amazing flat, kind and attentive hosts, super clean, close to everything. Internet worked fine (though faster from living room), bath is very mordern and complete, very nice new towels, kitchen was perfect, will come again.

Die Wohnung war super schön, neu renoviert und sehr zentral. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt dort sehr genossen.
Außerdem ist Alexis absolut zuvelässig und hat sich um alles perfekt gekümmert. Vielen Dank!

Amazing! 
Perfect location, super clean rooms, nice beds, great bath. Better than a hotel! Best accomodation we ever had. 
Alexis was also a perfect host. Thank you, Alexis!

We had a great stay at Alex's apartment in Taksim. It's very easy (5 minutes) to walk to Taksim's main shopping area and underground train station from the apartment. 5 of us stayed there and we found it to be spacious and immaculately clean. Alex and his Mum gave us a friendly welcome and showed us where everything was.

The only problem we had was a power cut on Sunday morning. Alex offered to come over and fix the problem, and he was easy to contact.

We would stay at the apartment again as it's spacious and very good value.

Excellent apartment, better than staying in a hotel.  Comfortably housed four of us: two in the bedroom with bunk beds, one in the bedroom with the queen sized bed, and one person on the large pull-out couch in living room.  Centrally located in a quite hilly street about a 5-8 minute walk from the north end of Taksim Square.  Great home base to explore the city from.  Owner was responsive to my emails.
Very clean, spacious apartment near the main square! Great location and value for price!

Before our arrival, Alex provided us with a map and some guidance on how to find his apartment which was very helpful. When we arrived, his mom was there to welcome us and showed us everything. The apartment is located in a quiet street with the bedrooms facing an even more quiet courtyard and it takes a 5-10 minutes walk to Taksim square and Istiklal Street. The apartment was very clean and comfortable, we always had hot water in the shower and the internet worked fine. We were also provided with everything we needed. We had a wonderful time and I would definitely recommend this place!

We had a great stay in Istanbul and the apartment is marvellous. In app. 10 minutes walk from the Taksim square you will reach the apartment. It´s in a very tidy condition and lovingly equipped. I can highly recommend it.
very rewarding place to stay in the heart of Istanbul! Alexis is a very friendly and helpful host..  We would like to come back soon !!

Alex's apartment is absolutely great: extra clean, with new furniture and all possible appliances. As we came at 8 p.m. the host provided tea, coffee and water for us which we appreciated very much. He also provided us with a great city map which was very helpful. The wi-fi worked with no problems whatsoever. Alexis was also kind enough to let us leave our bags at the apartment for a few more hours after check-out time, which gave us the opportunity to visit some more before heading to the airport. The apartment is ideal for families with children, much more spacious than any hotel room in this price range, and in a quiet neighborhood. Highly recommendable! Thank you Alexis

Alex was a great host - completely responsive to all of our needs. He was there to welcome us at the apartment with all the information and some Turkish snacks.The apartment was charming, quite spacious and in a neighborhood convenient to Taksim. I would highly recommend it as a relaxing alternative to the hustle and bustle of the more touristy hotels in the city.
Erzähle anderen in der Airbnb-Community von Deinem Aufenthalt.

Alexis' apartment provides for a pleasant, spacious, well equipped and very well maintained home, conveniently located within walking distance of the centrally located Taksim Square. A good starting point for explorations of Istanbul. Communication with Alexis runs flawlessly. I can wholeheartedly recommend a stay in Alexis' apartment

L'appartement d'Alexis est très agréable, propre, spacieux et bien situé.
Situation géographique idéale : Proche des transports en commun pour explorer la ville dans la journée (quelque soit les quartiers) et le soir proche des lieux ou se trouvent les restaurants et bars pour une petite sortie (10 min à pied).
Alexis a été disponible pour répondre à nos messages lors de notre séjour. Très bon rapport qualité prix je le recommande à 100%.
Nice and modern apartment near Taksim Square. It had everything we needed. Alex and his parents were very nice hosts. :-) Would definitely stay there again.

excellent stay at Alexis. What a wonderful apartment and a wonderful host to complement it. Very good location & very clean apartment. Would highly recommend & comeback here if we had a chance. 

Thoroughly enjoyed Istanbul.
The flat was really perfect! Very clean, quiet and new. Surrounded by supermarkets and turkish snack bars. It was only a 5 minute walk to Taksim place. I'd really stay there again!

The apartment is wonderful and Alexis (and his mother) made every effort to ensure that our stay was comfortable.The apartment is clean, furnished with modern household appliances and is very comfortable either for a short or an extended stay. No problems with wi-fi or any other utility. i would unreservedly recommend Alexis' apartment to anyone.

Beautiful, clean apartment, exactly as in the photos. Everything you need for a comfortable stay in Istanbul. Good location, very safe (never seen a solid door like that before!), beautifully renovated. Alexis was very easy to contact as well. 100% Recommended.

It was a pleasure staying at Alexis place. There was everything you needed for a good stay in this awesome city. Plus the location near the Taksim square is very convenient to explore the Beyoglu area and have a drink or visit a nightclub nearby. The flat is very well taken care of, has running AC and WiFi. I can highly recommend this place.

HIS PROPERTY IS JUST AMAZING. Book it!

Really Amazing...  IN a true cross roads world city ... Istanbul.


What a location and what a great value apartment. And a feel of a historic home ... living like the (wealthy ...I guess) local İstanbul people. The apartment is great mix of value and  comfort and and is on 1rd floor

 Why stay at a exorbitantly priced hotel room with little space ...when you could have a whole family home for 40 to 50% of the cost of a small room. 

Summary

The best recommendation one can really give is … would you use it again … well yes …I am in this property again on the 1st September. The apartment is just a great choice for those WHO want something real and authentic ... and owned and cared for by a real owner.

I never met the owner himself ... but his father ... check in and check out is effortless.

About the property ...

It really is a restored historical istanbul flat with 3 m high ceilings and balcony

The apartment is clean and quiet centrally located in a safe neighbourhood, very close to Taksim Square and to Istiklal Avenue 

Beyoglu is Istanbul’s most living and cosmopolitan quarter with a wealth of architectural styles, synagogues, Turkish baths, mosques, museums, traditional restaurants, cafés, antique shops and great nightlife. 

It is a great choice for a family stay or group of couples for an enjoyable vacation in our city. 

Why I liked the property ...

 This property is just fantastic,  Great value ... amazingly located apartment. Simply a complete gem.

 I have stayed in Istanbul a few times ... gone from chain international hotels to boutique hotels to this. An evolutionary and postive move each time.

and this is HALF the price of a room in a small boutique hotel ... you get a great apartment 

 You are only 2 blocks from subway.... This is perfect for all type  of  travellers ... particularly families. . It has great wifi

So the net net

Comfortable and classy ... unique location with breathtaking view of central park ... and in a quiet building.

. 

FINALLY ... Alexis/ Father are great Airbnb hosts! 

 They live the values of values of Airbnb.


 This is:

 Be transparent ... Accurately... represent your listing.

Be upfront about pricing, amenities, and expectations. 

Update your calendar

Respond Promptly reply to messages & reservation requests. 

Check-in Coordinate check-in time & key exchange well in advance of the actual date. 

Welcome your guests with a big smile! 


Simply ... look at the photos ... and book it. You will not regret . Thank you Harj

Ps ... One note ... I think it has no oven in the Kitchen ...not completly sure ...will find out in 3 weeks time.

The apartment was very clean, updated, comfortable, and close to Taksim square and public transportation.  It was exactly as advertised, and Alex is a good communicator and responsive.  Highly recommended.

We loved this (Website hidden by Airbnb) feels like home. super clean, tidy, and beautiful. Alexis and his family are very nice and helpful people. the location as it says is next to Taksim square. Few grocery stores are just step away. hundreds of restaurant around. very safe location. very convenience to and from airport by Havatas airport to Taksim non stop shuttle, it costs only 10 Lira. 
We highly recommend Alexis' to our friends.

This apartment was an oasis of calm, peacefulness and cleanliness in the middle of Istanbul. Very central and yet so quiet and well presented. The rooms were immaculate and every service provided  I would highly recommend staying in Alexis' perfect apartment!

Great apartment, very clean and in an easy location for accessing Taksim and public transport. Alexis was quick with communications and check in went smoothly and Alexis was very helpful with advice! Very much recommended!

Thanks for a great stay Alex. The apartment was wonderful! It has a terrific bathroom with an excellent shower, the bed was very comfortable and the living room was large with a great TV.  We were also close to Taksim square, which was handy.

Alex was also VERY accommodating with check in and check, as we were able to leave our bags for the day and leave a little later than usual. Thanks!

Would definitely recommend and would stay again.

The apt was fantastic. Super comfortable, clean, ample, and warm. You can get all what you need from this unit. I would say, it was better than a hotel of the same neighborhood (three times more space and for a half of the price).

Very close to Taksim square and very well connected with the all the historical attractions of Istanbul.

You can completely trust in all what the landlord is offering through the ads. The apt was exactly as he described in this website.

I would like to come back to Istanbul and stay in the same place. No question about it.

I recommend this place a 100%.

Excellent accommodation & management of meet & greet, key transfer.  Recently renovated & spotless. Massive thanks to Sophie & co who waited patiently for us as our taxi driver took a tortuous & expensive route from the airport.

All communications handled very professionally.  The cleanest place we stayed in our travels with 5 Airbnb accommodation.
the flat is unbelievable value. it was like staying in 5 star hotel! it made our trip to istanbul

Alexis was extremely helpful and informative in the lead-up to my trip. When I got to the apartment, the keys were handed over by his mother as promised. The apartment was spotless, everything was how it appears in the photos. The apartment is spacious and has modern appliances; it is also nicely decorated inside. I would thoroughly recommend booking with Alexis. The next time I go to Istanbul I will certainly be booking with him.

The area is a good one also, Taksim. There is plenty of activity close by, (in Beyoglu I think it is called) but the street and immediate vicinity is fairly quiet so you won't be awaken by noise. There is a convenience shop just up the road which was useful too.

Overall I had a great time in Istanbul. I don't think there were any negatives to Alexis flat and hosting...just positives :)

Chris (25, London.)

Die Wohnung ist ideal gelegen. Innert kurzer Zeit erreicht man entweder zu Fuss oder mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln die meistbesuchten Sehenswürdigkeiten. Nicht weit entfernt gibt es eine Fülle von Restaurants in allen Preislagen.
Bei unserer Ankunft haben wir mit Freude festgestellt, dass die Wohnung voll mit der Beschreibung übereinstimmt. Sie ist sehr sauber, alles funktioniert bestens und wir haben uns äusserst wohlgefühlt. Der WiFi Zugang ist sehr wertvoll, weil man das Gesehene nachlesen und sich in die Kultur vertiefen kann. Der Kontakt mit Alex ist unkompliziert, er beantwortet Fragen innert kurzer Zeit. Wir haben uns wirklich sehr wohlgefühlt. Herzlichen Dank: Ruth
we had a very good time! the flat is good located (but still quiet), good equipped and clean, Alexis is a nice and helpful host. very good value for money - recommendation from my side!

We stayed in this appartement for 6 days, to attend a congress and to enjoy Istanbul. It was perfect in many ways: Alexis ' mother received us very nice, the appartement was very very clean and had everything we wanted. We didn't use the refrigerator or washingmachine, but it's all there. We felt comfortabele and at ease. The congress centre was a 10 minutes walk from the appartement, as was Taksim square. This area of Istanbul is a good location for people who, like us, have free time to spend in the evenings, because it's a very lively place. The street where the appartement is is quiet. I would love to come back to this appartement if I ever return to this wonderful city!

Alexis n'était pas présent à notre arrivée mais il a été réactif et arrangeant tout au long de nos différents contacts. Ses parents nous ont accueillis gentiment le jour J. 
L'appartement est très très propre, lumineux, fonctionnel et très bien situé. Si vous êtes sensible, comme moi, aux bruits, n'hésitez pas à apporter le nécessaire.   
Nous sommes donc dans l'ensemble très satisfaits de cette location. Elle participe pleinement aux merveilleux souvenirs que nous gardons de cette ville fabuleuse !
Alexis is a really friendly and helpful person. The flat is amazing: very clean and welcoming. Moreover it is really well located, a few steps away from Taksim. I definitely recommend it!

Alexis and his mother were kind and nice hosts and they gave us nice hints about the city and how to find the places we were looking for. The apartment is cleaned and everything was perfect for our staying. We’ve been in Istanbul for a business congress and the location of the house was great because it’s just in the city center just a walk from Taksim Square. 
Thank you Alexis!

The place was great and absolutely beautiful. We even had water provided for us. The place was clean and the pictures were extremely accurate. 

Alex was extremely responsive and even provided instructions to us in Turkish! I would recommend this to all of our friends and family. If we are ever back in Istanbul we will stay definitely stay there.
Great location, great hospitality, great atmosphere of the apartment with modern, well designed high quality household goods :) I'm afraid I would not find a place on my next visit :) Thanks.

Alex was very easy to contact and very responsive. His directions and instructions were excellent. If you're a first time visitor to Istanbul he shows you exactly how to get to the flat from the airport.  His mother and father were very gracious and helpful when I met them at the flat. The location is very good. Close to transport and Taksim but very quiet. The flat is very spacious and well equipped. I can't think of any negatives.

Alexis was an excellent host. He was very prompt with his responses to requests and inquiries. Furthermore, his apartment is very clean(Cleanest apartment I've stayed at in all my travels), beautiful and spacious and easily sleeps up to 5 people. Additionally, it is very close to all the nightlife (Taksim) within walking distance or a short taxi ride to restaurants, shops and attractions within Istanbul. I highly recommend Alexis and his apartment and would love the chance to stay there again next time I'm in Istanbul.

Myself and some friends stayed in the apartment in Istanbul for 4 nights. We had a fantastic time. The apartment was perfect- very central. Everything was clean and brand new and the host had kindly supplied us with towels, fruit and some other items. The host Alexis was very fast at getting back to us and answered all of our questions.

We will definately be going and back and staying in the apartment again.

Our stay at at Alexis place was absolutely perfect! 
Alexis provided us with all the necessary information starting from how to get to the apartment from the airport, how to move around in Istanbul, etc. The apartment was spotless clean and very welcoming. It was the best stay that I had in an Airbnb apartment. We had a wonderful time. =)

Wir (49,46 und 18) hatten eine wunderschöne Woche über Weihnachten 2013 in Istanbul. Die Wohnung von Alexis hatte einen grossen Anteil daran.

Alles hat perfekt funktioniert. Alexis' Vater hat uns zu trotz einer einstündigen Verspätung begrüsst.

Die Wohnung ist wie von vielen vorher beschrieben. Von der Lage her meines Erachtens ideal, zwar nahe am Taksim-Platz und der riesigen Fussgängerzone, aber weit genug weg von Strassenlärm und auch den Demos, die uns in keiner Weise irgendwie behindert hätten.

Taxi, Metro/Strassenbahn, Cafes sind ganz nah, der Havatas-Bus vom/zum Flughafen quasi um die Ecke.

Hilfreich war auch die perfekte Ausstattung von Handtüchern u.ä.  über Spülmaschine, Waschmaschine, Fernseher und vieles mehr.

Ich schreibe diese Bewertung in Deutsch, in Englisch gibt es ja schon etliche.


Dear Alexis,

thank you very much, we enjoyed your apartment really. Happy new year and good luck whereever you are!

Wolfgang and family

My husband and I stayed in the Alexis's apartment in January for 4 days. It was our first stay with airbnb and definitely not the last. The flat is really nice, very well decorated and perfectly clean, we enjoyed the time spent there, the quality of sleeping there was at high level. The location was perfect, near the Taxim place, in the quite and nice neighborhood with some good restaurants where the local people go, small grocery shops and hair dressers. It was absolute safe there, even in night and we also enjoyed walking to the Macka park and pet the cats there.
