Alexis and his mum are great hosts, they gave us insider tips regarding where to eat, shop, make the hair.. and all of those tips were great... and bought for us, paid in advance, the tickets for a basketball game which was great.. Thank you Alexis and your lovely mum for making our visit to this wonderful city even better.

Highly recommended!
Excellent apartment in close walking distance to Taksim square. Very quiet apartment and neighborhood. It's clean and cosy, and offers ample space for 3 - 4 persons.

This appartement is really nice. Even though it is near Taksim Square, the street, the appartement is on, is quiet and nice. If you want to explore the historic centre and Beyoglu this is really a good place to stay - near the Taksim Metro stop and the large shopping street Tersane Caddesi. The appartement has a very high comfort and Alexis has been a very helpfull and nice host.

Alexis was a brilliant host, getting back to emails and queries with useful info which helped a lot with all preparations. The flat is gorgeous! A spacious, comfortable, nicely done flat with a great book collection, city guides, several pretty little deco pieces and surely the highlight of the flat was the couch corner by the window :-) The whole group enjoyed staying here.

The location of this apartment is awesome, walking distance to the main eating and shopping area. It’s in a smaller lane, so not right next to the big street, making it quiet and cozy.
The house decoration is just as nice as shown on the pictures, full of thoughtful designs, the owner also prepared whatever a traveller may need in the bathroom, like plenty clean towels and place to hang washed cloths...etc. Lastly, a good price with good value. Hope everyone will have a fun trip to Istanbul.

The flat was even better than I expected. Very clean and everyting need was there.
Alexis is very reactive and gives good informations.
Great host, flat was amazing, right in the centre. Thank you!!

Alexis' home was just as lovely as in the pictures.  Extremely clean, tastefully decorated, comfortable, secure and inviting. Alexis was not available to greet us when we arrived so his mother greeted us and took time to give us a full tour of the apartment and show us how everything works.  I had a question she could not answer well enough in English so she got Alexis on the phone for us who was able to answer my question as well as make an additional recommendation.  The apartment is located just blocks from bustling Istiklal Caddesi and with a 5 minute walk to Taksim Square it was very easy to take public transportation everywhere else.  It was a pleasure to stay there - I highly recommend and look forward to staying again on our next visit!

The Historical Istanbul House is in a great location just a few minutes walk from Taksim plaza. There is plenty of space inside the flat, it is clean, well lit, nicely furnished with a new bathroom including a washer. The place is so secure I marveled at the engineering of the front door. There aren't many places you go that deserve a picture of the security but trust me this is one. Nothing unwanted is coming through that front door, it's an engineering marvel challenging a bank vault. I've never seen anything like it.  Stay here and see. It's a great place to be and I would choose this location again on my next trip through Istanbul.

Dear Aleksi, 
the area was beautiful, your appartment was beautiful, check in , check out without any problems ! I love your specail - safety  door ! :-)   I ´ve enjoyed to stay in your appartment, i can recommend you apparment to anybody book it folks ! Very close to the central place of taksim, shops,markets,cash points etc etc. Havas Bus Transfer meeting point very close to the apparment. I am planning to visit in September again and if your appartment is available I would book it again. 
Thank you take care and god bless you. 
Yavuz.

Alexis' flat is beautiful, spacious, spotlessly clean, and very well equipped. I felt truly at home, in a comfortable and cozy environment. The location is very convenient, just a few minutes away from Taksim square, or, heading North, from other interesting and lively parts of Istanbul. Getting in touch with Alexis and arranging the check in could not have been easier. I highly recommend Alexis' flat.

This apartment was absolutely wonderful. Check-in was a breeze, as my friends and I promptly received the keys from Alexis' dad. We thoroughly enjoyed such a clean, centrally located apartment. The place was extremely clean and smelled wonderful every time we walked into the apartment. The bay windows provide a great view of the street and wonderful natural light. We were close to the bustling Taksim Square (15 minute walk) but far enough that we heard no noise at night. We felt very safe (the sturdy door had an even sturdier lock) and highly recommend Alexis' apartment.

Extremely nice apartment at a convenient location. Alex was very thorough with his instructions on getting to his apartment from the airports. Check in and check out was a smooth (Website hidden by Airbnb) friends and I hope to stay again!

Lovely apartment.  Wished I could have taken the shower home with me.  Very quite neighborhood but a little noise from the birds on the roof.  Noise came in through the bath vent.

My wife didn't like the steep 1 1/2 block walk up to the main street but other than that it was an ideal location.  I would strongly recommend getting a car service for airport pickup and return, as we did,  if you have more than one small roller bag, as it is a pretty long walk from the main square drop off point for the shuttle bus or subway, plus the steep incline on the 1 1/2 block down to the apartment from the main street.

We would for sure stay with Alexis if we returned to Istanbul again.  His mother meet us at the apartment when we arrived and Alexis called and talked to us before his mother left to make sure everything was in order.  Departure instructions were to just live the keys in the apartment and go.

This was our second time in Istanbul (1 day off the cruise ship) plus these six days with Alexis.  Although we saw a lot our first day off the cruise ship it was really nice to have 5 full days this time to really see the sights.  We left wishing we would have had a least 1-2 more days to go back to the places we had seen 2 years ago and didn't have time to also fit them in on this trip.

Before you go to Istanbul be sure and learn about the history of the city from at least the 2nd Century AD

Just spent Easter in Alexis' apartment. His mom greeted us and ensured all was in order on arrival as well as departure. They were very flexible allowing us to check out late and leave our luggage in the flat whilst out and about during the last day. The location is convenient for Taksim and Istiklal but at the same time ensures you are able to get some sleep, which is not possible in loads of places that are just around the corner from Istiklal. Alexis although away from Istanbul, was very responsive to any queries during our stay and ensured we had all instructions required about our stat. Overall a great stay.

Sehr schöne Wohnung, sehr sauber, sehr gute Lage!
Ich kann diese wirklich ohne Einschränkungen weiterempfehlen.
Zudem ist der Kontakt zu Alexis sehr unkompliziert. Schnelle Antworten, sehr guter Service!

L'appartement est situé à une petite dizaine de minutes de la place taksim. Très pratique pour les transports en commun. Propreté top. Calme  et confortable. Niveau accueil c'est la maman d'Alexis qui vous remet les clés vite fait. Donc faut pas compter sur un dialogue avec l'hôte qui n'est pas là. Par contre Alexis est très attentif et réactif. Le rideau de la chambre est tombé, Alexis a envoyé quelqu'un rapidement pour l'arranger. Un bon séjour.

We were 4 girls and stayed in Alexis appartment for 4 days. The appartment is perfectly located close to Taxim, so we mostly went by food to all areas in Istanbul. The appartment was lovely furnished as seen on the picture. It was very clean and everything was there what you need: towels, tea for breakfast, fully equiped kitchen, washing machine etc. We were friendly welcomed and had no problems. It is very calm there so we got perfect sleep to discover Istanbul. We had a great time also thanks to Alexis appartment. We very enjoyed our stay and can hardly recommend Alexis appartment.

This was a great local experience close to everything by foot or by taxi (which is inexpensive). A taxi front he airport to the apartment is about 30 Euro. 

The apartment itself is super clean, has nice interior, a small kitchen and two bedrooms perfect for two kids and two adults. Great bathroom.

Alexis was out of town, so his very nice parents greeted us...the language barrier was challenging but we managed.  We arrived at IST airport at 11:45pm, but after customs, etc. and taxi drive, it was after 2am before we arrived at the apartment.  The door is a little tricky to learn how to lock/unlock so make sure you have it figured out before the host leaves after checking you in.  Our driver had difficulty (at night) finding the place despite Alexis detailed directions that I printed (Website hidden by Airbnb) just a heads up.  We had four in our group, all requiring separate beds, and the arrangements met our needs.  Close to grocery stores and a food cart was just steps outside the rental...hot sandwich which was pretty dang good.  Easy walk to metro station.  Travel guides a plus.  Large container of bottled water was on hand and so was an iron, laundry soap, and bar soap.  Apartment is well maintained.  Positive experience.  Istanbul is a great city...clean, historic, and not expensive in my opinion.  We took a ferry to the Asian side and found it to be a wonderful first day of exploring everyday street life which was the highlight of our brief 2 day stay.
we had a great time in this charming Apartment in the middle of the City!
Great location, perfect host, good directions to get to the apartment.

We were welcomed warmly in the appartement and our host spoke super German and English and instructed us straight away :-) The flat looked like totally newly renovated, extremy clean, nicely furnitured and quiet. No doupt we can highly recommend this flat (for 2 - 4/5 persons), especially as it is only 7 walking minutes from Taksim and a Metrostation. Best regards Andrea & Urs

A perfect apartment, very clean and comfortable and great location for the wedding that we were attending. Alexis and his Mother (who met us) were extremely helpful. I would definitely stay here again. Also all the locals who we met near the apartment were extremely friendly. Thank You!

Alexis's parents met us to hand over the keys, and they were very sweet. The apartment's location is very close to many things (metro and funicular, bars/restaurant), but not so close that it's loud. The apartment was spotless!
This is a great place to stay. Highly recommended. Alexis and his parents went out of their way to help us. The place is very clean and comfortable and in a central location. Thanks Alexis!

Alexis was a very good host and we had excellent communication! He was not in Turkey so his mother opened the apartment for us. Everything is very clean and taken care of to the last detail. The house was lovely and at the best location just 10 min walking to Taksim square, only 4 minuites from Havatas airport bus shuttle and Taksim Metro station. The only problem we faced was that we had a water shortage for a fortnight, which was fixed on the next day. Other than that we enjoyed very much our stay in the apartment , it is comfortable for 5 persons, however one bathroom can be a fuss if you are so many... Definetely recommend it :)
房子位置很好,裏 Taksim 廣場比較近,附近吃飯也很方便｡有當地特色的裝修風格,設施也很齊全｡沒有見過房東,是一位女士給的鑰匙,從信件中感覺房東人應該很好｡
Beautiful appartment and perfect position.

beautiful flat, it is exactly as it is described in the website. 
we were very near from taxim place (5min to walk) so there is a lot of restaurants and activities to do the night. 
Alexis and his parents were very welcoming (as turkish people). 
an email has been sent before our arrival  with complete and clear description. 

It was my first experience with AirBnb and I will continue to use it. 

I'm going to recommend to my friend and my familly to test this flat !!

Alexis is a wonderful host! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at his flat. The flat is a few minutes walk from Taksim Square which made it really convenient for transportation from the airport and getting to other areas in Istanbul. I really applaud Alexis for keeping his flat super clean and providing all the amenities one would need. Alexis' mom met us at the flat and gave us the key. She walked us through everything and really made us feel welcomed. I'd highly recommend Alexis' flat to anyone visiting Istanbul!

Four of us stayed in Alexis' apartment for two nights.  Brilliant location, five minutes walk to Taksim Square and main Street, but in a quiet street.  The apartment was meticulously clean and beautifully presented.  Roomy, comfortable.. lovely bay window in lounge room where you could sit.  Air conditioning in both bedrooms.  Has everything you need.  Highly recommend.

A great location for us, really close to where we were attending a conference but also a short walk to the nearest public transport (and Taksim Square) to move around the city and to/from the airport bus stop. Some lovely restaurants very nearby also as well as small shops for food. The flat was exactly as described, spotlessly clean and really lovely - plenty space, air conditioned, great kitchen, really great shower and even washing machine, iron/ironing board and hair dryer. We were kindly met by Alexis parents, even though it was late on a Saturday night when we arrived. I highly recommend this place to anyone travelling to Istanbul. Thanks to Alexis and his parents :0)
Alexis is a host with mucho hospitality, four of us have had wonderful time. The apt is very clean and tidy, location is great too, close to Taksim Square and Havatas bus service point.

We recommend Alexis's appartment highly, especially for his family's
attention to detail.  Firstly, the instructions for the taxi driver,
which our taxi driver used and appreciated.  Secondly, the warm
welcome from Sophia, Alexis's mother who showed us around and gave
sound sensible advice about day to day housekeeping. Thirdly, those
little touches, drinking water, toilet roll, dishwasher tablets..they
don't cost a lot, but having to find them on your first day is
tedious.  All were supplied for which we were grateful, thank you
Sophia.

The location is good, 10 mins from Taksim Square ( and Sophia lent us
an Istanbulkart); excellent shopping area up by Osmanbey Metro
station, plenty of good fruit, veg, bakers, butchers etc.  The
appartment is absolutely as pictured on the website.  Well equipped
kitchen, excellent bathroom.

If you're thinking of renting an appartment in Istanbul, you could not
do better than this.

There are not enough superlatives to fully explain how wonderful this apartment was! The owners were extremely welcoming. The apartment is really as can be seen from the photos, taken care of down to the smallest details and spotless clean. This apartment had so much space you could live in it for months! Very comfortable bed, all kitchen supplies you could ever need... very comfortable lounge. Lots of thought and effort has been put into this apartment and it was like a home from home. Highly recommending it!
Great location, just 5 minutes walk from HAVATAS station. We cooked our meal in the kitchen, everything needed is supplied, from plate to salt. Highly recommend this lovely and cozy house!

It was very cozy, modern, and clean. My friends and I had a wonderful stay at this apartment. The location is in a superb area with many restaurants, and only a few minutes walk to Taksim and Istiklal Cad. Although we've never met Alexis, but his father gave us very clear information about the house. We'll definitely come back to this house again. Highly recommended apartment !

I would highly recommend this flat as it was perfect for our trip to Istanbul. It was clean, good size for our group, looked as if it was recently renovated, had comfortable beds, and was in a great location that is close walking distance to Taksim and other parts of the city. I would also recommend this flat to anyone staying in Istanbul who wants to be in the central part of the city but on a quieter side street that is not so loud as parts of Taksim can be really loud. So, this flat was the best of both worlds being close to the action but quiet for when we wanted to relax. The hosts had great communication with us for our arrival and meeting at the flat was easy. They even left us an IstanbulKart to use the public transportation which was really nice and useful to get around town. Can't wait to stay here again.

Super Wohnung 
Blitzsauber 
Sehr freundlicher Kontakt 
Modern ausgestattet 
Sichere Lage 
Wer im Wohnzimmer schläft - hört ggf TV Geräusche aus Nachbarwohnung nebenan 
Klasse eingerichtet und ausgestattet

Great apartment!!!
Good location, very very clean, well equipped
Very nice welcome by Alexis
We would love to come back

I and my family stayed in Alexis' flat for 3 nights. What to say: EVERYTHING WAS PERFECT.
Unfortunatly Alexis was not in istanbul during my check in, but his Dad has been so friendly and welcomed us with a big smile!
The flat is the same that you may see on the picture, the rooms were very clean and al the facilities worked well.
The area is rich of stores and restaurant and just 5 min far away from taksim square ( place where u can get bus, metro, tram).

Mon mari, ma fille et moi-même venons de passer 5 nuits à Istanbul dans l'appartement d'Alexis.
Malgré notre arrivée tardive vers 23h, son père nous attendait pour le check-in.
L'appartement est parfait, d'une propreté exemplaire. Il  est situé non loin de la place TAKSIM mais surtout est d'un calme inespéré dans cette ville géante qui vit 24 heures sur 24 heures.
tout le nécessaire au niveau de la vaisselle est là, un grand nombre de serviettes sont installées dans la salle de bain.
Il est parfaitement le reflet des photos que nous avons pu voir sur le site - aucune surprise.
Alexisis' place is much better than any hotel I've stayed at in Istanbul. Very modern and super clean. The location is also great.

Alexis has given us all the important informations by e-mail, really well organized! Warm welcome from his parents who were here to give the keys. Don't expect more informations, they don't speak english, just few words... The appartment is well situated, in a quiet street, clean, and has got everything you need. Only one bad point: you can hear the neighbours watching tv... Except of that, really cool stay!

We (4 young women in their mid-twenties) just had the most amazing long weekend in Istanbul, staying in Alexis' flat, which is exactly as shown in the pictures, super clean and comes with everything you need plus a super nice welcome committee (i.e. his mom- Sofi, thanks for showing us the flat!). 
Alexis and his parents are very considerate (as evidenced by bottled water, toilet paper, public transport card and other "basics" already provided). Also, Alexis is very responsive and can always be counted on to answer any questions in record time. Biggest plus for us was the fort-know state-of-the-art security door, which helped even the most concerned members of our group sleep easy at night.

What else? Location is quite good, really close to Taksim, where you can take all kinds of public transport to every part of town.

All in all, I can recommend staying at Alexis's when in Istanbul. I would do so again.

We had an amazing time in Istanbul - also due to our great flat which had to book last minute due to a last minute cancellation.
Alexis is a wonderful host - responded almost immediately, even let us stay past the check out time, as our flight was in the evening.
His parents, who are lovely as well, gave us the keys and showed us the flat. I think it´s the tidiest flat I have visited so far via airbnb, and all flats have been great. 
The flat looks exactly as on the pictures. I 1000% recommend Alexis and his beautiful flat in Istanbul and would definately stay there again during another visit.

Fin lejlighed! 
Alexis er en god vært! han ringede til mig for at høre om alt var ok da mit fly var forsinket.
Excelent experience! The apartment  was very clean and cozy. It was also very near to the city centre . I reccomand it!

everything was great! the apartment is almost luxurious and super equiped with everything. the flat was bigger than expected, the location is central but i would say not as central that we just easily wen't home in between sightseeing. but we loved that it was in a more quiet real area away from tourist masses but close to everything. we also loved istanbul great city, our favourite part was the "asian side", you should visit if you go there. oh yeah, also communication with alexis was great! his father waited for us at the apartment, we even got 2 keys. my best airbnb experience so far. thanks for having us over. oh..and the shower was greeeeaaat!:)

Place is located in excellent part of the city and place is very clean. . Lots of good restaurants and small takeaway joints. We enjoyed having takeaway dinner with my family. Thanks a lot for the place Alexis.
Apartment is nice,cozy,clean and incredible lounge. Alexis is really helpful and responsive. Totally recommend it!

Alexis' heritage suite is a wonderful home away from home! Alexis answered our emails promptly and was very detailed. The house is an absolute gem. It's been lovingly updated and is in a very convenient and neighbourly locale. It is spotlessly clean! 

The beds are super comfortable, the bedding is lovely. The bathroom is comfortable with a great shower! There is also a. dishwasher and washing machine. Wifi is excellent. Dishes etc are all new. 

We really liked the layout as there was a nice dining and working area and a separate and spacious lounge with comfortable seating. The decor is very relaxing and we felt very at home. We arrived when the temperature was cold at the beginning of January but the suite was lovely and warm with excellent heating and double paned windows. Alexis very thoughtfully provided books on Istanbul, maps and guides and also a variety of novels by Turkish authors. Nice touch.  

We enjoyed walking Istiklal Street, to the Sultanameht area, Galata Bridge, Besitkas, the list goes on.  We took a Bosphorus tour with Turyol which was very good. There are hundreds of tiny, delicious restaurants and bakeries within walking distance and some higher end venues as well. We like to walk and found we could reach most "must see" things within 15 minutes to an hour or the metro was nearby (5 mins) and there are taxis always at Taksim. 

Without question we would recommend staying at Alexis' heritage suite. We really felt like we could have stayed for weeks!
Alexis의 아버지가 우리를 반갑게 맞아주셨다. 집은 굉장히 넓고 깨끗했으며 편안했다. 탁심광장과 가까워 이동에 불편이 없었다. 나중에 이스탄불에 다시 방문하게되면 또 묵고싶다.

4 of us stayed in this apartment and we absolutely loved it. Very clean, tidy and spacious. Everything has been very well thought out, has everything you need. I would definitely stay here again next time I'm in Istanbul.
Alexis and his family - a very hospitable people. Wonderful atmospheric apartment. Recommend it to everybody!

We had a wonderful time at Alexis' Appartement, it made our vacation in Istanbul perfect. This part of the city is perfect for young People - wonderful places to have dinner or eat turkish brakfast. Alexis' mother was so great - how kindly and warm we were welcomed although our flight was late and she had to wait for our Arrival. Thank you, we would Love to Return!

Alexis was a very helpful and polite host. There is slight smell of smoke in the flat but it seems to be coming from downstairs. A nice and quiet street with easy access to the more bustling areas of Istanbul.
We spent 4 nights at Alexis' flat and everything went perfectly. His parents were waiting for us and showed us the rooms. The flat was very clean, comfortable, modern and quiet.

Excellent communication with Alexis, he organized late transfer for us and also greeted us at the apartment at after 1am at night.
Apartment is exactly as it shows on pictures, very clean and comfortable. Location is quiet side street but only 5 mins by foot from Taksim metro station and interchange with Taksim-Kabotaj funiculeure.
Gran splendida vacanza casa veranente stupenda accogliente e con tutti i comfort  educazione del proprietario incantevole  vicinissima al centro della città

Dear All, it was a fantastic flat. Just beautiful and in the middle of the center. The description of the flat matches exactly with what we have seen. I would like to thank Alexis and his Mom, who welcomed us just as sweet as possible, it was a warm welcome. Thank you very much.

The host's mother greeted us and explained the apartment really well. We talked on the phone with the host as well. The apartment is spotless and looks very newly renovated. The bed was wonderful. The memory foam pillows were awesome...we never used them before and are now looking to purchase some for our bed at home. The neighborhood was nice. Close to Taksim Sq and the Havatas bus that brings you from the airport. If I stayed in Istanbul again, I would stay closer to the old city though as we had a 2 year old and getting back and forth from the sights took about 20-30 minutes which would be nice to avoid. I would definitely stay here though if I needed to stay near this area of Istanbul. This place was the best kept apartment we've ever stayed in. Thanks.
The description was very accurate and the host was very quick with communication and extremely helpful!

We had a great stay here, the apartment is really well located but in a quiet street, the perfect place to relax after a busy day in Istanbul. Everything was new and super clean, and there was everything we needed. Alexis provided detailed information about how to reach the house and his parents were there to welcome us. I would recommend without hesitation!

Der Aufenthalt in Alexis' Wohnung war klasse! Wir waren zu sechst dort und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist ideal gelegen für alle Ausflüge in Istanbul. Die Ausstattung ist prima. Wir haben alle gut geschlafen und es wahr sehr erstaunlich ruhig mitten in der Großstadt. Wir können die Wohnung sehr empfehlen! Alles Prima!

I had a great stay at Alexis's place. It was conveniently located - only a 5 min walk from the Havatas bus stop, and a 10 min walk to Taksim Square and Istikal Cadessi - and yet it was also removed enough to feel quiet and restful. (If you needed to get to Karakoy or the Old City, it was easy to hop on the Funicular at Taksim and go to Kabataş, where you can catch the ferries to Kadıköy or transfer to the T1 tramway line to Eminönü, Sultanahmet, Grand Bazaar, etc.) The apartment itself was spotlessly clean and nice. The living room was beautiful and spacious, and the bed in the main bedroom was super comfy. The description and photos were all accurate. Alexis's mom met me at check-in and communication with Alexis beforehand was easy. I would not hesitate to recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Istanbul.
Very warm welcome with helpful advises for the city. Great flat near to Taskim.

This is an excellent apartment and very highly recommended. Alexis' hospitality was fantastic, providing very clear instructions on arrival and tourist suggestions. The apartment is impeccable, very neat tidy and we'll equipped. Moreover, it is centrally located; only a 5 minute walk from Taksim square. Fantastic!!

Alexis has a beautiful flat just as described and in the pictures. Our flight was delayed and his parents, Sophie and Erol, we're so welcoming when we arrived at 10pm. They gave us a quick tour of the house and then left us to it. Alexis had also sent us great instructions on how to get there from the airport. 
It's very close to Taksim square and an easy walk to great restaurants, shops and parks. 
The house had great facilities and was very secure. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend!

I have always had good experiences with airbnb rentals but this apartment, and the experience of interacting with Alexis and his parents,  shone above all others. 

All aspects of the apartment was just as described and photographed. It was waiting for us spotlessly clean.  Alexis and his parents were at our beck and call and responded promptly to any of our questions before and during our stay. The apartment itself is pristine, all of the appliances are top quality.  It is perfectly situated in a charming neighbourhood, a short walk from Taksim square  and easy access to airport and metro. 

I wholeheartedly recommend this apartment.

Excelente piso, muy bien ubicado, amplio, pulcro y con todo lo necesario para una estadía fuera de casa y como en casa.
Alexis fue súper amable y nos dio toda la info que necesitamos. Súper recomendable desde ya! Estambul un sueño y el piso de Alexis un placer
Wonderful, clean, and spacious flat very close to Taksim Square!

Alles war sehr sauber und sehr gut vorbereitet, die Einweisung erfolgte durch die Familie des Gastgebers, die sehr höflich waren. 
Die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral, einen Kilometer vom Taksim-Platz entfernt, sie ist sehr gut von den Flughäfen aus zu erreichen. Die Nachbarschaft ist extrem ruhig, zumal die Wohnung in einem Gebiet kleiner Gassen liegt. Die Unterkunft ist exakt so wie auf den Fotos abgebildet, die Beschreibung der Ausstattung ist 100% korrekt. Ich würde gern wieder in dieser Wohnung wohnen.
Alexis的房子位置很好,步行去塔克西姆广场大约10分钟,周围有两个开到很晚的小超市｡ Alexis的公寓非常非常干净,居家的所有设备都有,非常的方便,希望Alexis可以准备一些城市地图,地铁线路图之类的小册子更方便游客｡谢谢Alexis的招待｡

We enjoyed our stay in this apartment - it's well located on a quiet street, fairly close to major transport and to restaurants and shopping on Istiklal Street, in the New District of Istanbul.  The apartment was comfortable, with all basic amenities, plus air-conditioning and Wifi.  Alexis had sent us useful information beforehand on how to get to the apartment, and Alexis' father was waiting for us on our arrival and showed us the basic features of the apartment and reviewed the few rules (take off shoes on entry, keep windows closed, how to use keys).  There are a few things which could make things easier for visitors:  (i) a more accurate map showing the location of the apartment; the one Alexis sent us - which we appreciated - had some inaccuracies, and both my husband and I, arriving separately, had a little trouble finding the right street and the right block, although we did find the apartment eventually; (ii) the router for the Wifi needed to be restarted several times - Alexis had left a note to that effect, but without indicating where the router was located.  Once we found it, attached to the wall above the front door, we had to stand on a chair and reach up to get to it - only my daughter and my husband could do this; I was too short, so if it had been up to me to restart it, I would not have been able to do it.  What was a minor inconvenience for us could be a bigger inconvenience for shorter visitors.  (iii) we had some trouble figuring out how to use the washing machine, particularly how to get it opened when we thought the wash was done; my husband finally figured it out, but it wasn't obvious, and some instructions on how to use it correctly would be helpful; (iv) most important, I tried to contact Alexis while we were staying at the apartment, in connection with the washing machine, by email and by phone, trying both telephone numbers he gave, and was unsuccessful.  He never answered my email and I couldn't get through on either number.   Visitors need to be able to reach him with questions or problems.  Having said all this, we would recommend the apartment to others - it was really quite a good place to stay.
Alexis is a caring host. The location is wonderful.
Great location for exploring Istanbul. Also very quiet - apartment was immaculate!

Alexis communication prior to arrival was excellent. The material he forwarded was helpful. We used the Havatas Bus service which terminates in close proximity to the apartment. Unfortunately we caught a taxi from the bus after some one told us how "long the walk was". However this information was wrong and the walk to the apartment is short. Erol Alexiss father, met us. The apartment is very clean and comfortable. The white goods are of high quality. We liked not wearing shoes in the apartment. The apartment is some distance to Galata bridge and to the area of the blue mosque. It's about a 3-5 km walk or is accessible by the F1 from Taksim Square and T1 metro. There are many mini marts and a larger supermarket within a short walking distance from the apartment. The Internet connection connection is not strong. On a few nights the people in the apartment below were loud banging doors etc which woke us.

Alexis always responded quickly to any email enquiry. His mother met me at the apartment. She does not speak much English, but it was sufficient to explain me everything (and it added to the genuine local experience). The apartment looks exactly as in the pictures. Good location, 15 min walk to Taksim square and 15 min walk to Nisantasi district, both of which have lots of restaurants and shops. Felt like a local!

I strongly recommend Alexis place to stay in Istanbul! I were in Istanbul for 6 nights with my family (4 people) and it was perfect!! Very clean, with all facilities, good location and with a beautiful decoration.

Alexis ' parents were there to meet us, even though we arrived later than originally expected, and made us welcome.

The apartment is very attractively and comfortably furnished, with an excellent bathroom. The location is close to the action and transport of Taksim Square, but quiet, so makes a great base.

This was our favourite accommodation in Turkey

Alexis mother welcomed us at the apartment, so we never met Alexis. But the apartment is great, and everything went smoothly nevertheless. I definitely recommend, just like all the other reviews. 

The only thing to be aware of is that the living room (where the couch-bed is located) does not have an AC, so it will be hot there even during the night (at least in summer).

La ubicación si planean estar en taksim es buena, aunque las calles vecinas son obscuras y dan una sensación de inseguridad al caminar muy noche. La pasamos muy bien, el depa tal como las fotos, muy limpio y equipado. Hay una lavandería a media cuadra que nos fue muy útil.

Very clean and cozy apartments with everything you'll need even for the long stay. I can highly recommend it for the family stay as well as for any other kind of travelling cause it can easily fit up to 6 people. 
So 6 people more in probably the most crowdly city you;ve ever seen!)

Alexia is a wonderful host and his apartment is amazing!!! Perfect location just a couple of minutes stroll to Taksim square. The apartment is beautiful with AC and all new white goods. This is easily the best apartment we've stayed at on Airbnb. Alex was super helpful with his information and enabled us to checkin early and checkout a little later. He was also very very kind when we ran into an issue with our keys.
I cannot recommend Alexis and his apartment enough.
Please be aware taxi drivers seem incapable of finding this partKent for some reason. So best to find a hotel on the main street nearby and just use that as your drop off point. Otherwise... Perfect!

Alex and his mom were at the flat waiting for us, helped us with our luggage up the stairs and settled us in.   Communication with Alex was very prompt and easy.  The apartment is super clean and organised, and recently renovated to a good standard.  It is equipped with everything one could need.   Alex also kindly arranged for a crib for my baby, which was much appreciated.  The area is within a 5-7 minute walk to Istiklal street - long pedestrian street with shops and restos.  It is an area that is gentrifying, so expect to find renovated buildings along side others that are run down.  But the area is definitely feels safe.  You will have a hair salon, grocery stores and shops within a two minute walk.

I can only repeat everything everyone else has said - the apartment is great.
We were met by Alexis, Sofi and Erol  (his mother and father) – they helped us up the stairs with our luggage and they are all absolutely delightful.  Although we took longer than expected to get through immigration and our bus broke down, they were still smiling when we got there. :-)
All beds are very comfortable – even the sofa bed - and the air conditioning was a big plus, even in September. 
Washing machine, dish washer, all quite new and working, and the bathroom is perfect. 
It is very peaceful and close to public transport.  If you take the airport bus, you really don’t need a taxi – it definitely IS near enough to walk. 
Upon our request to leave our bags in the flat a bit longer on checkout day, we immediately got an OK back from Alexis, although he had people arriving the same day.
Many thanks Alexis - I can only recommend this flat to anyone spending a few days in Istanbul.
很别致的房子,房东干净整洁,很注重细节,有很多小挂饰都很用心,对房子保养得很好｡还帮忙安排了实惠的机场接机服务,我们当日晚上将近10点多到达,Alexis还在房子等候我们入住,耐心给我们讲解房间规则,非常有礼和客气｡
The flat was lovely and the location convenient.  Alexis's parents were very welcoming when we arrived.
Very cozy and clean apartment. The location is perfect, about 10 minutes to Taksim square. We enjoyed the stay in this apartment. Thanks!

Es war alles perfekt! Die Wohnung liegt superzentral am Taksimplatz, von dort kann man alle Sehenswürdigkeiten perfekt (mit dem Taxi) erreichen. Die Einrichtung ist hochwertig und sehr schön. Wir haben uns pudelwohl gefühlt und danken Alexis und seinen Eltern für den tollen Aufenthalt! Gerne werden wir wieder die Wohung buchen, wenn wir das wunderschöne Istanbul besuchen möchten...

My family and I had a lovely stay at Alexis' place in Istanbul. The apartment if exactly as pictured and it is very centrally located. Alexis organised an airport transfer for us too which was waiting in the airport and took us seamlessly to the apartment. When we arrived at the apartment we were greeted by Alexis' mum who was very helpful and showed us everything we needed to know. The apartment was spacious enough for 4 of us and it is centrally located so we walked to the metro in Taksim square to see the sights in the old part of town and to the main shopping street in the evenings. We had a lovely stay here and I would recommend it to others.

Very good choice! From even before we arrived Alexis took great care in supplying all information and making sure we would reach the apartment. The apartment itself a golden nugget. Very comfortable, very good location, clean and neat. All necessary items were present (towels, shampoo, toilet paper, even a big jug of water). The are is top. very close to Taksim with all you need around the corner.
Alexis was also easily reachable for inquiries.
All in all it was a perfect experience and I can recommend this host without any doubt. Thank you!

Отличная квартира в центре города, со всеми удобствами, уютная и светлая, полностью соответствуют фотографиям здесь.  Родители Алекса встретили нас в полночь и все подробно разъяснили. Остались очень довольны)

sehr schöne, sehr saubere Wohnung, die gleichzeitig modern ist und mit türkischen Elementen. Alles hat wunderbar geklappt, und durch die Lage nahe am Taksim ist man sowohl gut angebunden, als auch in einer ruhigeren Seitenstrasse mit kleinen lokalen Lokalen. Gerne beim nächsten Mal wieder!

Alexis was very responsive. His father met us at the apartment when our flight got in at around 22:00. The place was beautiful and spacious with a great location near Taksim's bustling main street. It also had a fantastic shower.

Charming and stylish apartment with a Turkish touch. 5 minutes to Taxim, great  local eateries around.
We were met by Alexis parents and had no issues to address. Would stay there again and recommrnd it

Host was very helpful in terms of making directions clear and helping if any problems arose. Someone was there to meet us when we arrived and showed us all the facilities in the apartment. The place itself had everything we needed, was very nicely decorated and was clean and neat.  Apartment was in a very good area, 3 minute walk to train station and 5 minutes to Istiklal Avenue. Very enjoyable stay overall.

Alexis s' est montré très accueillant et attentionné. Il nous a attendu jusqu'à 22h15 sans problème, nous a tt expliqué du fonctionnement de son appartement. Logement très propre, bien équipé et conforme aux photos. Quartier assez central (10 mn à pied de la place Taksim) qui permet de récupérer le metro ou le funiculaire puis de poursuivre la visite d'Istanbul. Nous recommandons cette adresse sans problème.

We are very happy to have chosen Alexis place. He welcomed us and help the taxi to make its way, it is a very short walk to Taksim Place but  by car it is a bit complex. The apartment is as described and the photos are accurate. It is the right size for a family of 4 (2 adults, 2 kids). The area is perfect, close to subway and funicular that leads to the tramway. I recommend to take the funicular to Kabatas and bus 42E to Sariyer to see the villages and go to the black sea. Very nice trip.

Отличная квартира!
Красивая обстановка, чисто, есть необходимая бытовая техника. 
Расположена в тихом переулке, Таксим в 10 минутах ходьбы. Рядом остановка хаваташ.
we live in the house like at home,very comfortable. And this house lies in the street which is closed to Taksim and shopping streets. Great!

Lieber Alexis,
wir können uns nur den vielen positiven Bewertungen bezüglich Lage und Ausstattung der Wohnung anschließen - mit dem Zusatz, dass diese besonders gut für eine Familie mit zwei Kindern/Jugendlichen geeignet ist. Unsere Töchter haben ihr Stockbett-Zimmer sehr fein gefunden! Und wir alle haben den Ausblick vom gemütlichen Erker-Sofa in die Üftade Sokak genossen. Ein sehr schöner Platz für einen genussreichen Istanbul-Besuch! Merci!

Le séjour chez Alexis s'est vraiment bien passé. L'appartement est parfait et très cosy, à quelques minutes à pieds de la Place Taksim et des transports (tram / métro) ; nous le recommandons vivement !
Very lovely place, clean, near to Havatas bus station, will stay there again if go to Istanbul again, warm host

This is the BEST place to stay in Istanbul! Alexis was so helpful before our arrival and is a very prompt communicator. His lovely parents were waiting for us when we arrived. The apartment is beautiful and very clean, just like the photos. The location is excellent and felt very safe. We walked to Taksim square daily, and it was also only a short walk to metro/bus stops. My family and I would definitely love to stay here again. There is not a single thing we would change. Many thanks to you, Alexis and also to your parents. Kind regards!

Très bon accueil par les hôtes. L'appartement est magnifique, tout juste rénové et très bien agencé! Propre.. rien à dire!
Situé à 10 min à pied de la place Taksim c'est parfait! Pas mal de petites boutiques aux alentours (superette, souvenirs, repas à emporter...). 
Niveau transport, c'était parfait! De l'aéroport Ataturk, nous avons pris un bus qui nous a déposé à 5 min de l'appart' !
Je recommande cet appartement !

Alexis is an excellent host. Due to our late flight his parent we're there to welcome us and even helped the taxi driver to find the apartment.  The apartment is superb! It's quiet, cool, well equipped and very clean.  If we had questions or we needed to arrange a taxi, Alexis was there to help us and always responded very fast. Wifi worked very well and was fast. I highly recommend this host and apartment to anyone who want's to explore Istanbul.

As described, the apartment was very nice and tidy. We liked all little details in it, and mostly the little chilling-corner in the living room. It was very good organized as well. The location was also very functional for us as it was very central. At the beginning of our stay we had a little problem with the heating and hot water, but Mr Erol (father of Alexis) solved the problem quickly. In general we loved our stay in this pretty apartment and would definitively come back again :)

Alexis was a great host, very easy to communicate with. I had several problems with my travel and I had to change dates many times, but Alexis was understanding. The apartment was exactly as described--very clean and new. I would definitely recommend to anyone to deal with Alexis as a host. Note though that this listing has a 'strict' policy for changes/cancellation.

我们的航班很晚,最终到达房子的时候,已经半夜1点了,但是房东的父母仍然在等我们,直到详细介绍了所有情况后才离开,非常感动｡这个房子真的很棒,距离Taksim广场非常近,坐机场大巴直接到达广场后,走路10分钟可以到达,闹中取静的地方｡房子很干净,内部结构合理,一个大卧室里面有一个大的双人床,一个小卧室有一个高低床｡厨房､卫生间都很不错｡客厅宽敞,一个小饭厅｡木质地板｡有Wifi｡
总体感觉很棒,今后还会来这里住｡

A nice clean apartment.
I wouldn't recommend the area. I didn't feel safe. If I was on my way home at night I was often approached by insistent men. I have stayed in Istanbul in other areas and have not encountered this before.
Super to have a washing machine.  I loved the neighborhood.

Evin lokasyonu çok güzel,her yere yakın.Evi bulmamız konusunda çok yardımcı olundu,ayrıca müteşekkirim.Fotoğraflarda olduğu gibi temiz ve tarz bir (Website hidden by Airbnb) çok keyifli oldu.Tekrar teşekkür ediyorum.
虽然没看见房东本人,但房东也很热心地解答问题,超喜欢他们家的椅子,可惜他妈妈不卖
A very clean apartment, close to taksim square, has nice food places close by. On a very steep road!

Apartment is lovely. Everything was spotless. Coffee, tea, water, soap & laundry liquid were provided. The building is on a quiet street on a steap hill. Had problems with hot water the first few days but this was fixed. The only negative thing is the neighbours, on a daily basis club music was blasted through the walls from morning to afternoon. Obviously this is not the owners fault but it was stressful. 
All the furniture etc is new & in excellent condition. Bedding was all clean & smelled lovely. 
Balcony looks over onto a quaint street with cute cats roaming around.
Nice appartment
Very nice and clean and the most important very near to taksim square. If there was a dryer and elevator it would be perfect.
very nice place and very nice people...
Alexis was a great host he was very attentive and communicated well. Nice apartment, good location and very clean.

The host was welcoming us very friendly and intoduced us to the details of the apartment. Before travelling to Istanbul the communication was perfect, the host provided us all the relevant and necessary information prior to our arrival (e.g. the different possibilities to get from the airport to the apartment, telephone numbers etc.).
The apartment was very clean and every single detail completely matched to the description on Airbnb.
The biggest advantage of the apartment was definetly its location. Taksim Square and the very famous shopping mile "Istiklal Caddesi" were just 5 minutes away to walk. If you want to discover the rest of this beautiful city, you can take the Metro or the busses at Taksim Square.
In general, we had a wonderful week in this apartment in Istanbul.
I can highly recommend this apartment to everyone, who wants to discover beautiful Istanbul.
Excellent apartment. Comfortable and well equiped with everything you need. Location is also excellent as t is walking distance from Taksim square.
the house clean and perfect and the location is very near to everything ....
thanks the house was perfect

I had a very pleasant stay in Alexis's place, and, on future trips to Istanbul, would be glad to stay here if he'll have me back.  :-)

Alexis's flat fulfilled many of the options I was seeking in an Airbnb space: walkable neighbourhood, easy access to public transit, residential but with great access to restaurants and nightlife; and Alexis's home fulfilled all these criteria. 
Additionally, the space is clean, private, excellent value for money, and very well-appointed...among the best Airbnbs I have so far stayed in. 

Alexis was helpful throughout my stay, and I especially appreciate the fact that his lovely parents stayed to welcome me even though the check-in hour was quite late.

I recommend Alexis, his place. and his lovely parents to you all. :-)

Alexisov stan je smješten na oko 10 minuta šetnje do trga Taksim. Stan je čist, udoban i dovoljno veliki za tri ili četiri osobe. Sve pisane poruke koje sam razmijenila sa Alexisom prije dolaska u Istanbul, u potpunosti su bile ispoštovane i sve je bilo u najboljem redu.
Preporučujem Alexisov stan svima koji imaju namjeru da odsjedaju u dijelu grada koji je blizu Taksimu.

Alexis was a great host and his house is great as well. It's not too far from Taksim so a great location to stay at. However, if you've got luggage then it's difficult to get to on foot since the house is uphill and you have to climb a narrow stairway. Overall it was a great experience but I do think that Alexis could've provided us with some basic household items. Apart from that, great clean apartment at a great location.

Отличная квартира недалеко от основной улицы. Второй этаж, тихо спокойно. Хороший ремонт, делали для себя. Все необходимое в квартире есть. Дополнительно просили только второй ключ от квартиры. Все очень чисто. Постель в спальне безумно удобная. Надеюсь в следующий раз получится остановиться тут же

Really nice place, renovated to a high standard for Istanbul apartments, very large, equipped with everything (though had to go searching for towel - it's in a drawer in bathroom), highly recommended, only thing had problems with was communication, took long time to hear back from host about this booking and another booking, missed on one booking due to the response time, also never met any host as a friend arranged key, this is what led to problems finding towel (borrowed one for first few days), highly recommend apartment though, it's much larger than appears in photos and very comfortable
Sehr empfehlenswert! Super Lage, sehr sauber, sehr komfortabel! Danke!
Great Host, Great Location to discover the city. Clean and comfortable, recommended !
Top Lage, die Wohnung hat alles, was man braucht. Die Kommunikation war unkompliziert und hat super funktioniert. Die Wohnung von Alexis würde ich auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen.
This place was very nice! The flat was clean and comfortable, and only a short walk to Taksim Square.
Great stay at Alexis house, everything was accurate, I recommend ! :)
Great place, close to everything but still quiet which is a big bonus in Istanbul

Great location
near stores and restaurants
nice shower
nice washing machine

Easy check in with father---but spoke very little English
The flat is very beautiful, all perfect.

Alexis is super nice and his guide is really helpful to find the apartment. it's located in the downtown, few steps to all the shops, very convenient to buy things, go to different places and to the airport. highly recommend!
Very good place to stay. Near taxim square. The neighborhood is nice. Easy to find everything nearby. The place is very cozy

The flat is located in a quiet neighborhood yet within a short walk to a major street with several cafes, restaurants, convenience stores, and banks. Alexis' brother was supposed to be waiting for us at the flat for check-in, but there was no answer after numerous rings. We did not have a local SIM, but luckily, a guy at the hotel nearby was nice enough to let us use his phone so we could call his brother; he ended up showing up within a few minutes. The flat itself is spacious, clean, and tastefully decorated. It was well equipped for our needs. Wifi didn't work that well, but all in all, it was a good stay.
Thanks Alexis!

Appartement très propre, Proprietaire très sympa. Nous avions à disposition tous se qu'il fallait, même des serviettes  de salle de bain toute propre, les draps et les lits tout propre. Très satisfait. Le seul seul bémol, il y avais des clim que dans les chambre et non pas dans le salon. Au salon nous avions en ventilo sur pied. Mais sinon tout était perfecto :)

Another 5-Star stay at Alexis's.  :-)
I stayed here the first time a few months ago, and was pleased to see on this most recent visit that all the attributes (very clean, very cosy, and very well-appointed quarters) that made Alexis's apartment a great stay the first time were even better the second.
I also enthusiastically recommend Alexis as a host: he is proactive with communication, and detailed with logistics...essential qualities to ensuring a smooth experience.
Enjoy.
We arrived late and Alexis brother could be there waiting for us. Very clean house and comfortable staying. Definitely recommend to anyone who is looking for Airbnb in Istabul.

提供给以后越来越多的中国游客们,房间非常好,全部实图无p,很干净,很舒适｡房东热情好客,在我们出发前给我发了详细的介绍,凭借此介绍,我们顺利的从萨比哈机场坐机场大巴到达塔克西姆广场,步行约10分钟到达房东的家｡设施齐备,冰箱,洗衣机,空调都有,还有洗碗机和咖啡机,厨房设施也很全,我们最后一晚做了火锅,棒棒哒｡
地理位置不错,附近有很多公交车,可方便到达蓝色清真寺,索非亚大教堂等,步行可到欧洲区最大的商场,以及箭头包的工作室和lv､gucci等奢侈品店｡
房东反应迅速,基本上邮件秒回｡第一天到的较晚,可能是房东父亲吧,一直在等我们,递交钥匙和告知注意事项及房内设施｡最后一天小伙伴晚走,房东也同意把退房时间改到下午两点,谢谢｡
最后,房子非常好,值得!

We stayed two weeks in Alex's flat. It is a comfortable apartment with all the necessities you need, though it should be noted that the balcony is not really big enough for two people to sit on. It is very well located. It is a short walk from Taxim square (with its excellent transport links - metro bus and dolmus and airport shuttle)  and iconic Istiklal street. The flat is very quiet despite being in the heart of Beyoglu district.  The area also has many local shops, restaurants and banks. I definitely recommend it.

Bonjour, logement bien équipé, très propre et très bien situé dans une rue au calme à 5 minutes à pied de la navette aéroport et à 10 minutes à pieds de la place Taksim. Idéal pour la vie nocturne et aussi pour les visites des monument qui sont accessible en transport en commun. Parfait pour les gens qui aime dormir au calme mais aussi rejoindre le mouvement de la vie en quelques minutes à pied. Je recommande fortement.
Great place to stay

Perfect location, good space, amazingly clean. We came really tiered late at night, but Alexis's parents still waited for us. The greeted us with smile and explained everything. Zero regrets in choosing this apartment. Highly recommended.
房间很好 房东妈妈帮忙办理的入住,不太会说英语但是很热情｡房间干净整洁｡就是运气不好,最后一晚赶上停水停电,没办法洗漱上厕所,很不方便｡
so close to istiklal caddesi, nice flat with bunk beds, clean bathroom was important for us, pleasant host. we will use this flat again

Alexis and his family rank among the most outstanding hosts I've enjoyed in my Airbnb travels around the world. This time, as with all others, it was a pleasure to stay here.
I like the stylish space and the authentic neighbourhood vibe, I value the prompt communication and logistical consideration provided by this family, and I hope to return to this space on future visits.
:-)
The flat was extra clean and cozy

The apartment is charming and has everything you need. Sometimes taxi drivers didn’t know the address but Alexis gave us very thoughtful and clear instructions how to get to the apartment and who to contact in case of anything. We would stay there again.

The only problem was that we could hear neighbors watching TV, sometimes till late, so don’t forget to bring earplugs.
Its very clean and good location

Charmant, douillet, extrêmement bien situé, spacieux, bien équipé.
à deux pas de Taksim, de sa vitalité. 
L’appartement d’Alexis est un endroit où on a envie de revenir.
非常建议大家来这里住,真的是非常好的住宿体验,去哪里都很方便,机场大巴,地铁站,独立大街,都在附近,最重要的是,房间很舒适,又很有当地特色,房东回复邮件及时,他的爸爸过来接待我们,非常友善!总之,让我们在伊斯坦布尔的行程特别的满意,提供了很多便利,推荐!

Great spot right next to Taksim square. Close to buses, taxis, restaurants, shops. The apartment is furnished beautifully, a lovely window seat sofa, another large sofa & two good sized bedrooms. Its very modern with authentic Turkish touches & spotlessly clean. Cheers for letting us stay

Очень здорово пожить в таком аутентичном месте! Великолепная квартира с продуманным интерьером и всеми удобствами! От метро 10 минут быстрым шагом. Вокруг много магазинов и кафе, но в тоже время район очень тихий!
Nice and clean house on a quiet street. We had a good time. We needed to arrange the check out time which they adapted. Very convenient!
A great place for families and friends. Close to the metro, and lots of local shops and attractions. Well recommended.

Квартира темная, мало света. Местоположение удобное в плане доступности достопримечательностей, но район не очень. Парковки нет, поблизости паркинги закрывают вечером в 8.00.
Ну и небезопасный район для семей

This lovely flat is centrally located, an easy walk from the metro and Istanbul’s famous Taksim Square and İstiklal Street. It was clean and comfortable. The host was accomodating and super responsive. I would definitely book again the next time I am in Istanbul.

资深算不上,但是也住过很多家名宿,这家我还蛮生气的,因为飞机到伊斯坦布尔是凌晨,之前邮件房东说Check in只能在下午2点,然后我们坐在星巴克坐了一个上午,后面就和房东商量能不能先把行李放进去,房东说可以,但是后面因为那边的房子太多了,和房东说能不能到星巴克来接下我们,房东说这是我们自己的事,我就觉得怎么可以这样,后面想想毕竟住在人家家里比较麻烦,还是给了从中国带来的礼物,并且发了邮件给房东,但是几天房东连邮件都没回我,有点生气
We had a wonderful time in Istanbul, the apartment was great. It was really clean and well taken care of. We can absolutely recommend the place for your stay in Istanbul.

L’appartement est d’une propreté impeccable ! La rue est calme (pas un bruit pour dormir), la literie est très bonne (bon repos). La douche est spacieuse, très agréable. L'appartement est bien équipé. Arthur et ses parents (qui nous ont accueillis le soir de notre arrivée) sont très gentils, arrangeants, réactifs, serviables. Je recommande fortement !
房间一尘不染,非常干净舒适,房东人非常好｡
位置挺方便的,出门两百多米就是公交站,离机场大巴出发到达地点五百米左右,在塔克西姆附近｡还有大超市,买水果早餐都很方便｡土国房间通病就是没有电梯,提行李很麻烦,没有人帮忙｡最后我们出门时候小伙伴没注意把地毯带出来半截,房东说门打不开,找了人开锁,收了近400,各位朋友注意｡
Great apartment. Especially liked the window seat in the lounge. Suited our needs perfectly. Apartment clean and welcoming. Would recommend to everyone.
Wonderful apartment, clean and complete furniture, close to the most vital places and a wonderful reception, thanks Arthur

We had a lovely time staying at Alexis' place. The apartment was very comfortable, and located in a prime area to get to and from so many of Istanbul's diverse neighborhoods. We had some struggles meeting our car service at the airport and Alexis was available and so helpful in  helping us get from the airport to his apartment. We couldn't have asked for a more welcoming and enjoyable stay in Istanbul!
Nice and very clean apartment. Safe and quiet neighborhood. Just 10 minutes walk to Taksim Square. Very friendly host.

The flat is very clean and comfortable, it is spacious so there is enough room for everyone and it is in a very good location right near Taxim square - the road it is situated on is a steep hill, and although it is only on the first floor, there is no lift in the building, so bare in mind if this causes an issue for anyone - however this didn’t cause any problems for us. The owners are very friendly and communicate very well, they allowed us to keep our luggage in the flat past check out time on our final day which was a very big help for us and very kind of them. We would happily stay in this flat again. Thank you for having us!
Great location and I recommend it for small family only (three Maximum).

the apartment is beautiful and like in the photos, the location is very close to Taksim and public transport and quiet and secure area.
I really liked the welcome and the quality of services and listening of the host.
I highly recommend and if I go back to Istanbul one day I already know where I am staying
Alexis’ place was clean, bright, in a great location. Recommended and thankful for the hospitality!
房子布置很用心,距离塔克西姆广场很近,机场巴士直达,交通便利,附近街区很漂亮,不过上下坡多,房子是楼梯房,提大行李会有点累,不过整个伊斯坦布尔也差不多TOT,推荐入住~
Great place and location.  Would definately recommend.
A very good place in Istanbul. The Alex’s flat is very confortable and nice. We spent a very  good time. Alex helped us for taxi. We hope to come back soon.

Nice warm personal welcome.
Lovely open space and comfy sofas.
Great location, quiet yet close to the hustle and bustle of Taksim square.
Very convenient, very clean. Fast and reliable internet.

This place is a little gem in the heart of Istanbul. It's quite close to Taksim, we never got tired walking to it even in the rain and cold, the space itself is very cozy and will make you feel like home. It's better than the pics!
The minor details are charming as well, from the daisies to the curtains and to the comfortable pillows, we never needed anything.
We didn't get to meet Alexis unfortunately, but his parents were very warm and welcoming and provided us with all the info we needed.
Alexis was very responsive and flexible, agreeing on delaying the check-out time and accommodating to all our needs.
Definitely booking again here.
Very responsive and flexible host. Clean and cozy apartment, located in a quiet neighborhood close to Taksim Square. Definitely recommend.

Good comunication. We were welcomed at the apartmet and did not need anything else after that which means everything was great..the place was excellent and we couldn't ask for anything more. Apartment located on a more steep street so it would be very hard for someone with a wheel chair or a walking disability. I would stay there again.

Really modern apartment, clean and has everything you would need (towels could do with up-dating).  I had a great stay.  The only thing worth noting is that late check in is not available.  Alexis does not live in Istanbul, his parents arrange check in and I was told my midnight arrival was too late, so I had to have keys dropped off with a friend.  Everything else is great, thanks for the stay, hope to come again.
Super propre et bien situé. Je recommande vivement!
Awesome place, I really recommned it.
Tres bon emplacement et bon rapport qualité prix
Overall experience is great, though there are few things that need to be addressed: a weak Wi-Fi signal / unreliable connection and a shower that needs repair.

name: Sleek & Comfortable Soho Apt
summary: This is an amazing apartment with a two main rooms + full bathroom. Enjoy these benefits:  - a separate bedroom with a queen bed - an awesome location between Soho and the West Village - easy access to multiple subway lines - a host who cares Come and visit! :)
space: This is a very comfortable 1 bedroom apartment (not a studio!) with great furnishings in one of the best neighborhoods of NYC. With easy access to Soho, West & Greenwich Village and Tribeca - the apt is in the heart of downtown NYC on a beautiful tree-lined block. Great cafes, amazing restaurants and, of course, Soho shopping are all located just blocks away.  Apartment is on the 3rd floor and is professionally cleaned prior to arrival. Fully furnished (kitchen, etc.) with a queen-sized bed and a desk in a separate bedroom. Wifi internet access is also included. Linens & towels are provided.  There is a flat-screen TV in the living room (sorry, there is to reception of local TV channels in the apt) with a good selection of books and magazines.  In addition, there is a brand new washing room in the basement of the building with a row of commercial quality washers and dryers.  Located on the same block as the 1 (red) subway line, and 2 blocks from the C,E (blue) line. AMAZING LOCATION.
description: This is an amazing apartment with a two main rooms + full bathroom. Enjoy these benefits:  - a separate bedroom with a queen bed - an awesome location between Soho and the West Village - easy access to multiple subway lines - a host who cares Come and visit! :) This is a very comfortable 1 bedroom apartment (not a studio!) with great furnishings in one of the best neighborhoods of NYC. With easy access to Soho, West & Greenwich Village and Tribeca - the apt is in the heart of downtown NYC on a beautiful tree-lined block. Great cafes, amazing restaurants and, of course, Soho shopping are all located just blocks away.  Apartment is on the 3rd floor and is professionally cleaned prior to arrival. Fully furnished (kitchen, etc.) with a queen-sized bed and a desk in a separate bedroom. Wifi internet access is also included. Linens & towels are provided.  There is a flat-screen TV in the living room (sorry, there is to reception of local TV channels in the apt) with a good selection of books
neighborhood_overview: This is one of my favorite parts of New York City since it's situated between two of the most popular neighborhoods, the West Village and Soho. Easily walk either direction from the apt, or head south to check out Tribeca.
notes: Please note that the TV in the apt is unable to receive any local (or cable) TV channels, so you must connect your laptop to watch your own content.
transit: Subways: the 1 train is just at the end of the block (Houston @ Varick St.) and the C, E trains are 2 blocks away at Spring St & 6th Ave.  The 6 train can be reached via a 15 min walk west to either the Bleeker St or Spring St stations.
access: The entire apt is yours!
house_rules: We expect clean, quiet guests that respect the place and our neighbors. No smoking or pets are allowed, and we screen potential guests to make sure they're the best possible fit. But we're friendly and always try to be helpful, so don't be shy!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Tech entrepreneur, chic geek and Airbnb power user

reviews.comments: we had an excellent stay at petes place - the pictures did not do the apartment justice, as it was much nicer - lots of magazines, dvds & books to choose from - pete was a great host - with lots of infos and sms-updates - and the location is fab, as you are in the middlle of everything - highly recomended

Pete's apartment is adorable. As a lone business traveller it was a perfect fit.  The apartment is small but I could definitely envisage a couple comfortably staying there too.

My first impression was relief quite honestly.  The photo's on AirBnB do not do it any justice at all.  It was absolutely clean, smelt sweet and was tastefully decorated (even freshly painted) and clutter-free.

Pete was a great host, upon arrival he gave me a full run-down of the apartment and the surrounding areas, even highlighting places of local interest on my map!  He was available at the end of a phone whenever I called (which was literally only at the beginning to arrange key-collection) nothing at all cropped up that I needed him for during the rest of my 2 week stay.  

All amenities in the apartment worked great, cooker, heating, power shower, toaster and internet.  There is also a laundry room in the basement (I never used it) but can see it being useful to some.

Location was also fabulous, in SOHO's "European" NY  next to Little Italy and with streets full of good eateries.  Then just a few subway stops away you can find the hustle and bustle of times-square.  Closest subways were Houston Street (2 minute walk) or Spring Street (5 minute walk).

Pete was also flexible on the check-out arrangements allowing me to stay until 3pm before sending in his cleaner at 4pm.

Would definitely stay again.

Thanks Pete!

Thank you Pete for renting your apt for two weeks.
Few minute walk to broadway, west village etc and subways are just around the corner.
Everything went well with our stay in NYC (and wireless internet in the apt was a huge plus!)
Pete was very very helpful and really nice guy. Pete's neighbour Geoff was also a great help. So thanks to him as well.
I can highly recommend this apt! ++++++++++++

We had a fantastic time staying in Pete's apartment. The area in which it is based - SoHo - is great. There are some really nice restaurants and bars close by, and the subway station is no more than a minute's walk away. Pete was also really helpful which was great as an Airbnb newcomer. All in all, it was a fantastic experience - I definitely know where I'll stay when I go back to New York.
The apartment is perfect, comfortable, quiet and clean. There are lots of good bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. The subway station is on the corner. No bad comments or complains.

The apartment was great and was even better than how it looks in the photos. For a one bed apartment I think it was an excellent size, and the bed was truly wonderful!
Location is key for me, and this did not disappoint. It is surrounded by bars and restaurants, which meant I spent hardly any money on cabs during my whole week. The shopping area on Broadway was also super close.
Pete kept in communication and quickly replied to my emails.
Unfortunately for me another guest was coming to stay on the day I was leaving so I was unable to leave my bags there until my flight, however Pete's wife kindly looked up baggage storage for the day so that I wasn't left with a problem.
I would highly recommend Pete's apartment and I would be very happy to stay there again if I was to visit New York for a second time.

Pete was very quick to respond to our initial enquiry and was very friendly in his communication with us.  Unfortunately, he was out of town during our trip but made the necessary arrangements to get us going.  The place is as described, very warm, very clean.  Location is great!!  Within walking distance to so many things.  Make sure you ask him about food recommendations in the area.  Hope to stay here again on future visits.

If you're going to NY, I highly recommend that you stay at Pete's place in SoHo!  My friend and I stayed here for 3 nights and had a fantastic experience.

Pete was very responsive to emails/texts throughout the booking process! Marie, Pete's wife, came to check us in and she was very kind and incredibly helpful! She even emailed us a list of restaurants in the area to check out!

Speaking of food----there are tons of cute/tasty restaurants in walking distance and lots of shopping as well. Lombardi's pizza (well known and arguably one of the best in NY) is about a 15 minute walk down Spring St. We also ate at SALT which is one block down King st where it dead ends into MacDougal. It was phenomenal. They even comped us an extra dessert. :) And at the end of the night, all we had to do was walk down the block and we were home. Perfect!

Great location! Also close walking distance to just about any subway line you need to take you anywhere. Whether you're going to Times Square or the MET, you can easily get to where you need to go!

Something else to consider, most of the apartments I've seen/been in in the city are walk ups. This unit is on the second floor---ideal location. Not at ground level, but not so far up  that you pass out after carrying your luggage up the stairs. 

We had a wonderful time and would definitely stay here again! Thanks Pete and Marie for being such kind, helpful and communicative hosts!

My daughter and I stayed for almost 3 weeks at Pete's appartment and we truly enjoyed it...the appartment is very well, clean  and tastefelly layed out, kitchen and bathroom had everything one needs when living there for a longer period of time, living room and bedroom tasteful and had a great homy feeling...all was well thought out and especially its location was so convenient, one can walk to all major neerby subways, restaurants, stores etc...being there for a longer period of time made us feel like being in our own second home!!

La localización es estupenda,el apartamento pequeño pero acogedor
Hacia bastante calor y estaba sucio,las sabanas no estaban cambiadas, eran del inquilino anterior

We stayed at Pete's place for 9 nights in July and had a fantastic time.

Located on the 3rd floor of a old style walk-up building, the location was amazing. 
Within easy walking distance to the great shops on Prince St and all the Soho eating, it also has easy access to the rest of town with the 1, C and E trains only a minute or two walk.   We were really unsure of where we should stay, as it was our first trip to NY but this area is really fun and away from all the tourist trap rubbish, so you do get that real NY experience without the Times Square nonsense.  Of course it's only 10 minutes on the subway to Times Square and Broadway. 

The place is clean, modern and well appointed, with all the things you will need. The kitchen had all the cooking utensils you'll want, if you want to eat in and being able to have some french press coffee was a plus!  
A high quality air mattress was also available for that extra bed, which was great. 
Air conditioning works well, as it was HOT in NY in July.  The place also had access to a great laundry and fast wifi. 

Both Pete and his wife Marie were really fantastic with communication and responded to any questions immediately. We were running a little late into NY, but Marie was so easy to contact to rearrange meeting time and very accommodating. Thanks so much guys!!
Overall a really great base for any sort of stay in NY, will definitely stay there again.

Our stay at Pete´s place was incredible. Everything was just as he said, the apartment is great and the location just perfect! Seriously, this is the type of location that changes everything about your trip. We´ve been to New York quite a few times and this is THE location!
Pete is a great host, and even when he was out of town he took care of everything we needed making all things simple and making us feel very welcomed!
We strongly recommend Pete´s beautiful apartment and would not hesitate to stay there on our next trip to New York!
Thank you for everything Pete!
Gracias por todo!

Pete's apartment was in a PERFECT location - beautiful cafes and restaurants everywhere, a supermarket five minutes away, subway stations a few minutes walk away.. we couldn't have asked for better.
I stayed a week with my parents and while it was a little small (though Pete did warn us!) it was very clean and comfortable. Pete was out of town but his friend met me at the apartment and showed me around. Pete was always contactable via phone and checked in to make sure everything was fine. I would definitely recommend Pete's apartment for anyone looking for an authentic NY experience!

My partner and I stayed at Pete's 'Sleek Soho Apt' for six days and had an amazing time. Pete met us at the apartment to personally give us the keys even though we arrived around 11pm, and was very kind to share some local knowledge. The location was brilliant, right amongst the action of Soho, yet in a quiet street. We would certainly stay at Pete's again and would recommend 'Sleek Soho Apt' without hesitation.

Pete was excellent! His apartment is exactly as pictured and was clean and had all the necessities eg. toilet paper, lots of clean towels, Wifi, a tv and DVD for down time (or while my husband waited for me to get ready) and such a big comfy bed (it was a true queen not a double called a queen which we have come across before).

Pete was there if I ever needed help and did not disturb us otherwise. Our friends who also booked through Air BNB were not so lucky. They booked an apartment in Hell's Kitchen which was supposed to be 2 bed 2 bath but ended up being one bed with an ensuite and a terrible fold out sofa. Their host let a friend just let himself into their apartment when they were there and it was terribly unclean. My point is that if you want a sure bet, a great holiday, great host and to not be disappointed when you arrive then I can strongly recommend Pete. Not only this but his neighbours were friendly and very helpful.

Lastly the location, in the popular West Village, of the apartment was a stand out for us. Last trip we stayed in Times Square and didn't truly get to experience the day to day life of New Yorkers. We were trapped in that overly touristy area and missed some really great places as our hotel was surrounded by a business district which was largely closed at night. Staying in the West Village meant that we were so close to all the other wonderful areas such as Soho, Nolita, Little Italy and China Town. There is a subway just around the corner that took us any where we needed such as Times Square and the Upper East and West sides. Strolling distance from the apartment was all the best areas for shopping and so many great bars and restaurants...we loved this place!!

As reviewers have mentioned earlier, the location of this apartment is superb! We were so happy to discover not only many subway stations close by, but also many great restaurants and cafés. The apartment is ideal for a couple and looks exactly like the pictures. 
Our communication with the host went well and Pete had great understanding for our need to be flexible with our check-in/check-out times. Would we stay here again? Absolutely.

Pete was a great host! Although we didn´t meet him in person, he made all the arrangements to make sure we had everything we needed. We had great communication with him before and during our stay  This flat is superb and highly recommended! Pictures are 100% the same of reality. It was super clean and well organized. It has the best location in the city centre, next to the Village and with a lot of restaurants, cafes, and everything you need around.  I strongly recommend to book it if you're going to visit New York!!!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Pete's apartment! As others have commented, the location is really amazing and gave us a sense of what it must actually be like to live in the Soho area - a welcome change from staying in a hotel and feeling like a tourist. But while located right in the heart of things, the apartment is also remarkably quiet and private feeling. Other details: the apartment is spotless, the bed is comfy, and Pete is very helpful and friendly.  This was our first time using Airbnb and I would highly recommend it!!

We had a wonderful stay in Pete's Soho apartment. The apartment is as advertised and Pete was an incredibly accommodating host. He went above and beyond to ensure our stay was comfortable. The position of the apartment really couldn't be better.  Close to everything and in a quiet street. Thank you Pete! Oh the bed is incredibly comfortable.

Pete was a great host who was easy to communicate and coordinate with!  He was helpful and attentive to details even with our visit falling over the holidays.  The apartment was wonderful - clean and conveniently located.  We really couldn't have asked for a better location.  Travel to Penn Station, Newark Airport and all of the major sights in the city was fast and simple via the subway stop that is literally around the corner.  It was wonderful to end the day by coming back to a location that had that small neighborhood feel, as opposed to a hotel in the crowded tourist district.  Within a few blocks of the apartment there are a ton of great restaurants, coffee spots and pastry shops to choose from as well as several grocery and convenience stores.  This is really the way to see the city from a more authentic perspective!
Everything was great: communication with Pete, and the place is exactly as advertised. Highly recommended if you want to be in the West Village / (North) Soho regions.

We had a great 3 week stay in Pete's Soho apartment which was conveniently located walking distance to everything we needed. We literally walked everywhere!
