Had great coffee at Jacks, cocktails at Raouls, dinner at New Mekong and Bar Pitti and these were just the things located in about 2 mins walk. The apartment itself was clean and tidy in a lovely apartment block which was very secure and well looked after. The bedroom had lots of natural light. There was ample storage space for all our belongings and the kitchen was fully equipped with all you needed for a home cooked meal. There was also a study set up and a great wifi connection which made it really convenient for doing any work and admin. Pete was a great host, very responsive and helpful to any queries we had and made the whole process really easy and pleasant. I would definitely recommend Pete's apartment and would stay again next time we visit NYC.

The apartment was even better than expected - nice quiet building in a cool neighbourhood with good restaurants, nightlife, shopping and access to subway and taxis. Pete was great to deal with and super responsive when I reached out to him, I'll recommend his place to friends that are looking to stay in the area. Cheers!

Pete is an interesting guy who ensured a seamless experience for my arrival and departure at his South Village place. The home was exactly as shown in the pictures. I've heard from friends who are in the neighborhood that it's a rather big one bedroom for the neighborhood. Note that there isn't a microwave in the place but that seems commonplace in NYC.
The area itself is a paradise of convenience. Subways to Uptown/Brooklyn/Anywhere are within a 3 minute walk. There's a snazzy Vietnamese restaurant round the corner to people watch. The holy grail of NYC street food, MacDougal street, is but one block away. IFC cinema, "cute" West Village Streets, the madness of Soho are all within stones throw of a strong arm.

You can't go wrong with this place.

El departamento es genial! Cómodo y limpio, las fotos son iguales y Pete fue muy amable y fácil de contactar! Gracias Pete
Cuando vuelva a New York quiero volver a hospedarme aquí! La zona es increíble!

This is a wonderful space in a great neighborhood.  The host, Pete, made me feel very welcome, and provided plenty of extras/amenities for a comfortable week-long stay.  I hope to stay here again next time I'm in NYC, and have also recommended it to friends.

Great apartment in a really nice part of the city. Clean with great facilities and then lots of local amenities near by. Pete was an excellent host- very responsive and really helpful whenever we had questions. Location is excellent - 5 minute walk to SoHo and 10 minutes to West Village. Would throughly recommend to anybody looking for a comfortable 1-bedroom apartment in the heart of the city.

We had a very pleasant stay at Pete’s apartment. Keys were deposited at a nearby market and everything worked out perfectly. Pete was very responsive on all questions we had. Location of the apartment was ideal, close to several metro stations and in a great neighborhood with excellent restaurants and bars. Surprisingly quiet for such a location, only on the weekend we had to use our earplugs. This apartment truly gives you a genuine NYC experience and it is in a really beautiful and authentic building.

Fantastic location on the border of Soho and the West Village, but not too noisy. The apartment is cosy and well equipped, with cooking facilities and laundry downstairs. Pete is a friendly and helpful host.

We stayed at Pete's for a week, his place was very nice, cosy and perfectly clean as advertised. We sent a text msg to Pete in the cab from the airport and he was here on time to welcome us when we arrived. Only one bad thing is the noise coming from the window in the bedroom: hard to sleep in the morning! but with the jetlag it was no big deal. The location of the apartment is great ! neighborhood is really nice!

Pete's place was perfect for the two of us. Everything was exactly as pictured except the couch was different.   Pete was very flexible with our check-in and check-out times, and we appreciated that very much.  We had plenty of clean fresh towels.   And the shower was perfect with plenty of hot water after a long day of sightseeing. We stayed in for dinner one of our five nights and had everything we needed to make a quick meal.  The bed was comfy and clean as well.  It was cold in NYC while we were there, but Pete has good heating in his apt.  Everything was clean upon our arrival.  An extra added BIG plus is the subway station at the end of his block!  
Since we were on the third floor, we brought our "sound" machine so street noise wouldn't wake us.  It was perfect, and we heard nothing outside.  

Thanks, Pete!

This was my second time staying at Pete's, I booked with only 24 hours notice and he was awesome about having the place ready super quick! Great apartment/building/location, close to subways, restaurants, comedy clubs, bars, shopping. Will stay again!

Pete was so quick to reply with all contact made, the apartment was clean, well-equipped and in a great location. Key pick up and drop off was really easy. 

I'd definitely stay again.

The apartment was very comfortable, clean and well set up; while not a large space it is quite OK for two people. It is in a great location, close to several subway stations and within walking distance of many good places to visit, eat and drink. Pete was responsive when we needed to check a couple of things with him, and concerned to know how we were getting on.

We had a great visit. Pete responded quickly to all our questions. The apartment has a comfy bed, a dresser you can use and a well equipped kitchen. The location made it an excellent base for our one week visit.

Location of the apartment is great - close to good restaurants, shopping and subway. As we traveled for work we only had one day to explore NY and Pete let us leave begs in the apartment after check out time on the day of departure so we had a chance to see a bit of the city and not to worry about our luggage.

We were very happy with our stay at Petes place.  The key pick up and drop off was very easy and convenient.  The place was clean and located in a nice neighborhood.  Pete was very responsive when we had a couple of questions.

This is a cool place in a good hood. It's a little off the beaten path -- not really Soho, not really the Village -- but a short walk to both. Apartment is clean and spacious, bed is comfortable. There are nice touches, like a container of filtered water and beers in the fridge. 

The only downsides are that the bathroom is on one end of the unit, the bedroom on another, so there's a lot of walking between them. And 6th Ave is right there, so traffic noise can be a problem at night. I'd recommend bringing earplugs or a white noise generator.

Also: The Keycafe key pickup/dropoff did not work for me at all. Your mileage may vary.

Pete was a stellar host and his apartment was exactly what we were looking for. He was easy to communicate with prior to our booking and was extremely helpful and easy to reach while we were in New York. His apartment is in an amazing location between SOHO and Greenwich Village. There are two subway lines just blocks away and lots of food options just outside the door. The apartment was clean and had nice decor.  The bed is large and comfortable. The kitchen has everything you need for your stay.  Pete also has lots of extras like champagne glasses, hair dryer & straightener, books, maps, shampoo and much more.  We had a great time at his place and we would definitely book with him again.
Was very happy with my stay at Pete's. Place is very functional, clean, super well located. Not much natural light but that didn't bother me. I will be happy to return to this place again. Thanks

The apartment was clean, neat, geographically desirable, & within walking distance of good restaurants & shopping.
We would stay there again:)

We spent a week in Pete's apartment. Exc­ellent location between different subway­ stations, lovely area of the West Villa­ge close to lots of shops, restaurants a­nd brunch places.

Pete was excellent, always communicating­ and allowed us to leave our bags in the­ apartment on the final day after the ch­eckout time as our flight left late.

The apartment was lovely, just the right­ size for 2 people, massive comfy bed wi­th plenty of wardrobe space. Very clean bathroom, good size overall and we miss ­it very much!

There was a very hot shower, hairdryer a­nd some toiletries available. The kitche­n had an oven, cooker and fridge so we c­ould reheat meals. The lounge had a nice­ TV and sofas too!

If we come back to New York, we would no­t hesitate to stay in Pete's Apartment, ­we had an amazing time! Thanks for every­thing Pete, much appreciated!

Spacious, very clean apartment in excellent location next to Soho and well connected by express and local subway lines.

The check-in was frustrating as no mention was made of the automated key pickup process at a cafe 10min away. It took some time to resolve this and get access to the apartment. 

From there, the experience was great and Pete was a very attentive host.

We absolutely loved staying at Pete's place! The location is fantastic and the apartment was spotlessly clean and well-stocked when we arrived. Need an umbrella? No problem. Need a space heater? No problem. Need an extra blanket? No problem! It looks exactly like the photos, so there were no surprises (thank goodness). We were very impressed. Important to note for some that it is a 2-floor walkup and we couldn't find a microwave. The key pick-up process isn't ideal, but it's perfectly manageable. Pete was very responsive and kindly checked in on us a couple of times during our 2+ week stay. Would love to stay here again!

the apartment was just as described.
the key pickup and dropoff was easy and not too far away from the apartment.
the apartment was perfectly located within walking distance to: shopping around prince/spring st, subway or bars and restaurants.
comfy bed, functioning shower and a clean apartment made it a great stay!
also pete was always approachable and helpful with Qs around the apartment or the city.
thanks and any time again!
pat

We stayed in Pete's place for 5 nights and we had a great time! Pete was very helpful and checked in with us during our stay - he even gave us advice to have food delivered! The apartment itself was exactly like the pictures and the location was perfect!
Staying at Pete's place was a great decision. The place is full of good energy and in a great location. I recommend staying at Pete's and will considered it on my next trip.

We had a fantastic week in New York, the flat was very clean and comfortable, close to 2 differents subway train stations wich was very convenient. We got the keys using keycafe pickup at a shop near the appartment, that was very easy. The neighborhood is very nice and full of pubs and restaurants.

My husband and I had a fantastic stay at Pete's apartment for our 5 nights in New York.  Response time was quick, key pickup a breeze, and the apartment was very clean. Comfy bed and hot shower. Great location in a nice neighborhood, with everything close and within walking distance. Would definitely stay here again!
We were 6 days in Pete's appartment and we were very comfortable. The appartment is clean and there is everything you can need. The location was perfect for us. Thank you Pete for your hostness.

Our stay at Pete's was absolutely fantastic! The whole experience was seamless. Communication was great, it was easy to get the keys, easy to find the place, we had everything we needed and wanted, it was quiet, and simply no problems at all. It was clean and marvelous There was even cold water in the refrigerator when we arrived! That was the best! It is a great location, secure, and close to different subways so no matter where we were going, it wasn't far. There is also a terrific deli around the corner! Definitely would repeat the stay. Thanks Pete!

Pete ha sido un excelente anfitrión, ayudándonos en todo lo que le solicitamos. El departamento está en una excelente ubicación y muy cerca del transporte público.
Además el departamento de Pete es idéntico a lo que se muestra en las fotos publicadas. Cumplió exactamente con nuestras expectativas. Lo recomiendo entusiastamente.
The apartment is in a great location and is good value (in NYC terms of course). Pete was an excellent host - checking I had moved in with no problems and responding promptly to questions.

L'appartamento è ottimo per posizione e comodità.
Molto carino e pulito.
Pete è sempre stato disponibile, gentile e pronto nel rispondere. Assolutamente da consigliare.

Pete's place is exactly as pictured.  It's good size with two people.  The location is very convenient, close to two subway stations and walking distance to Soho and Bleecker Street.  Pete is an extremely accessible host, timely responsive to all the requests of the tenents in a professional and friendly manner.  I had a great time at Pete's place and would recommend it to anyone.

Pete was a great host. He reached out periodically during the entire stay,  asking if all was good or if we needed anything. Apartment is great. Exactly how it looks in the pictures. Great location. Easy access. Would love to stay there again.

I bloody love this place!!!
What a nice little apartment that we had for a few days whilst working in NYC. Everything was amazing, clean and roughly about the same size as out flat in London so we had no complaints at all.
Pete was a gentleman who always answered emails prior to us arriving and also wanted to make sure that we got to the apartment okay too, which was late thanks to a two hour delay leaving. 
I hope that they next time I come to NY then I can bag this same apartment again.
The local area is quite quiet and there is a wine shop around the corner and a small grocery shop near by too so you can't exactly starve. Do a few minutes walk either north or south from the apartment and you can find a whole host of places to eat and drink. About three or four blocks from the nearest subway line helps should you need to get about plus there are always a few Uber or Yellow cabs near by if you want a quicker way to get to your destination. 
As for the apartment, well if had everything we needed to have a great stay and the shower was lovely after being in the hot and humid NY summer. Just can't fault it at all!
Thanks you for letting us stay with you.

Pete's apartment in the heart of Soho was a terrific place to stay. It is close to all one would want to do in New York, including some of the most amazing restaurants in the city. That the apartment is close to several train stations was an added bonus. The apartment itself was cozy and spacious, and the AC was much appreciated in the sweltering New York City heat. I would certainly stay here again on my next trip back, and would expect nothing but another incredible experience.
Stayed for a week and could of stayed longer. Great location. Key pickup/drop off was easy and simple. Pete was a good host. I would stay here again.

Pete's apartment is a fantastic and rare find in NY!
Pete is a great host, very helpful and friendly.
The apartment is in the best ever location in NY, with all restaurants and bars around, really can't get better than this.
The apartment is clean and spacious, with everything you need for a nice stay in the city. I can really just say positive things here.
Thanks Pete for a great stay.
Apartment was lovely.

Pete's place was exactly as described and expected! Location is amazing and I really had a nice time during my stay there! 
Pete has also been a great host. Unfortunately, we could not meet in person, but everything was perfectly arranged for my arrival, the apt was very clean and Pete has been available any time I needed any help.
I would definitely recommend his place for your days in NYC!

We had an AMAZING time at Pete's place. The apt was as described. Very cozy, well cleaned and the king sized bed was great after hours of walking trough this incredible city.
The apt is really close to great restaurants and a few steps away from the subway station. It's located in one of the best neighborhoods in Manhattan.
Pete was very friendly and answered all my questions very quickly.
If you have doubts about this place, just go for it!
We'll definitely stay here again.
Thanks for everything, brother!

Absolutely fantastic location - with Soho, the West Village and the Meatpacking district only steps away. Loads of great restaurants in the vicinity. 
Pete was away but in contact and offering help - very helpful and considerate. 
It was all incredibly straightforward.
Very comfortable apartment in a very convenient neighbourhood. Pete is very responsive to needs. Great stay!

It was an amazing stay. Pete made my experience so easy and convenient! The location is just perfect in the middle of the action but the apartment is very quiet. What to say except that I don't imagine an other stay in NY without staying there! Thanks again Pete!
Very clean, great location in SOHO and I felt safe there

This place was great! Not only was Pete accommodating and quick to respond (we chatted via text), but the apartment was in a GREAT location and was easy to find. It was cozy and comfortable and the bed was great - I could have slept through the entire weekend. When I return to NYC, I will definitely look into Pete's place again - much cheaper than a hotel and just as accomodating.
Good located (subway n°1 is very close 1-2 min walking), clean, big. Pete is a very kind guy that tries to help you enjoying your staying.

This is the perfect place to stay in New York city! Parking was easy to find, and all great restaurants/bars were walking distance.  Pete's location is absolutely amazing and makes you feel like a true New Yorker.  The listing looks even better than it does in the pictures.  It was safe, convenient, and only 10 minute drive from Midtown.  Shower pressure and bed in the apartment were ideal as well.

I would recommend this to anyone traveling to the city.

Pete is a kind and attentive host, and his apartment is clean, comfortable, and very conveniently located. The one bedroom apartment, though not large, is set up in a way that it surprisingly spacious for NYC. The kitchen was easy to use and move around in (though keep in mind there is no microwave, if that's important to you), and the living room organized and perfect for lounging. The bed is firm and comfortable. The bathroom was very clean. Pete was easy to get in touch with; he kindly checked in to make sure I was enjoying my stay, and additionally ensured that the check-in and check-out process was smooth and simple. Great host and great place!
Very good value for money. Very clean and in a great location.
Pete is a great host very concerns about his guest. He makes his best to help and answer very promptly. I recommend his place -same as the image- great situation.
Great spot and excellent value! Will stay again!!

Pete's apartment is your door to a "real" Manhattan experience. NYU has to be the best place to stay in the island. Variety of brunch, restaurant, dessert places, jazz joints and coffee shops. Easy access to several metro lines. Walking distance to downtown and midtown. Very comfortable apartment in a truly authentic building. Excellent bed. Pete is a good, attentive, and predictable host. We can't wait to be back.

Pete is a great host and the apartment is fantastic!  It's in a great location and provides everything you need for a short stay in NYC or a slightly longer one - we were there for almost three weeks. Thanks Pete!

We had a great stay at Pete's place. It's in a great area and his apartment is an excellent base from which to explore it. Pete always responded quickly to any questions we had. We would recommend his place!

We had a great stay at Pete's place!
Cafe, Bars, Deli's, Restaurants and more nearby. 

Public transportation is just around the corner 

If you like live music, checkout The Bitter End. It's less than 10mins walk, open jam every Mondays, it starts a little bit before midnight tho. Lots of good famous musicians 

Thanks again Pete

Cheers 

Patrick

Pete was a great host and the apartment had everything I needed for a great stay in the city.  The apartment is a small one-bedroom but is standard size for that neighborhood, which is one of my favorites in all of the city.  Keycafe worked great for picking up the keys.  Pete was attentive and responded quickly to messages.  Definitely recommend.

Pete has a nice apt in a fantastic location in NY. It's close to Greenwich Village which has plenty of bars and restaurants as well as a vibrant nightlife. The apartment was very clean and the user guide put together by Pete was all that we needed to access everything in the apt and the building. Pete checked with us on an ongoing basis to see how the stay was coming along and was always reachable on case of any questions. I would strongly recommend this place to anyone coming to NY.

Staying at this apartment was terrific! The location is great, everything is walkable, restaurants, cafes, bars, groceries and fancy and hip stores; it is close to subway stations which is convenient particularly if you want to go uptown to visit the museums. There is no elevator, so keep bags light and I think it wouldn't be kid-friendly. I will be happy to stay there again!
Great location. Clean and spacious. Pete was a great host with excellent communication even despite the time zone difference during his travels. Thanks again!

The location is fantastic.  In a most lively neighborhood, close to several subway lines, close to a vibrant environment, restaurants, coffee places, convenience stores, night life.  Great location!
Pete is extremely communicative, very helpful with all inquiries and requests.
The apartment is clean, with a separate bedroom.  Kitchen is equipped with basic amenities.  Wi-fi offers a good connection.
This place is just as described. Near great restaurants and touristic sights. The parking can be difficult get ready to possibly pay for parking.

Great location!  Comfortable space!  (And yes, the bed is as comfy as everyone says!)  Pete is a great communicator and host, always available when you need.  We feel very fortunate to have found his place on Airbnb.  Highly recommend.
Great apartment that's reasonably priced and centrally located.

Pete’s apartment is perfect! Very clean and fully equipped! One real and bright room with a big and comfortable bed. We didn’t cook, but everything seems present to do it. The bathroom is clean, with a bath and shower-pressure! Not very much natural light in the living room, but if you come to visit NY, you surely come back in the apartment in the end of the afternoon, or evening, so it’s not a big problem! The neighbors are quiet. Little, little noise from the street in the room (the street is very quiet for NY), so it’s not a big problem too if you come to visit (even if you come to work), the street wake up as you! The subway is at the corner, and other lines few blocks away. It’s a very convenient place to visit NY! The apartment is at the limit of Greenwich and SoHo, so it’s a very cool place with lots of bars and restaurants. And little supermarket not too far. We didn’t meet Pete (he was travelling) but it was easy to pick up/drop off the keys and he was easy to contact. Very accommodating too, we book the apartment one week before our arrival, and it was not a problem for him. The same to leave. We ask him to leave our bags a bit more time and he was ok! So everything was perfect!!! I surely recommend Pete’s apartment and if I’ll come back, I’ll book it again!!! Thanks again Pete for everything!!! L’appartement de Pete est parfait! Très propre et bien équipé! Une vraie et lumineuse chambre, avec un grand et confortable lit. Nous n’avons pas cuisiné, mais tout semble présent pour le faire. La salle de bain est propre avec une baignoire et de la pression dans la douche ! Pas trop de lumière naturelle dans le salon, mais si vous venez à NY pour visiter, vous rentrerez certainement en fin d’après-midi ou le soir, donc ce n’est pas vraiment un problème. Les voisins ne sont pas bruyants. Il y a un tout petit peu de bruit dans la chambre venant de la rue (la rue est calme pour NY), mais là encore, si vous venez pour visiter (et même si c’est pour travailler), ça ne sera pas un problème. La rue se réveille en même temps que vous ! Le métro est au coin de la rue, et il y a d’autres lignes à quelques blocs. C’est un endroit très pratique pour visiter NY ! L’appartement est à la limite de Greenwich et de SoHo, donc c’est un endroit très cool et il y a plein de bars et de restaurants. Et un petit supermarché pas trop loin. Nous n’avons pas rencontré Pete (il voyageait) mais nous avons récupéré/déposé les clefs facilement. Et Pete a été très facile à contacter. Il nous a aussi bien facilité les choses en acceptant sans problème notre réservation tardive (une semaine avant d’arriver), et en nous permettant de laisser nos bagages...
Pete's apartment is located very well. we found a very clean and intimate apartment at a perfect location. I highly recommend for couples.

Pete was quick to reply and the apartment was clean, well equipped and a terrific location for exploring NYC. 
Key pickup was just a few blocks away and restaurants very close. Try Olive's for a breakfast sandwich/coffee and Arturo's for Italian. Both very close. 
We would definitely stay again!
Great Airbnb. Great location and clean place for a true New York experience. Paul was a great host, very responsive and knowledgeable of the are, have many great recommendations.
Pete's place was exactly what I needed for a few days -- great location!

It was a great place go stay in manhattan. Pete replied to my questions so all the process could be done very quickly. Really appreciate! The best thing of Pete's home is the location! It is located at very trendy district. You can find many awesome restaurants and bars everywhere! I highly recommend you to stay Pete's home!! :)
Perfect apartment in fabulous location!
If you plan on taking the subway to get around, the location between two stops is great. And the neighborhood is a continual treat to walk around.

Pete was a great host! We stayed at his place for 5 nights. Response time to all my questions and concerns was great, and he accommodated all our requests as much as possible. Loved the location, which is right in the middle of Soho and Greenwich Village. Shops, delis, restaurants and bars are so close, you will never have to leave the area, if you don't want to. You can spend weeks just exploring the area surrounding the apartment. It's really fantastic. The subway station is 1 block away. The apartment itself was just as expected. It's located on a typical nice New York street. The neighborhood feels safe and homey. The apartment was clean, the bed was comfortable, sheets and towels were provided. You will find everything you need in the kitchen like coffee maker, electric water kettle, toaster, pots, etc.... but seriously, who wants to eat at home while in NYC :-) The bed was comfortable and a cute little desk in the bedroom by the window, allowed me to work in the morning while watching New Yorkers rush to work. What else can I say? We hope to be back soon and if available, we will stay at Pete's again, as 5 days were not enough to soak in the cuteness of this neighborhood.

La casa di Pete è perfetta! La posizione è comoda con i mezzi pubblici ed alle attrattive del quartiere. La casa era pulita e dotata di tutto quello di cui avevamo bisogno. Il letto era molto comodo. Unica scomodità è stata la mancanza di ascensore dato che la scala era ripida, ma, tutto sommato, era solo al secondo piano.

The flat is great and the location is perfect to visit nyc quickly. There is a lot of restaurants and bars in the surroundings. Pete’s appartement is clean, everything is  easygoing and pete is very precise, reactive and helpfull. I totally recommand it!

Pete's place is in an ideal location.  Apartment was clean, simple and bed was comfy.  It was a little noisy at night...windows are not very thick so you can hear all the street noise, but that was the only complaint.  Everything else was great and Pete was very responsive.

This is the apartment you want to stay in if you’re visiting lower Manhattan. Pete is a fantastic host: always quick to respond and help if you have any questions during your stay. This was my second time in the apartment on a business trip, and once again a comfortable and quiet place to be. It’s not easy to find an apartment in NY that has a full bathtub and space to easily move about in; no tight corners narrow spaces to navigate, thanks to the long layout. The kitchen now has a microwave in addition to everything else (full stove, oven, refrigerator, freezer). The location is fantastic: just a few blocks from the water and tons of restaurants, little grocery and convenience stores around the corner, and shopping nearby. Stay here!

Pete was a great host!  His place is in a perfect location for exploring the city.  There are dozens of awesome bars and restaurants within a couple minutes walk. The space is great. The building is clean and safe. Probably our favourite neighbourhood in NYC. Thanks Pete!!

Pete's place is exactly as described. Very conveniently located, well appointed, and comfortable. I would stay there again and would not hesitate to recommend it to a friend. Pete was very communicative and made the entire experience very nice!

The location is outstanding between west village and soho, with lots of good restaurants, bars and stores very close. Also, there is access to different subway lines a few blocks away. 
Pete’s place is like the pictures. I stayed for over a month in the apt and had no problems at all. 
Check in and check out were super easy and even before booking the place Pete was always very responsive of my questions.
I definirltely recommend to stay at this place!

I was in town for a week for work and this spot was great. Close to restaurants and the subway and in a very walkable part of town bordering the village and soho. The apartment was great and checking in and out was a breeze. Pete was on top of everything and a great host. Would stay again and recommend to anyone needing a home base  in the city!
This place is great! Such an amazing location and really close to the subway. Pete was super responsive and checkin was super smooth.
Liked the stay at Pete’s apartment.
Great location, quiet space, awesome air conditioning, and near so many transit lines, great restaurants, and things to do. Pete was easy to communicate with!

Pete's place is perfect! Clean, cozy and centrally located - Pete's place was the perfect place to act as "home base" for the month. Pete is a great host and check-in is an absolute breeze! If you need a place to stay in Soho - STAY HERE!
The flat’s location is great! Very close to the subway and soho. Pete is a great host - friendly and easy to communicate with.
Apartment is on the older side and lacked toiletries. Towels weren’t the freshest. Other than that location is amazing!
Perfect location in a vey nice appartment! Lots of great restaurants and bars in the neighbourghhood, super nice and comfortable. Thanks Pete for your hospitality!

MANY MORE CONS THAN PROS. Let me start by stating that we are also Airbnb hosts (Super hosts actually) and do know the short term rental business. I specifically explained to the host that we were arriving early (after a visit to our kids' in College) and asked him, since we knew that the apartment was free the night before (by simply checking on the availability calendar), if he would allow us to check in a bit earlier. BTW, this is (or should be) customary in this industry, let alone if you are a "colleague". He couldn't care less about our requirement. Not only he took few days to respond (and to, at the end, deny it), he simply lied to us by explaining that the cleaning people were not able to come in earlier. When we arrived to the apartment and checked in, we came across the cleaning people and asked them if that was true. It was obviously not. Hard to understand the logic behind. To begin with, check in process is overall very complicated. Keys are located several blocks away from the apartment on a 7Eleven. It is a hassle, particularly if you come with lots of luggage or if it is raining (as it was when we checked out) or if it is cold. This should be noticed clearly on the description. It is not. You only come to acknowledge it once you confirmed the rental and have access to the Full house manual. You just can't come with a taxi, step out and get them, as where the keys are located is a very busy area (in the middle of Greenwich Village, right next to the Blue Note Jazz Bar, just a of block away from Washington Square Park). Quite inconvenient. Also, the apartment is located on the 3rd floor, on an old building. These are very high floors. You have to be ready for this. Although is (slightly) noted on the listing, there should be a more clear warning on what it takes to get to the unit. Although it is also noted on the listing, there is NO TV/Cable service... I know, I saw it, but again, another negative. Internet was not working the first day and it took the host several hours (until the following day) to respond. I had to access a video call and needed full speed Internet. Communication in general was slow. No A/C on the main room (just a fan) and only an old and very noisy A/C unit on the living room that clearly needs maintenance. This is simply not an apartment to come in plain summer with 85+ degrees outside. You will suffer. Some of positives: The location and the area are very good. Although is not technically SoHo, as published (the boundary is either West Broadway or 6th Ave. for some others), there are subway lines very close which are very convenient. The apartment was perfectly clean. Impeccable. This is an absolute must for us....
Great

Well-located apartment with most basic amenities. Pete was super friendly and responsive as a host. Neighborhood is great.

It was missing some of the charming details in the photos, and the mishmash of furniture / cold lighting felt a bit like a college house. That said, it's all addressable, and you'd be hard pressed to find a 1BD in this neighborhood for less. Works great as a crash pad for your adventures!
Clean, comfortable, perfect location, we absolutely loved it!  Stayed here for a week, hated to leave!  Pete’s place had all we needed for a great stay in the SOHO District.  Great host!

Had a great stay at Pete's place. Check on was really simple and the place was clean and quiet. Good location and easy to get around. Pete was also super sweet and mailed back my Fitbit I left at his house! Really appreciated that! Definitely recommend staying here.

Well kept apartment and a areat starting base for exploration of the best neighborhoods of NY.  

Also, Pete has a great library.
Great location for the price. Very close to Joe’s pizza!!!!

Pete's place was great for our 1 week stay in NYC. It was very clean and comfortable - even better than the pictures! The bathroom was smallish but everything you need, with a good powerful hot shower! The bed was comfortable and the apartment warm enough - although as stated you cannot control the temperature yourself. Also of note, Pete's place is on the 3rd floor with no elevator but we managed fine getting our bags up the stairs. Additionally, great laundry room located in basement of building - easy to use. Overall, a great apartment in a great location!

This was my 3rd stay at Pete’s, and once again it was great. Having had a lot of experience with NYC throughout my life and knowing how difficult it is to find a decent place to stay with enough space to keep one from feeling suffocated, I can easily say that this apartment is a gem. It’s a 1-bedroom apt with everything: full kitchen with refrigerator, freezer, stove (4 burners), oven, microwave; a bathroom that has a full bathtub/shower combo (many places don’t have this), and the bedroom has an amazingly comfortable bed—way better than what I’ve found at most hotels (I travel constantly for work, and the bed in Pete’s apt outshines hotel beds 9 out of 10 times). 

The location of this place is amazing. It’s close to many wonderful restaurants and has very easy access to the subway, so finding something to eat and getting around the city is extremely convenient. If you like shopping, this is also the place to be, because the best shops and brands are a mere 5 min walk down the street. 

The only thing to be aware of is that this is a walk-up to the 3rd floor—so it can be a little difficult moving in if you have more than a single bag (my stay was in the middle of a month-long tour, so I had a lot of stuff to carry), but otherwise, the stairs are a great burst of exercise!

Can’t say enough good things. Pete is an attentive and concerned host. His reliable hospitality and all the great features of his apt are the reasons I keep coming back year after year. Don’t miss out on a chance to stay here!
Nice cosy place, right next to a subway station for easy access around the city.
Fabulous location, on the edge of SoHo and West Village! Pete was a great host, and as helpful as possible
Great place, great host, highly recommended.

name: Modern loft with a terrace in the heart of Kadikoy
summary: A modern decorated loft with a huge terrace and a perfect view of historical peninsula. Kadikoy is the new hype of Istanbul. A 24 hour living destination, perfectly located for food and craft beer lovers, shop addicts, music junkies. Close to Ciya Sofrasi, Baylan, Rock'n Rolla, Dorock XL. You’ll love my place because of its central location, the terrace and the view, the people and the ambiance. Good for couples, solo adventurers, young travellers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
description: A modern decorated loft with a huge terrace and a perfect view of historical peninsula. Kadikoy is the new hype of Istanbul. A 24 hour living destination, perfectly located for food and craft beer lovers, shop addicts, music junkies. Close to Ciya Sofrasi, Baylan, Rock'n Rolla, Dorock XL. You’ll love my place because of its central location, the terrace and the view, the people and the ambiance. Good for couples, solo adventurers, young travellers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

reviews.comments: We stayed at Alper's house for 3 nights. His flat is situated in the heart of Kadikoy with a lot of restaurants, bars and streetfood around. There is everything you need in the flat, especially we liked to sit at terrace, it has amazing view to Europe, Asia and Bosphorus. Alper and his sister were very kind and paid a lot of attention to us. Thank you guys for everything!

alper is an amazing host. during our stay, he checked on us through (Hidden by Airbnb) , and asked if we needed anything or if we were fine. his house is one of the most beautiful ones that i ever rented through airbnb. it was clean and had everything we needed. also, the house has a great balcony with an amazing view of the historical peninsula. additionally, the house's location is very central. i totally recommend alper and his house. i would defiantly hire it again.

Всё было очень хорошо.Лофт отлично расположен и в хорошем состоянии.Альпер радушный хозяин,очень понятно объяснил как чем пользоваться.шикарная терраса с отличным видом.Рекомендую парам или небольшой компании.
Alper is a very helpful host and a quick responder. His place was great. I really enjoyed staying there
Staying in Alper flat was a great experience, the flat is amazing, the view unique and alper is a great host. We ve spent a wonderful week in Istambul, thank you Alper for all
I doubt exist a most beautiful ans stylish flat in all Istanbul, moderm, comfy, great location, extremely well equipped,  just amazing, thanks Alper!!!!

The location is perfect to explore the city. It's at the heart of Kadıköy. The flat is very stylish, warm and cozy. The living room and especially the roof terrace offer more than you need! We have already started to talk about when we can arrange day-off and go back Alper's place ... and of course we recommend the place to everyone who needs to keep up with the city for sure ...

Konum olarak çok iyi, etraf çok hareketli olmasına rağmen daireye çıktığınızda inanılmaz huzur dolu ve muhteşem bir manzara ile karşılaşıyorsunuz. Alper istanbulu iyi biliyor olmama rağmen herşeyle yakından ilgilendi ve çok hızlı geri dönüş sağladı. Kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum.

Alper has a stylish flat at the center of Kadikoy with everything you might need. It was a very cozy, clean and comfortable place and it felt like a warm shelter in these cold winter days with a perfect view. We really enjoyed staying here for a short while and highly recommend to everyone. Cheers
Bizi çok iyi ağırladı. Dostluğu ve yardımseverliği altında ezildik desem yeridir. Herkese gönül rahatlığıyla tavsiye edebileceğim bir ev sahibi.
Very nice place in the most happening Instabul neighborhood.

Квартира находится на последнем этаже коммерческого дома в самом центре района Мода. Вокруг в переулках разбросаны бары и многочисленные заведения. Сама квартира - вау. Дизайн очень стильный, все удобства есть, Альпер очень приятный и отзывчивый господин. Мы остались полностью довольны всем и особенно довольны конкретно видами с террасы и крыши. Там реально круто. Рекомендуем.

Alper's place is great, located right in the center of Moda. It's very close to many places to eat and buy fruits. He was also very flexible with the check-in given my very early flight. The place has a nice design and the place has everything you need for a pleasant stay in Istanbul.

Alper is a perfect host who takes great care of his home. the apartment is beautiful and in a unique location in the heart of one of the most interesting areas of istanbul. Kadikoy is a perfect place for public transportation. Perfect for those arriving from Sabiha Airport and close to the underground  and ferries to Minonou and Karakoy. Alper and his sister advised me the best clubs in the neighborhood where I ate very well. They are all within a mile and the neighborhood is full of life and very quiet. The apartment is elegant, with a terrace offering a breathtaking view of Istanbul. There is a very comfortable sofa with a modern television. Alper supported me for every request and he always responded promptly.  There are a microwave oven, a coffee machine, a dishwasher and a washing machine. I recommend this district to those who want to know the real life of the city and in many trips I had never found such a perfect accommodation. I absolutely recommend it and will definitely come back
Very nice place in the middle of a lively neighborhood. All you need is there. Especially the big balcony is a plus. Alper was a very friendly and helpful host.

Alper's place is a gem in a wonderful neighborhood in Istanbul.  It is right in the thick of the nightlife scene of Kadikoy, but also not right above the most busy and noisy streets.  There is a Starbucks around 100 meters away, and a lovely man who makes fresh squeezed juices right below the apartment - both were musts every morning.  But, the really special thing about Alper's place is its extensive roof patio with breathtaking views of the Bosphorus.  I will check its availability everytime I go to Istanbul!
Los ısıklardan hoslanıyorsanız ev fena degil...

We’ve stayed in Alper’s place for two whole weeks. He was very responsive and flexible with our odd check-in and check-out times. The flat is tastefully decorated and the view from the terrace is more than what you’re looking for after a tiring day.

I'm in love with Istanbul!) Stunning city. Apartments Alper in my opinion are located in the best part of the city. From the top of the terrace, there is an incredible view of the sunset. This I have never seen) I liked the collection of shoes in the apartment) I was interested in the shoe maker;) The host organized a full transfer from the airport and back) Everything is just super!)

Our stay at Alper’s place was truly perfect. Not just did Alper assist in any kind of way before (offered a transfer to the airport, answered every question super quick) he also helped us during our stay in case he had questions or problems occurred (electricity). 
I’ve lived in Istanbul previously and I can tell that the overall condition of the apartment is way above the usual. It’s clean and stylish and the terrace is the perfect place for a sundowner. 
All in all it was a ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ experience as the place and especially the host made our stay more then pleasant!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place and host. Enjoy the view.

The best location & The beat Istanbul view! You won’t be disappointed. The place is very close to the any sort of shops that you can imagine. Bahariye shopping st is around the corner, best pubs are all in walking distance, a pastry shop is just a min away from the entrance  for a quick breakfast in the mornings, if you are having a late night and fancy some bites kokorec place os open and stuffed mussels are always an option :) and these are only the ones i can fit in one review.. many many more! 
When we arrived - around 1am at night - Alper was there waiting for us to hand our keys and show the apartment. Alper was very caring during our stay; he checked in many times to ensure all was well. He was also so quick in his responses. He also arranged a return airport transfer for us which was a VIP service and a great value! Thanks again Alper for your hospitality, caring and kindness!

Были на Новый год. 

Отличная стильная и уютная квартира для пары, находится в самом центре Кадыкёя — близко пешком до набережной и причала. Все самые злачные места возле дома или рядом. Рынок с божественными оливками и потрясающими огромными креветками тоже в минуте ходьбы. Лучшие коты тоже здесь :)
Сам Альбер был в отпуске, но нас встретила его сестра. Они заказали трансфер из аэропорта и все время были с водителем на связи, так что мы просто переходили из рук в руки)
Квартира на верхнем этаже, в доме ещё 3 квартиры, которые переделаны под музыкальные студии, так что часов до 11 вечера кто-то учится петь и играть на гитаре, но нам это не мешало. 
Есть огромная терраса с видом на Босфор — зимой она скорее для фоточек, чем для посиделок, поэтому придётся вернуться в более тёплое время, чтобы оценить. 
Очень мягкая кровать. ОЧЕНЬ. Лежишь в ней как в гнезде. 
Единственный минус — неудобный унитаз. Колени упираются в бортик ванной. И нет шторки в ванной, но это не беда. 
Зато в квартире тёплый пол, и это огромный плюс зимой, гораздо круче батарей. 
Нет яркого освещения, только точечные приглушённые светильники, и это создаёт очень романтичное настроение. 
В целом мы очень довольны, жена уже мечтает вернуться.

name: Nice studio in the Sud-Ouest
summary: 3 1/2 on a sunny second floor, quiet street. Near metro de l'Église. Available from May to September. Open bedroom/ living room. Private balcony in the back. Rent include furnitures and the four appliances. Perfect for one person or a couple.
space: Confortable space near everything. Parks, walk by the river...
description: 3 1/2 on a sunny second floor, quiet street. Near metro de l'Église. Available from May to September. Open bedroom/ living room. Private balcony in the back. Rent include furnitures and the four appliances. Perfect for one person or a couple. Confortable space near everything. Parks, walk by the river... As much as they need. Quiet neighborhood. Close to little grocery stores, city transportation and at reasonable distance from downtown and the Atwater market.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood. Close to little grocery stores, city transportation and at reasonable distance from downtown and the Atwater market.
interaction: As much as they need.
house_rules: Respect the space and the belongings. It is a no smoking place.

name: Backyard cabin by lovely Pittwater
summary: Our beautiful,, weatherboard backyard cabin sits opposite Pittwater on the Northern Beaches.
space: Our cabin is private with it's own access.  It comfortably sleeps two with a queen size bed, sofa, dining table, fully equipped kitchenette and ensuite bathroom.  It has been recently renovated with new bathroom, timber floor and full length verandah where one can sit and enjoy the garden.
description: Our beautiful,, weatherboard backyard cabin sits opposite Pittwater on the Northern Beaches.   Our cabin is private with it's own access.  It comfortably sleeps two with a queen size bed, sofa, dining table, fully equipped kitchenette and ensuite bathroom.  It has been recently renovated with new bathroom, timber floor and full length verandah where one can sit and enjoy the garden. Guests have their own access to the backyard cabin.  The backyard is shared and has a vege garden plus the clothes line which is shared.  Guests can also have the use of two surf skis for a paddle in Pittwater across the road.   As this is a backyard cabin, we will be present at all times, so if there is anything one needs we are on site to help out however, we respect your privacy at all times. The area we live in is, we feel. one of the most beautiful places.  It is quiet and very peaceful, one can swim over the road or at our clean beaches, bicycle, walk in Angophora forests, eat at the many great restau
neighborhood_overview: The area we live in is, we feel. one of the most beautiful places.  It is quiet and very peaceful, one can swim over the road or at our clean beaches, bicycle, walk in Angophora forests, eat at the many great restaurants and cafes in the area, or simply relax.
notes: The cabin does not have full cooking facilities. There is a fridge, toaster, kettle, microwave, electric frypan and if a BBQ is required, ours is available.
transit: Public transport is available to the city or shops or Manly, daily.  We have plenty of street parking outside the house.  If guests fly in to Sydney Airport, a northern beaches shuttle bus can be organised to deliver you to our address.
access: Guests have their own access to the backyard cabin.  The backyard is shared and has a vege garden plus the clothes line which is shared.  Guests can also have the use of two surf skis for a paddle in Pittwater across the road.
interaction: As this is a backyard cabin, we will be present at all times, so if there is anything one needs we are on site to help out however, we respect your privacy at all times.
house_rules: We don't allow pets as we have no fences and we don't allow smoking.

host.host_about: I am a friendly and easy going person.  I love the outdoors, sailing, swimming, cycling and walking, hence my love of the northern beaches.  I love good food and eat organics or from my garden as much as possible.  I am passionate about the environment and hence do not use chemicals around the house and compost all my putrescibles.  I would like my guests to enjoy the local environment and am happy to help with anything they need to know about the area.

reviews.comments: Michy and Paul are such great hosts. They made feel very welcome as soon as I arrived. The backyard cabin is newly renovated. It is very clean, modern, classy and quiet. It is very close to the beach. I will definitely come back again. Thank you Michy and Paul!

A wonderfully renovated and very comfortable separate flat which we will look to stay at again. Michy and Paul were very nice and accommodating people who went out of their way to ensure we were ok with everything. The location is in a quiet and very pretty surrounding which in future when we have more time we would like to explore more.
Overall a very pleasant experience which we would recommend to anyone and everyone.

Michy's place was so PERFECT! We loved it. Perfect remote location only around and hour from Sydney, the perfect weekend escape. The cabin was beautifully furnished and very up to date. Super clean and with all the basics provided even though there isn't a full cook top facility the local pizza delivery was delicious! The walk across the road and down to the jetty is so beautiful for an evening sundowner and really is the perfect spot to watch the sunset. Thanks again for your welcoming vibe and beautifully equip cabin Michy, we'll definitely be back!

We absolutely loved our stay at Michy's lovely cabin on Pittwater. It is even more beautiful in real life than the photos show. Michy went out of her way to accommodate us and make us feel at home, and was also very respectful of our privacy. The cabin is a delight, and full of lovely touches that made us completely spoiled. It's literally right on the water too. It rained the whole time we were there but we were so cosy in our beautiful cabin and enjoying cups of tea on the verandah that we didn't care at all. The Yoda Food restaurant in Avalon just 5 mins away is delicious too! Thank you Michy for a wonderful and much needed rest in your delightful cabin xx

Michy's cabin is very new, clean and equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay (TV, wifi, general cooking equipment, books). The cabin is located in the gorgeous suburb of Clareville, right by the sparkling water and amongst the trees - one of the most beautiful places in Sydney. It's the perfect place to stay if you love the outdoors - you could walk 800m to Clareville beach or take a short drive to many other beaches, explore the coast on a kayak or paddle board, hike up Bangalley head for a striking view, just to name a few ideas. Michy was very kind and always available if we needed anything, but otherwise respected our privacy. We had a lovely stay and would recommend to everyone.

We were warmly welcomed by Michy to the lovely cabin which is modern, comfortable, clean and beautifully decorated.  We had everything we required. The Pittwater area is just stunning and we enjoyed exploring the surrounds, eating out and checking out the boating scene.  We had a fabulous weekend and can definitely recommend staying here.

We recently spent two nights in Michy's backyard cabin and absolutely loved it. It is spacious and beautiful and decorated with love. the bed is  so comfy. Heaven! And the location and the area are unbeatable. Only a short drive to great restaurants too. water just across the road. I'm definitely hoping to stay here again.

We loved staying at Michy's place in Clareville. It's a lovely self-contained cabin which is very well appointed. Originally booked this place as close by to a party we were attending, however given I was sick ended up staying in ordering take-away and enjoying the space instead. Loved having a cup of tea in the sunshine on the verandah in the morning. Would definitely recommend Michy's place to anyone wanting to explore the northern beaches of Sydney. Tucked away in one of the most beautiful suburbs of Sydney (one I had never visited, despite being a Sydney-sider) with lots to explore nearby.

Spontaneously, I arranged for a dear friend who was visiting from NZ to stay on a Saturday afternoon to stay at Michy's cabin on Sunday night! It was smooth and simple and my friend had a glorious time and now I can't wait to try it!! Must book again so I can experience it for myself. Thanks for being so flexible and spontaneous with us xx

Michy - very prompt and efficient in her replies. From the time I enquired till the end of my trip which makes things a lot easier as I didn't know what time exactly I'll reach her accommodation. She was informative and told us where to get food. The Thai food up from her place was good! She also allowed me to do a late check out cause I needed to come back to bathe after. 

Accommodation - was LOVELY. The photos doesn't do it justice at all! Place was super cosy, comfortable and new! I love the electric blankets and the heater. The kitchen and toilet was good too!! Would definitely live here should I be around the area again. 

Cheers!

We loved staying here!  I never met Michy, but my husband said she was just the sweetest woman ever!  She brought us greek yogurt and granola for breakfast which was very sweet.  It is across the street from the bay and we even took out their surf skis briefly.  We loved being so close to Avalon Beach!  Great restaurants and beach nearby.

This was a great place to stay for a nice getaway weekend.
The area is fantastic, with the beaches a short drive away, and some benches for a chill by the water only 5 minutes walkaway.
Michy was great, nothing was too much, and the stay was everything we expected and more!

Michy made as very welcome,the property was as we expected.
Every thing we needed was proved ( so clean ).
Location was great and Michy told us about great walks near by.
Although it may be classed as a back yard cabin it was cute comfortable and furnished with a romantic feel

We had a great stay hosted by Michy. Good communication and very welcoming. 

The cabin was great. Very clean, comfortable and modern. Highly recommended.
Neat clean and cute. Lovely helpful host. Quiet location easy to find

Amazing location, really lovely cabin which we found perfect for our overnight stay. Even had room for the portable cot! Michy and her husband were really lovely people and Michy was very willing to help with anything we needed. 
Only a short drive to shops and beaches and a very lovely neighborhood. Definitely recommend!
Perfect, we stayed here on our wedding night. The cabin was quiet clean and very comfortable. Michy was excellent to deal with and everything went very smoothly. Would recommend highly.

Really loved this place for our stay. Paul and Michy were really accommodating and helpful. Couldn't have asked for more. The place was really nice inside and very clean. A great little spot with it's own access and just accross from the beautiful Pittwater. Avalon cafes and restaurants had us covered all weekend and the weather really turned on for us while we were there. Can't recommend it highly enough, definitely no compaints.

Michy was a very friendly and helpful host. She was always happy to answer any questions and make sure we were happy and comfortable. The granny flat was absolutely perfect for my baby girl and I. The bed was comfy, beautiful bathroom, clean, very chic in a great suburb. I loved the mosquito net. Sheets were beautiful to sleep on. Surrounded by beautiful gum trees. Perfect. I'd absolutely recommend people stay at Michys.
Michy and Paul made us very welcome when we arrived and then left us to enjoy our weekend wedding and discovering the beautiful neighbourhood.
I had a wonderful night's stay at Michy's cabin. What a beautiful place and the surrounding landscape is gorgeous.

Our stay at this lovely cabin was made even more memorable by the hospitality of Michy and Paul. Clean and attractively decorated the cabin was very private and a perfect place to rest after a day of sightseeing around the fabulous Pittwater area. Would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable stay.

We had a really lovely stay at this bungalow in Clareville. 
It's generous, light and well-ventilated, with many highly appreciated details, including a delicious breakfast, kitchenette at our disposal and kookaburra visitors. 

Michy is a warm and generous host. We stayed for a long weekend, most of which was spent at the wedding of friends nearby (or associated events), so we didn't get to take her up on her offer of the use of some watercraft, but did get across the road to the beach a couple of times. 

The area too is worth a scout - a couple of early morning walks gave us a great survey of the widest variety of housing I've seen in one location, set amidst lush greenness and against spectacular views. 

We'd love to come back some time. The experience left us feeling very spoilt.

The backyard cabin was like a secluded writer's retreat! So peaceful and homely, well stocked mini-kitchen too and a beautiful balinese style bed. There's very close by access to an almost private beach and jetty/swimming area, good place to watch the sunset and sip some BYO champers!
Michy was a fabulous host, warm and friendly, and not only did she let us check in early, but also gave us a lift to Jonah's for lunch as it's a little difficult to get a taxi in the area. Highly recommend staying here for a romantic getaway from the city!

We really enjoyed our stay at backyard cabin by Pittwater.  Michy was the most hospitable host who was eager to help us in any way.  We would definitely recommend staying there.  I would also recommend having your own transport as it can be difficult to get taxi service in the area. Thank you Michy once again!
Great time here, very nice self contained flat out the back, clean etc.
Had a great stay in the Backyard Cabin. Very comfortable. Beautiful location. Very accommodating host.

Michy's cabin was just perfect. It was a private, quiet, exceptionally stylish little retreat for two, a 30 second stroll to an almost private park and beach over looking beautiful Pittwater. The bed was very comfortable and we had a fantastic sleep. We came and went as we pleased and loved our visit to Clareville. We will just have to make sure we come back to try out the kiosk (walking distance to the cabin), which is suppose to be great for lunch and dinner. Thanks Michy!

Michy is a gorgeous host, willing to help in thoughtful ways to make her guests feel welcome and comfortable. The space is lovely. Quiet neighbourhood very close to the water with good coffee at a nearby restaurant. Other features of the area accessible by bus or car. I didn't want to leave and hope to return another time.

Michy's place was perfect for our short stay in the northern beaches. It's really comfortable and we loved the location right next to the water. Arrival and communication were made very easily. All in all we had a great stay.

My partner and I came up for the weekend for a wedding - fantastic location for us and the house was just what we needed. Michy was friendly and contactable and even had some milk in the fridge for a cup of tea the next morning. Lovely host lovely house, we would definitely recommend it.
Beautiful cabin, fantastic location, everything you need for a quiet getaway. Eat at Clareville Kiosk nearby for a great meal.
We had such a great stay in Claireville. Private little oasis in the Cabin. Michy was a lovely host and even drove us to the restaurant we had booked into. Highly recommend.
Great place with a nice vibe. Loved the location.

What an absolutely fabulous place to stay. Michy is considerate warm and a genuine lady. From a warm welcome on arrival, milk in the fridge, everything one could desire in the perfect spot to even driving us to our restaurant for dinner she is amazing. The cabin is perfect, it is beautifully decorated. The bed is large, deep and immensely comfortable. It took a real effort to prize my boyfriend away amid grumbles of why he couldn't squat there.....the cabin is reached by the stepping stone path around the main house, through the small garden and sits on its own. It is breathtakingly pretty....has a comfy sofa, a full bookcase,  a gorgeous mosquito net that makes you feel like you are lost in the orient falling asleep. I cannot tell you how fantastic this little treasure is we will most certainly be returning.

We had a super lovely time at Michy's beach cabin. Location was perfect, just across the road for some lovely quiet beaches on Pittwaters, the interior design of the cabin was spotless and classy and we had all we need to spend a very comfortable week in paradise.
Michy and her partner have been amazing hosts, always very kind and happy to have a chat, but also absolutely respectful of our privacy.
We would love to stay there again soon!
Mitchy was a wonderful host. Accommodation was lovely and clean and in a perfect spot in clareville.

We had a lovely time at Michy's.   It's a very comfortable place, very quiet little beach across the road, 5 minutes to Avalon's restaurants.  Why bother driving hours up the coast when it's right here !

Michy was so welcoming and made us feel very at home. The place was just as described- I would add that there's lovely light and air flow she has put mosquito nets over the windows so you can rest easy (if you get bitten alive like me) that you will have a mosquito free environment! We were so relaxed and rejuvenated after our stay (we live in Sydney and are a short drive away). Love the location and I'd recommend going to Clareville Kiosk- walking distance and beautiful restaurant- for dinner nearby.

Michy is a 10 out of 10 host in all facets of  the local area and making you feel at home, we were greeted by a very cheerful lady that made us feel like we were her friends. The property is  exactly as described and very comfortable. A short walk across the road to a wonderful beach location. So if you are into picnic's as we are, this is the place to go.  As we had not ventured to the Northern Beaches before, we were so very nicely surprised how beautiful the area is. Every restaurant we dined, the staff and food were excellent. A must to go is the boat house restaurant  at Palm Beach WOW views right on the river. We will definitely be going back. Therese and Mark
Hey Michy. Thanks so much for a great weekend.  Your place was beautiful and you were so accommodating. We will be back. Thank you

Quiet, comfortable and cosy cabin 50 yards from Pittwater and a few minutes from Avalon beach by car.
Helpful friendly host, but privacy for those who wish.
Very relaxing few days.

My partner and I stayed two nights recently and enjoyed our time in the beautiful Northern Beaches. I didn't get to meet Michy personally although my partner did. Communication through messages was always prompt and clear and we arrived late at night with the key left in the door and milk in the fridge for us. The cabin is cosy and had everything we needed. We couldn't get the wifi to connect but it didn't really bother us we were hardly there. I suggest you take your car as the bus only came out the front once an hour. Palm Beach close by is beautiful.

The cabin is lovely, really clean and has everything you need (including milk, tea, muesli for breakfast which was really appreciated). It's located right next to a beautiful beach. Michy was easy to communicate with but gave us a lot of privacy. Overall, we would highly recommend her place to anyone willing to spend a long weekend on the Northern beaches.
Friendly helpful host nothing too much trouble.  The cabin was lovely, nicely decorated and in a nice quiet area.  The beach across the road was great to be able to go for a walk.
Michy's backyard cabin was brilliant.  It was  wonderful to be able to walk across the road and launch our kayaks for a morning paddle on the Pittwater. Thank you for making us feel so welcome.
Fantastic place and Michy was a great host. The Cabin is very clean, beachy and in a great location in Clareville.

This is a lovely little place for a night away. The cabin has everything you could possibly  need - a bed, sofa, dining table, tv and shower. All put together in a small but aesthetically pleasing cabin. Really appreciated that fresh milk was provided plus tea and coffee and very tasty muesli. It has very quite location  and perfectly situated  for launching a kayak ( across the road). Also 10 minutes walk from the Clareville kiosk for that special meal.
Great cabin! Parents really enjoyed it. It was very convenient and michy was very accommodating to our needs. Cheers!

Perfect escape to paradise. Peaceful with the only sounds being the birds. Close to the water, walks along the beach, fishing, great restaurants. Michy was a wonderful hostess. Wished we could stay longer.
Beautiful secluded cabin, the perfect space to relax and unwind, just a short walk from clareville reserve, one of Sydney's most stunning waterfronts. Michy is the pe

Michy's place is in a wonderful location, perfectly located for exploring around Pittwater and the coast. It is quiet and extremely comfortable. With lots of windows, the cottage is light and breezy. Everything we needed was there and it is immaculately presented. Michy and Paul were on hand if we ever needed anything, but they also ensured we had privacy. A perfect mix!  The beach is just a minute away (across the road) and is a lovely spot to sit. Although we had a car, the local bus stop is just across the road. We could not fault Michy's place and look forward to the next trip.
Awesome

We enjoyed our stay and Michy's place lived up to expectations it is a beautiful garden studio in a very beautiful part of the world. Nice place to slow down and get away from it all. Michy was fantastic with communications and making sure we had everything we needed to make our stay successful. Highly recommend
Nice and quite.

We have just spent a wonderful month with Michy and Paul.  Their little studio was even better than described with everything necessary for our comfort. I had a health issue during our stay and Michy and Paul went out of their way to help. We highly recommend this accommodation for its proximity to beautiful scenery and beaches as well as the pleasure of meeting our kind and generous hosts.  We have become true friends! Thank you both so much.
Thanks so much for having us Michy! We definitely recommend this gorgeous place, everything was perfect! Must use the surf skis on the bay across the road.

Michy was very welcoming and our accommodation was perfect for visiting family , kicking back and taking in the wonderful environment in and around Clareville.
The cabin was spotless , bed was very comfortable with everything we required. We had a hire car but a bus stop was right out front for trips to the city or nearby Avalon and beyond.
Area was restful and we felt right at home with privacy but knowing Paul and Michy were a text away if required.
We would certainly recommend this cabin to others and would like to visit again soon.

The cabin was clean and cosy and the bed is very comfortable. Very clean and new bathroom. I didn't get to meet Michy in person but she seems lovely online and is great with communication. Only thing is the wifi was pretty much non existent.

What a wonderful stay! Quiet, clean and just a beautiful cabin. Location was fantastic with Taylor's point opposite and within close distance to Paradise Beach and Clareville Beach. Michy and her hubby were lovely hosts and very helpful. It's one of the best stays we've had!
Nice place to stay for the weekend
le logement est parfait,très propre bien situé dans un très beau quartier. Paul était là pour nous accueillir et repondre à  nos questions .Une petite plaque de cuisson serait un plus pour cuisiner .
Nice comfortable stay.
We loved our night in the cabin. Woke up to the sound of birds in the trees. It's a magical part of the world. Michy was lovely to deal with.
This cabin was lovely and the owners were very friendly and helpful throughout our stay. Highly recommend:)
Beautiful cabin. Very comfortable. Very clean. Lovely hosts.
Beautiful little cottage in a great location near secluded beaches
Such a beautiful spot! Shame it was raining and we couldn't enjoy the beach over the road. Thanks so much!

A very enjoyable stay, secluded, quiet, tranquil and just a short walk to Clareville beach. Borrowing the surf skis for a paddle on Pittwater was a highlight. Comfy bed and clean, we felt at home. Lovely hosts.
A lovely, quiet and well equipped cottage in the seaside suburb of Claireville. A perfect getaway for a single/couple.
Michy's place was a lovely quiet retreat for a few days.
A great spot to stay with a great host
What a great little spot. Perfect for those quick getaways both Michy and Paul are fantastic hosts and went out of their way to make us feel welcome. Thanks again!!

This is a really lovely cabin in a beautiful part of the Northern Beaches. The cabin is in Michy and Paul's backyard, entirely separate to the house but Michy and Paul are there should you need anything and they are lovely and friendly. Pittwater is just across the road; fabulous beaches and Avalon village with excellent restaurants and cafes are only a few kms away. The cabin is clean and comfortable for singles or couples. Beautifully decorated. Sitting on the verandah in the afternoon sun listening to the birds...paradise.

A wonderful place, great location - simply take a glass of wine across the road and watch the sunset. 
Very friendly and welcoming hosts.
Always a great time to stay at this great little cabin! Our second time there and will be heading back again for sure.
We had a great time while staying at Michy's. The room is super clean, cosy and has a great little library. Would definitely stay again!
A beautiful guest house in the perfect location. Everything you need across the street from the water and very short drive to the main town with shops and restaurants

Place was lovely with everything you would need for a night or two away. Can highly recommend a pre-dinner drink across the road at a little private beach followed by dinner at the Clareville kiosk which is only a few minutes drive from here.
A lovely location if you're after some peace and quiet. Proximity to water is great and use of 2 x surf skis is a plus.
Great spot with good people

Love Michy's backyard cabin! Peaceful, clean, comfortable, everything you need and a stone's throw from the water! Michy was the perfect host and made sure i had everything i needed. Highly recommend!!
Place to go!!!
Perfect for our trip!

Michy’s place is a real gem in a secluded and peaceful spot.
Right across the road is Pittwater for a swim and around the corner is Forage for a great coffee! 
Michy is an amazing host and was so hospitable and kind! A great place to stay we couldn’t recommend more!
A great little find for a one night stay. Clean, tidy and in a quiet neighbourhood. Michy is a fantastic host- clear, helpful and kind.

Michy and Paul were warm and welcoming hosts and made us feel right at home in their stylish cabin. It's in a great location with a secluded beach across the road with stunning views of Pittwater and beyond. We really enjoyed our early morning paddle on their two surf skis and some fishing from the nearby wharf. The perfect base for a relaxing getaway - I'm sure we will return.

A beautiful location and Michy and Paul were kind hosts. The only issue was the lawnmower man coming through the backyard at 9am. There for some peace and a sleep in but our luck brought the mower man too. Great place though.
Had a lovely stay. So peaceful, homely and comfortable. Michy and Paul were excellent hosts - lovely people who were only too happy to help but also respected privacy. Highly recommended!

Wow, stunning area. Can highly recommend Michy’s backyard cabin if you’re keen to chill out for a few days @ Pittwater. The cabin is stylish, private, and functional. In fact, I felt like I was staying at a health retreat!

I found the cabin a convenient short drive to trendy Avalon village with cafes, restaurants, and local shops. It was also great to walk down to the Pittwater and swim in the local’s netted beach area. Can recommend booking with Michy who is a friendly, and easy going host.

We had a fabulous 7 nights in Michy and Paul's leafy, garden cabin.  A very cosy, clean, comfortable, quiet and private bedsit cabin, with a washing machine available to use at the house. It was across the road from Clareville beach and the bus stop into Avalon shops where we picked up other bus connections.  We had no car and found it very easy to use public transport all over Sydney with the Opal card. Michy and Paul were very friendly and helpful, especially with dropping off something we left behind.......thank you.

Delightful find
Lovely thoughtful accomodation
Only downside for those seeking it  is that there are no grand views rather an intimate garden setting
We loved the little beach for a morning dip across the road

My husband and I stayed here whilst attending my brothers wedding on clareville beach. The location was perfect, just a short stroll along the beach (at low tide) and we arrived to our destination. The cottage was gorgeous and homely and the bed was super comfy. The cottage felt like a private oasis and Michy was helpful, and welcoming. A great first Airbnb experience.
Amazing, magical place, a hidden gem close to clean Waters of Pitt Water.
Wonderful spacious cabin in a beautiful part of the world!

The pefect weekend get away.
Friendly and accomadating  host
Close to the Avolon eateries.
We will definitely be returning.
Enjoyed my stay!

A little slice of heaven in one of Sydney’s most beautiful locations. Every aspect exceeded my expectations and I wish I could have stayed longer. The property was spotless, and had everything I needed. I felt right at home straight away.

Michy’s backyard cabin is in a wonderful location in Clareville, across from a small private secluded beach. Everything is as described and we enjoyed our short trip here. Wonderful hospitality and punctual communication made things run smoothly with no issues with checking in/out.
Lovely little house in a quiet suburb. The house looks directly into their own home which I did not realise when booking. Apartment is small but enough for a 1 night stay.

Comfortable and everything you will need for a short stay. Little beach opposite is walking  distance and very nice. 
The cabin faces the host’ s house and that makes privacy difficult.
Had an awesome stay, perfect location for a weekend getaway. I would highly recommend!
The cabin was absolutely fantastic and very comfortable. Loved the bed and we both had the best nights sleep. The location is nice and quiet, perfect for a stay on the beaches.

Lovely cabin very close to Pittwater and Clareville Beach, and short drive to restaurants. Nice walking in the local area. Michy very easy to deal with and respectful of our privacy. Will be going back!

5 stars to everything! 

The space was clean, comfortable and warm considering how cold it was outside! 

Michy was a wonderful host and my partner and I very much look forward to staying in her beautiful space again next time we travel to Avalon.

This was our first Airbnb experience and I choose it first on the location close to Palm Beach and also the price when scrolling through. The scroll through price was $110 p/n but there were extras of $35 for cleaning and a $22.15 service fee. These may well be standard Airbnb extras but on a one night stay I guess the cleaning fee to cost of stay ratio seemed a bit high. I knew the total fee before finalising the booking but I guess I would have liked the pricing better if it was all inclusive at $165 and not the $110 plus, plus .... one good flip side is when I shared a screenshot of where we were staying and a few commented that it seemed like great value at $110. The place is very nice and neat. We arrived at night and the host had left the garage lights on so we could see along the narrow path to the shack at the back. Later the lights were off and getting another load from the car was tricky although a flashlight was left on the kitchen table for this purpose. We never met the host but that was maybe due to our late arrival ...but I’m also ok with this as I’m a bit shy and I knew we could contact them easily if needed.
