It’s an awesome spot very close to a nice dock and a little beach as well as a swimming area. Well recommended!
Lovely cabin, great serene location and friendly hosts! My partner and I have stayed a few times here and we always love it!!
We loved our stay in Michy’s cabin, it felt very homely, a lovely get away! Michy was a great host, and very responsive to messages.
Our stay at Michy’s cute cabin was fantastic. Beautiful, quiet, picturesque location; easy communication; great space with thoughtful touches. Best sleep I’ve had in ages! Would definitely recommend
Great studio near the water. Was perfect for us as we had a wedding in Avalon. Easy check-in and communication with Michy. Definitely recommend!
Michy's cottage was really lovely and cosy. It was a perfect base to chill-out in the Avalon and Palm Beach area. Thanks. lot!
Great accomodation in a great quiet location
Great location but a car is necessary for most travellers.
Loved staying at Michy’s place. Would highly recommend.
Very accommodating host, terrific location within walking distance of Clareville Beach and a short drive to Palm Beach. Highly recommended and would stay again.
We loved Michy's cabin. It was clean, homely, very peaceful and we slept so well. We loved being within walking distance of the beach. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Michy is a wonderful host with a great little backyard shack in a beautiful location. Highly recommended.

Just completed a very enjoyable 3 week stay at Michy's cabin, while visiting family nearby. 
The cabin is opposite Michy and Paul’s home, but feels private. The property is in a beautiful location right on Pittwater, with good on road parking. The quiet reserve just across the road has lovely views along Pittwater to Lion Island. 
The cabin itself is compact, stylishly presented, very comfortable and well organised. The decking is a peaceful and shady place to relax during the heat of the day. We found we had everything we needed for an extended stay. 
Michy was a fab host throughout - always warm & friendly, respectful of privacy but quick to offer help when contacted. We enjoyed meeting her husband Paul and felt honoured when invited to the neighbours pre Christmas get together on the reserve. We had a super time with you Michy, thanks so much!
Highly recommend staying here.
Great place to stay on the Sydney northern beaches. very friendly and helpful host. Perfect size for couples. Nice touches like fresh milk and torches for late returns at night. great value also.
A super friendly welcome to an amazingly clean unit. So close to everything you could need/want.
Very charming, relaxing and memorable accommodation. Picturesque location and very friendly hosts. Highly recommended!
Great location, very clean, reasonably priced and very good communication.
Perfect weekend’s stay - can’t add much but to say Taylor’s Point is a stunning location.
A lovely cosy cabin, perfect for a weekend getaway.

name: Modern Top Floor Apartment
summary: This freshly renovated lovely 1 bedroom top floor apartment is situated in the Rouse Hill Town Centre featuring countless shops, cafe's, restaurants & cinema literally on your doorstep and only 40 minutes from Sydney's CBD with close bus stop.
space: Location Location Location.  We hear this all the time but this apartment actually lives up to this.  Located within the hills district of Sydney but in a cosmopolitan environment surrounded by shops and cafe's literally as soon as you set foot outside the door.  It's top floor so extremely quiet with lake views, you won't even notice you're in a shopping centre until you set foot outside the building.
description: This freshly renovated lovely 1 bedroom top floor apartment is situated in the Rouse Hill Town Centre featuring countless shops, cafe's, restaurants & cinema literally on your doorstep and only 40 minutes from Sydney's CBD with close bus stop. Location Location Location.  We hear this all the time but this apartment actually lives up to this.  Located within the hills district of Sydney but in a cosmopolitan environment surrounded by shops and cafe's literally as soon as you set foot outside the door.  It's top floor so extremely quiet with lake views, you won't even notice you're in a shopping centre until you set foot outside the building. private underground carpark gym, pool & tennis court shops restaurants public transport We will meet upon your arrival to give you access to the property & assist in answering any questions you may have. The rest is up to you Rouse Hill Town Centre is the premiere shopping & dinning location in the Hills District. Over 50 specialty shops, restauran
neighborhood_overview: Rouse Hill Town Centre is the premiere shopping & dinning location in the Hills District. Over 50 specialty shops, restaurants, cafes & cinemas. Woolworths is only steps away for convenience it doesn't get better.
notes: We're a young professional couple with a passion for Travel.
transit: There are buses right outside the shopping centre with quick & easy transit straight to the city.
access: private underground carpark gym, pool & tennis court shops restaurants public transport
interaction: We will meet upon your arrival to give you access to the property & assist in answering any questions you may have. The rest is up to you
house_rules: Strictly No Smoking Permitted anywhere in the building or on the balcony.  Strictly No Pets  No Parties Late checkin available for a small additional fee.

host.host_location: Baulkham Hills, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: Young professional couple in the media industry who love to travel.

reviews.comments:
Jared & Diana are 2 very welcoming and kind hosts , they let me book their place on the last minute and was very helpful with the process, they also checked up via SMS as this was my method of contact on anything else we needed on a regular .
Their place has absolutely everything all amenities and lots of extras  that makes a comfortable holiday , very good neighborhood as there's a Shopping Mall and  Supermarkets within 1 minute walk .
Would definitely be recommending friends and will be going back for a second time .

Incredibly welcoming and friendly host. 
Apartment very freshly decorated with scented flowers and candle.
Very good appliances with ample kitchen utensils and tableware.
More than sufficient consumables such as milk, refreshments, bathroom and laundry products.
Towels and linen immaculate.

Jared and Diana's apartment is immaculate, very clean and right in the middle of town with only 5 floors separating you from all the shops and eateries. The apartment is very modern with all the necessary amenities to make you feel at home and the underground secure parking provides peace of mind. My booking enquiry was responded to within a couple of hours so we were able to book the apartment very quickly. Jared and Diana will make you feel very welcome so if you're looking for a place in and around Rouse Hill don't hesitate in booking this place it's awesome! P. S if you know how to play the piano you'll love It even more :)

Jared & Diana were wonderful hosts, were easy to communicate with, welcoming and happy to help in any way they could. The apartment is situated above a shopping precinct which was very convenient and was surprisingly very quiet! Highly recommend!

Jared & Diana were fantastic hosts, very friendly and professional.  The apartment was clean and neat. Everything was provided.
The place is very convenient with plenty of shops, cinemas and restaurants below. 
We will definitely book this place again and highly recommend them.

Jared and Diana are the most delightful hosts, that go just that bit further to make your stay special.  The apartment is light a clean and has a beautiful feeling of open space, through the balcony.  There is everything you could possible want here, well equipped and immensely comfortable.   Amazing variety of shops on the door-step as well as access to express buses into the city.  Lovely!

Terrific hosts! Very helpful and down to earth. Lovely apartment! Top location! Great parking space, and no noise apartment, peaceful throughout the day/night. Everything is there that you need. Would definitely stay again.

We had a great 2-week stay at the apartment.  It's in a great location right above the shopping centre.  Nicely furnished, very comfortable and fully equipped. Very clean on arrival and some really nice touches provided by the hosts.  Jared and Diana are great hosts, always replied promptly and gave us a warm welcome.

Jared and Diana were very accommodating hosts. The location is wonderful with nice shops and restraurants at your doorstep. The apartment is comfortable and very quiet.  I spent 6 nights here and greatly enjoyed my stay!
Please read the below.

Jared & Diana are very nice. 
Thanks for providing us such lovely and comfortable home.  
The apartment is very convinent and very quiet. We spent a good  holidays living here.  :)

The unit is very comfortable and nicely decorated. You could stay one night or a month in complete comfort. The bed is very comfortable but I would like to suggest there was an option of another pillow. My husband only uses one, but I need two. That is only a personal thing.  
The position is fantastic, and you would never get bored.  There is every shop imaginable, cinemas and white we were staying, there was a hot rod/vintage care show on  in the main street, with live entertainment. 
We highly recommend the unit and its position to anyone visiting the hills district of Sydney. Jared and Diana are lovely.

Jared and Diana were great, they were very flexible and keen on making sure everything went well with my stay.  The apartment was perfect,  very nicely furnished and in great location.  I would definitely stay again and would recommend it to others

Diana welcomed us at the apartment, showed us how to enter and leave the complex. Garage underneath and shops also under the apartments easily accessible. Apartment was as described. We were entirely satisfied and would return .Apartment itself very clean with all facilities you would require.
The host was sensational. Diana was super helpful, super friendly and stayed in touch throughout our stay to ensure all went to plan. Highly recommended, and we will definitely stay again.

This was my first Airbnb experience and it was absolutely perfect! 

A huge thank you to Diana and Jared, who are were excellent hosts - communicative, thoughtful and warm.  I was made to feel incredibly comfortable in their home and I loved every bit of my stay.  Diana gave me clear instructions on how to find the place and communicated really well in the lead up to my arrival, making the transition smooth and stress free. 

I loved the little touches.  There were chocolates and water left out on the bed, milk and juice in the fridge and beautiful candles lit for my arrival.  I immediately felt right at home.  

The unit is modern, comfortable and in a truly amazing location.  The Rouse Hill shopping precinct has every shop you would need and you literally step out the door and you are right in the thick of it.  

The furnishings are modern yet comfortable, and the property is equipped with all the little things that you need for a week away (everything from laundry powder to salt & pepper shakers).  

Thank you so much for your wonderful hospitality guys!

Diana was so welcoming. She added little touches like Irish teabag and milk and chocolate to mention a few. She thought of everything.  Such a fantastic host. Always at the end of the phone if you needed her. Definitely would stay again.

Great accommodation, clean with all you could want to make your stay pleasant, great high speed broadband, close to the shops and restaurants.  Diana met us to check us in, nice touch with some juice a a chocolate on our bed.  Secure building with nice balcony on the top floor.  You don't need more than this...

We have just had 16 nights at Jared and Diana's apartment and perhaps the best compliment we can pay is that we did not want to leave as it had become to feel like home. It is a beautiful, spacious place, very well equipped with all you need to live there like a local. Being on the top floor there are good views across the lake and you hardly know that the shops are only a few steps away from the main door. We found having all the shopping facility and restaurants so available was a real bonus.
Diana communicated very well prior to arrival and was at the apartment to meet us. A delightful lady who was most friendly and welcoming. There were provisions in the fridge, chocolates on the table and a beautiful vase of flowers all helping to give the feeling of home from home. She was always available on the phone if we had any questions.
The car parking space below proved very useful too.
We loved Rouse Hill and when we return we will definitely be looking to stay at Jared and Diana's apartment again.
Awesome place. Would definitely recommend. Lovely couple, lovely home.
It's a very lovely place and I really enjoyed it there. Jared and Diana are very welcoming

I had a pleasant stay, in Jared and Diana's lovely top floor apartment. My only concern was that I couldn't stay longer !
Well located and central, a great place to stay.
Thanks Guys. !

The apartment is exactly as described and pictured. Check in and check out was simple and all communications were clear. The bed is very comfortable and the apartment is quiet and fully equipped with all you would need. It sits 5 floors above the shops, which means it only take a couple of minutes to get to either Coles or Woolworths and there are also a great cross section of restaurants and take aways if you don't feel like cooking. Secure car park is handy also.
Jared & Diana were fantastic to deal with and accommodating with our request.  The location is central to everything you need at Rouse Hill.  A very pleasant experience.

The apartment was very well positioned and was very comfortable to stay in. Diana was really responsive and helped us throughout the week. I would highly recommend this apartment for anyone who is traveling near the area, thank you Diana.

Thank you Jared & Diana for the warm welcome and generous hospitality. We had a wonderful week in your immaculate apartment with all the comforts of home and the added bonus of an abundance of natural light throughout each room! The location is ideal and made every aspect of our holiday a breeze from the parking of our car, to walking to all the local amenities - shops, restaurants and entertainment. We highly recommend your apartment and thanks again for being such friendly, thoughtful hosts that go the extra mile...

Location fantastic, accommodation fantastic, hosts fantastic!

We really enjoyed our stay. The place is as advertised. Conveniently situated for leisurely shopping, with great selection of restaurants and a cinema all within walking distance!

Thumbs up!

우리 부부는 Jared&Diana의 아파트에서 5박 6일을 머물렀습니다. 
체크인 하루 전에 주소와  파킹 정보까지  상세한 정보를 보내주셨고, 저희가 늦은 체크인을 했는데도 반갑게 맞아주시고 집안 구석구석  친절히 설명해주셨습니다. 은은한 향초의 향기와  센스있는 인테리어 덕분에 집안에 들어서는 순간  기분이 좋아졌고,  주방기구  세탁기 건조기 등 모든 것이 갖춰져 있는 곳이라  내 집처럼 편안했습니다. 또한 오트밀과 꿀 차등도  준비해주셔서 머무는 내내 든든한 아침 식사도 했구요. 주변에 호수 공원이 있어 저희는 매일 아침 산책하고 힐링했습니다. 커피를 좋아하는 저에겐 커피 머쉰이 없다는 것이 살짝 아쉽긴 했지만 길건너 커피숍이 있어 괜찮았습니다. 조용하고 한적한 곳이지만 Rouse hill town center내에 위치한 곳이라  woolworths나 레스토랑 등 편의시설이 모두 가까워서 편리했습니다. 아파트 자체가  완벽한 보안이 되는 곳이고  rousehill town center 자체적으로 24시간 순찰을 하며 보안에 신경을 쓰는 곳이라ㅇ 안전하고

Diana & Jared's is a nice well equipped Airbnb apartment located in a shopping mall, with a view on a bush and the rising sun from its balcony. 40kms away from CBD, but with all shopping facilities downstairs and a parking place that makes it a perfect location for business needs if you're planning to work somewhere around.

Not suitable for a long stay though, if you can't afford to pay for the whole duration upfront. Although my plans for a 3 months stay there were shared with the owner from day one, I discovered another booking had been accepted meanwhile when trying to extend my booking to the third month planned.

Long story short: My original place that I booked for my vacation was a noshow so as a last minute booking, I could not have been happier. It is above a shopping complex but you don't get the noise of the shoppers as you're 5 floors up. It is next to a main bus terminal and eventually on a rail line, so you won't be too far from town. 

The hosts were super flexible and were always available, if needed. I know when I return to Sydney, I will be booking this place again.

Great location, clean, great hosts. Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the area. Lots of nice little extra touches too - snacks, washing powder etc. the space was a lot bigger then expected. Thanks!

Immaculate, great value, extra amenities with personal touches. 
Great hosts to deal with. Would highly recommend
Fantastic to deal with, lovely place.

Fantastic on all fronts. True home away from home and met all of my needs (and more!) for the 3wks I stayed. The location is perfect for accessing shops (literally on top of them!) and the bus stop is a 3min walk away for easy travel to the city. The apartment is as beautiful as pictures show, has washer/dryer!, parking was easy, and Diana/Jared were wonderful to work with. They were so friendly and checked in with me to make sure all was going well and to see if I needed anything. Will definitely stay here again in the future! Thank you!

The place is simply amazing, cozy and in a very modern area just above the shopping town center.
I highly recommend staying at Jared & Diana’s as they are wonderful hosts.

Location perfect, very convenient.  Coffee shops and stores available as needed. Flat beautifully furnished with artistic design. Thoughtful snacks, cereal, coffee and tea provided. Washer and dryer simplified visit. Top notch security. Friendly welcome and check out. Would love to stay every year.

I would highly recommend Jared and Diana’s place. It is a beautifully clean, light and airy place. The hosts are very welcoming. The location was perfect for me with the shops just downstairs. I would have extended my stay if that were possible and I would definitely stay again if I needed to visit the area.

The place is immaculate ,spacious,comfortable  mordern,clean and right in the heart of rousehill shopping centre yet you dont feel like it is .Jared and Diana are such amazin hosts and they look after you well and youll be spoilt by their thoughtfullness. We will be back!!
Diane was so hospitable, accommodating and welcoming. The location was perfect and the apartment itself had such a relaxed vibe to it. Would stay again.

Me and my wife had an amazing stay in their apartment. The location is fantastic and there is good connectivity to the CBD. We loved dining at various restaurants near by and also there  aa beautiful lake near the house which is good for a morning walk. Total value for money.  Thanks Jared for this awesome experience.
Loved the apartment and Diana and Jared were so helpful.

Au top!
Super accueil, appartement vraiment joli et cosy, très bien situé, tout à proximité pharmacie, commerces, bus...etc
great location and very clean
This apartment is in a great location, is secure, private, comfortable, and has access to shops, food, and public transportation. Thank you for this wonderful opportunity!

The unit is immaculate right in the center of Rouse Hill shopping center with bars, cafe and restaurants galore. 

Public transport to downtown Sydney is easy with buses outside the door.  

Any questions I had were answered very promptly though was pretty much self sufficient after the first night - outstanding stay

We loved staying in Jared and Diana’s appartment.  It’s lovely and stylish and everything you could wish for was provided from shower gel and shampoo to cleaning products and sun tan lotion so we could start enjoying it straight away.  The location is great.  There are lots of lovely shops, supermarkets, coffee shops, places to eat, post office, cinema and bus station. Having said this the appartment is also lovely and quiet. We would not hesitate to recommend it.
Great place and location , recommend this place for everyone visiting Sydney
Excellent host and great personality. Easy approachable and make checking easy. I've no issues but she keeping on checking to ensure that I've no concern.  Thanks for be an excellent host.

name: Charming apart in heart of Plateau
summary: Beautiful, bright and modern  my apartment is located in an entertaining, friendly and safe neighborhood. 2 steps from shops,grocery,bakery,coffee shops,more…but also 2 blocks from the beautiful Laurier Park and its swimming pool free.
space: Nice apartment on the 2nd floor of a duplex located in the heart of the attractive Plateau Mont-Royal. Can accomodate 6 people. All beds are VERY confortable. 1 bedroom with king bed 1 bedroom with double bed. 1 Queen sofa bed. Large kitchen fully equipped. Table for 10 personnes. Bathroom with bath and shower. Separate WC. Laundry room with washer, dryer. Balcony forward. Back porsh Backyard barbecue.
description: Beautiful, bright and modern  my apartment is located in an entertaining, friendly and safe neighborhood. 2 steps from shops,grocery,bakery,coffee shops,more…but also 2 blocks from the beautiful Laurier Park and its swimming pool free. Nice apartment on the 2nd floor of a duplex located in the heart of the attractive Plateau Mont-Royal. Can accomodate 6 people. All beds are VERY confortable. 1 bedroom with king bed 1 bedroom with double bed. 1 Queen sofa bed. Large kitchen fully equipped. Table for 10 personnes. Bathroom with bath and shower. Separate WC. Laundry room with washer, dryer. Balcony forward. Back porsh Backyard barbecue. Cards, brochures and guides will be available. I will be reachable at all times. The constant activity and exitment in my neighborhood contrasts with the tranquillité of my little street. 9 mn walk from the métro Laurier. Vivre sur le Plateau Mont-Royal, c'est comme vivre dans un village au coeur d'une grande ville.
neighborhood_overview: The constant activity and exitment in my neighborhood contrasts with the tranquillité of my little street.
notes: Vivre sur le Plateau Mont-Royal, c'est comme vivre dans un village au coeur d'une grande ville.
transit: 9 mn walk from the métro Laurier.
access: Cartes, brochures et guides seront à votre disposition. Je serai toujours rejoignable durant votre séjour
interaction: Cards, brochures and guides will be available. I will be reachable at all times.
house_rules: I ask smokers to go out on the balcony or in the back porsh. Pets are allowed, ask me before the authorization.

host.host_about:
Je suis artiste mosaïste, j'aide mon mari à supporter sa retraite en l'accompagnant de en temps dans ses voyages. .
Nous avons acheté cette maison de ville  ( un duplex ) et y avons installé nos enfants ( au 1er étage )  notre appartement , qui se trouve au 2ème est complètement rénové.
Lorsque je voyage , j'aime trouver une maison propre, calme,  située dans un quartier  pittoresque  , confortable avec une cuisine bien équipée et, de préférence, avec un minimum de denrées alimentaires et produits d'entretien, c'est ce que je vous offre, ma maison est à vous, prenez-en soin !

reviews.comments: The apartment is indeed charming, very well located and well equipped. All of us had a great time spending time in the house in the different nooks and admiring the decor and walking around the neighborhood. Our dog loved the Laurier park and we enjoyed that we could walk to most places in the city or hop on the nearby metro when we got tired. It was a pleasure meeting Marius and visiting your bar too!

Great communication from Mina ahead of our arrival, making sure we had everything we needed. Everything was all set for us when we arrived. Apartment is very warm and welcoming; nicely laid out and very home-y feeling. Bedrooms and living room are very comfortable and the kitchen is well equipped.

The neighborhood is quiet and friendly. No real noise at night (we slept with the windows open). Great cafes, restaurants, parks, and groceries within a 5 minute walking distance. Subway is an easy 10-15 minute walk with easy access into downtown. 

All in all this is a great apartment in a great location and the hosts are very welcoming. Highly recommended!
We have really enjoyed staying in this appartment, clean and very functional. Great location on the "plateau". We would definitly consider this appartment for our next visit to Montreal.

Mina kept great communication before, during, and after our trip.  Check in was easy and the apartment is very nicely decorated with everything you would need during your stay. Beautiful and quiet neighborhood with a Starbucks and supermarket on the corner which was very useful. Plus a bunch of great bistros, breakfast nooks, and restaurants steps away. You can't beat it. I would highly recommend this flat to anyone visiting Montreal.  Thanks for hosting us. We hope to return soon from NYC.

Excellent séjour à Montreal dans l'appartement de Mina, très fonctionnel et magnifique, conformément à sa description. On a pu faire également des machines, ce qui était très utile. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Mina car elle était en vacances, mais tout était prévu. Le quartier du Plateau est formidable. A recommander .

Renting this apartment was great- Mina was quick to respond, correspondence was fluid and the apartment is in a wonderful location- great amenities, great neighbourhood atmosphere and close to a subway station. The apartment has everything you could need- a well stocked and appointed kitchen, wi-fi and air conditioning in a Montreal heatwave!

Quel magnifique appartement dans un si beau quartier ! On s'est vraiment senti comme à la maison! Mina a été au petit soin, bien que loin du Québec, et très arrangeante pour nos petits changements de dernière minute. Un grand merci à elle! On espère revenir très vite !

Though the host was not present when we arrived, she made sure all the details were taken care of to make us feel very welcome.  The neighbor hood was pleasant and close to all necessities. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend Mina's home to others.

Mina's apartment was a perfect place to stay! Very spacious and even though there were 6 of us, we didn't feel crowded at any time. There was even room to put an extra air bed in the living room. Grocery and SAQ are right around the corner, as well as some of the best ice cream in Montreal! (Bo-Bec). It was nice to relax in Laurier Park after having brunch at nearby Le Toasteur Laurier. Don't forget to walk over to St Denis or St Laurent or down to Mont Royal to check out the shops and restaurants!

As for the apartment itself, it was very clean, the beds were comfy, there were plenty of linens, the shower was amazing, the kitchen was GORGEOUS, and it was handy having the toilet in a separate room from the shower. Both the living room and main bedroom have ample air conditioning - it was quite warm in other parts, but that is expected in a heatwave, I suppose.  Although we did not get to meet Mina, she was available over text and answered the few questions we had, as well as offered her son's contact info (although everything was so organized and straight forward that we didn't need any help!) One thing of note is that the steps are very steep getting in and out of the apartment - possibly not suitable for older people.

I hope to stay here again when I return to Montreal next year. It was nice getting to know a different part of the plateau. Thanks Mina for everything!

We never met our host but communication was excellent and we were very pleased with the accommodation. The location was awesome, great neighbourhood and if visiting in summer there is an outdoor pool nearby that's great to hang out with friends and family! 
The apartment is super spacious in a typical Montreal style home with ample facilities to cook, relax and freshen up. 
That's so much for a great stay!!

Mina's apartment was wonderful. It was very clean and the posted pictures are accurate. Communication with Mina before, during and after our stay was great. The location of the apartment was perfect, it was close to transit to get to major attractions, but it was very awesome to stay in a less touristy area to be submerged in the local culture. The neighborhood is wonderful with plenty of restaurants and shops within walking distance. We did not rent a car while we were there and had no issues getting around. I highly recommend this apartment for your stay in Montreal.

name: Sunny 1BR in Plateau by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek hardwood floors, modern decor, and beautiful natural light. Located in Le Plateau, known for delightful coffee shops and classic architecture.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek hardwood floors, modern decor, and beautiful natural light. Located in Le Plateau, known for delightful coffee shops and classic architecture. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out P'tit Plateau or Arepera du Plateau for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Place Ville Marie for your typical fashion stores. To explore the rest of the city, take the nearest metro at Mont-Royal Station. For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downtown and hang out with the locals in Le Plateau. Nestled
neighborhood_overview: There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out P'tit Plateau or Arepera du Plateau for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Place Ville Marie for your typical fashion stores. To explore the rest of the city, take the nearest metro at Mont-Royal Station. For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downtown and hang out with the locals in Le Plateau. Nestled at the foot of Mont Royal, Le Plateau is the epicenter of entertainment and culture in this diverse city. Day or night, the streets of Saint Denis, Mont Royal Ave, and Saint Laurent Boulevard come alive with residents and tourists alike. Eat your way through a variety of restaurants, and adventure through countless shops, cafés, and bars. Save some time to explore Saint Laurent Boulevard, where you'll find all sorts of unique urban art installations on every turn, thanks to the annual Montreal Mural Festival.
notes: Due to new development, you may encounter some construction that may be audible from your Sonder Monday - Friday from 7:00AM - 5:00PM. This Sonder is a 2nd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.  This Sonder is an older, classic apartment with plenty of character and charm.
transit: Drivers can find paid parking options nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.host_about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.comments: the apartment is very cute and in a great location in the plateau. The hosts were very easy to deal with and were readily available. the place was pretty clean, however there was only one roll of TP and the lid on the toilet was broken. But otherwise it was great. I recommend it.
The team was very welcoming. It was easy to get there and find the place, and it was exactly as described! I really enjoyed my stay.

The apartment looked exactly as pictured. The furniture is new and the apartment was very clean. It was a bit stuffy, but when I asked Flatbook, they brought over a fan. There is a TV, but no cable service (you can hook up a laptop and use your own streaming service). My only complaint about the Flatbook was that communicating with them was a bit strange and different from my other experiences with airbnb (I've always reserved with private homeowners). Though they were certainly responsive, the responses always came from a different employee and there seemed to be uneven communication between them, so I had to repeat my question/request and the backstory each time.

This was our first time staying at Flatbook. We found the team to be very efficient, considerate and professional.  We were a bit late in arriving due to traffic but were still met at the door by smiling faces and a chocolate cake (to celebrate our wedding anniversary).   We very much appreciated the thoughtful gesture.

We were escorted to the flat and were pleased by the cleanliness and functionality of the space.  It was exactly what we had hoped for as well as being centrally located, near transit (metro), shops and restaurants.  It suited our purposes wonderfully.  We were also very pleasantly surprised to find the use of laundry facilities, including soap, had been included in the rental.

The only negative comments concern 1) the fact that this building has a lot of stairs to contend with.  So anyone with mobility issues would need to take this into consideration.  And 2) the television is not hooked up to any local channel.  Whenever we travel, my wife and I usually like to listen to local news and weather.  We managed to get some local information via WIFI by connecting the HDMI cable they provide to our laptop.  Flatbook may wish to add a section to their information kit listing local television/radio stations.

Overall, it was a great experience and we will definitely recommend this to friends and family.
no complaints! everything ran smoothly with check in and check out. excellent location, everything was as described

The listing description was accurate! The area was great, a ton of options for restaurants and shopping and right near the metro! 

Great host !
Wonderful location, excellent room stocked with essentials and more

logement très bien équipé , tout correspondait aux photos et descriptifs de l'annonce ...

Quartier animé et très bien situé ...
The apartment looks exactly as pictured and is perfect for a short-term stay in the Plateau. Very clean and stocked with just about everything.

Great spot, close to Parc Mont Royal and lots of great small shops and places to eat; an easy walk to the subway. The apartment is clean and has all that you need. The pull out sofa is not very comfortable, so I would not recommend this apartment for four adults. It was fine for a family with young kids - i.e. us. It would be great for a couple. Overall we really enjoyed our stay, and even though there was a mix up with bedding, they were responsive and did their best to sort it out quickly.

Perfectly adequate place to stay in every possible way. The apartment is quite barebones and in need of repairs but on par with Plateau apartments in general. I was quite happy with the value-for-money.

Overall, we had a good stay. The location is great and the neighborhood is charming.  The apartment gets a lot of sun however, which woke us up too early.  I've suggested that better blinds be put up.  But the other aspects of the apartment were good. Quiet, clean and pleasant.

Booked this place at the last minute and almost everything was great. As mentioned before something should be done for the blinds. Otherwise the place was super clean. We had everything we needed in the kitchen and the bathroom. Very easy to communicate with them and very responsive. It was specially hot days when we stayed in Montreal and the A/C being a bit noisy we asked if they could provide us with a fan and they actually brought two on the same day. That was very much appreciated! I would definitely stay in other flats managed by Sonder.

The place was bright, beautiful and clean and included everything as advertised. The only problem was that power was out in whole unit except for the kitchen so we didn't have air conditioning for the first night. After contacting them and waiting half a day for a reply, we were finally able to get power back by switching the breaker back on. Other than that, perfect place to stay for a few days.

name: Cute Lovely Studio @ Monarch Hotel
summary: Tax already included. 230sf Clean quiet studio located a few blocks from Waikiki Beach. Access to all of Hawaiian Monarch Hotel amenities and restaurants is at your service. Full kitchenette, 1 full bed plus sleeper sofa, 42" flat screen TV, and A/C. Parking in this building is $25 for 24 hrs.
space: You can walk to the beautiful Waikiki beach and blocks of world-class shopping, local stores, and restaurants. Hawaii Convention Center and Ala Moana Shopping Center are also a few minutes away from the building. The building has a gym ($5 for your entire stay), Pool/Jacuzzi, BBQ deck area, Spa, Rent a Car, Bakery, Lounge, Night Club, Pub, and some GREAT restaurants Cream Pot and Choco, you need to try. It is also a very secure building with 24hr security guards, secured key entry elevators, and security cameras on every hallway, entry way, and elevator.  Location is great, about a 10 minute walk to the beach, 7 minute walk to the main shopping areas and, 5 minutes to Mccully Shopping center, a nice little mall with fantastic Asian food. There are many nice restaurants on your way to the beach and a full grocery store 2 blocks away, Food Pantry on Hobron Lane. Treat yourself to a clean, relaxing environment and enjoy your well deserved vacation.
description: Tax already included. 230sf Clean quiet studio located a few blocks from Waikiki Beach. Access to all of Hawaiian Monarch Hotel amenities and restaurants is at your service. Full kitchenette, 1 full bed plus sleeper sofa, 42" flat screen TV, and A/C. Parking in this building is $25 for 24 hrs. You can walk to the beautiful Waikiki beach and blocks of world-class shopping, local stores, and restaurants. Hawaii Convention Center and Ala Moana Shopping Center are also a few minutes away from the building. The building has a gym ($5 for your entire stay), Pool/Jacuzzi, BBQ deck area, Spa, Rent a Car, Bakery, Lounge, Night Club, Pub, and some GREAT restaurants Cream Pot and Choco, you need to try. It is also a very secure building with 24hr security guards, secured key entry elevators, and security cameras on every hallway, entry way, and elevator.  Location is great, about a 10 minute walk to the beach, 7 minute walk to the main shopping areas and, 5 minutes to Mccully Shopping center, a n
notes: Parking in this building is $25 cash for 24 hrs. The room key must be shown. Ask about the rent a car businesses in the lobby 808smartcar or Honolulu Auto Rentals. Rent from them and get $10 parking per day.
transit: Public transportation is also available that can take you anywhere you want to go around the island.
access: WIFI Login- HDT_0N9L Password- (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
house_rules: Lost key card is $25.

host.host_about:
Aloha.. Born and raised here in Hawaii. I own a few condos in Waikiki. Airbnb has been great and everyone I have met has been the most excellence of guests. I pride myself on cleanliness and being professional.  Hope to meet some of you soon!
Any real estate questions especially in or around Waikiki just let me know.

reviews.comments: I really enjoyed my stay in Honolulu at this location. It was about a 10 minute walk or less from Waikiki beach, and the view from the studio was AMAZING. In the lobby there was a pub, a nightclub and a spot to eat. Within half a block was a place to rent bikes, or mopeds. I was really happy w/ my stay and Jason let me know if there was anything I needed to give him a call. I locked myself out of the condo one morning by accident and Jason was there promptly to let me in. I would definitely stay here again.

Jason's location was everything we needed and were pleasantly surprised upon arrival. Jason escorted us to security to check in & leave our info. Room was a bit better than the pictures & there was a partial view of the ocean which was nice. Kitchenette came in handy as we were able save some money! #Yay My husband and ran into Jason in the lobby during our stay & had let him know the room was bright; Jason bought curtains just to ensure we were the most comfortable. So thoughtful! The building is a bit up from the "super tourist" strip of Waikiki, but we were able to find the bus routes thanks to the concierge & rented a moped.

Our host, Jason, was so thoughtful! He helped us with our luggage and was very polite.Our room was just as promised...very clean and had all amenities needed (we even had complimentary water and chocolates.) The best part of our stay was the proximity to everything! Jason gave us good recommendations for restaurants. The breakfast place in the hotel was really nice.

Jason also helped us with parking, and was able to get us a great rate (parking can be very expensive in Hawaii).
We did not see our host for the rest of our stay, but he was always just a phone call away.

The suite was clean and Jason was very helpful and quick to respond to questions on airbnb. In addition to the complimentary bottled water and chocolate bars, there was wifi, TV, extra clean linens,  private full bathroom, and a tiny but fully equipped kitchenette (except no sink) with fridge. Access to an outdoor hotel pool and coin laundry was also included. When we had queries re: the wifi and TV, Jason responded on airbnb within 5 minutes, came to our suite upon request, and helped us resolve the issues within an hour. Jason also offered a parking pass at an extra but low price, which was extremely helpful, since overnight parking is normally extremely expensive in the area. Also, we found that the snug suite was ok for the 3 of us (3 adults), even though there was only 1 room with 1 small but full bathroom (studio style). The suite size would fit 2 guests most comfortably. We thought the hotel hallways were poorly ventilated (had an odor at times), but Jason's suite was better ventilated (with the bathroom fan and the air conditioner), so we didn't notice any odor in the suite.

We ended up renting a car and mostly visited places outside of waikiki, but the suite is walking distance (around 20 minutes) from the beach and from the ala moana mall. We also rented a car at the hotel, but there are also car and moped/motorbike rental shops by the hotel lobby. The smart car rental place is only around $60 per day. If you prefer, Hertz and Dollar-Rent-a-car are just 5 minute walk away from the hotel lobby. There is also a breakfast/brunch restaurant by the lobby and a pub in the basement.

I meet Jason on the day I arrived even if it was close to midnight my plane came in. He showed me the room and we talked about how things worked. Then During my almost 2 week stay he contacted me a couple of times to make sure all was good.
Thoughtful and service minded.

I really liked the room and it was a comfortable bed.
This Room had all I need and the location was great. 

I can see my self stay here the next time I come.

Jason made us feel welcome with special little Hawaiian treats in our room. He was quick with his responses to my questions, and very friendly. Great location...easy access to good restaurants, beaches and shops! I would recommend staying with him while in Honolulu.

WE RECOMMEND JASON AS YOUR HOST!  : )

This is our 4th accommodation with Airbnb and what we look for a is a Host that can deliver a STRESS FREE and GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE experience. My daughter and I recommend Jason as your Host. Very trustful, helpful and accommodating.
Jason gave us assurance when replying promptly to our emails. Went out of his way to set up the sofa as our second bed with extra padding and sheets. We were 10-15 mins early to the hotel and Jason was already waiting in the main foyer. He showed us up to our accommodation and we were happy to walk into an air conditioned, lovely decor, very clean, tidy room. It was better than we expected! 
Great views! Comfortable queen size bed and sofa bed too!! You'll find this accommodation very relaxing, especially after all that shopping, swimming and sight-seeing!!
ENJOY YOUR STAY HERE!!
p.s. thanks Jason for the bottle of waters and macadamia nuts.  ;O)

The stay was amazing! I'd totally recommend here. I was travelling with my mom, and she is a bit picky when it comes to cleanliness, she gets allergic easily, and she was saying "it is really great here, very clean!" for several times. It looked just like how the photos showed, the view was awesome, the bed was really comfy, there was plenty storage, and pretty spacious to stay in. We loved that there's an extra set of towels because we were staying for 12 nights total, which was really fresh we could just use another clean set. 

The location was a total 5 star, it was close to anywhere, to take trolley or buses. Although it wasn't on the beach, but it took only 10-15 minutes to walk to one, (I love walking down the street like that!) and comparing to the beach areas hotel, the price is really really affordable. The small kitchenette came really useful even thought there wasn't a sink by it, we just used the sink in the bathroom. 

Jason the host was super nice, he provided everything we needed and asked for in a very short notice, always responded quickly. He welcomed us with macadamia nut and water bottles, and it was so nice he treated us with some local macadamia chocolate when bringing us some extra toilet paper. We accidentally broke one mug before leaving, we were trying to buy a substitution, but he said it was ok, he will get one, which was super generous and kind since we were in a rush to go to the airport.

Jason was an amazing host! The room was clean and had everything we needed for our trip to Hawaii. If you are looking for a good, clean place to sleep and will be out during the day, this place is perfect.
We just stayed here one night but it was clean and as described. Small apartment but fine for a couple. Jason was very helpful and easy to contact and kindly left us some Hawaiian treats.

Jason very responsive and helpful, answered questions quickly. Studio as described, with lots of amenities, wifi, TV, cooking items., etc. Close to ABC Store, Ala Moana Shopping Center, beach. Outstanding view of mountains, Ala Wai Canal, baseball fields. Close to bus stop and major routes. Just off Kuhio Ave.

Jason is really kind and friendly from the beginning to the end of the jounery. The location is near the Waikiki beach but not noisy at night, and I can easily rent the cars or take the bus there. The studio is clean and included almost everything you need. I really enjoyed the vacation there.

Absolutely loved our time in Waikiki, we stayed at Jason's studio apartment for 6 nights. Jason was very helpful with details and information about the place, which was great as it was our first time to Hawaii. The apartment was exactly as we expected, great size and comfy bed. Large TV was great and wardrobes were very handy. Had a bit of trouble with the key cards opening the door but eventually worked out. We would definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a place to stay in Waikiki, the location is great and Jason was a very good host!

We stayed at Jason's for three days to explore some of Waikiki and Oahu. The place was great, only a short walk into the centre of Waikiki or the main shopping area Ala Moana (15 min walk). The Internet was fast and reliable and the small kitchen useful to make porridge each morning. The air conditioning was loud but effective and sometimes necessary! Jason was a very friendly and helpful host, and everything we needed was in the apartment.

Our flight arrived earlier and even though the check in time is 3PM, Jason had the room ready before then and was able to meet with us earlier. Location was great close to a lot of the places we wished to visit and within walking distance to some great restaurants.

The room itself was very clean and more than big enough to accommodate two people (or more if need be), the room was very comfortable and there's also the convenience of being able to cook for oneself as there were appliances (toaster, microwave, etc) readily available.

There is parking available close by as well for a pretty reasonable price. I will definitely recommend this accommodation to a friend.

Jason was a lovely host (even though we only saw him briefly) the room was adequate for our needs. I would strongly recommend this location as it is situated essentially halfway between waikiki and alomoana shopping centre which were the two main "hubs" of honolulu. 

Thank you!

There were many things we liked about staying at Jason's studio. The location was central, within walking distances to Waikiki beach and Ala Moana Mall. The beautiful window view of the skyline at night was a nice surprise treat. The WiFi internet was very fast - in fact the fastest of all the four places we stayed at in Hawaii (~30 Mbps). Even though we didn't get to meet him in person, Jason was also very responsive to our inquiries and needs. For instance, we misread the check-out time and had to ask him for a late check-out time on short notice, but he was so kind to grant our request. Lastly, the building is a bit old but the studio itself is new - it seems to have been renovated recently.
Jason was punctual in meeting me and personable.
Jason was an amazing host! Comfy beds, great location. Everything was perfect!

Fell in love with this cute apartment - perfect size for a couple. The place is spotless and all amenities provided, with exceptional view on par with the photo on Airbnb (I was skeptical, how can the view be THAT gorgeous? IT IS.) Great location just a couple blocks from the 'it' shops and restaurants in Waikiki, and also the largest outdoor mall Ala Moana. You must also try the two delicious Japanese restaurants downstairs ('Burger and Sushi' and 'Choco'). Jason was fantastic, set our room up for us before check in time upon our late request, answered all queries promptly. Recommend!

Jason is a fantastic host, he is friendly and easy-going. This place is perfect in Waikiki walking distance to everything. It’s a short 10-15 mins. walk to the main shopping street, ABC store, restaurants, famous ramen, etc. We also love swimming pool and the BBQ place up at 5th floor. 
The room is very clean and I love the view and coziness of the room. The room comes with everything we need and Jason even got us more things when it ran out.  
There are parking spaces right across from the condo, which you can rent from Jason for a great price. Jason's a wonderful host. He went above and beyond to help us with our questions and needs. 
We would definitely come back and stay with Jason for our next visit!

Jason was a great host, he met us at the apartment when we arrived and during our stay he responded to messages quickly, helping out wherever possible.  

This place was true to the photos and perfect for our needs. It's a studio so not huge in size but totally fine for a couple.  Most importantly it was clean, had a comfortable bed and was in a good location. (I sometimes get a stiff back from different beds but slept well here - no pain) Not too close to shops so it felt a bit more relaxed but close enough to walk into the main areas. We hired a car and Jason organised discount parking for us, right across the road from the apartment block.

The view was a nice surprise. Jason supplied us with plenty of clean towels, including beach towels. The apartment had a beach umbrella & hair dryer which was handy, as was the fridge and kitchenette. The air con did a good job of keeping the place nice & cool on those hot, humid days. Also provided was a clock radio with iPhone 5 connection so we could play our music when we were home which was an added bonus.

I accidentally left a dress behind in the room and Jason kindly delivered it to the hotel that my family were staying at so that they could bring it home for me. Thanks again Jason!! You're a legend. :)

We had a fantastic time & would definitely stay here again.

Seeing this was my wife's and I first AirBnB experience we were a little hesitant. Upon our booking with Jason, I had a lot of questions regarding Oahu and our place where we would be staying. He responded promptly to every question asked. 
Our stay was fabulous and the place was just as described. The room was very clean and organized. We had no issues with check in/check out. Very simple and straight forward. He promised us a parking spot and a parking spot we received. He was an excellent host and look forward to staying in one of his his places in the near future. 

Thanks Jason for Everything!!

Chris & Tarah

Jason responded to any communications very quickly. The apartment is part of the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel Complex. Although the hotel is quite basic the apartment itself is lovely and modern looking. You have access to the hotel's pool and hot tub. The location is good, among the main Waikiki hotels and is only a 10/15 minute walk to the beach, main restaurants, shops and bars. We loved having solid free wifi in the apartment and a nice big TV. Air con is great and the iPhone/iPad docking station was a nice touch. Bed is super comfy.

Jason's place was perfect for our first three days on Oahu! Walking distance to all the fun spots and a great view of the canal. Jason was very responsive to questions and made the check-in and out process easy.

Jason was not able to meet us to check in because of our late check-in time, but provided easy instructions for self check-in.  The apartment was easy to find and close to many of the tourist attractions in Waikiki.  Jason was very responsive to all emails and texts.

The room itself, however, was a bit of a disappointment.  The room is located in an older hotel complex that very much has the feel of an old hospital-- think lots of cement and cinder block.  While renovated, the improvements seemed sparse and a bit of a letdown from the pictures.  The kitchen is basically unusable for anything other than storing snacks in the refrigerator, and the tub was clogged for showers.  

All in all, I felt that it didn't justify the cost of the unit, which included a hefty cleaning fee.

Jason was very welcoming and included all the details I needed to know to get my keys and to the room. He was very quick to respond to any questions that I had. The room appeared just as pictured/described and was about a 10 minute walk from waikiki beach and about the same distance from the hawaii convention center.

Listing was accurate. The studio was small but clean, and cozy enough for my small family (wife, kid, and me). There are towels (including extra beach towels), kitchen supplies, nice big refrigerator with freezer, flatscreen, and couch. Air conditioning was awesome, considering the heat and humidity during our stay.

The location is good. We were close to everything (restaurants, ocean, shopping). We went swimming every day either in the pool or the ocean.

Jason was very responsive and provided good restaurant recommendations.
Jason was really quick on responding. The room was just as described and very clean. I highly recommend staying here. It's in a very convenient location with 7-11 on the corner of the block.

제이슨은 정말 빠른 답변을 해주며 친절하다.
호텔은 생각보다 오래되었고 방은 작은편이었으나 깨끗하다.
와이키키비치와 알라모아나 쇼핑센터 등등 최적의 위치해 있다.

I definitely enjoyed my two weeks staying in Jason's condo. It's exactly as pictured, the view is absolutely fantastic, it's well equipped and Jason is a friendly and very welcoming host. Personally thought it was a great location - away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki beach but close enough to enjoy the surroundings. Surprisingly spacious too. 

Some not so great aspects: If staying longer than a week, you have to register with security and have photos taken, which we weren't informed about. The swipe cards kept failing on us which was super inconvenient and lastly, the rooms walls are paper thin, you can literally hear the TV from next door. All very minor problems which were really only noticed because of our longer stay. Overall, a good experience and would highly recommend Jason.

I had a perfect experience at Jason's studio. Really great host, he meet me when I arrived and showed me around. He was very nice and helpful. I told him I needed an iron and ironing board and sure enough he went and bought them for me. Pretty sweet treatment there.
The studio is perfect, just as described: Clean, comfortable, and quite, contrary to what you would expect in such a busy building. The location was very convenient too, walking distance to waikiki beaches and hotels and restaurants, and easy access to anywhere else in the island. 
I will stay again if I'll ever be back.

Everything was according to the description of the place.
It is close to stores and beaches .
The pool was nice and not very busy .
Jason is very prompt to answer emails and texts.
The internet is solid and fast.  
We had a nice experience with Jason. Thank you.
Jason was very kind. When i ask something, he always reply immeadiately. Room was very neat and cozy.

The listing was definitely very accurate and well described. It was such a nice condo to stay in and Jason provided us with all the living utensils needed for a warm stay. The room was easily accessible and very clean.

Hello,
i Hello,
I can honestly recommend as Jason.
Room consistent with the description, the location sensational. Very helpful person. All fantastic. Once again, I highly recommend Jason.

Jason thank you for your stay and I hope that I'll ever we can meet.

The cozy apartment was in the perfect location - easy walking distance to Waikiki beaches and shopping, but a little of the main drag, so much quieter at night. Jason was very helpful with late arrival directions, and except for a little snafu with the parking, everything worked out well. Having beach towels available and an already chilled bootle of water in the frig upon arrival were nice bonuses.

Apartment was exactly as described. Jason was very responsive and came back to us quickly in regard to any issues we had. The hotel complex the apartment was a bit dated but overall good value for money.
Jason was very accomodating and a great host. We had all we needed and a very nice location, only 10 minute walk to the main drag!

Jason is hands down the best airbnb host I've had. I started planning our Hawaii trip months in advance and Jason answered every single question I had. Jason was always available and extremely helpful. He truly went out of his way for me - assisting with the parking situation, providing laundry detergent, turning on the AC before our arrival, allowing us to check-in early, I could go on and on. 

The location was great for me, you're within walking distance of the main area of Waikiki but not constantly surrounded by tourists. It's the perfect basecamp, easy to get around. Public transportation was pretty reliable, although we did rent a car for most of our stay. The condo is minimal but has all the amenities you need - even had beach towels. Would definitely book with Jason again! Mahalo!
Jason kept good communication and was attentive. The place was cozy for a couple and within walking distance to the Wikiki beach. Good value!

We never met Jason, but he was good in communicating with us of where to pick up the key cards and what to do if we need other things. 
The studio itself is pretty much like the pictures posted by Jason and it was clean and neat. The bed wasn't too bad, but the mattress did sink in the middle. The studio had everything you need. When showering, the water pressure was so-so, but I don't think the host can do anything about it. After showers we noticed it took awhile for the water to drain. 
The  area of the hotel is 10 mins walking distance from the beach and main drag as described by Jason. Very close to the 7/11 and ABC store.   Great for couples and satisfactory for a family of three. We went with a baby and made it work.

We stayed in Jasons apartmenet for 16 nights and everything was just how we expected. Apartment was clean, quite and very close to the beach, restaurants and shopping areas. We enjoyed our stay, communication with Jason was perfect, we even agreed on late check out since our plane left Honolulu late in the evening. This was our first-time experience with airbnb, and we are happy about this experience.

Studio is as pictured. Communication with Jason was great. There were some issues out of his control, and he did everything he could in his power to solve them. 
If you are sensitive to cigarette smoke: the airvent in the bathroom brings in smoke from other people in the building smoking.

Jason was super responsive and answered all of our questions and made check in very easy. The studio was very comfortable for a small space and we were pleasantly surprised with the small kitchen. The location can't be beat and we spent the week walking around Waikiki and it was very close to bus lines that we took downtown and into the Manoa valley.

Jason's apartment was a short walk to everything we needed in Waikiki. The decor seemed a little worn/dated (more than in the photos) and the bed sunk a bit in the middle, but overall it was a pleasant experience. 

Ps. You can smell cigarette smoke in bathroom air vents.

Studio was clean, neat. 
Jason answered questions and was available through email and texts. 
The only one issue I had  was when I texted Jason a few hrs after we left Hawaii asking him if he had seen a pair of earrings left on the bathroom counter. He never responded . Oh well. Other than that, decent place. No issues.
Jason was very accommodating and the room was as described. It was nice that there were plenty of beach towels and bedding/blankets. He was very responsive and I would highly recommend his studio!

Jason constantly checked in with us and provided great advice and feedback. Very accommodating and the room was great! Good size and it was outfitted with everything that you think you'll need and more!

The apartment was good for what we needed. It has a great little cafe downstairs for breakfast and is a short walk to the beach. It is a bit more run down than the photos but has all that you need for your stay.

Perfect location, very close to convention centre where our conference took place. Studio has everything one needs, fridge, freezer, microwave, a/c, internet....I had a very long flight back home and Jason allowed me to check out late, this was really appreciated.

Jason was very on the ball with communication and made a golden recommendation for breakfast . We were able to store our bags as we arrived prior to check in time which is always a plus. The condo is well located in waikiki and walking distance to everything you need to explore down that end . The views are beautiful and the condo is well equiped for its size.

Jason was great a communicating, we got in at 6am in the morning and he kindly let us check in straight away so we could get some sleep before exploring! The place itself looks as depicted, the hotel it is situated in is quite old but everything worked well, the pool was also good to have access to. It was a bit further out of the main town than expected but close enough to get a 5min cab to anywhere urgent. The AC works amazingly so if you like to come home to a cold room after a long day in the sun it's a great stay.
Great location, close to shopping and Waikiki beach..Beach towels and snorkeling gear supplied...great communication from Jason...
Place located in Waikiki not that far from the beach, bike rental place jus around the corner, effortless checkin and checkout. Very good location and price to quality ratio for such location.

Jason's place was a perfect jumping-off point for a fantastic Oahu vacation. The Monarch Hotel is easily walkable (10-15 minutes, leisurely) to Waikiki Beach and even closer to some of the best bars, restaurants, and sights. There are also a variety of convenient businesses (convenience store, small restaurants, car rentals) directly below the apartment. We really enjoyed eating at Cream Pot! 

The room itself was great for three people (2 on the bed, 1 on a converted futon bed). The air conditioning is ice cold (great for escaping the heat) and all the amenities worked great. The location is secure (need a key card to ascend the elevator) and comes with a great view of the Ala Wai road. 

Jason was superbly helpful and incredibly communicative of all responsibilities. He also had a variety of great recommendations for leisure and food. One of the best hosts I've had the pleasure of working with on AirBnb! 

Overall, if you're looking for a cost-effective and cozy way to do Waikiki and explore the island, Jason's place is your best bet.
Jason communicated well, great location, good pool. Able to drop bags off prior to check-in. A bit of road noise but to be expected.
Jason was quick to respond and answer questions. Room was clean, cozy, and in a great location. parking is an issue, but you will find this issue anywhere you stay in Hawaii.
Nice tidy room, good location & communication with Jason was quick and easy

Jason's place was exactly how it was in the photos. The location was perfect for trips to the main strip in Waikiki and day trips around the island. Jason was also very responsive to questions and made our stay stress free. The included snorkeling gear was also a bonus! Would definitely stay at Jason's place again.
Jason was a great host! The bed was too soft, but tastes are different. Other than that we had a great time there. Great location, easy checkin, checkout, great location!
Great location, small but quite comfortable. We highly recommend Jason's place to fellow travelers. Jason is very friendly and helpful.

Le logement est situé dans un hôtel, dans Waikiki. Il est cependant un peu excentré par rapport aux autres hôtels et aux activités pour touriste, mais on trouve juste à côté un dépanneur, un magasin de souvenir (ABC) et un Subway. 
L'hôtel aurait besoin d'un coup de peinture, et d'être rénové, mais la chambre est très bien. A noter que la piscine (6e étage) est à l'eau de mer, et que le jacuzzi avait une couleur d'eau bizarre.
Vous pouvez laisser vos valises pour 10$ chacune à la réception de l'hôtel ou 10$ le lot à la sécurité (lower lobby), mais qui n'est pas ouverte les fins de semaine.
Dans l'appartement, se trouvent une plaque chauffante amovible, une bouilloire, un micro-onde ainsi que des couverts, ustensiles et assiettes. 
La salle de bain présente des tâches d'humidité et la pomme de douche n'est vraiment pas bien.
A noter que le lit est très mou.
Globalement une bonne note, et pour Waikiki il s'agit d'un rapport qualité/prix correct.
Jason was super easy to communicate with and the condo was very close to the convention center for our conference. The unit had all of the amenities we needed.
Nice apartment, close to shops, restaurants and wakiki beach. Would recommend and stay there again.
Schoon en simpel appartement. We hebben Jason niet gezien tijdens ons verblijf maar in- en uitchecken ging zonder grote problemen. Dichtbij het congrescentrum.

The studio was clean and fresh. Liked the lighting of the room and AC. Bed was comfy with clean blankets and also extra clean pillow cases and blankets in closest drawer. The sofa was a nice little amenity of the room for TV watching while eating. Had very quiet sleeps and enough room for 2 people to stay.

Location is great, short walk to the beach and shopping area, the unit is facing the canal and view is quite nice.
Concierge at ground floor it's very helpful to offer information and to book taxi
Great place!!!! Walkable to downtown..
Smaller than pictures make it look but great location- walked everywhere

Check-in and Checkout was quick and easy. This room was very spacious. We rented this room for our friends during our stay together we had in the same Condo. There's a parking garage we paid for $25 per day. Affordable and located walking distance to many shops as restaurants. So when we return we will definitely rent from Jason again. The room had all the amenities such as cookware, detergent, iron board & iron, umbrella, beach towels,  beach tent, toiletries, etc.  Mahalo Jason for the wonderful stay.

Jason was great, the room is pretty small but worked for me and my friends. The building is quite old and the hallways were not the most clean. Proximity to the beach, Honolulu, and other attractions was awesome.
Jason was an excellent host for my 2 weeks in Waikiki.  His responses were very timely, check in process was easy, and the unit was clean/tidy.
room was not so big but good cost performance.
Jason was super nice and on top of all instructions, the room was just as listed and came with some extra perks as well. It was a great stay!

Cute little studio that is about 15-20 minutes walk to the beach/Waikiki center if you're a slow walker like me. Had no troubles checking in or out. Only thing is parking is $25 a night onsite or $12 off site one block away. Overall, nice visit.

This studio is a nice place to lay your head if you don't plan on spending much time in your place. There was no kitchen sink so those items would be washed in the bathtub sink. Jason communicated in a timely manner and was a nice host. All in all was a decent stay for the cost.
Clean and cosy apartment. Close to most places. Walkable. Restaurants close by. Public transportation easily accessible.

A really great place in a really great location. Within walking distance of shopping, beaches, restaurants and bus stops! Jason is a really helpful host who responds very fast with any questions or queries. The walls are a bit thin and noise can be heard through them, and the shower pressure isn’t the greatest. But other than that, it’s a place well worth the value.

Bardzo szybkie odpowiedzi! Jak coś nie działa to gospodarz szybko reaguje!
Dziękuje!

The location was very good. Close to Waikiki and shopping malls. Could use bus to go around. 
It was really relaxing, enough space for three people. 
The baths kit wasn't enough so had to but them ourselves. But other than that,  
We had a great time.

Overall ok stay. We were here for a wedding  and not in the room much. They whole building in general needs a major renovation. Nasty smell in the lobby. I would suggest redoing the bathroom. Additionally, more linens and towels. Also, the pub downstairs is dirty and they don’t clean their  glasses well. Coffee shop was real
Good
Great location, clean.
We loved our stay here.. the room has a nice view outside and very clean.. its very close also to everything :)

What a view! Jason's place was super modern and clean. Very spacious given that it is a studio. Elevators in the main lobby can be a bit slow at times. 

Waikiki Beach is just a short walk away (about 10 mins). The bakery and brunch place in the building were fabulous. 

Hosts gave great tips and replied very quickly to emails.
Convient, comfortable, and a good value!
Clean and a great view!

The location of this apt was great and near convention center and an easy walk to main tourist areas. I stayed with two other friends and although it felt cramped at times, it worked for us considering the reasonable price. Bathroom was clean. My main issue was that extra bedsheets for the sofa bed were not available, hand soap was nearly empty and wifi directions/password were not given. I had to contact host multiple times throughout my stay and several attempts were needed to be made to fix wifi. Someone had to drop off extra bedsheets and soap during our stay. I also had to contact the host myself regarding check-out directions. I felt that the apartment was not well prepared - many of the issues needed to be taken care of and organized prior to having a guest stay.

This accommodation was just great for two people and ideally situated for exploring the Waikiki area and the many good eating places near by.

The double bed was comfortable and the amenities were clean and in a good serviceable condition.

The host was a great help in providing us with information on car parking close to the apartment and very attentive to our other requests.

The communication was good, Raenette responded in general quickly. I hated the bed, it was far too soft and uncomfortable. It actually doesn‘t look like on the photos. It is an old building and it smells muddy. We were there for one month and there was no equipment for cleaning the studio. We had to buy cleaning supplies. In addition, the keys, which are cards in fact, didn‘t work well. We had to contact the security 4 times because they got blocked, it was very exhausting to have those problems if you paid so much money.
Great view & a great location. Was able to book this place last minute & thank goodness for that. Mahalo Jason & Raenette.
It was a great location it was clean nice and Jason was always there to answer any question that we needed to kno . we will be booking again next year
Wonderful place found in an exceptional location!

The view was amazing and the price was perfect for what we were looking for.   it's an incredible studio that we both fell in love with the moment we walked in.  mainly her but I was impressed none the less.  but the sunrise in the morning or even at night when you look at the cityscape is incredible.    walking distance to the beach and the mall.   and not that far from the bars and downtown.    area was spotless and clean.   one of the best airbnbs  we stayed at so far.  will definitely book again soon if its available again. thank you!!!!
Everything as advertised and extremely quick and helpful  responses.
very good located

name: Entire House in Little Italy(5 mins to Mile end)
summary: Located in Montreal's most young & hip but quiet area. A lot of Cafes and restaurants, best espresso cafe in Montreal. Jean-Talon market is about 5mins walking distance. Just next Mile-end, and Mile-ex, and Ville-ray.
space: I m subleting my apartment in the heart of little Italy(H2S 3A8). 4 1/2 with a big bed room with balcony, a small room for office, salon, kitchen, bathroom.  Laundry machine in the house.  Metro Beaubien. Near from all the restaurants, 3 Supermarkets in 3-5mins walk, also Jean talon market 5mins walking distance. At the boarder of Mile-end and Mile-ex, Great location!
description: Located in Montreal's most young & hip but quiet area. A lot of Cafes and restaurants, best espresso cafe in Montreal. Jean-Talon market is about 5mins walking distance. Just next Mile-end, and Mile-ex, and Ville-ray. I m subleting my apartment in the heart of little Italy(H2S 3A8). 4 1/2 with a big bed room with balcony, a small room for office, salon, kitchen, bathroom.  Laundry machine in the house.  Metro Beaubien. Near from all the restaurants, 3 Supermarkets in 3-5mins walk, also Jean talon market 5mins walking distance. At the boarder of Mile-end and Mile-ex, Great location! Entire house! In the heart of little italy! Walking distance to Mile-end, Jean-talon market, great places to visit in Montreal. A lot of great restaurants, cafe, beautique, just around the corner. Bus stop(180) right in front of the House. Metro Beaubien is walking distance(less than 10mins).

host.host_about:
I'm a ceramist @mieceramics and creator&writer of Korean supper club @minuskitchen 

I enjoy good film and literature, storytelling in all sort of medium, yoga, biking, ocean swimming day and night, surfing, and traveling of course!

name: Casas do Pátio - Azulejos
summary: This apartment in the historical area of Porto is near the river, has a balcony with river views and we provide free internet Wi-Fi in all the building.
space: This apartment has an excellent location in the historic area of Porto, Ribeira. This newly renovated building provides high standards of comfort and functionality. The decoration is inspired in the typical tiles you can see around Porto City like São Bento Station, Carmo, etc. The kitchen is an open space in the living room having 2 big windows with access to a small balcony from where you can see Ribeira and the Douro river. This apartment has 1 big bathroom and a smaller one with shower (the two bathrooms have shower, there is no bathtub). This unique typology with a mezzanine, with 3 single beds, is connected to one room, with 1 single bed, and to a bathroom. Free internet Wi-Fi and TV. Nearby you can find Clérigos Tower, Bolsa Palace, Ferreira Borges Market, visit the wine cellars of Porto and the Cais de Gaia simply walking across D. Luís Bridge and get the chance to do a Cruise in the River. You can find restaurants and bars from 1 minute walking from the apartment. The Bus stop
