host.host_about:
Gosto de correr, nadar e cozinhar.
Aprecio bons momentos de convivio.
As minhas cidades preferidas, depois do Porto, são Londres e Paris.
Como anfitrião tudo farei para que tenham a estadia o mais agradável possível e ajudando no que for necessário.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: My friend and I rented this apartment for 3 nights and LOVED IT!!!! It is BEAUTIFUL, well equipped and EXTREMELY well located. We were 2 friends and really enjoyed having our own bathroom:) No one could ask for a better place to stay in Porto. We had the chance to meet Joao and his wife and they are both amazing people. Dealing with Joao was so smooth, from the very beginning; he is so nice and so helpful. He is reliable, trustworthy and very kind. Even before making my decision to rent his apartment, he nicely offered to help me plan my stay in Porto and suggest things to do even if I ever decided to rent someone else's apartment.... How kind is that???  I also really appreciated the fact that he communicated with me in French just because he saw on my AirBnB profile that French is my first language...  MERCI pour tout Joao, and you need to let me know if you and your wife ever decide to come to Montreal ;)

Great apartment,good use of space and really centrally located in the riberia district.joao was very helpful with advice both before and whilst we were in Porto, very prompt with replying to any queries and its a great place to stay.
Many thanks
Anna

Casas do Patio is a very comfortable, clean and homey apartment. We stayed in 2 other apartments during our stay in Portugal and this was by far the nicest. Joao, Daniela and everyone else were great. They gave us tons of tips on making the most of our trip to Porto. Thanks for everything guys! We would definitely stay here again!

Merci a Joao et Daniela pour leur gentillesse, l'accueil chaleureux et les informations fournies sur la ville !
L'appartement ne peux pas être mieux situé, à une minute des quais, et proche de la gare de sao bento, que du bonheur !
il est très bien décoré et très pratique, très lumineux aussi. C'est un excellent moyen de partager un court moment la vie de porto. Un grand merci a tout le monde, 
Mélanie, Philippe, Rustine et Richard

Tolles, großzügiges Apartment in prima Lage mitten in der Altstadt. Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und nichts vermisst. Daniela hat uns sehr freundlich begrüßt und hatte jede Menge informative Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt. Vielen Dank!

Wonderful host, wonderful apartment, could not have asked for more. Would love to come and stay again just need to find a way to get back to Porto. Have told everyone I know what a lovely place it was. 
Thank you so much!
Excellent location, hospitality and well-appointed. Nothing bad to say at all.

Unfortunately I was not able to stay in in Casas do Pátio due to an overbooking but João was very swift in solving that issue and provide an excellent alternative.

The listing I stayed in was very modern and had all the needed commodities to make it an enjoyable stay.

Also, the location was perfect.

Porto é uma cidade maravilhosa e interessante que ficou ainda melhor hospedado em apartamento tão confortável e otimamente localizado. Certamente voltaremos .
Foi um prazer enorme conhecer a cidade e seu gentis habitantes.
L'appartement est idéalement situé, avec tout l'équipement nécessaire pour passer un excellent séjour. Les photos montre bien la qualité de l'appartement.
Appartement propre et très bien placé dans le centre historique. Parfait pour 4 personnes. Accueil chaleureux de la part de Daniela qui nous a conseillé des supers restos/visites - merci!
The apartment is beautiful and the location could hardly be better. The hosts are very professional, everything went smoothly. Thanks a lot to Pedro for the excellent local recommendations!
The flat was great. Very comfortable and in an excellent location. The hosts we very welcoming and friendly. Highly recommended.
This is a commercial letting and so not only lacks toiletries but any personal touches. That said location is great, apartment perfectly adequate

Our hosts were extremely helpful and friendly. The location is excellent to most amenities although it is in a quite run down area, but a lot of Porto is run down so can't blame the location.
The photos are realistic of the apartment but since then there is quite a bit of wear and tear. The entrance is up two flights of stairs. The second bathroom you will have to 'side saddle' the toilet. The downstairs bathroom floor had not been cleaned. Both bathrooms were mouldy and needed a jolly good clean with bleach. There was no soap or hairdryer but the very friendly staff found us a dryer. It would be very helpful to have a broom or dustpan and broom so we could clean the dirty floor. No one has ever vacuumed under the beds in a very long time. Lots of old tissues, dust and grime. The kitchen has the basics only. No oil, salt and pepper or any other such amenities. Towels were old and thread bare. All in all a very disappointing experience. Xcpt for the staff who were extremely friendly especially Lucinana.
Danielle C was absolutely fantastic ! The location was great and the apartment clean, spacious and bright.
Logement conforme à la description et aux photos ! Très très bien placé, tout peut se faire à pieds ! Calme et propre. L'accueil est agréable (même tard et en retard !). Je recommande sans problème !

Très bon accueil malgré notre arrivée tardive, le logement est très sympa, propre,  moderne, fonctionnel,  conforme a la description. L'emplacement et à la foi calme et très central parfait pour visiter la Ville.

the apartment is in the middle of the old district of Porto, many of the attractions are reachable by foot. Even though we arrived pretty late Joaquim took the time to point us to some of the must sees in Porto. Unfortunately we did not make it to the restaurant he recommended, so I guess we have to come back some time, we will definitively try to stay in one of their apartments again :)

El apartamento está en una ubicación excelente, fabulosa la vista desde los balcones. Es muy confortable y limpio, los colchones y almohadas comod (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) simos, la cocina está equipada con todo lo necesario y en general es muy acogedor. Los baños serían para mí lo único mejorable: en uno de ellos el inodoro y la ducha son extremadamente incómodos, en el otro se sale el agua entre la bañera y la mampara y, como no hay fregona, no se puede recoger. En cuanto a los anfitriones, nos dispensaron un trato exquisito. Desde el aeropuerto utilizamos el servicio de transporte que nos ofrecieron y Joaquim, el conductor, nos fue contando cosas de la ciudad por el camino. Además nos recomendó un sitio para cenar que nos gustó mucho y donde también nos trataron fenomenal. Repetiríamos y lo recomendamos sin ninguna duda. Oporto es un destino maravilloso y este apartamento un alojamiento perfecto para disfrutarlo.
Appartement bien placé, peu chauffé mais confortable
Top spot in old town, close to all sights

La situation du logement est parfaite, à proximité de beaucoup de points d'interets, sans pour autant être trop bruyant.
L'appartement possède les équipements nécessaires et il est propre.
Il est conforme aux photos.
Effectivement comme cela a été déjà dit, il n'y a aucune nourriture de fourni pour le petit-dej ou même un encas, mais une fois qu'on le sait il suffit d'en apporter ou d'en acheter sur place. Il y a de plus aux alentours de nombreux établissements pour prendre le petit-déjeuner pour pas cher du tout, comme le font beaucoup des habitants.
L'accueil à l'agence est très sympa, et peut se faire en français ce qui est vraiment agréable.
Le service de navette pour l'aéroport est très ponctuel. Il permet d'arrivée en toute tranquilité, avec une personne qui vous attend même en cas de retard du vol.
Je recommande vivement cette agence !
João and his team were very helpful in terms of providing lots of local tips and expertise. Check in and check out were both very simple.

расположение квартиры отличное. платная парковка рядом. заезд был быстрым. это плюсы. минусы следующие: грязные полы, балконы, окна. вай фай практически не работает, очень медленно. спальни маленькие, а одна спальня вообще проходная. стол на кухне разваливается.

name: Beautiful room in Modernist House
summary: Beautiful bedroom for 2 people in a ArtDecó building in the heart of the Eixample in Barcelona. Well connected via public transport. Elevator, WIFI and all you need for a pleasant stay.
space: The apartment is on the second floor, the building has elevator. The room is very bright (with a double balcony door), high quality wooden furniture.  Beautiful modernist tiled floors. ==> Double bed 135 cm wide ==> Access to equiped bathroom ==> Basic toiletries included: shampoo, gel, toothpaste
description: Beautiful bedroom for 2 people in a ArtDecó building in the heart of the Eixample in Barcelona. Well connected via public transport. Elevator, WIFI and all you need for a pleasant stay. The apartment is on the second floor, the building has elevator. The room is very bright (with a double balcony door), high quality wooden furniture.  Beautiful modernist tiled floors. ==> Double bed 135 cm wide ==> Access to equiped bathroom ==> Basic toiletries included: shampoo, gel, toothpaste Elevator Bathroom Bed Linen and towels included Personalized attention to guests, as I am living in the apartment, any question or advice will be solved in real time. Located in the heart of Eixample, an area known worldwide for its urbanistic grid structure, very easy orientation and its unique architecture of the early twentieth century, called Modernist in Spain and Art Deco in the rest of the world. Well communicated by public transport (bus stop on the same street, Passeig de Gracia metropolitan station (
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of Eixample, an area known worldwide for its urbanistic grid structure, very easy orientation and its unique architecture of the early twentieth century, called Modernist in Spain and Art Deco in the rest of the world.
transit: Well communicated by public transport (bus stop on the same street, Passeig de Gracia metropolitan station (L2, L3 and L4) and Hospital Clinic metropolitan station (L5) metro and train Passeig de Gracia station all 10 minutes walking distance) 15 minutes walking distance to the city center: Plaza de Catalunya and infamous Ramblas.
access: Elevator Bathroom Bed Linen and towels included
interaction: Personalized attention to guests, as I am living in the apartment, any question or advice will be solved in real time.
house_rules: It is a building in which standard neighbors live, so we ask you please respect their rest. Do not make noise after midnight.

host.host_about: Soy una persona culta, tolerante y tranquila. Me gustan los viajes, la casa, los animales y la naturaleza. Soy fotógrafo y experto en arte contemporaneo. Me gusta la musica y la buena compania.

reviews.comments:
Онофре был прекрасным хозяином, тактичным и отзывчивым.
С ним комфортно было делить одну квартиру.
Онофре не владеет английским, но тут гугл транслейт нам в помощь.
Чувствовалось, что гость для него в приоритете.
Сама квартира очень красивая и стильная, в историческом доме находится.
Все чисто и убрано.
Единственный чувствительный момент, это днем шум машин за окном.
Но через 3 дня привыкаешь и не замечаешь.
Район безопасный, в нем чувствуешь себя не так уязвимо, как например в готическом квартале.
Вокруг дома много кафе для завтрака, и для ужина.
Шкаф с вешалками для вещей.
Чайник и чашки в комнате.
Кресло на балкончике.
Ванная комната общая, но вполне можно поделиться )))
Кухней не пользовалась, но когда надо было мне постирать, Онофре поделился своей стиральной машиной.
В общем, рекомендую.

Onofre was a wonderful host, considerate and responsive.
With him it was comfortable to share an apartment. Onofre does not speak English, but here on (Hidden by Airbnb) Translate to help us. It was felt that a guest for him a priority.
The apartment itself is very beautiful and stylish, in a historic house located. Everything is clean and cleaned.
The only sensitive moment, this day the noise of cars outside. But after 3 days you get used to and do not notice.
State security, it does not feel so vulnerable, such as the Gothic quarter. Around the house there are many cafes for breakfast and for dinner.
Wardrobe with hangers for clothes. Tea cups and in the room. The chair on the balcony. The bathroom is shared, but it can be shared))) Kitchen did not use, but when I had to wash, Onofre shared his washing machine.
In general, I recommend.

The room was beautiful, with a balcony overlooking a lovely street in Barcelona. Very good location - a 20 minute or so taxi ride from the airport and walkable distance to lots of places. 

The host is the best bit about this though - he is such a nice, friendly, lovely man. Willing to help you however you so please, but also keeping his distance and giving you the space you need.

Onofre was the perfect host. His English isn't fully fluent, but that didn't stop him from making the entire experience of staying with him a delight. His apartment is beautiful, in a great location, and he gives you exactly the amount of help and space you need. 10/10. Would book again.

Onofre is very kind, friendly and easy going. I enjoyed staying at his apartment. The room is big, clean and cozy, and so is the hall apartment.
A metro stop is like 2-3 minutes walk from the apartment. A Lot of shops, bars, restaurants and clubs around. Few super markets open 24 hours.. 
Onofre were always there when I needed help. He is very responsive and informative, I didn't hesitate to ask him..

Onofre is a gentleman! Very very helpful. Although my Spanish was terrible and his English not so good he still tried to help me with places to go visit, eat, drink and transport. I would highly recommend staying with him. Very nice area. Not far from centre. If or when I return to Barcelona I will definitely look Onofre up again.

La habitación es espaciosa y tiene todas las necesidades, el apartamento es amplio, tranquilo y limpio. Las fotos se ajustan exactamente a la realidad. Onofre es un buen anfitrión. Muchas gracias por la estancia

Onofre nos hizo sentir en casa al momento que nos dio la bienvenida al apartamento. Nos ayudo con las direcciones y datos muy útiles sobre Barcelona y siempre fue muy amable y es una persona muy culta. Su apartamento es muy bueno, espacioso y limpio. Muy bien ubicado. Volvería a quedarme aquí si vuelvo a Barcelona. Agradecido con este anfitrión
Onofre was a very welcoming and hospitable host, the apartment was lovely and it made our trip to Barcelona a joy

Very pleasant stay in Onofre Flat. He was very accomodating with our flights time, we were early at the flat on first day and he keep our luggage late on last day. Room and bathroom were very clean during all the stay. The flat is very well located, 5 min walk to hospital clinic metro station, 10 min to passeig de gracia (casa battlo, la pedredra). I loved the decoration of the flat ! Neighborood is quiet, some very good and fancy bars and restaurants.

Great location in the heart of lovely neighbourhood EXAMPLE, 10 mins walk to the infamous Passeig de Gràcia, 15 - 20 mins walk to EL RAVAL and GOTHIC QUARTER. Close to all the major metro and train lines, but like lovely host Onofre said to me it's all about walking and exploring of this interesting neighbourhood. Room is very spacious and bathroom is super clean. Would definitely love to return one day and staying with Onofre again.

在巴塞罗那三周,住了几处不同的airbnb,Onofre家是最棒的!
首先是卧室,非常大&明亮,床&被子睡得很舒服｡白天阳光洒进来,可以懒散的在自己房间里阅读､休息｡
整个居所很宽敞有性格,有Onofre的很多收藏&挂着他自己的摄影作品｡还有供暖系统,是冬天里不可少的｡他给房客充分的自由独立空间使用厨房和卫生间｡
地点非常好,步行即可到达很多当地人活动的地方､餐厅酒吧,既可感受生活,又方便购物｡
我们用西班牙语沟通,即便我的西语水平很基础,他也很耐心地与我对话,交谈很愉快｡
作为市中心的居所,临街的汽车声不可避免,但晚上车少,还是很安静的,不影响睡眠｡
如果再来巴塞罗那,我会再次选择他家!

I stayed in BCN for three weeks by staying different airbnb homes. Onofre's home is the best one!
First of all, the bedroom is very big and luminous, with comfortable bed & quilt which made me sleep very well. 
The apartment is spacious and stylish with well collected antique decorations & his own work of photography, as well as the heating system which makes the rooms warm. Onofre gives the guest freedom of using the bathroom and kitchen. It has very good location, I can walk to many places and bars where local people go, and also easy for shopping. 
We communicated in Spanish. Although my Spanish level is very basic, he is so paticent to listen and help me to use the correct words. We had very good chat!
Since it is in the downtown, the sounds of cars & motos from the street is inevitable, but it is no problem to sleep well as there's few vechicals during the night. 
 I will choose his room again if I'm back to BCN!

I had a perfect and pleasant stay at Onofres wonderful room in Barcelona. The communication in preparation and during the visit was fast and informative. Due to a flight cancelation I had to arrive one day later: Onofre helped me a lot to adapt to this situation. I enjoyed every day in his wonderful, central and stylish arranged apartment.
Nice apartment, great host and amazing location. Defo recommended!

We loved our stay @ Onofre's place. He was very helpful & friendly. The decoration is very beautiful & well designed. He is very creative & clean & that is what you feel in the house/rooms. Also the location was good. We would definitely recommend this place to stay in Barca!

Onofre is the perfect host. He made me feel welcome as soon as I arrived and nothing was ever too much trouble. He helped me find where I needed to go to catch my bus and how to get there even after he had worked all day. Onofre is a very kind and peaceful man. The neighbourhood is safe and quiet and within easy access to busses and taxi's. Onofre is available to help you with whatever you need, he even offered to book me in to his favourite paella restaurant! :)
Onofre was very welcoming and was ready to help when needed. The room is just beautiful with beautiful light and decorated with good taste, it is realy recommended!

Onofre is a pleasant person, the week that i spend on his flat has been very good. The appartment is clean with à nice room and close to a Metro station. There are many shops and restaurants in the same street. Thank you, and maybe see you soon in Barcelona!!!
Great location. Love it. Everything is so Close by.

El departamento de Onofre se encuentra muy bien ubicado y es muy lindo y cómodo. A pesar de que Onofre tuvo un inconveniente grave antes de nuestra llegada, estuvo siempre disponible para responder nuestras consultas y ayudarnos a que nuestra estadía fuera muy placentera. Definitivamente un host recomendable.

Saludos!

Agustin

My boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay  at Onofre's place! The room was beautiful, comfortable and clean! Everything we needed for a romantic getaway! Onofre was super friendly and there to help us for whatever we needed. It was perfect! We will be coming back for sure :)

Onofre made sure our arrival was smooth. He has a great high ceiling room in the Eixample well appointed including comfy bed, tea service and water and nice bathroom down the hall. The room was light with a large openable window and small balcony overlooking a busy street. Several metro stations are within striking distance of this bnb.
Onofre made us feel very welcome and was very helpful in guiding us on what to see in Barcelona. He was friendly, kind and ensured we had a very comfortable stay which we did! Thank you! :)

L'appartement de Onofre est très bien situé dans le centre de Barcelone, proche du métro et dans le quartier vous trouverez toute sorte de commerces (supermarchés, restaurants,...)
La chambre est spacieuse, lumineuse et super propre, très bien décorée, bien isolée du bruit extérieur et il ne fait pas chaud même avec les fenêtres fermées. Onofre est le meilleur hôte que vous pourrez avoir ; super arrangeant, il nous a aidés en tout et nous a conseillé des endroits où sortir, manger, etc... en plus il est très agréable et parle un peu francais. Notre séjour chez lui à été parfait
Onofre has a beautiful apartment in a great spot in Barcelona. He was very kind and accommodating to me and I enjoyed my experience staying in his room.
The apartment was gorgeous and Onofre was a lovely host, incredibly accommodating and helpful. It was better than the photos suggested. A real home from home. Thanks for having us!

I had an outstanding experience at Onofre's lovely home in Barcelona. The room was exactly as described in the pictures, with a desk, a comfortable bed, and a door leading to small patio facing the street below. The apartment was tastefully decorated and about a 5-10 minute walk to most metro stations and about a 10-15 minute walk to the main square. Onofre was an extremely accommodating and friendly host. He was very flexible with me leaving my things in the apartment after check-out, returning to pick them up later in the day. I But more than that, I accidentally left an important bag which Onofre mailed to my next destination which I've just been happily reunited with. Would certainly recommend this place, and would love to stay here again when I'm next in Barcelona!

I stayed at Onofre's apartment with my girlfriend for a couple of nights. Not only was this apartment super lovely, it was also extremely comfortable. Onofre ensured himself to make ourselves comfortable and was even kind enough to answer any questions about what to see in Barcelona. This is a place I would definitely recommend to anyone looking to travel to Barcelona. I enjoyed my stay here very much.

Thank you very much Onofre! I had a great stay, slept well and enjoyed the sun and the view from the cozy little terrace. I could recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a relaxing haven in the big city of Barcelona. The room is super clean and comfortable, Onofre is a very friendly host and the neighboorhood has nice cafés and great architecture :)
Fantastic house right in the centre of the city. Onofre is a lovely guy too. Very easy going. Couldn't recommend this place enough.
The apartment was located in a great part of the city, close to the Metro! It's a beautiful space.

Onofre was really nice, he is really flexible and we had a nice time at his apartment. The area is nice, calm during the day and with lots of things going on during the night. Plenty of good places where to eat and have breakfast.  Walk distance to plaza cataluna, or close by metro if you do not want to walk. :=)

Beautiful facility, perfect location (very close to La Pedrera), the room and the house was exactly as it was described. Very clean and well-equipped, we made the most of our time there. Onofre's brother was always present in the house at our disposal and, despite the small language gap (ita-sp) we managed to get ourselves understood and had no problems. We really  enjoyed our stay, comfy and close to the metro, we really recommend it!

Had a wonderful stay in Onofre's apartment!  He was an incredible host and was very helpful and communicative leading up to and during our stay.  The room was spacious, comfortable and clean.  My favorite part was the small balcony off the bedroom, I loved sitting on the small chair outside listening to the sounds of the city - which were usually very quiet - and enjoying the beautiful weather in Barcelona.  The neighborhood was fantastic and perfectly charming.  Removed from the chaos of tourism down in Gothic and Barceloneta barios.  Very local, great shops, restaurants and cafes, easily walkable to most attractions and very close to city transit so getting around was really easy.  And it was an incredible value for the money. I can't recommend Onofre and his apartment enough!
The landlord especially good, full of art decorate feel comfortable. Especially like the hall that forever on the lamp, if there is an opportunity, still can choose.

Onofre is awsome host. We just felt being back to oir Home in Barcelona. He's really  nice. And the apartment is wonderful. Good design and well decorate! More important it smell good and make you relex just like staying at home. It's a wonderful experience.

Excellent location Onofre is kind and very attentive. The flat is very comfortable,  the room has a cozy balcony.
Thank you very much for the experience

Onofre is welcoming and friendly, although I didn't speak with him much due to language limitations.  The apartment is located in the very excellent Eixample neighborhood which is quite safe to walk around at night with nearby convenience stores and restaurants.  The apartment is very clean and stylish.  5 stars!
This was my first Airbnb experience and it went very well.   Thanks to Onofre for the clean comfortable place.
Onofre é extremamente atencioso. A casa tem uma localização perfeita e é bastante confortável e super limpa. A repetir!

Our stay at Onofre's house was a wonderful experience. The location was very walkable and safe, and the guest room was comfortable and clean. Onofre was great and willing to give recommendations during our trip. Definitely a good place to stay!
Great spot nice room!
My friend and I had a great stay at Onofre's!

L'appartement de D'onofre est formidable.
Les chambres sont spacieuses et propres. D'onofre laisse du thé, café et même des bonbons pour mettre à l'aise ses convives.
Il est très gentil, disponible puisqu' il prend le temps de répondre à toutes les questions et donne des trucs et astuces sur les bons plans de Barcelone. De plus il sait aussi être discret pour vous laissez jouir de son appartement sans avoir gêne. 
Son appartement est très bien situé dans Barcelone, proche des restaurants, commerces, salle de sport, et Passage de Gracia, La plage est elle aussi à 15 mn en bus.
Vous pouvez choisir ce logement les yeux fermés vous ne serez pas du tout déçu et vous rencontrerez par la même occasion une super Personne. Merci à to D'onofre!!!

I loved staying here. Onofre was traveling, but his brother Fernando was there. He spoke little English, but we used a translation app for the Spanish I did not understand. The place was beautiful, clean, and quiet, and I would stay there again. I felt safe as a solo female traveler, and the neighborhood was great. You can walk everywhere and the metro is about 3 short blocks away. Thank you so much!

Onofre was a fantastic host. He was very kind and accommodating. I would certainly stay here again and recommend to others.

I appreciated the attention to detail in terms of cleanliness (the fan was spotless), amenities and decor. The location was excellent with many bars and restaurants a stone's throw away. Transit options were convenient but I preferred taxis as they seemed quite affordable.

Very clean and well organized appartment with a very nice balcony in a superb location. A perfect stay in lovely Barcelona with lots of good reataurants and bars in the area and next to the nice ninot market and hospital clinic metro. Great place!
location was safe and the room was large and spacious. Bedding was also clean and comfortable. It was a happy vacation :)

Onofre's apartment was a wonderful place to stay during a 10 day trip to Barcelona. The location is great -- just 15 mins walking to the center and super close to a metro stop -- and the room was very comfortable. We spent most of the time exploring, but the room was a lovely place to return to at the end of the day and relax. Onofre was very welcoming and his communication leading up to the trip was wonderful.

Onofre was a very accomodating host. His home was very comfortable and spacious for a couple. It was super clean and central. Park Guell, La Sagrada Familia, Gothic Quarter, Barceloneta etc. were all a short walk or a taxi ride away.

Una habitación muy limpia, bonita, amplia y cómoda en la mejor zona de Barcelona, en un apartamento súper cuco. Onofre ha sido un anfitrión fantástico, muy atento y agradable, y si volviera a Barcelona no dudaría en volver a alojarme con él (si me acepta, claro :-)). Moltes gràcies!
Sehr freundlicher Gastgeber der nur zu empfehlen ist! Wir waren zu zweit bei Onofre und können ihn mit gutem Gewissen weiterempfehlen!

Très bon accueil 
Appartement tres propre et chambre spacieuse
Beautiful,clean house with perfect location

房间很干净整洁,充满艺术气息｡实际上整个家里和街道都是这样的｡客厅和厨房如果问过主人,也是可以用的｡主人非常热情,虽然他的英语不好,但还是努力用翻译软件交流｡他推荐的海边的西班牙餐厅超级好吃!相信我,如果一个对美食如此挑剔的中国人都说好吃,那么一定不会错的｡小阳台上的躺椅和房间的靠垫都很舒服,可惜我们没有多少时间享受｡公寓离圣家堂､巴特罗之家等几个著名景点都很近,可以逛过去｡家里也很值得参观,墙上的照片很棒,房间里的影集也可以翻翻｡
Good location, cleanliness, and friendly host.
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 42 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 37 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Onofre is very kind and the room is big and confortable. The location is central, close to the metro and very walkable. There are a lot of restaurants and bars around.

I had a very pleasant stay at Onofre. The apartment is just as described and seen in photos. It’s very well located, with many train, metro and bus stops around. It’s within walking distance of various attractions, which a great alternative to public transport if you’re in town for sight seeing, and you’ll find plenty of restaurants shops in the neighborhood.

Onofre has been a great host, ready to almost immediately answer my questions, whether it was before  or after booking, and during the stay.  You'll find it's super easy to use his instructions to get to the apartment, from the airport, complete with various travel options. There is a bit of a language barrier for real-time chats but that didn’t hinder our communication. Texting worked great at all times.
位置在扩建区 走哪都很方便｡很多景点都可以步行｡房间特别干净 可以在阳台晒太阳｡房东很好,对我们需要什么都及时提供,特别不错

Nous avons séjourné chez Onofre pour le week end de Pâques. 
Malgré notre arrivée tardive, nous avons été très bien accueilli.
Nous agenda respectifs ne nous ont pas permis d'échanger énormément mais Onofre nous a partagé ses lieux à voir et à faire dans Barcelone. 
L'appartement est idéalement situé pour rejoindre les principaux sites à pieds ou en metro

까탈루냐 광장까지는 걸어다닐수 있고 그라시아 거리와 가까워서 까사밀라 까사바뜨요 다 걸어갈 수 있어요. 집 주변에 레스토랑도 많고 슈퍼도 있어요. 주인이 정말 친절하고 인자해요 ㅎㅎ 집에 거의 늘 있지만 조용해서 서로 부딪히거나 딱히 마주칠일은 없어요. 집근처에 저렴하고 맛있는 빵집이 많아 아침으로 사먹었어요. 슈퍼도 근처에 있어서 물이나 음료 사드실수 있구요. 화장실도 정말 깨끗하고 따뜻한물도 잘나왔습니다. 방도 청결하고 수건이나 이불도 잘 준비되어 있어요. 우리나라와 달리 창문이 이중창이 아니라서 도로에 자동차 소리가 들리지만 저는 예민한 편이 아니라 밤에 잘 잤어요. casa bonita!!!
房子离市中心很近,地铁站走路5分钟｡房东是独居老人,应该是有同性伴侣的｡人非常好,不会说英语,用翻译软件交流｡建议两个人一起入住比较好｡房间临街,有点吵,但是发现巴塞的房间都是临街的｡房间干净,跟房东共用卫生间,但不会彼此打扰到｡

This room is perfect for both a weekend in town or a longer stay and absolutely exceptional for Barcelona. The spacious room with its high ceiling and its wonderful stucco, the large balcony window sharing a lot of daylight, the nicely balanced interior design with a lot of taste and with a lot of attention to details made me feel comfortable right from the start. (You will never feel cramped in this room - as it can get in a lot of other rooms for rent in Barcelona.) The generous working table with its comfortable stool is an important plus if one likes/needs to work on a laptop. Everything is speckless and very clean. Above all, Onofre is a wonderful host. He is very friendly and from the first day of arrival until departure, communication was fast and easy. Even my late time of arrival or my very early departure was no problem at all. Onofre is very attentive if one needs anything or has questions. The room is located in midst of a lot of good restaurants and close to the metro. I can fully recommend to stay at this lovely gem of a room.
Very clean and respectful living quarters and in  a central location.
El apartamento de Onofre es ubicado en uno de los mejores barrios de Barcelona. Ademas, la habitaciò es muy limpia y tiene un balcon con acceso directo miy agradable. Comunicaciòn perfecta.

Onofre was an amazingly genuine host, with a comfortable home located in a great location to the city and its many attractions! 

(I would also like to note that as a solo female traveler, the streets were safe even late at night and the room was cozy and private.) 

I highly recommend!

The appartment was really nice and clean. Especially when you’re interested in art and photography you should visit this place. Compliments to Onofre for the wonderfull stay at this beautiful location!

I stayed at this apartment for 1 week in July 2018. It is very comfortable and elegant, located in a great neighbourhood, it's cosy, with lots of cafes/restaurants and shops.  For breakfasts, I recommend cafe Santagloria nearby. There's a bus stop nearby if you want to go to the beach. Onofre is a great guy, welcoming, friendly and discrete. Would definitely recommend, with one note: if you are a light sleeper and plan to go to bed early make sure to bring your earplugs (I had to use them) because the room can get fairly noisy sometimes because of the traffic outside (the windows are looking onto the street).

Onofre est une personne très accueillante et comme les autres visiteurs, je dirais qu’il aime sa ville et nous en fait part. Il est tellement discret que nous l’avons très peu vu. Amateurs de photos et design, ce lieu est pour vous...Le quartier est vraiment sympa, nous recommandons également Sandwichez à côté. Super ville, supers gens... Vive Barcelone et ses habitants...
房东是摄影师 艺术家来的 装修摆设dou hen都很有格调,但是是和房东一起住,duo多少有点不太方便｡位置非常好,步行q去市中心很方便的,公交车也很多｡

The place and our host Onofre was amazing. He stayed up till very late when our flight was delayed and we felt very welcome at the place. Also, we loved the stylish interior, such good taste. The room was spacious, clean and had good vibes.

Die Unterkunft von Onofre ist so wie auf der Website beschrieben. Zentral für alle Unternehmungen gelegen, sauber u. der Gastgeber freundlich u. sehr hilfsbereit. Die Unterkunft kann man auf alle Fälle empfehlen. Vielen Dank Onofre.
Great room in a great location. It was so easy to see the city from Onofre’s house!

房子地理位置不错,距离地铁站相对较近,房子其实很漂亮,房东也算贴心,我的牙刷没有杯子,放在卫生间里,第二天房东为我的牙刷放了一个杯子,这一点很贴心｡但是房东一点也不热情,也不与我们交谈,回到家他没有睡觉在客厅看电视也从不跟我们打招呼,如果能多一点沟通交流就更好了｡最重要的一点,他对于声音的要求太过苛刻,有天晚上11点半左右,我跟朋友在卫生间用正常音量聊天,房东居然在门外用力拍门让我们小声一点,非常严苛,拍门也是怒气冲冲,表示不能接受!而且当时他bi并不是在睡觉,他在玩手机｡第二晚回来时,房东竟然直接把他客厅的门关紧,我们明显感觉到不友好,很影响居住心情!但离开时,咨询他一些问题并要求寄存行李,有了一次短暂的沟通,很积极回答我的问题,也答应了寄存行李,这点很贴心｡
Perfecta localización, todo muy limpio y ordenado. Muy recomendable!
Muy buena ubicación, el anfitrión es muy atento y colaborador.
Très bel appartement confortable au coeur de l'Eixample.

A cute room in downtown Barcelona. In a safe neighbourhood. 
The room was beautiful and had a nice balcony with a view of the street. 
Onofre doesn’t speak much English, but we made out just fine. He was very kind and welcoming. Other than welcoming me to his home, I didn’t see him really at all... so the room felt very quiet and private.
호스트는 매우 친절하고 자상한 사람이고, 숙소는 무척 쾌적하고 구비된 비품과 가구는 며칠 간 생활하기에 부족함이 없었습니다. 다만 주요 관광 포인트와는 거리가 있는 편이지만 가까운 곳에 버스 정류장이 있어서 큰 불편함은 없었습니다. 전체적으로 훌륭한 숙소라고 생각됩니다.

Danke, für eine sehr angenehme Woche, in der ich mich sehr wohl gefühlt habe. Onofre ist ein sehr angenehmer, ruhiger und freundlicher Gastgeber. Der Konkakt war sehr offen und zuvorkommend; aufgrund meiner eingeschränkten Spanischkenntnisse  bzw. seiner etwas  eingeschränkten Englischkenntnisse aber auf alltägliches beshränkt. Das Zimmer ist wie Beschrieben; ich konnte dort auch sehr gut arbeiten.
It was a pleasure staying at Onofre's place. The location is perfect, easy access to public transport and to walk around. Nice food choices around as well. Onefre was very friendly and flexible.

I highly recommend Don Onofre’s lovely apartment in the attractive moderniste Eixample neighborhood. If you are like me and prefer to stay off the beaten in a real neighborhood, and don’t mind sharing a bathroom, this stylish lodging is a perfect fit. Don Onofre was a great host. Although he is works primarily from home and is there a lot, he gives you as much space and privacy as you need. The bedroom is large and bright with access to a small terrace, and the beautiful high ceilings make it feel even larger. The WiFi, desk, fan, multiple lamps, a full-size mirror, hot water pot and teas, hair dryer, and other amenities were much appreciated. I was there for 9 nights and wouldn’t hesitate to return on my next visit to this gorgeous city. Mahalo, Don Onofre!
Listing is accurate. Much more central than map suggests with many public transit options. Would stay here again. Onofre is a great host.
Very accurate description of the flat and room. Great location with walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants etc. Onofre is a great host and I highly recommend.
Onofre is very nice and the apartment is great ;)
Excellent location, lovely quiet host who lets you do your thing..great value for money in Barcelona

Onofre est tres accueillant, l'appartement est grand et propre, la chambre est bine agencée avc une table, le lit est confortable et la chambre est grande.. Le quartier est aussi tres agréable, pres d'une école de médecine et d'un marché. On peut facilement accéder à n'importe quel endroit de Barcelone a partir de là...

This is an excellent space for a solo traveler or two to spend some time in Barcelona! The location of this flat is amazing - you can walk to pretty much anywhere in the city, so you don't really need to take the metro or taxi much if you like to walk! The neighborhood is also very safe and there are plenty of great places to eat and drink downstairs. The host, Onofre, is also friendly and goes the extra mile for his guests. Gracias por todo, Onofre!

name: Laulea Kailani Villa (Kauai), Peaceful Luxury
summary: This custom designed home by Hawaii’s renowned architect Mark Eyler is located on the idyllic northshore of Kauai. HAWAII STATE TAX WILL BE ADDED TO THE DAY RATE and sent to you in a special offer
space: Designed for professional surfer Bruce Irons, the architecture and interior design blends Balinese, Hawaiian and Asian elements with a contemporary style. This home offers a standard of unparalleled beauty combined with elegance in a modern tropical setting.  LAULE'A HALE, which means peaceful and happy in Hawaiian, is the perfect description for this home. In classic tropical design, each living space opens up to bring the outdoors in accentuating the awesome mountain, waterfall and ocean views and allowing the cooling trade winds to soothe you.  With almost 4,000 square feet of living space, this home features 3 bedrooms, 3 and a half baths with spa-like amenities such as steam room, jacuzzi, infinity pool, yoga/meditation room and expansive outdoor living areas. These are just some of the soul nurturing enhancements of LAULE'A HALE. This home boasts luxury, ultimate privacy and pure tranquility. Your very own 5 star villa in paradise. Other Things to note: HAWAII STATE TAX WILL BE A

neighborhood_overview: Your very own private resort within a resort. You can have the best of both worlds by staying in a luxurious and private villa setting while still enjoying convenient access to stores, restaurants and local entertainment options. There are a wide variety of shopping, dining and entertainment options just minutes away. Steps away from the renowned Makai Golf Course, the beautiful Queen’s Bath, Hideaways Beach, Puu Poa Beach...
access: Some of the amenities include steam room, jacuzzi, a mirrored yoga/exercise studio, high-speed WiFi, flat screen TVs in every room, cable TV, stainless steel appliances, beach towels and other beach amenities. Please note that that pool is not heated.
house_rules: OCCUPANCY: The Property is for the sole use as a personal vacation residence for families and responsible adults. Occupancy is restricted to the number of people listed on the Rental Agreement. If the number of occupants changes, Guest must immediately notify Agent and additional charges may apply. After the check-in date, extra guest charges will double per each additional person per night. If the total guest occupancy exceeds the number of guests allowed, this is a breach of contract and will automatically terminate this agreement. Guest will be asked to vacate the premises and all payments will be forfeited. Guest acknowledges that they will personally occupy the Property for the entire length of stay and will not sublet. Tenant shall not use the Property for any illegal or unlawful purpose, nor shall the Property be used in a fashion that disturbs or offends the neighbors.  Special events, including but not limited to weddings, parties, and reception will not be allowed. CONDITION

host.host_about:
Elite Pacific Properties is the leading luxury real estate brokerage and vacation rental firm in Hawaii, with over 100 agents statewide offering everything from luxury residential property sales to multi-unit projects/developer sales, to luxury vacation rentals. Elite Pacific Properties was founded in 2005 and is the only luxury real estate firm with staffed offices on each of Oahu, Maui, Kauai, and the Big Island.

Elite Pacific Properties is a member of Who’s Who In Luxury Real Estate, an exclusive organization of the top luxury brokers in the world; has been named to Inc. Magazine’s prestigious national  “Inc. 5000” list for both 2013 and 2014; and been ranked by Pacific Business News as the 9th fastest growing company in Hawaii on its 2014 Fastest 50 list.

Our Vacation Rental Division reflects our high standards of excellence. With over 70 professionally managed luxury homes available for vacation rentals throughout Hawaii, we are committed to making sure that our vacation clients experience the very best in quality, delivery and outstanding service.

Active Member of:
- (VRMA) Vacation Rental Managers Association
- (NAR) National Association of Realtors
- (HAR) Hawaii Association of Realtors
- (HBR) Honolulu Board of Realtors

reviews.comments: This home is amazing.. Impeccable construction with every last detail thought out. Great service from Yen upon checkin to ensure that everything we needed was arranged. Will definitely be back in the future :)
Great stay!  Will definitely come back.
Wonderful house and location.   Very relaxing.

We love the Princeville area and the house was perfectly located and absolutely beautiful.  My compliments to Bruce Strong, his wife, and the architect for a job well done on the house.  We will definitely stay at the house again if available.

name: Bright Modern Warehouse Conversion
summary: Our 1 bed apartment is modern, clean and located within a trendy warehouse conversion.  The location is ideal for a city stay offering some of Sydney's best cafes and restaurants within a 2min walk and easy access to the city, beaches and airport.
space: Our lovely apartment is a large and homely 1 bedroom located in a heritage warehouse conversion. We would prefer a maximum of two guests. The art deco brick facade and steel features of the original warehouse remain, while the apartment itself is brand new, modern and well equipped. The apartment has large windows and a north-west orientation which means lots of light and fresh air.  Our large balcony has a BBQ, outdoor table and herb garden, making it a perfect place to relax and enjoy a meal or glass of wine!
description: Our 1 bed apartment is modern, clean and located within a trendy warehouse conversion.  The location is ideal for a city stay offering some of Sydney's best cafes and restaurants within a 2min walk and easy access to the city, beaches and airport. Our lovely apartment is a large and homely 1 bedroom located in a heritage warehouse conversion. We would prefer a maximum of two guests. The art deco brick facade and steel features of the original warehouse remain, while the apartment itself is brand new, modern and well equipped. The apartment has large windows and a north-west orientation which means lots of light and fresh air.  Our large balcony has a BBQ, outdoor table and herb garden, making it a perfect place to relax and enjoy a meal or glass of wine! Guests will have access exclusive access to the apartment during their stay, including, kitchen, living room, bedroom, bathroom etc. We have a car parking space that can also be made available if requested, depending on the length of s
neighborhood_overview: Rosebery is an upcoming suburb that has started to get a reputation as a 'foodies' paradise, with a number of new restaurants, cafes, bars, a whiskey distillery and Messina Gelato, all within a 2 minute walk of our apartment. There is also a local park and yoga and pilates studios nearby for those wanting some exercise!  We love our neighbourhood and will be more than happy to point out the best places to eat and drink!
transit: We have easy public transport links into the city and eastern suburbs beaches. Buses leave frequently or the Green Square train station is an easy 15 minute walk. The easiest and cheapest way to get here from the airport is by taxi, only about $15AU.
access: Guests will have access exclusive access to the apartment during their stay, including, kitchen, living room, bedroom, bathroom etc. We have a car parking space that can also be made available if requested, depending on the length of stay, we may agree additional costs.
interaction: We will be available to give you keys and will provide information on buses etc. We will be in Sydney during your stay, so can provide our mobile numbers for any questions etc
house_rules: We have a good relationship with our neighbours, so please be courteous of them and keep noise to a reasonable level

host.host_about:
Hi There!

I'm an easy going and happy professional who enjoys travelling and experiencing the culture, food and adventures that it brings. The recent holidays my partner Steve and I have taken have been varied, from scuba diving and kiteboarding in Fiji to a relaxing camping beach break in New Caledonia and exploring Vietnam on Scooter.  

While I'd love to get advice and hear stories about life in other parts of the world and share stories of life in Australia, I'm also respectful of hosts and their space and privacy.   

Looking forward to meeting you soon!
Rochelle

reviews.comments:
Rochelle was excellent from the very beginning till the end! She was quick to reply, and very flexible in arranging to meet us when we first arrive. 

The apartment was lovely and looked exactly the same as the pictures on the listing. It was very neat, clean and spacious. It is in a fantastic location, with yummy Black Star Pastry just around the corner. The apartment block is very quiet and private.  We rented a car during our stay , and the private car space was a great thing to have! 

I left some of my clothing there accidentally (silly me!) and Rochelle was nice enough to offer to post it back to me. I would highly recommend Rochelle's apartment to everyone!

De hadde lagt gjen kart over området med tips om spisesteder, transport etc.  Vi var der nyttårsaften og Rochelle hadde satt en flaske musserende vin til å feire det nye året. Veldig omteksomt. Videre hadde hun ordnet med parkingstillatelse i parkeringshuset.
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

house_rules: Os hóspedes devem manter limpas todas as dependências da casa. Podendo usar a cozinha e arrumando após seu uso. Fumar e permitido somente em seu próprio quarto assim como o uso do som.  Não e permitido música alta e não se deve fazer barulho antes das 8 horas e após as 22hs Não é permitida a entrada de pessoas estranhas ao dono do imóvel a menos que sob autorização.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Moro sozinho, sou divorciado e recebo meus filhos em casa a cada 15 dias, nos finais de semana. Eles são tranquilos e silenciosos.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: A very nice experience, Rosanne and her family are lovely and very helpful. We had a very good time with them. The room and the apartement are nice, the location perfect. Good bus connections to all places of interest nearby and two blocks to the beach.

Thank you Rosanne for being such a lovely host for my two weeks in copacabana! The apartment is in a fantastic location in copa, close to the Santa Clara area which has great shops and restaurants - as well as being just a block or two from the beach. I was very comfortable in my room and from the moment when I arrived in the middle of the night because of a delayed flight, Rosanne and her family made me feel very welcome. On a practical note, the apartment is great because as well as the excellent location, it has good wifi, a good shower with plenty of hot water and its up on the 9th floor so away from the busy road below. It's easy to get around by foot and is also close to the metro and plenty of buses. There is breakfast in the morning you even have your own little fridge in the room. Do not expect 5 star luxury - this is someone's home, not a hotel, but is all the better for it! There is no air con but the two fans worked perfectly well and overall Rosanne is very considerate and goes out of her way to make sure her guests are comfortable.

The other reason this is a great place to stay is that everyone in the building was so helpful and friendly - the doormen will always stop for a chat! Rosanne has two delightful children who are incredibly polite and thoughtful towards her guests, as well as being very sweet and fun to chat to. Altogether a very relaxed and fun family to stay with and a great way to experience staying in this wonderful city. Highly recommended!

rosanna and her family were lovely hosts. she answered all our question about rio de janeiro. the room and the whole apartment was nice and clean. the location is perfect to walk around the area copacabana and ipanema. really just one block from the amazing copacabana beach with a lot of fresh coconuts and tasty caipirinhas...
i would definitly stay at rosannas place again. 
thank you very much for the great time in rio!
buena suerte!
anja & thish

Nuestra estancia en casa de Rosanne ha sido muy agradable. El sitio es magnífico, a una manzana de la playa y perfectamente comunicado. Rosanne es una buena anfitriona, y su familia encantadora. Si volviera a Río repetiría.

A experiência no Rio de Janeiro com a Rosanne foi maravilhosa, melhor impossível. Ela é muito amigável, simpática, acolhedora, gente boa e faz você se sentir em casa. Seu apartamento possui uma ótima localização, perto do comércio, praia e pontos turísticos; com uma estrutura confortável.
Ela ainda tem ótimas dicas para conhecer os pontos turísticos do Rio, que amei muito conhecer! Com certeza uma ótima opção de estada é na casa da Rô!!!!!

Rosanne e sua família são súper recomendáveis, o quarto é verdadeiramente espaçoso e iluminado, o apartamento está sempre bem arrumado e a família faz com que a gente fique a vontade, são super respeitosos. 
Rosanne, Marco e Bruna têm dois cachorros que ficam sempre na cozinha, são lindos!!
Fiquei súper agradecida e com certeza voltarei!!

Rosanna is a very friendly and open minded person. She helped us quickly to get her accomodation, because we were realy in trouble at that morning.
We would come again
Rosanna, thank you so much! Everything was great! Thanks for your help and good mood! waiting for me again! :) Now just go in costume together! ;)

Rosanne was a very warm and welcoming host, very helpful, especially when I got the flu during my stay. Her apartment is homely and comfortable and our room was very spacious and had all the amenities that we needed. It felt like being at home in brasil. perfect location, halfway down Copacabana beach with easy access to bus system as well as the metro which is a few blocks down. Awesome area, a 2 minute walk to the beach, very safe even at night. I would gladly stay there again. Obrigada Rosanne!

Very nice apartment in an excellent location near Siquiera Campos and a stones throw away from the beach. Rosanne is very kind and took real care to me feeling welcome here. The kids were equally kind, 'fofos' and polite. Would not hesitate to recommend :) (Only thing I would be wary of is if you don't like animals but I didn't find this a problem)
The reservation was canceled 57 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Adoramos a Rosanne, as crianças e os animais. A casa é pertinha da praia, passamos dias deliciosos, exceto pelo calor do RJ que quase nos cozinhou! Com certeza, será um local a se voltar em breve! Obrigada pela acolhida!

A Rosanne nos recebeu com muita simpatia. Seus filhos e bichinhos de estimação são uns amores e não incomodam em nada. Tive um acidente no Rio e Rosanne foi muito solicita e atenciosa comigo. Nos sentimos em casa! Obrigada por tudo Rosanne! Recomendo a todos!

Я жил месяц в доме Rosanne . Жилье просто идеальное: чисто, тихо, близко к пляжу Копакабана (2 минуты ходьбы), рядом много супермаркетов и кафе. 

Rosanne  очень добрый человек, который всегда поможет по любым вопросам. Соседи также прекрасные люди, в один день я заболел и молодой парень сосед, провел со мной в больнице почти весь день. 

Минусов просто нет. В доме живут две собаки, но с ними никаких проблем, ведут себя спокойно, и почти не заметны.

Рекомендую всем, лучше варианта не найти!

Roseanne made me feel completely at home and part of her family. The house was clean, cozy, and my room was quite spacious with a window facing the main street in Copacabana with good natural light. I had full use of the kitchen, bathroom, and common areas and I felt more like a roommate than simply someone who was there temporarily. Rosanne, Bruna, and Marcos (her children) are so friendly and helpful and my stay in Rio would not be as wonderful if it weren't for them. I also loved her two dogs, her cat, and three birds! The location was perfect for me-- two blocks from the beach, short walk to the Metro and bus stops, and on a main street that I felt comfortable walking on at night.
A Rosanne foi muito gentil e hospitaleira. A família me recebeu muito bem. Para quem gosta de ficar na gema carioca a localização é ótima, perto de todo que Zona Sul oferece.

Rosanne is a nice, helpful person. She was there to meet me when I arrived from the airport. The location of the apartment is convenient, but the fact that the two dogs spend most of the time in the kitchen was an issue for me, so I only ended up spending only one week at the apartment. Rosanne understood and we both agree on a resolution. Communication with her was open and friendly.

house_rules: portuguese lavar os pés na garagem quando vier da praia. não colocar sacos plásticos no frigobar lavar seus próprios utensílios. não deixar coisas sujas na pia, ou tanque. pode lavar roupas no tanque ou pedir o uso da maquina de lavar bem como cafeteira etc...somente usar caso seja liberado. fumar somente na janela ou fora do edificio Each clean their own dishes in the cafe or during the day, and also want to use the tank, put the washing machine I put to beat and then can be removed and hung the clothesline. We have coffee, juice squeezer, toaster that can also be used. do not put plastic bags in the fridge and washing the feet in the garage when you get to the beach. the key is delivered upon arrival and returned upon departure. Usar el frigobar en las noches para no hacer ruidos en la cocina donde quedan los perros. cambiamos la roupa de banho y tambien de cama una vez por semana  otros servicios solamente conversando conosotros.

reviews.comments: Rosanne and her family are very nice and hospitable.The room was comfortable for one person well- equipped for my one month stay.The room was kept tidy at all times thanks to to Rosanne who made sure of it!Her two children age 8 are well-behaved and tranquil.She also has two dogs in the kitchen who are very (Website hidden by Airbnb) good to make friends with them:)Overall I had a great stay and would come back!Thank you!

Rosanne and her family are wonderful. They are quiet, friendly, accessible, considerately and very helpful...i felt good all time...If i will come back to Rio, i will stay at Rosannes home. Thank you Rosanne for the good time in Rio and hope we will stay in contact and see you again !!! Kisses :)

The apartment is very confortable, close to the Copacabana beach and very easy to reach every part of Rio from there, Christ Reedemer, Pao de Acucar hill, Ipanema, everything is easily reachable by bus. 
Rosanne and her two kids are wonderful, I really felt at home, so sad at the time of living... 
I would come back for sure !
Thankyou

Rosanne es una persona muy amable y cordial, me brindo ayuda en varios sentidos. Sus hijos son muy respetuosos y simpaticos. 
El departamento es tranquilo y muy bien ubicado, a 1 cuadra de la playa y en la puerta están accesibles todos los puntos de omnibus.
Recomendable.
Rosanne es una muy buena persona, muy amable y sensible. Va a tratar de prestarte ayuda en todo lo que necesites. Sus hijos son chicos bien educados y amorosos. Un placer conocerla!

Gostei da minha estadia na casa da Rosanne. O ambiente em casa é bastante tranquilo e a localização é óptima, porque tem todo o tipo de comércio por perto.
Fiquei num quarto que dá para as traseiras da casa o que fez com que não sentisse o possível ruído da rua.
A Rosanne foi prestável comigo ajudando-me em diversas situações. Ela e os seus filhos são bastante simpáticos. 
Tinha a minha independência para entrar e sair de casa quando quisesse, porque possuia a chave de casa.

Difícil falar da minha experiência na casa da Rossane sem ficar com muitas saudades!!! Passei quase três meses com eles e me fizeram sentir que fazia parte da família. Rossane é super amável e te faz sentir bem, muito bem. Tudo de bom pode ser dito da família da Rossane, seus filhos são super bem educados, Bruna é uma menina inteligente e carinhosa e Marcos é um garoto divertido e curioso. Filhos incríveis vc tem, Rossane.
A casa é confortável e o quarto é bem grande. Ótimo para estudar porque a casa não é barulhenta e todos respeitam os silêncios dos outros e os espaços...
O apartamento está bem localizado, perto da praia e numa área de Copacabana segura. Pode se voltar tarde de noite porque é seguro. Acho que é a melhor área de Copacabana...
Eu não duvidaria em voltar com vocês..

Rosanne, muchas gracias por todo! 
Es una excelente persona. La ubicación es buena, cerca de la playa e Ipanema. El lugar es cómodo y confortable. Estuvimos hospedados 15 días para ver el mundial y no tuvimos ningún problema! Nos quedamos con ganas de seguir más tiempo! Será la próxima vez...

Salud (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) s!
everything was fabulous it's very close to the center of the Copacabana! hottest spot north of Havannah. Sorry, just had to do it...
Really good, Rosanne is a great host and she made us feel very comfortable :-) The apartment is ideally located in the heart of Copacabana and it is easy to get around.

This place is a very good deal for the price. I initially got a small but functional room for a few days but then someone else arrived and I got moved to a bigger room. Both are very good for the price, especially given the location of the apartment (one block away from the beach and a 10 minute walk to the metro station).  Both rooms have a private fridge, a desk and TV with cable. Breakfast is also provided.
The host Rosanne is great and makes you feel at home. Her two kids are incredibly well behaved. The internet connection is good. 
You will share the apartment with a few more "residents." There are two dogs with which you want to be friends with when you arrive. There is also a very cute cat. The only thing that made me feel uncomfortable are the caged birds, maybe this is cultural, but it was somewhat unconformable being in the living room with caged animals. 
The people that work in the building are also very friendly and there is a guard in the building 24 hours a day.
Overall a great experience!

Rosanne est très relax et sympa. Je suis resté 19 jours et c'est passé très vite. L'appartement est littéralement à 2 minutes de la plage. Les enfants de Rosanne étaient là de temps en temps mais sont cools et viennent vers vous. Petit plus, Rosanne fait la lessive des personnes qu'elle héberge.

Great place in Copacabana ! Rosanne is super nice and the location of the apartment is just perfect. Walking distance from the beach, the metro station, the supermarket and the many bus stops. Room clean and quiet with everything you need.  Will definitely recommend :)

I loved it!!! My favorite AirBnB experience so far. I stayed at Rosanne's place during Carnival and it was an awesome experience.  The location is fantastic! Right in the middle of the action in Copa on a street that has lots of souvenir shops, grocery stores, cafes and restaurants and one block from the beach!! The building is very secure and has a doorman 24/7.  The metro is very close and all the main attractions are also a short taxi ride away.

Rosanne is super nice and her adorable 2 kids are very polite and well behaved. There are also 2 playful dogs, one friendly cat and birds in the apartment. It made it feel a lot like home :)

When I return to Rio, I will definitely stay here again!!
Rosanne is a very lovely person. She gave me a warm welcome and helped me with every problem in Rio. Thanks for the good stay!

I enjoyed my stay at Rosanne's house. She made me feel very welcome and was always willing to help me out or answer any questions I had. She has a sweet family and I would recommend her place to anyone who wants to be right in the centre of Copacabana in a comfortable room.

Le logement est très bien situé juste à 2 minutes de la plage à pied..
l'appartement est spacieux et correcte très bon rapport qualité prix.
Rosanne est une femme très gentille toujours souriante.  
J'ai passé un super séjour à Copacabana !

Rosanne and her family are lovely! So kind and caring.I was a little sick and Rosanne was always asking if i needed anything.The location is perfect and i would recommend to anyone! I will miss Rosanne and her lovely children! Many thanks x

Adorei!  O quarto é super confortável, a Rosanne é super atenciosa e gentil e seus filhos são muito bonzinhos. Todos sempre disponíveis para me ajudar. Já guardei o contato pois pretendo voltar a me hospedar aqui. Tudo perfeito!  Recomendo

Très bien situé à Copacabana, metro, bus resto, et surtout 50 mètres de la plage.
chambres propre, et wi fi excellent 
L’hôte Rosanne est très sympa ....
Muy buena experiencia, lugar muy cerca a la playa y tiendas. Rogerio es una persona muy amable.

name: Beautiful suite near the beach
summary: Suite avaibable for the time you need Great location just a few steps from the beach, 10 minutes walking from the city park with lakes, tennis court, great for jogging... All commodities included (kitchen, room with private bathroom, garden, etc..)
space: Espaço amplo com privacidade, calmo e com um jardim onde podem apanhar banhos de sol. A cozinha está toda equipada com vários utensilios para tornar as suas refeições agradáveis. A limpeza impera. Tudo a pensar no seu bem-estar.
