All commodities included (kitchen, room with private bathroom, garden, etc..) Espaço amplo com privacidade, calmo e com um jardim onde podem apanhar banhos de sol. A cozinha está toda equipada com vários utensilios para tornar as suas refeições agradáveis. A limpeza impera. Tudo a pensar no seu bem-estar. Acesso à cozinha, quarto privado e jardim no interior do prédio. Estarei sempre disponível para qualquer informação seja durante o dia ou à noite. Matosinhos Sul é uma zona muito segura, considerada de luxo onde as pessoas são simpáticas e onde encontram turistas de todas as nacionalidades. Refeições económicas nas esplanadas, grande variedade de supermercados, pastelarias, farmácia, lojas e zonas ajardinadas. A praia é fantástica com grandes dimensões. Sim, há transportes públicos junto ao ao apartamento para o Port
neighborhood_overview: Matosinhos Sul é uma zona muito segura, considerada de luxo onde as pessoas são simpáticas e onde encontram turistas de todas as nacionalidades. Refeições económicas nas esplanadas, grande variedade de supermercados, pastelarias, farmácia, lojas e zonas ajardinadas. A praia é fantástica com grandes dimensões.
notes: Os hóspedes deverão informar os seus gostos para que a sua estadia seja o mais confortável e agradável.
transit: Sim, há transportes públicos junto ao ao apartamento para o Porto e qualquer lugar da zona bem como o metro até ao aeroporto, toda a zona metropolitana do Porto.
access: Acesso à cozinha, quarto privado e jardim no interior do prédio.
interaction: Estarei sempre disponível para qualquer informação seja durante o dia ou à noite.
house_rules: Os hóspedes têm toda a privacidade que desejarem, serão ajudados no que necessitarem e vigoram as regras de boa educação.

host.host_about: I am a positive person, nice and that like to receive its guests in the best possible way so that they feel comfortable. I like to meet people from other countries, show and tell what Portugal (Porto / Matosinhos) has the best.

reviews.comments:
Otimo, fomos MUITO bem tratados e bem recebidos. Se fosse em uma escala de 1 a 5 estrelas, eu colocaria 10!
Com uma "hosted" muito simpatica e atenciosa, quarto muito confortavel, espaçoso e limpo (e um toalete privativo)! Localizado em uma otima area (proximo ao metro e praias) .
Quando voltar a Porto, ja tenho um lugar favorito para passar se hospedar!
Obrigado

Great, we were VERY well cared  and well received. If it were on a scale of 1 to 5 stars, I would put 10!
With a "hosted" very friendly and helpful, very comfortable bedroom, spacious and clean! Located in an very good area (next to the metro and beaches).
When I return to Porto,  I alredy have a favorite place to stay!
thank you

Really enjoyed my stay at Maria's flat. The room was like the photos. I had a (very clean) ensuite, and it overlooked the communal gardens. It was 150m to the beach (huge and not overly busy!), and 100m to the direct tram stop to Porto city centre. 
Maria was a great host - genuinely wanted to make sure I was ok, and that I was happy.

Residence clean and reassured near the beach and the businesses;

Warm welcome of Maria

Unbeatable value for money for 2 adults

For that to ask futhermore ?

O quarto é grande e comporta duas pessoas tranquilamente, além de ser bonito e muito limpo e cheiroso. A casa é muito perto do metrô, da praia, de dois mercados grandes e toda a infraestrutura necessária. Maria é uma anfitriã incrível, que nos ajudou em tudo que foi possível e tornou nossa estadia muito tranquila. Recomendo a todos que forem visitar o Porto

Logement choisi en raison de sa proximité de l'aéroport (10 mn)  car nous devions prendre l'avion le lendemain matin.
 Logement très agréable  car près de la plage et des restaurants. Chambre calme, située en face des jardins. 
Accueil très chaleureux de la part de Maria.
Logement à recommander !

It's a good location. Supermarket, Trem and bus station reach to downtown and 3mins walk to nice beach. Maria's place is clean and comfortable and quiet. Her place has a small garden. Maria is kind and really helpful. I would like to recommend this place in Porto :)
Maria is very nice. We felt happy the whole stay. Her flat is very near the beach and a supermarket (Lidl). We enjoyed our stay so much and are thankful for having such a nice host.

Sem dúvidas foi a melhor estadia que já tive pelo AirBnB! Maria é uma pessoa incrível, faz sentir-nos como se estivéssemos em casa. E Pipoca, sua cadelinha, é muito fofa e educada. O quarto, que tem uma casa de banhos privada, é muito espaçoso e aconchegante, além de ter vista para um tranquilo jardim. Tudo estava muito limpo e organizado. A localização é fantástica! Muito próximo à praia e também ao metro, além de ter mercados, restaurantes e todo tipo de comércio logo à porta. Diante disso, recomendo fortemente que você escolha a casa da Maria para a sua próxima estadia em Matosinhos, não irá arrepender-se.

I had a nice stay at Maria's apartment with warm welcome. The room is even better than she described, clean, neat and convenient. I have my own bathroom as well. The apartment is close the beach with a walking distance of 3 mins. Downstairs of her apartment is the ATM and Lidl(supermarket) and the metro is only 1 mins walking. I enjoyed the stay there and would highly recommend it!

We had a great visit. Maria was v welcoming. The location of the flat is perfect for beach, shops and in our case local friends. The setup was not quite what we were expecting. This is a bedroom with an ensuite, rather than what I imagined a suite to be. The bed was comfortable but small. The accommodation was immaculate and comfortable. Was great as a base for our weekend away and we would come again. Thank you Maria.

Lo mejor de Oporto y Matosinhos es sin duda la casa de María. Todo muy limpio y muy buen olor, muy atenta con nosotros para todo y la casa es perfecta perfecta. ¡Un 10 a todo! Al lado de la playa y a 1 minuto del metro para ir al centro de Oporto. Volvemos a casa muy felices de haber estado allí. La mejor experiencia Airbnb o de hotel que hemos tenido.

Amazing Stay at Maria's place. 
Maria is really welcoming nice and friendly.  She is really helpful and easygoing. She was almost acting like a mum and even cooking for me sometimes.
The room is really nice big size with en suite bathroom. 
You can use everything in the apartment including washing machine.
It is really good located 2 min from the beach and 2 min from the metro Matosinhos Sul. Everything close by Shop restaurant ...
Thank

Maria is a cordial and generous person. The room and bath are comfortable and clean, and the location is excellent, 2 blocks from the beach and 1-1/2 blocks from the subway. It was very helpful to be able to use the kitchen and the washing machine.

Maria is a great host: gentle, generous, helpful and value personal privacy. She speaks English and a little bit of Italian.
The private room has a lot of comforts, a private bathroom, and a lot of space. You can also use her kitchen or her wash-machine if needed.
The place is near the metro-train station and a two minutes away from the beach.
This wasn't the first time in Porto but surely the best experience ever had there! Hope to be Maria's guest again next year!

A Maria é uma óptima anfitriã: amável, generosa, disponível e ao mesmo tempo discreta. Ela fala bem inglês e um bocado de italiano. O quarto è muito espaçoso, limpo e aconchegante e tem todo do que uma pessoa precisa: televisão, wifi, roupa de cama em quantidade, talheres etc. Maria disponibiliza também a cozinha para comer e lavar a roupa. A casa està perto do metro, da praia, de un grande supermercado, de muitos bons restaurantes e do Parque da (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza a melhor estadia que tive em Portugal: senti-me come se estiver em casa. Recomendo fortemente 

Maria è una ottima padrona di casa: cordiale, generosa, disponibile e allo stesso tempo discreta. Parla bene inglese ed un po' di italiano. La stanza è molto spaziosa, pulita e accogliente ed ha tutto quello di cui un ospite ha bisogno: televisore, wifi, biancheria, posate etc. Maria mette a disposizione anche la sua cucina per cucinare e fare il bucato. L'appartamento è vicinissimo alla metro, alla spiaggia, ad un grande supermercato, al Parque da Cidade e ci sono ottimi ristoranti nei dintorni. Sicuramente la migliore permanenza in Oporto che abbia mai avuto: mi sono sentito a casa. Lo consiglio senza dubbio.

Maria was a great hostess, she show us around the day we arrived and was always trying her best to give us tips about what to see and what food to try. The bedroom with our own bathroom was nice and clean and we had total privacy. Very well equiped kitchen was usefull as was Lidl across the street. The beach is really close and the metro station to the city center as well. I can 100 % recommend this !

Die Beschreibung der Unterkunft von Maria war genau so wie es angegeben wurde.
Sie war sehr hilfsbereit in jeder Hinsicht.
Für den Preis kann man nicht meckern und wir können es nur weiter empfehlen.

Maria war eine super Gastgeberin. Da wir sehr früh ankamen aber sie noch Gäste da hatte konnten wir unsere Koffer bei ihr ablegen und sind dann losgezogen. Das Zimmer ist zwar klein aber vollkommen ausreichend. Besonders angenehm ist das eigene Bad. Maria hatte uns alles gezeigt und uns immer ihre Hilfe angeboten. Super Aufenthalt, immer wieder gerne.
Maria was an absolutely great hostess! She made us feel so welcome, and went above and beyond to make sure we were happy.

Maria was very, very spontanious and gave me a warm welcome,although  I asked for the stay in the night before. When I entered the flat, I really "arrived". Everything was so convivial and hearty that I felt like home. Maria provided fruits and water in the room, showed me the area and was supportive in every way!
Pipoca, the little dog, is a cute thing, never awkward or loud. 

The room has its own bath and toilette- it is as stated. Everything absolutely clean, bed very comfortable and spacey for two. You go 2 min to the beach and 2 min to the Metro. In 30 min you are in the middle of porto- it's really easy to get there. Hop on/ Hop off.
Everything you need is arriveable in less than 5 min Walking.

For me, there were no negative experiences, if you have the opportunity to stay at Marias- do it! I highly recommend her room and will come back!

The room in Maria's apartment is very spacious and offers privacy. Maria is a very kind and communicative host, always ready to offer help if you need something. 
The apartment is well located in Matosinhos, near from the beach as well as the metro-stop Matosinhos Sul. If you like to stay in a clean, proper place for an affordable price with a friendly host, then Maria's offer is a good choice for you.
Maria is a very sweet and likeable host. Was very welcoming and available! Thank you, Maria!

Maria is a great host and my wife and son stayed for 3 nights. All the help was offered by Maria and beach is next to her apartment. After knowing that my wife is a vegetarian Maria made available plenty of fruits during entire stay. It was a pleasure staying with Maria. Looking forward to next stay with Maria in near future.

Maria's place was welcoming and had everything needed for a comfortable stay in Porto. 2 minutes from the beach, the metro, bus-stops and local supermarkets. The place is in a quiet location and has excellent Wi-Fi. Recommended

The room was really very comfortable, nice and cozy, with private bathroom. Maria is a very nice and friendly person and has an adorable dog. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone who wants to stay near the beach (less than 500 m to the ocean) but at the same time to have an easy access to the city (the apartment is located close to the metro station).
Nice place 5min to the beach, close to the metro and bus station. Bedroom with its own bathroom clean and light
Friendly, comfortable and a great location in Matosinhos. ..couldn't have asked for more!
le couchage est petit et la salle de bains aurait besoin de quelques améliorations.

Die Unterkunft ist genauso wie oben beschrieben. Maria ist eine sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Ein Supermarkt befindet sich gleich vor der Tür und der Strand ist nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt. Nur zu empfehlen!

Very close to the beach and public transport to the centre takes around 30 minutes and only costs €1.55. Maria was very friendly and provided breakfast upon arrival. Would definitely recommend. Maria does not speak English but does speak French and obviously Portuguese.

Tutto perfetto. Ottimo per raggiungere sia la spiaggia a piedi sia il centro di Porto con la metro a pochi metri dall'alloggio. Bellissima accoglienza da parte di Maria. Ci ha permesso di usare la lavatrice, la cucina e parcheggiare la moto in garage. A pochi passi dall'appartamento ci sono tanti locali dove mangiare pesce alla grigia a prezzi bassi (20 € in due da scoppiare). Bagno in camera dotato di tutto il necessario. Pulizia esemplare.
Excelente anfitriã e óptimas instalações numa localização muito boa, sobretudo para quem procura estar a dois passos do mar. Ambiente familiar, mas com toda a privacidade. Super recomendado!

Maria est accueillante, sympathique mais discrète. Elle parle français. L' appartement, tres bien tenu,  est très calme et très bien placé : pres de la plage, du metro et de nombreuses lignes de bus. Les restaurants ( pour tous les budgets)  les patisseries et meme les superettes sont tres nombreux tout autour  Pour mon arrivee Maria avait prepare un plateau avec de l' eau et des documents touristique. Je reviendrai sans problème  et j' en recommande la réservation.

Ich habe das Zimmer bei Maria als Basis für Surfen und Sprachunterricht gebucht, das hat hervorragend geklappt - nah am Strand und gut angebunden, um ins Zentrum von Porto zu fahren. Bei Maria hat ich viel Platz, ein eigenes Bad und konnte ihre kleine Küche mit benutzen, würde ich definitiv wieder buchen.
Personne très accueillante
Thanks Maria - supper stay !! ;);)
Maria is a really kind host and will try everything to make you comfortable in her cozy apartment. The flat was clean, well-located near the beach and nice restaurants.

Un lugar tranquilo y agradable en el que descansar. Cercano a la playa y bien comunicado con Oporto vía metro (a la puerta de casa). La zona ofrece un montón de restaurantes y servicios. Recomendable.

Maria is an excellent host!She is a beautiful person that makes you feel at home!I enjoyed staying for 6 weeks at her house very much and we spent a nice time tohether too! The location is really nice-next to the metro station and transport to Porto is really easy. Matosinhos is a beautiful place too, the house is next to the sea(and the surfing schools!)I will visit again for sure!
Maria has been super nice and accommodating.  The room and bathroom were clean and the neighborhood was quite and well connected. Was a great stay.
Tudo perfeito.  Ideal para uma boa noite de descanso.

María es un encanto, super amable y atenta. No nos ha faltado de nada porque Maria cuida mucho los detalles. La habitación es espaciosa y limpia con baño privado. La zona está bien porque tienes el metro y la playa muy cerca y hay calles de aparcamiento gratuito además del McDonald's y el LIDL justo en frente. ¡Muy recomendable!
Chambre conforme aux indications du site.

Maria was a great host and her place looks even nicer than the photos. The apartment is really close to the beach with many restaurants and supermarket around, takes around 30mins to the center. We enjoyed our stay there! :)
nice place near atlantic ocean, also near my work place!
Maria was extremely helpful. The room and bathroom was spacious and the building was very close to the beach. We had a wonderful stay and would recommend the room!!

Bardzo goraco polecamy.Swietna lokalizacja,pokoj duzy I czysty.Kiedy przyjechslismy pozno w nocy Maria poczestowala nas kolacja.Jej rady byly bardzo pomocne przy zwiedzaniu miasta I okolicy.Dodatkowo zabrala nas na piekna wycieczke Porto noca.Maria ma swietne podejscie do dzieci I doskonale przygotowala pokoj na przyjazd naszej piecioletniej corki.Caly czas starala sie umilic jej pobyt.Jeszcze raz dziekujemy I do zobaczenia.

We loved staying at Maria's!  Everything was very clean and we were provided with everything we needed.
The location was perfect for us as we were attending Primavera Sound music festival a few minutes  away but even if we hadn't we would recommend Matosinhos, it is a lovely area.
Mujer muy amable.
Great position in Matasinhos. Close to nice beach and the tram stops close by. Excellent value for money.
Ótima anfitriã!

Maria è una persona solare, gentilissima e disponibilissima, l’appartamento è accogliente e molto pulito. Vicinissima al mare e ad ogni tipo di servizio. La gente è cordiale e calorosa. Ottima esperienza.
Super hébergement près de la plage. Maria est très accueillante et disponible lors du séjour. Nous la recommandons.

Je vous recommande vivement Maria, Vous trouverez chez elle un accueil et une gentillesse comme il en est rare. Elle met tout en œuvre pour que votre séjour se passe du mieux que possible. Chambre très spacieuse, très propre et avec tout le confort.
Vous ne pouvez que être conquis, tant par le lieu ainsi que la personne qui vous accueille. Plage commerces , transports et restaurations a proximités à pied, se qui est un grand plus quand on ne souhaite  pas trop se déplacer en voiture.
c'est avec un grand plaisir que je reviendrais chez Maria.

Beautiful and very nice place to stay, near beach with good comunication.
100% recomend.
I had a few days work and this was a great place to stay. Right next to the metro and the beach. The room is a good size and very comfortable. Maria is lovely and made me feel very welcome. :-)

One of the best places we had on our jurney. Maria is a perfect host an very supportive. The room is absolutely clean, modern and in perfect shape. The location is a vibrant place in the outskirts of Porto. Lots of excellents restaurants and just 150m to the beach. We would love to come to this place and Maria once again.

name: Belle Époque Apartments
summary: The Belle Époque Apartments are located in one of the most beautiful architectural examples of Art Nouveau, in one of the most central streets of the city, in the heart of the historic city center of Porto, dated from 1890. Completely refurbished (01/2015).
space: Os Belle Époque - Tourist Apartments  localizam-se num dos mais belos exemplares arquitetónicos  de Arte Nova, numa das ruas mais centrais da cidade, no coração do centro histórico da cidade do Porto datado de 1890.  Este edifício foi sujeito a um completo restauro, a sua total  remodelação teve fim no inicio do ano de 2015, no seu interior  existem hoje seis confortáveis apartamentos com todo o conforto contemporâneo mantendo a traça e elegância da sua época , que se destinam a alojamento turístico. Todos os apartamentos  têm vista cidade e uma configuração comum, um quarto (duplo ou twin ), sala de estar com kitchenette, casa de banho privada completa, Tvs de ecrã plano, wifi grátis, roupas de cama, roupas de banho, produtos de higiene.  Os check in realizam-se das 15h ás 00h (com informação turística ) check out até ás 12h. Os hospedes podem contar com transporte aeroporto/apartamento com um custo extra.

Completely refurbished (01/2015). host.host_about: Porto | Tourism | Winemaking

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Nell'alloggio siamo stati molto bene, e' accogliente e gli spazi sono organizzati benissimo, si trova in pieno centro ed e' strategico per visitare Porto. Luis e' stato perfetto, ci ha dato tutte le informazioni necessarie per la nostra breve visita.
Great location and amazing apartment.
Apartamento magnifico por su gran ubicacion, es tal cual las fotos. 100 x 100 recomendable

The pictures are not reflecting how well the apartment is decorated with taste. The furnitures and decorations are very well chosen and make the apartment really charming. A local surprise was waiting us in a bottle with two glasses, that was very unexpected and very romantic. Excellent idea! The apartment is centrally located and the Luis was here to explain everything when we arrived. 
The only thing to improve is the quality of the mattress, be careful if your back is sensible, this could make you suffer a bit until it's changed. 
Aside this, I totally recommend this place!
Perfecto en todo

I was received with open arms and kindness. Luis was amazing from start to finish. A happy guy with a lot of pride in the apartment. As for the apartment, it was incredibly elegant, clean, quiet and bigger than what it seems in the photos. Incredible host with amazing spirit and beautiful apartment. Recommended ;)
Super clean and convenient place! Much like a hotel and right in the centre of town.
Very cool place and excellent location, highly recommended!
Appartement avec une excellente situation dans la ville. Décoration de goût. Néanmoins bruyant. Hôtes très réactifs.

Espectacular, la ubicación es inigualable, cerca a todo caminando, la atención de Luis fue excelente, estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y nos indicó como llegar a los sitios más importantes, el apartamento es muy cómodo!!
Lovely little place. Would recommend
Great experience in the apartment! Perfect location, clean, beautiful and good price. Amazing welcome from the host (Luis)! I 100%  suggest to spend here some days to visit the city.

Central, tiny and perfect for a short staying. 2 things to know: the street in front of the apartment is a big road with cars passing at all times. The traffic is not crazy but those sensitive to it may want to know it. Wood flooring in the whole building, therefore, it is very easy to hear creaking from the next and upper apartments at night. This might be a common issue in several old buildings such as the one where the apartment is located. I had a good staying overall.

Luis has been a wondeful host and gave us many tips about the life in Porto (restaurants, visits...). The place is perfectly located, you can go almost everywhere just by walking. I recommend Luis and his place ;) .
Great place and nice hosts
Lo que mas destacaria de este alojamiento seria la ubicación. Es totalmente igual que como se ve en fotos. Muy agradable.
El piso es inmejorable, con una ubicación perfecta para disfrutar de la ciudad
Very well located and nicely decorated, i highly recommand Luis' place
La verdad ha sido mi mejor experiencia en AirBnb!!! Súper host! Amable, recomendable, súper actitud, gran servicio!!!!

name: Idyllic Sanctuary in Mosman Village
summary: With private leafy gardens & set in the heart of Mosman's cosmopolitan cafe strip, this charming terrace provides an idyllic sanctuary. A quick stroll to shops, restaurants, parks, walking trails, zoo, cinema & beaches + 10min bus ride to Sydney CBD.
space: Layout Upstairs there are 2 very large double bedrooms, each room currently has a queen size bed in it and a balcony off it. One also has an adjoining sunroom. There is also a very large bathroom with double vanity, spa bath and separate shower. Downstairs, is a 3rd bedroom which is very small (single bed only) but has its own small adjoining bathroom with a toilet and hand basin. There is also an open plan kitchen and dining area, which flows through to the living room, which again flows out via French doors to the terrace and garden courtyard. Re parking, There is also unlimited street parking directly outside the house (one of the few streets in Mosman where you can find this) but it is highly coveted so you need to be quick to get it! There is plenty of street parking in nearby streets, however it is mostly for limited time frames eg 2hrs during the day.
description: With private leafy gardens & set in the heart of Mosman's cosmopolitan cafe strip, this charming terrace provides an idyllic sanctuary. A quick stroll to shops, restaurants, parks, walking trails, zoo, cinema & beaches + 10min bus ride to Sydney CBD. Layout Upstairs there are 2 very large double bedrooms, each room currently has a queen size bed in it and a balcony off it. One also has an adjoining sunroom. There is also a very large bathroom with double vanity, spa bath and separate shower. Downstairs, is a 3rd bedroom which is very small (single bed only) but has its own small adjoining bathroom with a toilet and hand basin. There is also an open plan kitchen and dining area, which flows through to the living room, which again flows out via French doors to the terrace and garden courtyard. Re parking, There is also unlimited street parking directly outside the house (one of the few streets in Mosman where you can find this) but it is highly coveted so you need to be quick to get it!
notes: Please note that Wifi is restricted. It is fine for checking emails etc but will run out quickly if you download movies, games etc. Mosman Library is a 2 min walk away if guests wish to use the computers, internet etc provided by them.
house_rules: PARTIES - No large parties without owners prior consent. RUBBISH - Guests must put all rubbish and left over food products in the outside bins on check out. GARBAGE BINS On Check-out, guests must take the outside bins out onto the street and leave them near the driveway, ready for council collection. Please note that I will need to withhold a portion of deposit to pay for a private rubbish collection if this is not done.

host.host_about:
I live in Mosman and love the vibe and location of this gorgeous Sydney suburb. I enjoy the cosmopolitan lifestyle Mosman offers with its vast array of boutique shops, restaurants and cafe's. With it's own beautiful Balmoral Beach, Taronga Zoo, local cinema, library, Mosman Markets, and an array of parks and waterside walking trails, I truly believe this location to be idyllic. Above all Mosman's close proximity to the city means I can be 'at the office' in 10 mins!

I love classical music and enjoy being around creative people. I think I have the perfect job in my capacity as Orchestra Manager of the Sydney Symphony Orchestra. I am lucky to be able to call the Sydney Opera House my place of work, and daily enjoy the vibrancy and excitement of this iconic Sydney venue along with it's sublime location on Bennelong Point.

In addition to my work with the orchestra, I run my own business which specialises in providing classical musicians, ensembles, orchestras, singers and entertainment for a large variety of public and private events. These include weddings, corporate events, TV commercials, concerts, recordings, cruise ships etc

I love travel and have a particular interest in European countries, history and cultures. I also enjoy meeting people, making friends, exchanging stories and generally interacting with others.

I am really excited by the unique travel experience that Air B&B makes possible for travelers, and look forward to welcoming Air B&B guests to Sydney and to my beautiful home.
Rachel

reviews.comments:
We loved staying at this home the night before and night of our wedding- it was spacious, well appointed and beautiful! The host Rachel goes out of her way to help you and ensure you have everything you need.

Would highly recommend- thanks!

We had a wonderful month at the Idyllic Sanctuary on moving to Sydney. Stayed there with my wife and two young children who had a great time.

Accommodation was as advertised and host was easily contactable and very accommodating. Location is extremely convenient for everything from shops to public transport to parks.

The third room provides options for an extra person but it is significantly smaller than the two main rooms which are very spacious and have built in cupboards.

Our stay at Rachels home was everything the pictures show.We found it to be very spacious and secluded and so much to explore within walking distance.Or many busses only 5 minutes walk to take you to the city.
We and our teenage girls loved it.

Rachel met me on the morning of my arrival and showed me round the house.  The house was exactly as described, the beds were very comfortable and everything was of a high quality.  I preferred living in Mosman to the centre of Sydney.  It has a lovely community feeling but the city is easily accessible by bus or ferry.  We ate breakfast and dinner within a very short distance of the house and there was a large range of places to choose from, all providing excellent food.  Balmoral beach was also a short walk away which I think is the most perfect beach in Sydney.
A truly wonderful experience. The home is so lovely and in a fantastic location. Rachel is a great host and very helpful and attentive. Would recommend staying here to anyone.
Beautiful home and Rachel was an excellent host.

Rachel met us at the property with a warm welcome. We appreciated the milk in the fridge for a cup of tea - always great to have after a day of travel! The house was as advertised- spacious and in a great location. We much preferred staying in Mosman to the city as it gave us a different part of Sydney to experience. Ferries from Mosman Bay were easy to use and so beautiful, Balmoral Beach was so close by I think we went there every day! Very enjoyable stay.

We had an absolutely amazing time at this beautiful home.  It really is a sanctuary.  Beautiful linen, big bath, lovely patios and big old fashioned verandahs with comfy lounges you can curl up in and read with leafy surrounds.  Shops with a village atmosphere and ***** dining.  Balmoral beach and sea pool.  A 10 minute bus ride to town.  Trully the best place to stay in all of Sydney with a great host!

Rachel's home was beautiful. We rented the place to get ready for our wedding and it was perfect. 
Rachel was easy to communicate with and her directions were clear and easy to follow.
The house was walking distance to shops and coffee. Thanks for having us Rachel!
We had a great stay at Mosman, beautiful house, great location, perfect. Thank you, will come again.

Rachels place was perfect for accommodating various family members who came to Sydney for my daughters wedding. The bridal party readied themselves there and the decor enhanced the vibe. Locale handy although we did not really do any touristy things. Thanks Rachel for the beautiful flowers.

Good location, easy to find, just 20min driving to the rocks, the house is clean and comfortable, Rachel always give me very clear and detail answer to all my questions, all my friends enjoy staying in Rachel's house very much, thanks a lot for everything you do for us

Rachel could not have been more helpful , flexible and genuine in wanting us to have the best time while we stayed at her lovely house .In the lead up to our visit lots of questions were answered and help offered to make us feel very welcome . The house is perfect!  Lots of space, everything we needed, inside /outside spaces to give us lots of choice and the most comfy beds possible! We will all be back and will highly recommend it to everyone . We did the Mossman -Manly walk (Trail we  could walk to) . Up to Freshwater on a bus caught 5 min walk away . We walked to Balmoral beach ( can get a bus) .We walked to the ferry ( 20min )  Everything we needed was close by and easy . Thanks Rachel for everything .

Such a beautiful house, perfect for my pre-wedding photos. 
Had everything we needed to make our stay lovely, stress free and easy. Would recommend the house to anyone looking to stay in the area.

Although I did not meet Rachel in person, she was a fantastic host and great communicator, who gave excellent directions and ensured that we found her property easily.  Keys were left as agreed and any questions were answered quickly.  We found the property was light filled, airy, beautiful and as pictured, including special touches like fresh roses on the dining room table.  The beds were comfortable and french provincial kitchen well equipped.  My daughter especially liked playing the piano.  The Mosman location was a treat as it was only a quick 800m walk to shops, including a supermarket and great take-away food / restaurants nearby were plentiful.  The beach at Balmoral (3 minute drive or 20 minute walk) was gorgeous, a short drive (2 minute) to Mosman Wharf had us on the ferry into Circular Quay with those amazing harbour views and Taronga Zoo was a 3 minute drive away too.   My husband travels to Sydney CBD frequently for work so I chose Rachels property in Mosman so he could experience Sydney like a local and how he has never seen it before.   Now he tells me he could live there!   Rachel's place ticked all our boxes for a family road trip to Sydney with two, almost teenage children in tow.  I would definitely recommend to others

Beautifully furnished, spacious and well equipped house within easy walking distance of the stylish shopping and eating amenities of Mosman village. Well placed for ferry and bus transport to Sydney Harbour area.

Although Rachel was not able to meet us, she answered any questions w had very fully and helpfully by text message.

Great experience. Rachel sent detailed instructions for finding and getting access to the flat. The flat was very clean and comfortable. Easy 2 minutes walk to military rd with lots of shops and cafes or a 15 minute walk to the ferry. Great place I'll definitely recommend
Rachel made the entire process so easy! It was such a beautiful place and the perfect location to get ready before my wedding. Thank you!

Rachel was very easy deal to with, nothing was a problem.  Very accommodating in our arrival time and departure.  House is in a fantastic location, very close to everything you could need.  The beds are very comfortable, was a great place to base ourselves with our two small children.  We would definitely stay there again.

My husband and I and two friends stayed in this lovely home for 9 days.  Its a very comfortable space, with 2 large bedrooms upstairs, both having lots of light, a full and spacious bathroom and there is a small additional room downstairs (more a small office) that can be used as a third bedroom.  One of our group was older and had trouble with stairs so she stayed in this room which Rachel had made up with a single bed.  This room also has a toilet with sink off it so very convenient.  The kitchen is well supplied with cooking utensils, dishes, pots and pans so cooking was quite easy.  We even hosted a dinner one evening for our friends' aunt who lives here in Sydney.  About a 3 block walk from the house is Military Road, the main road in Mosman.  It is quite a busy street and this is where you would catch a bus down to the Mosman Wharf to catch a ferry into Circular Quay.  All very convenient and smooth connections, both going and returning home, as the bus is waiting for you when the ferry comes back to the wharf.  We enjoyed sitting on the back veranda having a glass of wine in the evening.  There is a deli close by, an IGA  supermarket and farmer type market as well, plus a bottle shop, all close walking distance.   We were most pleased with our stay here and would definitely recommend this home as your base in the city.

Staying in Mosman at this stunning property really set us up for our stay in Australia.  We only stayed 3 nights and wished it could have been for longer. Photos were exactly as shown, it was lovely and cool in a funky suburb where you get to hang out with the locals. Found some great cafes round the corner for breakfast and lunch. Nearby Balmoral Beach was a great walk and well worth a visit as was the walk to Taronga Zoo for magnificent skyline views. Having a parking area for our 4x4 was a bonus and the outside seating areas were great. Just wish we had stayed longer to fully appreciate all that the property had to offer. Bedrooms lovely and airy with access to the verandah and sofas. Bathroom huge and loads of towels. Bedding luxurious and the beds were some of the comfiest ever ! Great experience and the memories of Mosman will stay with us. Thank you for making our first few nights in Sydney so perfect ! Lex and family.

Rachel gave us excellent instructions on how to find her home and upon arrival we couldn't have wished for anything more.

 The beds were outrageously comfortable, the neighbourhood was quiet with a village like atmosphere and the house itself was well equipped with all the things one needs to make a visit memorable.... and then there was the spa bath!!

Rachel, has been very helpful and easy to deal with. The house is gorgeous and described accurately, but is even better in reality than the photos. Every thing we might need is there, Rachel even had a beautiful vase of enormous roses on the table for us, very welcoming. Location is great, handy to shops, transport and Balmorel beach. I would highly recommend Rachel's house to everyone.

The house was great. Very roomy considering there are just 2 proper bedrooms.  The decor was beautiful, the place was clean and the beds were very comfy. Plenty of crockery and cutlery, and lots of bath towels. Good location for reaching city and the Northern Beaches. It was a pleasure staying there.

We did not meet the host but she did text to see how things were and if we had any problems.

The neighbourhood was residential and quiet

Rachel was super! Everything was found as described and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at her lovely house in Mossman! It was perfect for us as we had a wedding to attend at Balmoral Beach which is not too far away.

Beautiful location , beautiful house. 
Thank you Rachel.

The villa was exactly as advertised and very comfortable, clean tidy and well located.
The check in instructions were very helpful as were the brochures and local information

Architecturally this is a fabulous building and well located for Mosman. Rachel provided excellent instructions on accessing the property. Unfortunately we did not meet Rachel in person during our stay.

The house was easy to find with the instructions we were given. It was true to the images displayed. The kitchen was well equiped and the house was very central to everything we required such as public transport, shops, restaurants and a local beach. There was an art gallery and large oval at the end of the street. The bedding was of a high standard.
Absolutely beautiful abode in a great little neighbourhood. Very clean and comfortable, can't fault it.

We have been staying all around the world with air BnB for years and this is one of the best. Homely, light, breezy. Exceptional facilities. Beautiful kitchen. Close to parks, cafes, groceries, public transport. So family friendly. We can't wait to stay here again.

We loved staying for a few days at Rachel's exquisite home.  It is in such a great location, with a excellent providore up the road, and a 3 minute walk to the Military Road to catch a 15 minute bus ride into the CBD.  The house was clean and tidy and spacious for 5 of us. Rachel was very helpful, especially in giving directions and quick in her replies.

Rachel's home was certainly "Idyllic". 4 of us were accommodated most comfortably across the two large bedrooms upstairs and one single downstairs. The walking proximity to Military Road shops and laneway cafe's was very convenient. We even popped in to the free public Mosman Art Gallery at the end of the street. We chose Rachel's home for its location - close to the Georges Head venue of a family wedding, accessible to the City and easy driving to and from the airport. We had a car, so the off street parking was welcome - parking on the street was at a premium. The home was represented accurately in all photo's and the description. I also enjoyed tickling the ivories of the baby grand! Although we didn't meet Rachel, she was a great communicator and all the arrangements she made for our arrival and during the stay went off without a hitch. Thanks. We would choose this place again if we find ourselves on the North side of Sydney.

We are just back from our two week vacation in NSW. We had the good fortune to run across Rachels gorgeous home on Air bnb. 
This place was amazing.  We were here visiting relatives and sight seeing from the USA.  Its wonderful to hear the kookaburras right in the city and all the beautiful birds. This place is like a garden oasis. Rachel was so lovely and gave us all the information we needed to make  this trip perfect. Our family of four was very comfortable and we felt very at home here. My daughter is studying music and played Rachels gorgeous piano while we were there which was an added plus.  This home is in the most perfect place. Military road is two minutes walking distance from the house and there are plenty of buses if you do not have a car. We parked on the street because we had a very large mini van and it was just easier. Plenty of parking in the surrounding streets if you need to but there is a private garage there as well for your use. 
 There are wonderful cafe's everywhere and you are very close to Raglan street which takes you down to Balmoral beach. 
I cannot say enough wonderful things about this home but my kids and husband and I were sad to leave our home away from home. Thank you so much Rachel for sharing your lovely place with us. Hopefully we will be back again.

This is a great house in a fantastic location in Mosman. The rooms upstairs are lovely old bedrooms with timber floors and spacious high ceilings. So close to cafes and everything you need on Military Rd. Parking was easy and convenient too! Thanks Rachel for a lovely stay.

We had a truly beautiful stay!!!
It felt like.... home away from home!!! 
Loved it!! Will definitely be back!!
Our stay at Rachel's Mosman home was great.  The location is ideal and the home has a ton of character.  The kitchen is modern.
What a beautiful house ! We didn't want to leave . Great location and looks excatly As the pictures . Highly reccomend :)

I rented this property for several special guests in Australia on business. Rachel was an ideal host and extremely hospitable to us. 

The property is a elegant modern home with a beautiful decor. We were 15 minutes from the centre of Sydney and enjoyed the secluded nature of this property. Only 15 minutes from the beautiful Taronga Zoo and a local Beach. 

The stunning environment that was well heated on cold days but bright and warm on the sunny days was a great bonus as well as a gorgeous piano in the lounge room.

We would recommend this to any AirBnB users who want a special Sydney experience.

Rachel's house was perfect for us - it's just as  shown on the photographs and close to transport and shopping.  We were flying in early in the morning and Rachel was very accommodating allowing us to access the property early.  We were there for 9 nights in preparation for my daughter's wedding and it really felt like home from home.  We didn't  meet Rachel but did contact her a couple of times and she always respond quickly.
The house was very beautiful, and not too far from town. My family loved the style of the place. Only feedback would be cleaner sheets. Thanks a lot for sharing your home :)

The unit is pretty and had some nice conveniences. There was a lot of other conveniences in the kitchen that was so much better than a hotel. That was thoughtful. It looked bigger to me in the photos and fresher. Maybe more current photos would represent it better. It is located close to everything which was nice and the kitchen had everything we needed. The dishwater was great and it had plenty of nice extras needed to prepare a meal.....lThank You for that. It is a drafty place and there seemed to be a lot of noise of cars driving by.( seems the street has become a busy pass thru)there was lots of banging noises in the morning that we solved by putting towels over the doorway to stop that( one of the bedrooms has doors that lead to an semi exposed sitting area that was blowing a draft if the doors were closed it kept banging REALLY loud, after the towel was placed on top it stopped the constant open and closing of it. And one of the brass window closures was also banging all night from the breeze, I moved it to stop that but it woke us. I wanted to use the Jacuzzi tub but tried three times and the hot water ran out before it could be filled to level of jets.Maybe a bigger hot water tank might solve that. Bathroom was really good otherwise, quite gorgeous and towels were great. Liked the hand held shower head and shower was plenty of room. The beds weren't as large as I thought, I believe they were full size instead of Queen or King which I expected for the master suite. The bedding and Dooners as well as pillows were great. The chairs downstairs had blankets on them which seemed like a great touch. There was major rips and not much chair support left in them under the blankets( FYI ) all in all it was a nice stay. I just expected a bit more for the money paid. Slightly awkward floor plan. Wanted the four of us to chill out to watch a movie it just was laid out awkward downstairs. Just thought that area was bigger . Laundry was good, never used the drier. Dishwasher is a plus and it worked great.check in and out was seamless. The key in the door thing was weird. You had to leave the key in the door or you couldn't leave. This was awkward when we went for a walk and left kids at home we couldn't take keys with us because they could get out otherwise. Parking spot was good. Back yard looked nice but the fountain was full of old water that was green. Verandah was lovely. There are motion sensors in three of the rooms which felt a little weird to me when they went on but must be a security thing. I know we hadn't put the security on. Electricity didn't work in the bedrooms...

My family and I had a fantastic stay in Rachel's home. The house was beautiful and very clean. I chose this place because the photos looked amazing and it did not disappoint. I got ready for my wedding here and the house provided the perfect backdrop for our photos. 
The 2 main beds upstairs were large and comfortable. Very spacious bedrooms with lots of wardrobe space. The only draw back was that it didn't have enough curtains in one of the rooms so it became really bright and sunny early in the morning when we wanted to sleep in. The single bed downstairs was great. 
It was great having two toilets, one up stairs in the main bathroom and one downstairs in the laundry room next to the single room. That way we didn't have to go up and down the stairs for the toilet. 
Another draw back was that two of the steel chairs on the dining table were missing its seat cushion so I used the bar stool cushions but it may be time to replace them. Also, the 2 single sofa chair cushions were old and worn out. It was covered by a blanket so you couldn't tell, but when you sat on it, the cushion would slide off the sofa with you on it. 
We had everything that we needed like bath towels and extra blankets (the weather was cold during our stay). It was a 5 minute walk to the local shops and restaurants which was super handy. The garage provided was super handy too because street parking in Mosman fills up pretty quickly. 
I did not get to meet Rachel in person but we communicated via mobile phones. Thank you for allowing us to stay at your lovely home.

We had a beautiful stay at Rachel's place.
Everything about her place was of a very high standard.Highly recommended.
Lovely house, perfect area and great communication thank you

Rachel's house is lovely. We were a family of 5 in Sydney for my son's wedding at Balmoral and this spot was perfect for very easy access to Mosman shopping centre, buses to the city and Balmoral Beach. We parked the car and basically didn't use it again the entire weekend.
There is only one full bathroom however so if you don't like sharing then maybe not for you. We had no problem as it is a huge bathroom and there is another toilet in the laundry/3rd bedroom.
The house is spacious with lots of places to 'escape' for quiet time

This house is in a perfect location for cafes, shops and restaurants as well as wedding venues and ferry and buses to beach and city. While in a private courtyard the noise from the road was more than expected.
Rachel's place was central for us near shops oval, art gallery and public transport. It is well equipped and very comfortable.

Having travelled from the UK the house was a major disappointment in so many ways.  The cleanliness for a start particularly in the kitchen was quite disgusting, which probably is why we had visitors from lots of cockroaches each night!  The house had defiantly not been fumigated!  The third bedroom and ensuite bathroom should not be described as a third bedroom and the bathroom is very much a utility room with a sink and toilet.  The linen was put on the beds un-ironed and the towels were even presented to us with stains on.  The threadbare furniture in the lounge was a disgrace as was the debris in the garden.  Not an enjoyable experience at all, we couldn't wait to leave and it has defiantly put me off renting on Air B & B again.
Il faut y aller c est vraiment super
Beautiful home set in a wonderful location. Everything that you could ask for and so much more. Thank you Rachel for being a tremendous host.

Really quirky house to stay in and we enjoyed our stay. The pictures on Air bib reflected house very well. Unfortunately there wasn't a house manual there which would help visitors with knowledge of the area etc. We arrived early evening time and weren't sure what was around in the way of restaurants etc but we walked around and realised we were close to the centre of Mosman and there were plenty of good restaurants within walking distance although a lot were closed on Monday evening. The house has probably been painted internally fairly recently and generally everything was clean apart from the kitchen especially the chopping board, glasses and the cupboards which were pretty cluttered. Wifi is a problem as it ran out very quickly however we asked Rachel if it could be topped up which she arranged for us but that also soon ran out. Really good sized bedrooms and a very small bedroom downstairs but that was sufficient for one adult for a short stay. The road was very noisy especially in the early hours of the morning but the house only has single glazing and some lovely stained glass windows. The garden furniture was ok but large chair had broken leg and was resting on a brick. There was a washing machine, tumble drier and dishwasher so that was really useful. It was a 20 minute walk to the ferry terminal but there is a bus service too. Mosman is a really nice location

Rachel's place has loads of charm and character, very much like the photos. A pleasant surprise!
We stayed for 3 nights and found the beds very comfortable, the house close to restaurants, shops and public transport (bus and ferry). 
There is only one full bathroom, but 2 toilets and basins.
The kitchen appeared well appointed, however we didn't need to use it. There was evidence of cockroaches (as there is all over Sydney), perhaps regular pest control would be a suggestion to the host.
Unfortunately we didn't make into the lovely garden because of the incessant rain, but it had plenty of character as well.
I would definitely return if given the opportunity.
Our second stay at Rachel's house and hopefully not the last. Absolutely fantastic place with great amenities and a gracious host. Thanks Rachel.
Dear Rachel, We loved staying in your place, lovely house, great atmosphere and wonderful location .

This was our second stay at Rachel's place. The location of this property is brilliant. Right in the heart of affluent and central suburb Mosman, loads of things for kids to do close by - amazing pizza, oval, park, shops, public pool. Perfect. All you need is in walking distance. The accommodation itself is lovely and everything you could want for a family stay.
Beautiful home and very helpful host. Had all the things we needed over the weekend. Thank you
Rachel's house was perfect!! Great furnishings, very comfy beds and a brilliant location. Would definitely stay there again. Rachel was very friendly and helpful too!!
A lovely home full of character and great for our family trip.

Rachel's house is perfectly located in Mosman - close to shops, restaurants and transport. The house was exactly as in the pictures - very stylish, clean, light and airy. The beds were all very comfortable and all mod cons were available for use. Rachel was easy to communicate with and we would highly recommend staying here.

A lovely property in a great location - 1 block to Spit Junction with all the amenities, transport and shops.  Lovely strolling in Mosman shops and the Providores for high end deli, fruit, bread just around the corner.  Fitness First and the Pool also 1 block away.  The property is very comfortable and stylish.  Rachel is a great host.
Rachel's house is a fabulous house with plenty of room.  Near shopping and small cafe's.  Bus route was very close as well.
A very accommodating host.
A fabulous location and plenty of space for a small group or family. Lots of natural light and charm. Thanks Rachel!

The two upstairs bedrooms are large and well lit. Very comfortable. The third bedroom is more of a maid's quarters (with attached laundry room). If you plan to have a relative stay in that room, prepare for some feedback.

My only real issue with the home is the vehicle traffic. Do not understand how a narrow suburban road that is only 3 blocks long can support so much traffic starting at 6am, continuing to 10pm. Plus one day there were some early major deliveries to the facility across the street. [Not sure why this did not appear in other reviews. After my visit I rechecked the reviews. Traffic mentioned on page 3. Deeper than I usually look.]  Don't plan to sleep in.

Perhaps this was the price to pay for convenience to Mosman village. Walked there for breakfast, lunch, dinner, shopping, wandering. Very convenient. Very friendly.
Lovely house full of character, close to shops and amenities and bus route
Fantastic townhouse just off Mosman village, perfect launching pad to explore Sydney. Perfect accommodation, well presented and Rachel is very welcoming. This place is fantastic, highly recommended.
Nice home in good location.  Worth a visit.
Beautiful apartment that was very convenient to our family for a wedding nearby. Easy walk to shops nad wonderful calm house.

Great place in the leafy suburb of Mosman, short walk to really nice eateries, public transport etc.
House was great value, and Rachel a great host who answered questions promptly. Would definitely come back when next in Sydney, just so easy to access all that is north of the Harbour.

Rachel's place is an amazing house within a perfect location. It is situated within walking distance of most things and the house itself is amazing! 5 of us were very comfortable in the house for a long weekend.
Excellent location

The house is an old house in both good and bad, but we found it very comfortable and kids just loved having a garden to play in. Windows and balcony doors are a bit leaky, especially on stormy weather, but putting a piece of paper between the window will do the job. Public transportation was much better than expected, with M30 getting us fast to any place near the CBD. There are many grocery stores to pick from, and plenty of other small shops too. The square next to Mosman Council is quite lively on both mornings and evenings. Could've definitely stayed here longer!
Great location
Great location. Close to shops and restaurants. Short drive to beach and ferry terminal. House was nice, could do with a thorough clean.
Great stay in a lovely home and location. Rachel is a fab host.
Great location, very comfortable living and easy communication with the host. My girls loved hearing their Nanna play the piano

Mosman is a beautiful suburb.  From this location you can walk to Taronga Zoo, Middle Head, Chowder Bay, Balmoral Beach and the Spit.  It is close to many fine cafes and restaurants. Mosman also has excellent shopping.  Townhouse was in a quiet location close to Military Road.
A lovely house , close to amenities in Mosman. Well presented loads of character . I achel is a good host

We enjoyed our stay at Rachels home, however there were positives and negatives. Positives were the décor, the spacious bedrooms, the comfortable beds, the backyard area and the location. Although I didn’t get to meet Rachel, she seems very friendly. 

Overall, the cleanliness was unsatisfactory. The kitchen needed a good clean. The fridge interior, kitchen drawers and kitchen floor were all food stained. We had to wash all the unclean cutlery, glasses, pots, etc before using them. We also found dirty items in the dishwasher. We wanted to use the outside table for a group lunch but the large umbrella appeared to be broken and fixed or stuck in the corner.  

While the location is great to walk to restaurants, shops and down to Balmoral Beach, the noise of car traffic is very loud in the mornings. Difficult to sleep beyond 7am. The wifi did not work at all. We tried on many devices and nothing. Before we checked out, a broadband company arrived so hopefully the wifi will be ready for the next tenants.
Rachel's home is beautifully decorated and has a gorgeous outdoor sitting area. Walking distance from Mosman village cafes and restaurants.
Convenient location to shops. Taronga Zoo and Balmoral Beach are a short drive away. Rachel's pictures are an accurate depiction of the residence. Our family enjoyed our three night stay.

Lovely house in a great location but let down by a dirty kitchen including the fridge along with a cockroach problem all of which could have been sorted with proper cleaning before handover. The Wifi was very weak throughout the house.
Rachel's apartment was perfect for our stay in Mosman, it was very convenient for Mosman Village and had very easy transport links. We had a very happy stay in Rachel's apartment. Thank you

Rachel的房子很漂亮,很有艺术感,我们一家五个人入住,房间分配刚刚好,需要的生活用品很齐全,冰箱里还贴心地放了牛奶､鸡蛋､肉饼､各种酱料等等;客厅里有个大电视,我先生和儿子每晚可以看世界杯;我女儿很喜欢那架钢琴,每天都去弹奏,只是建议需要调音;冬夜挺冷,暖气让我们很舒适;街边的车位很充足,我们每天都能顺利找到车位;交通也很便利,到哪里都很快;只是卫生真的需要改进,很多角落不干净;我们入住期间碰上雨天,衣服一定要烘干,烘干机可以用但动力不足,每次洗完衣服都要分两次烘干｡最后,真的非常感谢Rachel提供这么好的房子,我女儿还说好喜欢,真舍不得离开呢!这是一个非常适合体验当地生活的好房子!
Rachel was great to communicate with. The house is very comfortable and has all you need. The beds and all linen are excellent quality. Pretty verandahs and a courtyard to enjoy. A great location!
A truly beautiful home set in the heart of Mosman. Flooded with beautiful light and lush decorations. Set in a great location not 2 minutes from cafes, shops and more.
Rachel is an amazing host, quick clear communication and a wonderful place to stay
Rachel’s place is big, spacious and incredibly nice. It has high end appliances and lovely nice big rooms. It also has wonderful gardens which would be terrific to enjoy in summer. Highly recommend.
Fantastic location + great host = wonderful stay..

Great location and European character!
Recommend!
Great location. Great home, but disappointing in cleanliness for the price.
Great place and great location!

i will write this opinion later
I'm to tired now

Rachel's house is so beautiful. the garden is sunlit and magical and the details of the home are wonderful. Some of the vintage furniture is aged but to me this only adds to the beauty of the house. The sofa,  beds, linens etc are fresh, clean and comfortable. If you appreciate a period house this place is a delight.

Five of us stayed here for a few nights. Overall the stay was nice and suited us perfectly. The architecture and furnishings had a classy feel and location was great. 
There were a few let-downs, though: we had to wash all plates and cutlery before use as they had food stains, pillows and linen were also stained and felt humid, some items in the fridge were way passed use-by date... If the cleanliness was up to scratch, this would be a top place to stay.
Beautiful home, comfortable , close location to park and restaurants , perfect for what we needed

Wonderful location,  but on an unexpectedly noisy street, so take ear plugs for sleeping! 
Stylish decor. Very welcoming host.
Rachel has a gorgeous home. It was the perfect spot to celebrate our wedding.

The house was beautiful. Very clean with lots of fresh bed linen and towels. The kitchen facilities were excellent and the house had lots of cooking essentials that I would not have expected. I would highly recommend a stay at this property
A beautiful home  in a great location. Easy to walk to shops and eateries.

name: Porto Leça Beach Flat in Matosinhos
space: Welcome to our apartment, near "Leça da Palmeira" city beach, that was recently renewed and it´s situated in Matosinhos Area/ Porto District: - 8 minutes walking to Leça beach;  - 20 minutes to Airport, by car; - 15/20/30 minutes to Porto downtown, by car/taxi, bus or metro, respectively (depending on traffic). The apartment overview is relaxing with lovely front and back gardens. There're also lots of shops around the apartment block (cafes, grocery and bakery stores, hairdresser and beautician, etc.) and the shopping mall with cinema and IKEA is about 2 km. You have great connections to O´Porto downtown from bus and taxi terminals near Leça Church (about 5/10 minutes walking from the fact) and from "Mercado" metro station (about 20-30 minutes walking from the flat).  Apartment w/ 1 car parking garage.
description: Welcome to our apartment, near "Leça da Palmeira" city beach, that was recently renewed and it´s situated in Matosinhos Area/ Porto District: - 8 minutes walking to Leça beach;  - 20 minutes to Airport, by car; - 15/20/30 minutes to Porto downtown, by car/taxi, bus or metro, respectively (depending on traffic). The apartment overview is relaxing with lovely front and back gardens. There're also lots of shops around the apartment block (cafes, grocery and bakery stores, hairdresser and beautician, etc.) and the shopping mall with cinema and IKEA is about 2 km. You have great connections to O´Porto downtown from bus and taxi terminals near Leça Church (about 5/10 minutes walking from the fact) and from "Mercado" metro station (about (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes walking from the flat).  Apartment w/ 1 car parking garage. There is always some assistant available to give you the keys and explain you the basic things about the apartment and the surrounding space. The apartment is
neighborhood_overview: Why is "Leça da Palmeira" city magic for us? Find for yourself... Take a walk in Leça see front, from Marina to the Light House. Have a drink in "Casa de Chá" (Tea House). Bring your kids to the salty swimming pool in "Leça" beach - Siza Vieria well-know portuguese architect works, born in Matosinhos. Great beaches for surf pratice or experience diving or sailing with "Leça" Marina instructors. Learn how to ride a horse in "Leça" Equestrian Center.  Walk through the bridge to Matosinhos city and experience "Porto de Leixões" - the harbour comercial life. Go to "L' Kodac" Bar and enjoy the view on a couch near the sand and sea. Walk in "Quinta da Conceição" gardens - free entrance (with court tennis and swimming pool available for the summer time) or "Quinta de Santiago" gardens. Experience the night life in "Batô" boat disco. Enjoy familiar bar called "45" with friendly pets that will share the space with you (great fireplace in cold weather). Don´t miss "Bit Bar", a pub in the old tow
notes: We notice that (Hidden by Airbnb) maps is not precise when showing our address, in spite of we are giving the fully and correct one. We are sorry about that, but we still can´t understand why it happens.
transit: The easy way: taxi cabs (15/25 minutes by car, depending on traffic, from the airport to the apartment and to Porto downtown is about 15 minutes specially at night). Central bus station/Taxi central station next to the village church: about 5/10 minutes walking to the apartment (connections with Porto downtown). The nearest Metro Station is called "Mercado": about 20/30 minutes to the apartment (more distant, but connects Matosinhos Area with the main spots in Porto downtown in about 20-30 minutes maximum and also depending on traffic). Also, if you want to know better Matosinhos city you only have to cross over the bridge and we think you will have a nice surprise. The bridge is next to the apartment block.
access: There is always some assistant available to give you the keys and explain you the basic things about the apartment and the surrounding space.
interaction: The apartment is totally available for 1 booking at a time and no one will be in the apartment during your stay, but I am available for anything you might need. Me and my assistants are always able to give you extra tips if you need it. Enjoy!
house_rules: Guests should behave normally.  Make silence from 22:00h (10:00 p.m.) until 08:00h (8:00 a.m)  Pets are allowed.  Smoking only on the balcony

host.host_about: Hello! My name is João and I had recently renewed my apartment for renting. Hope you enjoy it!  I also love to travel and know how important is to be well installed and get the proper guidance. So feel free to get in touch for more information. I´m looking forward to share my traveling experiences and also pratice other languages.

reviews.comments: Apartamento muito confortável e bem localizado! Gostamos muito da estadia. Recomendamos.

O apartamento é muito bom, excedeu todas as nossas expectativas. Está muito bem equipado, limpo e tudo o que é preciso para que nos sintamos bem. Está bem situado, perto de transportes públicos e da praia. O casal João Rodrigues e esposa são muito simpáticos e atenciosos. Gostàmos muito de os ter conhecido e de ter ficado hospedados na sua casa.

Very good apartment and the host was very helpfull. 
Certainly would stay there again.
Thank you

Apartamento muito bonito, acomoda facilmente o número de pessoas a que se propõe e, no meu caso que fui somente com minha esposa, tinha espaço de sobra. É importante lembrar que fica em Matosinhos (uma cidade muito bonita) e tem fácil acesso a Porto pela proximidade ao Metro. A cozinha é completa e bem equipada e o anfitrião é muitíssimo gentil e prestativo, fez questão de nos buscar na estação de trem quando chegamos e nos levar ao aeroporto no dia em que saímos. Recomendo!

Joäo est un super hôte, très accueillant. L'appartement est très agréable, bien équipé(draps, serviettes de bain, savon, essuies de cuisine) et chauffé, la literie des 3 chambres parfaite. Il est situé à 10' d'une plage et 30' du centre de Porto en métro. Nous vous conseillons le restaurant espagnol tout près de la tour (à côté): les grillades de poissons sont délicieuses....Excellent séjour, dommage que la météo ne fût pas au beau fixe!

Joao was a great host. The appartment was really clean and spacious. He drived us to the aiport and gave us a small city guidance. We had a nice stay in Porto and would really recommend his appartment. Thiemo & Kristin

Appart de qualité supérieur à tout point de vue. Tellement grand qu'on s'y perd un peu au début ! Décor personnalisé avec des meubles antiques, des souvenirs de voyage, des oeuvres d'art... Deux balcons mais il faut aller à la mer pour le coucher du soleil, ça en vaut la peine.
Merci Joao

Mr. João apartments are absolutely special, elegant place equipped with delicate taste. There is antique furniture as well as a lot of charming little things, original pictures within your possession. You will feel yourself better than in the best hotels and like at home at the same time.

The apartments locate not far from the ocean coast. It takes just 5 minutes by slow walk to come to the ocean to enjoy its breeze, to run or make your morning exercises or to have a breakfast in one among many restaurants and cafes, situated over there.

The place is also situated not far from the nearest metro station – you just have to cross the bridge (10 min by walk). But it is rather a pleaser than the obligation because the view from the bridge is really nice. It takes nearly 35 minutes to come to the center of Porto by metro. You also find bus stations and can take a bus to the center of Porto or any other place that you need. Taking into consideration than there are night buses in Porto, it is not a problem to spend a night in the city and come back by bus when ever you want without taxi. In the case if you don’t  want to go to Porto but have a fun at a place, you will also find a lot of nice cafes, restaurants and pubs close to your apartment.

We enjoyed our holidays at Mr. João place! It was perfect! We are very grateful to his and his house for a kindness and hospitality!

My sister and I stayed at Joao's apartment May 15 - 18.  The home was lovely and exactly as represented on the website.  It is very well laid out - things like the laundry area were very functional since a drying rack is provided and you can leave the clothers open to sun and air without worrying they will blow away.  We appreciated the heaters as well as it was unseasonably cold in Porto.  Joao's furnishings and decor are lovely and the two coffe pots were a bonus since I drink tea and my sister drinks coffee.  We enjoyed the fruit provided and since we are Americans we loved having the DVDs in English to watch in the evening.   It is very convienient to the subway so we did not have to drive in Porto which was helpful and did not have to worry about the car as an underground parking space was provided.  Joao even took the extra step of providing a subway card for the first ride into Porto which makes the opening trip on a strange subway quite a bit easier.  Joao also went out of his way to find a cheese tour for us but  we ran out of time to take it.  We highly recommend a stay.

Joao was a great host! 
My family and I stayed at his apartment for a few days in May and it was a wonderful time. 
Although we arrived at about 1am at night Joao wanted to pick us up at the airport, but since we rented a car there he waited for us at the apartment. It was really late but he had the time to explain everything to us and even came back to give us more sheets and covers.
The whole apartment is really big and nicely decorated, the kitchen fully equiped and the view from the balcony is wonderful. We felt at home the very first second we came in. (I just loved the bed, it was so comfy i didn´t want to stand up every morning) 
In the fridge we found milk and juice and a big bowl of various friuts, that was such a nice gesture! 
Joao insisted that we could always call him if we have any questions, but there were so many leaflets and maps that it was hard to decide what to do first. 
Within a 3-5 minute walk you are at a beautyful beach and if you want to walk a bit more there is a very nice promenade with a lot of restaurants, bars and cafes. 
Also the next metro station is in walking- distance and the city centre is worth a visit (you have to do a wine tasting ;) ) 
If I ever come back to Porto, i would always come back to Joaos Apartment and I would recommend it to everyone who wants a great relaxing holiday :)

Condo très spacieux et confortable près de la plage et en retrait du centre historique de Porto (métro agréable pour se déplacer). João a été un excellent hôte pour nous. Revues, cartes et livres sur la régions à notre disposition nous ont permis de faire de belles visites. Commerçants sympathiques au rez-de-chaussé pour prendre café, boisson, fruits et légumes. Encore merci!!

Leticia et Vincent

What a great time our family had in Oporto - a lot of which goes down to Joao's sublime and stylish Palm Tree Beach Apartment. 

From the moment we first communicated on airbnb to the afternoon we left the apartment, Joao was kind, attentive and efficient. 

He greeted us on our arrival, with supplies for the fridge and a gift for the baby. He discreetly checked in via email after a week to see how we were doing and then bade us farewell on our last morning.

Joao's apartment is luxurious and spacious, providing a restful base from which to explore the wonderful city and beachside of Oporto. It comes with all mod-cons, including a washing machine, handy for babies and washing out the beach towels used on the vast and safe strip of seaside just down the road. 

The apartment is located in a cosy and friendly neighbourhood with lots of cafes and restaurants. What we loved about the place was the sense that it wasn't primarily a tourist designation, offering instead a view of Portuguese at rest and play. 

Joao's apartment provides a very comfortable home away from home and comes highly recommended - we hope to come back soon. 

July 2013

João has a beautifully decorated and homely apartment, right in the heart of Leça, 5 minutes walk from the beach and 1 minute to shops, bars and restaurants. Perfectly placed for exploring this area and easy access into the heart of Porto by bus or train.
We had a great stay, lacked for nothing and João was there to meet us and show us the apartment.
Many thanks and we will certainly be back.
Je n'ai pas eu l'occasion de connaître Joao, à cause d'un imprévu mais les autres invités ont très apprécié son logement et son accueil.

As fotos do apartamento correspondem à realidade, a habitação estava limpa e bem equipada, sendo que acolhe perfeitamente o número de pessoas a que se propõe. Gostei muito da casa, espaçosa , com muita luz natural, com duas varandas onde se podem fazer refeições . Está muito bem localizada, tem minimercado/mercearia , talho, padaria nas proximidades e hipermercados não muito longe(15min a pé) , fica próximo da praia(5 a 8min a pé), do metro (5 a 8min a pé), e tem diversas paragens de autocarro nas proximidades, desta forma tem fácil acesso às cidades de Matosinhos e Porto. O Sr. João teve o cuidado de deixar mapas de várias cidades do grande Porto e do norte de Portugal, bem como informação sobre restaurantes. A própria cidade de LEÇA oferece um bom leque de cafés e bares próximos da praia que são úteis e agradáveis para descontrair ao final da tarde ou depois de jantar. O proprietário da casa foi sempre simpático e prestável, tendo sido atencioso ao deixar um cesto de fruta, sumo, leite, chá e outros.
A casa é Ideal para umas férias de praia ou até mesmo para conhecer o Porto e as cidades envolventes. Obrigado por tudo Sr. João, recomendo e voltarei um dia, até à próxima.

Joao is a very good host and his flat is perfect with everything you need and near the beach. Porto city centre is 35min away using the subway otherwise taxis are not too expensive. 

Joao est in très bon hôte et son appartement est parfait avec tout ce dont vous avez besoin et proche de la place. Le centre ville de Porto est à 35min par le météo et sinon les taxis ne sont pas très chers.

Otima estadia !
Très bon séjour !

Joao nous a accueillis à la gare de Porto et nous avons apprécié son attention. L'appartement est grand, silencieux et à quelques minutes du front de mer, au demeurant plaisant.. Finalement l'appartement de Jao est une solution à retenir si l'on désire se partager entre Porto et la mer.

El apartamento de Joao es simplemente genial, es acogedor y muy precioso. Hemos quedado encantados con todo el mobiliario y con muchas ganas de volver a repetir la experiencia pronto.
Joao es una persona muy atenta y servicial y fue de gran ayuda en el proceso tanto de la reserva como las directrices para la estadía.
Muy recomendable!
Joao was very nice and helpful. The apartment was kept very tidy and had all the amenities we needed. Wish we had more time there.

Nous avons passés vraiment un très bon séjour à Porto.
Joao et son épouse nous ont accueillis comme si nous nous connaissions depuis longtemps. leur appartement est très agréable 
il y a tout ce qu'il faut, même les tasses du petit déjeuner sont prête.
 Des documentations complètes pour pouvoir circuler sans se perdre.Mais étant venu pour les fètes de fin d'année, nous avons eu de la pluie et Joao s'est excusé pour le mauvais temps.....
Nous reviendrons car ce pays et ses habitants si accueillant 
si calme au volant, et sur les routes, cela change de notre pays.
A bientôt Joao
Michèle et Jean claude

Lovely time in Leca da Palmeira in Joao's apartment.  It has all the comforts of home and is well located, 5 minutes from the metro and from dozens of restaurants and the beach.  He was very helpful and kind and left us a lovely bowl of fruit and breakfast on our arrival.  I heartily recommend his apartment.
Joao tiene una casa muy grande, limpia y confortable. Él es muy atento y dispuesto. Totalmente recomendable.
Loved the house. Joao was very helpful. The house is clean and very close to the metro. Enjoyed our stay here.
Great house in quite comfortable location and great restaurantes near by. I surely recommend staying at this apartment.

Séjour parfait dans un très bel et grand appartement !
Rien à redire et à recommander pour tout le monde ;)

We loved the apartment João! The apartment has fabulous interior, very beautiful and comfortable furniture. The apartment has everything necessary for even more comfort, warmth and easy life. The house is located in a beautiful picturesque area, near the ocean, near the house of a beautiful lawn. In the center of Porto recommend traveling by bus number 500 , its route runs along the coast, it is very beautiful. João  great host, he showed incredible care of us met at the airport and left for us in the apartment fruit, tea, coffee, milk, juice. We recommend you to visit this apartment. 
P.S. In addition, the apartment João  became for us a place where dreams come true, that's where we learned that we have a baby :))

A very large apartment with lots of space and a great kitchen. João was very helpful and the apartment had lots of information and maps about Porto. The apartment is very close to the beach and very easy to access the metro to get into Porto. We had a great stay and would recommend this place if visiting Porto.

João was a great host! He was also very flexible with our arrival time. The apartment was beautiful with everything we needed to enjoy our stay. I wish we could have stayed longer! I highly recommend his place.

We were guests of Joao only for one night but I have to say that it is a really kind person. The apartment is comfortable, spacious and well equipped. Good clean and comfortable beds. Really convenient parking spot in the underground garage with direct lift. Fast wifi, fruit and juice for breakfast. Really good point to visit Porto. I recommend everyone this apartment.

I had very good days in joao's house.
Joao & he wife is kindly smile
house is beautiful & near beach~

João's apartment is spacious and beautiful. It felt like we were staying in an upscale hotel. It's very easy to get between the apartment and downtown Porto either by driving or taking the nearby blue Metro line. There is also a little market underneath the apartment for necessities and a supermarket a 15 minute walk away. 

Plus João left out waffles and jam for our first breakfast! What more could you ask for :-)

Joao was a very good host, his very friendly son met us at the apartment and gave us all the details we required.  The apartment is spacious, clean and had more than we expected for our 10 day holiday. It is in a good area, many good restaurants, shops just underneath, beach at the end of the street and a short walk over the bridge to the station to catch the train into Porto (only 3.50 return).
