On our second trip to Porto we caught the yellow tourist bus for a tour and were able to get off the bus at stop 17 (at the end of the bridge to walk home). We loved our stay here and would highly recommend this apartment and our contact with Joao and his family. Thank you

Joao’s garden apartment was delightfully decorated, and we were very comfortable there.  The kitchen was well equipped, the views were wonderful and we could sit on either of two decks facing different directions.   Joao met us at the apartment to show us around and even left us a gift of fruit and toasts.   There are many food stores close by, the beach is just a couple of blocks away and you can see the ocean from the apartment.   We walked five minutes to the metro and bus stop across the river.   The trip into Porto varied depending on traffic, but you could also easily spend time in Matosinhos, with the choice of restaurants and beaches.  Thank you, Joao for a lovely place to stay near Porto.

It's hard to say enough positive things about João's apartment. It's a beautiful, spacious apartment - it looks exactly as it does in the photos - which was totally clean upon our arrival. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine and all the utensils, cutlery and crockery you could need. There's a nice spacious balcony attached to the living room, and all the bedrooms have plenty of storage space and comfortable beds. Having two bathrooms is a bonus too. We found some fantastic restaurants nearby (try Castelinho on Rua Castelo, and the place next door with the terrace) and there are lots of nice bakeries and groceries in the area. The beach is five minutes' walk away. It's a great apartment and fantastic value for money - would book again.
Very easy and straightforward to communicate with Joao!

Joao nous a très bien accueilli. Le logement est spacieux et très bien équipé. Le quartier est calme et sur le conseil de Joao nous avons diner dans un excellent restaurant à proximité de l'appartement. Nos attentes ont été  entièrement satisfaites et nous le recommandons. 

Nadia et Apambah

João’s apartment is a very nice place, spacious and comfortable. When we arrived it was perfectly cleaned and it has all the facilities you can need. It was very easy to contact João and meet him for the check in.

The apartment was great, just as it appeared in the photos. Clean as a whistle. Leça is great and i had one of the best lunches of my life around the corner from the apartment, in the tasquinha cantinha espanhola...mixed fish barbecue with salad...lovely friendly people too.
There was loads of info and reading material in the flat and very easy to get into porto itself by just crossing the bridge and getting the tram.
Unfortunately i managed to bust my ankle a couple of days before leavinh and was rather immobilized. Still, the neighbourhood is so quiet i had a nice restful time. If i didn't leave the apartment in the same pristine state i found it, i can nly apologize and say it was because i was moving around with great difficulty.
Once again, many thanks...i had a great time and this apartment was definitely worth the money and perfectñy placed for a relaxing week by the beach

bardzo ładne, wygodne, świetnie wyposażone  i obszerne mieszkanie, 
gospodarz wyjątkowo uprzejmy i pomocny, 
wszystko ponad oczekiwania, 
mieszkanie jest w lecie przyjemnie chłodne (byliśmy w lipcu)
dobra komunikacja z centrum miasta i z lotniskiem

very comfortable, very good equiped and spacious apartment, host is very kind and helpful, all is above the expectations
the apartment is pleasantly cool in the summer (we were in July)
good communication with the City center and with the airport

Très bonne expérience. 
Notre hôte s'est montré très accueillant et d'une grande disponibilité. Il nous a prodigué de bons conseils concernant les plages, restaurants, etc...
L'appartement correspondait totalement à nos attentes et au descriptif.
Nous faisions le voyage en famille et petits et grands ont été comblés (chambres joliment décorés, appartement spacieux et convivial).
Nous nous sommes sentis comme à la maison.
L'appartement est bien situé (commerces, plage, restaurants, transports à proximité) et le garage est très pratique.
A recommander sans hésiter.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par la fille de Joao et sa femme. L'appartement est proche de la mer, comme indiqué. C'est très propre, avec une très belle literie ! 
Il y a un grand marché proche, avec des produits tout frais.
Joao was very helpful and has waited for us to arrive. The location is just 20 mins away from Porto center and the flat was clean and spacious.
Neat clean apartment we were here for just one night. Next time longer!

Merci à Joao pour la location de son appartement : spacieux, très agréable à vivre, parking privatif très utile et le tout d'une grande propreté ! Le quartier est très bien situé pour balade à pied, en voiture ou métro. Vivement recommandé.
Great apartment! Very clean, comfortable, just like on the pictures. Close to beach! Calm suburb Porto! Very nice contact, it was pleasure to meet Joao! Thank you!

Gemütliches Haus und netter Gastgeber. Lage perfekt für einen Strandurlaub, nach Porto allerdings schon ein kleines Stück zu fahren. Man kann aber relativ günstig mit dem Taxi nach Hause fahren wenn keine ubahn mehr geht. Ansonsten alles gut, sauber und wie auf den Bildern.

El alojamiento ha cumplido todas mis expectativas, agradable, limpio, zona tranquila, volveré sin duda..

Todo un detalle de bienvenida, el set de desayuno (leche, zumo, tostadas..) muchas gracias Joao!!

La TV con canales internacionales, muy bien..

Tout simplement formidable. Mes parents y ont passes un séjour très agréable. Joao les attendait en bas de l'immeuble pour leur arrivée. L'appart était super, très bien fourni, propre et bien situé! A 300 mètres de la plage! Une petite superette juste aux pieds de l'immeuble, idéale pr ses courses du matin! Un Joao très gentil et à disposition pr de l'aise et des conseil, cela leurs a vraiment plu et fait plaisir

João  a été un hôte remarquable !

L'appartement était parfait !

Très bien situé; à proximité du métro (à peine 10 min à pied) et de la promenade en bord de mer avec plusieurs plages accessibles.

Aussi épiceries et autres commerces à proximité.

Au point de vue des accès routiers c'était très facile pour explorer les alentours.

Wifi disponible et TV avec plusieurs canaux en prime !

The weather in Portugal unfortunately at the time of our stay was bucketing rain so it made our drive a little slower with road conditions and traffic. We were able to find the location easily enough, and Joao had ever so patiently waited for us despite being delayed. He was so gracious and his apartment was impressive as well as large. Immaculately clean as well. We had all we needed at our disposal. The rain deterred us from being able to venture too far, however the location was perfect. Supermarket, fruit shop just down stairs and a short walk to the train station to Oporto.  We enjoyed our time - just relaxed and appreciated his lovely accommodation.  No fault of the host if the weather is poor!!!

숙소 위치가 찾기도 좋았고  호스트도 친절 하였다 
숙소는 우리가 직접 살고 있는 집처럼 아늑하고 편안 하였다.  또한 근처에 아름다운 비치가 있어서  더욱 좋았습니다

Joao's place was just as advertised. A bit of a walk from public transportation, but that comes with the advantages of being off the beaten path. Leca de Palmiera has access to one of the best swimming beaches I have visited, ever. There is a boardwalk and access to beautiful restaurants. Back to the apartment, as previous users have mentioned, Joao meets you at a convenient place, walks you in, leaves some biscuits and instant coffee, and is happy to talk recommendations. It was clean and the kitchen was well-equipped. Appliances worked. Watched some movies the last night after a long day out, another nice touch. Highly recommended.

Very beautiful place, elegantly decorated in a peaceful seaside neighbourhood. Easy to get into town. Great value, and nice place to settle in for a while. Communication was a bit slow for check in but was a last minute booking. Would definitely recommend.

Our stay at João's was brief - only 1 night, but we wished we had had more time to stay there. The apartment is large and elegant, and very comfortable. It was easy to access from the metro and a 10-minute walk to the beach. Other conveniences all nearby, but is away from the hustle and bustle of Porto. Joao met us at the apartment, and showed us everything and then later checked in by email to make sure everything was okay. Would definitely recommend staying here - and also had wonderful dinner at Arquinho do Castelo, which was in the area by the fort.

広くてｸﾗｼｶﾙなｲﾝﾃﾘｱが高級ﾎﾃﾙのようで､とても素敵なお部屋です｡ｷｯﾁﾝも広くて､東京の狭い部屋に慣れている私たち夫婦にとっては広すぎるくらい笑
ﾎｽﾄのJoãoは､何でも質問に答えてくれるので､とてもたすかりました｡教えてもらったｴﾘｱのﾚｽﾄﾗﾝは本当に美味しくて､こういう情報を得られるのもAirbnbならではの良さだなと思います｡

お部屋は私たちだけで貸切だったので､気兼ねなく､朝ごはんを作ったり､お茶をいれたり､くつろぐことができました｡
このお部屋はﾎﾟﾙﾄの中心部から少し離れた郊外ですが､ﾊﾞｽや地下鉄で中心部に出られます｡40分位かかりましたが､車窓からﾎﾟﾙﾄの人たちの暮らしを垣間見ることができて､とてもｴｷｻｲﾃｨﾝｸﾞでした｡
また､郊外だからこその良さなのか､突然現れたｱｼﾞｱ人のﾊﾞｯｸﾞﾊﾟｯｶｰに近所のｶﾌｪのおじさまや､お兄さんがとても優しく､親切にいろいろと助けてくれました｡
そして､このｶﾌｪも海沿いのﾚｽﾄﾗﾝもごはんがとても美味しくて感動的でした!
このお部屋のお陰でﾎﾟﾙﾄの街が大好きになったので､ぜひまた訪れてみたいと思います｡

日本人です｡1月に家族で1泊しました｡大人3人､子供1､乳幼児1です｡
ﾎﾟﾙﾄ郊外の分譲ﾏﾝｼｮﾝ･大型2LDK分をまるまる貸切できます｡Airbnbの良さが体験できる､とてもお薦めできるﾘｽﾃｨﾝｸﾞです｡

寝室は2部屋で､ﾀﾞﾌﾞﾙとﾂｲﾝﾍﾞｯﾄﾞです｡
日本でいう二階にあり､ｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰもあります｡
鍵の受け渡しも問題ありません｡
一点､注意があり､住居のﾄﾞｱはｵｰﾄﾛｯｸなので､外出の際には必ず鍵を持って外にでます｡
またﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄの際は､鍵を玄関に置いて､そのまま閉めることになります｡忘れ物しないように注意してください｡

まずは､130m² はありそうな高級ﾏﾝｼｮﾝでとてもゆったりとしていて､家具や調度品は全てｱﾝﾃｨｰｸ調で見事です｡
ｷｯﾁﾝやﾊﾞｽは新しく､広々していて､私たちは材料を調達して自炊をしました｡
ｸﾗｯｶｰ､ｼﾞｬﾑ､牛乳､ｲﾝｽﾀﾝﾄｺｰﾋｰ等を提供してくれました｡

ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝは､ﾎﾟﾙﾄの町からは地下鉄を使って40分ほどかかったと思います｡最寄りの駅はﾌﾞﾙ―ﾗｲﾝの終点から2つ目のMercado駅です｡また駅からは､目の前の運河を橋で渡ります｡15分くらいは歩きます｡
とは言え､家族連れで滞在型の宿を探すなら､最高の物件です｡
海までも近く､素敵なｶﾌｪも多くあります｡

ﾎｽﾄのｼﾞｮｱﾝさん家族はとても親切でした｡お薦めです｡
以上

The apartment is very well equipped to enjoy a very comfortable holiday. 
We were with our little girl and it was great we didn't have to bring a bed and chair for her! We were very lucky with the weather and we took some nice strolls to the beach (at the end of the street) and had some coffee and pasteis de nata at the beach café on Leca beach.  It is very easy to reach Porto city center.  João is very nice and responds straight away on any questions! Thank you!

We had a lovely stay in Porto. The apartment was spacious and clean. Our host was extremely friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this apartment for any traveler planning on visiting Porto.

Un très bon accueil de Joao ... un bel appartement bien agencé, bien meublé, très agréable ...
Bien situé, avec un excellent parking au sous sol du même immeuble.
Je ne regrette pas et le le conseille ...

la casa es tal y como se ve en las fotos, perfecta para mi familia.
tiene todo lo que puedas necesitar en tu estancia. Muy limpia y ordenada. toda la casa es exterior y se puede respirar el olor a mar, la playa esta muy cerca y el paseo es espectacular.
muchas gracias João porque nuestras primeras vacaciones como familia numerosa fueron perfectas.

We knew from previous reviews that Joao's place was lovely, but still, it was a pleasant surprise to enter and see such a lovely apartment, just as pictured.  Joao had corresponded with us so frequently that we felt like friends when we arrived.  We felt like we were guests at our well-to-do Portuguese auntie's home.  It was fun cooking in the bright kitchen & sitting in the laundry room sipping coffee early morning when it was too cool to go out on the balcony.  The 2 bathrooms, dishwasher & washing machine made us feel right at home.  About the neighbourhood:  It is a real Portuguese neighbourhood & no one speaks English.  Downstairs in our building are many little businesses & cafés, very convenient.  There is even a dog grooming salon as well as a green space behind the building & a park across the street if you bring your dog like we did.  There are many buses running through the neighbourhood.  Just across the bridge, a short walk, is the Metro which will take you to the old city, the fabulous Bilbao shopping, Casa de Musica, or you can transfer at Trindade to cross the river to Gaia for port tasting or just walking along the river, very pleasant.  Going in the other direction from the apartment is the fabulous MAR shopping mall which is anchored by IKEA and the Jumbo.  The food in the food court is fairly good, abundant & reasonably priced.  If you're staying for awhile you might want to grocery shop at the Jumbo, a well-priced mega market.  If you have kids, that mall is for you!  It is kid friendly and had the most adorable clothes & toys.

Estadía perfecta. El lugar era conforme a las fotos: amplio, cómodo y fácil de ubicar. Cerca del mar y de la carretera.
João y su esposa fueron muy amables y disponibles para cualquier pregunta o problema. Lo recomiendo!

La experiencia ha sido positiva, hemos estado muy a gusto, la casa es muy amplia, y nos ha gustado comentar cosas con Joao, en relación con sus otras casas y las nuestras que tenemos para compartir en Rota, Andalucía y PANIZARES, las Merindades, Burgos.

Joao Is een heel aardige man, die ons zelfs van het vliegveld kwam halen. Zijn appartement was natuurlijk veel te groot voor ons tweeën en van alle gemakken voorzien. Keurig verzorgd. Het ligt bij het havengebied, maar daar merk je eigenlijk niets van. Het strand is 5 minuten lopen en we hebben heerlijk gegeten in een heel klein restaurantje om de hoek.

João est un hôte accueillant et serviable. Ce fut un plaisir de le rencontrer et pouvoir discuter avec lui de son sympathique pays. L'appartement est spacieux et confortable, bien équipé, tout à fait conforme à la description et aux photos, et situé dans un quartier calme. Nous recommandons ce logement à 100%!
Joao's apartment was beautiful- very comfortable for 6 of us. It's in a nice quite neighbourhood, a short walk to the beach and esplanade.

Wir waren 4 Tage zu Gast bei Joao. Alle Absprachen wurde absolut zuverlässig eingehalten. Die Wohnung entspricht den Bildern und Beschreibungen . Wir würden jederzeit gerne wiederkommen.
Ein sehr guter Gastgeber. Danke Gruß

Mr. João is a great host, making sure we were having a pleasant stay, he was flexible about check-in/out time.
The pictures doesn't do it justice to the apartment. It's a lovely, cosy and spacious apartment, everything was working fine, the location is also good, you have small grocery shop just downstairs and it's not far from the great restaurants near the port, 10 min. driving.

We loved our stay here even if it was just for one night. We wished we stayed longer in Porto. The apartment is near the Port and 15 min to the airport which suited us very well as we had an early flight the following morning. The house is lovely and you can feel right at home! 
Joao was very welcoming and helpful especially when my uncle got locked in one of the rooms. He immediately came back to help us get him out. We would highly recommend his place especially for larger groups as there are 3 suitable bedrooms and 2 toilets. 

We hope to go back next time :)

João was very accommodating and let us leave our bags at the apartment ahead of check in. The apartment was very comfortable in a lovely quiet neighbourhood. We were a family group with just a weekend in Porto. We loved seeing the port in action! And the 500 bus ride into the old city was fabulous.
This was my second stay here and I hope to return again. A fantastic apartment in a great location at a very good price. Highly recommended.

Grand et bel appartement tout équipé placé à proximité de la plage et du bus pour aller au centre de Porto.
Tout est comme sur les photos, il n'y a pas de mauvaises surprises, bien au contraire.
S'il fallait trouver un point d'amélioration, ce serait peut-être les matelas un peu dur et les lits qui grincent.
Mais enfin, c'est un excellent rapport qualité / prix si vous voulez alterner plage et visite de Porto...
Nous le conseillons vivement!
Merci Joao pour votre appartement...
Nuestra estancia en casa de João fue estupenda!La casa es muy amplia,acogedora,totalmente equipada y muy cerca de la playa,en una zona (Website hidden by Airbnb) playa es espectacular.

Excellent accueil de la part de Joao. L'appartement est idéalement situé, très agréable et d'une remarquable propreté. La plage est rapidement accessible à pied et de nombreux commerces et restaurants se trouvent à proximité. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour.
Really lovely place 10 minutes walk from the beach! A lot of space and a nice chessboard. João gave us all the information we needed. We will definately come back :)

Nous avons été accueillis d'une manière  très sympathique, par un Monsieur absolument charmant, aimable souriant, qui, après nous avoir fait une visite rapide des lieux nous a laissé les clés sans plus de formalités ! J'avoue même avoir été très agréablement surpris de cette grande marque de confiance.
L'appartement ne peut pas être plus agréable à vivre, on s'y sent vraiment 'à la maison' très spacieux, très confortable, confort douillet, excellente literie, (perso ai dormi comme un loir !) Grande cuisine on l'on peut se préparer de bons petits plats, salon plus que confortable avec télé, et bonne vidéothèque, sauf que n'ai pas trouvé version française dans DVD que j'aurais aimé visionner! (dû sans doute à mon manque de connaissance en ce domaine) Et enfin terrasse agréable au soleil, quand il est présent !
Un très grand merci à Joäo pour sa gentillesse, sa confiance, sa courtoisie.
Abbiamo trovato l'appartamento poco frequentato e con l'odore di chiuso.

I really enjoyed porto and Joao's house.
I can speak absolutely, his house was perpect. He is so kind and nice person. I recommend.

Joao hat uns sehr freundlich angenommen. Er hat uns tipps und Ratschläge schon am ersten Tag gegeben, maps, Einkaufs Möglichkeiten etc. wie wir am besten in die Stadt kommen können. Die Wohnung War sauber, wie beschrieben. Wir haben uns gefreut. Immer wieder gerne.

This is my 3rd rent from Airbnb & I started to feel very guilty for arriving very late, after midnight, at all the 3 rents in a row!! Anyway, our GPS brought us here without any mistake. I need to call João then. And he drove out to welcome us in the middle of the night. Not only explain us to all the things in his super well furnished house, but about the legendary Porto also.

We stayed in the nicest decorated apartment of this trip. A grocery on the ground floor of the building made our living even more pleasant.

All appliances in the fully equipped kitchen worked 100% perfect. All the beds in the 3 bedrooms including the sofa bed in the living were so nice for us to tug in.
Tolle Wohnung, super netter und sehr entgegen kommender Gastgeber. Sehr sauber, ruhig und geräumig. Wir hatten zu 5. eine erholsame Zeit.

Great apartment. Clean, tidy and elegant. Check in and check out was without any hassles. Mr. Joao was very kind and showed us where to go and to do things in Porto. Will love to return to Porto and stay here.
Merci à Joao , pour son acceuil, l'appartement était tel que  décrit sur le site , un espace très agréable , une décoration de très bon gout, nous y avons passé un très agréable séjour
The flat was nice, clean and fully equipped. Joao was a great host without any complications so we would like to come back, thank you!

Nous avons été très bien reçus par Joao et son épouse. L'appartement est vraiment spacieux, agréable et très propre. Il y a 3 chambres et 2 salles de bain. 
Les lits des chambres étaient faits à notre arrivée et nous avions des serviettes de toilette à notre disposition. 
En raison du mauvais temps, nous n'avons pas pu profiter des terrasses . Nous avons aussi apprécié le garage pour mettre notre voiture de location à l'abri. De petits commerces et restaurants sont proches, il n'est donc pas nécessaire de sortir tous les jours pour les courses. Le lave linge et le lave vaisselle étaient bienvenus.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour.

Great location for local cafes, bars and most importantly the beach. Fell about this place by mistake but what a great experience, the host is fab and the location to the Metro is less than 5 mins away. I can't recommend this place more.

Останавливались в апартаментах Жао на четыре ночи. Просторная хорошо оснащенная квартира, соответствует фото и описанию, обставлена старинной мебелью, есть все необходимое вплоть до мелочей, собственная подземная парковка. Тихий район в пригороде, несколько минут пешком до океанского пляжа. В центр Порто и в Ви́ла-Но́ва-ди-Га́я  ездили попеременно на метро и автомобиле. На метро занимало чуть менее часа с учетом пешего перехода через разводной мост до станции метро.
Жао был гостеприимен, подробно рассказал обо всем, что могло нам понадобится и заинтересовать. Рекомендуем.

The apartment was clean and well equipped, and communication with Joao was good.  Also good secure off road parking in the basement of the building.  We only spent a short time here and did not go into central Porto, but saw that this is very convenient for the Metro. Also very convenient for the airport.  This area itself is also interesting, with many nice looking restaurants, with lots of fresh grilled seafood.  We found an excellent Japanese restaurant over the bridge called Domino as well, which is worth a visit for their fusion Japanese-Portuguese fusion. Thanks to Joao for the hospitality.
Nous ne sommes restées qu'une nuit mais avions tout sous la main pour cette dernière nuit à Porto. Appartement bien situé à quelques minutes de la plage et bien équipé.

I really enjoyed staying at João's apartment. João was a the perfect host. He was really helpful and gave me a nice map and lots of information. I felt very at ease staying at the apartment. We did a quick  walkthrough and then he left me in peace. A very trusting gentleman. The apartment is really peaceful and very clean and had everything I required. Its the perfect location if you want a relaxed place to stay. With the relaxed and quiet beach just at the end of the road. A great sushi restaurant round the corner and host of there places to eat and drink in the vicinity. João even booked me a taxi to get me back to the airport. The location of the apartment means you can be at the airport in under 15 minutes.
Piso impecable. Todos los lujos a tope de gama. Buen trato con João. Relacion calidad precio inmejorable.

Très bon accueil malgré notre arrivée très tardive dans la nuit L appartement est conforme à la description et très bien équipé. Il est très bien situé, tout prés de la plage à pied, des commerces et des transports en commun.
Excellente expérience, je recommande !!

A casa é acolhedora, útil, confortável e tranquila... estivemos á vontade num fim de semana em família magnífico.  O sr. João excelente anfitrião e a filha também, muito simpáticos, e acolhedores. A praia fica a 10 min caminhando em linha reta. Muito bons acessos... Churrasqueiras perto, com comida take away excelente e barata. Supermercado tradicional, no res do chão do prédio. Resumindo, foi excelente. :)

O apartamento é mesmo como se vê nas fotografias. O bairro é muito tranquilo e com todos os serviços. Destacar o café "O lunch", dois prédios antes na galeria. A sua dona, Fátima, uma pessoa excelente e que cozinha maravilhosamente; prepara as refeições para levar à casa a um preço muito bom.
O apartamento está a dez minutos do metro/autocarro. Pegar no 500 para fazer uma rota turística até o Porto (recomendação do João). A praia a 10 minutos a pé. Está com tudo o que se vê nas fotografias, alem de lavaloiças. Muito cômodo e tranquilo. A garagem facilita o estacionamento, e tem aceso do elevador do prédio.
A comunicação com o João não foi precisa do nosso lado; do seu comunicou do chat do site sem qualquer problema. Atencioso e correcto.

Joao a était très accueillant et a pris le temps de nous expliquer toutes les commodités et lieux touristiques à proximité de ce logement. l'appartement était très propre, spacieux et au calme. nous y retournerons avec grand plaisir.

João is quite a nice person with patience(sorry again to let you wait ) and his house is amazing .If I got  more time I would like to stay several days more . It's clean ,beautiful and comfortable makes me feel just like home . I recommend João to everyone .

The daughter's welcome was gracious, warm and informative. The apartment was large and spacious. It was located in the perfect place to see Porto and Matosinhos. It was a short walking distance to the beach, tourist info, bus stops and restaurants. It was fun to watch the coming and going of the ships in the port of Matosinhos. The private parking under the building was an asset.

Appartement conforme aux photographies, calme dans un quartier très bien situé, la mer n'est pas loin, le métro est à quelques minutes à pied, il suffit de traverser le pont. Dans le quartier il y a beaucoup de petits restaurants. João nous a accueilli malgré le retard pris à cause de l'avion.

Nosotros ya conocíamos la zona, es un lugar tranquilo, con buenos accesos en coche y cerca de buenos lugares para degustar los pescados de los restaurantes cercanos.
Joao nos atendió puntual y amablemente. 
El apartamento respondía completamente a lo esperado.

Appartement totalement conforme à nos attentes.
Très confortable.
João a été un hôte très accueillant et conciliant, qui a fait l’effort d’échanger avec nous en français.
Si vous cherchez un pied à terre dans cette ville que nous apprécions particulièrement, vous ne serez pas déçu dans cet appartement. Tout est pensé pour que le voyageur se sente à l’aise. Merci !
Joao ist ein sehr freundlicher Gastgeber und die Unterkunft ist sehr schön und sauber
JOAO MUY AMABLE Y ATENTO A NUESTRAS NECESIDADES. MUY FLEXIBLE EN EL HORARIO DE SALIDA. APARTAMENTO COMO SE DESCRIBE EN EL ANUNCIO.
Un Anfitrión muy amable que nos explicó todos los detalles que podíamos visitar por la zona.

Espaço muito bem localizado para quem procure uns dias tranquilos junto ao mar! Zona perfeita para umas caminhadas e boa gastronomia regional
Apartamento acolhedor e muito limpo.
The house is very spacious and cozy... I got a very warm and helpful welcome. a good experience to stay.
The place is clean, very well maintained and has everything you need for comfortable stay.
Absolutely gorgeous spacious apartment. Good food and good sights. Friendly and attentive owners
We had a great stay. Joao and his wife was so really nice and helpful and the apartment had everthing we needed. Would like to come back here.

O apartamento é espaçoso, cheio de luz, com uma decoração antiga e (Website hidden by Airbnb) uma lojinha em baixo onde se pode comprar de tudo para alimentação, assim como cafés e perto da praia. Viajamos com o cão e à volta do prédio há varios jardins onde se pode passear. O Sr João foi simpático e disponível. A rua é tranquila e a vizinhança silenciosa. Obrigada por nos receber.

Wir haben wunderbare Tage in Joaos Wohnung verbracht. Alles entsprach den Angaben und Joao ist ein toller Gastgeber. Die Wohnung ist groß und hat nach zwei Seiten Balkone. Die Tiefgarage mit Lift ist sehr praktisch, da das Parken in der Gegend schwierig sein kann. In unmittelbarar Umgebung befinden sich Lokale und Bäckereien, im Gebäudekomplex selber sogar ein kleiner Lebensmittelmarkt. Porto allein ist natürlich eine Reise wert und von Joaos Wohnung aus gibt es gute Verbindungen dahin. Doch wer Joaos Wohnung bucht, sollte unbedingt in Leca da Palmeira einen Spaziergang in Richtung Leuchtturm einplanen. Noch ein Stück weiter liegen schicke Lokale mit unglaublichem Meerblick. 
Auf der anderen Hafenseite liegt Matosinhos mit einer Vielzahl von herrlichen Restaurants mit frisch gegrilltem Fisch und Meeresfrüchten. Wir kommen bestimmt wieder.
Danke Joao

Joao is an excellent host. Very proactive and helpful. The apartment is exactly as the pictures show. The beach is a 7-10 minute walk and there are eating options all around within easy walking distance. We greatly enjoyed our stay and I have no hesitation in recommending both the apartment and Joao.

We had a perfect stay at Joãos apartment. It's very comfortable, spotlessly clean and has everything you need. You only walk down the street to reach the most  wonderful beach. The metro and the 500 Bus and several other bus lines are just across the bridge, which is very convenient. The apartment is in a residential area, so it's quite at night, but with all the shops, cafes and restaurants close, so you hardly have to leave the area to enjoy Porto. We definitely recommend this place and would love to come back.
The apartment is very clean and in a great location.  Very confrotable.  The description of the apartment is accurate.

Very quiet neighborhood, close to Porto.
Nice apartment.

Good luck!

Appartement confortable bien équipé, bien situé par rapport aux transports publics 10 minutes à pied, garage privé. 10 minutes de la plage. Grand marché aux poissons et autres.(quelques bruits avec voisins)
Perfect place for families oraz groups to enjoy

Nous avons été agréablement accueilli par Joao. L'appartement est très bien situé, à 10min à pied de la plage. L'appartement est spacieux, confortable et tout équipe. Nous y avons passé une nuit très agréable. La petit plus, la place de parking pour la voiture, très pratique. Nous recommandons vivement ce logement,

João's home is only 2 blocks and a drawbridge away from the metro station strait into Porto proper.  He is impeccable as is his apartment.  The neighborhood is also not to be missed!  The beach is a 5-10 minute walk with good waves, sand, food and surfers.
We would definitely recommend this house.  Thank you for your hospitality João.  :)

We spent two wonderful weeks in the apartment of João.
Beautiful apartment in a convenient location. The bus, beach, shops and cafes are all within walking distance. It is easy to get to the airport. The apartment has everything you need for living. Thank the owner for the hospitality and quick response to all questions.
La casa es perfecta para pequeños grupos. Muy confortable y a 5 minutos a pie de la playa y de la zona de restaurantes. Joao muy atento y amable.
El piso estaba limpio y muy bien equipado en cuanto a electrodomésticos. Joao ha sido muy buen anfitrion y  generoso con la hora de salida. Repetiremos seguro!

João’s place was immaculate and very wonderfully decorated.  It was a pleasure staying there.  Very conveniently located to the airport (OPO).
Communication from João was outstanding.  Would not hesitate to recommend this property to anyone.

Le logement de João est parfaitement agencé, avec un vrai espace nuit pour les 3 grandes chambres et l'une des 2 salles de bain, séparé de l'espace jour par la grande entrée de l'appartement. Ce dernier dispose également d'une place de parking au sous sol, et d'un ascenseur.
Nous étions 8 départ, et João a très gentillement accepté 2 personnes supplémentaires ayant souhaité nous accompagner à la dernière minute.
Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.

appartement spacieux et très agréable 
correspondant a la description 
garage ferme en sous sol  
hôte très agréable et disponible  
localisé a proximité de la plage et des transports en commun 
accès rapide au centre de porto

This is such a warm and welcoming apartment. Joao and his family will make sure that you have a pleasant stay. They take much pride and care in their apartment. My mom and I loved going down to the cafe practically downstairs for an omelet and cappuccino every morning. You don't be disappointed!!

Idéalement situé à 5 minutes à pieds d'une très belle plage, nombreux petits commerces à proximité. Appartement est en lui même spacieux et confortable, réponse toujours rapide et positive du propriétaire!

Wir haben dieses Apartment mit 6 Personen genutzt und uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Haben alles genauso vorgefunden wie beschrieben. João hat uns sehr herzlich empfangen und sich viel Zeit für unsere Fragen genommen. Wir können diese Unterkunft zu 100 % weiter empfehlen
Great value, close to beach and shops, and a nice walk over the bridge to the metro.  I recommend
João was a very good host! The aprtment is big and easy for 3 couples, its near the Porto and have a free parking. I would recomend João house to anyone who wants to stay a few days on Porto.
Превосходная большая квартира. Идеально чистая, удобно расположенная. Прекрасный интерьер и все удобства. Рекомендуем!

El piso es como se muestra en las imagenes, tiene una decoración antigua. 

La casa esta cuidada con mimo, las camadas son comodas, los baños amplios, la cocina tiene todos los articulos que puedes necesitar (incluso nos habia dejado previsto un desayuno), es un piso silencioso.

Fuimos a trabajar a feria y Joao, se adapto a nuestros horarios de entrada. Nos contesto muy amablemente en todo momento y nos resolvio las dudas. 

El piso cuenta con garaje, esta cercano a restaurantes y tienda.  Todo un lujo!

Repetiríamos!
a very nice appt in a convenient location. Great beach at the end of the street, nice food in Matosinhos, just pass the bridge, sunny balcony to have a drink on. Big fish and veg market 10 mins away!
Trato muy correcto y todo perfecto, muy recomendable para grupos grandes y familias

Very spacious apartment with excellent thermal insulation in a very good position: 7m walk to the Leça beach and 10m walk to the closest metro station.
Pleasant owner; easy communication.

I've stayed at João's place for a short stay work travel and it was great! The location is very central to all the industries located in Porto de Leixões and also very close of amenities such as supermarket and restaurants! The host João was really welcoming and available and the house was really clean and with all the necesssary for a short/medium and long stay! I thank João for the hospitality and I'll definitively return there if the need rises!
Casa 5* situada no sítio excelente.

O Sr João é um ótimo anfitrião e sempre procurou nos atender com rapidez, boa vontade e educação. A comunicação com ele ocorreu de modo eficaz.
O apartamento é excelente, muito limpo e confortável, com estacionamento na garagem.
A região onde o apartamento se encontra possui boas confeitarias e restaurantes próximos que podem ser alcançados tanto a pé, inclusive à noite, quanto após alguns minutos de carro.
O Sr João foi muito atencioso e, portanto, recomendo a estadia nesse local.
Accueil très agréable. Appartement très propre et proche de Porto en transports en commun. João est très arrangeant. Logement conseillé.
Un alojamiento perfecto para conocer la coudad de Oporto
Casa super limpa, com todas as comodidades para o dia a dia. Cafe e mercearia por baixo! O sr. Joao esteve sempre disponivel! Sem duvida que será a nossa referencia na zona sempre que voltarmos!

Apartamento confortable y limpio, facil acceso en coche, parking libre, zona muy tranquila, silenciosa por la noche accesible en transporte publico a Oporto. Si vuelvo a Oporto me alojare en esta zona.
Perfect place to discover Porto and surroundings.
Emplacement idéal et hôte très serviable . Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.
João é um excelente anfitrião, muito atencioso. A casa é grande e acomoda bem 2 famílias grandes. Excelente estadia e com certeza queremos repetir.
Um excelente espaço, com acesso fácil para outros locais e várias coisas interessantes na região
Joao was super nice and supportive. The apartment is clean, spacious and comfortable. I recommend it to everybody!

Good Host
Close to seashore
Bonne location
a charming place to stay, lots of nice old portuguese furniture and ornate beds.

El apartamento está muy bien, la ubicación es perfecta, a cinco minutos de la playa y de los supermercados, bares y tiendas.
El piso estaba limpio.
Recomendable 100%.
ligger nära allt  vi önskade. gamla delen i den del av stan, marknaden, metro och havet med inbygg saltbasäng

Joao’s place is very near the beach and the neighbourhood is very family friendly. Old town is 20 min via a bus which takes a scenic sea front route. 
Brilliant hospitality. We will definitely return.
João's place is as described.

Апартаменты очень понравились, очень красивая мебель и интерьер. Правда нашли их с трудом, так как в адресе 496 - это не номер дома, а подъезд в доме. Но мы нашли.... С удовольствием на балконе по утрам  завтракали, а вечерами пили вино и ели фрукты. Очень здорово, что есть подземный гараж под домом и можно в него спуститься на лифте.

Joao's flat is a very nice place to stay in Porto. It is in a real Portugese neighbourhood close to the Porto harbour. It is easy to take the bus to the old town of Porto and close to the clean beaches. 
The house is clean and has real Portugese furniture, a lovely bath and sunny balcony.
Joao is a gentlemen who met us in front of the flat and helped us.
We had a good time in his home!
Adriana.

Very nice and beautiful rooms. 
João was very helpful. He shared all the important information around the appartment with us. (Like bus station, shopping, etc) 
The beach was only about 5-10 min away. The bus station to Porto Center was about 15 min away. But you were in Porto after 30 min.
We were very content with our stay in Mathosinhos, at João apartment
Lugar maravilhoso,localização excelente, seu Joao muito prestativo, apartamento confortável e limpo com certeza recomendamos.
Ótima experiência, numa casa extremamente bem equipada, acolhedora para grupos e com uma pessoa que facilita a experiência sendo rápido e agradável a estadia.
Wir haben in Joao einen überaus hilfsbereiten und freundlichen  Vermieter erlebt, der uns das Wohnen in seinem Appartement in seiner positivsten Form möglich gemacht hat.

Our 4 night stay in Joao's apartment was very enjoyable and we would recommend it to others. It is large and tastefully furnished. We felt immediately at home. The location was perfect for us to spend some time in Porto with either a bus or metro available just after a 10 minute walk over the bridge. Communication with Joao and his family members was excellent.
Stunning apartment

Nos hemos sentido muy cómodos en la casa. Estamos seguros de repetir la proxima vez que visitemos la ciudad. Es muy buena zona con todo tipo de comercios y muy buen situado para moverte.  Fácil acceso a la playa y mucha variedad de  restaurantes cercanos a buen precio y de todos los estilos, elegantes, informales, cervecería, marisquerias...etc
João a la llegada te explica todo lo necesario para ayudarte.
I had a great stay. Everything was as it was described. It was a good location and if I was ever in the area again I would be very happy to stay there again.
Greate place to be in...

name: Galata Tower 250mt,modern rooftop
summary: In a lively part of Istanbul's Beyoglu district,Palin Suites is only a quarter mile from Galata Tower. It features accommodations with modern furnishings and free Wi-Fi in all areas
space: Kavalalı , Refurbished Apartment!  This absolutely magnificent 1 bedroom and 1 balcony. Apartment is located in the very heart of İstanbul.  It's a 2 min walk to Galata Tower The apartment has been newly refurbished and furnished to the highest standards! Also you have the possibility to rent a baby cot and/Extra bed Price upon request. Absolutely marvellous and Kavalalı new apartment in very best city center location.  İstanbul historical city center and most famous sights on the palm of your hand.  It is situated on the Taksim opposite of the famous İstiklal Street . Just 5 minut buy walk distance.

host.host_about:
Hi I'm Can ,from turkey
I'm 25 years old ,  I live in Istanbul.I have been working upon tourism for 12 years.I like to visiting other countries which has historical backgrounds. This is the reason behind living in Istanbul. Also I have been to places in Europe such as  Italy,   Austria. I like to discovering new places in the world, particularly on the top of nice places for accomodation.
I hope see you İstanbul .
cheers :)

reviews.comments: As it rained a lot before we arrived, Can told us the rooftop room wasn't able to stay. We were changed to a smaller room. The room was okay. But I think if there should be a little refund as the room we stayed was cheaper than the one we booked.

We had an amazing long weekend in istanbul! We really enjoyed staying at cans place. He was a very friendly and welcoming host. The location was perfect - you can do almost anything by foot and are right in the centre of the great district of beyoglu. The apartment was not luxurious, but very nice and cozy and just what we expected. The terrace was perfect - whenever everything gets too noisy and busy in the city, it's a good place to calm down for a bit and enjoy the city from another perspective. The only drawback was that the rooms aren't soundproofed at all. Whenever new guests arrived late at night, we could be sure to be up for another 30min until they had found their rooms. But I would absolutely recommend this place and I will come back whenever I'm in Istanbul again.

Emplacement idéal proche de la tour de Galata et du tramway . Quartier agréable et vivant.
Appartement propre et décoration moderne , équipement rudimentaire suffisant pour quelques jours.
Immeuble malheureusement  très sonore.
Can nous a accueilli très gentiment.
Bon rapport qualité prix.

Das schön ausgestattete Apartment befindet sich im Dachgeschoss eines Apartmenthaus in der nähe des Galata-Turms und unzähliger Bars und Restaurants. Es ist verkehrsgünstig gelegen, die nächste Metro Station ist 10min entfernt, die nächste Tram-Station 5min. Zum nächsten Fährhafen gelangt man per Tram in 10-15min. Can hat uns sehr gut aufgenommen. Es hat uns an nichts gefehlt. Das Apartment enthält alles was als Selbstversorger benötigt.

Can è un ragazzo totalmente disponibile a qualsiasi ora per qualsiasi dubbio, domanda o indicazione sulla città, è molto solare e dolce. L'accoglienza è stata ottima. La camera è in linea con l'annuncio pubblicato: nessun tipo di strane sorprese: pulita (ogni giorno), letto comodo. Inoltre la posizione è assolutamente strategica, super centrale, tutti gli spostamenti si possono effettuare tranquillamente a piedi o con mezzi pubblici facilmente raggiungibili. Consigliato!

The location of Can's place is very ideal. It is a very short walk from Tophane Metro Station which makes it easy to go to Sultanahmet and the Ataturk airport. The little balcony that comes with this place is awesome. It has the view of the harbor and if you look behind you, you can even spot Galata Tower. The place itself is kept clean by the wonderful cleaning lady. 
The only drawback I can think of for this place is that (Hidden by Airbnb) map seems to give out the wrong location when typed in the address provided. (Hidden by Airbnb) map brings you to a place called "Galata Melling" instead of Can's place. But if you text Can, he will come out and greet you. 
And did I mention the awesome mini mart across from Can's place. This is where I get my yummy daily freshly squeezed orange juice.  =]

Sehr gute Location, nah an der nächsten Tramstation und etwa genauso nah zu unzähligen Bars und Restaurants. Wir hatten einen schöne Zeit in Istanbul. Das Apartement ist völlig in Ordnung. Can war immer da und wusste uns zu helfen. Gerne wieder!

the apartment is well located ,its look like a small hotel with 4 floors and two rooms each floor  with a lift . all is clean , towels everyday .WiFi is OK. AC too . a grocery shop in front the house  . and  restaurants for breakfast down in street if u don't want to cook 
near tophane tram station .. 10 mn walk to istiklal street and karakoy 

the only negative point ..the walls are not much  noise insulated .if u have normal and educated  people as neighbour its OK  but not fucker from Qatar ..fortunately we were enough tired for sleeping well...efis help well 

I think the next time ill book here

Suleiman Can is the best host I ever saw ! Warmhearted ! You can be sure he will do his best to help on any request cheerfully.

The location is really good. 
 
It has the advantage of beeing close to almost all places like istiklal street, kabatas, eminonu, sultanahmet (by tram from tophane station 2min by foot from the location), and galata tower , istiklal street by foot. It's also a quite and safe place.

You have several places arround from where you can get your turkish breakfast, we recomend "Falls in Galata" ! You have a small grocery just in front of the location it seems to be always open. There is a bakery for bred, pide an lahmacun near and a Borek shop near also ... You should try there the cheese borek.

I really recommend this place.

Can was very helpful and laid back. Our cab driver had problems locating the venue, Can helped to direct him and waited out (in the rain) for our cab. 

My friend and I "check-out" at different times. My friend was scheduled to leave in an airport shuttle that Can helped to book with a local tour company. As my flight was much later in the day, I scooted off to the Istanbul Modern (which is a really short 10/15 mins leisurely walk away) while she waited for the shuttle. But HORRORS! My friend left all her money with me and when her shuttle arrived, she had no money to pay for the service. Can graciously let her get onto the shuttle anyway with just a verbal promise that on my return to the apartment, I would be paying for my friend. He did not make any fuss about it at all nor was he anxiously reminding me to make the payment, so that's pretty cool.

The apartment was clean and spacious, pretty much exactly what you see in the photos. Noticed the aircon was dripping a little but that didn't affect our stay in any way. There were some stubborn stains on the white armchair but hey.. it is white, which is hard to maintain... so we weren't too fussy about that, we used it anyway, it wasn't disgusting.
 
The location is superb if you are visiting the Galata Tower and Istanbul Modern (which is awesome btw). It is also an easy walk to the Tophane Tram stop (max 5 mins) and the Galata Bridge (20 mins). 

There are many interesting eateries around and we had a nice breakfast at the eatery next door - the pancakes are freshly made and really awesome. I also had superb spinach + cheese pide at this no-nonsense place diagonally across the street. The pide are cooked in a traditional stove. When I visited, there were many locals enjoying their pide there. Yummy. I love to eat food prepared by people who take pride in making them. :)

reviews.comments:
Chile is a very friendly and helping person. She always responded very quickly when we had a problem, no matter at what time. Even when we had to change our booking dates, she was very comprehensive and professional. 
The flatscreen tv, which had also an HDMI cable, was very nice and also the weekly filling of our fridge was very convenient. 
We were 3 people and we had more than enough space. Even if you are 4 people, there is still enough space, but it may be a little crowded when there would be more than 4 people.
The location of the appartment is very good: 2 walking minutes from the mtr, 3 walking minutes from Victoria Park, 10-15 walking minutes to Causeway Bay and 5 walking minutes from a supermarket.
All in all a very nice appartment with a lot of space for Hong Kong conditions. 
If you are looking for a nice place to enjoy your time in Hong Kong, you won't regret to have booked this appartment :-)
人生特别的旅程有缘认识了特别的Chile,nice and warmhearted!公寓设施齐全,舒适,有一个大阳台,适合一家旅行,公寓地址便利,不论是去机场､还是城市任何交通工具都可以便利使用,楼下是巴士站,地铁站五分钟可以到达,的士也很容易叫,还有电车站,四周餐厅超市街市都在方圆一公里内,非常方便!一百个赞!
Great location for food and transportation! Chile took good care of the need of visitors Highly recommend.

Chile was an incredibly nice host, very welcoming, and always making sure we had everything we needed, answering within minutes to any issue we had! We stayed for nearly 4 months and Chile always made sure that we had everything we needed. 

The apartment is only a couple of minutes away from Tin Hau Station, and a lovely walk through Victoria Park away from Causeway Bay, making it a very central location! Especially the terrace makes it a great place :) 

We really enjoyed our stay and can only recommend it!

neighborhood_overview: Hop Inn is located in the heart of the historical Tsim Sha Tsui district, nestled among five star hotels. A three-minute walk takes you to the breathtaking Victoria Harbor, the monumental Cultural Centre and the Art Museum.
notes: •Check-in time: 1430 hours •Check-out time: 1130 hours * 24 hours reception. No worries to check in / out even mid night =)
transit: Getting Around. HOP on the Star Ferry to Hong Kong Island, or take the MTR (subway). Want to head over to China and Macau? HOP on the ferry terminal, train, and airport bus stations. They're all a few minutes away.  Shop. Harbor City, Ocean Terminal shopping centres, Sogo department stores, and shops along Nathan Road are all steps away. Hungry? Many superb restaurants of international cookery and flavours nearby. Night Life. HOP Inn is also about action -- we are a short distance to the fun night life, but yet far enough from the noise and bustle at night.
house_rules: •No visitors after 11pm. •Child Policy:  Dormitory - We only accept guests above 10 years old, unless group or family bookings for whole dormitory room. •No extra guest. We reserved the right to refuse extra guest staying in the room unless mutual agreement has been arranged otherwise. Violator will be subject to eviction from the property without refund. •Strictly NO SMOKING policy in all area of the premise.

name: Luminous Modern Apt Share for Young Professionals
summary: Fully furnished private room in a sun-filled modern apartment dedicated to young professionals with 30 day minimum stay. Located on the border of Clinton Hill and Bed-stuy, 20 minutes from downtown Manhattan. High speed WIFI, all utilities, and weekly house cleaning included. 5-8 minute walks to A/C and G subway lines: 4 stops to downtown Manhattan, express train to JFK, 4 stops to Willimasburg. Vibrant, multicultural neighborhood with solid and growing restaurant/cafe/bar scene.
space: A fully equipped 4 bedroom apartment with everything you need to feel right at home. The apartment covers the whole floor of a townhouse building on a quaint tree lane. Best features include skylight windows, hard wood floor, and modern appliances. There is a fully stocked kitchen, 1 full bathroom and 1 half bathroom with reliable shower and toilets. Your Bedroom:  A comfortable private room (120 sq-ft) furnished with a comfortable bed (foam mattress), a desk, a closet, and other small furniture for storage. The bedroom faces the backyard, free from most street noise. You have access to a small patio. Fresh bedding, towels and shampoo are provided. This apartment is dedicated to longer-term guests with regular routines (e.g. employment, internship, school, etc.) You get to meet 3 other housemates who are young professionals from various cultures and backgrounds. Scroll down for more information about the area.
description: Fully furnished private room in a sun-filled modern apartment dedicated to young professionals with 30 day minimum stay. Located on the border of Clinton Hill and Bed-stuy, 20 minutes from downtown Manhattan. High speed WIFI, all utilities, and weekly house cleaning included. 5-8 minute walks to A/C and G subway lines: 4 stops to downtown Manhattan, express train to JFK, 4 stops to Willimasburg. Vibrant, multicultural neighborhood with solid and growing restaurant/cafe/bar scene. A fully equipped 4 bedroom apartment with everything you need to feel right at home. The apartment covers the whole floor of a townhouse building on a quaint tree lane. Best features include skylight windows, hard wood floor, and modern appliances. There is a fully stocked kitchen, 1 full bathroom and 1 half bathroom with reliable shower and toilets. Your Bedroom:  A comfortable private room (120 sq-ft) furnished with a comfortable bed (foam mattress), a desk, a closet, and other small furniture for storage. T
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is safe, diverse, and full of culture. It is getting more vibrant than ever, yet still remaining relatively calm. You get a very genuine everyday-life-in-New-York feeling, which I think is awesome. However, if you are not comfortable being around people of other races and cultures, you might not get to enjoy what this great neighborhood has to offer.  With in a few blocks there are many really cute cafe, restaurants and bars. Bedford avenue is kind of the main stretch, where you will find some really great spots. Essentials like laundromat, supermarket, 24 hr deli are also very near by. Please see my guidebook for local favorites.
notes: I welcome mellow, easygoing guests who are looking for a genuine apartment share experience. All guests are considered housemates. Also, please do not request this room for someone else's behalf. The apartment is kept as calm as possible. Please do not dominate the common spaces, and please keep social activities outside the apartment. If you've read up to this point, please tell me what kind of doughnut flavors you like :)
transit: With the A/C,G trains all within a few blocks, you can get to most places very easily and quickly. The A line is 4 stops away from downtown Manhattan, and it takes you to Tribeca, Greenwich Village, Meatpacking District, Chelsea and Time Square all in under 30 min. The G line takes you the ultra hip Williamsburg in 10-15 minutes.  From our apartment it takes 8 minutes to walk to the A/C subway, and 5 minutes to walk to the G subway. There are also many buses. I would of course be very happy to tell you more in detail once you are here.
access: You will get your own key to the apartment, so you can come and go as you wish. You have access to the entire apartment except for the other bedrooms.
interaction: I would love to give you an apartment tour, and answer all your questions during check-in. After that I will also be available if you ever need me. If we are both available, it would certainly be my pleasure to connect over a drink or a meal. I love meeting people, and I would love to help you get acquainted with the city. This apartment dedicated to longer-term guests with regular routines (e.g. employment, internship, school, etc.) You'll get to meet 3 other housemates who are young professionals from various cultures and backgrounds.
house_rules: No shoes in the apartment Thoroughly tidy up after yourselves, and leave no traces behind No additional guest(s) without my knowledge Keep activities minimum in the common space, and be mindful of others who might not want to be disturbed Turn off appliances before leaving the apartment Be kind and respectful to one another

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am a designer/entrepreneur based in New York City. I live with my partner in crime, Hugo, the sweetest little pooch. Both of us have restlessly curious minds, which is probably what lead us to travel almost 6 months out of every year. Besides thinking about my next meal, I probably spend the most time thinking about my next travel destination. 

I was born in the US, raised in Taiwan, moved to the UK at age 17, then Italy for school. Before airbnb was made popular, I was a frequent couchsurfing host/guest. From a young age I started sharing apartments with other housemates, many of which became my close friends. Now I am really glad to be hosting on airbnb. I tend to treat whomever I meet like a friend, without unnecessary formality or customs.

As a person I'm quite levelheaded, affectionate, with a pinch of cynical humor I guess. Anthropology, linguistics, art, and music are some of the things that I'm most passionate about. I love to explore new places through the local people I meet, as well as the food and night life scene.

reviews.comments:
I stayed a bit more than two weeks at Olivier's place and it was perfect. The apartment is really nice and new, very quiet and with a lot of light, which is really pleasant.
The room is very comfortable and perfect to relax.
Olivier was really kind and he made sure I had everything I needed.
There's a lot to do in the neighborhood and it's an easy walk to the A express subway to manhattan.
I clearly recommend this room !

Olivier was a great host. I stayed in his room for the summer during my internship in NYC. Olivier and the roommates were always happy to help if I had any questions about the neighborhood, food, getting around etc. The place itself is great - the room is large by NYC standards and has a good sized bed. It was new and clean, with good water pressure in the bathrooms and a good kitchen for cooking. I would highly recommend if you plan on staying in Bed-Stuy!

I stayed at Olivier’s home with a friend for a few days during our holidays in NYC. The apartment is very nice, modern, equipped with every comfort, easy to reach with the subway. We stayed in Olivier’s room and it’s perfect for two people: spacious and very bright. Olivier is a good host, a kind person, whenever we had a question he responded very quickly. Also his housemates are very available. A nice place to discover Bed-Stuvy and the Big Apple!

Oliver var en mycket bra värd, absolut ingenting att klaga på... Hjälpsam och vänlig vid de frågor som jag hade. Rummet var lagom stort och helt ok. Dubbelsäng med sidobord, spegel och sittplats (där man kunde sitta och kolla sina mail (fritt Wi fii ingick). Tillgång även till fräscht vardagsrum med kombinerat kök och stort kylskåp (som delades med en till hyresgäst + Oliver). Området var rätt tyst och inte speciellt mycket trafik utanför... Området kändes även hyfsat tryggt och endast 4 blocks upp till Tunnelbanan, där du ganska snabbt tog dig till Manhattan...
Great place! It was pretty clean and quite! Olivier was a great host. He was always asking if everything were fine.

Great, sunny, clean room. Perfect neighbors, not loud, pleasure to deal with, helpful. All the little things important during the stay, amenities are present. Strong Wi-Fi, good shower. Lively neighborhood  close to subway and decent cafes. Olivier is a good caring host and I would recommend to stay here and will do it myself.

The appartement of Olivier keeps all his promises! It is so comftabel, clean and Olivier is not just a host. You just feel like a homemade staying with him. He just wants you to feel good during your stay.

Hugo is a quit and beatiful dog too! I'm not into dogs, but this little cuty makes you feel good :-)

This 7 days in New York I will never forget.

We had a wonderful stay at Olivier's home! The apartment is beautiful and clean with a very welcoming feel. Olivier gave us great recommendations on breakfast spots in the neighborhood as well as advice on which metro card option would be best for our stay in the city. The apartment is conveniently located to a couple of subway stations, and the Bed-Stuy neighborhood is now one of my favorite spots in Brooklyn. Highly recommend staying here!

Olivier is a very good host. I was in his room more than a month, the house is very clean. Olivier was always happy to help if I had any questions.The room has a good size bed. I would highly recommend if you plan on staying in Bed-Stuy! :)

The listing description was very good and Olivier kept contact as I was getting there. I felt welcome :) The place was exactly as described with sufficient space for privacy and friendly exchange. Hugo, Olivier's dog is adorable and clean. Nice neighbourhood and very friendly atmosphere altogether.
We stayed at Olivier's place for about three weeks. The appartment was clean (+cleaning lady on a weekly basis

Olivier nous a bien accueilli, son chien est délicieusement doux et adore se faire caresser.
L'appartement comporte 4 chambres, un séjour, 2wc et une seule salle de bain. Lors de mon séjour avec mon copain, les autres chambres étaient aussi occupés et j'avoue que du coup l'espace commun était un peu juste ainsi que l'accès à la salle de bain matin et soir. La climatisation est efficace mais il nous a été difficile de dormir avec à cause du bruit.
Les accès au métro (Lignes A, C et G) se font bien à pieds (5 à 10min de marche).


Olivier was a nice host. His lovely dog was very smooth. 
The flat was clean but a little too small to welcome 6 people in 4 bedrooms. There are 2 toilets but only 1 bathroom and bathroom turnover was not thus that fluent. The AC was efficient but too loud for us to sleep with.
Metro stations are 5 to 10 mins walk (line A, C and G).

Olivier est un hôte accueillant. L'appartement est charmant.
La chambre semble un peu plus petite que sur les photos et la clim fait un peu de bruit.

Olivier was a great host, he was flexible, the house was neat and clean, the room had a comfortable bed and the apartment was new.
He gave us tips when we asked.
All in all we had a pleasant stay.

I stayed in this room for a month and felt completely at home. Olivier is a fantastic host, always accessible, and takes good care of the place. The apartment itself is modern, comfortable, and had everything I needed. The other guests were lovely and it was a comfortable atmosphere all around. Highly recommended.

Non ho mai visto Oliver ma prima del mio arrivo abbiamo parlato al telefono,per spiegarmi le dinamiche della casa. La camera e la stanza in comune riflettono le foto. La location è vicinissima alla fermata del bus ed ha due metro vicine. Se ti piace Brooklyn il quartiere è perfetto!!

Sadly I didn't get to meet Olivier as he was out of the country but the place was great. Really clean & Tidy, it was exactly as you see in the photographs & the description. I talked to Olivier before getting there and he was very friendly. All messages/communications were great, passcodes, keys etc were all simply explained in an email. The locations is good, pretty close to subways and a nice neighbourhood with shops & restaurants within just a few blocks.

Booked online for a 30+ day visit. Friendly reception on arrival. The room was of generous size, furnished and clean. Good neighbourhood and close to A,C and G train lines.  Useful supermarket a few doors away and lots of good places to eat nearby.
Met some really nice house mates during my stay too.
All up 5/5 stars.
Olivier was a great host went above and beyond what was expected! Felt right at home

Olivier is very welcoming, I received messages to meet and get the keys without having to wait, which I appreciated very much.

The apartment is clean, well equipped and beautiful. Really as it is described in the announce.
The room was clean and confortable, with clean sheets and towel.
We also appreciated all the advices about the cool place to see in the neighbourhood.
Olivier is also very friendly but respectful of people who just want their confort and privacy.

It was a very nice stay, and I definitely recommend !

I was a very nice experience, I like to live with other people from other places and talk about our cultures and different ways of life, everything I liked in the department is very comfortable and has everything you need to live the time you're traveling, Oliver he is very attentive and very understandable, though not in all in the department, he will always answer a message whether or contacting and always as help you look, it is a very cute and nice person, I recommend one hundred percent stay, I would the city is very interactive and there are many places to visit, the area of the department is not dangerous and can walk at night without any problems, and I think the department rules are fine, I had no problem, I loved(:
I have a great stay in Olivier apartment. He is very helpful and apartment location is very easy access to Manhattan. Hope to stay there again for my next visit!

Very accurate listing. Super nice place and very affordable for Brooklyn. Olivier's recommendations directed me to some great spots in the area and it was easy to get in and out of Manhattan for work. Olivier let me check in early, checked in on me during my stay to make sure I had everything I needed and even helped me with a towel when I realized I'd forgotten one.

I stayed at Olivier's for one week and it was great! The place is just like the photos - very comfortable and clean. I didn't have a chance to meet Olivier in person but he was communicative the whole time and left me detailed instructions for check-in. Having the G and A/C trains nearby was super convenient and it only takes about 30mins to get into the city. The neighborhood itself doesn't feel super gentrified and it was nice just walking around to get a sense of real Brooklyn. There's also a lot of cool restaurants that are walking distance! I would definitely love to stay here again and would recommend it to anyone :)

Olivier was very attentive all the time and although he don´t live in the apt, he is always present when you need.
The neighborhood is great, near subway stations, with many groceries and coffe shop nearby.
The apt is clean, quite, cozi and bright. I enjoyed a lot staying there this week.
Nice apartment in a good location !
Olivier has been very helpful throughout the stay, quick reply to any request of information, help, among others. The apartment is a really nice and clean. Great experience!!!!

This is my first airbnb experience and my first visit to the US! I had a great time at Olivier's place. The other housemates were very friendly and everyone was quiet at night! I slept very good. There's a nice supermarket nearby so that's great if you want to buy groceries. It's also good commute to Manhattan with the A-train. Communications with Olivier was good, he helped me with Uber when I left because I've never tried that app before! Thank you so much for taking the time to do that! Also his dog Hugo is very cute!! ^^ I had a great stay!

The place is super spacious by New York standards lots of light in the apartment, Olivier was a great host and helped me out when I realised I didn't have a towel which was super nice of him. The walk to both subways is kind of far if you have a lot of stuff with you or are in heels! Overall the place is exactly what I needed and Olivier was a very friendly attentive host.

I really enjoyed my time at Olivier's. The apartment was clean and tidy which made it a joy to spend time there and the place had everything I needed for my 2 weeks stay. Olivier was really nice and super quick on communication and he was always on hand to help in any way he could. I would highly recommend staying at Olivier's apartment to anyone looking to stay in the area.
Really clean place! Olivier was very responsive and helpful.
Awesome host!
Oliver's apartment was great for those looking for a longer term stay in NYC or between houses! Very clean and communication was good.

Olivier was good in communication before and during my stay. The room is full of light, so is the apartment, and it's nice and clean. My room facing the backyard was really quiet, I defo enjoyed staying and my roommates from all over from Europe were super cool too!.

Oliver has been an exemplary host. He has been very attentive to make my stay comfortable as much as possible. The location of the apartment is very convenient to explore the city and surroundings on foot. I have NO complaints regarding this place and its owner. I wish I could have stayed longer. I will absolutely recommend Oliver to any of my friends that go to NYC in the future. Thank you.

Olivier was nothing but a fantastic host. He was transparent with all the details and house rules upfront and effectively communicated all the other move in nuances. Additionally, after I made the decision to cut my stay short, he adjusted my length of stay and reimbursed me for the time I didn't end up living in. He made the transaction seamless,  and without a hassle.

Would highly recommend Olivier as a host and his place as a home.

I've enjoyed and definitely recommend staying at Olivier's home. It is very stylish and has most of the amenities you need other than a washer and dryer, but there is literally a laundromat right around the corner. Olivier's home is also near the subway and fun hipster bars and cafes. He was very responsive and accommodating, and also has the cutest dog. Thanks for letting me stay at your home Olivier!
The apartment by itself is so clean and nice, but the neighborhood was not good, although the location and access to the subway is pretty good.
Everything is accurate! Thank you!
Olivier was a great host. He does everything to make the stay as comfortable as possible and the apartment is how it is described.

space: Stylish and big apartment close to metro and Atwater Market --- The apartment --- Beautiful, spacious and newly renovated 1 bdr apartment. As it is located on the 3rd and top floor of a triplex, it is a very luminous apartment, always filled with natural light. neighborhood_overview: Located in Verdun, only 650 meters (8 min walk) to Lasalle metro station: green line, easy and fast access to down-town by bus or metro
notes: We are always happy to receive your feedback about the apartment, the decor, the appliances and amenities, etc. This helps us continuously improve our standard of quality, so please do let us know your thoughts if you have any, as they are very welcome !!
transit: --- Transport --- -METRO: 8 minutes walk (650m) to the Lasalle Metro station and only 8 metro stops to St-Laurent station (nightlife, restaurants, bars, clubs) and 7 metro stops to Place des Arts (Jazz festival, etc.) The Lasalle metro station is on the green line, so you don’t need to transfer to go down-town! -BIXI: you will LOVE BIXI, the famous Montreal self-access bike rental system. It’s the ideal way to explore the city. There is a BIXI station at only 20 meters of the building (it's almost in front!) -BUS: there is a bus stop (n°107) directly in front of the building, going towards down-town -PARKING is FREE and super EASY to find in the street.
access: You have access to the whole property.
interaction: We are always just a phone call/ email away!
house_rules: Additional rules We are looking forward to welcoming you to Montreal! To ensure your stay is as enjoyable as possible, please make sure you take note of the following points before booking: - No smoking, No pets, No parties/loud music are allowed - We use Airbnb's strict cancellation policy  - Early check-in / late check-out is possible upon availability and subject to fees - All instructions to access the property are in the Guestbook you will receive by email at the latest 7 days prior to check-in (contact us if you haven not received them!) - Please leave the property in the same state in which you found it. If left in an unreasonable state at check-out, excess cleaning charges may be involved  - In the unlikely event that you are disappointed with the property or experience any issues, please inform us immediately. - Children under 2 years old stay for free. A portable baby bed can be provided free of charge if you request it. - Only the number of people indicated in your booking a

host.host_about:
We are Home in Montreal, a team of 4 (Joanna, Catalina, Jeanne and Joel). We are passionate about offering the most beautiful and well located apartments to tourists and business people visiting Montreal. "Home in Montreal" was started in 2012 and has now welcomed over 1000 guests from all over the world in their 13 short term rentals in Montreal.
Please, have a look at all our apartments by clicking on the "see all my listings" button.

We LOVE our city and its amazing neighbourhoods and we would LOVE to share our passion with you! We welcome you in French, English and Spanish and we can't wait to be your hosts in Montreal.

reviews.comments: Joanna was amazing, she responded immediately and the apartment we stayed at was beautiful. The apartment is located in a very nice area and we really appreciated the guide book Joanna left for us as well! Joanna was great and we would book a place through her again in a heartbeat!

Frederique is by far the nicest most decent and hospitable person i've dealt with since I can remember. There are no surprises when you rent from these awesome people, you get what you were promised if not more. The flat was super clean, with a comfortable bed and top notch washing machine, dryer and kitchen equipment. The area is friendly and quiet with nice neighbours.
Frederique responded to my questions instantly, and cooperated regarding any special requests I had.
Those people care about Montreal and their guests passionately, so you will also get a guest book with all the info you need about the area you're staying in as well as the best things to do in Montreal. 
Dealing with people of this standard and kindness is heart warming. I'm glad you guys exist.

My stay with Robert at the apartment hosted by Joanna and Frederique was simply amazing. It had all the amenities we needed to make our trip even more enjoyable. We utilized the kitchen often to cook our meals and enjoyed them on the balcony along with the nice weather and serenity of the neighborhood. The wifi was a little slow during the first few days but manageable. Frederique was a wonderful host and consistently checked up with us, responding very quickly to any questions or regards. There is a very useful packet that came with the place, which provided information on the apartment and many recommendations for anything you could possibly think of--food, shopping, entertainment, etc. The metro was very close to the apartment and the location allowed us to travel very easily to the downtown area of Montreal. Overall, the experience was very satisfying and I certainly recommend anyone traveling to Montreal to stay at this spot! Thanks again, Frederique!

Bonjour,
L'appartement que nous avons loué rue de verdun est fidèle aux photos publiées sur Airbnb. Il est sympa et bien équipé au niveau des électros et des autre équipements. Il est situé pas trop loin du étro.
 Nous avons une réserve quant à la qualité du matelas trop dur et à l' (Website hidden by Airbnb) la chambre qui est située coté route on entend bien tous les bruits de circulation, c'est bien dommage mais compte tenu de la configuration de l'appartement, il ne peut être situé que coté route, si la chambre avait pu être situé du coté intérieur, ça aurait été génial. 
Prévoir peut être un meilleure insonorisation mais apparemment c'est une réserve que j'émets pour pas mal d'appartements à Montréal à l'exception des appartements modernes
Sinon à part ces réserves, je vous le recommande

Bel appartement, idéalement situé près d'une station de métro, parking facile.
Nous n'avons malheureusement pas rencontré Joanna mais très bon contact et disponibilité par écrit et toutes les info pratiques du quartier et des conseils pour la visite de la ville étaient dispo à notre arrivée.

The apartment was very clean upon arrival. And     the way it does in pictures. The hosts were very  helpful and i called them several times to ask questions about a few things and they were nice and very kind. The guest book provided is very handy and i used it during our stay.

The washer dryer are super
The kitchen is very clean and well equipped 
The bathroom is very decent 
The bed size is ok i personally would prefer a bigger bed
The tv Internet and Ac are all excellent addition 
The only issue i had were the stairs to the building and then up to the apartment. I have a knee injury so you can imagine.

Over all this place is so worth it and its close to literally Everything. You just have to walk maximum 10 minutes to be near anything from metros...restaurants. markets...pharmacies...grocery shops...etc...
I highly recommend this apartment if you wanna have a good time in montreal !

name: Terraced Ottoman Villa - Room 1
space: The room I am renting out is in a renovated Ottoman villa with a terraced garden and a magnificent view on to the Bosphorous.  Within a 2 - minute walking distance to Büyükdere (a small Bosphorous village and shopping center) on the bus route connecting to the subway, which provides quick and easy access to Taksim - Kabatas and the historical Peninsula.  Stopping at interesting museums while taking a leisurely walk along the Bosphorous or going for a cup of Turkish coffee in the gardens of an Ottoman Sultan's hunting lodge or taking a ferry to Anadolu Kavagi (a picturesque fishing village) to climb up to its Ottoman Castle and have a look at the Black Sea ... are some of the attractions we can promise you.  There are quite a few other surprises if you're really up for Istanbul adventures ... Or you can just relax and read (or write) your book in a serene atmosphere just listening to the beautiful sounds of nature ...  Organic breakfast is also included.
description: The room I am renting out is in a renovated Ottoman villa with a terraced garden and a magnificent view on to the Bosphorous. Or you can just relax and read (or write) your book in a serene atmosphere just listening to the beautiful sounds of nature ...  Organic breakfast is also included.
house_rules: No smoking in the room and in the house. You can smoke at the garden only.

host.host_about: I'm retired lawyer. Love to meet new people and traveling. Interested with organic agriculture, grow vegetables in the garden.

reviews.comments: The house was marvellous and probably has one of the best terraces in Istanbul. After wandering around in the city centre it was a pleasure to come 'home' to this heavenly place. I hope we can stay again in this house next time we go to Istanbul.
The host canceled this reservation 42 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Designer Warehouse 1BD City Living
summary: Our chic, spacious, cozy & light-filled converted warehouse apartment is located in a quiet street of vibrant Surry Hills. It's within easy walking distance to the city and close to Central Station and its transport links. City living at its best!
space: A contemporary transformation of a warehouse in a quiet street of Surry Hills. Our apartment comes with generous ceiling height, large glass doors and windows drenching the entire apartment with light. But don't worry shutters and curtains are there to protect your lazy lay in. This large (69sqm) contemporary warehouse apartment with mezzanine bedroom includes:  * super comfortable queen size bed with hotel quality bed linens and a generous built-in wardrobe  * private district views from the tranquil & spacious balcony * air conditioning ensuring you are comfortable no matter the temperature outside * complimentary Nespresso coffee (or visit one of the many specialist coffee shops nearby) * spacious and modern bathroom including natural hand, body and hair care products, hair dryer, washing machine & dryer (incl. detergent)  * fully equipped kitchen incl. dishwasher, oven/stove, microwave, toaster and kettle * 55" TV with Cable & Blu Ray Disc player (including a selection of DVDs)  *
description: Our chic, spacious, cozy & light-filled converted warehouse apartment is located in a quiet street of vibrant Surry Hills. It's within easy walking distance to the city and close to Central Station and its transport links. City living at its best! A contemporary transformation of a warehouse in a quiet street of Surry Hills. Our apartment comes with generous ceiling height, large glass doors and windows drenching the entire apartment with light. But don't worry shutters and curtains are there to protect your lazy lay in.
