This large (69sqm) contemporary warehouse apartment with mezzanine bedroom includes:  * super comfortable queen size bed with hotel quality bed linens and a generous built-in wardrobe  * private district views from the tranquil & spacious balcony * air conditioning ensuring you are comfortable no matter the temperature outside * complimentary Nespresso coffee (or visit one of the many specialist coffee shops nearby) * spacious and modern bathroom including natural hand
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is world renowned. A vibrant suburb boasting a huge variety of fantastic restaurants, bars, cafes, galleries and shopping. It is adjacent to Centennial and Moore Park, Hyde Park and many smaller pocket parks, where you can picnic, play a round of golf, horseride, team playing fields, cycle routes (and hire if you didn't bring your own). Or just watch everyone else. You will enjoy strolling the streets where you can view some of the best restored Victorian terrace houses.  All of this is within walking distance of Sydney's CBD and Downtown. The apartment itself is less than 5 minutes walk to Central Station. Please refer to our guidebook for some of our favourite restaurants, bars, etc.
notes: If you love to cook, supermarkets, grocers and delicatessens are close by. We're sure you'll find what you're after. For special occasions, you can pre-order champagne and Lindt Chocolates, which will be awaiting you at arrival. These products can be paid for either at time of booking or separately via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) before arrival. You have a selection of: VEUVE CLICQUOT YELLOW LABEL at A$80  VEUVE CLICQUOT ROSÉ NV at A$110  MOËT & CHANDON IMPÉRIAL at A$70  MOËT & CHANDON ROSÉ IMPÉRIAL at A$100 MOËT & CHANDON ICE IMPÉRIAL at A$110 LINDT LINDOR CHOCOLATE HEART TIN at A$15 Secure undercover car parking is available, please confirm when booking to secure. For monthly stays, fortnightly cleaning at A$85 per clean will be added. Additional cleaning including change of bedlinen and towels can be organised at A$85 per clean. Lost keys and/or lost/damaged pocket WiFi will incur a fee of $AU150 each. Please note that this apartment hasn't been set up for families with children.
transit: The apartment is ideally located in a quiet residential street, less than a 5 minute walk to Central station with major train, bus and light rail connections. It takes you about 12 minutes from and to the airport by train. You can walk to the Sydney's Centrepoint Tower in 15 minutes, Chinatown in 10 minutes, Darling Harbour in 15 minutes as well as catch the train/bus to Bondi Beach in 30 minutes, and the Blue Mountains in 1.5 hours. Ferries are available from Circular Quay for a leisurely journey to Taronga Zoo and Manly Beach. For the sports enthusiasts, apart from the onsite gym, there is also a public 50m lap pool within a 5 minute reach at Prince Alfred Park. There is an abundance of Yoga and Pilates studios in Surry Hills. There is a 18 hole public golf course at Moore Park, and plenty of running courses. Without a doubt your fitness levels will be maintained.
access: Entire apartment is yours to enjoy, with security access and lift.  Secure undercover car parking is available, please confirm when booking to secure.
interaction: We live in the area and can meet you at check-in and show you around. We will provide you with a list of our favourite places to eat, drink and shop - there are lots. Should you need to contact us during your stay, we are generally available on our mobiles between 8am and 11pm.
house_rules: Be considerate of the neighbours and keep noise to a minimum after 10pm - No parties at any time. This is a pet and smoke free apartment. Air Conditioner, fans and heater to be turned off when not in the apartment. Please leave the apartment the way you found it, remove shoes in the apartment, and leave the sand at the beach.

host.host_about:
We are a professional couple with a passion for travelling, food, discovering new restaurants, shopping, interior design and arts. 
We have been using airbnb for many years, and love the personal touch and experience it brings to our travels.

reviews.comments: The place was great; clean and quiet with modern and tasteful appointments. Large living/dining space. The location fantastic. Nicole was only a call away and always happy to offer advice when needed. Would definitely be back.

Look no further! We had an excellent stay at this amazing apartment. It is so central everything is in walking distance, great restaurants, pubs, bars, entertainment yet the apartment is nice an quite. The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. Nicole was only a phone call away and attend to all of our needs which were quite extensive. I will always come back to this apartment!

Highly recommend this apartment! Fantastic location, with a 5 minute walk to Central station and also to Crown St cafes & shops, but feels like a leafy quiet residential neighbourhood. You couldn't get better! The apartment had everything we could possibly need on a trip and more - from umbrellas to hairdryers to bandaids! And a lolly bowl on arrival! The host has carfeully thought of everything. Huge tv, super comfy couch and very spacious balcony, comfy bed, lots of travel books, full kitchen.  The apartment feels very spacious and luxuious for 2. Key pick up/drop off was easy and communication from Nicole was fantastic. She responded instantly to any queries we had and was very helfpul on our last day checking out. We loved our stay and won't hesitate to book again if back in Sydney. Thanks!

Fantastic place in surry hills. Very easy to check-in, as Simon and Nicole were waiting for me at the loft. 
The place is well designed, very bright and large. 
I would go back anytime!

Nicole has an amazing apartment. Well designed, cozy and fully equipped. The bed was very comfortable that we almost didn't want to wake every morning! It's centrally located near the Central station so it's a plus if you are on public transport though the area could get pretty quiet at night. Sweet little touches like a lolly bowl and chocolates near your bedside table made us feel welcome. Nicole was also very prompt in replying our messages. Great host and place!

Thoroughly enjoyed staying at Nicole and Simon's apartment in the fantastic Surry Hills. The apartment is refreshingly spacious, clean and very quiet. The secure parking was very helpful to.

Nicole really went out of her way to help us out on numerous occasions whether it was finding places to eat or getting around.

The location is practically perfect for food and coffee lovers with numerous cafes, restaurants and bars all within a 5-10 minute walk. Central Station is just around the corner too.

Highly recommended!

The place was beautiful, clean, and looks just like all of the photos.  Nicole was very helpful and accommodating with all of our travel needs.  It was close to central station which was great, but if you will be traveling with large, heavy luggage from the train there were hills to keep in mind when pulling around your suitcase.

We were welcomed accordingly from our friendly host, Nicole. She was very considerate, helpful and great at communication. As soon as we walked into the apartment, we felt like it was our new home for our short visit. It's a spacious and very tidy apartment filled with a great selection of furniture. We loved the little frenchie decor! The bed was also one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept on. 

The neighbourhood was nice and quiet yet we still found ourselves surrounded by interesting shops and cafes close by when we walked out from the building. Reuben Hills was a great cafe which we highly recommend!

One of our favourite features of this airbnb was the access to the beautiful rooftop garden/pool area. Great view of the cbd and generally an awesome spot to relax in.

Simon and Nicole were very helpful throughout our stay. They were on hand to help at all times and addressed our needs without any issues.The apartment was as described, nicely renovated and maintained in a nice, quiet, easy to access building. It had everything we needed and more. Surry Hills is a great area close to all attractions in the city but away from the noise and hustle, cafes and restaurants are a short walking distance making it an area ideal for all purposes.

Thanks Nicole for a lovely stay! Checking in and out was very easy. The amazing studio apartment was very comfortable, thoughtfully filled with heaps of amenities. Location was perfect and very central, close walk to Central Station and you are spoiled for cafes and coffee in the surrounding neighbourhood. Thanks again for a great stay in Surry Hills!!

Simon and Nicole's apartment is in an excellent location, walking distance to Central station and Right next to Crown St. 
Nicole met us at check in to show us around. The apartment has everything you need and was very quiet, even on the weekend. 
We had a great time, thank you Simon and Nicole!

Simon and Nicole's spacious apartment is nestled amongst the leafy streets of Surry Hills, only a few minutes walk from funky Crown St and to Central Station. The space is warm and comfortable with a well stocked kitchen and a feeling of being at home. 

We were able to arrive late on a Sunday night and Nicole made sure our arrival was problem free. This was a fantastic place to stay and I could not fault it!

This was such a beautiful experience so clean and fresh the bed is the most comfortable bed I have ever slept on! We are investing in a new bed and sheridan sheets doona etc now!
I loved the balcony and would have my coffee there in the morning while reading my book. The location was perfect for us and Nicole went the extra mile to get us the milk froth machine to form part of our coffee experience. The hand and shampoo products were so lovely.

THanks so much Nicole we will be back! The smarties at the bed side table were a nice touch and the umbrella which we needed so thank you!!

Simon and Nicole were wonderful hosts. Very polite and helpful. Their place was very clean,spotles, close to transport and in walking distance to cafe and restaurants. I would recommend this place to my family and friends. Thankyou for having us there.
We loved our stay in Surry Hills! Great apartment, perfectly located in a FANTASTIC neighborhood. We would rent the place again in a heartbeat!

Thank you for having us stay in your amazing apartment, we felt most welcome and at home there. The apartment is beautifully decorated, very comfortable and was just perfect for us. We look forward to visiting again.

Simon and Nicole were very welcoming hosts. They greeted me on arrival and went through house details. They had prepared a handy book for guests with lists of their favourite restaurants and the locations. 

The kitchen was fully stocked with spices, tea flavours and an Nespresso machine. The bathroom had lovely toiletries and supplies.

Overall I had a lovely stay. Simon and Nicole were very accommodating hosts. The area is in a great location with easy access to public transport.
Excellent accommodation for my business trip to Sydney. Excellent hosting and attention to detail, thank you so much!

Nicole was able to meet us at the apartment to show us details about the use of keys and the security system and other provisions in the apartment.
The location was ideal for what we intended to do in Sydney being a short walk to Crown Street and it was near our family who we were visiting.  Transport to The Opera House and The Sydney Theatre Company was also an easy taxi ride.
The living and kitchen area in the apartment was spacious and light and airy, while the bedroom was discretely placed behind a wall divide. Even though the bathroom was on the small side, it was well equipped with hair dryer, soap, shampoo and all you would need for a short or longer stay. (We often want to do washing when we are away,  but not this time). The apartment was clean and tidy with a very comfortable lounge. There was a great deal of cupboard space in the bedroom as well.

My cousin and I stayed here for a couple nights in August 2015. It's a crazy short walk from Central Station, which makes it easy to get just about anywhere in the city and really handy if you're getting the train from the airport because the airport link stops at Central. The place was exactly as it looks in the photos: clean, spacious and filled with light. Nicole was lovely to deal with from start to finish and I said to my cousin that I'll definitely look this place up again next time I need a place in Sydney!

My daughter and I stayed here for 2 nights last week. Its bright, clean and has everything you need. We had beautiful sunny days so the sunlight poured onto the balcony where I spent an hour attending to some work on my laptop. Its a very convenient location so we easily walked to Crown St for a fabulous breakfast before walking over to UTS campus in Ultimo. Lovely bonuses with aromatic handwash and body lotion.

Simon and Nicole were great hosts with a fantastic apartment/designer warehouse. Simon and Nicole have put a high level of effort into the apartment to ensure that guests feel welcome and familiar with the area of Surry Hills. Nicole was contactable if we needed any assistance anytime during our stay. The apartment is lovely and spacious inside with only a short stroll to the Sydney CBD.
I would highly recommend to anybody staying in Sydney.
Fantastic stay, superb accommodation and hosts par excellence!

The apartment was perfect for a week of visiting Sydney - we were walking distance from cafes, restaurants, tourist sites, and the central train station so we could get anywhere in the city. The pictures accurately represented the apartment, which was gorgeous, clean, and well appointed - but they didn't include the view, which was also spectacular. Thank you, Nicole, for making the visit so easy and seamless.

Our stay at Nicole ' s cosy studio apartment was definitely a wonderful experience. Nicole was prompt in answering our queries before the stay, she's also flexible to let us have the keys earlier. There're some snacks in the apartment and we absolutely love the nespresso  coffee machine. We also had a game at the rooftop tennis court on Sunday morning and that ended our stay in sydney perfectly. The apartment is within walking distance to shops and cafes.

I stayed in Nicole's amazing Warehouse apartment for 8 days and had the pleasure of meeting Nicole on check in. Everything was very easy and Nicole did everything possible to make my stay as comfortable as possible. 

On entering the apartment I had two thoughts. 1- this apartment looks better than the photos. 2- this place actually feels like home. Nicole has gone to great efforts to make this apartment really feel like it's home. Everything from the Nespresso coffee to the lollies and little extras in the fridge for arrival. I was so thankful for all of this. 

The amenities are great and a perfect, quiet location that is next to the city and so close to everything you need in Sydney. I would honestly say that this would be the most comfortable Air BnB that I have stayed in. 

The only real thing that I would say about this apartment would be that it is more like a studio apartment, as opposed to a 1 bedroom apartment. The bed is elevated in comparison to the rest of the living space and private thanks to half height walls, though all the actual  walls are common in the apartment which I was surprised about when I arrived. I do believe that 1 bedroom would be classed as a bedroom being completely separated from the rest of the living space, also something that I look for when staying away from home. In saying that, it's still one of the best Air BnB's that I've stayed in.

Definitely recommended!

Thanks Nicole!

We loved staying at Cooper Street! So close to everything including the city, restaurants, parks and transport! And the host Nicole went out of her way to accommodate our needs with our little one! Such a great spot!

This apartment is just perfect!  It's clean, spacious, in a good location -  close to public transport, grocery stores and heaps of great cafe's.  I didn't get to meet Nicole but she is very responsive, flexible and friendly, her mindfulness is evident in the attention to detail everywhere in the apartment. 
I'm so glad I booked for December too - can't wait to get back!
Thanks Nicole, see you in a couple of months!

We had a great stay at the apartment of Simon and Nicole. Location is perfect, close to many nice restaurants and bars. The apartment itself is large and very convenient (great bed and shower). We highly recommend to stay here!

This apartment is clean, modern, and comfortable.  We appreciated the thorough communication and ease of hand-off for the keys.  We were especially grateful for the toiletries, guidebooks, laundry powder, and coffee provided - the attention to detail was wonderful!  The building requires the key to use the elevator, so we felt very secure. We would stay here again!  Be aware that the 1BD is separated by a partial wall, so if you're looking for privacy from the living room, it is limited.

We enjoyed staying in Surry Hills. It is convenient being so close to Central Station.  It seems to be an up and coming neighborhood so I would advise others that you should assess your level of comfort with urban life. By day, I noticed all of the cute restaurants, yoga/barre spots, and shops. (Simon and Nicole provided excellent recommendations as well!) By night, I noticed more of the remaining graffiti, vacant storefronts, and quiet streets.  If you do not feel comfortable in cities or would feel more assured with constant tourist traffic, you may want to spend more to be closer to CBD. For us, it was perfect.  Thanks Simon and Nicole!
Perfect apartment - great location, size and beautifully decorated. Rooftop was huge and the pool looked lovely. We had a fantastic stay at the apartment and would definitely come back again.

Nicole was very prompt and friendly in replying all queries and messages. I didn't have a chance to meet her but the flat was impeccable and so welcoming. The attention to detail was brilliant: great coffee, toiletries, and amazing bed and shower. The description was very accurate. I look forward to returning to the flat in the future.
This was a lovely place to stay - great location, great apartment, great hosts.

Great apartment in a fab location! Really wonderful apartment in a cool part of Sydney, a few minutes walk from central station and also really close to the cafés and restaurants of Crown Street.  The apartment has been maintained to a really high standard and has some nice touches from the hosts such as lovely bathroom products, tennis racquets for the rooftop court and a really useful house manual with recommendations for your stay.  Really attentive hosts, really quick to respond to messages and helpful with queries. Would stay here again if I'm in Sydney.

Thank you Simon & Nicole for a very enjoyable three night stay in Sydney. We loved the location of the apartment and found it very convenient -only five min walk from central station and a very enjoyable half hour walk into the city. 
The roof top pool and tennis court was a highlight. We enjoyed a very relaxing day lazing around the pool- beach towels and tennis equipment supplied. 
Thank you again. Hope we can stay again soon.

Great apartment in an awesome part of Sydney. Nicole met us and showed us around - she was fantastic and really friendly. Great restaurant recommendations too. The apartment has everything you could need, as well as a rooftop pool and tennis court. Would highly recommend for a bit of indulgence in Sydney.

From our initial communication to the day we checked out, we could not fault our stay here.  Nicole was super-efficient with communication, the apartment was perfect for our two week stay and we can't recommend this place highly enough.
The location is perfect, just a five minute walk to the "Central" rail station which is a twelve minute ride from the airport.
Surry Hills is a vibrant neighborhood, with a range of restaurants from coffee and cake to fine dining and everything in between.
Bondi beach is a fifteen minute drive and Circular Quay (for the Opera House and Bridge) just four stops on the train.

Apartment was great, exactly like the photos. Had the most comfortable bed and nice touches like products and and other little goodies for a nice experience. Very helpful guidebooks and recommendations as well. Great location, right near the Central rail station so you can get anywhere easily and only a 15 min walk to the CBD.

Staying at the apartment in Surry Hills was such a great experience! It was well stocked with everything you would need, including a great pantry of seasonings! We LOVED having the Nespresso Maker as well!!! The bed was very comfortable and the shower head was like being under a waterfall!!!!!! The building itself was amazing and the rooftop views were beautiful, especially at sunset! Not to mention the awesome pool!!! Everything about the Surry Hills apartment was amazing, from brekkies on the balcony to evenings on the most comfortable couch in the world! Also the little details like the advent calendar with little chocolates in it and the bowl of yummy candies to munch on! Thanks for a great stay Nicole and Simon!

This is my second time staying at Nicole and Simon's beautiful bright, spacious apartment.  The  apartment is within walking distance of everything - transport, grocery stores and an abundance of cafes, restaurants and bars.  There is NOTHING that Nicole hasn't thought of!  Nicole is an absolute pleasure who goes above and beyond to ensure her guests wellbeing.  We will be back :-)

Amazing apartment in a really great location, loads of nice bars and restaurants around Surry Hills and just a Stone's throw away from the city. We really enjoyed our time there and felt right at home in the apartment.

The place was amazing. Located on the top floor of an apartment complex in Surry Hills it was central yet quiet. Train station a five minute walk will get you anywhere and some nice local pubs and places to eat close by also. 
The space itself it awesome. Has everything you need and the cable TV caused us to stay inside a little more than we probably should have. 
Pool and gym located in the building as well as a roof top tennis court none of which seem to get overly busy which is good.

Nicole and Simon were a pleasure to deal with and flexible with us as guests. Would recommend to anyone and would return when next in Sydney.

Thanks again Nicole and Simon.

We didn't meet Nicole and Simon when we arrived yet Nicole was very responsive with our inquiry and sent us the details of key pick up location. The check in process were seamless and we found the parking easily.

The apartment has a great location, only minutes away from great restaurants and I found a great hairdresser just 5 minutes away who knows my hairdresser in Canberra. What a small world!

I like the toiletries provided in the apartment. Normally I use Aesop products and the Brown Alchemist products were very similar to what I normally used. 

I also like the way they provided everything that we might need in a trip such as umbrella, hair dryer, even Opal cards (we have our own but it must be really handy for someone new to Sydney). We walked to central station and enjoying the gigs and shows at Sydney Festival. The Uber charge from the city was less than $10. 

Thanks Nicole and Simon for sharing your nice place with us. We'll stay again if we are going to Sydney next time :)

Great apartment. Excellent location close to restaurants, bars, supermarkets and public transport.
Very good facilities with nice personal touches.
Nicole provided a very helpful booklet and the restaurant recommendations proved a big hit.
We were able to check in early and the key pick up arrangements worked well.
Although we didn't meet Simon and Nicole there was good communication throughout our stay.
We really enjoyed our stay in Sydney, would highly recommend the apartment and would definitely stay again on a return trip.

Location very close to Central station makes everything in Sydney accessible. The restaurants and bars on crown street were perfect because we could relax close to home after a long day of site seeing. I would recommend this to anyone who likes living in a city and being a little outside of the tourist CBD. The apartment had everything we needed for a week long stay.

Apartment was stunning, exactly like the photos. Very warm and welcoming and the little touches made my stay feel like home. 
Unfortunately there was a lot of construction work across the road, but as I was up for work during week, did not impact my stay. 
Nicole and Simon were both great hosts, particularly as I had to call them to assist. Great communication and very hospitable.

Great apartment in a nice neighborhood. The apartment is nicely maintained and everything was clean. It was the second time we stayed in one of the apartments of Simon & Nicole. We would definitely stay here again on our next visit to Sydney.

Check in instructions were easy and Nicole was very helpful in all communications. That apartment was perfect for my needs in a great location very close to the Surry Hills shops and restaurants. The rooftop pool was also a treat after exploring Sydney each day. Hope to stay here again on future trips.
Made us very welcome, flexible and attentive,  very well appointed apartment in a fascinating area. Just what we had hoped for!

Nicole met us at the loft and went over the TV, Wifi, etc., - we were totally impressed as this did not happen at the places we stayed in  Cairns & the Brisbane area (those hosts were only available by email/phone/text which was welcomed).
We loved this loft which was perfect for our 6 nights in Sydney. 
Nicole had thought of everything and supplied it which was wonderful, location is perfect for public transport, restaurants, sight-seeing, etc.,
The only negative was the work going on outside from around 7:30 - 4pm - demolishing of a building opposite the loft - it was pretty noisy at times.  
Nicole mentioned it was temporary and she apologized that it was happening (she shared that she had just  found out about the demolition recently). 
We would defintely stay here again when in Sydney - it was the best place we have stayed in during our 3 week travel across Australia.
We will definitely encourage friends to stay here too if they travel to Sydney.

Fantastic, modern apartment in a very central location. Nicole was there to meet me on arrival which was terrific and hugely helpful. Would recommend this listing highly and hope to be back some day soon.

First rate host and apartment. The hosts cared about the quality of our stay and this showed. A lovely apartment. The only downside was the noise from building works directly outside. However when so many other things were perfect this is easily forgiven

Simon and Nicole's apartment was an absolute delight! 
It is very conveniently located near the Central train station stop-which is the perfect place to be if you are going to the Blue Mountains, beaches, anywhere really- from Sydney. This stop is only minutes from Circle Quay which is the stop for the wharf and all ferry transfers, the Rocks, Sydney Opera House, etc. With the Central Station so near we felt truly like we were in the perfect location.
The apartment itself is very clean, cozy, and has everything you need to feel right at home. Kitchen is well stocked with necessary items for  light cooking, but there are also many cafés and coffee houses near by. Staying here made us feel like we had a home ( or at least an apartment) away from home right in Sydney. 
We would definitely stay there again on future visits to this beautiful city!
It was an absolute perfect place for us to stay on our first visit to Sydney! We would highly recommend this apartment to anyone!

Nicole was a great host.  She showed us around when we arrived, and was very responsive to all communications, providing the extra information we needed before travelling from the UK. The location was fantastic and we loved being so close to Central, and within a few minutes' walking distance from dozens of restaurants, pubs and shops. The apartment was beautiful, very comfortable and just perfect for two people, and had everything we needed. We absolutely loved it, and will be back next year.  Thanks Nicole and Simon!

Nicole est une hote tres arrangeante et tres disponible. L'appartement est agréable et parfaitement équipé ainsi que idéalement situé dans Sydney. De plus la piscine et le court de tennis situé sur le toit de l'immeuble permettent de passer un séjour inoubliable. N'hésitez pas réservez

We had a wonderful time in Sydney staying at Simon & Nicole's apartment. It's very well situated - Surry Hills is a really great neighbourhood with loads of great cafes, bars, restaurants, clubs, etc. and is only a 10 minute walk from the central station. From there you can go practically anywhere in the city. The airport is only a 10-15 minute train ride away, as is the harbour. 

The apartment itself is beautiful and well appointed. Nicole very kindly travelled through the busy Sydney traffic to the apartment from a BBQ to meet us as we arrived. She made us feel very welcome and showed us around and explained how to use the TV, appliances, etc. She also explained how to use the roof terrace which is just amazing with fantastic views over the city. Perfect for a morning swim!

I would also like to note that the little touches such as the provision of factor 50 sun cream, beach towels, and tennis racquets (for the rooftop court) were brilliant. Very well thought out.

We very much enjoyed our stay at Simon and Nicole's and would highly recommend it to anyone.

Simon and Nicole's apartment was lovely. Well set out in a safe and well appointed apartment block. The couch and bed were comfy and the shower has brilliant water pressure!
Nicole was a pleasure to deal with for my first Airbnb experience, even helping me with using the app!

Nicole was great host with excellent communication before, during and after our stay, also welcomed us warmly on our arrival showing us every detail of the apartment and surrounding.

The place is just as good as on the pictures, and especially the bathroom to be underlined with amenities even more than you could need!

Location is great, close to central station, and Surry Hills is such a perfect place full of wonderful dinning spots. Make sure you follow Nicole's guide book, all her recommendations are golden words. We tried 4 restaurants from the book, fantastic!

We had very good time here. Highly recommended :D
Nicole is a lovely host to deal with, very kind and helpful.  The apartment self is excellent, beautifully decorated and extremely comfortable to live in and the location is brilliant
My colleagues Stefan and Mandie enjoyed the abundance space and location of this place. They assured me they will definitely be back.
This was an excellent experience.  A beautiful apartment in a fantastic neighbourhood.  Simon and Nicole were accommodating and easy to communicate with.  All good!
Amazing large apartment in a terrific location

Great location and cozy flat. Parking is a great bonus especially int he city. The apartment was clean and check in was flexible and easy. Would definitely recommend for anyone wanting a place in city that has parking and is close to public transport. Central station is less then a 5 min walk and so many fantastic cafes close to the apartment. Great stay.

Nicole and Simon's apartment in Surry Hills is a beautiful spot, really close to central station and all of Sydney's main attractions. The apartment itself was very comfortable and their attention to detail made it feel like a 5* hotel. Would thoroughly recommend staying there.
Great apartment, super spacious, and in a great location. Definitely recommend Nicole & Simon's apartment. They were quick to reply with any questions and provided everything we needed for our stay.
Loved the place! Easy to find, and a great apartment. Nicole was helpful and informative. Couldn't ask for more :)
Amazing location, great apartment with everything you need for a visit to Sydney. Would be happy to stay again  and recommend.

Nicole & Simon's apartment was perfect for a weekend away. My girlfriend and I enjoyed every aspect of the apartment. It is very well furnished, stocked and all of a high quality. The apartment is in a prime location for walking to the City, Oxford street and Crown street. We didn't need the car at all! 
The attention to detail in the apartment is great, it has everything you need to make the most of your stay, it has a lot to offer. It is very quiet for its location, we never heard any noise during the day/night from inside the apartment. I highly recommend staying here for any couple! 
Thank you!

We were very please with the apartment and its location. Unfortunately, we did not meet Nicole in person, but Donna was very kind to wait for us and give us the key. The unit is very well appointed and comfortable. Nice partial view of the Sydney skyline from the rooftop area. We were lucky to be in town for Vivid Sydney.
Love this place - this is my third time staying here! It is a fantastic apartment in a great area at a great price.  Nicole always goes above and beyond!

Great clean space in a super convenient location with central station and great cafes at walking distance. Nicole was there to show us in, and was kind enough to allow us an earlier check in time. Recommended.

Incredible place and incredible host...even was super flexible when I accidentally told her the wrong time of our arrival (oops). The place is gorgeous and makes you feel like a local while being an easy train ride or walk to all the tourist places. Highly recommend it.

Terrific space in a cracking spot of Surrey hills. Large, open living with really comfortable furniture and pretty much everything required to make for a very comfortable stay. The accom was clean, quiet at night and in the thick of the action. Would definitely recommend staying.

Loved staying at this light, bright and airy apartment, comfortable with attention to detail. The location is convenient and as an inner city spot this area has developed into a delightful place for exploring. A short walk to Cental Station made commuting further, easy. Recommended.

Un très bon accueil (en Français, un plus pour nous), logement confortable, très bien équipé, avec une jolie piscine sur le toit. Très bien situé pour les transports, les petits Resto recommandés par Nicole  & Simon sont bons et tout près. Un endroit à retenir.

Thank you again Nicole & Simon, another great stay in one of your properties. The apartment is spacious, well equipped and very comfortable for a few night or long term stay. Great location, we really love being in Surry Hills, so many delicious food options within a short walking distance. Communication prior to and during stay was prompt. There was some construction near the apartment during our stay which was not ideal in the mornings but obviously nothing that Nicole and Simon could have prevented, just as an FYI to guests in the coming weeks. Highly recommend and we will be back.

Stayed at Simon & Nicole's place for 4 nights at the beginning of our holiday, really easy to get in touch with and met us at the apartment even though we got there fairly late in the day. The apartment is in a great location for everything whether you want to catch the train or walk everywhere! It is very tastefully decorated &  really appreciated the little touches like the nespresso machine & travel guides. I wish our bed at home was as comfy! Only negative was that the pool was closed for refurbishment, which can't be helped & was just our bad luck! There was a bit of building work out the back which was pretty noisy from about 7.30am onwards but on the plus side it got us up & doing things in the short time we had in Sydney instead of lying in bed! 
Thanks for a great stay- have already recommended your place to friends!

A really cool place to stay. Very vibrant neighborhood. Train from airport to Central and then a short walk to apartment. Not huge but way bigger and more comfortable than a hotel room. Hosts were very accommodating and allowed us to leave luggage til mid afternoon on day of departure.  Highly recommend this place.

Really nice and funky apartment in a great area! Very close to central train station and so many great places to eat! I didn't get to meet Nicole but she was so accommodating and we had everything that we needed! Would definitely recommend to all

We were thrilled with our stay here.  The location was great - it's centrally located near a main train station (Central) and it's a few blocks away from a grocery store, cafes, and restaurants.  It's a quieter neighborhood, which was perfect for us.  There was construction going on at the time, but Nicole let me know about that ahead of time.  The amenities were great - everything you could need.  The pool was being worked on, so that area was closed off.  When that space is back up and running, it's a great rooftop spot.  They even have a tennis court and Nicole and Simon provide you with rackets.  The bed was really comfortable and the layout of the apartment was perfect for a couple.  There was a day when it was raining, and we enjoyed snuggling up on the comfy couch, drinking tea, reading and watching movies.  They have a selection of movies available.  It seems they also had Netflix, but this was protected through parental controls, so we couldn't access it. It would be nice if there is an option for the renter to use their own account if they already have one, but that is really a minor thing in comparison with all the other great things this place offers.  Highly recommend staying here.

Exceeded high expectations! The apartment is even more beautiful and charming than the pictures capture. And the location is PERFECT. Walking distance to everywhere - especially Crown Street where there are tons of cafes and coffee shops.

Oh and the bed is heavenly. 

I'm disappointed that these guys are booked during my next trip to Sydney in November, otherwise I wouldn't have looked any further. It seems they are booked roughly 90% of the time, based on the calendar Nicole showed me...so book early!

PS - their guide book is GOLD! Best listing of restaurants and cafes I've seen in 10 AirBnB stays.

Simon and Nicole welcomed us in their lovely apartment. The apartment has everything to help make our stay comfortable with all extras, I can think of nothing else they could include. Convenient location, comfortable bed, loved the decor. Thank you I would definetly stay again.
Great hosts, good place, very chic, very nice, would come back again.

The location is perfect, close to the city and all the wonderful eateries, we were excited every morning to explore the neighborhood for breakfast. The house is very neat and spacious. We enjoyed our stay very much.

Had a wonderful stay at Nicole and Simons place in Surry Hills. Close enough to the city and lovely local restaurants and bars. Bourke St bakery was lovely so was the little cafe across the Rd which served a lovely breakfast. 
Thank you so much, for our beautiful accommodation it was fantastic.
Look forward to our next stay.
The place was great and exactly as described.  The location was great and Nicole was helpful in explaing the area upon our arrival. Would definitely stay here again if visiting Sydney again.

Simon and Nicole's apartment has everything you need and in a great location. Just a few minutes walk to Crown Street with loads of dining options and only 5 minutes or so walk to  Central Station. The Surry Hills is the best location to stay in Sydney. Definitely recommend staying in Simon and Nicole's apartment.

Simon & Nicole's designer warehouse in Surrey Hills was a perfect getaway spot for my husband and I. 

Walking distance from so much and they truly made us feel at home right down to the little details of leaving a comprehensive guide of what is close by and leaving little treats for us by our bedside!

Would definitely stay here again and would recommend to anyone considering a holiday in Sydney.

My husband and I had an amazing stay here. It was near the Central station and there was a small supermarket nearby which closed late, there was also lots of food around and was nearby the famed Bourke Street Bakery. The place was clean and the amenities were amazing, we could see that every thought was put into the decoration and we could find everything we needed. Everything was great and we will be back again!
Eleanor told me that it was a great place!

The host did make us feel very welcome and the Air bnb was amazing - exactly like the pictures. The hosts were very quick to answer any questions we had with helpful suggestions. The space was very comfortable and clean, however, we did not have access to the pool during our stay. 
The location was very convenient and we were able to access central station easily. We also found the suggestions for places to eat in the booklet provided very helpful. 
A highly recommended stay!
Everything was perfect. Nothing was not concudered by the hosts and we had everything we needed for a perfect 3 days in Sydney. Beautiful space and a wonderful location. We were sad to leave.
Everything was great! They took care of each detail and made us feel like being at home!

Nicole and Simon's apartment was exactly as pictured and we had a lovely stay in their clean, comfortable and spacious place. Our communication with Nicole was always easy and she was quick to reply. It is close to so many delicious restaurants and coffee shops, attractions and boutiques. We would highly recommend this place and hope to visit again. Thanks for everything!

Nicole was excellent to deal with good communication throughout the booking 
Would highly recommend this property

A gorgeous little apartment in Surry Hills. Great location and the apartment had everything you could need. Perfect for people travelling solo or a couple. Nicole was lovely to deal with and always responded very quickly.

Nicole was very friendly and helpful upon arrival.  The neighborhood was cute but we had trouble eating out in the area.  Only because everywhere was so crowded.  I would recommend reservations.  Even on week nights, the places we tried to go were overcrowded - this may have been just the restaurants we tried to go to though.

Very nice apartment at excellent location. It is on a quiet street, but building works on building opposite are still ongoing and start at 07:00.  Contacts with Nicole were easy with very quick responses.  A special arrangement was made to accommodate our later arrival, which went smooth.  Would be happy to come back to this apartment at a future visit to Sydney.

This is a good spot if you want to be out of the hustle and bustle of the city but close enough to walk to it. The Air Con only goes down to 18 degrees celsius and mostly directs to the living room not the bed room so if you sleep hot be warned. 

Sweet place!
Great place! great time!
Our stay was fabulous. Location is great, near everything. The apt is clean and exactly as described. Unfortunately the pool was being worked on the 6 weeks we were there   Would highly recommend it!

I have stayed at many air bnbs and this is definitely one of the best I have been in. The accomodation has all the facilities needed and very close to great Shops and restaurants. The attention to detail in property like the quality of duvets, towels etc is super and they kindly helped us with our very late check in! Perfect place to stay!

Simon and Nicole's apartment was just perfect. The location and free parking was a must for us. Fully equipped kitchen and lovely decoration. Plus the bed was extra comfy!! 
Nicole was very quick to answer and check in was easily done. I recommend this place without hesitation. 

Thanks again!
This place is great. Excellent location and well-presented.

Our second stay here and we will come again. Brilliant location a quick walk from Central but quiet. Close to tons of restaurants and bars/pubs. Super clean and has absolutely everything you could want. Coffee machine, pool and gym will bring us back every time. Next time we'll try the tennis court. Host super-responsive and helped us check in early after long flight from London. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
Fantastic place in the centre of Sydney! Everything is within walking distance, would definitely book again!

A great size flat in an amazing location. Perfect access to every area of Sydney, while being far enough away from the centre of town.
Really cool bars and restaurants in the area.
Rooftop view is pretty good too!

Simon and Nicole's place was very comfortable and perfectly situated for a few days exploring Sydney! It was quiet, the bed and linens soft, and included amenities that were very helpful (washer/dryer with detergent, all toiletries, good wifi, a bit of cable TV, good selection of kitchen tools, etc.). We walked everywhere, including the Central Business District, Paddington, Bronte, and a ton of other places. Simon and Nicole were very responsive and made our stay there a breeze!
We had a great stay at Simon & Nicole's place. Good eating places and train station nearby. Clean, great location and would definitely stay here again next time we come to Sydney.
Great location, very comfortable bed.  Everything just as shown on the website. We would stay here again if visiting Sydney.  Sydney is a wonderful place to visit!
Great apartment, great location. Within walking distance of several nice cafes and restaurants. Having a pool on the roof and access to gym was great bonus. Nice views from rooftop.
Great apartment, great location and great hosts. We would definitely stay here again!

Great place.  Nice walk to many places around.  If you want to walk to the city, it's only a 30 minute walk.  Very safe at night.  If you are a late sleeper, worry about construction waking you up about 8am.  Washer/dryer are great!  The shower head is awesome! And free parking!
Lovely and central place to stay in Sydney.

Appartement magnifique et tres bien équipé, dans une résidence sécurisée propre et qui offre de nombreuses prestations (salle de sport (bien Que tres petite ), court de tennis, piscine). Tres bon emplacement au coeur de La ville sans pour autant en avoir Les désagréments. 

Quelques travaux en face de l'appartement qui gâchent un peu La vue malheureusement, et sont source de petites nuisances sonores (en particulier le matin ) mais rien de bien méchant . 

Je n'ai pas eu la chance de Les rencontrer en personne mais Simon et Nicole sont vraiment tres disponibles par message en cas de besoin. 
 
Globalement je recommande vivement cet endroit, idéal pour célibataire Ou couple sans enfant.
Had a great stay, the location was perfect!
Lovely apartment, close to public transport, city, restaurants. Hosts were great with communication! Great place to stay when visiting Sydney!

My partner and I stayed in this clean spacious apartment for five nights. It's right in the heart of Surry Hills, a five-minute walk to all kinds of fun shops and restaurants. We walked *everywhere* during our stay---to the harbor many times, and to many parks and neighborhoods. We enjoyed returning to this apartment and relaxing in the evenings. We loved the building's roof deck---seriously, it's a delight!---and fitness center. We cooked almost every night while we were there, and loved the easy walk to great markets. Nicole was out of town during our stay, but still she and Simon responded to us promptly. We're very glad we stayed here.

Simon and Nicole's place was perfect for my needs. The location means that great cafes and restaurants, the central train station, the business district, and many of the main tourist attractions are all walkable.  The apartment is well equipped with high quality appliances and, best of all, a super-comfy bed! Nicole was responsive to all questions or requests, even though she was out of town at the time. I'll definitely try to stay here again the next time I visit Sydney.

Simon and Nicole's place is tiny and clean.

They are easy to communicate with. Although we haven't meet them, but they have responded to every message and provides us some suggestions.

The location is great, 5-10 minutes walk from central station, and 5-10 minutes walk to Crown Street, where the pubs, bars and cafes is located in.
Their guidebook is awesome as well.

If I come to Sydney next time, I will stay in Simon and Nicole's place again.

We had a great stay, good access to public transport, lots of great cafes around the area and places to eat. Wish we could have stayed longer! Nice apartment building, fairly close to central station.

Simon & Nicole's Airbnb was great! 

Apartment was clean, had an awesome shower, comfy bed, fully equipped kitchen, even had a few little chocolates & snacks scattered thru the house. 

Location was close to shops, cafes restaurants and central station. 

Thanks so much Simon & Nicole for an fab stay in Surry Hills!
Fantastic apartment true to the description and painstakingly well maintained.
A great location, an awesome accommodation - we will be coming back
Hosts were super accommodating and helpful throughout my stay. It's a very nice place to stay as it is in a great location and is super spacious and clean. Highly recommended.

Beautiful apartment, close to Surrey Hills restaurants and shops. Communication was amazing between Nicole and Simon and I, and we were also checked on via message to make sure our stay was comfortable. The apartment was so beautifully done and exceptionally clean. Couldn't get over how many products they had in the bathroom for guest use...they really supplied everything. Thank you so much and will definitely be staying again!

We had a wonderful stay at Simon & Nicole's place. The location is fabulous -- right next to many restaurants, bars, and cafes, and a short walk to Central Station. The apartment was clean, quiet, and had lots of natural light. The apartment is furnished well and has a nice kitchen and balcony. Nicole was also flexible about letting us drop off our bags well before check in. Would definitely recommend.

We loved how Simon and Nicole's apartment was so close to the city and Central Station. We were in amongst the trendy cafes and restaurants and a quick walk took us to the train station so we could go anywhere we wanted very easily!

일단 예정된 체크인 시간보다 빨리 체크인을 할 수 있게 해주셔서 정말 감사했어요. 숙소는 사진과 다를 바 없었구요. 의자 1개만 파손되어 있어서 미리 사진 찍어 놨었구요. 니콜은 만나지 못했지만 일을 도와주시는 도나에게 열쇠를 건네 받을 수 있었답니다. 침대와 소파는 정말 편했어요. 
그리고 센트럴역과 걸어서 5분거리라서 이동할때 매우 편했구요. 주위가 조용해서 자기에도 좋았어요.
단지 쓰레기 버리는곳을 찾지 못해서 니콜에게 미안했어요. 아 그리고 청소기가 성능이 좀 떨어져서 먼지 흡입이 잘 안되더라구요. 
그래도 최상의 조건으로 잘 놀다 왔습니다. 니콜에게 감사해요.
It was quick, easy, simple, nice.... all good

A fantastic apartment in a superb location with lots of lovely places to eat, drink and socialise nearby. Communication was brilliant - instructions for getting there were superb and very easy to follow and Nicole's welcome was warm and full of good local tips. We hope to return one day!
I come to Sydney 4 times a year and this is always my #1 destination. But it's so popular that it's always booked out 6 to 9 months in advance for long term stays! Highly recommended!

Das Apartment von Simon und Nicole ist wunderschön eingerichtet und gut gepflegt. Es war sehr sauber und super ausgestattet. Die Lage in Surry Hills, in der Nähe der Central Station, haben wir sehr genossen. Leider haben wir Nicole nicht persönlich zur Schlüsselübergabe antreffen können, sie hat aber eine gute Alternative für uns organisiert. Die Kommunikation mit Nicole verlief einwandfrei und immer sehr schnell. Gerne wieder!

Nicole was an excellent host and the apartment is lovely and actually looks as nice as the photos! The only issues were with the internet not working one day (which should be fine now that NBN has been installed), loud music on the Friday and Saturday nights from neighbours and construction noise from the building works across the road from 7.30am 6 days a week. Overall a lovely apartment and I had a good stay but it may not work for you if you are a light sleeper wanting to sleep in on a holiday!

This apartment is well situated near Central Station and within walking distance to Oxford Street, Chinatown and many other attractions. It is well appointed with good quality appliances and products (shampoos etc). The look and feel of the apartment suggests space, and has a pleasing design. It was also a treat to have the large cable TV on hand. Nicole was very responsive and went out of her way to ensure I had a good stay. The gym was also particularly well appointed, which was unusual for these kinds of apartments. I recommend this apartment.

Nicole and Simon’s apartment was perfect for our two week stay in Sydney, right in the middle of Surry Hills, close to so many fantastic cafes, restaurants and pubs. Also really handy for Central Station or for a walk down into CBD or Sydney Harbour.  The apartment was exactly as described and immaculately maintained. Nicole and Simon provided a very handy guide to the local eateries which was really useful. Would not hesitate to go back again. Thanks so much to Nicole and Simon.

This flat is in a perfect location for funky bars and cafes, close to Central Station which then gives easy access to the city.  Accommodation was exactly how it was described, lovely choice of decor.  There is also a rooftop pool (although whilst we were there, it was closed due to some redevelopment work) and a small gym.  The bed was super comfy! Thanks so much!!

Simon and Nicole were amazing hosts as was their accommodation. It was ideal for our trip and so so central. Nothing was too far away. Thank you for the flexibility you provided at both the start and end of our stay. We so enjoyed our home for the trip and would definitely stay here again. Thank you.

Cet appartement est très bien situé à Surry Hills, un quartier très agréable , plein de petites boutiques, restaurants et cafés super sympas, et pas du tout touristique ce que j’adore.
L’équipement de l’appartement est parfait, la literie très bonne, tous les produits pour la salle de bain sont d’excellente qualité. Il y a un cours de tennis et une piscine sur le toit, et une petite salle de sport bien équipée.
Simon et Nicole mettent à disposition tout plein de petites choses qui font que l’on se sent comme à la maison ( serviettes de plage, raquettes de tennis, crème solaire, guides de Sydney, livres, bonbons...)
C’était parfait, encore un grand merci à Nicole et Simon!!!

Great place and great host - as simple as that.
PS: a tennis court and pool on the roof (!!!)

Simon and Nicole were great hosts. The flat was impeccably clean and comfortable for our holiday stay. Communication was excellent for our late check-in. The heated pool upstairs is a nice touch, and the air conditioning was a good to have during the hot Australian summer days. Very much enjoyed staying here and would stay again!

We had a great time at Simon & Nicole’s apartment. It was very clean and was situated in the very popular area of Surry Hills, where there are plenty of bars and places to eat. Would definitely recommend!
Fantastic place, nice quiet area within walking distance of Central Station
The hosts are helpful and interested in making they visitors feel comfortable. The apartment is clean and very well presented and there are a few nice ‘treats’ to make you feel at home ❤️

This place is ideal for discovering Sydney, a lot is within walking distance (and Simon&Nicole have loads of useful tips) and everything else is close by via public transport. The kitchen is well equipped and felt like at home - thanks again!
Great apartment, super location and Nicole is an exceptional host.

Interesting location worth exploring, stylish apartment with parking & also easy access to public transport.  Great hosts. 
Longer stay would have been better!
I booked Simon and Nicole’s place for my parents. They both commented on the great location, and the clean, comfortable space, as well as Simon and Nicole’s hospitality.

This condo is wonderful! It felt modern and comfortable to us (32 year old couple) and just like home. We adventured through Sydney for a couple days while working remotely from our laptops, and couldn't have been happier with our choice of housing. The condo is very clean, well appointed and a large generous space. I slept so wonderfully in the bed, it didn't even feel like jet lag! We loved the walkability and hip nature of the neighborhood, while still feeling inviting and authentic. We immediately felt like this is the area we would choose to live in Sydney. We ubered to/from the airport but walked everywhere else. From the unit there are lost of coffee shops/cafes/restaurants within a few blocks. We walked through downtown to the Opera House and even walked home from Bondi Beach. Everything feels safe and there are always people out and about. Definitely would stay here the next time I'm lucky enough to get out to Sydney!
Great location. Large, stylish studio apartment with all the necessities. Nicole is wonderful to work with. I would stay here again.
Uitstekend appartement leuke buurt en dicht bij openbaar vervoer

Nicole and Simon’s place is 5mins from central station and with easy walking to the city. The apartment is beautifully set up and comfortable with everything you need supplied. It is quiet and there is seating on an internal balcony. Coffee and chocolates were lovely touch. Communication was prompt and helpful and our late checkin easy. 

Nicole and Simon also offer an extensive list of local cafes, bars and restaurants. We ate at Muum Maam and Yullis (both within a 5 min walk) and recommend both for delicious food and excellent service.

We highly recommend Nicole and Simon and thank them for the care and thought that has gone into the making the apartment perfect for our Sydney stay

Un appartement idéal placé et très bien décoré. Très agréable à vivre !
Le seul bémol : le manque d'isolation vis à vis du bruit dans le couloir et des voisins.

What a fantastic apartment and in a very good location. Some of the best places to eat just around the corner.
Stylish apartment with pool on the roof. Local bars were good. Cuckoo Callay is a must visit! Loved our stay with you. Would definately stay there again.
Thanks. x
Very big studio apartment, immaculately present and very comfortable.  Great location between Surry Hills village and central station.
Fantastic centrally located apartment. Hosts takes a lot of pride in their accommodation. Loved it!
Great place, great location, would book again

Nicole siempre ha respondido a todas mis cuestiones y peticiones de una forma extraordinaria. El apartamento está en una ubicación idónea, he estado 4 semanas y no he echado en falta nada, tiene una cama comodísima, un salón muy amplio y es tal y como aparece en las fotos. Además de esto la casa tiene todo tipo de utensilios de cocina, el baño es amplio y con todo lo que puedas necesitar. Una cosa que me llamó la atención muy en positivo es que en el apartamento había cápsulas de café para todo un mes.
Recomiendo 100% a Nicole como anfitriona y el apartamento para una estancia en Sydney.
Perfect space for two. Spacious living and dining area with a lovely balcony. Great location. Communication with Nicole has been quick and easy. One of the best Airbnb we've stayed in.

Nicole is a great host, always replied promptly to all my queries, location is great, close to Central station, CBD, grocery store and lots of cafes to choose around the area. Highly recommend staying in this “funky” unit in Surry Hills.

Very stylish space in a super central location in trendy Surry Hills, very short walk to Central Station and amaaaazing local restaurants. Was able to use the car space which was excellent. Very clean apartment and exactly as described. Easy check in and out!
very stylish place in a nice neighborhood of Sydney. easy to communicate with Nicole. lovely stay all together.

I really appreciate for their house and kindness. Thank you.
I couldn't forget memory in Sydney.
Great location for walking into the city or catching a train or bus to anywhere in Sydney. Good selection of local cafes and bars. Very comfy bed

We had a really great stay at Simon and Nicole's place. Check in and communication was quick and easy (many thanks Nicole!), the apartment itself is very spacious and comfortable with all the amenities you could wish for, and the location was excellent. Would definitely book again, highly recommended - thanks Simon and Nicole!
Great location, right in the middle of Surry Hills with cafes and restaurants within walking distance. Parking spot in the garage was great and seems to be a rarity in this location.

Fantastic location, within a few minutes walk to Central station and a few minutes walk up Cooper Street to Crown Street and all the shops and cafes there.  I also walked into the Circular Quay via the Opera House and Woolloomoollo one day which took an hour.  The apartment was sparkling clean, stylish and spacious.  There were lots of extra touches, such as beach towels, tennis rackets and lots of extra bathroom products.  I couldn't fault it and I would love to stay here again.

Beautifully decorated and immaculately presented apartment, in a quiet block in the hipster Surry Hills. Conveniently located close to Central station. Lots of amazing restaurants nearby. Nicole provides excellent communication and ensures all enquiries and needs are met.

Simon and Nicole's place is a great little place for a short or extended stay in Sydney. It is close to public transport and amenities. Unfortunately there was a party of one night of our stay at a neighbouring property that went well into the early hours of the morning. Otherwise it was a lovely, quiet location. Thanks Simon and Nicole.

Great base for a visit or work trip to Sydney! Loved the location and it was easy for me to walk into the CBD for work each day and to get around from. Great places to eat nearby too and Nicole was great to communicate with, everything was super easy!
Great location. Note that the bedroom is not separate from the living area and also a very noisy nightclub downstairs.

Simon & Nicole's place is very close to central station and hence very easy to access the CBD. The neighbourhood has some good restaurants and trendy stores. The flat itself is spacious and clean. Simon & Nicole also put in those little extras which make your stay a special one! Thank you Simone & Nicole!
Great place. Wonderful location with easy walking distance to the train station. Bed was comfortable and the home was very clean. Highly recommend!
Great location, 40 minute walk to harbour front. Really enjoyed our stay

I had a wonderful stay here for two nights. The place was exactly as it looks in the photos - very modern, clean and comfortable, and is an easy walking distance from Central Station and Surry Hills bars, restaurants and coffee shops.

Simon & Nicole's place is perfect for a couple or individual traveler heading to Sydney. GREAT location, super clean place, lovely terrace for breakfast. The WiFi is great, perfect for a working holiday. Nicole and Simon were both so helpful with local tips as well as making sure we had all of the amenities we could ask for. Another perfect Airbnb belonging to likeminded lovers of travel that reminds you why you're a part of this community in the first place.

A very central place to stay in Sydney. Being so close to Central Station allowed us to get everywhere easily. We used all types of public transport, light rail to the Maritime Museum, buses to Coogee Beach, Bondi & Watson’s Bay, and of course the trains & ferry's. We also walked from the apartment to Chinatown, Hyde Park & the Botanical Gardens and Kings Cross. Being there over Xmas & New Year we expected it to be noisy but although a little noise from the neighbours we were pleased with how quiet it was. Great place to stay.

What a fantastic apartment - spacious and well laid out. One of the really great things was the fresh linen along with a very comfy bed and towels. 
There was really great facilities including a gym which was empty every time we went! 
The location was perfect for our stay close to some awesome cafes, bars and shops and public transport, with central station only a short stroll away. 
We needed a slightly later checkout and Nicole was very accommodating of this.

This is a wonderful house which I highly recommend. Its a great size, everything you need, great location, air con for the warm Sydney weather and wonderful hosts. The only negative is that its a bit dark which is shame when its sunny outside but in every other way, this place is perfect.

A cosy place in a good location. A short walk to cafes, train station and the city or a short drive into Darling Harbour. Simon and Nicole were very quick to respond and helpful about the local area and what was happening around Sydney during our stay.

Delightful stay, definitely recommend! This place ticks all the boxes. It’s stylish, clean, and well fitted with all the amenities for a more than comfortable stay. There was nothing lacking. Location wise, you can’t go wrong! Seriously! Short walk to Central station, even shorter walk to Crown St for delicious eats. Nicole and Simon were friendly, attentive and responsive hosts. Looking forward to my next stay here!

name: Big House Near Porto and beachs
space: Maison de campagne sur deux étages avec jardin sur propriété privée très spacieuse.  Petit potager et arbres fruitiers qui régaleront les plus gourmands. Portail automatique pour rentrer les voitures et système d'alarme.  Il y a quatre chambres qui peuvent être utilisées contenant chacune un lit double, un grand placard et un fauteuil. Dans l'une des chambres il y a une salle de bain avec toilettes et baignoire et les deux autres pourront se partager une salle de bain avec toilettes et douche. Une troisième salle de bain se trouve au rez-de-chaussée contenant douche et toilettes. Il y a un grand salon avec une bibliothèque très bien fournie avec des livres en français, un lecteur de DVD et un lecteur de laser Disc, une petite chaîne hifi, un babyfoot et une télévision avec chaînes câblées.  Il y a deux grands canapés 3  places et une cheminée. Un accès internet via WI-FI est également disponible dans le salon.  La salle à manger est immense et contient une grande table et un petit salo
description: Maison de campagne sur deux étages avec jardin sur propriété privée très spacieuse.  Petit potager et arbres fruitiers qui régaleront les plus gourmands. Portail automatique pour rentrer les voitures et système d'alarme.  Il y a quatre chambres qui peuvent être utilisées contenant chacune un lit double, un grand placard et un fauteuil. Dans l'une des chambres il y a une salle de bain avec toilettes et baignoire et les deux autres pourront se partager une salle de bain avec toilettes et douche. Une troisième salle de bain se trouve au rez-de-chaussée contenant douche et toilettes. Il y a un grand salon avec une bibliothèque très bien fournie avec des livres en français, un lecteur de DVD et un lecteur de laser Disc, une petite chaîne hifi, un babyfoot et une télévision avec chaînes câblées.  Il y a deux grands canapés 3  places et une cheminée. Un accès internet via WI-FI est également disponible dans le salon.  La salle à manger est immense et contient une grande table et un petit salo
neighborhood_overview: Quartier résidentiel très calme mais néanmoins proche d'une autoroute ce qui permet de rejoindre la plage à Espinho et le centre de Porto en une quinzaine de minutes.
transit: Un car passe dans la ville cependant il est grandement souhaitable de posséder un moyen de locomotion personnel. De plus, vous pourrez le garer dans l'enceinte de la résidence.
access: Vous aurez le logement entier sauf une chambre fermée
interaction: Je ne suis pas sur place lorsque je loue ma résidence cependant notre voisine Adélaïde est présente pour pouvoir gérer les urgences.  De plus, je réponds rapidement aux messages que vous pouvez m'envoyer.
house_rules: L'endroit n'est pas interdit aux fumeurs toutefois il leur ai demandé de fumer à l'extérieur. Pas d'animaux à l'intérieur de la maison. Merci de retirer ses chaussures pour monter à l'étage.

host.host_about: Je suis Dulce Medeiros, j'aime lire et sortir me balader dans Paris.

address.street: Santa Maria Da Feira, Aveiro, Portugal

reviews.comments:
The wonderful villa is very well presented and comfortable, with all modern facilities.
Apart from the world famous city  (Porto center is just 20 minutes away). There are many other city's in the area worth a visit. 
Visitors will also be spoilt with the numerous and diverse restaurants at the sea, offering excellent value for money. 

We had a perfect holiday!

We spent 10 days in the house which was our perfect place to do several car tours in the northern region of portugal. The house was beautiful, spacious and excellently equipped. The beach or Porto is 20 minutes by car. Aviero, Braga, Viseu, Geres National Park, Douro valley etc. are just nearby. We had a pleasant holiday. Thank you!
Las fotos eran correctas ,casa muy cómoda y muy bonita y muy grande
The reservation was canceled 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Dulce a une très belle maison, très bien équipée et très bien entretenue.
Sa localisation est idéale pour découvrir la région centre du Portugal.
L'accueil se fait par le biais d'une connaissance bienveillante sur qui on peut compter à tous moments.
C'est une destination à recommander pour qui veut partager son temps entre visites et plages.

Et rigtigt dejligt og hyggeligt hus med rigeligt plads til os 6 voksne personer. Pæne store værelser med hver sit badeværelse. Stort køkken, hvor vi opholdt os det meste af tiden, når ikke vi var udenfor i haven. Om natten var vi desværre plaget af en del trafik lige udenfor døren og ikke mindst også larmen fra kirkeklokkerne, som ringede hvet kvarter !!!
Men Top karakter til huset og haven.
Men - huset var svært at finde på GPSen og da vi endeligt nåede frem (efter at have kørt forgæves til 3 andre addresser med samme vejnavn), så havde vi en del besvær med at forstå nabokonen, som  skulle udlevere nøglen og vise os rundt i huset. Hun kunne KUN tale og forstå portugisisk - men vi nikkede høfligt til det hun prøvede at fortælle os, og så fandt vi ud af det selv bagefter.
Huset ligger i en meget lille by, hvor der absolut intet sker og den nærmeste butik ligger ca. 2 km derfra. Til gengæld ligger den helt fantastiske by Porto og Villa Nova de Gaia kun ca. 30 i bil nord for huset.

Venlig hilsen
Pernille

Hello, 

We are pleased to receive you and your family in our big house. 
I hope you will enjoy your trip in Portugal and that you will be appreciated the facilities of our house.

If you have any question do not hesitate. 

Dulcel
Ótima localização. A casa é bem espaçosa e aconchegante. Foi uma ótima experiência para quem busca tranquilidade ou vivenciar alguns dias morando em Portugal! :)
Excelente experiência num espaço muito agradável. Obrigado!
The host canceled this reservation 123 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Superbe villa très bien équipée, tant à l'intérieur qu'à l'extérieur. Les équipements sont de très bonnes qualité, la surface disponible permet d'avoir des lieux d'intimité ou de rencontres avec vos amis, votre famille. Les équipements permettent de recevoir en intérieur ou extérieur sans aucun problème dans un très beau cadre.
Piekny, czysty dom w cichej okolicy. Wspanialy basen z cudnym widokiem. Polecam !!

We had an amazing time in this fabulous house. It has everything we needed & spent most of our time by the great pool area. The house keeper gave us plenty of food from the houses big vegetable garden & the housekeeper was very friendly. Road noise was a bit loud in the evenings as the house is directly on the road but this isn't a big issue. I would highly recommend this property for a stay in Porto. Thank you very much for allowing us stay. I hope to return in the future.
Beautiful house, beautiful pool, beautiful location! The house was much bigger than we expected which was a bonus!
La casa es tal cual aparece en las fotos. Su ubicación es muy buena. Además cuenta con todo lo necesario y la pisciba es una maravilla. Totalmente recomendable
Très belle maison très bien équipée. La piscine était  super. Nous étions 8 à occuper la maison, grands espaces. Dona Adélaïde était très gentille et disponible.

The villa and grounds far outweighed our expectations. The property is huge, much larger than 3 bedrooms would suggest. The house is secluded and behind an electronic gate. The kitchen and bathroom cupboards are full of useful goodies, a real home away from home. Porto is a 30 minute drive and the beach at Espinho is only 15 minutes away. Lovely family holiday!

Nous avons séjourné dans cette maison du 06 au 18 septembre, nous étions 3 couples et nous y avons passé plus de temps que prévu, faute à la superbe piscine et son patio, au jardin très agréable. Superbe cuisine, vraie pièce à vivre et surtout très bien équipée pour ceux qui aiment cuisiner. Rien à redire sur le reste non plus, très beau salon avec beaucoup de bouquins et bien décoré, chambres parfaites aussi ainsi que les SDB. Propriété bien située, proche des commodités supermarchés et restaurants mais aussi de petites villes tout à fait sympa comme Espinho à 10km bord de mer pour se baigner et Aveiro mais surtout Porto à 20 mn environ en voiture. Allez y sans crainte

Wir hatten eine schöne Woche im Ferienhaus. Wie schon von anderen geschrieben war die Übergab des Hauses in der Landessprache, aber das hat trotzdem alles geklappt. Der Verkehr direkt entlang des Hauses war etwas laut, da auch alle Schlafzimmer zur Straßenseite lagen.
Le logement est très spacieux et agréable. Celui-ci correspond parfaitement à l'annonce !
The host canceled this reservation 109 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

La maison de Dulce est juste exceptionnelle!! Super emplacement rien à redire avec tout ce qu’il faut dans la maison!
Dommage qu’il y ai eu des travaux en cours et pendant notre séjour Ainsi que la propreté de la piscine à revoir mais sinon nous avons passé un excellent moment! L’extérieur est grandiose avec un potager dans lequel nous pouvons nous servir c’est le must! Et merci à dulce pour sa rapidité.

We had a nice stay in a very spacy house during May period. The property offers various options to make a stay very convienient. Unfortunately we couldn’t make use of all of them such as the nice pool due to the whether conditions. However, enjoying the evening in the pool house with some vine, the nice garden and even two sheeps next door was very relaxing making us feel the holidays.
The location of the property is good to start exploring the wider area of Porto, the Atlantic Ocean is just 20 minutes away by car, supermarkets and restaurants are also reachable easily in a few minutes.
All sleeping rooms of the house are located on the street side which is sometimes a bit noisy, however the electric gong of the local church is more disturbing every half hour.
A car and some talent in „gesture language“ for non verbal communication - for non Portuguese - is recommended. The host and the neighbors are helpful responding to your inquiries.
Me and my family enjoyed the stay.

Nice house, great amenities. The pool area is a plus. The Host doesn't speak English, so plan accordingly. The gate getting in and out of the property is on a curve and a little scary at times with oncoming traffic. Losts of room to spread out.

la maison est magnifique le cadre superbe avec une piscine merveilleuse
la personne qui nous accueille est charmante et tres disponible
je recommande fortement cette location

La maison et les extérieurs sont magnifiques et spacieux. 
Dommage pour nous que la météo ne soit pas au RDV cette semaine pour profiter pleinement de la piscine.
Lire face au patio et à la piscine est top. Quelle vue exceptionnelle
Je reviendrai avec plaisir.
je recommande cette jolie maison avec piscine.

Wir haben im Oktober eine Woche zu sechst in dem Haus verbracht. Das Haus ist sehr, sehr schön und sehr groß! 
2 Badezimmer befinden sich im OG (1x Badewanne/Dusche, 1x Dusche), 3 Schlafzimmer à 1Doppelbett im OG (+1 abgeschlossenes Privatzimmer des Vermieters) und ein Zimmer mit Doppelbett im EG. Ein drittes kleineres Bad mit Dusche befindet sich im EG.
Die Lage des Hauses zur Straße hin wurde schon mehrfach erwähnt und ich kann dieses bestätigen. Das Haus liegt in einer Senkung an einer Dorfstraße und die Mopedfahrer geben ordentlich Gas um den Berg hochzukommen. Daher hält man leider die Fenster im Ess- und Wohnzimmer geschlossen. Bei dem schönen Wetter haben wir uns aber fast ausschließlich am Pool aufgehalten. Außerdem gibt eine nahe gelegene Dorfkirche alle 15min eine Melodie von sich ... auch nachts. Nach 2 Nächten hatte man sich aber daran gewöhnt. 
Meiner Meinung nach kommt daher auch der niedrige Preis für dieses Anwesen zustande. Porto ist in 25min zu erreichen, das Poolhaus und der Pool sind top und wir haben uns bei Dulce sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Nachbarin war auch seh nett. Die Verständigung mit Hand und Fuß hat gut geklappt.
Nice

name: Ainalani
summary: In the heart of Princeville, walk to beaches stores & restaurants. We have boogie boards, beach chairs, snorkel gear, beach towels & umbrellas for your use.
space: Located on the north shore of Kauai this beautiful  home offers a relaxing place to call home during your vacation. 1 bedrooms 1 bath shared laundry, shared space with other guests. Mini kitchen includes, mini fridge, toaster oven, blender, hot plate & bbq.  boogie boards are there to use as well as knowledge from a local surfer  that can give you good tips on where to go. Walking distance to beaches, shopping, park , library,restaurants
description: In the heart of Princeville, walk to beaches stores & restaurants. We have boogie boards, beach chairs, snorkel gear, beach towels & umbrellas for your use. Located on the north shore of Kauai this beautiful  home offers a relaxing place to call home during your vacation. 1 bedrooms 1 bath shared laundry, shared space with other guests. Mini kitchen includes, mini fridge, toaster oven, blender, hot plate & bbq.  boogie boards are there to use as well as knowledge from a local surfer  that can give you good tips on where to go. Walking distance to beaches, shopping, park , library,restaurants Laundry, porch, garage It is a quaint family environment There is a close by bus stop otherwise bikes to use. We do have an outdoor dog Nalu & kitty Rainbow. They are outdoor & garage pets. They do not come inside.
neighborhood_overview: It is a quaint family environment
notes: We do have an outdoor dog Nalu & kitty Rainbow. They are outdoor & garage pets. They do not come inside.
transit: There is a close by bus stop otherwise bikes to use.
access: Laundry, porch, garage
house_rules: No smoking please!

host.host_about:
I am a long time resident of Kauai's north shore.
We love the beach & surfing almost everyday.
