I have an 8 year old who attends school in Hanalei.
W have a 17 year old dog and a 4 year old cat. Our home is cozy and conveniently located to beaches, stores, restaurants & park.
I love Kauai & it beautiful offerings like fresh organic produce all year round, farm to table meats & ocean to table fish & crustaceans. 
I have a passion for surfing, fishing, flowers & food!

reviews.comments:
Michael and I loved staying with Paulina and her family! They were so accommodating during our stay on the North Shore and made our last few days on Kauai very enjoyable. 

The location of the house is great, right in the heart of Princeville and only a few minutes drive to Hanalei. We spent most of our time at the beach and also enjoyed a beautiful sunset at the St Regis Hotel, which is just right down the road from Paulina's house and provides incredible views. 

We will definitely keep in touch with Paulina the next time we come to Kauai, and I recommend her hale to anyone looking for a welcoming and wonderful stay on Kauai's north shore.
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The room was clean and nicely set up. Though we stayed only one night- I can easily see myself staying longer. The bathroom was right next to the room and clean with nice towels. Paulina was very hospitable and the house was easy to find. Great location for North Shore exploring!

My girlfriend and I needed a place to stay before backpacking the Na Pali coast and found this little gem. The place was easy to find, clean and cozy. Paulina was very responsive and provided everything we needed.

My husband and I stayed at Paulina's place before backpacking the kalalau trail. Paulina was great! She was quick to respond to all communication. Both her and her husband were very friendly and happy to provide suggestions and answer our questions. The bathroom is shared with the other air B&B room that she rents out which was perfectly fine with us and fun to chat with the other couple. Everything was clean and the bed was very comfortable! Thanks so much!!
We had a great stay at Paulina's home! great welcome and very good tips! Well located on the North Shore , not far from Hanalei bay where you have many options to surf.
Neighborhood was really nice and Paulina was very nice and accommodating. Made us feel right at home.

Our Kauai experience was greatly enhanced by our host's interaction and assistance. Paulina and her family personify the island's aloha and ohana spirit. Thank you Paulina and Harry! My daughter and I take home a better understanding and appreciation of just why so many people love your beautiful island.  It's not only the picturesque beauty but the people.  Mahalo...
Thank you, Paulina for sharing your home with us and letting us be your guests for a week!

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay with Paulina on Kauai. Her and her husband were great hosts and gave really helpful advice on where to go and what to see. We were able to visit the Queen's Bath, Turtle Cave, great beaches and beautiful hiking trails all in two days since the location was so central to these activities. The room is located in a private area of the house with a separate entrance from the main one and the space is shared with one other air bnb room, which could be great for travelers with four guests. We had a great time and would definitely stay with them again the next time we make the trip back.

We stayed here for 5 nights, and Paulina and Harry were wonderful, gracious hosts.  They loaned us beach chairs, an umbrella and boogie boards for our entire stay and gave us great information about nearby beaches and places to eat.   The room has a private entrance that is shared with another rental room and bathroom.  Very comfy bed, peaceful nights.  Thank you so much!
Pauline and Harry were very welcoming hosts. Beach towels, chairs, boogie boards all available for use as well as laundry. Location good for north and central coast.

Paulina made me feel very welcome. She is polite and willing to give information. 
The listing was accurate. I was surprised to find that Princeville was such an upmarket area with manicured gardens and absolutely beautiful homes. The 2 rooms underneath her house were perfect. Lovely towels and a drier which was great! Own entrance and about a 15 minute walk to Princeville Centre for shops, groceries, restaurants and a bar. 
You need to walk to the centre in order to catch the local bus which leaves from the main highway. That's if you don't have a car. 
A 15 minute walk to Queens Bath. 
I would highly recommend staying at Paulinas.

This was our favorite place we stayed on Kauai! Paulina and her family were very welcoming and provided us with an oasis in between hiking, snorkeling, and all the other outdoor activities on the island. The room is quiet and has a private entrance and a deck outside. There's also a small kitchen with a coffee maker, dishes/silverware, and fresh fruit so you can comfortably have home made meals!. 

I will enthusiastically recommend this place to my friends and family traveling to Kauai.
The room was nice and clean, and the bed was comfortable. It's was just as described in the listing. Paulina and Harry are super friendly people, and wish we could stay more than one night. Mahalo
They are very friendly and nice, the room is very clean, very good.

In a great area! Close to Hanalei Bay, tunnels beach and Na Pali coast. I stayed in the room closest to the front of the house, amazing breeze, clean and big comfy bed. There is a small kitchen with a mini fridge, a single electric stove top and coffee maker. There are grocery stores in the area. I highly recommend Paulina's place.
Casey's place was very nice and welcoming. The price is great as is the location; close to many things in Princeville and in a lovely neighborhood.

Paulina and Harry are awsome hosts.
The room as well as the little kitchen, the bathroom and the lanai are super sweet, very clean and nice located in sandpiper village.
We felt comfortable from the first minute on. Also our little one was in paradise, since Paulina is well equiped with baby and kids toys :)
Thanks very much for lending the surf- and boogie board (and the very good surf lesson by Harry), the invitation to the Easter Saturday dinner and the nice conversations.
It was a pleasure staying at your place. We would do it again immediately :)

A convenient location to explore the north coast. Keep in mind that there's a family living upstairs and the bathroom kitchen/lounge is shared with another room of guests or family. Harry and Paulina are very welcoming and helpful. Great if you want to be able borrow the surfboard or kayak and go down to Hanalei Bay.

Such a beautiful home! Very spacious rooms. Paulina and her family were awesome! Super friendly and very accommodating. Being able to use they're surf boards was such a luxury! I'd highly recommend Paulina and her ohana!

Paula was very kind in welcoming my wife and I into her home. Her location is in a great little neighborhood in an ideal location on the North end of the island. She was generous to offer beach towels, chairs, surfboards, snorkel gear, kayak, and more. We had a great stay!

Paulina was unable to greet me when I arrived, but she gave me a thorough walk-through of the property on the phone. I did end up meeting her in person later on in my stay and found her friendly and helpful. She told me about a "secret" beach in the neighborhood that (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps alone would not have revealed to me. Another plus is that the place is even nicer than it looks in the photos. The Princeville neighborhood is quiet and suburban, a mix of homes and hotels, with easy access to beaches, a grocery, and restaurants.
We had a great stay! Unfortunately it was only one night. They have surfboards that we were able to use and helped us tie them on our car! Very clean and comfy bed and a convenient kitchenette.
Very friendly and open family, beautiful house and nice place to stay :)
Great hosts, very friendly and helpful! They supplied us even with surfing gear. The one night we have stayed there, they really made our stay comfortable!

Paulina and Harry were great hosts, they made us feel extremely welcome and were very generous, allowing us to borrow a surf board, bringing us fresh fruit from their friends farm, and always greeting us with a smile. We were there with our six month old son, and since laundry is a huge part of having a baby it was very convenient to have unlimited access to the washer and dryer. The bedroom was large enough for our travel crib and our belongings, and the sitting area/kitchenette area was a good size. The only drawback would be if you were wanting to cook a lot of your own meals as the fridge is very small and its not possible to buy much and store it, and there is limited facilities for cooking, but we were easily able to make breakfast daily, some lunches, and a few dinners as well. A great location in princeville, walking distance to queens bath, hideaways and sealodge beach (handy since there is no parking there most of the time), and close to a small shopping centre and to Hanalei Bay with all of its shops and restaurants (not walking distance).
Paulina was an exceptional host! She was always available if we had any questions and made excellent recommendations for local hikes and adventures. Her family was very polite, warm and welcoming!
Great spot and Paulina was always very communicative and easy to coordinate with!

We loved our stay here! Paulina's husband, Harry, was very welcoming and hospitable.  He made sure we had everything we needed and told us about great restaurants, beaches, and activities in the area.  Gorgeous yard!  Great place to stay in the North Shore!
Great private room and shared space. Host was super kind and accommodating. Lovely place to stay!
Me and my wife we really enjoyed our stay at Paulina's place. Hosts were super friendly and helpful, room was clean and cosy. In general great place:-)

The host was very welcoming. The entire house was gorgeous. Especially our room. Everything was very clean. We had full cooking capacity and utensils as well as a beautiful back porch. The host helped with tons of tips and beach equipment to borrow. Would recommend

I can't recommend Paulina's place enough! Amazing location on the north island, and easy access to Princeville, Hanalei and tons of great hiking. Her husband Harry is awesome, and offers surfing lessons and board rentals. I did two lessons with him and he showed me how to find good locations, read the waves, and on my third time out I was able to get up on my own and 'ride the rail' a few times. 

They also do a great job keeping the place clean and comfortable. Some girls staying before me left a huge mess of sand and food, but a few hours later it was spotless. 

Also has a mini-kitchen with a small fridge coffee maker, toaster, dishes, etc. which was great for making breakfast. You can't go wrong staying here!

Beautiful area, home is in a golf community. Harry met us when we arrived and was super friendly, just a great personality with lots of Aloha! Paulina was out of town but was very easy to reach and helpful in every way. The space was much bigger then expected, we were able to just relax and have a great time in the house when we were not out exploring all the beauty of the North Shore of Kaua'i!!
Super accueil par Henry! Logement tres spacieux dans un quartier luxueux et tranquille. Toutefois tres humide donc rien be séchait.
We were so lucky to find this place on our stay in Princeville. Nice home and great hosts.
Amazing stay, in an amazing place with amazing host

Great stay! The space was clean and comfortable. The other Airbnb travelers staying in the other room were friendly.  Paulina couldn't have been more accommodating and it was wonderful using the bikes, beach chairs, and surfboard. Nice place in a fabulous location! Thank you!

Paulina and her husband were extremely warm and welcoming but also gave us plenty of privacy. The apartment was situated on a beautiful property and we loved having coffee on the porch in the morning. The bed was very comfortable. There's great food and places to hang out, swim, and surf nearby. Paulina gave us great recommendations for all those things.

We absolutely loved staying at Paulina's place! It was the perfect place to stay if you intend to be mostly on the north side of the island. The extra perk of having surf boards, snorkeling gear, beach towels, etc all available for our use was the icing on the cake for us at this wonderful accommodation. Would definitely stay again!

-gracious host with palpable 'aloha' attitude.
-every visitor I had was surprised with how much I got for the price.
-immaculate part of town.
-cozy communal area shared with only one other room; private entrance.
-wifi; full kitchenette, large outdoor deck; bodyboards, surfboards, snorkels, beach chairs, matts, umbrellas...
-the two rooms are separated by the bath so I never heard a peep from the couple down the hall.
-outside the bedroom window are 60ft. stalks of bamboo that sound like rain when the wind blows.
-there's even a guitar & didgeridoo should you feel the need to express your joy.

Paulinas place is awesome! It is basically a holiday apartment with two bedrooms, bath and living room with small kitchen plus lanai! You will have a lot of privacy, parking at the house, beach gear, surf boards and a well sorted foodland right around the corner.
We enjoyed our stay a lot and can highly recommend this place!

Paulina was very nice and the place was very comfortable. Unfortunately there was a mix up and no one was available for a few hours after check in to let us in. She was very nice and apologetic about this offering a refund. Also let us store our bags while hiking for a few days- this was great!
Paulina is very easy going, open, and was a great host. Great location with the ability to relax on the lanai and enjoy fruit from their trees!

Paulina is such a warm spirit. She was very welcoming and gave us great recommendations. She has multiple water sport equipment available to borrow during your stay. Its a close drive to many Princeville points of interest. I'd definitely recommend staying with her!

The best Airbnb I've ever stayed at! Everything was Perfect: the location, the place and the host. Residential and quiet area. Very very clean and beautiful apartment. Very very comfortable bed. Fast internet connection. Paulina's welcoming, passion, attention to details and refine taste, made her the ideal host. She really  knows how to exceed  guests' expectations. And her beautiful family too.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great place located in a resort type grounds, close to the golf course, library and grocery store:5 minutes drive. You can go for a walk around the golf course or drive 20 minutes to the Village or beach.
This is a perfect location, the room was quiet and very nice. Paulina is a great host, we recommend this place!

Paulina and her family is very welcoming. Their place is close to beach and a couple minutes drive to restaurants, local places. The house has everything you need but the best part is waking up with bird chirping. Would definitely be back!
Paulina's place was beautiful and her communication was great! Wish we could have stayed longer!
We had a great stay at Paulina's place! Everything is exactly as described in a safe neighbourhood and close to beautiful beaches on the North Shore.

Paulina was a great host -- always quick to respond and handle any questions. As far as the location, it's in a very nice residential neighborhood. Only negatives are that it doesn't have a TV and was a little loud in the mornings. However, overall, I think it's a good find.

My friend and I had a wonderful time staying at Paulina's place! She was kind enough to have towels, snorkel gear, bikes and gave us plenty of recommendations for things to do around town. Would def stay here again!!
We really enjoyed our stay at Paulina's. It is located in Princeville, with easy access to grocery stores, restaurants, beaches, and great activities! Paulina is kind and very responsive.
great location! i had a good time at Paulina's
Schöne Wohngegend. Bei vier Bewohnern knappes Geschirr.
I highly recommend this place to anyone! Beautiful home and neighborhood, walking distance from incredible beaches. Paulina was a great host!
Really nice place, very clean and well presented, and in a great location. Loved our time their, the whole island was beautiful. The place actually was a lot nicer than what we expected too!

Paulina's place includes the bottom floor of her house, with living room/ mini kitchen, a big sunny deck, and two rooms available to rent, so you may have great privacy, or may have roomates! You can walk to princeville center, or use her bikes to get down to the st. Regis beach, plus theres surfboards, boogie boards, and snorkeling equipment for all the fun you need. I did not have a car (would recommend getting one on kauai) so all this worked out great for me. I biked around and surfed the bay every day. Place was clean, had coffee, fridge and hotplate/pans to cook. Mahalo Paulina, a great stay.

Paulina is a nice host. Her place provides a nice place to land after time spent at Kauai's many attractions.  Her home is close to Tunnels Beach, Ke'e Beach and the Na Pali Coast.  Paulina shared her beach gear (umbrella, cooler, snorkeling masks and fins, and beach towels) bikes, and kayak gear. I cooked fish every night on the hot plate and baked brownies in the toaster oven. The bed was comfy and the space was homey. No TV, which might be a problem for some, but you're in Hawaii, so who needs TV! Wi-fi works great, though

Paulina's place is near to beautiful Hanalei Bay and the Na Pali coast. It is located in a nice, quiet neighbourhood and waking up to the sound of birds and the ocean was very serene. Paulina has bikes,  kayak, snorkel gear etc that you can borrow which was appealing to me and I could really take in the beauty of the island.

We arrived in the afternoon and Paulina was here to show us around. Interaction with guest is limited but if you have a question Paulina is easy to reach. Very nice and easy going. The appartment is the bottom part of the house with a large uncovered deck at the back. You are sharing the appartment with one other airbnb room. There is one shared bathroom with a bath tub in it. The toilet is in the bathroom which is the only downside as when we stayed someone decided to have a bath in the evening so no access to the toilet for about an hour. The kitchen is simple but has everything you need to cook simple meals, pots, pans, dishes etc. There is a hot plate, oven/toaster. The living room is nice and cosy. Internet worked well too. The house is in the heart of princeville in a cul de sac, lots of kids around but overall its slick and quiet (except there was a kid gathering for easter and that was very noisy). Easy parking in the driveway and close to beaches too. Note that the washing and dryer are adjacent to the unit it can be noisy if people decide to do a load in the evening. Paulina was flexible for us leaving our bagage in the living on the day of our check out so it was convenient.

Wonderful stay in a quiet area about 10 minutes from Hanalei Bay. Paulina is a great hostess, friendly and accessible for any questions but we also felt like we had plenty of privacy. Great location, close to St Regis (great sunset drinks) and surfing is great in Hanalei Bay. Would definitely stay here again!

Room with a comfortable bed with shared bathroom. Everything was clean. 
Quite residential area.
We only stay one night and we liked it.
Skvělý
My wife and I had a great time. We stayed 5 days and cooked in the kitchen and tried to do as much exploring as possible. This house is the perfect location for surfing and hiking the Napali coast.

We loved staying at Paulina's place. It was quiet, clean and our room was bright and had its windows to the garden which was beautiful. We slept very well in Paulina's bed. We had the ground floor for ourselves, only shared it with other AirBnB guests. Next to the bathroom it consisted of a living room area with a mini kitchen and a terrace where we loved to sit to greet the night and welcome the day. Paulina was there, when we needed her, but left us our privacy otherwise, which we very much appreciated.
Amazing place to stay, close to Many of the well known beaches/hike. Great public park nearby with playground, work out equipment.

Notre séjour s'est très bien passé chez Paulina.
L'endroit est magnifique et très bien situé.
Nous conseillons sa maison très bien située à Princeville.
Merci encore :)
Great place! I liked the location in Princeville!
Go for it. Paulina is awesome. Place is beautiful. Cozy, quiet,  you can relax and is very convinient, especially if you want to explore wonderful north shore.

Paulina's place in Princeville was perfect for me! She was so warm and welcoming. The Airbnb is in the heart of the North Shore of Kaua'i, very close to beautiful beaches and restaurants shopping etc. She has a very nice family (her and her daughter) along with 2 outdoor cats and a sweet older dog. She provides boards, snorkel gear, towels, chairs etc for a perfect beach day. Paulina's place was a hidden gem, truly blessed to have found her. My favorite Airbnb ever! Mahalo Paulina and family ! XO
Great stay, everything was perfect! Would definetly stay here again!
Dreamy, clean, and super comfortable with all the right amenities.
Nice room with separate entrance.  We didn't realize there would be other people staying in an adjacent room, but they were very pleasant! Cool location close to the Queen's Bath.

My parter and I had an amazing time at Paulina's. Location is great, room was perfect and confortable and Paulina was fantastic. We felt lucky to use her surfboards and snorkeling gear! Highly recommend.

Wonderful host and great airbnb experience! Private entrance, porch, kitchen and sitting area separate from rest of house. Comfortable bed and room. Shared bathroom with one other room, so very easy to access. Area is right next to walking trails, golf course, and Queens Bath. I loved walking to get fresh smoothies in the morning at the shopping area nearby--check out the rainbow eucalyptus trees on the course! Paulina gives guests use of snorkeling gear, beach towels and washer/dryer. Would definitely stay here again. A gem!

Paulina was great and super responsive - especially since I had a last minute booking (just 1 hr prior to arrival). The place is clean and location is amazing. We stayed just one night and location was perfect for the activities on our list (St. Regis happy hour, dinner, Queens bath the next morning). There was a fan that was used by us all the time and the kitchen toaster oven and patio made for a great breakfast at home

The house is in a really nice neighborhood. The house is quiet. If you are looking for a place, where you are not disturbed by the owner this is your place.

Room is good, bed is comfy. Kitchen is not really practical. Good for making sandwiches and  tea, but not really well equipped for more "complex" things (like heating food). Fridge is small, so buy your grocery and drink for the day.

Providing beach towels, chairs, snorkeling gear for free is priceless. Other tenants leaving things behind is helpful. 
Grocery store is close, area is beautiful.

Paulina's place is comfortable and clean, and she's a very warm and welcoming host. Hopefully we will be back soon.
Mahalo!

Paulina took me in at the very last minute (i think I gave 30 mins warning?), for which I was hugely grateful. The place is exactly as described and Paulina even got up before dawn to help me when I had been blocked in by another car. Fantastic host, great if short stay.
We had a fantastic stay! I can't say enough great things about Paulina. She is a wonderful person :)

We had a fine stay at Paulina's home. She welcomed us warmly, the location was very practical to visit the north shore and close to a nice tiki bar. The bed was comfy, the bathroom spacious, and you can fix a small meal in the kitchen. Thank you :)
Clean, quiet, and very comfortable, a beautiful place to stay with all the amenities and no inconveniences, andPaulina is a wonderful host.

Paulina is such a nice host! She always was there for us... giving us recommendations and lending us surf boards, snorkel equipment, towels...Also is a plus that it has a kitchen next to the room, you can cook and save some money. The house is located close to the best surfing beaches and best hiking. Also she is a warm and authentic kauaian woman. Thank you Paulina we will come back for sure!
We had an amazing stay in Paulina's place! Always quick to respond to our questions and very hospitable. Would love to stay there again!

Place is clean, safe, convenient, and cozy. Just what I needed while I explored Kaua'i. Paulina was great--very hospitable and friendly. She even lent me her hiking stick while I hiked the Kalalau Trail! Kitchenette served all of my needs to make/prepare/store my own food/snacks. Would definitely stay here again.

Paulina's place was great! We had just finished hiking the Kalalau Trail a day earlier than we expected and Paulina answered us within minutes. Centrally located and very clean! We wish we could have stayed longer.

Great place to stay with lots of things to do near by. We stayed here before hiking the kalalau trail and it was perfect. We woke up early and got to the trailhead before anyone was there. Paulina was very helpful, she let us do laundry and also stored our stuff in her garage while we were hiking which was fantastic!
Paulina's place was the perfect spot for any adventure on the north shore!  Absolutely recommended.
I had a really great time at Paulina's and felt very welcomed!
Excellent location for anyone looking to hike the Na Pali coast. Our private room was just perfect, and Paulina was super easy to communicate with.
Ruhig gelegen, hatten keinen persönlichen Kontakt mit Paulina. Für eine Nacht aber völlig ok.
Good accommodation with all the beach/surf gear you need near the beautiful hanalei bay.

We just stayed for 4 nights and had a nice stay.  Paulina was very friendly and responsive and easy to work with.  The room was very nice and clean and the bed was very comfortable.  The shared living area was simple, but nice.  We used the hot plate to cook breakfast and the refrigerator was useful.  There is no microwave.  Wi-Fi was fast and reliable.  The living space is shared with another Airbnb guest room, and we had a nice couple to share with. Porch was nice. We used the beach chairs available and the laundry.  It is a great location to explore the north shore.  Our only major surprise was that it was a shared bathroom.  The listing says "1 bathroom shared laundry." I guess it should read "1 bathroom, shared, and shared laundry."  It was not a big deal for us, but just be aware.  Overall, a nice place and we would stay again, especially for the rate in that location.
Paulina's place was very clean, well kept and Paulina was a very gracious host. I enjoyed my time staying there!
Great location, great bed, nice towels and soap, enjoyed other guests. Good value; would stay again.

Great location near Hideaways beach, Princeville marketplace, Kalalau trail, and Hanalei. Great touches such as beach gear, guidebooks, and a great lanai to eat on. I was surprised to be able to hear the surf at night! Paulina is very friendly and willing to offer advice if needed. Yes the bathroom is shared. We enjoyed meeting the others that were staying down the hall so no problem. They also offered advice on things to do/see. Overall, I would not hesitate to stay here! Can't wait to come back!

The room is a nice size with good storage space.  The shared kitchen and bathroom area are welcoming and has everything you need to make coffee and whip up a simple meal.  We enjoyed meeting our fellow guests. 

Paulina is a great host.  She had lots of little beach items available like chairs and beach mats.  Great experience.
Very nosy. We were waken up every single morning at 4:15 am. We will never stay her again.
Very good experience. Just as described, had a great trip!

Great location in Princeville, and lovely bedroom space (one of at least three that are rented out on the property), with two windows that open to a beautiful yard view from either one. No roosters (yay!)!! Very clean living areas, including the nice, elevated lanai. Recommended!
You get what you pay for

Good place to go for it's value, just remember that they don't have a microwave :)  If you're afraid of your stuff getting stolen, don't stay here, there isn't a way to lock up the place (we didn't have any issues, but just thought I'd let you know.)  Also if you're deathly afraid of bugs this may not be the place for you, we definitely had our fair share of beetles, cockroaches, spiders, and ants while we were there, but that's pretty hard to avoid when going to Hawaii.  They're not taking over the apartment by any means, but every night we had to kill a few bugs before going to bed.  Also it's a bit out of the way from most of the island, so make sure you have a rental car to get around, this is not a central location.
This was a great value on the North shore.  Self check-in was easy, and the neighborhood is quiet and peaceful.
Schöne Unterkunft mit Strandutensilien (Stühle, Sonnenschirm, Schorchelsets...)
Very charming and peaceful  place. Location was excellent to the north shore beaches and Queen’s bath in Princeville

We stayed for three nights, it was a comfortable way to begin our vacation before going camping. The location was perfect, down the street from beautiful beaches and close to a shopping center where they played music two nights we were there. Paulina provides plenty of beach towels and supplies (like snorkeling gear and boogie boards). There’s also a dog and cat on the property, both very friendly and love to be petted! A huge plus was the washer and dryer, which came in handy after falling around in the mud one morning. But beware of huge cockroaches- I could have gone my whole life without seeing that little guy!
Pretty location in safe neighborhood.
Space was nice, clean, and pretty private.  Shared common space and bathroom with another couple, had own bedroom.  The host wasn’t present.  There was a little fridge and a bathroom.

Great place to stay in Princeville! 
Snorkeling gear is provided which is amazing:)
Paulina’s place was very clean and located in a very nice, quiet neighborhood.
Great space and location. Check in was very easy (the dog was our greeter ).
Enjoyed my time. The room was lovely.  Didn’t get to enjoy the deck because it was raining. Great location!

This room was cozy, clean, and felt like home right away. The living area was spacious and the bathroom pristine. The walls were a little thin at times, but we didn’t mind so much since our neighbors were respectful and quiet. The mini fridge was convenient for storing a couple meal staples, but don’t buy too much; it is a mini fridge after all. Whenever we come back to Princeville, we’ll first check to see if Paulina’s place is available. Cat and dog were precious too! :)

The stay was as described in the listing and generally everything was good but a few minor issues. For starters the bathroom lock didn’t work and there was no way to lock up the room/house when you left. The neighborhood was very safe and never had any issues but some might not feel comfortable with that. The bed was also overly soft and our backs hurt every morning when we got up. The property was clean, but there were a few bugs, not a big issue. The location was fine for visiting north coast attractions but it was very far (2 hour drive) from Waimea Canyon and NaPali coast. I didn’t realize this when I booked this place since on a map it looks right next to it. Also due to all the rains/flooding/landslides this past April the road didn’t go past Hanalei so you couldn’t get to Tunnels Beach or the Kalalau Trail. Having said all of this Pauline was very nice and we’d stay here again, just not for the entire time we were on the island.
Paulina is lovely and her place has wonderful energy.  It's a beautiful patio/yard to relax in.  She keeps it low-key so there is no pressure to interact but always was available if necessary.
Great place to stay if you want toexplore Princeville area. Paulina was a good host and our check in has no issues even though we arrived late.
Very gut

We had a one-night stay at Pauline's room. The other room was occupied by two Canadian girls, with whom we shared the bathroom. Room was small but clean, and bed was comfortable enough. Shared kitchen looked clean (we did not use it), and shared fridge was clean and very convenient to store food. The lanai was the best part of the shared spaces: it was very nice to spend the evening there having dinner and a glass of wine, watching a movie or chatting with the other guests.  Bathroom is small and the drain of the sink was not working properly. Fresh towels and soap were provided, but no shampoo. It was possible to park for free in fron of the house, but parking was a little crowded with the host's car as well as the other guests' car.  It was ok for one night.
Paulina’s place was a lovely home! I was pleasantly surprised after a long day of hiking. Thanks again! Suzi
Good and central and a nice place to relax. Would book the accomodation again.

It was a welcoming, relaxing place to stay.  Everyone else who stayed there was respectful and friendly.  I found the location perfect for my needs - I love the North Shore!  Paulina was warm and easy to relate to, available if I needed anything but left me to my own devices if I didn't.
Nice little  2 bedroom appartment, small kitchen to use shared bathroom. we could also used the laundry. we liked our stay here. paulina is very nice and helpful. aloha ben&tanja
Zimmer schön. Paulina schwer zu erreichen, nur über teures handy und waren noch viele fragen offen. Wlan ging nicht richtig.

I had a VERY comfortable two-night stay.   It was very easy to find and was perfect for my short stay.   Paulina is friendly and welcoming, and the neighborhood is amazing.   Highly recommended!!  :-)

As a solo female traveler, this spot was it.  I spent a couple of days on the north shore to see/do things that are normally far from a day’s drive from the south shore (where I spent majority of my time on the island), and this location was super. If I wasn’t in Hanalei, I was on foot exploring Princeville and nearby beaches/snorkeling/biking the path. Unit is clean, quiet, gorgeous deck/view, and my air bnb house mates were wonderful (noise wasn’t an issue - for me).
Deffenetley a place i would recommend for everyone exploring the north shore of kauai.
Die Unterkunft hat uns sehr gut gefallen.
Really nice place, near beautiful and almost private beach. Close to the shopping centre where you can buy food
nice room with shared kitchen and bathroom

Endroit délicieux facile d accès stationnement sans problème 
Je n ai vu personne pendant mon séjour 
Pas de wifi non plus même avec le password 
Dommage

We loved our stay here and enjoyed having access to snorkeling gear that Paulina has available for guests to use. The rooms are very cozy and the neighborhood is nice. You do need to have a car if you stay here. Everything is easily within driving distance but there is not much that you can walk to.
Muy buena habitación en muy buena urbanización.

pictures were accurate and Paulina is great, very friendly! for the price this was perfect and she had snorkeling gear, beach towels, chairs, and a small cooler all available for use. very safe and quiet area, great for relaxing, and I will definitely book again next time I'm on the island!

easy access Princeville location great for an adventuring person who will be out and about most of the time. bring ear plugs and eye mask to sleep beyond sunrise and rooster talk as windows are open for breeze due to no central air. this room is in a shared space with other airbnb renters, not the hostess. sweet outdoor pets and close to late night grocery.
Paulina’s place is very clean, visually appealing and has everything you need for your stay!

We never met Paulina, but the place was good for our short stay (2 nights).  We overlapped for one night with another couple in the other AirBnB bedroom -- they were easygoing and we didn't have any problems with noise.  The laundry access is a plus, and wifi was excellent.  The mini-fridge is small to be sharing with folks if you're planning on cooking and eating a lot of your meals in.
A pleasant stay. Very comfortable bed. Basic cooking supplies. Calm space to be in. Good area.
Good place to use as a home base on the North side of the island. Need a car to stay here but easy access to Hanalei, hikes, grocery stores, etc. Good budget option.

Two bedrooms for guests are located in a roomy downstairs of Paulina's house, along with a laundry room (available to guests), partial kitchen, and shared bathroom. Outdoor access is thru a shared (unlocked) patio door; bedroom doors do not appear to lock either; take note if this is an issue for you.  Paulina was generous, and accessible by text.
Very good place to stay, nice and clean.
Nice neighborhood. Short drive to Hanalei. Note: shared bathroom.

Paulina was very kind and responded quickly to questions and communication. The backyard garden is very lovely and the kitchen and laundry amenities were basic but comfortable. It is very close to all the happening resorts and beaches in Princeville. Great location and a cozy place to stay!

Paulina was an amazing host! She went above and beyond to make sure we had a wonderful stay! She made sure we knew all the great spots to swim, snorkel and surf as well as all the awesome attractions and things to do! She was so caring and understanding to our first Christmas away from home and made sure we felt the Aloha spirit!! The house was great! Very clean and had everything we needed and more! Also there was laundry which was very much needed due to swimming and snorkeling daily! She provided a hunch of extras as well - snorkel gear, towels, cooler etc to be used while we were there! Overall we had a perfect Kauai experience thanks to Paulina!! We will definitely stay with her again and will recommend her to everyone we know!!!! ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️ Thanks Paulina!
The Airbnb was a good experience and I wouldn't hesitate to go back.
Paulina was an awesome host! Perfect little space in a really beautiful location. We really enjoyed our stay here!
It's fine if you need a place to crash for the night.
Beautiful sunlit home is a very safe neighborhood. Swim, surf, and snorking equipment available which is great for us. We'd definitely stay over again!
ﾀﾞﾌﾞﾙﾌﾞｯｷﾝｸﾞのため､ﾘｽﾃｨﾝｸﾞとは異なる部屋に宿泊しましたが､とても景観の美しいｺﾃｰｼﾞでした｡ﾉｰｽｴﾘｱを拠点にする場合はおすすめです｡ただし夜間は本当に真っ暗なので､ﾄﾞﾗｲﾌﾞには注意が必要です｡

Paulina’s home is beautiful and in a very nice community. She let us use her bikes to get around and gave some tips about where we could rent a car! The home itself is a bit far to walk to many places but the bikes were very convenient! If your looking for a relaxing beautiful home in a nice area, this is for you!!

Cozy room, shared kitchen, large living room and bathroom, a lanai with a table and chairs, and Paulina is a very sweet and friendly host. She helps wherever she can and answers all sorts of questions you have. It is a very peaceful place. We cooked breakfasts and dinners for us, and if there is another couple who does the same, the fridge can be too small. We would return anytime again, we loved the peace and quiet, too.

name: Soho/Nolita - Best Location - Large 1 BDRM.
summary: Ideal home base to explore & enjoy NYC.  Recently renovated & beautifully furnished 1 Bdrm apartment in central, prime downtown neighborhood. Fully equipped -with necessities, amenities, & food provided, (including luxury bedding, towels & toiletries).  Nolita is lively but quiet, safe, & convenient - with top dining, art, shops, & nightlife. 5 min walk to Soho, Little Italy, Lower East Side, E. Village, Chinatown, and easily access the rest of NYC (4 major subway lines less than a 5 min walk).
space: Renovated and well furnished apartment in one of New York City's most desirable, fun, and central neighborhoods.  Ideal for vacation or work: prepared and equipped with everything needed for your stay. Top restaurants, shops, cafes, nightlife, galleries, and multiple major subway lines within 2 blocks. Walk to most popular downtown areas, and a quick taxi or subway ride to midtown and more.  The building is on a small street with minimal car traffic, and a neighborhood garden, offering peace compared to most of the city.  Large bedroom with Queen sized bed, two desks, two chairs, bookcase, and lots of floor space.  Full closet with hanging and shelf space and a large dresser.  There is a twin fold up bed which can be set-up in the bedroom.  Comfortable living room with a large sofa, very comfortable for sleeping (apx. 6ft 7inch length).  Premium Cable TV and On Demand with HDMI cable to connect a laptop. Bookcases have guidebooks and supplies for your stay. The kitchen has an open layo
description: Ideal home base to explore & enjoy NYC.  Recently renovated & beautifully furnished 1 Bdrm apartment in central, prime downtown neighborhood. Fully equipped -with necessities, amenities, & food provided, (including luxury bedding, towels & toiletries).  Nolita is lively but quiet, safe, & convenient - with top dining, art, shops, & nightlife. 5 min walk to Soho, Little Italy, Lower East Side, E. Village, Chinatown, and easily access the rest of NYC (4 major subway lines less than a 5 min walk). Renovated and well furnished apartment in one of New York City's most desirable, fun, and central neighborhoods.  Ideal for vacation or work: prepared and equipped with everything needed for your stay. Top restaurants, shops, cafes, nightlife, galleries, and multiple major subway lines within 2 blocks. Walk to most popular downtown areas, and a quick taxi or subway ride to midtown and more.  The building is on a small street with minimal car traffic, and a neighborhood garden, offering peace com
neighborhood_overview: Ideal location: At the intersection of Nolita, Soho, Lower East Side, Little Italy, Noho, Chinatown & the Bowery - neighborhoods all within a few blocks.  The East Village, West Village, and Greenwich Village are walking distance as well.   Nolita is one of the best neighborhoods in Manhattan, featuring top dining, shopping, culture, on tree lined, charming streets. Outdoor seating, coffee shops and cafes.  "Here, you have all of downtown at your fingertips, but get to come home to a family-like community. The small, homey details combine to make it a truly unique part of Manhattan."
notes: The apartment can sleep 4 people, with 2 in the Queen bed, 1 fold up bed, and 1 large sofa - I  recommend 1-3 people for best comfort in terms of the space.
transit: Among the most convenient areas in terms of transportation. Easy to reach all areas of Manhattan via subway and transfers to Brooklyn.  Taxis available 24/7.  Walk around and explore. 4 of the major subway lines are within 3 blocks of the apartment.  2 blocks to the 4/5/6 train (Spring Street - Soho), a 4 min walk to the N/R (Prince) the B/D/F/M (Broadway- Lafayette), and the J/Z at Bowery.  7 min walk to the A/C/E/ line as well.   Laguardia Airport: 20 minutes by taxi without traffic. Average 30 min. JFK Airport: 30 minutes by taxi without traffic. Average 45 min.  Union Square: 10 minutes by subway Grand Central Station (42nd street): 15 minutes by subway Times Square: 17 minutes by subway Wall Street / Financial District: 13 minutes by subway Upper East Side: 20 minutes by Subway Deli and convenience store one block away, Whole Foods is a 5 min walk.
access: High speed internet, and TV with cable (HBO, Showtime, Premium channels). Air conditioning and heat.   Full access to the apartment including kitchen equipment and accessories.  Everything needed to cook or eat in -  kettle, keurig coffee maker, toaster, microwave, oven, french press, dishes and cookware.  Filtered water, ice, coffee, tea, sugar, spices, almonds and small snacks.  Full closet and drawer space in the bedroom- including hangers. Additional storage cabinet opposite the entrance for luggage or other storage. (This cabinet also has extra supplies and an iron.) Large premium towels and wash cloths, high quality sheets and pillowcases, extra blankets. Bathroom essentials: Soap, shampoo, conditioner, and body wash as well as travel items.   iPhone alarm clock dock and speaker.  Travel friendly items: world adaptors, metro / subway card, chargers for blackberry and iphone.  Dyson air cooler and heater can be placed in the bedroom or living room for extra comfort. (Please use ca
interaction: I can be reached via text, and am also available by email or phone.  If you have questions or would like specific recommendations ahead of time please let me know.  For any questions or additional needs during your stay please contact me.  When you arrive I will meet to give you the keys and show you in, or can arrange an alternative. I have lived in NYC for 20 years and can help with recommendations and some other needs.  Am happy to suggest activities and sights as well as restaurants, shopping, and nightlife.  Upon request I can arrange for a cleaner, for laundry to be picked up and returned, as well as stocking any food or special requirements for your arrival.
house_rules: Please be respectful and no smoking inside. No parties, and maximum 6 people total in the apartment at one time.  Be polite to neighbors :).

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hi! I grew up in New York, and recently moved to Nolita.  I decided to list my apartment on Airbnb so that it can be enjoyed by others when I am away.  

I have friends who have had positive experiences so am hoping to have the same and really want visitors to have the best possible time on their travels.

reviews.comments: We had a great time at Mariana's place, she provided everything we needed and was very helpful.
The reservation was canceled 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had a great time staying at marina's. Her apartment was very clean, a great space, and comfortable. She provided everything I needed for the stay. The apartment is right in a great area and is very easy to get to the subway and other areas. I definitely recommend!

Marina's apt is very clean, nicely furnished and outfitted with new appliances and cabinets. The bed is comfortable, the kitchen and the bathroom well equipped. The location is fantastic with a variety of restaurants, tons of shops, a Whole Foods and subway station all nearby. It is also very close to Chinatown and Little Italy so don't miss the Sunday food markets.
Marina met us right on time with the keys and answered all our questions. I highly recommend this apt. We will be back.
The reservation was canceled 54 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
we had a wonderful stay, thank you very much

Amazing location in one of the greatest spots in Manhattan and very cosy and comfy apartment!
Cleaning was great and Marina very welcoming!
I'd come back any time...

We stayed 5 days in Marina's apartment. The area is great full of many restaurants, bars and trendy shops. It is also close to many subways and one city bike. The apartment itself is perfect for a couple and well equipped. Note that it is on a 1st floor which is very convenient after a long day walking : you don't have to go all way up to 5 floors :) 
The bedroom can be a bit noisy since it is on the street but it was really not an inconvenient for us.

Marina was great! She met us outside upon our arrival and gave us a tour of the apartment. She was very welcoming and opened her entire apartment to us. Marina was extremely easy to get in touch with if we had a question during our stay. 

The description of the apartment is very accurate. 

The apartment couldn't have been in a better location. We were walking distance from Broadway, where all the shopping was, our dinner reservations, great breakfast/ snack options, etc. Although we were in the center of popular streets/ restaurants, you could not hear any of the outside notice from inside. 

All together, we had a great experience and would highly suggest going through Marina for any airbnb requests.

L'accoglienza è stata ottima, siamo arrivati in anticipo sull'orario e Marina è stata molto gentile a raggiungerci prima del previsto. L'appartamento è in buone condizioni, pulito e completo di tutto quello che serve, ideale per tre persone. Ottima la commessione wifi. Anche il quartiere è funzionale: ci sono diversi negozi, ristoranti, bar, supermercati ed è proprio vicino alla zona di Little Italy. La metropolitana dista solo 5 minuti a piedi e con poche fermate si arriva in centro a Manhattan. Sicuramente consigliato.
Nice apartment. Renovated. Clean. Good location. Near many good restaurants and shops. Good communication with the owner. Would recommend.

The host was fantastic to us. Even though we did not meet her, her friend let us in the apt, and showed us around . Marina left notes on all the cabinets , explaining ehere everything was . Lots of fresh linens and clean towels for 3adults for 3 days. We would definitely come back on our next visit .

This place is in a great location. It's in Nolita, 2 minute walk from great breakfast spots and pizza and a 5 minute walk to two different subway lines. 

It's very clean. The bed and pillows are comfortable. The air conditioning was a big plus since we went during summer.  Marina was very accommodating, very nice, and always available to answer any questions.

Fantastic location and spotless apartment. Neighbourhood building crews on street mean early starts but excellent coffee is close at hand. Maria was very responsive to any questions and was kind enough to ensure all essentials were stocked. Hope to be back soon.

Excellent Excellent location and we love our stay in Marina's apartment! New York is such  a lovely city that you don't need any specific reason to go there, just set off! (and staying in Marina's apartment ;)   )
This place is in a great position, with a fab restaurant next door, a great coffee shop down the road and close to good shops. It was comfortable and quiet and provided a good base for hectic NY!

Logement  bien décrit 
Emplacement formidable 
Très bonne literie

The apartment is perfectly clean and just the right size for three people. Everything you could possibly need is available to fix a meal, there are extra linens, everything has been well thought out. The location is great - steps away from Little Italy and the subway, and there are great shops and restaurants right nearby.
Unfortunately, the host is a very busy student, so communication before, during and after our stay was very difficult. So difficult that we wouldn't stay at this great apartment again. If you can wait until the last minute to see if the host will indeed have a key and get it to you, and if you don't mind making several phone calls to help the host decide where to leave the key at the end of your stay, this place may be ok for you, but it won't be for us.
Great apt in the middle of SOHO. It was very comfortable and perfect for a weekend in the City. I would consider this apartment for future visits.

This apartment was just perfect for our long weekend in NYC.  Really and truly this place is in the perfect location...mere minutes to any subway stop you'd want to take, tons of unique little restaurants just outside your door, and a very community-like feel to the neighborhood.  Walk about 2 blocks south and you're in Chinatown/Little Italy for late night cannoli!  

The apartment was spacious and had everything you could possibly need.  Marina met us earlier than expected and completed check in so we could be on our way.  Lovely big bedroom with lots of storage, comfortable living room with wifi, uber well-stocked kitchen, bathroom with super soft towels.  I almost hate to leave this review out of fear this place will never be available again...we will definitely check to see if this place is available when we come back to NYC!  Thanks Marina!
Great experience with Marina. Apartment was exactly how it showed in photos, clean, amazing location, I would stay here again.

Hostess was out of town on our arrival day. Mixup on picking up the keys took two hours of frustration to get in.  Maid did not do a good job.  Hostess would text and not talk on the phone.
Made promises that never followed up on.

Actually quite disorganized. Has only listed apartment recently so she is new to the game. She tries hard and will get better with experience but for now, disorganized.

WONDERFUL location !!!! Best in town. Only one flight up. Great bed. Great kitchen. Long and narrow but perfect for two. Not three or more. Fantastic restaurant right beneath her apartment.

I'd rent again but wait a few months until hostess figures out how to be a hostess.
Pre - stay communication and check In /out was good . On check out day we were able to leave our luggage there until 13.00 which was helpful as our flight home was not until much later
Great experience!

Marina made us feel very welcome. She made sure she was there to let us in and show us everything even though we arrived later than anticipated. She was very flexible with our needs.
The apartment met our needs very well indeed. The bed was comfortable. The kitchen and bathroom were very well equipped.
We really loved the area. Upbeat, with great shopping and eating and easy to get anywhere in New York.

Amazing experience - great apartment and host and wonderful location.  Very clean with everything necessary and some extras! Very comfortable bed, linens, towels.  Marina was a great host and very thoughtful.  She was flexible with my check-in and in contact while booking and during our stay.  She provided a list of recommendations we asked for, and provided water, coffee, tea, some snacks, as well as metro card, toiletries, and more.
Highly recommended!  Apartment was perfect for our stay - in a great neighborhood and easy to travel to other parts of NYC.

Perfect apartment at Mott street - close (or even next door) to restaurants, bars, shopping, walking distance to other downtown areas.. The apartment is super clean, lots of closet space, comfortable bed,  and felt spacious for 2 people. Marina was very accommodating for my late arrival and flexible for check out. We couldn't ask for a better place to stay for a weekend in NY!

Since we arrived on Thanksgiving evening, it was understandable that Marina wasn't on property, but she made it very clear where she would leave the keys and we got into the apartment without any problems.  The neighborhood was great - very New York-ish.  Apartment was small, but very neat and tidy and had everything we needed. Kitchen and bathroom were well stocked. Marina was very considerate and provided all things one would need - right now to special band-aids for blisters (which thankfully we did not need!)  Nice plush towels and soaps and shampoos. The bed was comfortable and the bedding was nice. 
We didn't cook while we were there, but there seemed to be pans and anything you would need. Marina provided coffee and tea, which was great. Not having to go out in the morning to get coffee is important. In the evening we would make tea and enjoy our delicious pastries we'd purchase in Little Italy!  
Location was ideal - walked everywhere - Little Italy, Chinatown were just blocks away. Walked to 9/11 Memorial Museum, Union Square Park, shopping on Broadway - all were a very easy 1 mile walk. Dinner at Emporium just downstairs and it was very good. Also hit the "famous" places - Katz's Deli, Lombardi's, pastry from Ferraras Bakery - all were just blocks from the apartment.  The apartment was small, but was perfect for my daughter and myself. Might be a little cramped if you are big or tall and could be crowded for three adults.  The bedroom windows faced the street, so there was so noise from that, but nothing that bothered me or made me lose sleep. Overall it was a wonderful experience staying in Marina's apartment in Nolita and we will definitely stay again!

We had a great experience staying in this apartment. It was very clean and had all the amenities we needed. The location is excellent with many great restaurants, coffee shops (I was a regular at the cupcake store) and awesome boutiques. Only a block from Mulberry Street :)Marina was easy to deal with -- I would absolutely stay here again.

This apartment was perfectly located in Nolita, near Soho and close to subway stops.  Marina was unavailable to let us in as she had a personal commitment, but made arrangements for us to get the keys, left sticky notes around, and was available by text.  She was very responsive.  The apartment is small but delightful, was impeccably clean, and had all needed amenities.  We had a very nice stay except for one thing:  the noise.  The bedroom window is just above a bar and, as the weather was nice, there was significant outside revelry until 5 a.m. one night, the other night until about 2.  This was a major problem for us.  I slept on the couch one night as it's further in the apartment and not by the window.  If you plan to use this other wise fabulous place I would encourage bringing ear plugs and considering elsewhere if you are a very light sleeper.  In fairness, NYC is a noisy place, but this was noisier than other locations I've stayed in.  I'm giving it three stars, but only because of the noise factor.

It was a great experience! The location is perfect! And the flat really looks like as the pictures show... Thanks Marina, also for the quick answers when we had some questions.  I recommend this flat to everyone

Our stay at Marina place was great! Flexible in the check in and out time and Marina was very caring making sure everything was going well. The apartment is just as in the photos. Comfortable for two with everything you may need, even iPhone charger! Heat was good. We had a couple of very cold days and we did not suffer any cold. Marina left us another heater but we did not need to use it much. The neighborhood was great. Full of nice restaurants, good shopping and a few blocks from several subway stations. At night it is a bit noisy as there is a small restaurant next to the apartment. It was not a problem for us but if you have problems to sleep you may need ear plugs to do so before midnight. 
We'd would definitely recommend Marinas place to any couple who is looking to live like a local in New York . When back, we will surely stay there again. Thanks Marina!

We first stayed here in October 2015 and liked it so much that when deciding to return to NYC in April 2016 we had no hesitation in choosing this apartment again . Lovely , compact , comfortable flat in a great area . Lots of restaurants (Little Italy & Chinatown a few blocks away ) ,  4 or 5 subway lines within a few minutes walk  and a great location from which to explore New York on foot . Marina is a very nice ,helpful host .

We had a great experience staying at Marina's cute SoHo apartment. She is very responsive and met us when we arrived. The location was fabulous, the apt was clean, and she left us tea packets, coffee, water, etc. to use. We didn't have to leave until the evening and Marina was very flexible with our check out time. Overall, a great stay in NYC!

Marina is such a wonderful host and so attentive. We would recommend her any time as a hostess that is there for you!, 
Also a great location..I love this area .
 Being a place on the street that may create some noise for a lite sleeper ,is a known for NYC, but if one knows that its only when there is city construction its great!! I was very grateful for her care of comfort and being available on a text..  I give her a 5 star for helpful cleanlines and integrity.

Marina was very responsive, accomodating and friendly.
The  appartment looked exactly like it was shown in the pictures. Was very clean, tidy and equipped.
The key delivery worked perfectly. In fact, we were delayed and Marina was waiting for us in the appartment.
The appartment is very strategically located, near fancy restaurants, the Soho and the metro. Very freindly neighborhood.
The only issue I would like to point out is the noise of the construction of  the building next door. It started very early in the morning and it was difficult to keep sleeping.
For the rest, as mentioned, we recommend to stay at Marina´s appartment.

We had a great experience and would definitely come back here again. Apartment was clean and just like the pictures shown. It was modern and had all the amenities of home. Even had iPhone and android chargers next to the bed ready to go! The location is amazing and the nearby restaurants, shops, and bars are great!

Our stay at Marina's place was absolutely perfect, she is a great host and her apartment is as great as she is - it looked exactly as shown in the pictures, was super clean and very well equipped, she even left us coffee, tea, shampoo etc to use. We stayed there with 3 people, one sleeping on the couch, and she provided extra blankets and sheets. Marina was already waiting for us when we arrived and told us we could call/text her with any questions. She was super flexible on check-out time, our flight only left late in the evening and we could stay at the apartment the entire day. Marina's apartment is right in the middle of my favorite area in the city - the cutest cafes, brunch places, restaurants and boutiques are only a few minutes of walking away and it's close to several subway stations, so you can explore the rest of the city. If my family would ever visit NYC again, we would definitely return.

L'accoglienza da parte di Marina, che si è fatta trovare nella casa al nostro arrivo, è stata eccellente. 
L'appartamento corrisponde pienamente alla descrizione, l'abbiamo trovato in ordine e pulito, attrezzato con tutto quello che ci serviva.
Anche l'ubicazione della casa è ottimale, perchè si trova in un quartiere centralissimo, molto ben collegato con tutto il resto della città, raggiungibile sia a piedi che con la metropolitana, la cui stazione è vicinissima.
La zona è molto giovane e trendy e vivacissima a tutte le ore, ci sono tanti bellissimi  locali, bar, pasticcerie, ristoranti, negozi, ecc.

We had a great experience staying at Marina's place. Everything was perfectly arranged even though Marina couldn't be there in time due to a delayed flight. She took care of everything remotely and had a friend check us in. The apartment is very clean and had all the amenities we needed. Also, the location is just perfect. Many bars and restaurants, several subway stations in walking distance.

Marina was a great host! She contacted us in advance to ask about our specific needs and was very friendly. We were caught up in traffic and weren't able to give her a very specific time of arrival, but she patiently waited for us at the apartment and showed us everything in detail when we arrived. The description of the apartment is very accurate and perfect for 2-3 people. Everything was clean and comfortable. Fresh towels, extra blankets, spare toothbrushes and other amenities were all provided as stated in the description. The bed was also very comfortable! The location is absolutely awesome -- lots of great restaurants nearby and close to the subway. We had a wonderful time here and would definitely stay here again!
Marina was a wonderful host. She was very responsive and super helpful. Her apartment was clean and cozy. I had an amazing stay and would definitely recommend staying here.
Adorable apartment, great location! Thanks, Marina!
The neighborhood was loudly specially on Saturday night. Other than the fail of the cable and wifi service everything was good.

The wi-fi did not work which made it very difficult to make plans. The hallways were very unappealing and there were concerns about the buildings cleanliness. The bathroom door didn't close which could make intimacy difficult. Otherwise the place was nice and the stay was overall comfortable.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Schöne Lage der Wohnung! 
Leider hatten wir keinen Wifi Empfang! 
Ansonsten wie beschrieben.
Für New Yorker Verhältnisse prima für Eltern mit 2 Kinder.

La estadía fue genial, las fotos muestran el apartamento tal como es, pequeño y confortable, ideal para tres personas como máximo, algunas molestias por una construcción que se estaba realizando en el edificio de al lado, los que comenzaban muy temprano a trabajar, lo que de seguro será pasajero.  Todo lo que Marina ofrecía en su anuncio se cumplió...limpieza, artículos de aseo personal, básicos, snacks, libertad de entrada y salida, etc. El barrio lindísimo, tranquilo y seguro. Una ubicación muy buena, metro cercano, restaurantes, mercados, tiendas......repetiría nuevamente si voy por NYC una segunda vez.

My partner and I loved our stay at in NYC at Marina's apartment. The location is perfect, close to many restaurants and cafes, and close to multiple subway stations. The apartment is exactly as depicted in the photos, and has everything you would need. Marina was very helpful and easy to communicate with. I highly recommend staying here.
Great place! Lots of different nice places nearby.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a very pleasent stay i Marina flat.  God and informative wellcome by Marina. Exellent coffe for breakfest and breakfest cereals. The flat was clean and tidy, with enough towels, soap etc. 
So if possible, we would like to come back to this apparment next time we visit NY. We give Marina and her flat our best recommondation

Marina was a friendly, accommodating host; she was easy to reach prior to and during our stay. Her apartment was equipped with all the essentials (dishes, coffee maker, hairdryer, etc.) for a long weekend in a great neighborhood. The space was clean and as described/ pictured in her listing. She was kind enough to leave a few snacks and beverages for us to enjoy. The bedroom was spacious with a comfortable queen size bed and plenty of space for clothes in the chest & wardrobe. There's a fold-out bed available if you have another person, but I didn't use it. The living room is small (as expected in NY), but there's plenty of space to lounge after a long day exploring the city. She has space heaters & fans for easy temperature control (I loved the heated fan in the bathroom when the temps dropped!) The apartment is in a great area with a ton of delicious restaurants and cute shops within walking distance. There are a couple of subway stations a short walk away too. The neighborhood is quite lively, so if you're a light sleeper, be prepared. Marina offers a noisemaker and earplugs to help with the sound. Everything was great and made for a fun weekend! I would highly recommend this apartment for anyone looking for a local's experience in the city.

This is a great little apartment in the coolest neighborhood in NYC.   Perfect for a couple.  Great subway access, not that there's any reason to leave Nolita.
The apartment is cozy.  Noise wasn't too bad, as expected for the spot, one flight up.
Everything worked fine including full kitchen.   The bed is very comfortable.
Marina was a great host, easily accessible.
We'll plan to stay here again.
Marina's place is in such a fantastic spot -- NoLita is totally hopping right now. Access to all subways, great food, shopping, etc. The apartment is surprisingly spacious and the bed is super comfy.

We enjoyed staying at Marina's place. The apartment is not big, but easily accomodates 3 people, with a nice kitchen area and a spacious bathroom. Although it is a little noisy in the morning because of construction nearby, the location is hard to beat - near soho, greenwich village and just a short walk to B,D,Q and 6 subway lines. The restaurant downstairs is really good - delicious and reasonably priced. Thanks!

This apartment is a good value for staying in a great neighborhood. We had a hiccup at check-in—the apartment wasn't ready before our arrival—and Marina was very communicative throughout that process and was proactive in offering some money back for the inconvenience, which was awesome. The overall cleanliness of the apartment wasn't great, but that could probably be blamed on a last-minute/rushed cleaner trying to accommodate us checking in. That said, the apartment was perfectly fine as a place to crash between activities. Bed was comfy, plenty of closet/dresser space and bathroom was sufficient. Location can't be beat.

Marina's place was the perfect location for our girls weekend! The bed was very comfortable and the fold-out bed and couch were great and allowed us to sleep four adults easily. It's a small place but has everything you would need. The area around the apartment is adorable with lots of cute shops and restaurants - we would definitely recommend Marina's place to friends and family!
Had a great stay and would definitely stay there again

I LOVED Marina's apartment. It's a newly renovated and super clean spot in the BEST location. The perfect size and comfort when traveling. I was beyond happy staying there and Marina was very sweet and accomodating. She responded immediately with any questions and left all the amenities you'd find in the nicest hotels. The bed wsa very comfortable and the towels/sheets/bathroom products did not disappoint. Not only was the apartment perfect, so is the location. Located in the heart of Nolita, next to all the shopping and delicious food one dreams of when visiting NYC. The apartment is close to boutique shops, SoHo, public transportation, and so much more. You are in the heart of central downtown. Can't beat that spot!!!
My son and husband stayed in Marina's apartment on their trip to New York.Very nice place,very comfy,and close to all kinds of restaurants.They loved her place.I would highly recommend her place.

Fantastic location!! Super cute apartment, everything was as displayed on airbnb. Marina's a great host and was very helpful showing me everything in the apartment when I first arrived. Highly recommend staying here!! You really can't beat the location and the apartment is lovely!

The location is the best thing - this is a  wonderful location with a lively and hip  neighborhood that has everything you need within a few blocks.   Also very convenient to transportation for traveling around the city.      
This is a very clean and modern apartment, comfortable bed,  good working appliances, and good water temperature and pressure but know that it is very small and a bit dark.  The photos are accurate, but I was still surprised by the narrow living and kitchen area.   The bedroom is more roomy and a nice space with a desk too, but the living room area is so narrow that my husband could touch both walls standing in the center!    We wished there were more windows for light and a view.   

It was comfortable for 2 people, but I think more would be uncomfortable.  
 
But then, when you are in New York how much time will you spend inside  anyway?

El departamento es genial, en el primer piso excelentemente ubicado en el barrio Nolita donde se encuentran pubs, restaurantes, lugares para desayunar y tiendas comerciales de todo tipo, también supermercados y farmacia a menos de dos cuadras. Tambié (Website hidden by Airbnb) cuadras están avenidas importantes con subte  y las mejores tiendas para comprar. Podes vivir el barrio a toda hora sin problemas. La comunicación con Marina sin problema y nos estaba esperando para darnos todas las indicaciones que necesitábamos. Un lugar muy aconsejable para pasar una excelente estadía en una ciudad como NY.

Great place, great location ... near Spring Street Metro Stop, lots of really good restaurants & bars. It can be a little loud, but only if you plan to go to sleep before 10 at night- And who does that when they're in New York?
This place was perfect for my stay! The location couldn't have been any more perfect and Marina was super accommodating. It was nice to feel like a local for a few days.

The apartment was clean, comfortable and in a great location. It was exactly as described in the pictures.  It looks like it's been recently renovated.  We had our family of four and Marina had a cot put out for us for one of the kids and the other slept on the couch. Communication, check-in and check-out with Marina was easy.  We would definitely stay there again!
Marina's place was a perfect location. Restaurants galore and subway close to enable us to visit anything Manhattan had to offer. Her apartment was small but comfortable for 4 adults.

The apartment was perfect! Great location! Marina was very accommodating. My friends and I were flying into New York at 6am and she made it possible for us to get into the apartment as soon as we arrived in SoHo that morning. Next time I visit New York I would definitely book this apartment again if possible. Thanks Marina!
Marina was a perfect host and her apartment was great!  Good size for 2-3 people.  Apartment was very clean and had everything you would need.  Loved, loved, loved the location!
She is a great host.  Very gracious and accommodating.  Location is awesome.

Marina's place is lovely and convenient and is accessible to the restaurants, shops, bars and subway. You can get whatever you want in Soho area. Marina's place is def a good location if you would like to stay in Soho.
Very clean place and located right near coffee shops and clothing stores. Would definitely stay here again.

Marina was awesome! I was pleasantly surprised and extremely grateful that she offered to get some food for my kids when we check in since our flight was red eye. It was the nicest thing a host has done for us and we've stayed at many rentals in the past. You seriously cannot beat the location. It was the best! So convenient to the trains, yummy eats and great neighborhoods. I wished I stayed longer. Thanks again Marina!
This was the cutest apt! Marina was so helpful after we had such a chaotic airline experience.  She's so helpful, always answering my questions!! Had a blast! ❤

Un lugar muy bien ubicado , cerca de varias estaciones del metro. El departamento está muy bien equipado con todo lo necesario para tener una buena estancia y está en el segundo piso. No hay elevador. El barrio es seguro y tiene muchos restaurantes y bares cercanos. Hay una construcción grande justo al lado que por el momento genera ruido en especial por las mañanas.

Marina's place is in a fabulous location. Very close to several subway stations, restaurants, bars and cute shops. It's a small apartment  and it's on the second floor, but it's very comfortable and has all the amenities you need.

This apartment couldn't be in a better location.  It is right in the middle of everything.  We walked EVERYWHERE - west village, soho, brooklyn, china town, little italy.  Perfect central location.  The apartment itself was very clean and check in was wonderfully easy.  Another benefit was the checkout time being in the evening so it gives you a place to keep your stuff until you fly out.  Though the apartment has sleeping for four, it is quite small and I would recommend smaller parties.  However, Marina was extremely kind and set up the apartment before we got there for four with a cot and sheets for the couch.  All in all, a great stay and I would definitely stay there again.

Marina is a very god host. Her place is very well organized and very clean. The location is so god ind the heart of SOHO. Close to shopping and restaurants. It’s our second time staying here, and we will love to come back another time.

Marina's apartment is in an amazing location. It is quite small, but to be expected in that location. We loved the Pizzeria Emporio downstairs, great coffee, food, Happy Hour etc. Loved it. Marina provided lots of bathroom necessities in case you had forgotten anything plus food basics. We bought the seven day Metro card which was brilliant to be able to run around all over the place on the Subway and bus.
Great location and helpful host!

This was my first time in NY and there was a lot of debate about what area I should stay in. Soho is hands down the best spot to get a good feel for everything. Way nicer than central which was too hectic. This is close enough in that you feel connected and has a tonne of bars and restaurants right on its doorstep, But also close to Williamsburg and L.E.S. etc. Marina was great, the perfect host! We'll definitely be staying here again when we come back.

We are a family of 4 (2 adults and 2 children) and we spent 3 lovely days (2 nights) at Marina's appartment in NY. We can only say positive things about this experience. Firstly, the appartment description and pictures shown at airbnb are 100% accurate. It is VERY clean and really well furnished. And its location is simply perfect. Marina was a super host too. She was flexible with our flight schedule, allowing us to check-in early in the morning and check-out later in the afternoon (it helps a lot when travelling with 2 kids!). She was also very kind by leaving coffee and some food at our disposal. We strongly recommend Marina's place and would definitely stay there again!
Excellent location

Location was perfect. Hip neighborhood with cute boutiques shopping. Close to restaurants and nightlife. Easy acce to multiple subway lines. The apartment was clean and bed was comfortable. Marina met us upon arrival and offered tips for our stay. She was readily available. Would definitely return.

We really enjoyed our weekend getaway to NYC and couldn't have asked for a better place than Marina's. Marina was a great host, she waited for us, even after a delayed flight, to meet and check us in. She gave us some great tips on things to see, great coffee shops and amazing places to eat in the neighborhood. Her place is very comfortable and provides everything you need to make you feel like you are at home. The best thing about Marina's place is the location. It is right in the heart of SoHo and NoLiTa, fantastic neighborhood for walking around and with countless restaurants and shops to visit. We would highly recommend and would stay there again.

This is a very comfortable small apartment in a wonderful neighborhood if you like fine little restaurants and shops. It is a great place to walk around and is very convenient to subway connections for uptown and downtown. We would definitely stay there again. Our host Marina was very hospitable and accessible.
Place was perfect!  The best location and exactly as described.  I wish we could have stayed longer

Marina’s place is very welcoming. She provided basic breakfast essentials, iPhone chargers, plenty of sheets and towels.
The neighborhood is filled with shops and restaurants. Can get noisy, but that is typical of NY city.
The flexible checkin/checkout times were a great help !
I would definitely stay there again
