Fantastic apartment with an authentic NYC feel located in a fantastic position served us well. The apartment was spotlessly clean & the host, Marina, included so many thoughtful personal touches (coffee machine & pods, milk, sugar, other goodies to eat & drink, clean linen, the list goes on!). Numerous cell phone chargers & charging points were located throughout the apartment for guest use (we have not seen this bonus in any previous Airbnb home before). The cosy heater really helped with the extreme cold weather (including snowy days)! A wide variety of movies & tv channels are available to pass the time on rainy/snowy days.

Marina was exceptionally quick, very personable & super helpful when responding to our queries. Checkin & checkout was easy & extremely flexible. 

We would highly recommend Marina's apartment to anyone looking to stay in NYC, it is a real gem! Our experience was wonderful & we are sad to leave!
Marina's apartment is in the BEST neighborhood.  We loved walking out the door to amazing coffee, dining, shopping, sightseeing, and people watching.  It is close to the subway and is just adorable.

Marina's place was great.  Centrally located near SoHo, East Village, and LES.  The big bedroom was great even if the apartment is pretty small.  Marina had toiletries, snacks, and coffee ready and was quick to respond when we were checking in.  Would definitely stay here again!
It was very quintessential New York. Small but still very comfy. The restaurant below our space was fabulous!!  The apt is very close to a subway stop so it was really convenient.

This is a great place to stay. It’s in the vibrant area of Soho and Nolita and very close to the East Village. There are a great number and variety of restaurants nearby and shopping galore. Marina’s place is a large one bedroom by NYC standards. It’s a very comfortable place for 2 or 3 people. The building is quiet and we felt very safe in the area. Marina has it well stocked with a number of amenities. We will definitely stay here again.
Awesome location, comfy, not expensive

Our 5 night stay was everything you could wish for in a NYC Airbnb. 

LOCATION!!! 

CLEAN!!!

COMFORTABLE!!!

GREAT VALUE!!!

I was traveling with my 70 year old mother and my 8 year old daughter. 
The apartment is up one manageable flight of stairs. 
It is located a short walk from several different subway line stops. 
There are lots of restaurants, cafes, coffee shops and shops around. 
The neighborhood is so charming. Lively enough to feel safe but not to keep us up all night. 
The bed was super comfortable. There were several other seating options to retire to at the end of a long, busy day of sightseeing. 
The place isn’t huge, but it’s certainly big enough!
Highly recommend!!!
Wonderful location! Easy access to public transportation, as well as a wonderful neighborhood feel. We loved the access to restaurants, however, it was also pretty quiet at night.
Make yourself comfortable in this nice Nolita Apartment and feel yourself as a New Yorker citizen. This is the perfect spot to start exploring  the city!

We stayed almost 2 weeks by Marina apartment, with our 8-months old baby. The house was perfect for all of us, although the flight of stair. The apartment was comfortable, cozy, very well furnished with all the amenities and, most of all, in a great position. The surroundings are amazing, we couldn't ask more. Thank you Marina! We hope to come again.

This is a great apartment in a fantastic location. It is walking distance to great restaurants, shopping and the subway. The apartment is clean and the beds are comfortable. I highly recommend this apartment to anybody travelling to NYC.

PERFECT LOCATION. We didn’t even feel the need to go anywhere else but we had to do some touristy things! There are loads of restaurants, coffee shops and comedy clubs within walking distance. The street is picture perfect and we even spotted a few celebs !!! We had 3 people in this space which was ok but it would be perfect for a couple. It was clean, there was coffee and lots of bathroom gear!
This was a great experience. We definitely enjoyed our time at this AirBnB and would stay here again given the opportunity.

Stayed at Marina's place for only 3 nights but LOVED IT from the first moment on.
Marina greeted us upon check in, showed us everything inside the apartment and then gave us total privacy.
The place is small but perfect for a couple, kitchen is stacked with nearly everything you could ask for including coffee, tea, water, as well as as the bathroom is equipped with shampoo, shower gel etc.
Bed very comfy, bedroom windows facing Mott St. are tight enough to shut out most of the street noises when closed.

But best of all: LOCATION!!!

Being in the middle of Nolita means you have plenty places to drink and eat just minutes (or even seconds, e.g. Gimme! Coffee right across the street) away!! Our recommendations: Prince Street Pizza on Prince, Tacombi on Elizabeth, Grey Dog on Mulberry, Rice to Riches on Spring.
And not to forget the WholeFoods on Bowery and Houston.
Subway as well is only some steps away so you can reach easily all of the city.

Yes, you have to climb  1 flight of stairs, and yes, sometimes you can hear the music from 'Emporio' right under the apartment, but that is part of the New York experience, and I wouldn't miss it for a minute.

Thanks marina for letting us stay at your place, and we'd love to return!!
Terrific location in the heart of Nolita. Clean and efficient place with well stocked amenities to make you feel right at home. 10!
Very central location in a lively neighbourhood! We had an amazing time, the flat is very nice and cozy, and the host super friendly and full of recommendations!
Great apartment in a wonderful neighborhood, and a lovely owner.
If you don't know where to stay in New York, stay here. What a location! Will try and stay here next time I'm in New York. The flat has everything you need.
Very nice & lovely place with an exceptional location !

Marina’s place was perfect for myself and my 2 teenage daughters. The SOHO location is within walking distance of many great shops,  places to eat and easy access to the subway. The neighborhood seemed very safe, everything was very clean and Marina provided more than the standard amenities. It was perfect!

This is a great small rental in an absolutely wonderful neighborhood! My husband and I stayed for two days with our two children. It was slightly cramped for the four of us, which we totally expected, but it met our needs just fine. The neighborhood is truly wonderful and we had so much fun exploring.
Marina’s apartment  is perfect It is perfect for the area in which it is located. And the subway is very close.

Marina’s place is very pretty, organized, clean, and in a great location, between NoLita and SoHo. I would recommend her place in warm-ish months, as I had issues with her bed location —pushed up against the windows. I was there in a bitter cold snap and was cold at night, with very cold drafts.

name: Aparthotel at Praia da Barra.
summary: Apart hotel with beach, pool and 24h reception. Nice and comfortable, overlooking the beach and Marapendi lagoon. Gorgeous sunset! Comfortably accommodates up to 6 people. Great location, close to restaurants and shopping malls. Garage available.
space: The beach and the swimming pool are so close that they make an excellent leisure option. The swimming pool with heated water and bar service make this condo truly outstanding. 24 hour reception and security. Parking available.
description: Apart hotel with beach, pool and 24h reception. Nice and comfortable, overlooking the beach and Marapendi lagoon. Gorgeous sunset! Comfortably accommodates up to 6 people. Great location, close to restaurants and shopping malls. Garage available. The beach and the swimming pool are so close that they make an excellent leisure option. The swimming pool with heated water and bar service make this condo truly outstanding. 24 hour reception and security. Parking available. Access to fitness room and sauna, children's playground, swimming pool with bar and snacks. I'm always interacting via emails and cell phone, I'm at your disposal to solve any problems. The condo has 24 hour reception and security. Maid service 3 times a week. The best beach and the best restaurants and shopping centers are in Barra. Currently the best of Rio de Janeiro. Currently the best of Rio de Janeiro. The taxi service in Rio works very well. The people at the condominium's front desk can help by indicating public

house_rules: Espero que os hóspedes sempre se sintam em casa.Portanto, tenham o mesmo respeito e cuidado como se fosse sua. Observando as regras de boa vizinhança.

host.host_about:
Sou uma pessoa bacana e muito educada, dedicada ao meus objetivos.
Gosto de curtir um bom livro, filme e um bom vinho com queijos. Adoro ar condicionado e meu computador. Celular e tablet.Joguinhos também. Sou uma boa cozinheira e adoro comer bem. Me considero uma pessoa realizada, já fiz vários trabalhos como voluntaria e o mais importante sei receber muito bem.Sou aposentada como aeronauta, comissária de bordo e atualmente sou psicóloga.Meu lema é "Ser e ter empatia com as pessoas."
Adoro viajar, já viajei pelo mundo trabalhando e agora viajo a passeio sempre que posso. Por isso gosto muito de ter o apartamento limpo e bem cuidado para poder recebe-los bem. " Simples assim"...

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
O apartamento da Rachel é ótimo, bem espaçoso, limpo, bem localizado, seguro e com portaria 24hrs.
Possui uma linda vista para praia e lagoa!!
Adoramos tudo e a Rachel foi super simpatica e deixou tudo perfeito no ap!
Super Obrigada não vemos a hora de voltar para ele :)
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Ótimo apartamento, bem localizado, fácil acesso, sem problemas para check-in e checkout. Rachel foi um amor de pessoa, deixou tudo bem preparado para nossa estadia. Recomendo e voltarei em breve.
Adoramos o lugar, muito organizado, limpo e com ótima localização. A vista é ótima. Chuveiro quente e cama confortável, tudo ocorreu perfeitamente.

A minha experiência como hóspede da Rachel, foi a melhor possível. Sempre pronta para tirar minhas dúvidas, respondia sempre que solicitado, me deu informações muito importantes sobre o local. O apartamento estava como nas fotos, muito limpo, organizado e com tudo para tornar a estadia confortável. Minha nota é 10! Ótima localização, em frente à linda praia da Barra...amei!

Raquel foi muito solicita desde o comeco conosco. Sempre respondeu rapido os emails e a casa estava bem organizada quando chegamos. Tudo limpo e cheiroso.
Houveram alguns imprevistos, mas ela contornou e deu assistencia a todo momento.
E foi alem, se preocupou em toda hora com nosso bem estar. Ate providenciou berco pro meu bebe e fruta organiza ja que chegariamos tarde. 

Sobre o apartamento, mesmo mais antigo ele é completo e aconchegante. É bem localizado, bairro tranquilo e perto de restaurantes, posto e padaria. Tem em frente infraestrutura boa e suficiente para aproveitar a praia.

Super recomendamos!!!!

Rachel foi sempre solicita desde o inicio com meus questionamentos até a efetivação da reserva e hospedagem, o local é realmente igual as fotos, simplismente maravilhoso. Bem proximo tem uma estação da Bike Rio onde era possivel alugar uma bike e sair pedalando pelo bairro que é super seguro e tranquilo.
Eu e minha amiga adoramos tudo, a Rachel foi mto atenciosa e cumpriu com todos os quesitos citados no site e ate mais! Agradeço pela otima recepçao!

Excelente Apartamento, ficou acima de minhas expectativas. Tudo muito arrumado e em otima (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza pretendemos retornar. E sobre a anfitria, tenho somente elogios, muito atenciosa e a comunicacao foi excelente. Recomendado!

Bom apartamento, com ótima vista para a praia e a lagoa, em uma boa localização na Barra. A cozinha e o banheiro são bem equipados, e a cama de casal é confortável. A piscina do condomínio é bem bacana e bem administrada. Não experimentamos a sauna. A diarista fez uma boa faxina em um dos dias de nossa hospedagem.

Há, no entanto algumas melhorias possíveis na infraestrutura: o ar condicionado é um pouco barulhento, especialmente o do quarto; e o sofá-cama é bem desconfortável - apertado para um casal e com pouco estofamento.

Quanto à comunicação com a proprietária, nenhuma reclamação: as mensagens com nossas dúvidas eram respondidas rapidamente. A Rachel até mesmo nos deixou alguns itens de geladeira e se prontificou a comprar mais coisas antes de nossa chegada, caso precissássemos, sendo incrivelmente solícita.

Na média, foi uma ótima experiência, e não tenho dúvida de que me hospedaria novamente.

Excelente localização, apartamento perfeito para quem busca conhecer umas das melhores praias do Rio, excelente estrutra.

Voltarei mais vezes.

O apartamento é maravilhoso, a vista então, nem se fala. 
Tudo estava muito bem limpo e com as devidas funcionalidades.
A Rachel também foi muito atenciosa e sempre prestativa durante a (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei mais vezes.
A minha estadia foi excelente, o imóvel é como está descrito no anúncio, a localização é muito boa, além da Rachel ser muito atenciosa. Recomendo a outras pessoas a alugarem este imóvel.

Adorei o aparthotel que tem uma ótima estrutura e fica muito bem localizado. Belo visual da praia e próximo a restaurantes e transportes.
Rachel é uma excelente anfitriã, sempre atenta aos nossos contatos e bastante dedicada. O apartamento estava sempre limpo e arrumado.

O apartamento é fantástico. Localização perfeita, praia lindissima e muito tranquila, entre o posto 07 e 8. Prédio de frente para a praia. Tudo limpo e cheiroso. Banho quentinho e noite agradável com o ar condicionado. A anfitriã é maravilhosa, não a conheci pessoalmente mas não me faltou vontades. rsrsrs.
Atendimento da equipe do prédio também é fantástica.

Obrigada

A experiência como hóspede da Rachel foi excelente. Ela é uma ótima anfitriã e se mostrou sempre disponível para esclarecer nossas dúvidas. O apartamento estava como nas fotos, muito limpo, organizado e com tudo para tornar a estadia confortável. Além disso, o aparthotel também tem uma ótima estrutura e fica muito bem localizado, com um belo visual da praia e próximo a restaurantes e transportes.
Excelente!! Todo como lo habíamos acordado con Rachel!

O apartamento é lindo, super limpinho, organizado, localização incrível! A Rachel foi super flexível com os horários de check in e out e sempre respondendo rápido, pronta pra ajudar no que (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei mais vezes.

L'appartement de Rachel est très bien équipé, complet, agréable et super propre.
Rachel est très disponible et a été super ouverte pour le check-out.
Je recommande sans l'ombre d'un doute.
À bientôt

O apartamento é exatamente como anunciado. Muito limpo e bem cuidado. Ótima localização, ótima estrutura do condomínio. Check in e check out mais rápidos impossível! 
Definitivamente recomendado!

Realmente um apartamento maravilhoso , super limpo e tudo em perfeito estado , a proprietaria super atenciosa e a equipe do condomínio todos excelentes , realmente estou apaixonada pelo o apartamento , quem busca um apartamento limpo , de frente à praia e são tranquilos como o apart ... vcs vão amar ! , muito obrigada Raquel ! , vc e top!! , voltarei sempre!!!
Excelente todo , limpieza ubicación servicios etc para recomendar muy muy bueno a mi criterio es muy cómodo otro para dos personas

Apartamento maravilhoso e a Sra Rachel super atenciosa e responsável .
Quem busca um apartamento no Rio de frente à praia , limpo e atencioso com certeza o da Sra Rachel

Totalmente perfeito. Muito limpo, mimos da proprietária, resposta sempre pronta, suporte local (restaurante, farmácia, conveniência, tudo próximos), boa estrutura do condomínio, boa praia, boa localização.
Já fiquei em vários lugares pelo Airbnb, dentro e fora do país, acredito que tenha sido a melhor experiência.
Voltaremos com certeza.

Se vocês buscam um apartamento maravilhoso , caprichoso e de frente para a praia e com uma excelente proprietária que trata seus clientes com carinho e respeito não deixe de visitar esse apartamento COM ESSA MRAVILHOSA HOST!
Super limpo , uma linda vista e com certos mimos que so os bons clientes podem ter!
Adoro seu apartamento Rachel!...muito obrigada!

Já estou me considerando suspeito, tinha passado o réveillon e já voltei no carnaval. Repito os comentários já feitos anteriormente. Tudo funcionou perfeitamente como no réveillon. Boa localização , limpeza, facilidade de comunicação, amenidades, flexibilidade de horários de checkin e checkout. Enfim tudo.

Já tive varias vezes no apartamento da Sra Rachel e estou super apaixonada ! , THE BEST PLACE IN RIO ! , AMAZING! , apartamento tem uma vista espetacular : mar , montanha , lagoa , cidade e sempre super limpo e com alguns mimos para minha chegada ! , Sra Rachel super atenciosa e majestosa ! , super educada e gentil , e uma honra me hospedar na propriedade da Sra Rachel! , Muito obrigada !
Excelente Todo!!

Meus dias foram sensacionais. O apartamento extremamente limpo, organizado, ótima localização e sem contar a vista magnífica.
A Raquel é maravilhosa, além de muito atenciosa, a equipe do condomínio é excelente e a estrutura sem igual.
Agradeço todo o cuidado e carinho.
Não deixem de visitar o apartamento com essa Host SENSACIONAL.
Estou apaixonada e voltarei muitas outras vezes. SUPER INDICO!!!

Toda vez que vou ao Rio de Janeiro eu me hospedo no apartamento da Sra Rachel e como sempre muito bem limpo ,organizado e um tratamento diferenciado! , Se buscam um apartamento em frente a praia , seguro, super limpo e com todas as comodidades e limpo? ..o apartamento da Rachel! ...sou uma cliente fanática !
Excelente hospedaje, muy limpio y recomendable! Muy buena atención de parte de Rachel, todo el tiempo se preocupó y estuvo a disposición. Volvería a ir sin dudas
Todo ok rachel nos dejo bebidas, snack y galletitas para el recibimiento

Nuestra experiencia fue maravillosa, Rachel es una excelente anfitriona.
Desde el personal de recepción del condominio hasta ella inclusive siempre se mostraron atentos y con buena predisposición.
El departamento es excelente en todo aspecto.
Vale destacar que está totalmente equipado para sentirse a gusto como en casa.
Altamente recomendable y seguramente volveremos.
La ubicación es fantástica.
Saludos.

Pelas fotos já é lindo, mas pessoalmente é incrível! Tudo muito limpo e cheiroso! Com uma vista pro mar incrível! Rachel deixou até alguns mimos! Obrigada por fazer dos meus dias no rio melhores! Com certeza voltarei.
Amo me hospedar no Apartamento da Sra Rachel , sempre me hospedo , perfeito ! , linda vista e lindo apartamento , muito Obrigada
Excelente ubicación y confort del departamento. De volver a Barra seguro que me volveré a hospedar allí. Rachel es una excelente anfitriona

name: Spectacular Modern Uptown Duplex
space: DESCRIPTION: This is a well situated modern duplex (150sqm) with spectacular views of the city of Barcelona from the beautiful terraces (125sqm). From the terraces you can view the sea and downtown to the east and Gaudi's Parc Guell to the North.  There's a private solarium in the upper terrace complete with deck chairs where you can enjoy cocktails, private sunbathing or star gazing while relaxing at night. APARTMENT DESCRIPTION Upstairs floor: 1 large bedroom suite (30 sqm) with a double bed and a single bed, private connected bathroom (10 sqm) with Jacuzzi and shower, and a small private terrace (8 sqm) with views of Barcelona. 1 small bedroom (single bed) with exit to a big terrace and solarium area. Panoramic solarium with deck chairs, chill-out area and exterior shower. Downstairs floor: 1 double bedroom (20sqm) with double bed and attached bathroom with massage jets shower, and balcony (6sqm). 1 single bedroom (15m2) with two single beds 1 auxiliary room (10sqm) with 1 sofa bed
description: DESCRIPTION: This is a well situated modern duplex (150sqm) with spectacular views of the city of Barcelona from the beautiful terraces (125sqm). From the terraces you can view the sea and downtown to the east and Gaudi's Parc Guell to the North.  There's a private solarium in the upper terrace complete with deck chairs where you can enjoy cocktails, private sunbathing or star gazing while relaxing at night. APARTMENT DESCRIPTION Upstairs floor: 1 large bedroom suite (30 sqm) with a double bed and a single bed, private connected bathroom (10 sqm) with Jacuzzi and shower, and a small private terrace (8 sqm) with views of Barcelona. 1 small bedroom (single bed) with exit to a big terrace and solarium area. Panoramic solarium with deck chairs, chill-out area and exterior shower. Downstairs floor: 1 double bedroom (20sqm) with double bed and attached bathroom with massage jets shower, and balcony (6sqm). 1 single bedroom (15m2) with two single beds 1 auxiliary room (10sqm) with 1 sofa bed
neighborhood_overview: SITUATION This duplex is located in a quiet area of the trendy district of Gracia, next to Gaudi's Park Guell.  Well comunicated: Upper zone, relax and safe and with all services near. (super,gym,metro,bus,shops...).   Only 5m walking from Gaudi's "Parc Guell"
notes: NOT INCLUDED IN THE PRICE: BARCELONA'S MANDATORY TOURISTIC TAX 2'25€ PER NIGHT, PER PERSON ON YOUR ARRIVAL DAY (Maximum 7 nights. Over 16 years). Separated from the amount of the reserve. To be paid in cash on arrival. Registered nr. HUTB-008325
transit: 10m from city center (Plaza Cataluña, Las Ramblas), and 12m from harbor, by metro (L3) Thanks to its excellent location you are connected to all transportation used to get around the city (metro, and different bus lines). Plaza Cataluña (Barcelona's city center) is just 4 subway stops away. You can walk 15 minutes and you'll be in Gracia's most exciting zone, where you can find cinemas, nightlife, restaurants and local designers’ shops.
house_rules: PLEASE; DO NOT SMOKE INDOORS. NO LOUD NOISES AFTER 10PM All guests are asked to clean up after themselves and keep order in the apartment throughout their stay. If the apartment is found in disorder the cleaning service will notify me and the guest will be charged an additional cleaning fee. To avoid extra cleaning charges please be sure to leave the apartment clean and orderly as you found it. Cleaning supplies will be provided. You are NOT required to wash the sheets, towels, or make the beds, the cleaning service will do so.

host.host_about: I was born in the city of Barcelona but a few years ago, my husband and I went to live outside in the country. That's why we are able to offer our fantastic loft in the city as a home for travelers on Airbnb. I love to travel and discover new places andI understand the pleasure of staying at a comfortable, clean and safe place when you are away from home, so we try to make our place as cozy and comfortable as we like to find when we are abroad.

reviews.comments: Maria and Joesph were incredibly welcoming and we really appreciated their welcome platter!  Their apartment was simply amazing and we had everything we needed to enjoy our stay.  We were very impressed with the beds, bathrooms and various levels of balconies that overlooked Barcelona.  The flat was 4 stops on the metro from the centre and maybe 6 stops from Barceloneta and a short stroll to Park Güell.  We throughly enjoyed our stay and will be definitely returning to Barcelona and Maria/Joesph's flat.
Wonderful house!
This was a super stay . I thank very much Maria for all . WE discussed with our friends and will definitively recommend this place ( so nice ) to all our friends !

We had a very nice, pleasant and relaxing stay in Maria's apartment. 
It was very spacy - clean & comfortable. 
Maria was very helpfull and flexible in arrangements. 
Ideal place for family or group!
For vacation or work!

Wow! What a beautiful apartment! Well equipped, spotless and in a safe peaceful area.  It  also has a modern garage as well as an elevator for those who need it...Perfect for large families. It also has easy access to downtown, both on foot and by public transport.   Our hostess was charming and attentive and informative as well.  Worth every  penny.  
Thanks for everything, Maria!!

Nous avons eu un accueil très chaleureux des propriétaires  L'appartement est magnifique, bien décoré et en excellent  état. Il y a tout le confort nécessaire (air conditionné, lave linge, lave vaisselle, parking) et les 3 terrasses sont très appréciables. La dernière terrasse permet une vue sur Barcelone et la mer. Le quartier est calme ce qui est très appréciable. L'appartement est proche des commerçants et d'une station de métro située sur la ligne principale qui dessert les principaux sites touristiques. Nous recommandons cet appartement pour un séjour réussi sur Barcelone
We had a great time in Maria's Apartment. thanks so much

Great apartment, ideal for staying in Barcelona, metro is really close, one store is 30 meter from apartment and work until midnight. It is really close to center of Barcelona. We really enjoyed our stay there. Owners are really pleasant and polite and very flexible about check-in and check-out. Communication with them is great and they will help you if anything you need or want to see in Barcelona. We can't say nothing else except we are hoping that we will visit Barcelona once again at least and we are going for sure stay in Marias apartment.

The area of the apartment was very convenient in terms of proximity to the city centre and the major attractions in Barcelona. The flat itself is clean, spacious and very confortable. We would thoroughly recommend it.

El lugar perfecto para un estancia en Barcelona, para un grupo de mas de 5-6 personas ya sea familias, amigos etc, Economicamente sin punto de comparacion y con una calidad inmensa. Duplex de ensueño, muy limpio, bien equipado, limpieza exquisita. 
La localizacion es perfecta, a 10 min del parque Guell, a 5 min de la parada del Metro ( Linea 3 q llega a las Ramblas en poco tiempo) con un Establecimiento de comida mediterranea para llevar a 100 metros ( muy recomendable),  y a pesar de la buena situacion, muy tranquilo, para descansar por la snoches o para disfrutar de un buen desayuno en algunas de sus 3 terrazas.
La recepcion por parte de la dueña fue perfecta...Recomendable 100 %. Volveria otra vez.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The perfect place for a stay in Barcelona, for a group of 5-6 people over ..whether family, friends gruops etc,
Really economic place if you compare with a Hotel.
Very  clean, well equipped, .
The location is perfect, 10 min to  Guell Park, 5 minutes from the subway stop  (Line 3 that  reaches the Ramblas in short time) with a Mediterranean food take away  establishment 100 meters (highly recommended), and despite of good location, very quiet, to rest at night  or enjoy having a breakfast in some of its 3 terraces.
The reception from the owner was perfect ... Recommended 100%.
We had a lovely stay in Maria´s flat. It was a great place to stay with our large family. Lots of rooms and space outside - Thanks for everything :-)

Maria,s flat is perfect with excellent location if you do not like to be in a touristic area. When we travel, we prefer to feel local people and gain access to good local shops for food. There is a great tapa,s bar nearby and many stores offering fresh fish, meat, bakery, wine and anything else you might want. We where six people and enjoyed the comfort of this home away from home. The Metro is very close and you are 10 minutes from the centre of the touristic areas. If you would rather walk, this is also perfect - a 7minute walk and you are on Grand de Gracia for shopping. We recommend this apartment and our host Maria and her mother. The flat is Ideal for 2 couples with children, but big enough for 6 or7 adults. Barcelona is a great place to visit and we will most likely return next year. All in all, a great experience. Francois and Irina

The apartment is absolutely stunning and has everything you'd need for a very comfortable stay in Barcelona.  It's fully equipped, has loads of space including about 4 terraces/balconies with spectacular views of all of Barcelona down to the sea.  In addition, it is very well located in a beautiful area of Barcelona that is convenient to all of the major attractions.

Lastly, Maria was a wonderful host and made sure we had a comfortable stay.

If you're looking for a larger, beautiful, welcoming place to stay, this apartment is perfect and is also a great value for money.

Maria's apartment is truly spectacular penthouse quality!  We were thrilled! Two large master suites (one up and own down) with double beds and totally amazing in-suite bathrooms, plus two bedrooms with twin beds, along with several wonderful terraces for al fresco dining or sunbathing, weather permitting.  The kitchen is fully equipped and also includes a washer and dryer. Our family of three had plenty of room to spare. The wi-fi connection was very good. It's a perfect apt. for two couples! The location is in a quiet, safe neighborhood and near two metro stops. A full grocery, wonderful bakery, meat and seafood shops are all within close walking distance. We can recommend the Mangana restaurant (just a couple blocks away) for tapas! Maria will respond quickly to any questions you may have. Maria and Josep met us, and were helpful and delightful, giving us a tour of the neighborhood. The apt is near Gaudi's Park Guell. Other sights and the city center will require the metro or a taxi, but we found the metro very convenient and inexpensive and had no safety concerns.   If you buy the BCN (Barcleona) card all public transportation is included.  Otherwise, purchase a 10-ride metro ticket for a discount.  Don't miss the Barri Gotic (Gothic Quarter) at night - it's enchanting!  
We highly recommend Maria's apt!!
Splendid appartment! Very warm welcome and some little gifts. Qick acces to the centre by taxi or metro. we even walked one time. Next time we hope to use the terasses more often.

We really loved to be there. Location is awesome! The apartment is very big, with lot of light and fresh air. Bedrooms, kitchen, bathrooms are all very comfortable. Our favorite place was dining room. Where we loved to spend evenings:)
Nearby except Guell Park there are also Putxet Park, sport club and a lot of bakeries. 
And the place is very quiet and uncrowded.
So highly recommend! Better than a hotel!

This was a brilliant stay thanks in no smal part to Maria's fab apartment The location introduced us to a whole new side of Barcelona Gracia and the neighbourhood was very local and friendly. The many terraces were perfect fr soaking up the sun and was roomy enough for 6 of us to have enough individual space..There was a great selection of delis especially if one walked downhill to Fontana and the views of the hills from eh flat were stunning Everything worked well Maria was super responsive and assisted us promptly when any questions arose. Heartily recommend it for a stay in BCN! The wifi was strong and the big showerheads were strong and there's a jacuzzi bath too!
Big and super apartment! Joseph was so helpful by telling us where to go etc. its very near Parc Guell . Will definitely recommend!

A perfect haven away from the bustle of the city! Tucked up near the Parc Guel but only a very short metro ride from the very centre of Barcelona, Maria's flat offers such fantastic views from its top terrace that we occasionally found it difficult to actually go out... 
Maria was a great host, greeting us when we got in and more than happy to offer help and advice on how best to enjoy our time in the city. And the welcome pack in the fridge was the icing on the cake!

We are very happy with our stay in this apartment, very convenient arrangement, 5 min. to the subway, nearby are a mini-market, cafe and grocery little shops, a place silent, but is subcentral and 3-4 stops on the subway or by a taxi are convenient to reach 10-15 min. there, to park Guel went on foot. The apartment caused our admiration - spacious, perfectly furnished, there is all necessary for rest and cooking, the kitchen perfectly approaches to make a breakfast, a dinner or the dinner, a convenient drawing room with TV, a fireplace, a sofa and a table - there we had comfortably a rest after walks around the city, convenient bedrooms, 2 of them are on one floor, 2 - on B'day with convenient beds, us were 7 people and all comfortably took place. And about fine balconies and terraces in each room there is a wish to tell special a view of all Barcelona, opening from the top terrace simply bewitches, still there are chaise lounges, chairs and a little table milking about дыха, even a shower. Owners of the apartment very lovely and hospitable, with hospitality met and helped us to resolve to icq issues, for example, how to call a taxi, without knowing Spanish etc,
All our company is very happy and all told, in a trace of times only in this apartment, we recommend to all
Accueil chaleureux.Appartement spacieux et très confortable.Merci pour tout!
Excellent stay and excellent plays.
Amazing flat ! it was great to enjoy some drinks on the terrasse. Maria was very nice and very helpful. Will def recommend it and go back. 10mn walk from parc Guell!

Super appart et super Hôte. Maria a été très arrangeante et son appartement est vraiment superbe et pratique. Dans une rue calme il reste accessible très rapidement en transport et en taxi du centre ville. Toutes les facilités sont à proximité et seulement 15 mn à pied du Parc Güell.
Je recommande vivement d'y séjourner ! nous y avons passé un excellent moment !
Merci Maria

This apartment was much more than advertised and we can't say enough about how this place really make our stay that much better.  The place was immaculate and worked great for our family of 3.  Maria was very communicative with us prior to the visit and greeted us upon our arrival.  Maria have given a lot of thought to the furnishings -- which made our stay even that much more fabulous.  The apartment is on a quiet street but very close to the L3 metro and a vibrant commercial area with lots of cafes, markets, etc. quickly accessible.  Highly recommend this apartment.

Our family of 6 spent one week in Maria's apartment.  She is the perfect host and was always very helpful if we needed anything.
The apartment is beautiful, clean and in a good location.  Everything you need, and then some, is there.  We had plenty of space.  Mostly we enjoyed the rooftop terrace.
One night Maria and her husband gave us a lesson in making Paella and Sangria, which were both delicious. While they were cooking, we learned a lot about Spain and Barcelona. I recommend to taking advantage of this lesson. It was a perfect place and a perfect host. We had  great time.  Wish we could have stayed much longer and hope to go back one day.

What a lovely apartment in a great location. Loved all the terraces. We can't wait to go back and stay again. Maria helped so much with the planning of the trip. I would recommend this apartment to anybody wanting a quiet location. Really close to 2 Metro stations, shops, and restaurants.

This house is such a gem!  The house comfortably accommodated four adults and one child (22 months)-  Maria even provided a cot/crib for our little one. There are five terraces in total, including one with a dining table and canopy off the living area and the rooftop terrace with 360 degree views of the city.  We used them daily and found it enhanced our Barcelona experience.  We found the local metro stop to be on a convenient line (L3); it got us to most downtown locations without the need to transfer.  Maria was helpful and responsive with any questions we had during our stay, and even during preparing for the trip.  We would highly recommend a stay here!

We had a wonderful stay at Maria's flat.  They were very helpful with getting my large car into their garage and made us feel very welcome.  The flat is very large and in a great neighbourhood.  I would absolutely recommend to anyone to stay at Maria's.  Thank you for making it a great time in Barcelona.

Great apartment in Gracia, a wonderful neighbourhood with plenty going on. Maria was really helpful, sorting out any concerns quickly and without fuss. The apartment is beautiful, and the roof terraces are really useful, we ended up eating there almost every night. We stayed as a group of 10 adults, and while being a little bit cosy at times we all fit in fine, which is certainly an achievement. In short, I'd definitely recommend staying here.

A five star accommodation!  Beautiful, well-kept, high end styled home.  Maria could not have been more accommodating.  She met us herself and took us on a tour and showed us how everything worked.  She had a bottle of cava, some snacks and even milk and orange juice in the fridge for us.  How very thoughtful.  She made sure we could get in touch with her if we needed to.  There were many booklets available for our information on things to do and see in Barcelona.  There were lots of towels and blankets and sheets at our disposal.  The apartment is fully equipped to very high standards including wi-fi and has three beautiful terraces plus a big area with clotheslines.  We were 2 couples and 2 single people sharing the apartment and we had plenty of room, even could have had a couple more people with us.  The air conditioning was a great asset for sleeping after a busy day of touring in late August and the elevator went right to our door.  The metro was walking distance away and there were many shops of all kinds in the area. We have only positive comments to make on our stay in Maria’s apartment.  If we ever go back to Barcelona we will not consider staying anywhere else.  If you can rent this lovely apartment you will be very happy there.    

José & Louise Sanchez and family 
Montreal, Quebec, Canada
August 2013

Nous étions deux couples et nous avons passés une très bonne semaine dans cet appartement qui correspond très bien au photos qui sont présentées sur l'annonce. L'appartement est très grand et bien équipé. Il se situe entre deux stations de métros, et pas loin du centre de Barcelone. Nous avons trouvé l'adresse pour notre séjour à Barcelone. Maria est chaleureuse, accueillante et nous mets à disposition un classeur avec les endroits à visiter, où sortir et manger. Merci pour ce séjour très agréable.

Het is een heel mooi, compleet appartement, op een perfecte locatie!!Het was precies zoals op de foto, de inrichting is prima, appartement van alle gemakken voorzien en we hebben erg genoten van zowel het dakterras als de balkons...Maria is erg aardig en heeft ons zelfs wat langer de tijd gegeven om uit te checken, omdat wij pas s'avonds terugvlogen.Als ik weer naar barcelona ga, zou ik zeker nog een keer in het appartement willen verblijven, het was Top!

L'appartamento di Maria è davvero molto bello! Pulitissimo, accogliente, a pochi passi dalla metropolitana. La cucina è fornita di tutto. I bagni super attrezzati. Le terrazze sono una più bella dell'altra. Non abbiamo conosciuto personalmente Maria ma comunicare con lei è stato facile, è stata molto disponibile, ha risposto velocemente alle nostre domande. Check-in puntuale. Un soggiorno perfetto! Vivamente raccomandato

Great appartment! Very big and comfortable and the multiple terrasses are wonderful! Not very far from the center, close to supermarkets and restaurants and to Parc Guel!!
Maria is very available and friendly, as well as her mom who welcomed us in the appartment!

Octobre 2013 - Très bel appartement, très agréable ...
Nous y avons séjourné pendant 3 semaines avec nos 2 enfants et sommes contents de notre séjour.
Le seul bémol est qu il est un peu compliqué d accès avec des grandes poussettes (marche à monter ; ascenseur et palier étroit). Le parking est quant à lui pratique : nous avons un van, ce fut un peu compliqué, mais on s en est sortis ... 
Par contre, si vous n avez pas ce type de contraintes, l'appartement est super. 
Quant à Maria, elle est très sympa, disponible et arrangeante. Donc, le bilan est positif, et l appartement conforme à la description/photos.
Merci Maria !!!

The apartment is as lovely as one can judge by photo and is twice bigger than I thought it would be. There is a huge terrace perfect place for breakfast and dinner for the whole company (we were 6). Beds are very comfortable. Kitchen is fully equipped with everything you can think of.

Location is on a quiet street, 5 minutes afoot from Parc Guell and 5 minutes from metro station.

And there is a parking on the ground floor. We had Fiat Scudo van, and it was able to fit the parking (with a little bit of precise work), but for the city the better option is scooter or metro.

We are happy with the trip, thanks a lot, Maria!

Maria was a fantastic host! She was very fast in replying to all communications and was very helpful during our stay.  She was kind enough to call taxis for our group since our language skills weren't the best. The apartment was spectacular and located on a lovely quiet neighborhood near the Parc Guell. I highly recommend this place for larger groups and people wanting to stay in areas outside the normal tourist areas.

Wow, wow, wow!! This is the place to stay in Barcelona. You'll be 5 minutes from the metro, near shops and restaurants, and a 15 minute walk from the Park Güell. Then there is the apartment itself. You truly feel that Maria has opened her home to you. It is luxurious and occupies the top floor of the building (don't worry, there is a lift) with wonderful views from terraces and the roof. The accommodations are SO comfortable from the beds to the baths. Maria could not be more kind and had some goodies waiting for us in the fridge. I hope to return someday soon, and this is where I'll want to stay!

Nous avons passé un week-end prolongé de 3 jours dans l'appartement de Maria. Malheureusement pour nous ils correspondaient à 3 journées de pluie torrentielle... Nous avons donc d'autant plus profité de cet appartement vaste et superbement bien équipé. Nous étions un groupe de 7 amis, venus fêter les 30 ans de mon mari. Nous étions 2 couples et 3 personnes seules, ce qui a mon sens est le maximum pour que le confort reste parfait. L'appartement comporte en effet 2 belles suites parentales (chambre + salle de bain), mais le fait qu'il faille traverser ces chambres pour que chacun puisse accéder aux salles de bain est a prendre en compte. Les terrasses sont exceptionnelles, et doivent être un réel bonheur lorsque le temps s'y prête ! La localisation de l'appartement est très agréable, dans un joli quartier résidentiel qui vaut le détour, à proximité du métro direct pour plaça catalunya, avec un accès facile à pieds au parc Guell et pour les plus courageux au centre ville (même sous la pluie !). Nous y retournerons sans hésiter lors de notre prochain passage a Barcelone. Merci Maria !
3 günlük konaklamadan Çok memnun Kaldım.Herkese tavsiye ediyorum.
Nos encantó el piso tanto en decoración como limpieza, ubicación, etc. Además, la propietaria nos ha tratado de maravilla así que todos son palabras de agradecimiento! ;)

Perfect apartment, perfect host, very helpful. The place was clean and completely suitable for 9 people. Maria was lovely either via email or "in real". A place to recommend for a weekend or longer. Definitely.

Swietne mieszkanie. Spędziliśmy w nim święta całą rodziną. Razem spało tam 8 osób. Taras na dachu jest niesamowity. Poza tym pralka i suszarka pomogły znacząco. Jest DVD więc można wziąć dla dzieci jakieś filmy. Nieopodal jest też Puxtet Sport - czyli basen i siłownia gdzie dostałem karnet na 5 wstępów za 25 Euro. Polecam

(english below)
Excellent sur tous les points : l'appartement est magnifique, plus grand encore qu'on pensait, les terrasses sont superbes (vue sur la mer, sur toute la ville et même sur le parc Guell !), nous étions 6 (2 couples et 2 personnes seules) et avions quand même chacun notre intimité, le niveau de confort est excellent de la literie au salon, la localisation est excellente (15 minutes max du centre en métro et 30 minutes pour ceux qui aiment marcher), présence de tous les commerces (fruiterie, boucherie, etc.) et petits restaurants de quartier à quelques minutes aussi. Les tous petits bémols seraient que les accessoires de cuisine ne sont pas de la même qualité que le reste, que le lecteur de DVD est un peu vieux et que malheureusement pour nous il y a avait des travaux dans l'immeuble (mais pas trop tôt). Mais tout ceci est vraiment secondaire par rapport à la qualité globale du séjour. Je recommande cet appartement chaleureusement à tous les niveaux, c'est un excellent rapport qualité / prix et Maria était super gentille !
------
Great at every level : the apartment is wonderful, spacious and very pretty, the terrasses (yes! plural!) have the most amazing view and are great to chill out, the six of us (2 couples and 2 people alone) had enough privacy because of the lay out of the place and the number of bathrooms, the beds and the living room were extremely comfortable, the location is great (15 minutes from downtown with the metro and 30 minutes if you like walking) and you can find great shops and restaurants 2 minutes away. The only tiny littles things were that the kitchen was not the same quality as the rest, the DVD player is getting old and unfortunately there was some construction going on in the building at the time we were there. But all of this is seriously secondary, everything else makes up for it and I would recommend this place anytime, we had a WONDERFUL experience overall, it's very reasonably priced and Maria was super nice!!
Really nice attic where you can see all the city, three beautiful terraces for an unforgettable holiday or work journey. Highly Recommended

Very spacious and very nice apartment! We are a big family, 5 adults and 2 kids, and everyone enjoyed the two nights' stay in this nice apartment. The location is very convenient with 5 minutes' walk to metro station. Maria's husband is so nice, though we arrived in mid night, he waited for us in the apartment, helped us to park our van, and provided a lot of good advice!

Maria's place was absolutely fantastic!! Beautiful apartment with terraces on every level and the roof. Very comfortable to hang out in. Gorgeous rooms, bathrooms, everything. I would go back to Barcelona just to stay in this flat! :) Maria was not there but her mom met us and she was very kind and helpful in showing us around.  The flat is also in a fantastic location.
Our family of three had a wonderful stay in Maria's home. It truly is a spectacular place.  We would return again in a heartbeat.  Maria was a gracious host and available to answer all our questions.
Super place to stay when we been to Barcelona, big and luxury house.

This appartment is very comfortable! Located in a quiet street within just a few minutes walk to the metro as well as Park Guell. Great views, several spacious rooms, nice terraces and more makes this a great place to stay, both for families or a group of friends. Highly recommended!!

bonne situation, bel appartement.
une adresse à conserver

This was an amazing four days.  We began our Barcelona adventure in this apartment and finished with a conference at a hotel.  The entire time we were at the hotel we wished we had just stayed at the apartment.  It is in a great neighborhood, very close to a subway line that takes you right into the heart of things, and you can't beat the incredible view from the rooftop terrace.  I highly recommend staying here.

Très bel appartement en duplex avec 4 terrasses en tout dont un toit terrasse avec belle vue mer très agréable par beau temps !
Très belles prestations les photos décrivent très bien l'appartement.  
Situé à 5 min de la sagrada familia. Il y a également un garage très pratique pour ceux qui viennent en voiture. 

Je recommande vraiment cet appartement à un groupe d'amis comme nous ou à plusieurs couples (2 suites parentales et deux petites chambres)

This felt like a perfect match for five guys on a football and big city weekend. First we experienced a very nice welcoming by Maria's husband and mother-in-law. Second, the pictures do not lie. Good facilities both inside and outside. Not all beds were super comfortable, but for three days it was good enough. Sadly, we had just two hours of sun, but those were wisely spent on Maria's roof terrace. Wonderful spot!

Nous avons passé un superbe séjour à Barcelone . Nous étions 6 amis et pour la 1ère fois j'avais choisi de louer un appartement au travers d'airbnb. Très belle expérience! J'avais opté pour l'appartement de Maria car il correspondait à nos exigences : un parking, plusieurs chambres à pouvoir utiliser en single ou à 2 et plusieurs salles de bain. L'appartement est splendide, il correspond tout à fait à la description publiée sur le site. Il reflette la personnalité de Maria : accueillant, fonctionnel, très ordonné et très propre. Tout est parfait. On se sent chez soi ou plutôt on a l'impression d'être chez de très bons amis qui mettent à disposition  tout ce qu'ils ont pour vous rendre un séjour agréable. Quant à Maria et à son époux, ils sont vraiment charmants, très disponibles et attentionnés. Ils sont de très bon conseil pour itinéraires, restaurants et tout autre bon plan. Nous avons vraiment beaucoup apprécié leurs conseils. Dernière chose à préciser : l'appartement est dans un quartier calme, avec de superbes terrasses, très proche du métro comme le précise le site et à 2 pas du parc Guell. Puis si l'on préfère se déplacer en taxi (très abordable à Barcelone) en 5, 10  minutes on se retrouve sur la Rambla! Nous habitons dans le sud de la France et il nous arrive d'aller à Barcelonce pour quelques jours. Je reviendrai chez Maria et je conseillerai son appartement à mes amis. Excellent à tout point de vue. N'hésitez pas à contacter Maria, vous ne serez pas déçus.

We had a great weekend in Barcellona and Marias house was fantastic. The pictures doesn't lie. What you see is what you get and if I have friends going to Barcellona I will highly recommend this apartment, at least if they are in as many people as we were. Big, cosy, beautiful, not far from anything and with the subway close by.
The apartment is amazing ! The area is very good and quite . Definitely will be back again :) Maria was very kind and helpful . Thank you

The owner is extremely friendly and kind.
Great location in a quiet, peaceful area.
Easy access to the town centre, which is only 15 minutes away.
The apartment is fantastic, very tidy and spacious. I would highly recommend it!!!

It's a beautiful apartment. Very comfortable. Lots of space. We stayed her  with a family of 6 adults. It is situated in a quiet neighborhood. Nearby you will find a a main street om which you find all the stores you need.
In 15 minutes you travel to the centre of Barcelona by metro.
For sunlovers on the roof  a terrace is situated with al beautiful overview over the city. At night  here you can enjoy the lights of the city or the stars.

Don't miss the opportunity of staying in this apartment. You won't regret.

Mans Harms and family,
The Netherlands

An excellent place for our group of seven. Close to markets, great quiet neighborhood near Park Guell. Maria has all the bases covered! No regrets with this beautiful top floor flat. Thanks Maria we already miss the place especially the roof top patio.

We really enjoyed our stay in Barcelona also thanks to Maria's apartment. The photos and descriptions are accurate.
Lots of space, good location near the metro, fast internet connection (for the kids the most important thing...). There is everything you need to feel like at home.

As others I can fully recommend this location.
Piso estupendo, totalmente coherente con la descripcion y fotos, situacion ideal

Hallo airbnb Team,
it was very great, to stay in maria'a wunderfull apartment.
Near the city, perfect for a city tour.
Thank's a lot to maria.

maria and hans
germany==cologne

Maria est sympathique elle nous attendait à l'heure.
L'appartement est superbe et correspond tout à fait aux photos, c'est très propre, et la literie neuve. Le métro est tout proche.
Il y a bien une machine à café, c'est une nespresso, il faut penser aux capsules.
Excellent séjour
We could not have asked for a better apartment to stay in during our weekend in Barcelona! Truly lovely, and the area was very nice with little food markets and cafes. Thank you Maria!

L'appartement de Maria est magnifique, la description et les photos correspondent parfaitement à la réalité. Situé dans un quartier très calme, il est à quelques minutes en métro de la Rambla. La vue de la terrasse est magique, surtout de nuit.  Maria et sa mère ont été très disponibles malgré notre arrivée retardée suite à l'annulation d'un vol. Si vous voulez passer un séjour de rêve à Barcelone, n'hésitez pas.

Maria was so welcoming - she was there on arrival, she is super friendly and comes armed with a bunch of good tips.  The apartment was spotlessly clean, looks just like the photos and AMAZING.  We were a group of 10 girls, and we had plenty of room, the bathrooms were modern and pretty luxurious - but the best thing for us was definitely the roof terrace. There are 3 - and the top one is wonderful!  Brilliant views, loads of space - perfect for the pre-dinner cava or breakfast in the sun.  Maria was also really accommodating with our check-out, and was really quick to answer any queries I had in the run-up. Cannot recommend enough!
Very good apartment  and convenient location. It is even better dan the pictures.

Exactly as described and as in the photos, we were welcomed and signed in very efficiently. Beautiful setting, clean and homely feel. Plenty big enough for and great value accommodation for our big family group. Great location in quiet area with short walk to metro and useful corner shop that stays open til very late which was handy considering the time we arrived! Everything you need has been thought about and lovely welcome. Outside spaces make this apartment an amazing place to spend the mornings and evenings when we had a hard day sightseeing! Roof terrace has lovely views across the city and up to the hills best of all at night!

Nous avons passé 15 jours très agréables dans ce duplex. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié les propriétaires, Maria et son mari, très serviables, accommodants et disponibles. 
L'appartement est très spacieux, et ces trois terrasses bénéficient d'une vue incroyable sur Barcelone, notamment celle du toit, que nous avons la plus appréciée car bien isolée du voisinage. Le quartier est à la fois calme et commerçant ce qui est très agréable, bien desservit par les transports en commun (10min à pieds max). Les voisins que nous avons rencontrés ont tous été accueillants.
La littéraire est de bonne qualité, et les deux grandes salles de bains tout confort. La cuisine est très bien équipée. 
Nous n'hésiterions pas à renouveler cette expérience et remercions à nouveau sincèrement Maria et son mari.

Our host was out of town so her mother greeted us and was kind and welcoming (we spoke a little Spanish so that was helpful)!

We enjoyed the views from the apartment and the location was very central to the Metro which is a great way to get around the city.

The apartment was nicely furnished and it looked just like the photos.

Warm regards from San Diego!

We had a lovely stay. Maria was very helpful and the apartment was well appointed, clean and stylish. The apartment is exactly as it's described on the website and it is very near to the metro. We would be very happy to stay here again.

När vi anlände var det Marias man som tog emot oss. Han visade oss runt i lägenheten och berättade om praktiska och tekniska funktioner samt ordnade med formalia. Lägenheten var välstädad och motsvarade beskrivningen fullt ut. 
Vi var två familjer som bodde på var sin våning vilket fungerade utmärkt. Eftersom lägenheten ligger en bit från centrum så var omgivningen lugn vilket passade perfekt för oss barnfamiljer. Kommunikationerna med tunnelbanan var ett enkelt och smidigt sätt att förflytta sig till och från lägenheten.
Følte mig allerede velkommen, før vi kom

We had a wonderful stay in Barcelona and were very happy with the apartment - we were two families with older children. The apartment was spacious, clean and conveniently located next to a tube and bus stop in a nice quarter of Barcelona. Maria was a very kind, welcoming and accommodating host which made us feel at home. We can definitely recommend it and would go back!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis. Le logement correspondait tout à fait à notre attente et aux descriptions faites sur le site. Il était propre, très bien équipé, proche du Parc Guell et à 5 minutes de 2 stations de métro. Une météo exceptionnelle nous a permis de prendre notre petit déjeuner sur une terrasse bien exposée. Nous avons passé 4 jours merveilleux à visiter Barcelone. un très beau souvenir!
Très bon accueil, appart magnifique et renversant, quartier très calme qui aime à le rester.

Een fantastische duplex, zeer netjes, goed gelegen en zeer luxueus. Het contact met de eigenares verliep zeer vlot. Zeer vriendelijk en altijd heel snel antwoord op eventuele vragen. Echt een dikke aanrader!!!

Overall a wonderful experience. Maria answered my email queries promptly and her husband met us at the apartment and showed us around and gave us keys.  I felt comfortable if we had any queries or issues they would be taken care of promptly, but we didn't have any issues! The apartment was as lovely as it appears in the pictures, we had everything we needed for our ladies getaway. The apartment was close to the Metro and there were shops cafes within walking distance. Everything was spotless and we really enjoyed sitting outside on the terrace, even in November it was warm enough some days to eat outside. Overall a great experience, we loved Barcelona, and want to go back! Thank you Maria for being a wonderful host!

We had a wonderful stay in this apartment-- Maria's husband and his mother were very helpful and kind upon arrival and the accommodations were great.  The location is a 5 minute walk to Park Güell and very close to two Metro stations, which made it easy to access the city.  Would recommend!

Whole week in Barcelona  was amazing and beautiful experience even when the weather was so so.. 
The apartment was perfect for all my family. The hosts was very kind and available for all request. The house is filled with all the means and luxurious. Thank you for a great week .

The appartment was totally similar to the ad. We had an excellent stay and his situation was offering a great view and super service. If you add his position closed to the Metro entrance and the parking, it is a good value for money for groups.
Maria had been kind to wonder how everything was going during the stay.
I would really recommend her apartment for other groups of friends who want to stay in a quiet area but want to get nice level of confort in their apartment (dishwasher, 2 bathrooms, solarium, nice terrace next to the living, parking, lift, 1 fridge and 1 freezer...).

Beautiful apartment in a quiet neighborhood, really peaceful yet easy to access everything. We are used to walking and we never used public transport during our visit, but the Metro stop is really close and there are plenty of shops close by to pick up whatever you need. The parking space provided in the secured garage made the value of the apartment even greater. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again!

This was my first experience of using Airbnb and everything went smoothly. The apartment really was fantastic and exactly as described. The owner Maria was always available for any queries that I had leading up to the trip and a representative of hers was waiting at the apartment for us on arrival. The apartment is located in a quiet residential area of Barcelona very close to Park Guell and very close to two metro stations on the main green line. Overall great apartment, great location, trustworthy and reliable only. Many thanks to Maria.

The apartment was very nicely furnished in a pleasant and interesting area of town. Maria was an extremely helpful and nice host, and provided us with very useful for finding out information about the apartment and the city. The kitchen is very well equipped, and with the fresh food market at the corner of the road we had a great time cooking dinners. What an amazing solarium giving us an advanced taste of spring. I would definitely recommend this place as a way to experience Barcelona. The wonderful bonus is that the apartment is directly opposite a the Park Gaull. The tube station is only 5 minutes away.
Great apartment. A true gem on airbnb and great value. Don't think twice about booking this for your trip to barcelona!!

We had a fantastic time in Marias amazing apartments the views are absolutely stunning  and. the place is all you would expect and and more   The location is very central only five minutes from the Lesseps  station I'm 10 minutes from downtown Barcelona.
This is a great place, a spacious apartment centrally located and equiped as advertized. A very convenience place to stay whilst in Barcelona!

We had a short stay in Barcelona with just 2 nights. Fortunately Maria and her mother were flexible enough so our time was maximized. The apartment was uptown as indicated but there were alternatives means of transport and a lot of things within walking distance. We had a great view from the place especially from the solarium floor. Very clean and well maintained conveniences were at hand from what we saw. Thank you, Maria!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour . L'appartement est très agréable, il correspond au descriptif . Il est bien placé. Nous avons pu faire facilement plein de visites grâce à la ligne de métro 3. Nous avons apprécié la confiance des propriétaires. Merci.

Maria's apartment was spectacular as described!! We had an awesome time and the communication was great and uncomplicated even though Maria was not in town.
I can recommend Maria's apartment to everyone!
Thanks a lot!

Superbe appartement qui correspond à l'annonce et aux photos , accueil chaleureux et merci pour les petites attentions que nous avons trouvé à notre arrivée . Nous avons passé un superbe week-end à visiter Barcelone. 
Corinne

Magnifique appartement qui correspond parfaitement aux photos et au descriptif. Nous avons été très très bien accueillis par Maria et le quartier est très calme, le métro le plus proche est a 5 minutes de marche, ce qui est pratique pour se rendre en plein centre ville rapidement (environ 10-15 min). Maria a pensé a tout pour rendre le séjour agréable et une bouteille de mousseux vous attend même dans le frigo pour vous souhaiter la bienvenue. Si nous revenons à Barcelone nous reviendrons a coup sûr chez Maria!

Everything is as pictured! This apartment is sooooo spacious, when shown around the apartment we just kept finding more space and more rooms. The bathrooms were winners, fancy showers and roomy, a rarity in Europe! Everything was clean and well equipped, fast internet is always a welcome addition. The location is ard 12 mins taxi ride from Passeig del Garcia and 20 mins hike to Parc Guell with plenty of patisseries, small cafes, banks, convenience store and taxi stands in between. Maria and her mother were more than accommodating, this place is definitely a gem!
The flat was clean, really big, in a quiet street and the view from the top was beautiful!!! In one word : perfect!

Very good place to stay and very comfortable. The house is very pretty and is the same as you see in fotos. Close to metro station, though slightly far away from the beach. But given the comfort, i would still prefer to stay there.
Hemos estado muy cómodos. La dueña un encanto de señora. El barrio muy tranquilo

Absolutely amazing space.  We had 8 people and never felt crowded.  Our 4 teenagers loved the house and we loved all the outdoor terraces.  Incredible views from the rooftop terrace.  Great neighborhood and so close to everything we needed.  I wish we could have stayed longer!  Thank you so much Maria!

I enjoyed my stay at Maria's place so much, so did my friends. I would definitely go back for my next visit. And Maria kept in contact with me all the time in case I need anything. Best stay of my Europe trip.

It took us a long time to find an affordable place for 6 people in Barcelona, but fortunately we found this house. Very nice bedrooms, good kitchen, great showers and a nice balcony. It even has a roof terrace with views over the city! It's only a couple of minutes to metro station Vallcarca, from which you're in the city center in no time. Very nice.

This is a great apartment.  Everything was exactly as described and we had no problems. 11 of us stayed for a weekend, but it didn't feel over-crowded. The roof terraces are amazing. I would definitely book this place if I go to Barcelona with a large group again. Maria was prompt and polite her replies, flexible when we needed to add guests, and there was lots of information at the flat. Thank you!

Bonjour
Nous avons adorés notre séjour dans le logement de Maria. Le logement est tres propre et a toutes les commodités. L'emplacement est idéal pour découvrir Barcelone. Nous étions 2 couples et l'espace ne manque pas. Nous vous recommandons l'endroit.

Met by Maria' s Mum, who showed us around & made us feel at home. Had a translation application on her iPad, which helped us  with communication. Enjoyed all the goodies left us. The apartment was very spacious & comfortable...& had a lift which was fantastic for our luggage as apartment is on top floor. Near metro & shops, totally recommend.

Nous étions deux couples, avec 3 enfants. L'appartement est comme sur les photos, très sympa et très pratique ! Avec ces belles terrasses, les chambres spacieuses. L'emplacement est super, à proximité de tous les commerces ! Du parc Guell, et à 5 stations de la plage avec un changement mais largement faisable ! 
Rien à dire sur l'accueil!

This is the perfect place for a trip away with friends. There were six of us and the apartment felt huge and luxurious. Maria made us feel very welcome both in our correspondence before the trip and at check in, and was kind enough not to charge extra for a very late check in (our plane was delayed). The balcony and top terrace were favourites and made it easy to relax. The neighbourhood is quiet and well-connected, with food shops close by. Would definitely recommend!

We were met at the door and greeted most warmly by Maria's husband who guided us around the apartment. He also gave us lots of information about events, restaurants and places of interest. The apartment was fabulous and exactly as pictured. It was very spacious and spotlessly clean with four terraces giving wonderful views of Barcelona. Maria left a welcome pack in the fridge which was greatly appreciated. The apartment was ideally situated, Metro stations nearby and the centre a pleasant walk away. The bathrooms were fabulous.Whenever we visit Barcelona again Maria's apartment will be where we choose to stay. We met Maria and both she and her husband are delightful.

Although she didn't meet us herself, Maria sent someone to greet us and help us through the process of settling in Barcelona for the week that we were there.  She was accommodating when we wanted to have grandma and grandpa over for dinner, and the 2-floor apartment was spectacular and close enough to town that it was easy to get to all of Barcelona's attractions.  There were some nice little welcome gifts that she left for, too!

A lovely, inviting apartment with amazing space, luxurious bathrooms and comfortable accommodation. A little out of the centre but perfect for a small group to relax. Quiet location.  Maria's mother was just fantastic and very helpful. Maria answered all queries very quickly.

We had a fantastic stay! The apartment was beautiful and spacious. The roof terrace was an amazing space and we enjoyed sitting out on the balcony. Facilities were all great too. I have personally never stayed anywhere like this when I've visited Barcelona and would definitely stay again!

Wonderful apartment, well furnished and equipped.  Lovely and clean.  What you see on the pictures is what you get.  There were four of us in the apartment and there was so much room with two bathrooms and lots of bedrooms.  We were given a welcome pack of milk, water, a bottle of cava and a box of delicious chocolates.

We booked this in March this year and every time I messaged Maria I received a quick response to my questions.  

Our outward flight was delayed but when I messaged Maria she responded immediately to say that her mother would wait for us and there was no problem. 

Maria had advised that she would be away during our visit but her mother would be at the apartment.  Upon arrival at the apartment we were met by Maria's mother who was extremely welcoming and a lovely lady.  She explained where everything was in the apartment and pointed out the shop on the corner and restaurants. There is a comprehensive amount of information in the apartment about Barcelona. The apartment is very well placed, the metro station within walking distance, direct line into Catalunya.  Parc Guell very close by.  Beautiful views from the solarium and lovely terraces where we ate outside almost every day for breakfast and drinks before going out for dinner.

As our flight home was not until late in the evening and check out is at 11 am, Maria's mother took our luggage to the garage and kept it safely in her car which enabled us to have the whole day in Barcelona without our cases. When we returned to pick up the cases Maria's mother insisted on taking us to the airport in her car. We had of course planned on getting a taxi.  Upon arrival at the airport she did not even want any money but we insisted.  How kind was that!   

We would all thoroughly recommend Maria's apartment. Excellent accommodation and friendly host.
Maria is a very nice host , her apartment is very beautiful, comfortable, the location is good.

Maria simply sets the gold standard for how an AirBnB experience should be. Her home is simply amazing and her helpfulness and communication throughout the process was stellar. I really cannot think of a way that this experience could have been better. I've never had such a stress-free experience in terms of staying somewhere and I honestly don't expect to in the future because it was THAT good. If you're looking to come to Barcelona, don't stay anywhere else.

We loved this apartment. It suited our group of 8 perfectly. Lots of space. Everything immaculate. Exactly like the photos here on Airbnb. We had absolutely everything we needed. Very good value for money. Check in easy. All good. Thank you Maria!

The communication with the host before we arrived was excellent and we were welcomed at the property on arrival. The apartment was very well appointed and very spacious over two floors with three outdoor balcony/ patio areas plus a roof terrace!. The neighbourhood was peaceful with a local shop open until 23:00 every day and there are plenty of excellent tapas places close by. The flat is also only a short walk from the Metro.
Overall our stay was very good, relaxing and convenient and I'd recommend the property for friends and families.

Maria was an excellent host, and was in regular contact before me and my friends visit to Barcelona. The flat itself is great - clean, comfortable and easily held 6 of us. The balconies and the rooftop area were amazing to get a bit of the Barcelona sunshine, especially to chill out and have some breakfast in the morning. Nice and quiet location, a 5 minute walk from the metro which takes you quickly into the centre. Don't hesitate to book here!

Great location, central and close to major metro stops but away from the tourist traffic. A walk away from Park Güell. It's a beautiful 2-story penthouse (ático) apartment, with lots of sunlight and patios all having great views of the city. While there are lots of beds, there are truly 4 bedrooms, with 2 that are suitable for couples, and 2 that are for singles or children.

Superbe appartement, avec tout le confort nécessaire pour passer un excellent séjour à Barcelone. Excellent accueil par la maman de Maria. Le parking est un plus notable à Barcelone où on fait tout en transports en commun. Je recommande vivement cet endroit et espère y séjourner à nouveau prochainement !! Merci Maria !!!

We had a lovely stay at Maria's house in Barcelona. We got a taxi from the airport but the tube is really close. There was milk , orange juice and coffee and even a lovely bottle of cava and chocolates thank you x
The apartment was clean and roomy with towels etc provided. There is a washing machine and detergent if needed. 
The sun was warm enough to enjoy the roof terrace on our first day which was lovely coming from England in February

Un séjour parfait dans l'appartement de Maria. Nous avons été accueillis par sa maman, ponctuelle, arrangeante et très claire (à condition de parler  espagnol... Ce qui était notre cas).
À une vingtaine de minute de l'aéroport en taxi, le trajet se fait sans  problème. La rue de  l'appartement, dans les hauteurs de Barcelone, fait penser à un san francisco méditerranéen, les taxis ne connaissent pas  forcément l'endroit mais ils ont toujours fini par trouver!
L'appartement en lui même présente une distribution idéale pour les aperos au soleil ou les dîners sous les étoiles avec le superbe toit  terrasse. Le vis à vis est quasi inexistant et on se sent rapidement chez soi.
Nous étions 4 couples de trentenaires et le nombre de chambres étaient  idéales, avec de l'intimité pour chacun sauf dans la chambre de l'étage qui comporte 2 lits double, le temps d'un week-end end cela ne pose aucun probleme, et cette chambre est parfaite pour un couple avec 2 enfants.
Les salles de bain sont spacieuses et de belle  factures. La cuisine est fonctionnelle et l'arrière est équipée d'un grand frigo et d'un grand  congélateur. À 20 mètres en bas de la rue, vous trouverez une petite épicerie pratique pour des courses d'appoint et à environ 5/10 min à pieds un petit supermarché Dia. Le centre ville est à 30 min à pieds tout droit vers la mer! Le Parc Guell est juste à côté en montant une bonne côte à pieds, aidé par les escalators. 
Très satisfait egalement à notre depart, la maman de Maria nous a fixé une heure et elle était ponctuelle.
Nous retenterons l'expérience lors de notre prochain séjour à  Barcelone.

L'appartement est bien situé  : rue calme, commerces alimentaires et station de métro à proximité. Les terrasses sont très plaisantes, le parking pratique et le confort général très bon. C'est une bonne solution pour un hébergement à Barcelone

bonjour,
L'appartement est superbe, la literie parfaite et les terrasses superbes, bref un véritable havre de paix et d'excellente qualité.
Le centre est à 10 min de métro et  l'appart se trouve à &à min à pied du parc de Guell
Bref l' endroit idéal pour séjourner à Barcelone le plus une place de parking ... génial !!! et l'accueil irréprochable comme la propreté !!!
bon séjour

Agradecer a Maria y a Angela el excelente trato recibido que ha hecho que nuestra estancia haya sido muy agradable.  la casa está muy bien acondicionada y no le falta ningún detalle para que no eches en falta nada.  Una lástima que las nubes no nos dejarán disfrutar de el magnífico cielo nocturno desde el solárium....

Vi havde en god kommunikation med Maria, og hun svarede hurtig når vi havde spørgsmål.
Lejligheden levede helt op til forventning og standard, og lå i et stille område. 
Vil helt sikkert anbefale andre at bo hos Maria.

This apartment was a wonderful space with great lighting, excellent amenities, terrific location (easy walk to two metro stops), and in a nice neighborhood.  Maria was extremely responsive both before our trip, and during our trip when we had a few issues come up.  We'd stay here again if we have the chance to come back to Barcelona!

Bonjour, Merci pour l'accueil.
L'appartement est vraiment spacieux et propre avec des espaces de vies communes et la possibilité de garder son intimité pour les couples.
On apprécie les divers terrasses et le solarium.
Très très bien pour des groupes d'amies.

Cordialement

Hoa

We were greeted by Angela, Maria's mother-in-law and she was very helpful and patient with my poor Spanish.  As we were a little early, we left our bags and returned later.  Although we didn't think that we would see Angela again she had to return on two occasions to sort out a couple of issues with the apartment, this was done very promptly and via email with Maria, and Angela resolved the problem.  She even brought me a bunch of flowers on my birthday which was very thoughtful of her.  The apartment is comfortable but it would be a squeeze for 11 people, there were 8 of us and it worked well but people were prepared to share the 3 bedrooms (1 single room = 4 bedrooms in total).  It is a very quiet neighbourhood but well situated for Barcelona, we walked to the Ramblas and took the bus and metro on other days.
Apartamento grande y limpio. Barrio tranquilo cerca de parada de metro caminando entre 5 y 10 minutos.
It was nice house for family! And very near from Guel park.

The apartment was amazing. We were so fortunate to have been able to live in the neighborhood and enjoy everything that it offered. It was close to all of the attractions, but situated in a very quiet area so that we could experience local culture and cuisine without crowds of tourists. Having the apartment as home base allowed us to take day trips and visit historical sites but then be able to come home, relax, and soak up the local culture. The apartment had unbelievable views from 4 private terraces. We began our day with breakfast on the main terrace and ended our day with drinks on the rooftop terrace. Our host, Maria, was super accommodating and everything was exactly as promised.  The apartment itself is beautiful and well appointed. Everything was excellent.

In our opinion the listing description was not accurate.  Definitely not "spectacular".  The downstairs guest bedroom was bad. Very hot and very uncomfortable bed. We felt the description was very misleading. The view from the roof was amazing, but literally everything else was just ok. Maria and her mother in law were lovely, but this listing could use some help.

Vi fik mail om hvornår vi kom med vores fly så Maria kunne se om vi var forsinket med fly, Franzika (familiemedlem) tog imod os kunne ikke så meget engelsk men ved fælles hjælp forstod vi hinanden  hun var meget behjælpelig. Fredelig nabolag, fordel at det var ude fra centrum tæt på indkøbsmulighed en gade derfra lå metro.

we had a lovely stay at Maria's beautiful apartment. Her cousin Angela was really helpful and even showed us a nearby restaurant where we could get vegetarian. I really appreciate the warmth and kindness shown. Thanks

Maria a été très prévenante. Nous avons été très bien accueilli, avec convivialité et avec de  généreuses attentions.
L'appartement est fidèle à la description.
