La situation est pratique, avec commodités, très calme, mais sans beaucoup de charme.
Très bon séjour

We loved the apartment. Clean, well equipped, great location, just like the pictures and charming host.
The area is great. Local feel. Lots of amenities. Just 5/10 minutes walk to Lesseps or Vallcarca. Great line and quick to main sites.
We tried: Open air cinema at Montjuic, Opera at Theatre Liceu, Beach Bogatell, Miro, swam in Olympic dive pool, Picasso, Fat tire bike tour, Runner Bean walking tours Old City and Gaudi, Sagrada Familia, the Magic Fountain, Museum of Modern Art. We ate at Bogatell Escriba, La Pubilla Gracia, roof top sushi with music and view of La Pedrera at Hotel Omm, Pez Vela and Theresa Carles. All brilliant. Plus pot luck places too also good.
We took a day trip on the train to Cambrils.
For next time other museums, flamenco, Sitges, Tibidabo, Spanish guitar concert and revisiting great places. 
So much to enjoy. A wonderful apartment and city. 
Thank you Maria. Best wishes
Lisa and family x

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona and enjoy the terraces. The apartment is the same as the description and photos. Maria and Francessca are very nice and helpful. 
Perfect stay! Thank you both!

This was a fantastic apartment. Very clean and comfortable.  Nice location if you don't mind being out of the city center.  Great views of the city and sea from the many terraces. Great communication with Maria. She allowed us a late check out and kept our bags before and after we checked in/out.  Check in was very simple. Would recommend this apartment.

Acceuil très agréable avec boissons et chips au frais plus lait pour les enfants 
L'appartement était propre et bien situé , confortable avec toutes les commodités . 
Les terrasses sont un vrai plus 
Je conseille vivement cette hôte et ce logement , notre séjour à Barcelone est un merveilleux souvenir 
Merci Maria ainsi que Francesca qui nous a s accueillis.
Maria helped with every step of my group trip to Barcelona. If there was ever an issue, Maria sprang into action to resolve it as quickly as possible. Thank you so much for all that you did for us.

L'appartamento di Maria ha ampiamente superato le nostre aspettative: spazioso, elegante ma accogliente, pulitissimo, con tutte le comodità possibili, dagli elettrodomestici ai bagni super accessoristi (jacuzzi, doccia idromassaggio, e bidet, cosa molto gradita a noi italiani), posto macchina (in garage coperto e sicuro da non sottovalutare in una metropoli come Barcellona) e vicinanza a 2 stazioni metro (in 2 fermate si è in centro). Anche i nostri 3 figli hanno apprezzato molto le comodità della casa di Maria (TV satellitare con tante opzioni, stanze grandi con letti comodissimi,...). 
Inoltre la presenza di 4 terrazze con una bellissima vista su tutta la città, rendono ancora più piacevole il soggiorno. 
La posizione è fantastica anche per chi ha un amico a 4 zampe, essendo a pochi passi dal parco Putxet dove i cani sono liberi di correre in ampi spazi anche senza guinzaglio. 
Quando torneremo a Barcellona sicuramente Maria sarà la nostra prima, anzi unica scelta!
Consigliatissimo!!!
Recomendado 100%. El lugar es precioso y muy confortable.

Maria's sister Francesca met us at the apartment. She was amazing, we love her. The apartment was spacious, the outdoor spaces were great, the kitchen was well equipped, and the air conditioning was a life saver. The apartment is a couple minutes walk from Guell Park, which was pretty cool. It was about a 15 min underground ride to La Rambla.  It was a quiet, lovely way to end our Barcelona adventures. Thank you Maria and Francesca!

Thank you so much !! It was a perfect place for us girls. Clean and lovely  apartment. very  friendly cousin, showed us everything in the apartment. She was really nice. 
The rooftop terrace is amazing. 
Perfect place for a group. Thanks Maria !!

Maria was very helpful in the build up to our stay and answered all our questions. We were greeted by Francesca who let us in and showed us around and sorted admin out for us. Francesca did not speak any English but judicious use of (Hidden by Airbnb) Translate enabled us to sort everything out.  The flat was as advertised, extremely clean, very good value and in a great location. The rooftop views of the city in particular are incredible. Only negatives I can think of are that the air conditioning is a bit weak and a couple of the beds aren't massively comfortable.

In conclusion, I highly recommend this apartment and host.

The check in process was extremely easy. Maria wasn't there but her aunt helped us get settled in. She even had (Hidden by Airbnb) Translator on her phone so we could understand everything. The house was extremely clean, and the patios were stunning! Highly Recommend this place!

Maria was out of town but her Cousin met us  was very helpful -even booked our cab to our cruise. This apartment was amazing. The pictures on the ad don't do it justice. We enjoyed sitting n the roof top terrace in the evening and the kitchen terrace during the day.

L'appartement est chaleureux et conviviale, nous nous sommes très vite senties chez nous. C'était propres et tout ce dont nous avions besoin etaient sur place. L'emplacement est bien également: à 5 min du métro seulement nous avons pu nous balader dans barcelone sans problème !
Die Wohnung war wie beschrieben sehr groß und auch hochwertig ausgestattet.  Die drei terassen waren das beste was die wohnung zu bieten hatte. Alles in einem war die wohnung sehr gut :)

We absolutely loved Maria's place. When we arrived Francesca was waiting for us and made our arrival supper easy. The house was very clean and cozy! The pictures definitely do not give it justice.  The Terrance was great for hanging out in the evening with a great view of the city.  I would definitely come back and stay at Maria's place again and would highly recommend it to anyone!

Great house sized apartment with enormous roof terraces and balconies located in quiet safe area close to metro and shops with easy commute to all attractions of Barcelona.  We stayed at Maria's place for 6 nights with friends of ours 
And we all had privacy and a wonderful stay in this apartment.  Great communication and a comfortable stay.
MARIA는 당시 출장중으로 우리를 맞이할 수 없었지만 그녀의 사촌이 우리를 맞이하였으며 위치설명과 숙소 소개를 잘 해주셨다.

The flat is really lovely and spacious, with big rooms and terraces, well equiped andlocated in a very pleasant area. 
The reception was very nice and helpfull.
I strongly recommend it.

Beautiful home! We loved our stay here. Very spacious--we stayed with 6 people and had plenty of room. The location was fine--not necessarily close to all the big "sites" but it was a beautiful location (and near a Metro stop). It felt like we were a local when we were there. We saw kids walking to school, neighbors doing laundry and eating on their terraces--lots of fun. 

The terrace was beautiful--great views of the city and GORGEOUS sunrise there. We had dinner up there one night and it was quite lovely. 

*Note: The host does not speak much English. We had someone with us who spoke Spanish, otherwise this would be a minor inconvenience. 

*Another note: Wifi was a bit weak. We had 6 devices on it and would usually need everyone to get off but one person if we really wanted it to work and be effective. Not a huge deal, but helpful to know. It probably has enough juice for 1-2 devices.
Apartamento muy bien equipado y que cumple con lo prometido. Estuvimos 9 personas muy a gusto.

Schöne Wohnung, zentral an der U-Bahn-Linie gelegen, mit der die meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten erreicht werden können. Wer keine Probleme mit Stufen oder engen Wendeltreppen hat, wird diese Wohnung mögen.
Appartement magnifique au calme, proche des commodités, avec des vues superbes sur Barcelone grâce à toutes ses terrasses!

Estuvimos ahí 3 días en familia para pasar las Navidades. Todo estuvo muy correcto, es un piso cómodo con todo lo que uno puede necesitar y además estaba limpio y ordenado. Está cerca de transporte público línea verde. Lo recomendaría.

L'appartement est tres spacieux. L'accueil de la cousine de Maria était tres chaleureux. Nous avons pu mettre notre grosse voiture au garage privé. Le métro pour aller au centre ville est à 5mn à pied. Le trajet du métro pour station Liceu est de 10mn. Nous avons passé un bon séjour. Merci beaucoup.
Appartement magnifique. Une mésentente sur l'heure d'entrée.

Our family of five adults spent a month in Maria's home.  We couldn't have selected a more perfect place to stay.  Incredible location with 1) easy access to transportation to all of Barcelona, 2) daily shopping options, including bakeries, cafes and specialty markets, and 3) a wonderful neighborhood, full of life but peaceful and friendly.  Maria's home enhanced our family's phenomenal visit to Barcelona.  This AirBnb experience will be hard to top.
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt in der Wohnung, vor allem die Terrassen sind einfach toll: vor allem der Blick von der Dachterrasse!
Cet appartement est idéal pour une famille, spacieux, agréable et  toutes ses terrasses avec vues magnifiques.
Lovely apartment, photos do not do it justice. Very modern and clean. Amazing terrace with great views. Short walk from park guell and short metro ride in to the centre. Would definitely recommend.

Maria was a wonderful host! Not only is her home amazing with some fantastic views of the city, but she was generous and available for any question I had during our stay. I traveled with four other friends and Maria's home was ideal for this trip! The home is spacious and comfortable - there are some wonderful coffee shops and markets nearby. We felt incredibly safe during our entire stay, and while it is walking distance to several key attractions in Barcelona (Park Guell) we opted to take a cab downtown in most cases - which was only about 15-20 minutes.

Thank you Maria for being such a wonderful host!

Appartement très jolie, décoration raffinée.
L'acceuil était tres bien, la propreté et le couchage étaient parfaits. Endroit calme. Maria est jognable à tout moment.

Maria's home is absolutely lovely!  This large home provides so much space for Barcelona, and also features high-end designs and comforts that would be helpful for a longer stay.  Our family included three children (13, 11 and 8) and elderly parents (one in a wheelchair).  The lift/elevator was a must for us, and we used it daily.  We do have a few things to note.  Maria's house is in a residential area--it is quiet, and just a 5-10m walk downhill to the Lessups metro station (L3).  It is a 5m walk downhill from the Valcarca station (L3).  It would be a really difficult walk to go up to Valcarca (steep walk uphill).  Francesca was so easy to work with; she received our luggage before check in and showed us how to use the appliances etc.  We did need to use a translator app via our cell phones to communicate but it worked fine.  The bedrooms and bathrooms were comfortable for a family of 7, and the numerous balconies were just incredible.  We LOVED this home and the location, but we were also hoping to live among locals vs being tourists.
Great apartment, great location, Maria is very helpful - cannot fault it :)

This is a gorgeous home, our family of 5 had so much room to spread out. We could easily have fit another family in and not even noticed!  
House was clean and everything you wanted was there, washing machine and the clothes dryer saved us as we traveled light and it was raining a couple of days.  Jetted tub, huge showers with multi heads, and the gorgeous terraces were all such a treat. The fridge had welcome goodies including fruit, cava, beer, juice, water, and chips that was very thoughtful.  Great and super friendly English communication with host Maria and also with Francesca, who was on site (we communicated easily with (Hidden by Airbnb) translate).  Highly recommend this apartment!

Une maison exceptionnelle par son emplacement à proximité de tous les services et du transport en commun.
Maria et Francesca sont des hôtes remarquables.

Denis &  Pierrette  
Québec,  Canada

A beautiful apartment! Perfect for a relaxing stay in Barcelona. The apartment is well equipped and very clean. There is fantastic outside space with a number of balconies and a roof terrace with a sea view! 
Communication with Maria was professional and prompt. 
I would definitely consider staying here in the future!
Appartement spacieux, propre et bien situé. Idéal pour notre 1er séjour en famille à Barcelone !
Ottimo soggiorno bel appartamento e zona tranquilla

Location is great and connections to the beach, airport, Camp Nou etc. were good. Nice bakery almost just behind the corner. Uncortunately, the weather wasn't too good while our visit, so we were not able to enjoy the terraces.
Great place for a big group like us. Everthing was great and very clean. There  are a lot of bars and restaurants in Gracia. Very good communication with Maria. Thank you for the opportunity Maria.

What a beautiful apartment in a breath-taking city.  I wish we could've stayed longer to truly enjoy all the home and city had to offer but we would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a retreat in Gracia.  Bring your walking shoes and enjoy!

I can highly recommend staying here. I was here with 6 friends and we had a great time. It's so close to the metro, a 5 minute walk, there is  a shop at the end of the street for small items and lots of nice food nearby. I fully recommend that you try the tapas restaurant around the corner, we had the best food there.
The house located in a beautiful area, it was clean and the communication was perfecto :) Thank u Maria for everything!

This was a wonderful place. The two main bedrooms were very comfortable and roomy, with very nice adjoining bathrooms. We ate every meal that we had in the apartment on the terrace outside of the dining area. It had a table that comfortably sat four, and an awning that protected us from the sun. The apartment was in a real neighborhood as opposed to a tourist enclave. There were excellent bakeries, fruit markets, places to buy wine, and a charcuterie within a few blocks. Although we were only one block from a major commercial street, the neighborhood was very quiet. It was a 10-minute ride on the metro to the Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. We also found a really excellent restaurant only a couple of blocks away.
Maria's place was just a excellent location. Very clean very well equipped with everything you might need or want. You will really love it
非常好的公寓,适合家庭和小伙伴入住,房东人特别热情,下次一定还住这家

Maria was out of town when we arrived to check in but her cousin Francesca was available to show us around the apartment.  Francesca didn't speak much english but it was not a problem at all.  She was delightful showing us the space and making recommendations.  Maria had materials all laid out and offered plenty of brochures to get you going if you didn't have many plans to see the city of Barcelona.  The space was wonderful.  We spend a fair amount of time on the terraces at night and the view was breathtaking.  There was a small problem with the time of checkin (the listing says 3pm on the website but Maria informed us that was a mistake and that it was actually 4pm)  It was not a problem for us and she has made a note to update that for future guests.  It can take about 30 minutes to get to the city center where some attractions are located (Sagrada Familia, Gothic District) but Parc Guell is a 15 minute walk away if you like a workout (it's uphill but there are escalators in some spots).  The house is comfortable, all amenities were available and worked properly and I would highly recommend this home to stay at during your visit to Barcelona.

Maria's place is centrally located, can get to most attractions easily in one line of bus or metro (or by foot to Park Guell). The apartment is roomy and can easily host up to 8 people. Maria is very accommodating to allow us put our luggages earlier than check-in time. We were greeted by Maria's cousin with a lot of details of the local convenience and felt welcomed by bottle of wine and a few beers. The house has everything we need including outlet converter for all of the phone charges. All in all, we are very happy and highly recommend her place.

If you are looking for a spacious apartment with gorgeous rooftop views, this is it. It is just outside of the hustle and bustle of central Barcelona, but very, very well connected to all the most famous sites. Maria's cousin, Francesca, lives downstairs, and she will take good care of you!

Fantastic!! You will absolutely love the roof top deck with views of the city and ocean. Maria is extremely accommodating and communication with her put us at ease, as this was our first trip to Europe. I highly recommend this apartment

This is a great place to stay if you have 4 or more people.   My sons age 22 and 26 my husband and I had plenty of space, the decks offer beautiful views and we had lots of shops, cafes and restaurants nearby.  The metro got us everywhere we needed to go and we used cabs as well once in awhile.  We highly recommend this place if you need space and don't mind being a little was away from all the tourist areas.  There was lots of nice touches, wine, beer in the fridge.
Super appartement, très adapté à la vie à plusieurs, chill garantit. Cependant assez éloigné de la plage.

Maria's apartment is simply oustanding. The location is perfectly located in a quiet residential district, yet very easily accessible on the metro to all that Barcelona has to offer. Everything is exactly as detailed, extremely well stocked kitchen facilities, beach towels and so much space, even with 8 of us in there. Communication has been fab, Francesca was a delight to deal with on our arrival, we managed to communicate perfectly via a translate app, despite the language barrier! Missing it already and will definitely return. Thank you for everything!
Great place, nice terrace and rooftop, everything was great and as described. Recommend!

Great house!! There was a ton of outside space!! Maria was unable to meet us bit her cousin was there, she was awesome. We had a language barrier but were able to work it out!!

We had issues figuring out the washing machine, dryer, and dishwasher. Never did figure out the dishwasher, so some instructions /instructions in English would be great. There is AC except for 1 room upstairs and in the hallway where the fridge is.

Some dishes in the cabinet seemed dirty, so look before you use. Quick fix, just wash them or buy plastic.

I heard from the people who slept in the twin beds in the master bedroom upstairs that they were uncomfortable.

Also, you will probably need to purchase more toilet paper and paper towels if you have a large group like I did. There is a corner store right down the street.

We had 7 people with luggage, so when we booked our shuttle it was a large bus. It couldn't make the turn on our street. So be aware when making transportation arrangements. Also, not all companies do pick ups at apartments so you will have to go to the nearest hotel, about a 5 min walk.

All in all, this was a great apartment. Had everything we needed for our stay. The host checked in with us regularly. I would definitely stay here again!!

Wow what a place! 3 levels 4  Balconies and plenty of places to chill out and socialise!

The accommodation was superb and very relaxing and I certainly would recommend family and friends staying here.

The rooftop terrace was a great place to socialise and chill out and the view was excellent looking over the city towards the sea.

Communication was really good and a special thanks to Francesca for all the help she gave when we had a question.

10 out of 10 from myself and my friends.

Maria's house is really big and absolutely lovely (all the rooms have balconies, the rooftop has stunning views!) and in a fantastic location in Barcelona, the subway is close and there's many places to eat and see, a short walk away, very close to the house. Maria was also super nice, I didn't actually meet her but her cousin Francesca was really helpful, even though she didn't speak English and I don't have much Spanish, we managed to communicate easily with gestures and also the help of (Hidden by Airbnb) translate ;) Will definitely recommend and come stay again.

Maria's place was excellent!  Nice to be away from the tourist areas, but still very close to public transit as well as walkable to grocery stores and other amenities.

Having a washer and dryer in the apartment was a blessing.  It not only saved on laundry cost but also was super convenient to have.

There was an unexpected welcome gift and extra sundries in the cabinets that we were welcome to.

The apartment was clean and safe and in a quiet neighborhood.  If we come back to Barcelona with a larger group again, we will definitely be hoping Maria's apartment is available!

Maria is a fantastic host, so helpful and accommodating.

The place is perfect for a visit to Barcelona. We came with our children, 7 of us and found the apartment to be perfect.

Thank you

Appartement très grand, propre.
Nous avons passé un très bon week end en famille avec nos enfants.
L'appartement est tout proche du park güell et très facile d'accès par métro vers le centre de Barcelone.
Great communications with check in and check out. Wonderful property and we had a great time

We stayed twice at Maria’s—before and after a trip to Mallorca. It worked well for our family of 7 (4 adults, 3 kids). We liked being in a neighborhood away from La Rambla that was close to transit (Metro L3 line). It was a short ride to go anywhere. Cousin Francesca greeted us warmly. The kitchen was stocked with basics and a bottle of wine, while the welcome notebook provided great tips. We loved the bakery 2 blocks away on Argentina, and the Asador restaurant in the upscale consulate area nearby. The kids (all of us) loved Tibidabo amusement park. Great trip!
Big place in a good location at a reasonable price. Would definitely stay here again
Wonderfull

This place is only a few hundred metres from a metro station on the main green metro line going into the old centre. And you can easily walk up to Park Guell (believe me, the street escalators are an experience, and a bliss). So you can stay here in a very quiet and “real” residential area of the city, and still be conveniently connected to the must-see highlights of the city. By the way, you do have stunning views from the terraces (yes, several), all the way down to the sea.
The place is cosy, and the pictures do it justice. Downstairs you have one twin room (access through the kitchen; use the corridor toilet) and one double with a nice en-suite bathroom (with excellent shower; we had some issues with the flush of the toilet). Upstairs there is one single room (though you could put a second be there; very tight, but possible) which has access to the main terrace (from where also the stairs to the top terrace), and then there is the Master bedroom with a double bed and two twin beds (and private terrace and en-suite bathroom with nice bath and correctly-flushing toilet). All beds were really nice and we slept well. So, if this bedding arrangement fits your group, then this is really a nice place to stay.
The kitchen is convenient and functional, with the basics when it comes to cutlery and cooking utensils/pots. If you plan to mostly go out to savour the great local kitchen, then this kitchen is more than enough for your breakfasts (including Nespresso machine!); if you plan to cook full meals, you may run into some practical challenges.
We really liked our stay, and quickly felt at home. The welcome and local support by Francesca was great (always only an SMS away), and Maria kept communicating so well via AirBnB messaging.

This airbnb was lovely and perfect in size for my family of 8. It was clean, spacious, and decorated beautifully to make it feel like a home away from home. In addition, so much helpful information was given to us on how to get around, where to eat & shop nearby, etc. The heating/ air conditioning and water pressure in the showers are very good. I would definitely recommend this airbnb to anyone! The best part that I think isn’t exhibited as much and it should be, is the amazing number of terraces, including the rooftop one with the most magnificent view of Barcelona! 
My only concern with the location is the steep hills, that may not be suitable for older or disabled people to stay at. Just a warning towards that, but the distance to the metro and travel time into the city center is perfect! The L3 train travels pretty much to every main tourist destination. We are very satisfied with our stay!
The apartment was perfect for our family of 7. Very spacious, clean and had everything you would need. Home away from home.

Super appartement bien situé parking privé magnifique propre bien equipe ect...
Le seul problème Le jacuzzi grosse fuite qd VOUS l'allume à l'étage du bas très dangereux AVEC LES cable  des  lumière ds le plafonds  on a du mettre un saut et ensuite l'éteindre.

L’appartement de Maria est fantastique : spacieux, propre, tout équipé et très bien situé. À moins de 10 min en métro du centre ville, il est néanmoins situé dans une rue calme avec peu de passage.
Le petit bonus : ses nombreuses terrasses et la vue magnifique depuis le rooftop du dernier étage ! 
Maria et sa cousine Francesca sont très arrangeantes, à l’écoute, et sympathiques.
Nous avons passé un superbe weekend entre amis. Nous avons tous adoré l’appartement !

숙소 시설은 매우 훌륭합니다. 주요 관광지가
멀다고 느낄 수 있지만 지하철을 타고 이동하기에 편한 거리에다가 근처 동네는 조용하고 안전해서 오래 머물기에 좋습니다. 매우 강력히 추천합니다.

Maria's place is simply amazing - if I could rate it 10+ Stars I would!!!   It's large, as you would expect from the listing, but more importantly, simply everything is perfect.  It is very nicely decorated - not like a lot of "this is AirBnB so I'll use the minimum amount of IKEA furniture possible".  Nope!  This place is meant for you to relax, enjoy, and feel comfortable.  The location is great; about 5 minutes from a Metro station.  It's not right in the middle of the center of town, but it is well located and it's easy to get everywhere, via walking, buses, Metro, etc.  There's shops, bakeries, markets, restaurants, all around the place.  Best of all, it's quiet!!  The views from the balconies are incredible.  The kitchen is fully stocked with dishes, towels, soaps, etc.    I can't think of a better place to stay when you're in Barcelona!!
L’appartement est très grand, confortable, proche de transports. La vue des terrasses est exceptionnelle, on voit même la mer ! Maria n’était pas sur place mais a été très réactive et agréable !

it was quite big and warm as we are unexpected. and this house has a beautiful terrase.. we loved it too much.. 

thanks
A fab apartment, would definitely stay again
Logement moderne et agréable à deux pas du métro . Parfait pour quelques jours de détente à Barcelone en famille .
非常棒的房子,性价比尤其高｡不会后悔的｡
Very nice and clean apartment with an amazing view. Well located and very convenient. Everything was perfect for our stay in Barcelona. Thanks Maria.

Spacious and in a great location. Plenty of room for 7 of us. The roof terrace was perfect for relaxing in the sunshine. Less than a 10 minute walk to the metro station and reasonably priced cafes and restaurants. We loved the Italian restaurant that the guys in the shop at the end of the road recommended.
The Cava in the fridge was a lovely touch after a long journey. 
It’s a shame that the jacuzzi bath was out of action during our stay. No doubt this will be fixed soon. 
Maria was away during our stay but communicated well through messages and email.

Our favorite Airbnb out of the 3 that we stayed at in Barcelona and Valencia, Spain. I loved being in the Gracia area, a bit away from the downtown Gothic Quarter madness but advise any other large groups to do a little more planning when going out late or farther afield due to the metro closing around midnight, and cost of cabbing around. Maria was very responsive and seems like she would be a great host, but happened to be on vacation herself when we stayed. Her cousin Francesca let us in no problem. Main point - You just can't beat the views and those amazing rooftop patios.

Grand appartement situé dans un quartier tranquille de Barcelone , idéal pour se retrouver en famille dans un confort agréable . Maria et sa cousine ont donné tous les conseils utiles pour un séjour réussi .
This flat was very comfortable for a group ! A good weekend To discover Baecelona
We loved this home! It's beautiful, clean and in a great location!  Great access to grocery stores, restaurant and public transportation. We would definitely stay here again if we return to Barcelona

Great Appartement with great view. Enough space for 9 people (one bedroom has 4 beds) 
Located 5 minutes from metro L3
Friendly and easy going rental process

Lage ist gut . Mit der Metrolinie L3 kommt man direkt in die Stadt. Supermarkt Consum in 5 Gehminuten.   Die Schlafbereiche müssen dringend verbessert / renoviert werden. Bilder im Internet zeigt die Wohnung im neuen Zustand was bestimmt schon einige Jahre her ist.  Neue Matratzen wären auch gut. Die Terrassenmöbel sind teilweise beschädigt und nicht zu nutzen. Wohnung liegt am Hang ist aber leicht zu erreichen. Allerdings nichts für Leute mit Gehbehinderung. ! Die Terrassen an sich sind super !!!!!!!! Maria ist eine sehr hilfsbereite Person welche sich sehr um uns bemüht hatte.

Magnifique appartement bien située, à quelques minutes de deux stations de métro. L’appartement est super équipé et immense. Il jouit d’une vue exceptionnelle sur Barcelone et Montjuic. Si nous retournons à Barcelone et qu’il est libre, nous n’hésiterons pas longtemps avant de le réserver à nouveau !!

This apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood with a number of nearby markets and cafes.  In addition to a spacious interior with cool mid-century deisgn and decor, there are multiple outdoor spaces for relaxing and taking in the view of the entire city.  This was our first visit to Barcelona and we should have stayed longer.

Die Unterkunft ist nördlich von Gracia in einer eher ruhigeren Gegend.
Die Aussicht von den verschiedenen Dachterrassen ist überwältigend. Die Ausstattung der Unterkunft ist gut, die Aufteilung der Zimmer ist nicht ganz optimal, aber für 7,8 Leute total ausreichend.

Hallo,wir hatten vier schöne Tage in der Wohnung von Maria in Barcelona. zur U Bahn  ist der Weg nicht weit. die Wohnung ist perfekt eingerichtet nur das Kaffe kochen mit der kleinen Maschine war etwas mühselig für neun Leute. es war sehr schön. Danke Christine und ihrer Mannschaft

Très bel appartement, très spacieux et très bien équipé. Les 2 terrasses, le balcon et le solarium sont de magnifiques atouts pour ce pied à terre Barcelonais d'exception. Nous le recommandons vivement aux futurs voyageurs qui y trouverons du calme tout en étant au coeur d'un quartier vivant et proche des transports en commun.

This is a beautiful and spacious home in a fantastic location in Barcelona. We were stunned by how large it was and how many amazing outdoor spaces were available, in addition to all the bedrooms and large living area. After being in in smaller apartments, my family of five loved spreading out and enjoying some space in this beautifully decorated home. We were easily able to walk to the metro, the bus station and many good restaurants. Park Guell is just a mere 10 minutes away as well as the chic Gracia area. Maria was an incredibly helpful and gracious host, and I highly recommend this place for anyone visiting Barcelona.
Maria's place lived up to it's reputation.  Great space for large families!
Un super séjour dans un magnifique logement

We were a family of eight, stayed pre and post our Med Cruise. The apartment is just like in the pictures, clean and pretty.  Two metro stations close by along with small restaurants and markets.  We truly enjoyed our stay!   Highly recommend.

Myself and 9 friends stayed at Maria's apartment during off week in June. The apartment exceeded all our expectations, the photos do not do it justice! Very clean and plenty of room for the 10 of us. We opted to stay in Maria's apartment for the outdoor spaces as opposed to staying more central and we're glad we did so. The number of venues we visited during our stay were only ever short taxi or metro journey away. Would definitely recommend to any large groups.
Maria’s home is well kept and has lots of space which was nice for a large group like ours. She was responsive and provided a lot of tips and info

This was our first visit to Barcelona, and we enjoyed our two-night stay at Maria’s lovely apartment!  She was a wonderful host, promptly responding to all our questions as soon as we booked our reservation.  The apartment is huge and had more than enough room for our group of four adults.  It’s a very easy walk from the apartment to the nearest  Metro Station, and is also close to a wonderful  bakery.  We were very comfortable and would highly recommend Maria’s place!
Amazing experience, a wonderful apartment, and very hospitable host! 100% recommend.

A perfect place for an extremely pleasant and relaxing stay. Well presented to a high standard.
Welcomed by our hosts into an immaculate home with all the amenities, lots of useful information on local area and more. Has everything you could possibly need, and more. Even to having a welcome bottle of champagne. Highly recommend and will certainly tell our friends visiting BCN. Certainly 5 star.
Los baños increíbles y habitaciones  grandes. Lo mejor ha sido la hospitalidad y comunicacion
Amazing apartment and wonderful location.  This apartment is large and spacious.  The balconies are amazing and a wonderful spot to enjoy the cool breeze at night.

Superbe duplex, Très grand où chacun peut avoir son indépendance.  Très bien situé pour les transports en commun.  Nous sommes à Barcelone sans être dans le coeur de Barcelone souvent très actif . Mais en 10 minutes de métro vous vous rendez sur les spots stratégiques ! 
Une magnifique terrasse au sommet de l'immeuble  pour des petites soirées couché de soleil avec vu sur tout Barcelone.  
Maria est une super hôte très disponible et accueillante.  
Je recommande fortement !

Our extended family of 10, with three generations, stayed here on our first visit to Barcelona.  The space was 2 stories with several outside balconies (the rooftop was amazing!) made our 4 night stay seem like home with plenty of space.  The kitchen was well equipped for making meals.  There are several super markets, cafes, and restaurants near by and the Metro was about a 5 minute walk.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend it for a large group.

Fabulous luxurious apartment in a wonderful quiet location, a short and easy metro ride to the city centre.

The apartment provided everything we could possibly require (two families with four children) for a very comfortable weeks stay.

As runners there were some easy routes up onto the trails above the city. And only five gruelling minutes run (uphill) to the Park Güell.

Thank you Maria for a wonderful week.
stunning place, great hosts cant wait to go back!
Great flat with a great location. We were 6 people and there was plenty of space - perfect for a trip to Barcelona
Great apartment, really spacious and well furnished. The terraces are awesome and a great place to relax and the location is great as well! ( also for summer, the AC works well).

Maria’s place is in a great location to easily explore a few of Spain’s main attractions (Park Guell & Casa Vicens) by foot. Also super close to the train which takes you to many of the other places we wanted to explore. Close by bakery, coffee shops & supermarkets that helped start off our morning. The view from the terraces amazing!!!! Not to mention the space for our group of seven. I would absolutely stay here again.
Amazing stay!! Quiet area but central. Mini supermarkt is at the next corner which is very near. Metro  Stop Vallcarca is the nearest one. Very clean appartement!! Thank you so much for everything.

Logement très vaste et très propre.
Très bien situé dans un quartier calme et des voisins très serviables.
Mme Angela est très accueillante.

Wir haben die Wohnung zu acht Freundinnen gemietet und waren sehr begeistert. Da wir sehr früh angereist sind, hatten wir die Möglichkeit vor dem Check-in unsere Koffer in der Wohnung unterzustellen, was für uns natürlich eine Erleichterung für das Sightseeing war. Vielen Dank dafür, Maria.
Die Wohnung ist riesig und die Terrassen ein Traum, man hat von der Dachterrasse einen wunderbaren Blick über Barcelona. Die Einrichtung ist sehr hochwertig, die Bäder sehr groß und schön.
Die Lage ist ruhig und optimal gelegen um alle Sehenswürdigkeiten gut zu erreichen, da die Metrostation in ca 5 min Fussweg zu erreichen ist.
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

What can I say,  Maria's place was amazing in all aspects. beautiful, spacious, clean. 
She is a fantastic host and I highly recommend anyone traveling to Barcelona to stay right here!!
Appartement agréable, bien insonorisé, belles vues des terrasses, beaucoup d'espace. Nous étions deux couples et chacun avait son intimité. Merci Maria et Angela.
Super cerca de park guell! El depa tiene todos loa servicios y es súper tranquilo! Esta lindisimo y es ideal para quedarte en tu estancia en barcelona :)

Nous avons passé un we entre filles (8) et l’appartement est parfait. Le quartier est calme , pas de bruit, résidentiel. La vue de la terrasse du toit est magnifique ! Que ce soit la nuit ou le matin... chambres confortables . Linges de lit et (Website hidden by Airbnb) quelques attentions pour nous dans le frigo. À qq minutes à pied du métro. C'est la maman de Maria qui nous a accueilli. Tout était parfait pour nous. À recommander les yeux fermés !

房子在地铁站步行5min的位置,出行方便｡不过对于自驾的游客来说,公寓周边的单行道和停车库所在的坡道需要点技术｡房子内部有两层,房间众多,每层都有露台,最喜欢顶层的露台可以远远的看见海面,清晨在露台上裹着睡衣看了日出,这个体验会一直留在记忆中｡入住当天是Maria的母亲接待了我们,虽然她的英语不太好,可是还是很周到的告诉我们房子的各种细节,沟通顺利完美交接｡
性价比很高的一间民宿,适合一个家庭多人来居住,会推荐给来巴塞罗那旅行的朋友们!

My family, girlfriend and I (8 people) visited Barcelona for 4.5 days and we stayed in Maria's amazing apartment. It is huge and at no point we felt that there is not enough room. Plenty of bathrooms, balconies, beds, etc. Everything is furnished very nicely and the style fits to the Barcelona atmosphere. Maria took really good care of us. Also her lovely mother helped us very much. Because my grandparents had trouble walking a lot, she even took them with her private car to the dinner place when we arrived! The view over the city is exceptional as the house is in the north west where the ground level is higher than the rest of the city. The elevator in the house makes it convenient to get into the apartment and we also had a place to park the rental car. Everything was great and we highly recommend the place!

This apartment is fabulous and Maria is a great host! Check-in was simple and went smoothly - we even arrived before 4pm and were able to check in without a problem. The location is excellent - located in a quiet neighborhood away from all the tourists, yet the convenience of the metro makes it easy to get anywhere very quickly. The apartment is beautiful and very cozy. We loved returning every day after our outings, and the layout made it easy for us to relax together as well as retreat to our own areas for privacy. The outdoor spaces are exceptional and all of the bedrooms are very comfortable! The shower in the downstairs en suite bedroom is amazing. The apartment was well-equipped, though we had trouble figuring out how to use the clothes dryer. Also, while there were liquid soap dispensers in each bathroom as well as next to the kitchen sink, it would have been nice to have small bars of soap for the showers. In addition, while the photos were generally an accurate portrayal of the apartment itself, there were minor differences, and we didn't see some of the items shown in the photos (there were no televisions in any of the bedrooms - which was okay since we didn't watch at all; no chaise lounge chairs on the terrace off the living room; no basket of personal care supplies in the bathroom; etc.) These are all minor things, though, and we absolutely loved this apartment. We would stay in this apartment again in a heartbeat! One of our only regrets was not having more time to spend there!
Maria is a very helpful and friendly landlord. Her flat is absolutely gorgeous! The metro is not far away and there’s a supermarket nearby.

Nice place, Great stay.
Thank you
Maria’s place is totally one I would return to as much as possible.  It is amazing!!
Great place to stay for a site seeing holiday in Barcelona! Super facilities and location.

If you have a crowd to take care of you need to consider Maria's - it is a superb two story flat that provdie a ton of amenities. It has an abundance of terrences to relax in that provide flex space for outdoor meals, mid-afternoon tapas and great views of the city on the rooftop terrace. Both levels have well appointed bathrooms and the extra half bathroom meant that we had lots of flexibility for the four couples that shared this space. The kitchen is well stocked and although we didn't prepare any meals except breakfast it had a full range of cooking options. The washer helped us clean a few things before going home, and the access to the clothes line meant that our clothes was nice a fresh. If it had rained we did have the option of a dryer which we did not need. The beds were generally ok and each guest has a comfy pillow and both a small and large towel. The place was very clean and there is a lot of space to lounge about both inside and out. We were only sorry that we only had two days, we would have loved to stay longer. Very close to Park 
Guell, and the nearby metro made it easy to get around to other locations. There are not a ton of restaurants nearby, but the Inka hamburger place is a resonalby priced options with all kinds of items on the menu (the goat salad was a big hit, althouh I stuck to the hot sandwiches). There are a lot of grocery and food options very near by and we did not lack for great pastries! The check in was easy and the flat itself is on a quaint and relatively quiet street. I understand why Maria is a super host, thanks for the wonderful stay;

Fantastic location and unique space -so quirky and fabulous roof terrace- was great for my friends 40th. We all had our own space and loved the living areas and also the tapas bar close by  - would recommend 100%

Maria’s house was perfect for our stay in Barcelona. Communication was great and we had everything we needed. Parking was a huge plus for us and the terrace is amazing!
Thank you!
That was the best apartment we've ever stayed in in Spain. You can't ask for more for the money. 'Nuff said.

Maria’s place was amazing! It’s alot bigger than we thought and there was a balcony outside of every room  I wasn’t there to check in, but my friends said it was an easy process. It’s about 10 mins from the centre of Barcelona on a train, which was really easy to figure out. We had a late flight back home & Maria let us stay later which we really appreciated. I would definitely stay here again if I’m in Barcelona with a big group of people!
Nice apartment close to metro, super accomondation - highly recommended :)
Parfait! Propre,bien placé, calme, magnifique vue depuis la terrasse du toi.

We enjoyed our stay at Maria's place. The apartment was very clean.  The kitchen was well equipped. The location is fabulous, very close to subway, walking distance from various parks with an amazing view of the city.   We definitely recommend Maria's rental.

Maria’s house was excellent.  She has many bedrooms and beds to accommodate up to 10 people.  The house is a great bargain.  It is easy to take the bus and metro from Maria’s house to surrounding areas like Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla which is 15-20 minutes away and Park Guell which is 10-15 minutes walking uphill.  I would definitely stay here again and recommend this place to everyone visiting Barcelona.  You will feel like you are living in a home.  It has a personal touch.
Fantastic space - loads of room for a family or big group. Great location with easy connections into the city centre and lots of good stuff within walking distance too.

This apartment was stunning and spotlessly clean. The roof terrace was great with a fantastic view of Barcelona. It's in a lovely area with all amenities near by, full of locals rather than really touristy. Maria was also a fantastic host! Thank you for an amazing holiday!
Grand espace, photo en adéquation parfaite avec la réalité. Magasin et métro tout proche.
家裡的環境空間非常大,而且舒適,我們全家都非常的喜歡,尤其還有露臺,讓我們不用出門就可以看見巴塞隆納,推薦所有要去巴塞隆納的人,這裡真的是非常棒的選擇,設備非常的完善,附近就有地鐵,距離奎爾公園也非常的近,走路就可以到達｡

L appartement de Maria est vraiment super, il est immense, très propre et bien décoré. Du parquet partout au sol, des lits confortables, deux belles sdb dont une avec une baignoire balnéothérapie.
Le gros plus est le parking sous l appartement. Nous avons laissé la voiture pendant 4 jours car tout se fait très facilement en métro (5 min à pied)
Maria est très réactive.
Nous recommandons ce logement +++ et nous y reviendrons avec grand plaisir.

My family of 5 spent a week in this very large, very comfortable space. It was not one of those all-IKEA furnished places. The apartment has lovely spaces indoor and out. Maria and her mother were very easy to communicate with and very responsive. The location, while not immediately downtown, was convenient to get around and purchase groceries and such locally. Our airline moved up our arrival flight so that we landed very early in the morning and while we couldn't check in until late afternoon due to the prior night being rented, Maria's mom was kind enough to allow us to drop off our luggage and return later. In retrospect, I wish we had booked the night prior so that we wouldn't have had that very long day, but it all worked out. Would definitely consider staying here again if we return to Barcelona.

Cracking place , location and balconies/terraces! comfortable beds and good bathroom and kitchen facilities, great space all round.   Really comfortable.   we found plaza del Sol and Gracia area really great, the immediate surrounding area of the apartment is really nice area, relaxed and quiet, 10 mins walk towards centre things liven up.  so you get best of both worlds

YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED if you book this place. Maria was super hospitable and the place was impeccable. It’s good for big families and small groups. The place is stylish and has everything you need.

name: Condo style loft
summary: Situé dans le quartier Rosemont et à distance de marche des services tel qu’épicerie, parc, restaurants et du cinéma Beaubien, ce magnifique loft vous charmera ! Plus de 1000 pied carré d’espace comprenant : -Une chambre fermé avec lit king -Canape lit situe dans l espace bureau ouvert
description: Situé dans le quartier Rosemont et à distance de marche des services tel qu’épicerie, parc, restaurants et du cinéma Beaubien, ce magnifique loft vous charmera ! Plus de 1000 pied carré d’espace comprenant : -Une chambre fermé avec lit king -Canape lit situe dans l espace bureau ouvert

host.host_about: Cinema voyage

name: 2 Bedroom -guest parking.
summary: Fab Cool Clean 2bd with Mod cons. Unlimited Wi-Fi, Fetch TV and Netflix. Freshwater Village and beach around the corner. Bus stop to Manly/City on doorstep. BBQ & table chairs outside. Body board & bike.
space: Around the corner from the Vibrant Freshwater Village
description: Fab Cool Clean 2bd with Mod cons. Unlimited Wi-Fi, Fetch TV and Netflix. Freshwater Village and beach around the corner. Bus stop to Manly/City on doorstep. BBQ & table chairs outside. Body board & bike. Around the corner from the Vibrant Freshwater Village Queen bedroom - bathroom and kitchen/laundry Its perfect On doorstep buses - and are very frequent. Walking - stunning walks along the coast in either direction
neighborhood_overview: Its perfect
transit: On doorstep buses - and are very frequent. Walking - stunning walks along the coast in either direction
access: Queen bedroom - bathroom and kitchen/laundry
house_rules: Pets are allowed however please clean up after them.  No smoking inside please - and please clean up any spills - thank you

name: For funny and enjoyable holidays
summary: My room is in the middle of the downtown. Near of the Bosphorus, Taksim square, Sultanahmet, Ortaköy, Kadıkoy. All the cultural activities, pubs, nightclubs, museums, etc. are very close or very easy with bus or other transportations.
description: My room is in the middle of the downtown. Near of the Bosphorus, Taksim square, Sultanahmet, Ortaköy, Kadıkoy. All the cultural activities, pubs, nightclubs, museums, etc. are very close or very easy with bus or other transportations.

name: Classic West Village 1BR on Quiet Tree-Lined Block
summary: This small, quiet,  private one bedroom apartment is in the heart of the calm oasis of the West Village, where the streets are lined with mature trees and stunning townhouses.  Close to subway, shops, cafes, fine restaurants--and two blocks from the iconic "Friends" apartment--this two-flight walk-up is fully furnished and ready for short-term or long-term stays.
space: This apartment is ideal for anyone from European travelers to Bohemian writers of purple prose to finance dudes working crazy hours to female professionals looking for a safe, well-lit neighborhood. Your friendly hosts can tell you the best places to eat, drink, be merry and shop.
description: This small, quiet,  private one bedroom apartment is in the heart of the calm oasis of the West Village, where the streets are lined with mature trees and stunning townhouses.  Close to subway, shops, cafes, fine restaurants--and two blocks from the iconic "Friends" apartment--this two-flight walk-up is fully furnished and ready for short-term or long-term stays. This apartment is ideal for anyone from European travelers to Bohemian writers of purple prose to finance dudes working crazy hours to female professionals looking for a safe, well-lit neighborhood. Your friendly hosts can tell you the best places to eat, drink, be merry and shop. Intercom with buzzer. This is a quiet, small building with some old school villagers and some sleek young professionals. It's the West Village. Need we say more? Just a few minutes from major subway lines (1, 2, A, C, E, F, M) with easy connections to 4,5,6, L, 7) and all bus routes.  Easy access to taxis at all hours. Uber friendly. We live nearby s
neighborhood_overview: It's the West Village. Need we say more?
notes: We live nearby so we are always available to help -- whether fixing problems or finding the best place to eat.  (Free guided tour of the neighborhood included!) But we are also busy professionals so you don't have to worry about us poking around.
transit: Just a few minutes from major subway lines (1, 2, A, C, E, F, M) with easy connections to 4,5,6, L, 7) and all bus routes.  Easy access to taxis at all hours. Uber friendly.
access: Intercom with buzzer.
interaction: This is a quiet, small building with some old school villagers and some sleek young professionals.
house_rules: Only one rule: make yourself at home.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Matthew is a friendly, knowledgeable, longtime West Village resident.  He is  eager to share his enthusiasm for the neighborhood and the city and can  provide tips on food, transportation, and adventure.

reviews.comments: Location is awesome. Matthew is a fantastic host. Easy check-in and always available if need a question answered. Would stay here again!
Great apartment, great location, great host.

Matthew’s apartment is located in one of the most beautiful blocks in New York, those ones that still has the filling of what makes NYC, the city. The apartment is super comfortable, ultra clean, and just a few minutes from lots of the subway lines. Matthew was super friendly and ready to help and the arrival was perfect! Thank you very much Michael!

Matthew was an excellent host. He was always very prompt replying to our messages, and even came to meet us at the local station so that we didn't get lost when trying to find his place. He told us all the best places to go, and we felt very welcome in his home.
The flat was pretty basic and perhaps a little dated (but cute!) and had everything you needed - very comfortable bed, tv with American Netflix, powerful shower. 
The best thing about it was the area - we had initially tried to stay in the Hell's Kitchen/ Times Square area however now are SO glad we stayed in his area as it was so nice an peaceful - really easy access to all main sights and has the BEST bars and restaurants just walking distance with such a varied selection! (You have to go to Marie's!)
Overall Matthew was great, the area was fab (couldn't think of anywhere we'd rather have stayed) and the whole trip was so much fun! 
Thanks so much guys

We had an absolutely amazing time staying here. We don't know the area very well so we asked a lot of questions and Matt was very very quick to respond with some very well thought out suggestions and recommendations. The location for us was perfect as we wanted to be kinda centralized between times Square and downtown and it was exactly that. Highly highly recommend staying here on your next trip to NYC. It's a very cute apartment and very comfortable. Truly enjoyed our stay and will look for this first the next time we go to NYC. Thank you so much Matt!!!

Our first trip to New York was perfect for one of the following reasons: a stay in West Village. If you want a real taste of NY your search ends right here! We had a very comfortable stay with all the facilitities. We experienced New York not like any other tourist. It is a dream to walk through the streets of West Village and discover New York from there. 
Many important sights are nearby or easy to reach with the subway. 
Our host Matthew was so sweet and took good care of us. He made sure we didnt miss out on any experience and provided us a warm home and great tips. So make sure you check out the recommendations he provides.

We had a great week in NYC staying in Matthew's apartment! It's a lovely small place located in one of the most beautiful areas of the city we have seen. The location of the apartment is perfect - easy to reach via subway and close to many sights. At night time it was surprisingly quiet within the street and we were always able to get a good rest in order to keep exploring the next day. The apartment was perfectly clean and comfortable and provided everything we need. Also, we would like to emphasize Matthew's qualities as a host as he was super dedicated showing us around the block and introducing us to his favorite shops, restaurants and areas in the neighborhood. He has always been friendly and happy to help, responses were quick and easy. We would be very happy to come back soon!

Matt was very kind, helpful and quick to respond.  The apt is lovely while small it suited our needs perfectly.  We enjoyed the location, the space, the time the host took to be sure we were acclimated to the space/city and overall this was a lovely location and a wonderful time.  There is so much to do/see nearby and coming back to the peace and quiet of West Village after being in the hustle of Times Square, etc. was a delight as well.  Thank you for the wonderful experience Matt.

Located in great Neighborhood.
You will find everything you need cafes, restaurants, pubs, deli.
Metro is just few minutes from the apartment.
It's small but, It's cosy. You've got here all you need to live for few days in NY.
Matthew is great host and will give you answers for all your questions.

Matthew welcomed us as we were long time friends, he kindly showed us the neighbourhood and gave us some good suggestions for our visit. The apt itself was amazing, everything we could desire in the most perfect location in nyc.

The apartment is great and very well located in New York, in a calm street and near to nice and living places. Matthew and Collin are great hosts and welcomed us very kindly. They are very flexible for check-in and check-out.
We really enjoyed our stay there !
Super endroit et rapport qualité prix imbattable à New York. Les hôtes sont très agréables et aidant.

The BEST Airbnb we have ever stayed at. The location is perfect! Easy access to the subway giving us plenty of options to get around. Lots of cute shops and restaurants available. Matthew and Collin were both very accommodating and answered any questions we had.  Everything was so clean it felt like a cool vintage New York apartment. Will definitely be staying with them in the future.

Matthew apartment was exactly as presented (description and photos). The place is absolutely amazing, so quiet while being in one of the very best places in Manhattan for restaurants, bars, taverns and clubs. It is also very close to metro stations and perfectly linked to all metro lines. The apartment is really good, sunny, cost and pleasant. Bed and furniture are confortable and in excellent condition. We were very welcomed upon arrival and had regular excellent contact during our stay. We will definitely come back here for our next stay in NYC.

El alojamiento tiene una gran ubicación, está situado en una calle muy tranquila, es pequeño pero muy cómodo, las fotos le hacen justicia de lo que es, Matt fue muy atento para recibirnos y enseñarnos el apartamento. Si regresaría y lo recomendaría. Lo único que vale la pena mencionar es que está en un tercer piso y no hay elevador.

También hay que mencionar que está cerca de varias paradas del metro y a 2 cuadras de muchos restaurantes locales.

This flat was an incredible find! We were met at the subway station and guided to what might be the nicest street in Manhattan! All classic New York town houses, round the corner from an amazing restaurant area/ the high line/ a very convenient subway stop that made exploring the city quick and easy. The flat was really characterful, clean and had all the amenities we needed! Thanks to Colin and Matthew for their flat and all the tips about the local area!

LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!!! Can not say enough about how wonderful this area is.. it’s SO charming, tons of restaurants (for all eating/dietary needs), 5-10 minute walk to Subway Stations, safe to walk @ night, & perfect change from the crazy hustle & bustle of the busy city streets, all while still being very close & having plenty of things to do!  Although, it was a quieter area of the city, there are some pigeons that live in the area next to the bathroom & bedroom windows that kept us up multiple nights (even with windows shut)...just nature, but something to be aware of.  Matt & Collin were very welcoming when we arrived and always very quick to respond to all messages & questions we had prior to our trip.  The place is small, but perfect for a couple.  The kitchenette has a stove, but realistically the area is perfect just for use of the small refrigerator/freezer, sink, cups/bowls/plates, & silverware.  The bedroom has a Full size bed which was very comfortable & high quality mattress, but we do recommend bringing your own pillows.  The apartment is old (which is part of the charm) however, that can come with its downfalls.  The carpet in the bedroom has seen better days, and the shower head was very awkwardly placed (making showers difficult), but a major bonus was the water pressure & hot water!  We highly recommend this place.. The price was great for this location/ apartment (especially compared to hotels & competing AirBNB’s), and we’d definitely stay here again! Hope this was helpful and enjoy your visit to West Village in NYC!!

The apartment exceeded our expectations. The location couldn´t be better, the space itself is very cosy and nice to hang out in.  Also, we really enjoyed the trifecta of heating, warm water with great water pressure and good natural light. The area is very safe and surprisingly quiet at night, within walking distance of a couple of museums and subway lines that will take you all over NYC.  But for sure what made our stay was the amazing hospitality of the host, Matt.  He was there to welcome us and show us around the apartment, the communication was a dream. Take him up on the walk around the block, he will show you a couple of hidden gems. If we´re ever again in NYC, we are hoping to stay there again!
Matthew was a great host, very hospitable and attentive. The place was nice and cozy, it had everything that I needed. One of my favorite airbnb experiences— It was so sad to leave.
Very warm welcome from both of hosts. Apartment is clean and in a superb location - walking distance to tons of restaurants/ bars/ metro, but still quiet enough.
nice apartment, very very friendly and supportive host. Matthew gave us a lot of good hints and tips for the neighbourhood. great connections to public transport, nice neighbourhood

I had a great time staying at the apartment. Matthew was a great, charming, and very helpful host, who was happy to give any information on the neighborhood needed. Very lovely West Village apartment with street views and a great mattress. All furniture was very comfortable and it was complete with all you needed: coffee machine, kettle, microwave, all the amenities. I hope to return on my next trip. Thanks, Matthew! It was a pleasure meeting you!

Great stay at Matthews. Excellent location and comfortable apartment. Very warm in the middle of winter. I did find it small, but it was fine for 2 people for a week. Matthew was a great host going the extra mile for us when we needed.

Matthew and Collin were such great hosts- they met me very late at night after I arrived and lugged my enormous suitcase up 2 flights of stairs. Also their communication was always prompt and very helpful. The apartment has everything you need, good light and a comfy couch- not a full kitchen but enough to have breakfast before setting off for the day. Great bathtub and really good heat- I was there when it was 10 degrees. The block is magnificent with so many wonderful shops and restaurants everywhere. Great stay at a great price!

The location is perfect to explore mid/downtown of NY. Walking distance to Chelsea market and Union square. After exloring the city, you can chill out at nice restaurants and bars in bleecker street near the house (even 2 of famous jazz bars!!!). Matthew's house is decorated with very sensitive touches and he is always responsive to our requests. We'd like to stay again when visiting NY.

The apartment is clean, quiet and well equipped - a great base for our New York trip. We also really liked the neighbourhood, it felt really safe to walk around, is very well connected via the metro and we were spoiled by the choice of places to eat. Highly recommended!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Matthew’s apartment. It was the perfect base to explore New York from, not too far away from anything. And the neighborhood is lovely (with a great brunch spot right on the corner!)

Matthew was one of the best hosts we have ever stayed with. He gave us a ton of recommendations and it was clear to us that he really cared that we had a great time during our stay. 

We would definitely recommend and would stay again!

name: Vaucluse, city views, large two bedroom w sunroom
summary: Two Bedroom hardwood floor apartment with an enormous master bedroom. Central sunroom / walk in wardrobe with immense amounts of natural light throughout all day.  Large gas kitchen and outstanding harbour views from the main bedroom windows. 1930’s style building with charm and warmth, clean and neat - roughly 80sqms Bathroom is older style but functional and very cool, with a half-sized hot water tank - it is extremely hot though so still good.
space: Very sunny and open two bed with clean facilities and a lovely outlook to Harbour bridge views from the bedroom.  Clean, close to beaches bays bondi and breezy. Quiet neighbourhood so really better suited to small families as noise travels a lot through this area
description: Two Bedroom hardwood floor apartment with an enormous master bedroom. Central sunroom / walk in wardrobe with immense amounts of natural light throughout all day.  Large gas kitchen and outstanding harbour views from the main bedroom windows. 1930’s style building with charm and warmth, clean and neat - roughly 80sqms Bathroom is older style but functional and very cool, with a half-sized hot water tank - it is extremely hot though so still good. Very sunny and open two bed with clean facilities and a lovely outlook to Harbour bridge views from the bedroom.  Clean, close to beaches bays bondi and breezy. Quiet neighbourhood so really better suited to small families as noise travels a lot through this area Run of the house You have the whole apartment At the Vaucluse cliffs/massive park, minutes to everything (camp cove, Watsons bay) . Spacious apartment with sunlight from all directions. Free parking outside plus loads of public transport - 15 minutes walk to the ferry, 1 min to the bu
neighborhood_overview: At the Vaucluse cliffs/massive park, minutes to everything (camp cove, Watsons bay) . Spacious apartment with sunlight from all directions. Free parking outside plus loads of public transport - 15 minutes walk to the ferry, 1 min to the bus
notes: Super quiet building and very quiet apartment block. It’s above a family with a young child so late night noise isn’t really an option - so quiet after 10pm is a must even on weekends. It's a nice area, warmer and more open side of Vaucluse within minutes to everything
transit: Yes bus stop literally 35 metres from the front door, straight to the city or junction or rose bay, and / or Watsons bay ferry. 12/15 minutes walk to the closest ferry Driving to Bondi or the city is 15/30 min respectively.
access: Run of the house
interaction: You have the whole apartment
house_rules: No smoking that's about it. Not a pet friendly building I'm sorry - if sucks.

host.host_about:
World Travel - 27 countries so far. I live in Vaucluse, Sydney, and lease out my apartment as well as travel extensively. I travel mostly for experiences and work. Happy to help guide you on where to go/what to see in the area - just drop me a line.
Sydney local, seen more than most

reviews.comments:
Kariem's place was cosy and close to the Macquarie lighthouse where we walked to in the morning for the sunrise :) 

Additionally, he has lots of snacks! & a great Xbox system. Also, he gave us helpful suggestions on the places to eat around our area :) Thanks for having us!!

warm and sunny in a great location. Kariam was not there but we enjoyed a relaxing time with a late check out. Nice to walk on the cliffs and visit Watson bay and the waterfront by foot, parking on the street

You get exactly what it says on the tin - with the addition of a most charming host. Kariem seemed willing to do almost anything to make my stay as perfect as possible. I was even taught how to make barista coffee, a serious bonus! 
I was concerned about the cold - but my room was warm and a wool underlay was provided for my bed (I don't like electric blankets), there was heating in the lounge. The apartment gets a good deal of natural sunlight.
I arrived very early in the morning, Kariem stayed home from work to welcome me and make sure I had everything I needed. He even offered to take me into the CBD when he went in.
I can fully recommend this. It is perfect for one person needing to be in this beautiful part of Sydney.
There is also great storage for your luggage and draws as well as hanging.
Kariem was a great communicator and very accommodating. The unit was sunny, very tidy and in a stunning location. Booking and communicating with Kariem was easy.
Kariem was a great host, the appartment was keen, tidy and more spacious than expected.

L’appartement de Kariem est idéalement situé dans un beau quartier calme au nord du centre ville visible par la fenêtre, et tout à côté d’un grand parc qui borde l’océan  et ses falaises magnifiques. L'appartement est grand, très lumineux et bien équipé  et Kariem, que nous avons eu en contact via e- mail uniquement, était très serviable et réactif. Merci pour tout!

Great place. We stayed here a whole month after transitioning  back to Sydney from overseas. I would highly recommend the area especially for nature lovers; cliffs, parks and amazing beaches all at your door step. Kariem had a genuine concern for our well being and comfort during our stay and was very professional and upfront about what the apartment did and didn't offer. I have stayed in many airbnbs in Sydney as I travel alot and so far this has been the most comfortable and relaxing. Recommended.

name: Clean and cheap room
summary: Very close to seaside
space: Very Clean
description: Very close to seaside Very Clean All facilities inside of the flat Whenever you need a help.I'm there Green area Very close to seabus and metro station I have a discount for either airport transfers if you are interested in that please message me.
neighborhood_overview: Green area
transit: Very close to seabus and metro station I have a discount for either airport transfers if you are interested in that please message me.
access: All facilities inside of the flat
interaction: Whenever you need a help.I'm there
house_rules: No smoking inside and please take off your shoes in the flat.

host.host_about:
Hello,hola,hallo,bonjour. I love hosting people from all around the world.

Im a primary school teacher. I love kids and i believe that i'm part of creating respectful,polite new generations with education.
Im doing my master now and its about "teaching Turkish as a foreign language " I really enjoy learning new things..
Im interested to learn Spanish.
Me gusta hablar Español.Yo puedo hablar un poco de español.

Im an easygoing and openminded person.i like travelling and making friends from all around the world.

I have been to 23 different countries and i hope i can see more soon.

reviews.comments: Mert is great. He's very kind and friendly. Bostanci is a very nice district, if you need to stay on the asiatic side of istanbul he will provide good tips about how to get around and you wll feel that your are meeting an old friend. I really enjoy the stay.

Mert is a great host,helpfully and welcoming.his place is very clean,comfortable and quiet.
you can  experience the local live here.I recommend to everyone .


房子坐落在亚洲区,可以白天在老城逛,晚上回到安静的住处｡房东还会请你和他的朋友一起度过快乐的时光｡房东很友好,幽默而且思想很容易沟通｡十分推荐这里,不愧为超赞房东的称号!

Merit, made me feel welcome before I had even arrived. The area is safe, and very close to all modes of transport. Merely a 5 minute walk from the seabuses and ferries. Close to stores, restaurants, cafes.

Mert is a truly pleasant host. He'd do his best to make you feel right at home. He will make sure you are all set (for your exploring this foreign country that is) before he sets you free and be on your own. He tries his beat to answer your every query and when has free time, would try to meet up with you.

[Twas a shame we didn't get to spend more time together even during the parties/events that we were already attending at the same time. Would've been nice to be with a friend.]

If you're not up to walking a few hundred meters to and from the main (transport) road, or you mind walking an inclined path, or you don't think you could handle seagulls in chorus every morning, or you require a very big space in the bedroom or bathroom, or you want to be literally minutes or walking distance from the touristy spots, this might not be the place for you. Otherwise, if you want laid-back, a modest and comfortable bed, healthy muesli and milk with grated chocolates in the morning (haha), a friendly host, and a quiet and unpacked (with tourists that is) neighborhood, then Mert's place is a good option.

See you when you visit Manila, Mert. All the best and keep in touch!
Mert is a lovely guy! He is tactful and welcomes you with open arms. You wouldn't regret knowing him. Plus, I had the pleasure of meeting some of his friends and family and they are as lovely as him!

Staying with Mert is such a right decision I have made. Mert is kind, open and very helpful. His house is located in a quiet neighborhood on the Asian side of Istanbul, right next to the sea, but it's also easy to access to the bus and take a short cab to the metro station. The house is neat and clean, and moreover, it's comfortable and cozy. If u are tired of a bustling surrounding and want to experience the original Turkey, to stay in Mert's place will be a right thing to do. 
Mert 是一个十分热心而又开放的人,他的房子位于一个安静的社区里走四五分钟就到海边了,但又靠近商业区和公共交通,房子里简单而且干净整洁,坐公车或地铁都很方便｡假如你已经厌烦住在挤满旅客的区域,又或者想体验当地的安静生活,去跟Mert一块住｡

I had a very short, one night stay of less than 24 hours but felt at home as soon as I arrived. Mert is a very kind and welcoming host, who tries his best to make you feel comfortable in his very neat and tidy home. The apartment is very well located to all modes of public transport for wherever you want to go in Istanbul. Mert is not only a great host but also an intelligent guy with a good soul. I enjoyed my stay and would recommend him to anyone.

My stay at Merts place was thoroughly enjoyable. The Apartment is spacious, offering exactly things as per the description: a bedroom and a living room. I had my absolute privacy, but at the same time had a fabulous interaction with the host. You can talk about many things with him. He is really nice!. The breakfast you can make whatever you feel like as Mert has all the stuff in his refrigerator. Mert takes personal care and makes sure things are maintained in a clean way. The location is unbeatable, in the midst of all places, close to harbour as well as metro subway. 
      The best part is that he is always available and keeps in touch through (Hidden by Airbnb) and phone call. He is indeed a very good and caring host as he personally came to receive me at the harbour when is was snow storm in Istanbul.
       On the whole to have one of the most friendliest BnB option in Bostanci, you don't have to think twice to book this place.

Halis  was very nice and friendly man .  Although I am an airbnb host, this my fist time  staying  at airbnb. I   had the best time with  Halis , He offered me coffee and tea, then he showed me around the city and the local area .  His place is very nice, clean and close to everything . 
I loved it!!. I will stay there again the next t time I visit Istanbul .

Mert was such a wonderful host. He helped me with all my travel plans and in any way possible when I had questions. I also enjoyed his friends and we were able to do Pilates one day at the house since one friend is an instructor in this. I went out with Mert and his friends for dinner and coffee and enjoyed this time. He even arranged for me to stay with his brother and family in another city here which was very helpful. This is in Kusadasi(Ephesus). 

He prepared breakfast for me that was delicious with coffee too. There was always water available to drink and anything else that I needed. 

His place was very clean and he offered to wash clothes for me. This was so nice of him. 

The area were he lives is near the sea with incredible views of the islands. It was easy to take transport from here also. 

Great host and new friend! I will be back soon to visit my new friends in this beautiful, peaceful city.

Mert var en rigtig god vært. Svarede altid på diverse henvendelser og var utrolig hjælpsom, uanset hvilke spørgsmål jeg havde. Mert gjorde derudover oplevelsen meget nemmere og bedre ved at komme med gode råd, både omkring hvilke ting der kunne være interessante at se, men også i forhold til hvordan man transportere sig nemmere rundt i byen. Det var nemt at komme til lejligheden fra lufthavnen og værten var altid til at få fat på. Sagt med få ord: Mert var en fantastisk og behjælpelig vært!
❤️ils m'y new Freinds
Halis is very great guy. I enjoyed my stay with him a lot. He is very openminded, helpful and caring  person. I wish more turkish people would be like him.

If you are looking for a quiet and safe place, to feel a local hospitality, it will be a ideal offer for you. The home located in a near public transportation, just a 5-10 min walking distance, Bostanci area. The rooms are big and clean, as described by host.
Mert is a very benevolent and sympathetic person, who care about all details for your stay, i also would like to recomend him

Mert's place is in a nice quiet residential area that is near cafes and the beautiful water side. The place is roomy and spacious. The room itself has a very comfy bed too. It's great for me as I have back issues. I sleep so well there. There's access to a full kitchen and a store just a few meters away if you need some food items. 
More than anything Mert is such a helpful, kind man who will assist in any way. He responds quickly to any question and is very helpful with information about public transportation which is great. I've met his mom this time and she is very kind too and cooked several meals for us. She treated me like family just as Mert does. It's near public transport and you can reach taxi, bus, metro or boat in just a few minutes. This was my second stay with Mert and I will stay again with him. Enjoy!

I am so happy I decided to stay at Mert's place.  It was a last minute booking as my plans suddenly changed.  I couldn't have picked a better place to stay.  Mert is a great host.  He is very helpful, attentive, and always available to answer questions.  He goes out of his way to make sure you have everything you need.  I felt like I was staying with a long time friend.  The apartment is in quiet neighborhood kind of in the middle of a very busy area.  It's near the seaside and a main road where you can ride a mini bus to many parts of Kadikoy.  The apartment itself is spacious, clean, and comfy.  Mert gave me free roam in his home.  I had access to the kitchen and fridge, wash machine, living room, balconies, you name it.  To sum it up, I will always consider Mert's place whenever I am in Istanbul.  And if I don't stay at his place, I will still call him to see if he wants to hang out!!!

For a short stay booking, Mert's place was perfect! Located in quiet neighborhood in Bostanci, not far away from Main Street with taxi/public transport to reach anywhere in Istanbul. The rooms are spacious with access to all facilities and amenities. Mert is truly a super host, very hospitable & helpful with everything. Though it was late booking, Mert ensured smooth checkin & had great recommendation of local places to eat. Would definitely recommend lodging with Mert!

Best airbnb experience I've ever had! Mert was an absolute legend. It was my first time in Turkey and I couldn't have had a better person to introduce me to the country. He was very hospitable, a great communicator and always eager for me to hang out with him and show me around. I really hope I get to stay again with him sometime in the near future or maybe even see him in Australia! Cheers, man

Logeren bij Mert was een geweldige ervaring ! Mert is een zeer goede host en een fantastisch mens !
