We can use a good swimming pool and spa and from this place is possible to go walking to Anini Beach and Hanaley Beach Park. It is possible to cross the river from this beach to Hanaley Bay too!
It's a perfect place to relax and enjoy the northshore of Kauai! Everything was perfect!

We stayed for 2 nights. Great location in a quiet district with small holiday condos close to shopping and famous Hanalei beach town. The apartment itself is very cozy and clean. It lacks a kitchen, but that's not really negative, because you are provided with a fridge and small oven on the balcony and microwave in the bedroom. Overall, we were very happy with our accomodation.
A great room in a great location. We really enjoyed staying there. We did not meet Catherine, but all the amenities and accommodations were perfect.

This cozy, clean and well located studio with its spacious balcony really felt like home. Perfect place to rest after spending the day exploring the amazing island of Kauai. Id highly recommend it and would definitely come back. Only down side : it was a bit difficult to find using GPS, we should have read Catherine's instructions first :)

Great experience. Studio exactly as described. Wonderful location, 10 second walk to the pool, BBQ and assigned parking. also waking distance to the Princeville center with shops and grocery stores! :)

This property was absolutely perfect and even better than pics and description. Everything you need to explore the island is here. The kitchen is limited but we new that based on the description and it worked out perfectly for us. The price I feel is right on and we would absolutely stay here again for our next Kauai visit.

Catherine's place was just like staying in a hotel, easy check-in and easy check-out. Comfy bed and lovely area inside or out to enjoy breakfast. We enjoyed staying here while travelling through the North of Kauai. 

Highly Recommended!
Great place.. Clean.. Nice neighbourhood. Small walk to princeville plaza. I would definitely stay here again.

We had a lovely stay. The accommodations were perfect for us and the small kids, just as described. We are pretty close to neighbors so a crying baby at night was a concern but nobody seemed upset. We will be back!!
We had a great time, nice quiet get away.

This space was very cozy and well-equipped, just as implied in the description.  A few things to note: 
1) The beach is a ten minute drive. Do not stay here if you want to walk to the beach. 
2) If you prefer to chat on the balcony after 10pm, be prepared for a resident to yell at you to keep quiet. 
3) The shower pressure is VERY WEAK. 

Other than that, we loved this space.

We had a terrific stay at Catherine's property. Extremely comfortable and well supplied. Excellent communication throughout the stay and easy check in/out. Great location for the Na Pali coast and Hanalei restaurants. The St Regis is a mile walk and has a wonderful sushi offering at the lobby bar. We highly recommend Catherine's place.

The studio was perfect - I was staying by myself, but there was plenty of room for clothes, a breakfast table and a convenient bathroom (along with microwave, fridge and screened in porch). Catherine described it perfectly, and it was very clean and usable. I would definitely stay there again if I am back in the area.
Catherine's studio was easy to find, very clean, well stocked and the bed was super comfortable! We would highly recommend her place to anyone interested in traveling to Kauai!

The place was in a good location with a nice patio.  We enjoyed our stay in Princeville as it's close to some nice snorkeling beaches and the Na pali coast hike.  There is a keurig that had a couple pods for use and basic dishes, microwave, nice toaster and small frig.  Recommend to check out the St. Regis bar for sunset that is right down the way.

The location was GREAT! The units were very close together, it felt like a shared space and unfortunately the walls were very thin. The little children in the other unit were being children and playing, however, it was too loud for me. 

The pictures of the studio apt are accurate, it was a nice room.

I was looking for more of peaceful atmosphere, I did not make an issue of it, I paid for my nights, but chose to stay elsewhere. 

If you need a place to stay, I'd recommend it. Thank you Catherine.
Catherine was a great host though we didn't see her. The apartment was a great location and everything was easily accessible.

Catherine's place is in a nice area and the property feels like an apartment complex. The space is fine if you're planning to spend most of your time out.
Note that there is no AC (not uncommon in the islands) so you'll have the windows open much of the time. This is usually really nice but the trash bins and other units are close by so you'll hear most conversations and anyone who visits the dumpster. There was also some construction going on while we visited that was loud at times.

This was a great, easy, and affordable option in the ritzy Princeville area. The community and grounds are pristine and clean. The host was very kind and gave very thorough instructions and directions to the unit. The unit was clean, spacious, and modern. It is perfect amount of space for 1-2 people. It comes equipped with a fridge, toaster oven, microwave, coffee maker, utensils, plates, etc. To be honest, we didn't linger or hang out much in the unit since there is simply too much to do and see in Kauai, so the unit was perfect to rest your head. The bed was SO COMFORTABLE. I slept like a log every night. I was concerned about the directions to the unit, since another reviewer wrote their GPS didn't work and it was dark out. My phone's GPS worked fine, but I printed directions just to be safe. The street signs in Kauai are hard to see as they are usually several feet before the actual street, so I relied heavily on the GPS for the first day or two until I got my bearings. So, bring a car charger if you plan to rent a car and print directions just to make sure you can get there.

The location was ideal too--it was situated in the middle of the North Shore and about 15 minutes to Kilauea, and 30 minutes to Kapaa. As a bonus, the residence is only 1 mile from the Queens Bath, which is absolutely worth the venture. You could walk there since parking is rough, and you have to hike downhill about 0.6 miles to the actual bath. 

I had no issues or complaints and would definitely recommend this accommodation.
Nice central location with easy parking and logistics (checking in/out, getting the key, etc.).  Space is clean, bed is comfortable and there is a nice deck.

Catherine's place was a perfect spot for a getaway on Kauai. It's nestled in a beautiful part of Princeville right near the golf course and the Westin right down the street, it's even within walking distance to a secluded beach if you can find it! My fiancé and I had a great time enjoying the tropical feeling on the outdoor porch and being within driving distance of some of the greatest hikes and snorkeling spots on this planet was amazing. Could not have asked for a better location for on the north part of Kauai. Thanks again!

I was super happy with the apartment/condo.  It was extremely clean, had everything I needed to make small meals (small fridge, plates, silverware, microwave, etc.).  The outside porch area was also very nice to relax on and also to leave the door open to let the breeze in.  Catherine was very responsive, helpful, and kind in making my stay as easy as possible.  Thank you!

We had a great time on Kauai! The studio was clean, comfy and offered everything we needed. The location was perfect for exploring the island. All in all we very much enjoyed our stay at Catherine's place. Thanks a lot!

We had a great visit here. As Catherine mentions in her listing, this condo was an investment for their kids for the future so it seems to be not lived in, but more so treated like a hotel. Which was great! Princeville is a nice spot to have as a home base. We did not try out the pool, but loved the bed.
I highly recommend brunch at St. Regis, a trek to the Queen's Bath (keep your car parked at Catherine's lot - little parking by the baths) and dinner at Tahiti Nut. Hanalei is nearby and simply gorgeous.
Perfect location and great space.

Easy directions to find unit. Was located within short walk of golf course and shopping center, a few eateries and coffee /bakery shop. 
Luxury bedding and comfort plus. A couple of fans are handy in the humidity. Back porch had small frig and toaster oven. Unit has microwave.
Pool use for guests, key provided. Hot tub was out of service during our stay.
The unit connects to a larger compound of condos. Tenants and short term guests are very near one another. Shares a front porch and wall with other unit. This is not a good location for privacy. However, served our needs and why we visited Kauai.

The studio was in a great location, close to St.Regis and Hanalei Bay, although not walking distance. 
Upon arrival to the studio we though it was a bit dingy but I think it was the brown curtains and old brown breadspread that made it seem that way. The pictures of the studio were the same except for the furnishings. 
The ammenities were great: use of the pool and beach items to use. 
There were dishes and a coffee maker with all of the furnishings. 
The bathroom was clean and shower was nice. 
The studio was definitely great for the price! Thanks Catherine!
Catherine was responsive and the place was great.  Clean, comfortable and in perfect location.

Easy late check-in and the unit is as described. Great location... close to food, shops, gas, the beach, etc. Pool and hot tub were wonderful and the hot tub was working during our stay. The noise level was almost unbearable due to thin walls and the construction workers remodeling the condo across from this unit. If you are looking for a private, quiet, and peaceful location, book a different spot. If you can handle some noise and are a deep sleeper who wants convenience and to check out the North shore, book this spot!

Catherine's Studio was an affordable, comfortable, and clean experience!  The location was perfect for commuting purposes and surrounded by beauty.  Within walking distance to Queen's Bath!   The only surprise for me about this studio upon arrival is that it didn't have a kitchenette, which was an issue as My friend and I planned to make meals here.  Fortunately we were able to get a little creative with the complementary Keurig (an awesome bonus!) to make meals with the hot water.  The studio does have a microwave, a small oven, fridge, plates, and utensils - which was very useful.   Overall, a great experience and will definitely book with Catherine again on my next adventure in Kauai!

Convenient location, clean and relatively quiet.  The unit is near the recycling and trash bins so it can get noisy when people take out their trash and bottles but not a big deal.  Close to everything on the north shore.

I loved my stay at Cathrines place. It was very clean, great linens, filled with everything you need for the beach and close to everything. I travel to Princeville once a year and this truly was a gem. It was quiet and easy. Bed extremely comfortable. 
Cathrine got back to me in a reasonable time frame, but was all business. A bit to impersonal for my taste, but she was good about communication. The place is exactly as described, I would say even better. No complaints other than the vent for the dryer at the next door unit blows directly onto the lani. So sitting on the lani I got hit with the heat when the dryer was on. Outside of that the place was perfect. Thank you Cathrine, I truly enjoyed your place and look forward to coming back again next year.
Great place to stay. Nice balcony to enjoy the evenings. Enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi. Nearby Princeville. Queens bath on walking distance.

Beautiful place to stay, pool is great, room is very clean. Good location in princeville. Beach chairs and towels are provided. There's also a fridge, microwave, coffee machine and a small grill/toaster which were all very useful. Catherine was great with communication.

Awesome neighborhood! Very close to the princeville village to get all the items you might need. Tons of beaches & trails near here & walking distance from queens bath! Not as many roosters up here so no worries on having them wake you up each morning! Cooler, beach chairs, and beach towels were provided with the room so that was a big plus! Thanks for the stay, we loved it here! Mahalo!!

The listing was accurate, clean, and comfortable. The room had modern amenities and is comparable to many hotel chains. The bed was extra comfortable and the breeze that moved through the room was soothing. The neighborhood is fancy, well landscaped, and close to the "Queens Bath", several other beaches, and a local market. We spent most of each day exploring the island, so the room was a great place to relax after each day.  We never met the host; there was a coded lock box with a key waiting for us upon arrival.

Everything was as described and the listing is fairly well priced. There is no air conditioning, which may be an issue for some, but the room definitely cooled off at night. 

Our host was responsive to our messages and we had a great time in the area!

Clean space, comfortable bed, convenient location.  Good value for a basic studio.  We  couldn't figure out how to turn on one of the lights, and Catherine was easy to reach.  The fridge, toaster, microwave, and beach towels were useful, and the pool was a nice perk. I would recommend staying here. Thanks, Catherine!

This place was perfect! Exactly what we needed. Excellent location. Shampoo, body soap, and conditioner are provided along with some nice beach towels, 3 folding chairs and tatami mats. The balcony is huge and wonderful. There's a fridge, microwave, and toaster. The pool and jacuzzi are very nice. The wifi worked perfectly.
Place met expectations and the price was right! The location is great!

We unfortunately had to only stay one night out of our two initially planned nights because of noise issues with the adjoining unit (not noted as joined by a shared interior door in the listing). Catherine gave us a partial refund, but the stay ended up being quite expensive as the cleaning fee and Airbnb fee were not adjusted. We also noted some concerns with cleanliness  and condition that should be addressed and make this unit less appealing than other available Airbnb listings.

Problem areas:
Beach chairs rusty and completely covered in sand upon arrival. Dining seat cushions stained and discolored. The ceiling fan makes an irregular metallic clicking sound that is loud enough to be disruptive to sleep, but given the lack of air conditioning needs to be used to make the space comfortable. The blinds don't go down sufficiently to block the front windows and the curtains aren't sufficiently wide to cover the patio door. SHARED INTERIOR DOOR with the adjoining unit is a huge noise/privacy problem. We found several cockroaches in the apartment (likely due to close proximity to the dumpsters). The area surrounding the shower is badly in need of cleaning -- very dusty and grimy. Crusty stain (semen?) on the duvet cover. -Even small things like the laminated sheet with directions needed a wipe down or just replacement (outdated info, just print a new one).

The good:
Comfortable bed. Location. Ease of check-in.

I'm not sure what the $62 cleaning fee is going toward, but it doesn't appear to be particularly effectively spent. I'm appreciative of the partial refund for the canceled portion of our stay, but I am somewhat incensed that our one night ended up being so expensive -- and in fact, our most expensive night of our vacation, when it fell so short of even basic levels of cleanliness, privacy and comfort. I'm still dissatisfied with amount of refund we received and believe more effort should have been made to make things right, including at least a partial refund of the cleaning fee given the lack of cleanliness when we arrived. There needs to be some attention paid to this apparently neglected unit. It has potential to be a good listing again, but it's not there now.

The room was exactly as described in the listing. It is a nice small space that fit our needs while we were visiting the island. It is in a great location on the north shore close to Hanalei Bay and with easy access to the Na Pali Coast. I would recommend staying here for your north shore adventures.

Here's what you need to know about this rental. The bed is super comfortable and the shower is really nice. There aren't many chickens because it is in a very upscale area. 

The density is pretty high but there wasn't too much noise from neighbors. One night there was no parking available. 

It is a very simple space and the cleaning fee seems pretty high. We didn't hear from Catherine during our stay, but didn't need to.

Catherine's place is exactly as described. It is a small studio, without an actual kitchen, but she has everything you need, minus an oven!, to make your stay easy. The bed was comfortable, there is a small fridge, toaster oven, coffee maker and tea kettle and I believe there is a microwave. She also supplies a small cooler, beach chairs, towels and mats! Great to have someone supply those kinds of things when you are traveling. The condo complex was quiet (we didn't hear ANY roosters while we were there!) and there is a great walking path very near. Great value for the location!

We had a fabulous stay in Catherine's studio apartment . 
It came equipped with everything needed for making coffee, storing and preparing food, picnicking, washing up, ironing and cleaning. 
We needed a couple of things and called Catherine. She promptly bought them over.
The area is scenic and close to great shops . We would definitely stay again. 
Thank you !
Excellent stay. Very clean studio, quiet, very comfortable bed. We would rent this one again. Thanks. Guy & Rosie.
Mit der Lockbox beim Eingang ist das Check-in unkompliziert und einfach. Pool und Whirlpool sind sehr gepflegt. Bequeme Stühle auf dem Balkon. Die Unterkunft ist sehr zu empfehlen.

Catherine's site is in a very nice resort development and is very new and clean. We loved the shampoo too it was great! Catherine was very helpful guiding us to the correct parking lot when our phone navigation got confused. We met her cleaning lady and she was also very nice. We were given a pool key but never used it, there were too many beaches to explore. There was a grocery store nearby as well. We enjoyed our stay.
The place was nice! Simple but had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The private lanai was really great with comfy chairs. Having access to the pool and hot tub was also nice.

The apartment was great! Nice, upscale and quiet location, high ceilings, comfortable bed and nice swimming pool & jacuzzi. The huge balcony with the rocking chairs and the mini-oven were a huge plus. We had dinner on the balcony almost every night! We never met Catherine but communication prior to our arrival was uncomplicated. We can higly recommend this place!
This place was excellent. Exactly as described and close to lots of great things to see and do. Very good value!

The place was nice with all the basic needs for one or two people.  The only thing I would suggest is additional curtains over the Lani sliding door.  Those that are on the door do not completely provide enough privacy.  This room is very close to the pool and hot tub although we didn't get use them due to our lack of time.

Our stay here was pleasant. It was clean, well-described and the shower was a dream. The bed was comfortable and we appreciated the coffee left for us. Only negative comment is that it was difficult to rest as we are accustomed to, due to the constant noise outside. The area is residential and there are always children playing outside. Since we don't have kids ourselves, it is not something we are used to. However if you have children this is a great place for your kids to play with other children.
Great! Super close to Queen's Bath.
Great base for exploring the north shore. Ideal for a single traveler or a couple. No kitchen, but has all the basics- fridge, toaster, kettle.

Great location. Princeville community is visually stunning and very close to all the North Shore action. Great walking and running paths. Good restaurants around either at the Princeville Center or at the resorts. Neighbors were all nice. Unit was clean, bed was very comfy, everything just as described. Will likely stay again!
A good value and place to sleep if looking to spend most of your time sightseeing or the beach. It is not a destination in and of itself.

The accommodations were great for a couple. The location offers great access to walking trails and shops and restaurants. The pool is a great accomplishment. The is a great value for Princeville locale.

Catherine is a great host. Our place was very private and perfect for my fiancé and I. The location was perfect as we love the north shore of the island. The studio was very clean, updated and spacious for just us two. We will definitely come back again!

The description of the unit itself was accurate, however I had 2 issues with this stay, one major one and one minor one. 

The major issue was that the unit has no allocated parking spot. If the property isn't full, this likely isn't an issue. During my stay the property was very full, and since the unit doesn't have a reserved parking spot, one must utilize a visitor parking space. There are only so many visitor parking spots, and once they fill up folks can make up a few more spots under trees, on the grass, or around medians, but even those vanish after a while. After that, I don't know where one could park without worrying about being towed. As such, I felt like I had a curfew during the say and was constantly nervous when out at night that no spot would be available when I got back to the property.

The minor problem was related; the wireless Internet in the unit was VERY slow. Much too slow to stream anything, so since I was stuck in the unit fairly early at night, it got a little boring.

This studio apt. is comfortable. The queen bed is excellent. The nearby pool and hot tub are great. The location is in a residential area with any services a half mile or more away. Unless I'm unaware, there are no self serve laundry facilities closer than Kapa'a, about 25 miles away. Kauai is such a beautiful place that the lack of some conveniences doesn't spoil the overall charm of time spent here. Enjoy!
Fantastic value and location. We needed a clean and quiet place to sleep, we wanted it to be affordable- and we got what we wanted.

Overall, our stay at Catherine's place was great.  Check in was easy and the place is very centrally located, just a quick drive to a lot of shopping and restaurants.  We used the place more as a location to sleep and shower, and were out exploring most of the days, and for that type of schedule, this was perfect.  I am not sure if it would be suitable if you are planning to spend a lot of time in the room.  The only big issue we had, as others noted, was that parking was very difficult to find at night.  Both nights of our stay we came back (around 8 or 9) to find that all the unmarked spots were taken and ended up driving back and forth between the two parking lots for 20 minutes waiting for someone to leave.  One of the nights we ended up parking on the grass because nothing opened up.  A very frustrating way to end the day, especially when parking is a listed amenity.  Other than that, we enjoyed our stay.

The space was clean and as described. The parking is in guest spaces and thankfully there were not that many people in parking spaces so we had no problems. The area is in a complex with many families and the walls are very thin, so we were woken up every morning by screaming kids, which is by no fault of the owner! Otherwise we had a great stay.

What a great setup! All so easy from start to finish. Very cleverly put together by Catherine to give you everything you need for a practical and comfortable base to explore a what is beautiful part of the world.
We loved the pool and lanai. The space was small but very nice.

Overall a comfortable place to stay. No kitchen, but had a toaster oven and microwave for some basic meals which was perfect for us. And the pool and hot tub were an added bonus! Wifi was very slow at times, and it could get a bit noisy from neighbors. But it was overall as advertised.

A comfortable condo perfect for a couple in the picturesque Princeville area. Close to all the northern shore beaches. The check in was hassle free and the condo has all the ameneties including beach chairs, towels etc. We got the parking spot easily on all the nights of our stay. We did not see Catherine but the communication and house manual are precise and clear. We enjoyed our stay.
This is the best value going on Kauai. Great convenient location. The space is small and parking is an issue if you stay out past 7:30. Otherwise a great find!
Awesome place, much better then on pictures
This place is in a killer area. Packed with everything you need for a great stay. Would highly recommend.
Nice room in a quiet location. Close to Queen's Bath and Hanalei.

Handy to where I needed to be, very nice surroundings, and had all the facilities as described (once I looked out onto the balcony to see the refrigerator and toaster oven). I was surprised at the lack of AC but it's normal to go without AC in Kaua'i and maybe all of Hawaii. The fans certainly put in a valiant effort to keep me as cool as possible :-)
I would recommend staying here. It's good value, clean, and comfortable. It also has a nice balcony.

Krisha was a great host. She alway replies promptly to my questions. The location is really good. The room is clean and looks exactly as describe. There is usually parking lots for guests' car. The studio has also a little balcony which is really charming. I would recommend this place to stay!

This is a nice place in a central location. It was clean and the lenai is great. This is a second floor condo and doesn't have air conditioning so it gets a bit toasty during the afternoon. It has a nice big shower and lots of beach gear for you to use.

Great location - very close to Hanalei!!!

Would stay there again.

Really nice location and good accessibility to beautiful areas of the island providing you have a car. Was awoken at 8am by people mowing the grass which was already very short so unsure as to the reason for this. If you have Irish blood do not expect too much sleep as it is very hot and no air conditioning. Obviously its hot in Hawaii so a somewhat redundant comment lol
Catherine's place was just as described, and very clean. Nice lanai space. We enjoyed the pool/hot tub/ BBQ area every evening.

I messaged Catherine to book her place for my friends for their honeymoon as a gift. They said their stay was very pleasant and loved every minute of their stay!! There is no a/c which is the only thing they mentioned, being a bit hotter than they are used to but other than that, it was perfect!

Fantastic getaway for the North shore. Simple elegance surrounded by a park like atmosphere. We ate  romantic breakfast, lunch and dinner on the balcony. It's close to grocery and small shopping center. Try the Dolphin restaurant just 10 minutes away  20-30 minute drive to fantastic snorkeling.

Studio is exactly as described. It is well located in Princeville - a very short drive / walk to one of the best beaches on Kauai via the St Regis. We found the north more beautiful than the south, and fully explored the island from this location. The host provides some excellent wooden beach mats (or chairs). Bathroom amenities are provided and the bed is comfortable. The host is also great at communication if you have any issues or questions. 

There is a nice balcony where the mini-fridge is located to enjoy an evening meal. The place is lovely and great for couples.

As others have stated - there is no AC. The 2 fans suited us just fine. You may have to search for parking if you arrive home after 9:30 pm, but we found parking in the lot every night.

Really comfortable bed. We slept great! There is also no noise from the chickens like there was at other places we stayed in Kauai. If you are planning to cook your own meals, know that there is no stove or griddle, only a microwave and toaster oven.

The room is perfect for us and come as expected. Location is amazing in princeville which puts you very close to Queens Bath and St. Regis for a nice sunset drink every night. But also still give you easy accessibility into Hanalei (less than 10 min drive) for good eats and necessities. Given how expensive it is to stay in the north shore, the studio is really a gem for a no frill clean and practical stay! Also, we didn't get to use it, there is a community pool and jacuzzi too!!

This is a great little apartment in scenic Princeville. Exactly as advertised and it was quiet and comfortable. Nice bed helped me get a great few nights sleep.


I didn't spend a ton of time there except in the evenings but I had no issues.

Was kind of misleading in the sense of I thought I was going to be able to cook my own food there. There is another much bigger condo right next door that this person owns hat has all the amentities such as stove, oven etc.
There was a toaster over and mini fridge on the outdoor patio. Had to was dishes in the bathroom sink. Overall though it was a good stay. A bit over priced in my opinion.

We had a great time staying here! It was comfortable and cozy and met our needs well.  The bed was very comfortable, we enjoyed our time relaxing on the balcony porch and at the pool.  We also enjoyed grilling at the pool and using the beach chairs at the beach.  The hostess (Catherine/Krishna) was quickly responsive to a question we had.  Beautiful area! And close access to the Kalala trail.

Catherine's place is nice. Its location is great and it's clean and comfortable. We didn't have a problem not having A/C but we were there in October and it wasn't that hot. The bed is super comfortable and the lanai is great for hanging out (a sofa here would be a huge plus!). We could do surprisingly much with only a toaster oven but a few more utensils would make life easier when cooking in such a limited space. The bathroom sink is also where you do the dishes but that wasn't really a problem. The one thing is that it's quite noisy. We could hear the next door neighbors as if they were in the room with us and even people who were farther still seemed as if they were in the next room. This did make it difficult for us to sleep and it even woke us up in the middle of the night; if you're a heavy-sleeper you'll be fine, if not, bring earplugs! Overall we enjoyed our stay, Kauai is small enough that you get to the farthest point in ~2 hours but the Northshore is beautiful and full of things to do!
Great, affordable place to stay in princeville.  Nice pool and hot tub were a huge bonus.  Close to the St. Regis, where we went to the bar and watched a gorgeous sunset over Hanalei bay.

Good rental as advertised.  Great location for exploring north shore Good, prompt email communication
Thanks
No kitchen, but good spot for the price.

Catherine was awesome! We accidentally locked out selves out at 10pm, and she still answered my phone call and came to unlock the door! The hospitality was great! It has a great pool and jacuzzi too! So that was nice! But the place was great with a great price! :)

Very very beautiful area and good to get around the North Shore. Good shopping near by. Beautiful room with large shower fully equipped with soap and shampoo and wonderful fluffy towels. She has beach equipment also. That is a plus

Catherine’s place is great and I would definitely book it again. Being on the north side was much quieter. You will definitely need a car staying here, but can get to restaurants and shops pretty quickly. Definitely recommend to others.
Awesome place to add more family to other unit. Worked great
Great place to stay. My wife and I loved the location.

Great location, close to beaches, restaurants, grocery store. Nice pool,hot tub grills and grounds. All the children staying in the complex seemed to be having fun.
Studio is private reasonably priced for Princeville. Take advantage of the beach at the Saint Regis, Anni beach and the state park at the end of road. Good variety of restaurants in Hanalei

I didn’t really have contact with the host. The instructions were thorough and self explanatory. I had one contact call about check in and she responded by phone immediately. 
The price was right. The location was perfect. I was visiting my son staying in Hanalei so I only spent the evenings in the studio decompressing comfortably. The space was great for just me. Complementary amenities like beach chairs and towels, refrigerator, coffee maker and dish ware added to my comfort. It rained a great deal and was cool one evening. An extra blanket on the bed was helpful.

The Princeville studio was nice, as expected - clean, really comfortable bed, great wi-fi (I needed to do some work), wonderful location as a jumping-off point to do North Shore exploring. I appreciated the toaster oven one late night, when I wanted to reheat some manapua from Foodland.

Check-in was a breeze, everything as outlined in Catherine's pre-check-in communications. I arrived when it was island-chilly (lows in the 50s) and was surprised that the unit's louver windows didn't close. There were plenty of blankets in the closet to stay cozy, though, and the rain made for quite a lullaby.

The studio is in a condo complex, and parking could be a little ... competitive ... at times, but I always found a spot eventually. It's not the most cliché Hawaiian vacation place to stay - not jungley, covered in tropical prints, etc. But the price was right, and it was an awesome place to find peace at the end of adventurous days. Mahalo nui, Catherine!
Great location in Princeville near Queen’s Bath and a quick 10 minute car ride to Hanalei. The bed is very comfortable! Would recommend staying here.
Joli studio, très fonctionnel. Bien placé pour rayonner dans le nord de Kauai.
Great location with good food and good beaches.

A lovely place up in Princeville. It was windy the whole week we were on Kauai but this was a nice, quiet place to relax. Bed was a little soft for us but it was quiet, well equipped and a great place to settle into for a stay on the North Shore!

Check in was easy despite my very late arrival. Nice amenities, clean and having a balcony was an added bonus. The location is wonderful , close to many hikes (which is why I came to Kauai.) This was my first Airbnb experience and I am not disappointed.

It is a great location near the shopping center. We had an issue with the Keurig provided malfunctioning and she replaced it with a working one quickly. We also appreciated that she had shampoo, conditioner, body wash, extra sunscreen, and aloe available. We had no real issues or complaints! Mahalo!

Le condo était très propre et au goût du jour. Situé directement à Princeville, la localisation est idéale. Le logement est un peu dur à trouver la première fois mais les indications laissées par Catherine était très claire. Ce fût notre logement préféré de tout notre voyage. La communication avec Catherine était efficace et rapide bien que nous ne l'ayons jamais rencontré en personne. Je recommande ce logement à tous ceux qui souhaite visiter la cote Nord de Kauai!

Guillaume
Fantastic location and Catherine makes check-in and check-out so easy so it makes more time for vacation. The flat and amenities were more than we expected. Great valie.

The location of the studio is beautiful, but there are many things Catherine needs to improve. Her home needs more towels, toilet papers, fixing the toilet, the blowdryer looked very used and unsafe, and the studio was extremely dark, needs more light. Also, she should text to the people who rent their home at least once while they are there and ask if they need anything or just being kind. She should be curious if everything is all right with them and they feel good there.

I had a great week in Princeville, the room is very nice and clean and you find everything you need. The place  is not far away from a supermarket and some shops but to see all the island you definitely need a car. The communication with Catherine was good, got answers always very fast. Thank you for everything!

Had a fantastic stay. Neat and tidy, and in a well kept neighbourhood. Quick 2 minute drive to local shops to grab food, necessities and souvenir. Access to a private pool was great for those lazy afternoons.
Great location on north side and great value!  Has everything you need! We really enjoyed staying here!

We had a nice stay at Catherine's place.

Though we never met Catherine, she was very responsive in email. Check-in was super easy as well.

Everything was as described in the listing. Location was good, a very short drive to everything in the Princeville/Hanalei, which make it convenient to get out and explore the area.

Without AC the room did get a little warm during the heat of the day, but there is a room fan and ceiling fan to help with that. It was very comfortable at night which is obviously most important.

Overall, we had a nice stay, it was just what we expected, and we would come back again.

Catherine's studio is in a great location in Princeville, close to tons of beaches, Hanalei Bay, numerous food/drink options nearby.  She provides snorkel equipment, beach towels, beach chairs, so convenient.  We also appreciated her consistently prompt responses when communicating.  Studio was clean, quiet, and comfortable.  Definitely would stay again whenever vacationing on the north shore.

We enjoyed our stay at Catherine’s place. Princeville is a nice area very close to Hanalei and a grocery store, and the apartment had all the amenities we needed. We felt like we had limited on privacy as the blinds were broken on one window and the curtains on the door to the porch did not cover the windows completely, but those would be easy fixes. Other than that, we had a great stay and loved the apartment!

Last minute plans actually prevented us from staying a night in Catherine’s place. Though we did go into the unit, and everything was as advertised. The place was clean, has a good sized patio/lanai, and the location is in a perfect Princeville resort spot. Short (10-15 min) drive to Hanalei Bay. And even shorter to the foodland area - there’s a gas station/general store there with the best (and cheap) breakfast burritos, which we ate every morning :)
El apartamento es mucho mejor que las fotos. Esta en una urbanizacion preciosa y tranquila. La piscina muy bien. Cama comoda y todo lo necesario. Repetiríamos sin duda!

Catherine's place is great (and so is Kauai). The room was comparable to other places on the island, no stove / full kitchen, but a mini fridge, water boiler, microwave and microwave oven. There's no AC (many places don't have AC on the island) but sleeping at night, even in the summer, was just fine with a fan and ceiling fan. It gets below 70 most nights on the island. The room was private and quiet, with ample parking.

The pool and hot tub were very nice and never crowded. Catherine's place is also less than a thirty minute walk from queen's bath (highly recommended!), which is convenient since you have to drive everywhere in Kauai, and there's usually a 45+ minute, cutthroat, car line waiting to park in one of the few spots at queen's bath. It's also close to kayaking, snorkeling, cozy beach towns, some amazing beaches, and an airport that does helicopter tours. It's also less than an hour drive to Wailua, where there's many scenic things to see.

Be aware that in 2018, until at least (estimated) September, basically anything west of Hanalei Bay is closed except to locals only due to the historic flood damage that has affected much of the island. The whole island is still open for tourism (trust me, you should still go), and there's still plenty to do on the north shore alone, but some beaches and hiking (like the Kalalau Trail) are not accessible.

Also as there is no road going through the middle of Kauai. If you want to do hiking around Waimea Canyon, it's about a 2 hour drive from Princeville, which means you should be ok with getting an early start to your hiking day!
A nice stay.

Great Location, easy to find parking.
Catherine was very professional and responsive to my inquiries. 
It was nice to have access to the pool and Jacuzzi, which I didn’t take advantage of because the ocean was too inviting! 
The studio offers basic amenities, clean linen, large beach towels and snorkel sets that can save you money from renting them (but I always haul my own, so I can’t speak to how good the sets were) handy beach chairs which I also should’ve taken advantage of but I never sat down, there’s too much to enjoy in Kauai than stay seated! 
WiFi sort of slow if you’re attempting to do research on activities or send photos to make your family and friends jealous of your amazing vacation ;-)

I strongly recommand. Amazing place.
Easy access to the pool and the jacuzzi.

The place was tidy and clean. Provides nice bonus features such as beach chairs, snorkelling gear, bug spray, sun screen and aloe Vera, for your stay! Catherine was a good host and quick to respond when we needed help with something. Would stay again.
No kitchen, but other than that, no complaints!

Our stay here was amazing! We were here for two night and we had what we needed. Enough space for our belongings, a comfortable bed to sleep on, a warm shower, fridge, microwave, small oven, patio to air dry clothes, and a fan for the hot nights. It’s located in a very pretty area if you want to explore Princeville and the towns nearby. There are many shops and places to eat minutes away, but plan accordingly because they close early. There was also some beach equipment in the closet, like snorkel gear, beach chairs, and beach towels in case you needed it. The place was very clean and check in and out was made easy with all instructions easy to follow. Thank you for letting us stay in your home and we hope to be back soon!

Catherine's place is as described. The room was comparable to other places on the island, no stove, no full kitchen, but a mini fridge, microwave and mini-oven. There's no AC. The room was private and quiet, with ample parking. Beware that in 2018, until at least (estimated) September, basically anything west of Hanalei Bay is closed except to locals only due to the historic flood damage that has affected much of the island. The whole island is still open for tourism (trust me, you should still go), and there's still plenty to do on the north shore alone, but some beaches and hiking (like the Kalalau Trail) are not accessible. Also as there is no road going through the middle of Kauai. If you want to do hiking around Waimea Canyon, it's about a 2 hour drive from Princeville, which means you should be ok with getting an early start to your hiking day!

Very nice area on Kauai. Loved this cute little condo, the patio is perfect to have a cup of coffee every morning.. the bed is the comfiest bed ever. Parking was always open right in front of the condo. Loved it here!

I had a wonderful time at Catherine’s place. This unit is in a great location, is clean, comfy, and had everything my boyfriend and I wanted to snorkel, go to the beach, keep and prepare food, and relax. I especially appreciated her quick tech support when there was an internet issue. Highly recommend! It was fabulous.

Catherine’s place was simply lovely! Very clean, great location, had all basic amenities you expect. It also has a beautiful terrace. Very nice to hang out there after a hot sunny day at the beach. The pool area is also great - very quiet tho. I will definitely stay here again if I will return to Kauai. Mahalo, Catherine!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Catherine! 

La chambre se trouve dans un complexe de vacances, avec une piscine et un jacuzzi, le top en fin de journée!
Vous serez à 5 Minutes d’un supermarché et à maximum 10 Minutes de Hanalei (ville très chouette, cela dit en passant)! 
Même si la ville d’Ha’ena n’est pas accessible (éboulement), notre séjour à Princeville a été génial! Mahalo Catherine

The good:
It’s in the middle of Princeville, easy access to where you need to go. Bed was super comfy, large nice shower. 
The bad:
Curtain on sliding door was not big enough to cover the window so there were privacy issues, had to prop chair against screen to keep it closed so mosquitoes would not get in, had to wash dishes in the small bathroom sink, deck chairs were broken so if you leaned back you would almost fall over, could hear everyone in to complex. 

Overall it was a place to stay that was clean and had a comfy bed.

Catherine’s condo was a wonderful place to stay during my trip to Kauai. Everything was clean, and easy to find. The pool and hot tub area were great, and I liked being able to grill at the pool area. There was a grocery store right around the corner, which was very convieniant. I would definitely stay here again!

I enjoyed my stay here for two nights.  Everything needed was available.  I was a bit worried about no AC but with the windows open and fan running through it was very comfortable!  Catherine was quick to respond at check in and as needed.

Catherine's place is conveniently located to explore the Northern part of Kauai. We didn't meet her in person, but she always answered very quickly and was friendly. The apartment is suitable for 2 people and has a microwave, a small oven and a small refrigerator which allows to prepare simple meals. All in all, we were satisfied with the stay.
Fantastic location that feels like home while on vacation. Great place to stay!
We enjoyed our time in Princeville. The room is clean, tidy and sufficient equipped. Shopping facilities are nearby.

Cozy unit for a couple with nice balcony, fridge, small electric oven and microwave. The residential object looks new and clean, there is a pool and jacuzzi available. The neighborhood is lovely. Overall I rated this accommodation with 4 stars for 2 reasons: 
1. The apartment was not build as a separate apartment (it is one big apartment separated by doors and wardrobe), so we can heart every single word of the family staying in the second part of the apartment (5AM - TV, shower, talking). 
2. We do not see Catherine, she was just send us a password for the key. Did not ask if we need anything, no tips for Kauai. I get only one message from her and it was answer on my question when the apartment will be ready. 
Anyway I can recommended this place if you are ok with noise from next door apartment and impersonal communication.
Great location that is close to town and local sites. Reasonably priced in a super clean and nice neighborhood.
Great place! Clean, close to Hanalei and lots of great beaches. Would definitely recommend.
Catherine’s place was great! And so convenient to everything.  Catherine was also so helpful.
Clean, comfy, affordable.

You get what you pay for. Location requires a car for everything. No AC & putting that right at the top as this is important most likely every month but Jan-Feb. Bed is comfy and the bathroom was clean & towels were soft :).  Parking spot was easy. However, please note the following: Pictures are not from this unit, but same layout. Many things are broken including the chairs outside, the front blinds, and the screen door takes some oomph per se to move. The linens are a hot wrinkled mess and the dishes are to be washed in the little bathroom sink (read: Do NOT use-- oooh gross!!!). Overall, I am going to pass on Catherine's place in the future.

The studio was very clean and had all the amenities we needed. The location was amazing since it was close to all the shops and grocery store. It is a beautiful area and we would definitely stay here again!

Location... it's great. 10 minutes to Hanalei 13 minutes to Kilauea. That makes the Lighthouse an easy drive. Good snorkling at Anini Beach (until road opens) only 8 minutes away.  The Bistro Kilauea 15 minutes to Happy Hour and some of the best food on the north shore plus meet a lot of locals. Kalypso in Hanalei is another Happy Hour spot with very nice staff and good food and drink. You want to splurge go to the Westin or Princeville Resorts breakfasts (don't miss Puu Poa beach or Secret beach) less than 5 minutes away.  And the condo itself is steps away to the pool/spa... Another place to meet fellow travellers. And your car is parked just 100 feet from the stairs to your door, easy daily unloading and loading.  The unit is cozy comfortable.. largish lanai to sit outside in all weather. View is lacking but just a 2 minute walk up to the main road/park and you'll be quite happy with the view and great walking paths. So it was better than expected. Doesn't exceeding your expectations always feel better!

The place is in a great location and provides nice amenities. The value is very good as well. However, because the metal shutters do not close entirely, you are left with the choice of whistling wind throughout the night, or the open shutter with wind whipping through causing the front door to rattle. We ended up putting a chair up against the door which stopped the rattling. Overall, a nice area for a pleasant stay with everything you could need assuming you aren’t planning on cooking.

name: Newtown Superclean, Quiet, Roof Terrace, One Train Stop City
summary: See yourself in the heart of Newtown in this plus guest favorite, designed for absolute comfort in a security building.  Minimalist fit out with no owners clutter, Mews will feel like your home away from home.  Discerning guests love: Quiet privacy Crisp linen and quality queen size bed The soundproof European tilt door Kitchen if you want to eat in Rooftop views Newtown come explore this walkable suburb just 1 train stop to the city. Sip coffee in some of Sydney's best cafes, stroll to dine at amazing restaurants, gaze at street art, hop on a train to the city and a bus to Coogee beach!
space: Newtown Mews offers 2 units in the same complex- numbers 7 and 14. A big plus is the landscaped rooftop garden with outdoor seating and views to the city. Max 2 adults only in 1 queen bed.  Mews is unique in that it is not in someone else's house- it is your own apartment, designed down to the last detail for absolute comfort, style and privacy. “Newtown Mews" (3km from Sydney CBD ) sets the standard for boutique apartments and is just 2 minutes away from the Newtown train station (1 stop to Central Station). Mews is located on the 1st and 2nd floors of a small walk up complex of 20 apartments set around an internal garden atrium. Mews is designed down to the last detail for your comfort and privacy. You can relax on the large sofa and enjoy the flat screen TV. Mews features a full kitchen (with superior appliances). If cooking isn't your preference, indulge in the many cafes and restaurants footsteps away on Enmore Rd and King St. The bedroom is separated from the living area by a des
description: See yourself in the heart of Newtown in this plus guest favorite, designed for absolute comfort in a security building.  Minimalist fit out with no owners clutter, Mews will feel like your home away from home.  Discerning guests love: Quiet privacy Crisp linen and quality queen size bed The soundproof European tilt door Kitchen if you want to eat in Rooftop views Newtown come explore this walkable suburb just 1 train stop to the city. Sip coffee in some of Sydney's best cafes, stroll to dine at amazing restaurants, gaze at street art, hop on a train to the city and a bus to Coogee beach!
neighborhood_overview: Newtown is a diverse eclectic University suburb with amazing bars, cafes and restaurants, Dendy movie theatre, the Enmore theatre, galleries, gym. Walk to great outdoor pool or gym and cool local shops! Try the most photographed Instagram cake, watermelon! As a guest you will have the opportunity to explore the city of Sydney which is just 1 train stop away (less than 5 min walk to train). You will stay in a safe and well lit suburb and at the end of the day you will return to quiet privacy.
notes: Full info and travel folder in the unit- cleaning and laundry can be arranged for a small fee on request
transit: Newtown Mews is 2 mins from the train station and 1 stop to the city-a bus (370) can take you straight to Bondi beach- if you like to walk you can walk to the city in around 40 minutes!
access: Flexible easy access all hours is offered
interaction: Guests privacy is respected but we are only a phone call or email away to provide local tips
house_rules: Hello Mews 7 is a great place and these rules and requests ensure your comfort and safety. Mews is home to its full-time residents so you must agree to read the check in instructions carefully and respect our neighbours privacy, the directions we provide are detailed and clear so please do not ask our neighbours for assistance.  Please enter and leave quietly and do not drag suitcases on the entry tiles, Mews may not suit you if you can't lift your suitcase and use the wide, carpeted stairs.  I am 60and I manage with no trouble but elderly or frail people may not be able too. We only accommodate quiet, non smoking guests and no parties and booked guests only on site, that means no visitors unless we have agreed to visitors. The rooftop is only available between 8am-10pm and only for booked guests, if you break this rule you will be asked to leave and forfeit your booking. The cleaner comes in after your stay but the unit must be left in a tidy condition, this means as you found it!  i.

host.host_about:
Hi  
I am both a Super Host and traveller, so my places are designed for absolute comfort with discerning travellers like myself in mind!

As a long standing Australian Super host, I strive to offer fabulous, unique, sparkling clean accommodation in the vibrant Sydney suburb of Newtown just 3km from the CBD, walk to Sydney Uni and RPA Hospital.  I have been offering accommodation for 17 years, before Air BnB I was listed on more commercial sites.

My point of difference is I have a ABN and my business is run to a professional standard with correct insurances etc. There are no common shared spaces. You are not squeezing into someone else home! My places are your home away from home.

Having returned from travelling, 3 times to Santa Barbara in 2018, and in 2017  (kayaking in Antarctica and exploring Chile) and having worked in Geneva and NYC, I strive to offer guests what I need myself, a very comfortable bed, quality linen, quiet but interesting environment and a place to eat and work (a real table and chairs!), a couch, outdoor space and Wifi!

Much of my time is spent travelling  and hosting and I also have my own Clinical and teaching mental health practice so I am busy!

Here's my hosting story:

In 2000 I purpose built Studio Q as a stand alone Studio in my garden in O'Connor, a sought after leafy inner suburb with cafes a easy 10 min walk away.  The City is 3km away and ANU a 15 min walk.  This property has been sold but Simon is now hosting Studio Q.

In Newton (Sydney) I have 3 fantastic apartments in the same complex with a roof top garden.  3 mins to the train and on "the strip" of restaurants, cafes, bookshops, movie and live theatres.  Please read more under Newtown Mews listings.

You will find my favourite local tips in each unit (i.e. best local cafes, great walks and the best the area has to offer).  I am a non intrusive host, and available by phone or email between 9-7pm,  I do not offer a 24 hr Concerige service but reviews conclude I am helpful and available in reasonable hours.

reviews.comments:
I had a great stay at 'the mews'. It's a brilliant location surrounded by some of Sydney's best foodie haunts. 

The cow and moon (coffee and ice cream) as well as the stinking bishops (cheese and wine) both deserve a special mention 

Narelle was great to deal with and everything was as described

We did not feel welcome, we lost our way not Narelle's fault but her response when we called her was a put off.  The raising of voice as she questioned how we could loose our way was  unpleasant and unnecessary

Narelle was brilliant. The unit was just what we wanted. A perfect little spot right in amongst the bustle of Newtown. It had absolutely everything we needed. It was spotlessly clean and very comfortable. It was also amazingly quiet, we couldn’t hear any traffic at all even though we were right on Enmore Road. The position was great, with all the restaurants and shops only around the corner, very convenient to everything. Taxis always around, buses and train station less than 50 metres away! We enjoyed our stay there very much. We will definitely be back.  It was really the best way to spend a week in Sydney. Thanks so much Narelle.
Great location, clean and comfortable. Narelle was a fantastic host and very easy to communicate with and very helpful. Would highly recommend!
Great location.  Close to train station, great restaurants and bars.  Very clean and private space.

Narelle was a lovely and highly accommodating host! The apartment was ideal, stocked with everything you might need for a comfortable and homely stay. I have now found my new spot for whenever I travel to Sydney for business! I highly recommend this place to all!
The flat is very clean and super close to transport and amazing food. We love Newtown and will definitely stay again. Thanks Narelle for sharing your beautiful apartment.
Great location, good facilities. Narelle was great at communicating and helping us out:)
The apartment is amazing.  Perfectly placed, amazingly quiet and just so close to everything.  It's my go to place in Newtown. Thanks Narelle.  Again!

This is my second stay at Mews in Newtown now, first in 14 & this time 7. Both stays have been amazing. Apartment is beautiful, central, walkable to anythign you need and the host wonderful. I stayed for business, and will try and book this apartment as often as I can. Everything I need so conveniently located. Thanks Narelle for having me again!
3rd (Email hidden by Airbnb) 7 for business this week. Love this little home away from home!
Narelle was a great host
Another awesome stay at Mews. Perfect little apartment for everything I need. Thanks Narelle!

Five stars. Lovely little flat very close to Newtown station (less than five minutes). Narelle has thought of everything - washing powder, plenty of sockets, small carton of milk - a great host. Small flat but perfectly formed. Very, very clean. Amazing comfortable bed, and nice and dark for a good lie in. Lovely little balcony. Triple glazing to keep out the traffic noise. I was travelling alone and felt very safe. Only issue could be the stairs - no lift - but I'm lazy and I could manage them easily! Highly recommend. I will try to stay here again next time I'm in Newtown.
Another incredible stay at my favourite AirBnb yet! Thanks Narelle for having me

The one bedroom apartment was bright, clean, quiet, close to public transport, and minutes away from many cafes, restaurants and shops. The bed was comfortable, living space lovely and well appointed. The washer and dryer came in very handy. Narelle was welcoming, kind, easily accessible and responsive. Everything you need or want is just minutes away on King street. Will definitely stay there again on my next trip. Thank you Narelle!
Great location.

I've stayed at Narelle's multiple times now for business. This time in particular I was quite unwell the day of check out, and Narelle and Simone were both kind enough to let me check out later and leave for my flight. Thank you so much ladies, for letting me stay longer and for another wonderful stay in your beautiful apartment. I honestly don't know what I would have done without the extended check out! Looking forward to my next already. See you soon!
Beautiful appointed and comfortable accommodation in the heart of funky Newtown. Traffic and street noise due to central location.

Narelles unit is in a perfect location to experience all that Newtown has on offer.
Public transport, cafes and restaurants, bars and night clubs are within a hop, skip and jump.
The unit is modern, immaculate and presented tastefully. Considering the close proximity to the hustle and bustle of street, the units specialised glazed door blocks out all noise. 
The communication from the host was excellent and as a regular visitor to the area we will definately be returning for another stay.
Yet another wonderful stay at Mews. Forgot just how comfy that bed was! Thanks ladies
Loverly place. Very quite inside even though in busy area of Newtown. Great help with checkin and out
It was exactly as I'd expected, because I knew the place well. Spotless. Quiet. Nicely decked out.

Thoughtfully set out, immaculately clean and amazingly peaceful - given that it's right on Enmore Road in what is now the epicentre of Sydney's night life. I wanted some space for reading and reflection and it was just perfect.
Great place, clean very well set up, great location, loved Newtown.

I can't count the number of times ive stayed at Narelle place for business now but never disappointed. Awesome location and that bed is almost more comfortable than my own. Thanks for having me again Narelle!

From first contact through to departure, this was one of the best AirBnB experiences I've had.

Narelle was warm and welcoming with all communication & went above & beyond for a request I had on our check out day - which both myself & my friend (travelling with me) very much appreciated.

The apartment was in a fantastic location within walking distance of everywhere in Newtown & in very close proximity to public transport.
It was also very clean, extremely well-maintained & cozy - just perfect for our visit to Sydney. 

Thank you Narelle for being such a welcoming host - we really enjoyed this visit to Sydney even more so because of this wonderful accommodation & we'll definitely look this apartment up again for our next visit.

All the best,
Matt
Narelle was very helpful. The apartment was clean, compact and had everything we needed to enjoy our stssy.

An immaculate beautiful apartment in the heart of New Town! Excellent for those using public transport or taxi. Parking is difficult in this busy place. Though is we did not meet Narelle she was always at hand with clear instructions. We very much enjoyed our stay.

This unit is fantastic and the location couldn't be better. Narelle made check-in a breeze and was always quick to respond to messages. The unit was clean and very very comfortable. It has a full kitchen which, in addition to grocery stores and bakeries in easy walking distance, make it easy to save money on dining. However, if you want to go out, there are heaps of cafes and restaurants within a 10 minute walk. Easy access to public transportation makes exploring the city a breeze. Excellent!
Super quiet, secure and cute apartment. Awesome location and rooftop garden has wonderful views.
Amazing location and apartment. 10/10.

Perfect stay as always. This little apartment, location, access to shops, restaurants and public transport is the best i've ever stayed in while in Sydney. Will be back again and again! Thanks for having me again, Narelle :)
Clean, central, friendly and amazing location. Couldn't be happier with the ammenities, location or communication with Narelle and Simone.

Narelle's apartment is a great place to stay - just a 1 minute walk to the train and two stops to Central Station.  Newtown has lots of cafes, restaurants and also has a movie theatre - all within very easy walking distance.  There's also a really nice organic supermarket right next to the Train station.  Newtown is well lit and very safe to walk around in the evenings.  The apartment is small but very well appointed, very clean and comfortable.  The apartment complex is fresh and clean and quite secure.  Although the apartment faces onto a busy street it is perfectly quiet inside due to the triple glazing on the balcony door.  I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it.

The apartment is great and ideal for a couple.  We spent three nights there and it was ideal because of it's location - huge vibe in King Street - and proximity to public transport. Would definetly stay again.  Thank you Narelle.
很好的住宿

This is the most wonderful place to stay.  I just love it.  It has everything you need.  Even the little things like a plug adaptor and cling wrap. It is so close to everything and yet amazingly quiet.  I will definitely be back.

A great location in the lively town of Newtown - under 5 minute walk to the train which gets you to central Sydney very quickly, lots of shops and restaurants around.  And a lovely apartment - clean, nice layout.  Check-in is very easy and communications are great.  Highly recommended.
Place was great. Very clean and modern. Close to everything you need.
Had a great stay at the mews, right in the centre of newtown surrounded by cafes, coffee and public transport.  No traffic noise and plenty of space and very comfy bed.

Bom apartamento, bem funcional. Perto da estação de trem, com lavanderia e AC. Acesso só por escada, com malas pesadas acho que seria o único contra. O chuveiro também achei baixo e só tenho 1,70m. Mas ótimo custo benefício.

Great apartment in the center of Newtown. We weren’t familiar with the neighborhood but it turned out to be a great choice. You’ve got all kinds of super hip restaurants, cafes and bars and a lot of small shops. The apartment was super clean and had everything we needed.
Perfect for a quick business trip to Sydney!

We love the Mews! As travelers of a certain age, we were a bit worried that Newtown's energy would be overwhelming, but Narelle's apartment was well-insulated from the hustle and bustle outside. The location would be hard to beat: the wide array of local shops and restaurants had everything we needed, and with the train station a stone's throw away, moving around the city was easy and efficient. Definitely a keeper!

If you need to stay in Newtown then this is the place. It's lovely, very clean, has aircon and is right by Newtown station. Narelle was lovely and very communicative.  I enjoyed it and will stay here again!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Narelle’s apartment! It had everything we expected and some lovely little touches that made us feel at home. The apartment was really close to public transport which suited us. Surprisingly, it was quiet, but also in the thick of the inner-west’s hustle and bustle! I would happily stay here again. Thanks, Narelle! You were so easy to correspond with! I wish you all the best!

The unit is exactly as described and it is excellent. In the heart of Newtown but still really quiet inside and very comfortable. The apartment was very well maintained and we really enjoyed staying there. Thank you.

Fabulous location, very comfortable, clean and enjoyable apartment. Everything has been thought of and we enjoyed the fully equipped kitchen, hot shower and comfortable bed. Stairs are not a problem, they have handrails and even with luggage, very manageable. Great base for exploring Sydney as public transport is at the door, highly recommended.

Smaller than it looks in the pictures. 
Sliding doors around bed are quite inconveniently close to the bed
Quite small bathroom, shower has very little water pressure

Can be almost noise free if door is closed properly
Very conveniently located near train station, bars andrestaurants

It was our second time in Newtown and it did not disappoint! We had some little mishaps with wifi and some kitchen utensils but the host was very quick to respond with solutions and was able to help us whenever we needed it. The house is very close to local cafes and restaurants with ample amount of activities to do with the train station less than a 3 minute walk away. Fantastic service in a lovely home, we would recommend this place to everyone :)

This place is centrally located, super clean and well equipped and also very secure for the solo traveller. I was able to catch a train from the airport and walk only a couple of minutes to the destination. Nearby there are lots of restaurants and cafes, and I enjoyed the food from a different culture every meal. I would happily stay there again.
Smack in the middle of Newtown, yet quiet and modern. Everything we were looking for.

This was by far one of my favourite AirBnbs. It is central, lively and has everything you could need all in a cosy and open little apartment. Thanks so much for letting me stay. I will definitely be looking for this place next time I'm in Sydney.

Een super locatie. Newtown is heel erg leuk om rond te lopen, en het is naast het station, waardoor je ook snel naar andere plekken toe kan.
Het appartement is heel prettig en het bed ligt lekker. Het straatverkeer is wel vrij luidruchtig met de ramen open. Maar met de ramen dicht heb je er geen last van.

Loved staying at Narelle's place. The location is unbeatable, the triple glazed balcony door really does keep out all the street noise. Lots of thoughtful touches like a well stocked kitchen and bathroom, and little things you might not have with you such as spare Opal cards and an umbrella. Self check in/out made everything easy. Also a very stylishly decorated and clean place, it was a very enjoyable stay.

This is the best location I could have imagined!  Less than a block from the train with direct service to the harbor.  But Newtown is a great place to hang out with many great restaurants and cafes.  Narelle and friends are responsive.  The place is neat and clean as advertised with the bonus of a comfy bed.  I recommended it to friends.

The apartment was very safe and cosy. I was staying on my own for 2 weeks and loved the convenient location to all public transport, restaurants and shops. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it and would definitely book again!

The unit was very clean, well designed and remarkably quiet while being at the heart of Newtown. It is close to public transport and all the amenities of Newtown. Narelle was a very responsive host, she replied to emails promptly and checked with us that all was well during our stay. The self check-in instructions were clear and easy to follow. Narelle had provided a short list of things to do in Newtown. We know Newtown well having visited a couple of times before, so my only suggestion for improvement would be some more comprehensive information about Sydney. Otherwise I wholeheartedly recommend this unit to other travellers and would definitely stay here again.

This place is great, location is hard to beat and the place has everything you may need for a stay in Newtown. Is clean, well planned and secure. 
Definitely will stay again!

We really enjoyed our recent stay at Newtown Mews. Great location, very clean, several clever uses of space, and nice amenities. We loved the neighborhood and the apartment and would highly recommend to others!
Exactly as described. Would recommend
lovely space and location!
Narelle’s place is clean, tidy and cosy! Perfect location to experience all that Newtown has to offer.
Nice 10 days with a nice room!٩(๑^o^๑)۶
Narelle was a wonderful host, quick to respond to any enquiry, the place is so neat, clean and homely. My partner and I enjoyed the locAtion and the night we cooked the most. Everything was spot on!!

Really a perfect place to stay in terms of location, facilities, value and comfort.  Communication was very clear from start to finish.  Slept brilliantly every night and really appreciated the fact that Narelle gave some of her local recommendations for Newtown.  Proximity to the train station means that you can be in the centre of Sydney well within half an hour.   Strongly recommended!
An excellent apartment, great location near train station, bars and restaurants. Would stay again.
Great location in a stylish space

The Airbnb was absolutely perfect! I stayed for two weeks and it couldn’t have been better. The location is incredible, so central and the place itself is incredibly clean and has everything you need. The rooftop is also an amazing addition. Loved it.

This is a gem of an apartment in an outstanding location.

The apartment itself, while a studio, is bright, spacious and tastefully decorated. Every amenity you could desire is provided, including a very well-equipped kitchen, a nice bathroom, and a good sized washer/dryer.

While the apartment is on a busy road, none of the street sounds come into the apartment when the balcony door is closed.  The building is upscale, quiet and maintained well.

Which brings us to the location. I've been to Sydney several times, but this was my first experience in Newtown. It's simply wonderful.  Within steps of this apartment are countless good restaurants, many moderately priced by Sydney standards.  If you plan to do some of your own cooking, there are decent markets within walking distance.  While the apartment is not located in the main tourist areas, they are readily accessible by public transportation.

Finally, Narelle is a superb host. While we never met, she was extremely gracious in our written communications and responded promptly.  I  felt quite welcome in her apartment and would have no hesitation about booking this unit again in a future visit to Sydney.

Very highly recommended!

Great place, superb value! I highly recommend that you go visit the rooftop terrace of the place, as it's lovely up there and exposing yourself to the sunlight (with proper precautions like 50+ Australian Cancer Council sun cream, a broad-brimmed hat, and some water) will help you get over your jet lag. Having the washing machine and drying racks for laundry is especially helpful for the compact traveller who doesn't bring much but does have to wash clothing often enough. I also loved the little terrace off the condo unit, where I had my breakfast every day. So wonderful! Give it a go! It's a great listing!!

The apartment is very well-located, comfortable, cool and well-equipped. Narelle ensures everything runs smoothly and easily. I stayed five nights, and the apartment is equally well-suited to shorter or longer stays, with everything guests might need. The local neighbourhood is terrific. The apartment is located on a busy road in a bustling area, but the sound-proofing is excellent, so you have the benefit of being in the middle of a lively local scene while the apartment is calm and quiet. Recommended.
great location and apartment! we really enjoyed our stay in sydney.

Narelle was a fabulous host, always responding quickly and made check in and check out easy.
Narelle's place was lovely. It was small, but had everything you need if you're on your own or with someone. It is close to trains and buses which take you straight into the city centre. The door blocked out most of the noise and there was a fan and air-conditioning, so if you can't handle the noise and it's hot, you can close the doors and still be cool. 
I would definitely stay again and would recommend it to anyone else travelling to Sydney.

Narelle's apartment is a such a gem! Her place is tidy, stylish and she is extremely responsive. It is located in the heart of Newtown, literally steps away from cafes, restaurants, great indie shops, bars, supermarkets, etc. Everything you can possibly need is so nearby. It's also about a block away from the metro which was is so convenient to travel around Sydney. Though she is located on a busy street, you would never know it because her soundproof sliding door blocks out all noise and the place is very quiet (a must for me and my husband). We really enjoyed our stay here and I can't recommend it enough!
This is a great little place to stay...handy to transport links and in a vibrant part of Sydney. Loved our stay!

Looks just like in the photos, has everything you need (even fresh milk in the fridge!), clean, very central location right near Newtown station and surprisingly quiet with door closed or just tilted open, considering the busy street below. Also very good communication & quick resolution to an issue that arose with the downstairs lock. Definitely recommend!
Narelle is a great host, lovely and clean and in a fantastic location

Narelle は素晴らしいです｡
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝもﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄもｽﾑｰｽﾞに出来ました｡

お部屋も綺麗で静かでした｡
近くにたくさんの良いｶﾌｪやﾊﾟﾌﾞがあって､食べ物に全く困りませんでした｡

ありがとうございました｡
またｼﾄﾞﾆｰに来た時は､ここに泊まりたいです｡
Very stylish apartment in fantastic location.

Super convenient place!! Right next to train station, so you could easily get to and from everywhere. Also, Newtown is a really neat and quirky area! The place is a great, quiet home base for Australia adventures :)

Narelles Airbnb was the perfect little home away from home! The location was absolutely perfect for us as it was central to everything and had a train station less then a 5 minute walk away. Would highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone :)

name: The Notorious B.N.B. { The William Henry }
summary: Queen room - private bath  . Rate - $259 nightly . Shared house
space: {BEST OF NEW YORK}  The 10 Coolest Airbnb Rentals in New York  Timeout New York, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  "Staying with Jessica at the historic mansion was quite a remarkable experience. It was not only one of the nicest homes I have ever stayed at on Airbnb, but Jessica made one of the best breakfasts that I have ever had . . . better than any breakfast spot we found, so if you stay here, I recommend sticking around for breakfast. The photos do not do the first floor justice. It is massive, but also very charming. We stayed in the top floor, and the room was beautifully designed and arranged for us. After staying with Jessica, I would recommend it as one of the best Airbnb's in New York, and a must visit if you want to experience the authenticity of a Brooklyn brownstone neighborhood, the charm of an historic mansion, and the soul of Jessica's hospitality. In other words, this is a 6 star experience, even though we only allow 5 stars to be left."  .  Brian Chesky, Co-founder a

neighborhood_overview: Voted Brooklyn's Most Livable Neighborhood by L Magazine. . This is the best neighborhood in New York City. It is friendly, diverse, laid-back, and urban. The restaurants are great. The people are wonderful and the architecture is beautiful!
notes: 1. We have an energetic Boxer who stays on the first floor. 2. Guest rooms are second, third and fourth floor walk-ups. The top rooms are an 80 step climb. 3. City living can be dusty. I have high ratings for cleanliness but living in a house that was built in 1887 that is on a street with traffic makes it a challenge. 4. Guest rooms do not have televisions or telephones. 5. Additional fees apply for events, photo and film shoots.  6. All shoots and events must be booked prior to arrival. 7. Non-guests visits must be approved by owner. . (Photos by Peter Margonelli and Connie Zhou)
transit: G and C trains, local taxis, Uber, Lyft, walking and bicycling.
access: Guests have access to the living room, tv lounge, dining room, kitchen, garden and billiards room in addition to their guest room.
interaction: As much or as little as you like.
