The room is stocked with everything you could need for an enjoyable holiday, from beach towels and a bag to carry them in, to surf toys to play with while in the water, not to mention, everything you could need to cook in the kitchen, or to get yourself ready for the day in the bathroom.  Huge TV to enjoy cable programs on as well. 

We went to Costco and got a few fixings for Christmas dinner and made a feast right there in the room, and had our meal on the 10th floor veranda overlooking the beach and front and center views of Diamond Head, dining with my 87 year old aunt and my mother on Christmas day and ...seriously...couldn't have asked for anything better.

The front desk staff were lovely and the manager really helpful (especially when we blew the breaker on Christmas Day)  

Thanx for having us, Judith.  All the best with your future guests.
Great hospitality and communication. It is a wonderful location situated close to all the main attractions in Waikiki.
Great place, so close to beach, superb location.

Location location location. Judith's home was the perfect spot for our Honolulu visit. Loved that it was at the far end of the strip with fabulous views of diamond head and the ocean. Small but clean and fantastic value.
Perfect position

This is prime location, just blocks from the beach, and right next To restaurants and Starbucks. The host provided tons of conveniences such as beach towels, cooler, toiletries, hair dryer, etc. Enjoyed my stay!

Centrally located in the best part of Waikiki, yes there are a lot of people, but this is the end of the strip so it’s not nearly as packed. This place is a hop, skip and jump to the beautiful beach. Parking on the street is free after 6pm and there’s always some spots, just have to move the car before 7am and the zoo lot is $1 per hour. My boyfriend and I went to Safeway our first night and bought some food, which this air bnb had everything we needed to cook and save some $$ for activities. Seriously, I’m going to miss this place and would suggest to anyone staying for their first time in Waikiki to stay here! Go up to the 10th floor and enjoy the view and go to Hulas and get a cheap drink at the end of the night. 

Mahalo!

Location, Location, Location!!  The convenience of this place can’t be beat.  It was so worth it to rent a car and get a parking spot at the garage. Really loved having the option to cook my breakfast in the kitchen.  All the extra toiletries, sunblock, and refrigerated aloe for my burnt skin was a nice touch!  You thought of everything!!  Thanks!!

This condo is small but updated with everything you need included. There was plenty of storage for our clothes, plenty of towels, floats for the kids, iron, shampoo, hairdryer, beach chairs and even an umbrella, if needed. The kitchen has a microwave, stovetop, coffee maker, fridge, pots, pans, utensils and tea and spices. There is no view but there is sitting area on the rooftop with probably one of the best views going. It’s a great place to enjoy your coffee in the morning while the sun comes up or a glass of wine at sunset. All in all this was and the great location, makes this a really good place to stay...
Gorgeous studio in a great location across from beach and walking distance to amenities.

My wife and I rented this place for 6 nights and we really enjoyed it. It's conveniently located in a hotel where you can walk to the beach within a couple of minutes. The host communicates well and provides many things for you, even slippers, mat, beach chairs, beach towels, etc. There are many shops and restaurants around there. If you rent a car, you can park on the left side of Monsarrat Ave. (by the Zoo) for free but depending on which time of the day. Just make sure you get back to Waikiki before 5 pm or 6 pm to find a parking spot there. The city bus stop is right in front of Waikiki Grand hotel, too.
I would definitely recommend this place.

location, Location, LOCATION!!!!! This is an amazing location to stay at in Waikiki.  It was close to both beaches and shopping.  The front desk was always helpful and kind.  Judith and family communicated quickly and made check in/out a smooth transition.  We will definitely consider coming and staying here again.  If you are looking for a great place to stay with an amazing location, look no further!!!! :)

We traveled to Oahu Hawaii for five days to celebrate our birthday's and had the best time. Judith's place was the perfect location and perfect size for two people.  It was literally right off the Waikiki beach, walking distance to many restaurants, shops, transportation etc. We utilized public transportation to and from the airport, and malls with ease, as the bus stops were super close. Judith offered beach towels, chairs, floatys and everything needed for fun in the sun. The balcony added a nice relaxing touch after a long day of outings. Decor was nice and the condo was clean, just as advertised. The hotel (condo inside Waikiki Grand Hotel) staff were friendly, set us up with a snorkeling tour to Hanauma bay, and after check out they kept our luggage until we headed to the airport later that evening. We were even able to get picked up from our hotel to go skydiving at Skydive Hawaii on the North Shore. Judith and the family communicated well, especially prior to our trip. The only concern was that the WiFi did not work for us. However, it wasn't a big deal as we were there for vacation, not work. We had a pleasant stay, the outside environment was lively, but inside was nice and quiet. We recommend others book Judith's place, and we would definitely return upon our next visit!
Un lugar increíble y super confortable
Har inga synpunkter alls, lägenheten var precis som lovat i annonsen. Mycket snabbt svar från Judith. Smidiga incheckningen var ett särskilt plus hos mig, samt det oslagbara läget givetvis.

We stayed at Judith’s for 10 days, it was our first time in Hawaii and her place was perfect, and exactly as described. Close to everything, we could walk, or even use public transit which was just steps from the door to the Diamond Head hike, Dole Plantation, Lanaiki Beach. Her place had everything we needed. We had an amazing vacation! Thanks Judith!
We would book this room again - great location, good value for the $.
The room was great- perfect location, close to shops and tour pickup location is right around the corner. Very clean and beach equipment was provided! Would highly recommend!

Judith’s place was great, really close to everything! The apartment is pretty compact but it’s comfortable enough for one or two people. 
Thanks so much!
Great Location & value. Small but cozy room

Judith’s place was great! Can’t beat the location. Everything was clean and we appreciated the beach gear available for us to use. Kitchen is a bit small but fully functional and fit our needs. Would definitely recommend and stay here again !
Cozy place to explore Waikiki and Honolulu from! Would 100% recommended.
Great location, however the bed was pretty hard, which made hiking and other activities hard to do. The view out of the balcony is not diamond head, it's the view from the viewing dock of the hotel.
Very fast response when having any problem!

Judith’s place is very comfy and perfectly located in Waikiki. All of the details in the home are so helpful when you are on vacation (especially the body board and chairs!). Would highly recommend staying here

This was a great first time experience for my fiancé and I! We didn’t know what to expect from the outside of the hotel (its bit older of a building) but the room itself had everything you need for a short stay. The location was the highlight for both of us. You are literally a block away (within eyesight) of the beach, right next to the ABC store for convenience of water or snacks, Starbucks around the corner and all sorts of shops and food for any time of day! The only confusion we had was at check in we thought we had to go to the front to check in but it ended up that we just had to go straight to the room and just type the code. We even had good luck finding parking on the street to avoid costs! But again, everything is walkable (we didn’t have a car for the first three days) so a car is not entirely necessary. Finally, if you wanted to do something outdoors and touristy, we walked from this spot to the peak of Diamond Head and back. Round trip is 7 miles. Highly recommend it and it’s easy for anyone of any athleticism! All in all I would say five stars and we will be back :).

Thank you Judith for letting us stay at your apartment,  the room had all the amenities and more importantly was comfortable for the two of us, it felt like a home away from home, situated just meters away from the  beach and main shops. ..the staff were friendly and helpful that answered all our questions which made our holiday at this establishment enjoyable, we will definitely be wanting to stay here next time we're in Hawaii
Mahalo
Marie and Sam

Judith's studio is  perfectly located and had everything that we needed.
The Southern end of Waikiki is much less populated, but is still close to everything. The salt water pool is a great spot for a swim at any time of the day.
Sunset swims were the best though!
TheBus stops and picks up within 50m to 200m, for just about anywhere you want to go.
We would happily go back.
We loved the place!  Great, quiet location, and super clean!  Thanks again!

Super stylish! This Airbnb is compact, but was just enough for me and my guest to crash in after a long day exploring the town. It’s a 5 min walk to the beach and easily accessible to eateries and convenient stores. Our only issues was the parking (which is a struggle all over Waikiki), however the parking lot across the street saved us! Would recommend this spot to all of my friends and family.
Great location and lots of amenities. A must stay if you are looking for easy access to the beach, bars, etc.

Booking this room through Airbnb streamlines the check in process!  As advertised, you are steps away from Waikiki Beach and all its lively attractions. Restaurants and convenience stores are everywhere!
Our only issue was handled with speed and professionalism. (Lock code). 
Expect to pay more for Uber and Lyft transportation, if you’re not from a big city. However, it appeared that navigating the city and parking would be nerve wracking. 
Have fun.

Exactly what the ad says. 

It was perfect for me and my wife. But would be too small for anyone traveling with more than just two people.

The room is very lovely. The location is great and we stayed one week for our honey moon. I will recommend to my friends. Its in side of grand hotel and you can access to hotel facility like laundry and pool etc. You do need to make in advance parking reservation  thru hotel for the parking is very limited especially during weekends just as Judith mention when we booked.

La ubicación es muy buena y el apartamento muy limpio y agradable pudiendo encontrar accesorios para la playa, champú, acondicionador, gel de baño, productos de limpieza. Todo lo necesario para una estancia agradable.
Amazing location!! Airbnb is nice and clean. Really enjoyed having beach supplies including chairs and floats already available for us!
Decent place for great money. Great location!

We just checked out of Judith’s place and we had the most wonderful stay. It was an easy check-in process which was nice as our flight didn’t get into Honolulu until about 10pm. Great essentials located in the room which are available to use (beach towels, beach chairs, umbrella and cooler) You can’t beat the location... steps from the Starbucks, ABC stores, LuLu’s Bar and most importantly the famous Waikiki Beach! We would highly recommend this Air BnB to anyone looking for a great place to stay at a reasonable price!

The location is perfect! It is near everything and you have teddy’s ( you just really have to try the burger), tucker and bevvy for smoothies and acai bowls, subway, and a whole lot of restos along the kalakaua road. 

The beach is just very very near and it is also a few steps away from the bus stop. It is also near ABC convenience store — well, youll see a lot of those across. 

The nice touches of sunscreen, various sun care products are really nice.

I would come back here, definitely!

Great location! Being on the edge of all the action in a slightly older building and just outside of the more luxurious center of Waikiki meant there were fewer clusters of tourists outside the hotel and driving in and out of the area to go other places was a snap.  I walked through Waikiki every night and was happy to return to my room in a slightly less crowded spot with the beach and zoo just across the street.  If you’re looking for a 5 Diamond room this isn’t for you, it’s small and in an aging (but well kept) building but if you’re looking for awesome value and a killer location for access to Waikiki shopping, restaurants, and beaches as well as ease of getting in/out of the area this is a great option.  The places was clean and had everything I need.  I felt safe and comfortable. The only thing I wish it had were cotton sheets instead of microfiber bedding, that stuff was sooooo hot I ended up sleeping on top of two breathable cotton towels but I tend to sleep hot.  Parking was also easy to reserve and reasonably priced for the area (just make sure to call ahead and know that the smaller the car the better for tiny city parking stalls).  Hope to return!
Great location, had a pleasant stay. Thanks Judith

Great location
Park at zoo parking

Perfect place for two people! We had everything we needed. I wished we had an ocean view but we just went up to the 10th floor to the sundeck. Our favorite part was the location of the hotel. It was right near the park and beach and we were easily able to walk everywhere.

A beautiful studio at a quiet section of Waikiki Beach - the perfect location!
Beautiful view of Diamond Head and sunsets from the 10th floor deck. 
Judith and Danny have provided all the little extras: cooler, beach chairs, boogie board...

A wonderful studio in a quiet building with great staff!

schönes kleines Zimmer.
Lage ist kaum zu überbieten.  1min zum Strand.

sehr sauber und alles was man braucht 

nur 2 Kritikpunkte

1. das Bett war für uns ein bisschen hart aber das ist Geschmackssache

2. Man sollte Ohropax mitnehmen. die Hotelklimaanlage ist nur 2 Etagen tiefer auf dem Dach und deutlich hörbar 

wir kommen wieder
Space is not big, but it locates at a very good spot - 3 mins walk to the beach! Nice place to stay!
A small well stocked apartment in a great location and very reasonably priced.

This place was exactly what we were looking for.  A great location with enough space for the two of us.  Clean with many extras including beach chairs and a guest book with great tips on what to do while on the island.  Would definitely stay again!!
Muy recomendable para parejas que desean disfrutar de Waikiki. Todo accesible.

Small and tidy.  Perfect place for a few nights in town.  
Great location near restaurants, beach and entertainment. 
Make sure to reserve underground parking ahead of time!! you will save money and time trying to find street parking.
Great location and cute space!

Judith’s cozy studio is the perfect size for two people! It’s in a great location where all the restaurants, bars, and beaches were walking distance. Judith supplies everything you need to hit the beach: towels, chairs, sunscreen, to name a few. There are also public bikes nearby that you can use to get around which came in handy. I definitely recommend staying here!

name: Charming Apartement
summary: Apartamento de Luxo ,a 5 m da praia ,desportos náuticos(vela, surf, windsurf, bodyboard, etc). bares e restaurantes, com piscina e zona verde. A dez minutos da zona histórica do Porto. Totalmente mobilado e equipado para uma bela estadia! Desfrute!!!
space: The tranquillity of the surrounding area (Beach and field), access to  Oporto (tourist area) at 10 m. Casino and golf at 10m and 5m. Bares , restaurante and supermarket at 5m.
description: The tranquillity of the surrounding area (Beach and field), access to  Oporto (tourist area) at 10 m. Casino and golf at 10m and 5m. Bares , restaurante and supermarket at 5m.
access: Acesso a tudo
interaction: Sempre disponível
house_rules: Indicada á chegada

host.host_about: Adoro viajar ,conhecer pessoas de outras culturas , trocar experiências.

reviews.comments: Het appartement is ruim en mooi, het ligt echter wel vrij ver van Porto af, dit is op te lossen met taxiservices als bijvoorbeeld Uber. De verhuurder Jorge is aardig en staat altijd voor je klaar/is bereikbaar. De geluidsisolatie in het appartement is niet geweldig, maar dit valt weg denkend aan de smartTV, het zwembad, het terras en de badkamer(s). Het is ook slim om goed inkopen te doen, de supermarkt is namelijk niet om de hoek (Al is een ritje met Uber ook niet al te duur). Restaurants aan zee zijn ook aanwezig en opzich prima te bereiken, al is het wel handig wanneer je hiervoor een wat dikkere portemonnee hebt.

Beautiful appartment, very,very spacious. We always went out for dinner,but cooking,bbq'ing, everything is possible! Jorge is very attentive, when we had trouble opening the high tech lock on the door he came asap 'to the rescue'. The pool was almost completely for ourselves during the week(in July!!!!), during the weekend there were more people using it, but still ok. Terrrace is vast and very nice to have breakfast or dinner, electric shades keep the temperatures ok during hot weather.
We would come again, any time. 
Thank you Jorge, you were the perfect host!!

Nous sommes restés 2 semaines chez Jorge.
Jorge est très sympathique, accueillant et toujours disponible!
L'appartement est spacieux, très moderne, propre, avec une piscine presque que pour nous ! La mer est à 10 minutes à pied par un petit sentier et Porto à 15 - 20 minutes en voiture par la plage. Les photos sont conformes à la réalité.
Si vous aimez courir ou faire du vélo, il y a une piste cyclable/piétonne tout le long de la plage et le soir c'est très très agréable !
Porto est une ville magnifique et nous avons beaucoup aimé ce voyage.
Merci beaucoup Jorge!

Grande disponibilité et accueil sympathique de Jorge. Conditions commerciales strictes, sans souplesse possible. 
Demande pour départ anticipé refusé (incendies de foret à proximité, fumées, cendres ...).
Appartement spacieux et de qualité, mais sombre. Manque de luminaire dans la pièce de vie et + de la moitié des ampoules grillées.
Ustensiles cuisson et coussins du mobilier extérieur à revoir. Chiens du voisinage aboient du matin au soir, quartier en cours d' aménagement ne correspond pas à un environnement de vacances, mais logement d' habitation. 
Accès Porto facile en 10 minutes de voiture longeant la mer, belles balades et running, parking facile

¡¡Muy recomendable!!

Hemos pasado 4 días en el apartamento de Jorge, y la experiencia ha sido genial.

Por un lado, el apartamento: excelente ubicación, en una zona muy tranquila (hemos llegado a pensar que no había vecinos, por la ausencia de ruidos), a 5 minutos a pie de la playa. La parcela dispone de piscina y abundante césped,  y está muy bien cuidado. Y el apartamento, como se ve en las fotos, es muy acogedor, con materiales de calidad, muy luminoso, limpio y con todo lo necesario para pasar unas buenas vacaciones. A destacar la gran terraza, donde se puede comer o cenar disfrutando del clima.
En la zona de playa hay una gran oferta de restauración (bares, chiringuitos, restaurantes...) Recomiendo el Pingo de Fogo, de comida brasileña, el Vintage Praia, con sushi, y el Daikiri, para tomar algo a pie de playa.

Por otro lado, el propietario, Jorge: Muy agradable, muy atento y siempre dispuesto a aconsejarte, ayudarte y mostrarte todo lo que necesites de la zona. Hemos tenido mucha suerte. No hay muchos anfitriones así. Nuestras vacaciones no hubieran sido lo mismo sin él. 

¡Muchas gracias,  Jorge!

Estancia perfecta!
Hemos estado una semana en el apartamento de Jorge y la experiencia ha sido maravillosa. La casa es moderna, con muy buenas calidades, amplia, luminosa y tiene todo lo necesario para sentirse como en casa. Las habitaciones son amplias, los baños están muy bien y lo mejor de todo la terraza. La urbanización está muy cuidada, con amplias zonas verdes y una piscina enorme que además hemos disfrutado casi para nosotros solos. Está muy bien situada, a pocos minutos de la playa, con kilómetros de recorrido para pasear, un buen carril bici, buena oferta de restauración y cerca de varios supermercados. La zona es muy tranquila, por lo que a la hora de descansar no se oía ni un solo ruido. Al estar tan cerca de Oporto, 15 minutos en coche, da opción a disfrutar de la ciudad y hacer turismo durante parte del día, y el resto del día descansar y tomar el sol o bañarse. En cuanto a Jorge, es un anfitrión estupendo, muy buena gente y siempre pendiente de lo que pudiera hacer falta, muchas gracias por todo!!
Jorge es muy buen anfitrión, todo lo que necesitábamos allí estaba. La casa estupenda!
Very comfortable apartment, great terrace and rapid pool access. A great setting for a relaxing holiday.

Jorge has been the perfect host, welcoming us when we arrived and giving us a tour of nearby spots on his Vespa, and then taking us in his car for our vacation grocery shopping! More than we would have dared to ask.

Apartment is great and very modern, with an amazing terrace and nice swimming pool.
We would recommend to rent bicycles to travel around, between beach and Porto (10kms away).

Highly recommended place!

It's a great apartment, pool and surrounding gardens. The terrace is amazing - perfect for watching sunsets with a glass of wine, whilst the kids play in the garden and pool.
It's peaceful during the day and very quiet during the night.
Jorge is always looking out for your well being and was flexible with our requests.
Will return.

The apartment is very spacious, the pool and the gardens are well maintained. It takes about 8 minutes walking to the beach and the strand bars. It's peaceful during the day and very quiet during the night. The terrace is beautiful. Jorge always responds within an hour and when we arrived, he took us to the hot spots of Vila Novo de Gaia. He arranged bicycles, which is a great way to explore the surrounding. Porto is about 10 km. Perfect stay!

Cuando llegamos Jorge estaba de viaje, por lo que nos enseñó la casa un amigo y sus 2 hijos muy amablemente. Nuestra primera sorpresa fue cuando le pregunté por el garaje y me dijo que no había y que lo dejáramos en la calle ya que no había problemas de aparcamiento, es verdad que todos los días dejamos el coche en la misma puerta, pero nos fastidio un poco ya que el garaje era uno de los motivos por los que habíamos elegido este piso y no otro. En fin...
La casa está muy bien, es exactamente igual que en las fotografías, pero nuestra siguiente sorpresa fue cuando fuimos a cocinar, ya que íbamos con una niña pequeña, y comprobamos que todas las sartenes y cacerolas estaban completamente inutilizables, completamente oxidados y sin pintura (una pena no poder poner aquí fotos). Le llamé a Jorge para preguntarle si tenía alguna sartén y cacerola que se pudiera utilizar y me dijo que estaban perfectas, que esa era su casa y que ellos cocinaban en ellas... 
La limpieza de la cocina también era bastante pobre: la nevera llena de restos de comida en mal estado, el congelador no se podía ni abrir del hielo y mierda que tenía y casi todos los muebles estaban bastante sucios...
Con este panorama lo primero que hicimos fue irnos a comprar una cacerola, una sartén y lejía para limpiar la nevera...
Una vez superado estos contratiempos todo fue bien, estuvimos muy cómodos en la casa, aunque no nos hizo muy bien tiempo y pasamos un poco de frío ya que la casa es bastante fría.
La ubicación de la casa está apartada de todo, para nuestro gusto demasiado, es necesario el coche absolutamente para todo, y la zona en si, nos ha defraudado un poco porque no se veía casi gente y no había absolutamente nada para los niños. El resto de cosas de Portugal que hemos visto nos ha encantado
La urbanización es muy tranquila y la piscina siempre estaba vacía (ya he dicho que nos hizo bastante malo), excepto el último día que hizo muy bueno y habría unas 20 personas, pero todo muy agradable
2 días antes de venirnos Jorge llamó a casa para decirnos que ya había llegado de viaje y preguntarnos si necesitábamos algo, y ahí fue cuando le conocimos.
Sin duda, lo mejor de la casa ha sido la terraza, simplemente ESPECTACULAR!!
Una pena que por dos tonterías no hayamos podido estar 100%

Es un alojamiento ideal para ir a la playa al igual que para visitar Oporto.
Es igual que viene en las fotos. Estaba muy limpio y con un menaje completo.
Jorge, el anfitrión, nos obsequió con frutas, bombones, flores....
Se dispone de una terraza con vistas al mar muy grande. Todo muy bien en general.

Jorge was a nice host. He lives in another apartment in the same block and was on hand when required. Upon our arrival he left us with cake and a bottle of port which was a nice surprise.

The apartment was nice and much bigger than expected. 5 adults stayed and there was plenty of room. Apartment has lots of mod cons which is great but is missing things that would have eased our stay (cleaning products, dishwasher tablets, lightbulbs! (nearly half not working in the aparment so it was fairly dark). In general cleanliness was ok however it was not up to hotel standard, particularly in the kitchen.

Communal gardens and pool are well maintained. There are a few sun loungers located by the pool. Pool was fairly well used at the weekend and quiet in the week, although this may have been due to the weather we experienced during our stay.

Apartment is in a residential area. plenty of roadside parking. Short walk to a very nice beach. Nothing much else to in the area. 10min drive into Porto, uber cost Approx €9 each way
Es un sitio tranquilo, próximo a la playa. Si se dispone de vehículo, en 15 minutos puedes estar en el centro de Oporto.

Apartamento moderno y bien situado.
Muy cerca de las playas de Magdalena (se puede ir andando) y el resto de las playas de Oporto están a 10-15 minutos en coche, así que perfecto.
Jorge es un anfitrión excepcional,estuvo pendiente de nosotros en todo momento y nos hizo muy buenas recomendaciones.
La casa está muy bien, destacar sobre todo la terraza. 
Un gran descubrimiento esta zona de Portugal para pasar una semana tranquila de vacaciones ya sea con amigos, pareja o familia.
Seguro volveremos

Situation idéale, 10 minutes à pied de la plage, restaurants.
Belles promenades à faire le long de la plage sur 15 km, idéalement aménagée avec passerelles en bois.
Logement très spacieux et calme. Piscine très propre et bien entretenue.
Terrasse très grande.

A very stylish apartment close to beautiful beaches xx Jorge the host is lovely and helpful . The pool is gorgeous and so clean and we had it to ourselves for most of the week . Will definitely be back x

name: White Sand Beach Ocean Front Home
summary: On a beautiful soft white sand beach. World class surfing, beach exploration and sunsets right from our back yard. Guests universally rave about the spectacular setting, convenient location and comfort of our fully equipped ocean front paradise.
space: Step down from our grassy lawn to a luxurious soft sandy beach. Surfers, turtles and even whales and dolphins grace the waters while wedge-tailed shearwaters and crabs frolic just off our back yard. Enjoy our fully equipped kitchen or barbecue in the back yard while the sunset paints the waves and sand. Cruise on wifi, watch cable or DVDs, or curl up with a book from our library while sea serenades float in from over 2,000 miles of ocean.
description: On a beautiful soft white sand beach. World class surfing, beach exploration and sunsets right from our back yard. Guests universally rave about the spectacular setting, convenient location and comfort of our fully equipped ocean front paradise. Step down from our grassy lawn to a luxurious soft sandy beach. Surfers, turtles and even whales and dolphins grace the waters while wedge-tailed shearwaters and crabs frolic just off our back yard. Enjoy our fully equipped kitchen or barbecue in the back yard while the sunset paints the waves and sand. Cruise on wifi, watch cable or DVDs, or curl up with a book from our library while sea serenades float in from over 2,000 miles of ocean. A master bedroom with a queen size bed and deluxe views. The second bedroom can be made up with either twin beds or as a king. The den/tv room has a queen size sofa bed. The second bathroom is in the garage, and is great when coming off the beach. The full sized washer and dryer are conveniently located right
neighborhood_overview: The north shore of Oahu boasts world famous surfing and a laid back vibe. We're near Waimea Bay with it's giant winter surf and fun summer swimming. In the same area, Shark's Cove and Three Tables provide great snorkeling. There's a big supermarket and Starbucks there too. The Polynesian Cultural center, Turtle Bay resort, Historic Haleiwa town teeming with surf shops, boutiques, casual eateries, shrimp trucks and fine seafood restaurants are all nearby as well.
notes: At Hale Moana we are witness to the impressive and fascinating interaction of land and sea. The shoreline may dramatically change from summer to winter, year to year. The tides, currents, waves and wind are constantly rearranging the beach, and sand levels will vary significantly and unpredictably over time.  The North Shore is known world wide for its dramatic winter surf. Be aware that swimming in most places during big wave season is best left to experts and children should be closely supervised. Quoted prices include 13.96 % local excise and transient accommodation taxes. NUC Certificate #90/TVU-0375; HI Tax ID #(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
transit: There is a bus stop just steps away with hourly service but a car is recommended.
access: A master bedroom with a queen size bed and deluxe views. The second bedroom can be made up with either twin beds or as a king. The den/tv room has a queen size sofa bed. The second bathroom is in the garage, and is great when coming off the beach. The full sized washer and dryer are conveniently located right off of the den in the garage.
interaction: Guests will have complete privacy. There is never anyone else living on the fenced property. Host and housekeeper contact information is provided.
house_rules: No smoking in house or pets allowed. Maximum of 6 people. No large gatherings, large weddings or large wedding receptions allowed. With my previous approval, and a $500 charge, a small wedding or wedding reception at my home and yard of no more than 10 guests may be approved.

host.host_about: I lived in this lovely home, "Hale Moana" (house by the sea), for many years. Since moving away into Honolulu I'm able to offer you the amazing experience of living on this special beach. I'd love for you to have a delightful and comfortable vacation, and I strive to provide everything you need so you may enjoy your time together and the magic of Hawaii. My own "Hale Moana" website Guest Book comments from the last nine years will give you an idea of what to expect.

reviews.comments: My family had an awesome time at Sandi's home. The house was clean and comfortable for 2 adults and 2 kids (3 and 9 years old). It is right on the beach so it was very convenient as you can walk back to the house to get anything you need any time. Thank you so much Sandi!
The house was clean, beautiful, well-appointed, and amazingly well located. I would stay there again without a moment's hesitation. Parking was easy and the host was great!
Wonderful stay! Loved the location, lots of beautiful beaches in the area. House as advertised.  View from living room was beautiful. Thanks!

Central beach location with surfing on one end, breakwater tide pool area on the other, and an amazing yard for barbecuing and just relaxing. Did everything we could to enjoy every minute of our short stay.

Nice house in a beautiful location - right by the ocean, you can sit in the living room or in the garden and watch the waves or sunset. 

The only inconveniece was that the house is close to the road and you can hear cars passing by, especially in the rear bedroom with the twin beds.

Hale Moana is a perfect place to reset, look at the stars, enjoy the sunset, and sunbathe!  I cooked everyday with the fully equipped kitchen, the beds were comfy, ceiling fans in every room, & lots of towels.  In the middle of all amenities the North Shore has to offer.  Location can’t be beat! Just perfect!  I will be back!! Thanks Sandra!
Nice older home on the water.  You sleep to crash waves and a little road traffic.  I would not hesitate to stay again.  Plenty of chairs and beach stuff.
Sandra was equipped with everything we needed and more. Great location, lots of fun, would have liked AC in the house... but overall was a great experience!

Sandra, your home Hale Moana, was even better than the pictures you posted !! Our family of 5 plus our 2 year old grandson enjoyed it so much. Great location on the beach, my husband enjoyed his morning coffee out on the deck chair watching the waves, it was always one of his dreams to do something like that - so thank you !! You were fabulous with all the material/ local information you provided prior to the trip. We had no problem finding and entering the property. The place was just perfect in every way - it's a 10 out of 10 for us. We certainly have raved about it to our friends and many photose pasted on (Hidden by Airbnb) and highly recommend Hale Moana for anyone wanting to stay on the North Shore. Thank you again and we will be back !!

This place is dreamier and even more special than the pictures express. The house sets the stage for unforgettable memories and absolute relaxation. The location can’t be beat (if you’re looking for peace and privacy!) and lends itself to whatever you’re looking for - surfing, sunning, beach walks, family bbqs, reading, sleeping ... I could go on and on. Sandi is the best communicator. The only downside is leaving!!

From the moment we walked in the door, we knew we wanted to come back. Hale Moana felt like a home away from home with stunning, literally jaw-dropping views from every room. As a family of 5, we were completely comfortable with plenty of space for both relaxing and activity. Direct access to beautiful beaches, 5 minutes from downtown Haleiwa, 2 minutes from Waimea Falls, it just couldn’t have been any better. This is the saddest we’ve ever been to leave a vacation spot, and we are already planning a return trip!! Sandi was so responsive and helpful that we had absolutely no issues checking in, finding activities, or even getting weather updates for the Norah Shore. She made our trip such a relaxing experience, we couldn’t recommend Hale Moana more! Thank you Sandi!!

We stayed at Hale Moana for five days. My family and my three-month-old daughter had a good time. The views are amazing and unbeatable. The house has no air-conditioning except for one bedroom. If traveling during summer the house can get very hot. My daughter had to stay in the air-conditioned room for most of the trip as she did not do well with the heat and humidity. If you like that sort of weather this would be great house for you. Sandra provided a list of activities, coffee and wine upon arrival, and everything we needed for a nice day at her house. The shower was narrow for my 6 foot two 200+ pound brother and the toilet in the garage is also very narrow. Something to keep in mind for larger guests. Close to down town Haleiwa and Waimea beach and dole plantation.

This home is in a perfect location on Oahu North Shore.  One mile from Waimea  bay and two miles from grocery and trucks. The owner of this property has everything you need to relax... walk in and you can snorkel, bbq, shower, laundry.  Also have AC to chill with movies and books when not on beach. Mahalo to Sandi.  This place is forever in our hearts.

This home is surrounded by beautiful views, where you can go out to the beach and where you can literally see the sun go down. Despite the beach being public we didn't see anyone else on it when we wanted to go out meaning it felt very private. There are helpful hints provided in terms of places to go to eat and activities to do. A well thought out location. Would definitely stay again.
Outstanding hospitality by Sandi and it’s all about “location, location, location “! Blissful beach setting to enjoy beautiful sunsets.

Sandra’s house is the perfect spot to relax, enjoy the view and the sunset. I stayed there for a week with my family and we really made the most of this place. It is ideally located: not too far from Honolulu and with great beaches around. 
Pictures are accurate and the beach house is well furnished. 
If you’re looking for a place to relax and rest, don’t look any further, you found it! Would stay there again if I ever come back again.

We had a fabulous stay. The views and beach are amazing!  Down a few steps and you are on a beautiful beach with great snorkeling and fishing.  About 50 yd walk down the beach there is a sandy cove protected by a reef.  Perfect for little kids. The house is perfectly situated to enjoy the beach and views. Sunsets were truly spectacular!

The size of the window in the living room was a feeling of liberation, it was very nice.
The garage with the shutter is also very convenient and you can bring the luggage to the living room immediately.
It was close to Foodland of Pupukeaa and Haleiwa, it was a very convenient location.
Perfect little private beach getaway.

This place is right on the water, and it's beautiful to watch the waves crashing. We enjoyed swimming nearby and just relaxing outside. Even had a rainbow above the ocean. About 20 minutes drive to the shrimp farms where you can buy fresh shrimp!  Had a great time!

What a fantastic place! The view is breathtaking. So many extras provided. We enjoyed the beach items each day. I would recommend this home to everyone. We will return soon I am sure. Thank you to Sandra who provided excellent communication.

Hale Moana is the only place where we would stay when visiting Oahu in the future again! Forget about the touristic and crowded Waikiki and choose the quiet,private and peaceful Hale Moana,where you ll have direct access to the ocean without any interruption! We had a fantastic time there and appreciated the beautiful view from the backyard to the ocean and the nearby sandy “private beach” without any tourist disturbing us. Staying at Hale Moana was the best decision that we could have made,I can only recommend this place!
Great place, awesome hosts. Will come back next time in Hawaii

name: Most breathtaking view of Manhattan
summary: This stunning apartment is located in one of the most desirable locations in NYC, at McCarren Park. Facing the Williamsburg waterfront on the East River, enjoy spectacular views of the city spanning from Lower Manhattan up to Quensboro Bridge.
space: This stunning apartment is located in one of the most desirable locations in NYC at McCarren Park facing the Williamsburg waterfront on the East River enjoying spectacular views of the city spanning from Lower Manhattan all the way up to the Queens Borough Bridge. This contemporary corner apt is covered with knee to ceiling windows, with rich, wide-plank American walnut floors, custom designed kitchen with sub-zero fridge, viking ovens, chrome hardware, marble countertops with pure crystal white backsplash and a host of sleek appliances. Baths are framed by custom tiling, contemporary chrome fixtures and a frameless glass-enclosed shower with rain head and separate soaking tub. It is easy to relax and enjoy this exclusive view from the comfort of the stylish living room when the Empire State Building and Chrysler Building sit right in front of you or while lounging on the terrace. And if you feel like breaking a sweat go downstairs to the gym or outside for a run at McCarren Park or fo
description: This stunning apartment is located in one of the most desirable locations in NYC, at McCarren Park. Facing the Williamsburg waterfront on the East River, enjoy spectacular views of the city spanning from Lower Manhattan up to Quensboro Bridge. This stunning apartment is located in one of the most desirable locations in NYC at McCarren Park facing the Williamsburg waterfront on the East River enjoying spectacular views of the city spanning from Lower Manhattan all the way up to the Queens Borough Bridge. This contemporary corner apt is covered with knee to ceiling windows, with rich, wide-plank American walnut floors, custom designed kitchen with sub-zero fridge, viking ovens, chrome hardware, marble countertops with pure crystal white backsplash and a host of sleek appliances. Baths are framed by custom tiling, contemporary chrome fixtures and a frameless glass-enclosed shower with rain head and separate soaking tub. It is easy to relax and enjoy this exclusive view from the comfort of
notes: (Website hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: Please do not throw parties, don't break anything. Please lock the door and leave the keys with our host by calling him to pick it up on the check-out. Switch all the air conditioners and lights off as you leave. Don't take any of our books and don't change the position of the wires and furniture. Thank you, Fabio

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm from Brazil and I live in NY since 2006. I worked in the financial market for 20 years to reach really one goal: Fund my dreams :-)

This apartment in NY is one of my dreams come true. I really love to travel around the world for surfing, snowboarding and tastings of wine and food. Now I'm into the lodging and wellness segments as an entrepeneur, building boutique hostels with a focus on wellness.

reviews.comments: Fantastic apartment with amazing views. Everything you could need and the friendliest doorman in Brooklyn. Fabio is easy to contact and very helpful.

Amazing AMAZING experience overall from the beginning until the end of the stay. I rented the place for my parents who were visiting New York for the first time. They were ecstatic about the apartment and the view is truly breathtaking. As soon as we walked in, you can smell fresh clean linen and the place was extremely immaculate. Pictures don't really do the apartment justice. Fabio was also so great to deal with. He's so accomodating and professional. The experience made my parents feel so welcomed and at home. They kept telling me that it was by far much better than staying in a hotel. The doormen were all so friendly and great to deal with. Subway was a quick walk and you would be close to markets and the park, so it's in a very convenient location. I can't stress how fortunate I am to have found this place. I live 5 blocks away and I'm already missing this apartment. I  would recommend any out-of-towners to  stay here definitely!!!

We were five family members who met in NY and lived at Favio's apt. for 5 nights and it was AMAZING!!!
Fabio's apt. is really too good to be true!! It's cleane, big and decorated beautifully. The neighborhood is great and the apt. is close to everything. We were in an amazing city, but did not want to leave the apt. because it was so great and pleasant. I definitely recomend it, if you want your vacation to be a dream. Definitely a lot better that living in a hotel! Thanks Fabio for a beautiful experience, we will come back! :)

Fabio's apartment was amazing. Literally the best view I've ever seen of the city. We did not meet in person, but he had all the accommodations well setup for our group. We even had parking included, which was incredibly convenient.
Fabio's apartment is beautiful and the views are incredible. The apartment is all that everyone says and more. I highly recommend staying there, you'll never forget the view and comfort.

We were in NY in November 2012.It was our first trip to USA.The apartment of Fabio was one of the best impressions of our vacations!The  view from this place is really excellent.Every evening we sat on the balcony with heating and (Website hidden by Airbnb) is very light and clean apartament.Here is all that can made need you.Thanks Fabio for possibility to live in his (Website hidden by Airbnb) was beatiful!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Very beautiful clean apartment, even bigger in person than it looks in the pictures.  Fabio was kind enough to let me host a small gather here as my own apartment was too small. Easy key pick up at the front desk whenever it worked for me and the door man was super nice. Over all very accommodating, would recommend to anyone. Also the view is as good as advertised, and with the heat lamps on the balcony, it can be enjoyed in any season.

My family and I had a fabulous stay in Fabio's beautiful apartment.  We were a five minute walk from my son's apartment, a ten minute walk from the L train into the city, and were surrounded by wonderful restaurants and shops.  The kitchen was more than adequate for our holiday cooking needs and the view cannot be beat.  If you are looking for a city living experience, including lots of night time light and traffic noise, this is the place for you.

Fabio nous avait certifié que nous trouverions la clef de l'appartement 24 h sur 24 chez le doorman à notre arrivée et que nous pourrions la déposer 24 h sur 24 le jour du départ
Notre soirée de Noël en famille à été totalement gâchée car pas de clef chez le concierge à notre arrivée de l avion à 18  h
Nous avons passé notre soirée de Noël dans la crainte de ne pas savoir où coucher!!!
Nous n avons pû pénétrer dans l appartement qu après minuit après de multiples appels téléphoniques au  Brésil  (où se trouvait Fabio) et au service client de Air BNB( en Californie)
Pendant tous le séjour les gardiens ont été désagréables car ils nous ont dit être en contentieux avec le propriétaire  et au départ ils nous ont dit ne pas vouloir prendre en charge la clef que nous avons dû laisser sur leur bureau
Nous avons donc été très déçus  par la fiabilité de notre hôte et par air Bnb que nous pensions être garant de la fiabilité des hôtes
Sophie

Fabio's apartment was perfect for the stay.  The space is large and bright and very comfortable.  I live very close by and would rent the apartment again for friends and family anytime they come into town.
Superb ! Nothing else to say about the accommodation, location and the view.

Our stay at Fabio's place was fantastic!  The key pick up and drop off was very easy, and the apartment was amazing!  Very nice modern furnishings, and an incredible view with two walls of windows.  Location is an easy walk to the subway.  Highly recommend!

I had a nice stay here with a couple of friends. The apartment is spacious, with plenty of place to hang out and to sleep. The location is perfect, right near Bedford Ave in Williamsburg. And it is quite true that the view is spectacular! There are multiple balconies where you can stand out and look at various parts of NYC. My whole transaction was pretty smooth and effortless, and I would definitely recommend staying at Fabio's place if you want to spend a night or two in Brooklyn.

I rented this apartment for a client of mine. IE I wasn't even staying there. The pick up of the keys was fairly easy. Unfortunately once at the apartment my clients has issues that the host  was  unavailable to help with. They called several times and had no responses. I was then given a bad review. The apartment looks really beautiful and I would rwccomended it. But don't expect an easy time getting a hold of people when problems arise. Also you should expect a bad review if you ask for help.

We had a very good experience renting Fabio's modern, 16th floor apartment in the Williamsburg section of Brooklyn. The breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline are iconic and we found the apartment clean, spacious, conveniently located and functional.
It is well equipped with a large screen Tv with cable and other technology, including free wifi. Be sure to pay attention to Fabio's technology instructions. 
The neighborhood felt safe and friendly, even late at night, because there are so many people walking their dogs and coming and going from the subway and restaurants. 
It's an easy walk to stores and restaurants in Williamsburg and parts of Fort Greene, and a short subway ride into Manhattan on the L line fron the Bedford Station. On the host's recommendation, we used Northside car service several times and found it highly reliable.
The apartment is near the corner of 12th and Union, overlooking McCarren Park. When we were there, in mid-May, the well-lighted park was busy with soccer players, joggers and walkers from early morning until long after dark. There is a huge, relatively new public swimming pool as part of the park, the equivalent of a few blocks away from the apartment.
The apartment has two enjoyable small terraces, one off the living room and the other off the master bedroom.
The apartment and its furniture are showing some small signs of wear and tear, but overall it was an excellent experience  and we would gladly stay there again.
amazing space . great view .

This apartment truly does have the most breathtaking views of Manhattan !
It's an easy 10 min walk up to the L line on Bedford should you want to go in to the city, but right next to the hippest neighbourhood in NY should you want to chill / dine / drink locally.....
Obrigado Fabio !!
Nick from London UK
PLACE WAS AMAZING! The loft was exactly as fabio described. The views are breathtaking and the location is perfect. I am definitely staying here again. Awesome experience!!!
Fabio was a great host. The apartment was beautiful and clean, the handoff of keys was smooth, and the stay pleasurable. I enjoyed the spot greatly, and would return again if stars aligned.
Great apartment.  Very spacious and clean.  Definitely a great NYC experience.  I would absolutely stay here again!
Fabio's place is fantastic, and seriously, the view is out of this world.  If you are looking for a really nice 2 bedroom in Williamsburg with a great view, this is your place.
Fabio's place has a great view in a fun part of NYC. Lots of light. Worth a bit of a treat!

Truly breathtaking views. Comfortable, clean, and modern apartment. Key pass off was easy and host was very accommodating with our check-in / out times. Everything was perfect except for one of the two bathrooms had a hot water issue. Honestly we were so busy enjoying the city we didn't give host a chance to fix it while we were there. Would come back in a heartbeat.

Spacious and clean apartment in a great neighborhood (Williamsburg). The apartment is just a 5 minutes walk from Bedford Avenue, the main street with loads of coffee shops, bars and restaurants. From their it's a 10 minute commute to Soho/Meatpacking and about 20 minutes to Central Park. The place is really spacious and the views are absolutely amazing! And if you're into sports, there's a big running track in the park in front of the place. We used it every morning. 

The only thing that could be improved to make my 4 stars a 5 star rating is the attention to small details. There are some things that need a little maintenance, e.g. screws that aren't completely fixed, blinds that aren't working 100% smooth anymore. Nothing really big that couldn't be fixed in a days work. 

Again, if you need a spacious place with great views and easy commute to Manhattan, this is great choice!

The apartment was excellent - great location, amazing view, plenty of space.  Fabio was accommodating with check in/out times.  It would have been nice to have more than one set of keys since the apartment sleeps 6 people and we weren't always all together, but we made it work.  The doorman was rude though and said we weren't supposed to be there...which was weird.  But otherwise it was a smooth and great experience!  Would stay here again for sure!

Indeed this is an awesome view and experience.  Highly recommend Fabio's apartment.  We love this neighborhood and the energy going on.  However it is lovely to come back to this oasis in the skyline and just be able to turn out all the lights and watch the city sparkle.  enjoy.

Awesome view in this apartment, there's heater n aircon n heater out at e balcony which we loved! Huge tv and all creature comforts. There's also a running track which we utilized! Wifi n cable excellent. Quite a bit of walk to subway abt 10mins (there's metropolitan station / Bedford on L train, Bedford would be nearer apartment) very nice area felt v safe, good groceries store n some restaurants in e vacinity. Would surely recommend! The view is to die for, we are a party of 4, everyone had their own space and we enjoyed e apartment tremendously.
The best deal on airbnb in brooklyn period. Unbelievable view. Host was super nice. The place is gorgeous.

I agree, Fabio's almost-top-floor apartment has the most unbelievable view!  A full wall of windows in the living room and kitchen provide a stunning Manhattan ambience to the space, including a cozy but well-appointed, heated balcony.  The 2 bedrooms in the back oppositely face out to a beautiful southern Brooklyn view, complete with the master bedroom's additional walk-out balcony with sun-lounger. The master also has a beautiful adjoining bathroom where, leaving the door open, you could shower looking across the bedroom to the same view. The apartment's residential neighborhood near North Williamsburg is also ideal -- only 5 min walk to Bedford (L) subway station, which will get you west to Manhattan's 14St/Union Square station in 3 stops (~8 minutes on board).  We also experimented with taxis back from Manhattan: after midnight a cab was $28 from Times Square and $38 from Harlem, before tips.  Our group didn't mind paying this since staying in Manhattan with these conveniences (and view) would have been at least $800/night.  Fabio's apartment is conveniently only 1 block from Khim's natural grocery store (which was open past 1am on a Friday and has ICE, which was a good find since the apartment does not have an ice dispenser), and there is a heap of cute shops and locales on Bedford Ave too.  The cleanliness of the apartment was great considering the previous group left around noon and I needed to check in at 2pm the same day -- I'm convinced this is the only reason a couple of the smaller details were overlooked (some stains on the couch's slip cover, unsightly black scuffs on most of the walls and doors, which I wiped down, so no worries now!).  I'm sure with more preparation time these items would have been addressed, but we were excited to begin our stay and were not burdened by these details -- everything else certainly made up for it!  Note: responding to previous reviewers, Fabio does provide 2 sets of keys now, and if you want to avoid doorman confrontations (not that we experienced any), it's easy to use the ground-level entrance ("B - basement" on the elevator) as opposed to the main lobby up the front stairs.  Oh -- and Fabio provided the FLUFFIEST towels, wow!  Another great AirBnB experience indeed.

Fabio's place is stunning.  The view is spectacular and the location nearly perfect. It is a short walk to the L train and only a couple of short stops to either the 4,5,6 or 1,2,3 lines to get anywhere in Manhattan. But you might not go to Manhattan at all since Brooklyn is fantastic. Fabio's place is right on the border between Williamsberg and Greenpoint two really great neighborhoods of Brooklyn, and the rest is just a quick subway or better yet bike ride away. The McCarren framer's market is right there at the base of the building on Saturday and is a place you can get wonderful produce, meat and cheeses. The entire experience was delightful. Thank you Fabio gracious host and Bruna his friend who helped with keys etc.

The apartment is very large and does have a great view of NYC skyline.  However, the apartment was filthy.  There are stains in all the couches and beds. The kitchen was dirty and the floors and bathrooms were dirty as well.  The owner is in some fight with the building and the bellman told us that we were not allowed to ask anything of the building.   It was really strange. I would not recommend staying here.

Our stay was fabulous!  The view is amazing.  My family and I enjoyed having such a lovely large apartment to stay in rather than a cramped hotel room.  The park across the street is perfect for morning jogs or strolls.  There was also ice-skating.  Great coffee shops, restaurants, bars and gourmet grocery stores very close by.  I would definitely recommend this place.  There were a few scuffs and marks on the furniture, window treatments and floors but nothing too major.  Otherwise, it was pretty clean.
Appartement agréable avec superbe vue sur Manhattan, conforme à l'annonce et répondant à nos attentes, qui nous a permis de passer  Noël en famille dans les meilleures conditions.

I stayed at Fabio's apartment for the New Year period and had the most amazing time. I could see all of Manhattan from the living room and everything in the apartment was in working order. Fabio was a prompt communicator and Bruna was very friendly and helpful when exchanging the keys. I had read the previous reviews about the doorman and met him once when we first arrived, he was pleasant enough, but we used the basement entrance for the rest of the stay. My only suggestion is to replace the blinds in the master bedroom, not such a problem in the winter but they would be a little irritating in the summer months. Williamsburg is a fab little town and my vegan friend was in heaven as there are vegan food stores a plenty.
Fabio and his place are amazing. Wonderful experience- don't know why anyone would stay elsewhere.
Great location in Williamsburg, with a commanding view of the Manhattan skyline.  Very comfortable space, host was easy to work with.
Our stay at Fabio's amazing apartment was awesome.  Nothing but good things to say about this place and the experience with Fabio.  The view is worth the stay alone.

The tagline is totally right - it was a fantastic view of the city - SO GLAD WE STAYED THERE vs MANHATTAN.  Every amenity was available - parking was great - subway was close - neighborhood was super safe. Would definitely stay here again.

Great views! Promised, secure parking lot space was "unavailable", but we weren't told this until we arrived. It was one of the features that attracted us to the listing.Street entrance to building is convenient. Neighborhood is great. Comfortable apt. with updated appliances. More attention to detail is necessary to ensure cleanliness and provide adequate supplies, such as toilet paper and bath soap.

Fabio's place was perfect for us; three colleagues traveling to New York City from Norway for an oval weekend of fun and inspiration. The views from the apartment are just as spectacular as they're made out to be, and we had plenty of space: a large lounge/dining/kitchen area, two spacious bedrooms (+ an inflatable double bed) and two full bathrooms. Also, the location couldn't have been better, within walking distance of restaurants, bars, shops, subway station etc. And there's no reason to skip working out while you're there, with the McCarren Park (running track, pool, tennis, skate park etc) right outside. Fabio and his friend, Bruna, were very helpful, and there were no problems with keys or any other issues. One minor thing, though: The apartment smelled of old cigarettes, but nothing a few open windows couldn't fix. We would gladly stay here again, and don't hesitate in recommending it to others.
Fabio was a great host and everything was just like it was posted on his listing.

The location at Fabio's is absolutely amazing. The title that he uses "Most breathtaking view of Manhattan" is exactly what it is. The condo is huge, two bedrooms, two bathrooms, a private laundry, kitchen with a view and gorgeous living room.  The area is neat as well, lots of colorful characters, interesting shops and tons of places to eat within walking distance. The view of Manhattan at night just takes your breath away. Well worth it! Fabio was also an awesome host. They responded quickly whenever we had a question.  Thank you for allowing us to stay here!
Fantastic apartment!  The entire process from check in to check out was easy and professional.  My family stayed here for my wedding weekend and loved it!

The views from Fabio's place are simply the best in the city! Can't say enough about how much we enjoyed watching the Manhattan skyline and East River through all times of day and night from the spacious and comfortable living room/dining area/ kitchen. And overlooking McCarren Park's field was another treat, especially if you're a soccer fan.  So many pluses: nice building, great location close to subway (1 stop to Manhattan). The entertainment center and wifi are excellent. The master bedroom and bathroom are great, and the kitchen is fine. Only slight downside was the second bedroom and bath, which were a bit below the rest of the apartment, but they were  okay for a short stay. 

We had one problem, which Fabio handled fairly and promptly. He was easy tp work with.

We enjoyed our stay at Fabio's apartment.  It definitely has a beautiful view, and it's big enough to host 5 people comfortably (3 adults and 2 small kids). Balcony is a big plus (it's nice to have coffee there in the morning). The place is close enough to everything in Williamsburg. Fabio was very flexible and helped us get the most out of our stay in NYC. We had a great weekend!
Great apartment- spacious, clean, well equipped and with a stunning view of the Manhattan skyline. Breathtaking.

What a spectacular view and a beautiful apartment! We stayed over 4th of July weekend for our wedding which was at a nearby restaurant. The place was the perfect setting for the bridal party to get ready, our first look at each other before the wedding and as our first night as a married couple. Would highly recommend it to anyone wanting to hang out in Brooklyn with a fabulous cityscape view.

The location between Williamsburg and Greenpoint is excellent. The view is truly fabulous. The building very secure. Mostly easy on-street parking. Great for smaller families (2BR, 2 bath). Host was charming, accomodating, and punctual. A+
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The place was incredible and the view was over the top. Such a great weekend. Fabiola is a perfect host and everything went really smooth.
Completely recommend staying here if you're in town.

We loved it! the view is way better than pictured and the place felt very spacious. Location is spot on. The host was so fast to get back to us, and very flexible about timings to check in and out. Brilliant to have 2 bathrooms and washer drier too. Highly recommended. Would say that the master bedroom is a bit better than the second bedroom which is a bit smaller, and with not such a good bed, so try and grab that one, if you have a choice!

Indeed a most breathtaking view!  The apartment was clean and bright, with central AC (very welcome in August) and all other conveniences.  We used it as a staging area and guest accommodations for a wedding, and there was plenty of room for all the women to get ready together before the ceremony.  After that, it became a cosy place for our guests to sleep and use as a base for exploring Brooklyn.

Fabio's place is amazing. Beautiful view of Manhattans skyline, clean and enough place for 4 people. Great communications with Fabio and a friend of him. No problems with check in and check out. Near the L train and Bedford ave. We had a great time and would come again.

Fabio was easy to communicate with and helped us out in NYC when our other host cancelled on us at the last minute. The view from this condo is amazing with sunsets right off the deck. The place was not as clean as I would expect. It seemed as though one of the bed sheets had not been changed as there were stains, make-up and hair all over. This was the room with the mattress on the floor. My husband and I are in our late 40's and really expected more than a mattress on the floor for $500/night. There were no amenities such as soap to wash your hands in the main bathroom or for showering. This was my first Airbnb experience so maybe that is how it is suppose to be. Master bedroom and bath were better but again there was used soap in the shower and no washcloths out for use. I had to find linens in an extra closet and thankfully there were extra sheets and pillowcases. I did email Fabio and he did respond the next day to see if we need maid service but we had already cleaned up everything. This part of Brooklyn is up and coming and it was much more relaxed than Manhattan with lots of great shops and restaurants. A must try is The Meatball Shop. Don't wander too far as you might end up in a BAD neighborhood. Easy subway access to get to anywhere!!
Fabio's place is amazing. You couldn't get a better location. The views were fantastic. We really enjoyed our stay.

Wy wife and I stayed here with our 8-month old kid and my parents. And we could not have loved it more. The apt is gorgeous, the views breathtaking, the location is supercool and the hosts incredibly friendly and accommodating. 

We lived in Williamsburg for years, so for us it was a no-brainer. But if you're on the fence about staying in Brooklyn, do not worry. You'll be within a 5 minute walk to a one stop subway ride to the city or a 10 minute cab ride into the Lower East Side. Not to mention Williamsburg is packed with awesome bars and restaurants.

Plus, an awesome park with a running track is literally across the street.

Fabio's apartment is lovely and it really does have one of the best views of Manhattan, further enhanced by the green vista of McCarren Park. Our group of four middle-aged women stayed in the apartment for almost three weeks. Both Fabio (who is usually overseas) and his local assistant, Thiago, were friendly and helpful. When I first inspected the apartment, the doorman who buzzed me in was quick to point out that subletting was frowned upon and that we couldn't make any requests of the front desk. Fabio had agreed to give us two sets of keys during our stay but unfortunately the people who checked out before us returned their keys to the doormen (don't do this!), meaning we couldn't access those keys and had to make do with only one set. I thought it would be a problem because of the doormen situation, but they continued to buzz us in when necessary. As long as you don't make a fuss and don't bother the other residents, they will be civil. Note: this is not a building for parties!

Pros: Stunning view, quiet location, easy access to transport, park across the road, great neighborhood.
Cons: Doormen and some residents seem to resent subletters. Furniture is a bit chipped and showing signs of wear. There was a plumbing emergency and the plumbers told us not to drink the water that came out of the faucet in this building, because the pipes were not good – best to use a water filter jug instead.
Fabio was good with getting back to us. Apartment was as described and great location
The reservation was canceled 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We made the perfect choice with this apartment.  It's calm and spacious yet instantly homely and the views are insane, stunning! All the excellent reviews are well-founded.  Fabio and Bruna were super helpful and answered queries quickly but to be honest we didn't have that many, it was so easy to live here.  We stayed for a month and loved the neighbourhood - great vibe, great bars, coffee shops, restaurants, gig venues (check out Rough Trade, some incredible acts here), a wealth of brilliant vintage clothes and furniture shops, indy cinemas etc.  It's also quick and easy to get into Manhattan on the L train.  There's also a toy room in the building, next to the gym, which our 2 year old daughter loved playing in.  And loads in the neighbourhood for kids to do too.  The doormen in the building were also very helpful and friendly and the other residents too, we just felt really at home.  Thanks Fabio!

We spent two nights as Fabio's place. And it was absolutely brilliant place. Free parking was one of the first things we looked into since it's NYC, Fabio has a private spot in the parking lot right behind the building. The furniture are carefully planed as where they are. The view is also astonishing, looking out from the master bedroom and the living room, as well as the balcony. 

I highly recommend this place and the host is very helpful and nice.

We booked this apartment that had the most wonderful view over Greenpoint and Manhattan. Well located, close to Bedford and McGuiness. Only thing that was not good was that Fabio let me know just 1 day before arrival that the apartment only had 1 bedroom instead of 2, that was on the description. Since we came to work and I specifically look for 2 separate bedrooms, I was quite upset. 
Otherwise everything worked just fine. Fabio was on point with everything else. And I could definitely recommend this stay.
The apartment was very nice and in a great  part of Brooklyn- Williamsburg.

This place is in an amazing location.  We came for a wedding at My Moon around the corner, and fell in love with the neighborhood.  McCarren Park is literally across the street, and the views from both sides of the apartment are beautiful.  When we first walked in, we noticed that the apartment furniture is starting to show a few signs of wear, but we were traveling with our daughter and there was a high chair waiting for us, so I can't say it ever crossed our mind again.  The only thing that actually bothered me was that the front desk guys (or more likely whoever manages them) made it clear that they were nonplussed about airbnb in general.  Fortunately, there's another entrance on street level that was both super easy to navigate with a stroller and had no unhelpful doorman.  I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.

Fabio even though was in a different country was very responsive after the booking was made.  He linked us up with Bruna who was AMAZING and a wonderful host, without her we would have lost hours of time at the beginning of our trip.  The place was beautiful, clean, and had an outstanding view.   Plenty of places to eat within minutes walking, off street safe secure parking, and subway to downtown Manhattan in less then 15 minutes from the door step.  I would highly recommend this place for future travelers and will be coming back again to visit in the future.  We will stay no where else in NYC on all of our future en-devours.  Thanks Fabio for welcoming us into your home.

Fabio and his assistant, Bruna, were very good with communication beforehand and meeting us on site on arrival.  We were a bit surprised however, and disappointed, that a unit with the title, "A breathtaking view..." had scaffolding and a net in front of the windows.  We were not advised of this beforehand, nor discounted because of it.  This seemed to diminish the unit's main asset.  The neighborhood was great with about a five-block walk to a subway station.  There was another unfortunate issue - the owner appears to be having an ongoing dispute with the building, resulting in advice by a concierge that their services would not be available to us as guests of this unit.  Whether this is true or not, we felt in the middle of a dispute we as guests should not be faced with. When the fob to let us into the building stopped working late on the second day of our stay, I alerted Bruna, and eventually Fabio, to this but we never received a replacement.  Luckily, the concierges buzzed us into the building anyway despite the dispute. Finally, another disappointment - the second bedroom does indeed have a king mattress, but it was on the floor.  How expensive would it be for the owner to get a simple frame on which to put the mattress?  For the price of the unit, we really should not have to sleep on a mattress on the floor. Again, not what a class act should be doing.  Although there were good things about this unit, they were outweighed by the disappointments, all of which the owner has the ability to address.
Great apt exactly as described!! Amazing views (despite the current scaffolding) and very spacious.

Wir waren mit Fabios Apartment sehr zufrieden und hatten einen angenehmen Aufenthalt in Williamsburg. In dem geräumigen Apartment haben wir uns zu Viert (plus Baby) sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist komplett eingerichtet, es ist alles da, was man im Alltag benötigt.  

Pech hatten wir lediglich damit, dass die wirklich tolle Aussicht auf Manhattan wegen eines Baugerüsts vor dem Gebäude verstellt war - wofür Fabio aber nichts kann.

Im zweiten Schlafzimmer befand sich bei unserem Aufenthalt lediglich eine Matratze auf dem Boden, was für uns aber kein Problem und wegen unseres Babys, das bei uns im Bett schlief, eher von Vorteil war. Ein neues Bett ist aber angeblich bereits unterwegs und sollte während unseres Aufenthalts geliefert werden. Toll fanden wir, dass ein Babystuhl vorhanden war, was uns vieles erleichtert hat. 

Fabio selber war nicht da, dafür hat uns seine nette Freundin Bruna in Empfang genommen und uns alles erklärt. Wir konnten uns jederzeit an sie wenden, wenn wir Fragen hatten. Bruna hat uns auch erzählt, dass die Doorman nicht sehr gut auf die Touristen im Apartment zu sprechen sind, aber das ist eigentlich kein Problem. Links vom Haupteingang befindet sich ein kleinerer Eingang durch den man ebenfalls ins Haus kommt und somit den Doorman so aus dem Weg gehen kann.

Die Verbindung nach Manhatten ist mit dem L-Train problemlos. Aber auch das Viertel rund um die Wohnung ist sehenswert und bietet mit seinen Kneipen, Restaurants und Geschäften genügend unterhaltungswert. Direkt vor dem Haus ist ein Park, der sich bestens zum Sport treiben eignet.

Wir können dieses Apartment nur weiterempfehlen.

We had a fantastic stay!! The apartment is beautiful and completely consistent with the photos. There is currently scaffolding in the front of the windows in the living room, but this really didn't detract significantly from the view. Fabio (and Bruna, who we met to get the keys from), were both extremely friendly and responsive. It was also an added bonus to have a parking spot along with the apartment!

We were able to arrive very early and Fabio arranged the key without hesitation,very cool and kind.
We loved the space, the location was perfect and the building and apartment very luxurious.
We felt very at home, this was great value for money
The flat is very good and the neighbourhood is also interesting.

Our stay in Brooklyn was a blast.  We hit heavy traffic on our way in from Boston, and Bruna was very patient, understanding and accomadating.  The apartment is absolutely gorgeous with amazing views from the balconies on either side of the building.  My guests and I ran into an unfortunate issue with the city cutting off the water supply on the morning of our first day in Brooklyn.  Not an ideal start to our trip, but Fabio showed what a fantastic host and human being he is, and rectified the situation.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Absolutely perfect. the apartment was Beautiful. views in every room including the master bathroom.
Fabios apartment is in a wonderful location, not too busy in front of a beautiful park.  A beautiful oasis to relax in after a crazy day in the city!

Our family's second great stay here!  All of the communication around booking was handled quickly and Fabio even worked with us to make a last minute change to the reservation.  Highly recommended the apartment and neighborhood!

Fabio is a really positive guy. The whole thing went really smooth and even though our flight was delayed, Somebody was waiting for us in the apartment to hand over the keys. The apartment itself is state of the art, very fancy furniture and luxurious bathrooms and kitchen. We loved the balconies as well as the spacious living room. Totally recommend it.
Great apartment as always. The host are super accommodating and the view is unmatched! Close to everything.
All great! Superb location, easy communication. Too bad I didn't  book it longer!

What an incredible way to start our New York experience! Fabio's apartment is fabulous and just as described. The view is breathtaking to say the least, and it's so convenient to heaps of great bars and cafes. Bruna was such a welcoming host too. We only wish we could have stayed longer, but Manhattan was awaiting!

Fabio's place was amazing. The apartment was extremely clean and the views were possibly the best I have seen in all my times that i've visited NYC. The location was perfect as well, in the vicinity of numerous train options to the city. I would definitely request to stay here again!
The reviews were spot on about the views, apartment and neighborhood.  What a great find this apartment has been for us...we would stay here again when next in New York.

This was our first Air BnB experience and we were not disappointed. Fabio communicated quickly and clearly, so booking etc was very smooth. The apartment is exactly as advertised, the most amazing apartment, well laid out, all amenities, great location, and the views are way better than the photos which simply cannot do them justice. The only downside, as others have referred to, is the ongoing dispute with the building management. This led to problems in getting access for us, but once we were in, it didn't really affect us at all. We simply exited and entered through the basement. I hope Fabio is able to sort out the problems, as in every other way this apartment is a gem. Even so, I would happily book it again when next in New York. Thanks for a great stay.

Fabios apartment is stunning- truly a gem in New York and more than enough room for two couples traveling together. 

As others have mentioned, there's an ongoing dispute as Airbnb is, according to the front desk of the apartment, "illegal" (I don't know whether or not it is in New York), which made for an awkward arrival. We were concerned it might affect our stay, however, it did not at all and from that point on, everyone in the building was easy to deal with and lovely towards us. 

Fabio and his family seemed to be rushing out on holiday upon our arrival, and there were a couple of things that seemed like they may have been forgotten about upon tidying up- food in the microwave, wet towels in the wash, etc- but honestly the view and apartment were so lovely and above our expectations that it was no problem. 

We hope to visit again soon and would absolutely recommend Fabio and his apartment in Brooklyn.
The place is great! Excellent location! You can truly relax here! Host was more then helpful. 'Y favorite Airbnb this far.
This apartment is the greatest discovery I have made on Airbnb so far. The view is truly amazing day and night. The space is bright and open!

Fabio's place was great. Nicely furnished with big comfy beds and the flat provided all the amenities described . The view from the flat is really fabulous! Easy to get to and easy to reach anywhere.
