Very clean and comfortable and so close to Manhattan. I would recommend anyone and would def come back. Thanks Fabio!!!

Thank you Fabio for letting us check in earlier and check out later on our departure date.  We thoroughly enjoyed your breathing-taking and spacious stunning apartment .  Thank you for all the information provided!  
Hope to come back soooooonnn!
Apartment is close to all activity and convenient. It is the best view in Brooklyn.

Ive stayed in over 30 airbnb accomodations and this was top 3 of my favorite locations ! Modern clean with stunning basically 360 degree views of the city and brooklyn. Amazing sunrise and sunsets ! I didnt want to leave ... dont think about it book ... FAbio has a house assistant who was excellent and this is a HUGE apartment. I promise to return

Fabio and Bruna were super responsive and very accommodating - since there were 4 of us staying in the apartment, all getting in to the city from different locations at different times, that was very useful. The apartment was a great space for us, and in an amazing location. We walked everywhere or took the L, which is less than 10min away. There were plenty of restaurants and bars around. Highly recommend!

We loved our stay. The biggest problem is it's hard to leave. Why jump into the rat race of the city when you can view it from the 16th floor.
Honestly this was probably one of the best airbnb spots I have stayed in. The only issue was with getting and giving back the key but it worked out just fine. Fabio was very responsive as was the friend helping him while he was out of the country. I would book again for sure.
Bruna and Fabio were friendly. The appartment is the same on the website. The Streets around are nice whith yong people.

The place was perfect for us. Amazing views. In fact, unbeatable views of the entire Manhattan skyline and Brooklyn.
Bruna was a pleasure to deal with and made our entry and exit very easy.
Definitely recommend and will come back again.

Wir wurden herzlich empfangen. Die Wohnung war geräumig und modern eingerichtet. Die Lage war perfeckt, wenige Meter von einer Einkaufsstrasse mit unzähligen von Restaurants. Wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt. Danke!
Fabio's place is amazing. It's the best location in Williamsburg, right next to the park. My favorite AirBnB I've stayed at in the area.

Unfortunately we didn't get to meet the owners.
The apartment has amazing views and is in a great location opposite the park.

We had a great time at this appartment. The location is perfect with a fantastic view over Manhattan. The appartment is very nice with a nice balcony. We stayed with the four of us. The walk to the subway takes 5 minutes and 10 minutes later your in Manhattan. Fabio and Bruna are very friendly and everything was arranged very well.

Nous avons aimé l'appartement. L'emplacement était vraiment bien avec effectivement une vue très chouette sur Manhattan midtown. L'appartement se trouve à la limite de Williamsburg et Greenpoint. Proche du metro et du ferry de East river. Plein de clés et restos super dans le quartier. C'est au 16 e etage et plutôt calme, meme si on entend toujours le bruit de fond des express ways mais bon c'est New York. L'appart lui meme nous a un peu déçu et je m'attendais à quelquechose de plus luxueux et soigné compte tenu des photos et du prix par nuit. Le menage était vraiment superficiel et l'appartement aurait besoin de plus d'attention pour être vraiment agréable. 
En general on a été content mais je ne suis pas sure qu'on reviendra.

This apartment is amazing! The view is incredible. Both nights we didn't even want to leave for dinner. We stayed here with out two year old son and it was very kid friendly. There was a pack-n-play for him to use as a bed. Great location, really nice neighborhood overlooking a park and plenty of places to shop and eat nearby.

Fabio could not have been a better host.  He was welcoming and helpful as we planned our stay, and very accommodating.  His apartment is incredible.  We arrived at night and enjoyed a drink on the patio while we enjoyed the beautiful sight of the New York skyline; it was gorgeous.  The wall of windows gave us picturesque views the entire weekend.  The apartment was perfect for our family of four, very comfortable, and we loved the proximity to McCarren Park.  The neighborhood was terrific, very convenient with shops and restaurants and markets close by.  We loved the weekend Farmer's Market just one block away!  We loved everything about our stay and hope we can come back again!  Thank you Fabio!

The view from the apartment is superb, the location is fantastic (a short walk from the subway, the waterfront, great coffee and food) and Fabio/Bruna were very responsive. They were flexible on the times for check-in and check-out, and gave us access to a parking spot for free. If you're interested in staying in Williamsburg this is the place to be.

Le logement est parfaitement bien décrit et les photos du site reflètent bien l'appartement.
En revanche sur l'accueil (CHECK IN), Fabio, le propriétaire n'était pas présent, il nous avez laissé les coordonnées d'une Amie qui devait nous remettre les clés à l'arrivée et nous ouvrir l'appartement le jour de l'arrivée et cette dernière n'était pas là.
Les clés nous ont donc été remises de façon très impersonnelle et sans accompagnement jusqu'à l'appartement, sur le trottoir, par une personne. C'est un peu dommage.
Sinon, tout était parfait. Appartement propre, fonctionnel, en bon état, et la vue sur MIDTOWN de Manathan est fascinante.
Le quartier de WILLIAMSBURG est vivant et l'on y trouve énormément de commerces et restaurants à proximité.
Expérience à renouveler.
Jacques FLOTAT

Fabio and Bruna were fabulous hosts! Our stay couldn't have been better and the view was even more amazing than we could have hoped for! Bruna was very easy to get in touch with throughout our stay and incredibly accommodating. Hope to return next year!
Fabio's apartment is the perfect place to stay if you're taking a trip to Brooklyn. It's centrally located and has an incredible view of the Manhattan skyline. I'd definitely stay here again.

We totally enjoyed our stay here and would stay again in an instant!  The apartment has everything, is spacious light and bright and in a great location.  We really enjoyed the park right across the street, local shops, farmers market and restaurants - and it is only a short walk to the metro if you want to get to Manhattan.

The view from this apartment was exceptional. It was a horribly hot weekend in NYC and the large expanse of windows made you feel as if you were outdoors without having to face the heat. The apartment overlooks McCarren Park where there is alway lots of sports activity but you hear none of the noise on the 16th floor. The neighborhood is wonderful with shops and restaurants close by. The beds were large and comfortable and it was great to have two bathrooms. The sofa bed in the livingroom was also appreciated. We would definitely stay here again!

His condo was beautiful and in a great location. It was the perfect size for a family with small kids. The location was directly across from the park and we felt completely safe walking around even late at night. We would highly recommend it and would love to stay there again.
Killer location. Great views. Nice place.

Bruna was very flexible on the check-in.  My nephew met her at a nearby location to get the key do we wouldn't be delayed after the taxi arrived.  The apartment is spectacular with views of McCarren park just below.  We particularly enjoyed having coffee on the veranda every morning.  The kitchen had all the dishes and other amenities so that we were able to eat in a couple of nights.  Overall, this is a great place to stay and enjoy the sites of NYC.
Stay was brilliant!
Bruna was great host, communication was clear and everything went smoothly. View is amazing and location is perfect!

What a fantastic stay in Williamsburg/Greenpoint. Fabios apartment is modern and gorgeous. The best part is the view! The pictures here don't do it justice. It's a large apartment that can easily fit two couples. Great and spacious living space with floor to ceiling windows overlooking McLaren Park and all of Manhattan. Also a nice little balcony from which to take in the view. Located in a great part of town, you are close to all the restaurants and shops on Bedford, but removed enough from the bustle to feel relaxed. Easy access to the subway and to highways. Overall great stay! Would return anytime.

Der Blick aus der Wohnung und die Lage waren hervorragend! Wir fühlten uns zu jeder Zeit sicher und um die Ecke gibt es viele schöne Restaurants, Cafés usw. Auch die Subway ist um die Ecke, so dass die Lage für uns perfekt war. Brooklyn ist richtig toll! 
Einziger Kritikpunkt ist die zum Teil mangelnde Hygiene. Speziell die Küche/Küchenschränke waren verschmutzt und die Bettwäsche, Handtücher und vor allem die kleinen Teppiche hätten sauberer und frischer sein können. Trotzdem haben wir uns wohl gefühlt und würden die Wohnung empfehlen!

Great location and amazing view over Manhattan skyline!
We were thrown out of the fitness center by management and the concierge told us that they don't give any service to visitors of this apartment due to difficulties with the owner.
Fabio was not there during our stay and his girlfriend was late for checking in and she didn't even show up for checking out although the time was agreed the day before. I did not get any reply to my messages anymore and left the keys at the concierge although I was specifically asked not to do so when I checked in, but what should I do? Even now - one week later - I didn't receive an answer!

This is a beautiful apartment with views that are every bit as striking as the listing suggests and a great location in the heart of Williamsburg. We jogged around the McCarren Park track, shopped at the Saturday farmers market, brunched at nearby bistros, and generally had a swell time. Communication with Fabio was straightforward, and the logistics of key pick-up and drop-off were easy. We'd come back.
Fabio's apartment is beautiful and lived up to all expectations.  He is a warm and friendly host.  A great place to stay in central Williamsburg.
The apartment was in an amazing location with fabulous views of Manhattan.  It was great to explore Williamsburg.  It was very spacious, clean and comfortable.
Amazing view of the city. Day or night, it's spectacular. Right in the mix of everything that Brooklyn has to offer. Great communication with the host and everything was easy to figure out.

I visited Brooklyn and Manhattan with my friends and stayed in this beautiful place. The apartment was nice and very comfortable. The view of Manhattan and Brooklyn was truly amazing! My girlfriends were just as impressed as I was. Fabio communicated everything very clearly before our arrival. I've stayed in other homes in Williamsburg and Greenpoint and this was absolutely the best! Thank you Fabio for providing this lovely place for us.
Great apartment. The view is really breathtaking and the location in Williamsburg is really nice to enjoy the city
We stayed in Fabio'a place for 2 nights. Check in/out is easy and the place is very clean and cozy. The best part is the view - breathtaking!

Awesome experience! The host was very friendly and available via (Hidden by Airbnb) at all times. Both check-in and check-out were arranged perfectly. The apartment has a great layout even for 5 and more visitors and the view certainly is breathtaking! There are plenty of shops and restaurants on Bedford ave and the L line is only a few minutes away, so getting in and out of Manhattan is convenient – after this trip I would actually recommend to stay in this area and not in downtown Manhattan because it is much calmer and more convenient for families. If you do so, make sure to stay at Fabio's!
Really great view and spacious apartment. Fabio and his hosts were very responsive and easy to work with

We had a great month in Williamsburg. Easy to check in and out, host available when needed. The apartment has absolutely ludicrous views! Only thing is one of the porters is a bit rude and very against airbnb people staying (the other was charming). Also only one set of keys available which was inconvenient. That said, stunning place and recommended.
Great location, perfect apartment! Stayed there with my kids and it was excellent.
Beautiful place and view. Private parking. Nice neighborhood. Good communication.

Our stay was great. The location was very good, view was great, the beds were comfy, and the baths were luxurious. We had a bit of trouble on our end with the key pickup but Michelle was very kind and accommodating which made a stressful situation very positive. Thanks again!

Beautiful view from large windows. Parking was great. Beds are firm (to my liking). Water pressure and temperature good - shower door needs to be adjusted. Several eateries nearby, and Saturday fresh market right out the door, plus friendly dog park. We did not cook, so I do not know about how well the kitchen was stocked. The coffee maker was small, but there was a close-by coffee shop/breakfast restaurant. Be discreet with building staff.
gorgeous view, basic amenities, 2 cup coffee pot, comfortable Master bed
The apartment is very bright and comfortable. The view is spectacular, and the location is very convenient. Fabio and Michelle are wonderful hosts. We would definitely come back.
Make certain that the there are no big repair items open before renting this lovely apartment.

Greenpoint is a great neighborhood that is lively during the day and quiet at night.  I found it to be similar to Jamaica Plain in Boston. Unpretenious eateries can thrive.  We enjoyed Beco, serving Brazilian food. 
If Fabio doesn't mention it, McCarren Park is nearby. In addition to some green space, it has a track, racket court, skate park, (and public pool--not sure ~admittance). 
The view is just as the photograph portrays, from the financial district to uptown. 
The apartment is roomy and the balconies are just large enough for a few people to gather.
Was a wonderful place to stay nice view I'm really recommend to other people this place :)
Super apartment. Michelle, the host, was nice and responsive.

El departamento es muy lindo , tal cual se ve en las fotos , el barrio es lindisimo y fácil para viajar a Manhattan . 
Baños , camas , almohadas , muy bien
Great view
Great location. Having McCarren park below and the city as a backdrop is just incredible.
The apartment has a great view and a really good location, calm and close to restaurants, shops and the subway. Michelle, the host, is very attentive and nice.
Great apartment, fantastic location and view

Four words to describe this great apartment: 1. VIEWS - pictures do not do it justice, the views are spectacular!. 2. LOCATION - a quiet, peaceful place with a big park and lots of fun, eclectic walk able restaurants and transportation. 3. PARKING - included,  gated and secure. 4. MAINTENANCE - unfortunately, this apartment needs some.  Only one of three air conditioning units was operable in the front rooms - it was over 80 F in most of that space (the bedroom units were fine) making it uncomfortable.  Master shower door and door knob on bedroom #2 were broken, and several light bulbs were missing and some electrical outlets did not work.  There is no available "on-site" service for any of these items.
Great views!
We had a fantastic time in Fabio's apartment. The apartment has some of the best views in Brooklyn, its close to restaurant, bars and a short walk to the subway. Highly recommended

This place is incredible. A perspective on New York like nothing else. Such a comfortable, easy apartment to be in, has everything you need to make it a home away from home. Thanks for having us Fabio!

This apartment was a perfect fit for our trip to Brooklyn.  The location is perfect, the apartment is clean, comfortable and well set up.  The views were amazing as promised!  We will be back to Brooklyn and hope to stay here again.
We would highly recommend this apartment. The location is perfect, the view amazing, the apartment clean and spacious!

Not only does Fabio's apartment have a jaw-dropping 270 degree of Manhattan and beyond, it is conveniently located in the hottest neighborhood in Brooklyn, close to the best restaurants, great indie shopping, and easy transportation.  It also has the most comfortable mattress of any Airbnb I have stayed in to date.  Spotlessly clean and modern, with wifi, cable, powerful A/C and all the comforts of home.  I will definitely be back.
Place is exactly as described. Wonderful place, well stocked and excellent view in a great location. Parking is on site. We can walk our dog in the park across the street.

Fabulous views of Manhattan, everything that we wanted after sights seeing. Big comfy beds and 
Large lounge area. Close to Subway for day tripping and lovely Italian restaurant nearby. De Stefanos, definitely recommend.

Apartment is very spacious and it has an outstanding view of NYC skyline and the East River.  It is in a quiet building but  it is walking distance to everything in Williamsburg.  The "across the street" access to McCaren Park is an added bonus.
Amazing apartment. Two porches have amazing views of both Brooklyn and Manhattan, plus the view of mccarren park is great! Has everything you could need. 5 stars!
Great views and location
Everything was amazing! The views are fantastic!

The view is as advertised and is simply breathtaking. The location is great and the logistics of checking in and out were smooth. There were quite a number of things in the apartment that were not working (1 AC, shower door, toilet, almost all outlets in master bedroom and bathroom, lights) which was disappointing considering the price.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Beautiful place and oh what a view! The balconies off of the living room and master bedroom are amazing! The location is perfect! I went to a concert at The Barclays Center which was a pretty quick Uber ride away.  Williamsburg is fabulous! Great restaurants, bars and cool parks. Thank you for a wonderful experience!

Fabio's place is stunning! it is clean, in  a great location and the view REALLY is amazing. We loved being right by the park, a little bit away from wburg central but still walkable. The place was clean and well stocked. We would stay here again.

Suggestions I have/ things to be aware of: there are a few fixtures that aren't repaired in the apartment. Shower door/some doors don't quite close. We didn't use the AC so can't comment on that. This didn't hinder the experience but just an FYI. Additionally, there seems to be some friction between the owner and the building. While we stayed there, we got several comments from the neighbors about the owner's standing with the building, and got a knock on the door trying to serve the owner foreclosure papers. We tried to stay out of it, but would have appreciated a heads up or more clarity around the situation.
Fabio's apartment is absolutely stunning. The view can't be beat and he was amazingly responsive. Thank you so much! GREAT host!

This was a great place to stay! Walkable neighborhood with lots of restaurants and shops; close to the park; beautiful, clean apartment with AMAZING views, smooth check-in/out process & easy communication with the host. The only downside was some of the outlets not working in the bedrooms, and that there aren’t any nearby subway stations. That aside, I strongly recommend!
Great place and omg what a view 5 star home!
This is a great spot ...really a fabulous apartment. And the views are great just like they promised. We'll be going back
Beautiful home is a great part of Brooklyn.  Check-in was easy, and communication was great.  It was a perfect place for an extended stay!
Great place, great host.

Fabio’s place is beyond breathe-taking. The view is priceless. Photos of the apartment are pretty accurate but expectations were exceeded after our first arrival. The place was very clean, stylish and fully stocked with basic necessities and extra amenities. 
Fabio made sure communication was quick and easy during check in and check out.
Beautiful apartment - highly recommend to anyone looking for a spectacular view of the city.

Great location. Close to shops, Resturants etc. Subway is 10 min walk and quick to Manhattan. Area in Greenpoint safe and easy to navigate. 

Only niggles: Frustrating that plugs don’t work, no kettle and chipped mugs for hot drinks. 

Loved everything else. Views from apartment are standout.
Unbeatable views in a great neighborhood.

Fabio has a beautiful apartment with truly amazing views. It is spacious and comfortable and we enjoyed hanging out there. It is in an excellent location, close to shops, restaurants and the subway, with super fast connections to Manhatten. Gaining access and communication  with our host Michelle was excellent and she was extremely responsive to questions and issues. The only small negative is that there are a few minor maintenance issues, including those that have been raised in previous reviews, that need to be addressed. However, overall we very much enjoyed our stay - thank you.

Fabio was a fantastic and accommodating host. Check in and check out were extremely smooth and the place has one of the most incredible views. The place was very clean and located close to the L train, which made going back and forth between Manhattan and Brooklyn very convenient.

This place was d (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) pe. The views are insanely beautiful! Nice size apartment and great sound system. The balcony was great and he even has little heaters out there so it can be used in the winter
Wonderful views of the city! The apartment is fabulous and check in couldn't be easier. Great communication and a smooth process. Lots of restaurants in the area and just an ideal location.
Amazing view of Manhattan! Stay went smoothly, no dramas. Fabio was really easy to communicate with, would definitely stay again.
A beautiful, wide-open, sun-lit flat with incredible views of Manhattan. Portable crib and high chair were huge bonuses for our family. A short walk to all the amenities of Williamsburg.
Spectacular Views and incredible hosts! Will most definitely stay again!!
Fabolous view in a great location of williamsburg. Well equipped, spacious apartment with super comfy beds :) Highly recommended

Fabio’s apartment rocks. A step away from a ton of restaurants on Bedford Ave and overlooking beautiful Mccarren park.
The apartment has all the amenities you need, it is clean and has the most amazing view of the manhattan skyline. Two thumbs up!
We really enjoying staying at Fabio’s place. AMAZING view of Manhatten from the w tire kitchen and living room. Quick walk to the L and you catch a train into the city. Loved our stay!
The view is absolutely spectacular. Everything you could want from coffee to wine to food to music... this location can’t be beat!
Generally found the apartment consistent with prior reviews.   We had a couple issues that he tended to

We gave 16B a very low rating for two reasons.  First, its photos and descriptions were very misleading.  While the views of the Manhattan skyline were impressive, the apartment itself was rundown and in need of repairs.  The furniture was not what was shown in the photos.  There were no rugs on the floors which were in desperate need of refinishing and were dirty and stained with grime.  The shades in one bedroom were broken and couldn’t be raised or lowered.  The bathroom door in the master bedroom was off its rails and couldn’t be closed.  There were no functional lights in one bedroom and the door to the outside deck was broken and couldn’t be opened.  We were very disappointed given the “hype” of the advertisement.  A more accurate description would have been “Rent from an absentee landlord whose interest has waned and whose neighbors are upset.”

That’s the second reason we were disturbed by our experience and doubt we’ll rent from AB&B again.  We were told by several people that the owner of the unit we rented is in conflict with the condo association in the building and in litigation over maintenance fees.  He’s very unpopular with other owners, guests can’t use the work out Room and admit that they are staying in 16B, and can’t leave the keys when they leave the building with the concierge because the owner is so unpopular.  My family and I came to Brooklyn for a family occasion, to relax, and see a show.  We did not come to take part in someone else’s conflict with his neighbors, profit-making rip off, and another example of the Great American social media scam.  Let’s ask for a little integrity in how AB&B treats its customers and its neighbors.  I would never want to repeat this experience again.
Fabio's place was fantastic and just as advertised/pictured. A great stay.
FANTASTIC views and in a prime location for restaurants, parks, and nightlife! Very appreciative that we were able to experience this one-in-a-kind home!
If you want a great view this one can’t be beaten.  Apartment a wee bit tired, but that’s not why you rent this place.

We have stayed in this flat before and will hopefully again. Love it. It really does have a spectacular view of Manhattan.  The space is comfortable and relaxing.  The neighborhood just continues to blossom in all directions.  And fabio and his communication is always very clear and rapid.  Enjoy.
Perfect place to stay in. Perfect location.  Couldn’t have Asked for more.  Communication was awesome and felt well prepped for staying there.  Thanks again for everything.

We had a great time staying in the apartment.  It was just as nice as it looks in the pictures, and the view is spectacular.  The check in process was seamless, and communication was easy.  It’s a great deal for this neighborhood- would definitely stay here again.
We had a fabulous time here. Super location, very family friendly, beautiful spot!

Great apartment on a fabulous location!
Enjoyed Brooklyn a lot; the atmosphere, restaurants, shops, the river-area.
With Manhattan only a few metro stops away it is perfectly located.
The views are magnificent all around and there's more then enough dining/breakfast choice in the neighbourhood. 

The apartment is spacious and nicely kept with fine bedrooms, bathrooms and a little balcony with stunning view over Manhattan.

Communication is fast, friendly and we were helped with our need-to-knows.
This was my second time staying at this apartment! Amazing views of manhattan in the perfect area. Thank you!
Views are wonderful!  I loved every minute I was there!  I hope to go back next year with my daughter!
What an amazing place! The view is breathtaking. One of the nicest apartment I have been in Brooklyn. Highly recommended.

Beautiful apartment, highly recommended. We are a family of five and it suited our needs brilliantly. Facilities in the apartment are excellent and the view is spectacular 24/7. It’s the 16th floor of an 18 floor building, which is one of the tallest in the area. Directly in front is McCarren Park, which means there are uninterrupted views of Manhattan, either from the living room or a small terrace, accessed from the living room. There is a second, small terrace on the other side of the apartment, accessed from the master bedroom. The local neighbourhood has plenty of grocery stores, bars and restaurants. Subway is a 10 minute walk (Lorimer St/ Metropolitan Avenue or Bedford Avenue) but once there it’s a quick ride into Manhattan. We had a fabulous stay.

Beautiful space and view.
Possibly one of the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in!

Communication simple et efficace, emplacement exceptionnel, espace et excellent confort!
Nous recommandons cet endroit magique
Spectacular view!!!

Great location, space and view!
Everything went very well and we were well taken care of!

All about the views and location. Our stay at Fabio’s was quite enjoyable, especially with the living room terrace attached. Unfortunately there were a few unexpected issues with the stay, including burnt out lights in the master bathroom and an unfriendly building staff. 

The doorman and other employees made it clear that the host stopped paying maintenance fees so in turn would not accommodate us as Airbnb guests, even as far as buzzing in. We understood that the building might be upset over the issues with our host but as Airbnb customers, we had no prior knowledge to this issue or any control. 

A clear understanding of the situation or a resolution between Fabio and the building fees would be appreciated by future guests!
Amazing city view and apartment is clean, modern, and very accommodating

Fantastic experience. Stunning views and extremely convenient location. Couldn’t have picked a better spot to bring friends who’ve never been to NYC. Very flashy yet homey and comfortable. The only thing I didn’t like is that it’s not mine to stay at forever. Wonderful neighborhood, close to the train, quiet building—just perfect.

The apartment was clean and the view is fantastic! Fabio was very easy to get in touch with and helped with an earlier check in time. Some comments mention the building gives issues to guests staying in the apartment but we did not run into any problems.
Great place to stay!
It was an amazing stay! Great views with the perfect location
Great stay here. Will definitely come back if I’m ever in the city. Thanks Fabio for your hospitality.
Fabio’s place was beautiful, clean and comfortable.  Perfect place to stay if you’re traveling with a dog as a dog friendly park is right across the street.
I really enjoyed staying here. Spacious and the view was amazing!! :)

Spacious apartment with great NYC skyline view - just as mentioned in the description. There is also a rooftop terrace with even better view!
Everything fine & clean!
Our check-in was very late - but no problem as the key was deposited in a place accessible 24/24.
Beautiful space, great location. Very comfortable place to stay - equipped kitchen, clean and lovely bathrooms and bedrooms, outdoor space is beautiful - view is truly spectacular.

Great place with amazing view! The building is secured and clean. Easy to get to Manhattan or other parts of Brooklyn and boroughs. Beautiful modern bathrooms and kitchen all have sleek updated fixtures. 
Highly recommend it!

Vue à couper le souffle! Appartement génial à la hauteur de nos espérances pour le séjour de ma famille à New York. Propriétaire très à l’écoute et toujours présent pour donner des conseils. 
Thank you so much :)

Fabio's apartment was fantastic. The view really blew us way and isn't common in New York. The apartment was spacious and clean. Everything was easy - easy entrance, easy exit, great location. We would definitely stay with Fabio again.

This condo exceeded my high expectations! First, the views are AMAZING. There’s an entire wall of windows with full Manhattan skyline views. The size of the condo/kitchen was giant, especially for NY standards. The master bath was also beautiful - with a big counter and space for hair/makeup. There are two outdoor spaces/balconies. The elevator was so convenient with our stroller. Huge bonus was the free parking too. The neighborhood was fun, so walkable with many many restaurants and bars. The subway was nearby too. Couldn’t love this place more.

Fabio's place is very spacious (especially by NYC standards), fairly clean, and close to everything. The city views, of course are amazing. It was also nice that we were able to leave our bags before the official check-in time and come back later. The apartment had everything we needed! You'll notice by the number of reviews, that this place is pretty popular – and as a result it's a bit worse for wear. Nothing major, just scuffs on walls, toilet paper holder hanging on by a thread, broken electrical outlets, and general signs of serious wear and tear. For the price, would be nice to get those in shape.
Fabio’s place is great. I recommend it.
Amazing location if you’re staying in Brooklyn and has a spectacular view of Manhattan. Will definitely considering staying at this AirBNB again in the future!

Amazing location, convenient to quaint NYC eating and shopping. The view of midtown is absolutely incredible both day and night! The apartment is very large and accomoddates small gatherings beautifully. The check in and out is very easy. Building staff were very pleasant. I agree with a previous review that it is very clean but shows alot of wear and tear.

Wonderful, spacious apartment. On a high floor so nice and quiet.  Stunning view and loads of great places to eat in the neighbourhood.  Very well equipped kitchen. We were  two couples and had a fantastic long weekend in Williamsburg.  Very easy access by subway to Manhattan.

Would have gotten 5 stars, but they lose one for the crappy internet, and our 1st morning visit from 4 officers of the NY Department of Housing who were investigating the property's apparent illegal usage as an AirBNB rental. Just a heads up that this is an issue in the building.
Fabio has the best apartment in Manhattan folks! Stop your searching and book because he is the best host with a beautiful apartment and quick responses!
Very nice
Fabulous views! Very well appointed so that we were able to have Christmas dinner there. Nice building in great location. Process of checking in and out was very easy.
Great location, easy check in, spectacular view of Manhattan.

Fabio’s apartment is a very modern and still cozy place! the subway station is very close (5min walking) and the neighborhood very friendly. we had some doubts about the washing machine, trash and a doorman but they were solved right way! internet was great, the apartment was clean and the view is everything! a lovely space to enjoy nyc!
The views and the apartment are spectacular.  Location is excellent.  We really enjoyed our stay.
Perfect everything
Amazing space, great host, and those views! HIGHLY recommended. This is what the Air BNB experience is all about.
excelente
Beautiful apartment. The Airbnb Host was very responsive and nice.
Fabio’s place was nice. The view is truly amazing and the space was clean comfortable.
The view was the best part of the whole experience. When I go back to nyc im definitely staying here again! Thank you

We were very disappointed staying in Fabio's place. The day before the move in, we received an email saying the heater didn't work in the 2nd bedroom so they were providing a space heater. We tried this out on our first night, but this one didn't supply even heat throughout the night so our 13-month old son woke up shivering in the middle of the night. The master bedroom heater didn't work well either. It was 65 in the morning although the heater was set for 70.  Although they were willing to help, we realised it would take 2-3 days to get this fully sorted and we simply didn't have the time for that because we had important things to take care of in NYC. We moved out after 1 night, even though we had initially booked it for 10 days. I believe airbnb has required them to fix the heater issue before they can accept more guests. 

Apart from this, the apartment does NOT look like the photos. The sofas are not white. There is now an L-shaped grey sofa and a polka dot armless 2-seater. The dining chairs are now all black leather. The TV in the apartment is maybe a 36" and the one in the photos looks like a 50". The artwork on the walls in the living room and master bedroom are gone and there is no decorative items on the coffee table. They have hung the mirror seen on the floor in the photos on the wall. The photos make the unit look warm, lived-in and stylish, but this is not how it looks in real life. The host really should update the photos. The host told us the photos are 5 years old and that he has improved the furniture. I think it's unfair to rent anything on airbnb that doesn't look like the photos. 

On a positive note, the view is amazing and just like the photos. The kitchen and bathrooms are fine, the beds are comfortable and there is a washer and dryer in the unit. It's right next to McCarren Park which has so much to offer: running track, playground, outdoor gym and hang out areas. Williamsburg also seems really quaint. We wish we could have experienced all this.
Views views views!! What an amazing stay in Brooklyn. I can’t wait to return in the spring and summer when all of the trees are in full bloom. Thanks for a wonderful weekend.
Expect to be super pleased.

name: This Princeville 1BD Will Charm You
summary: Aloha! Our newly remodeled one-bedroom condo is light and airy, a lovely place to come home to after exploring Kauai’s North Shore. Full kitchen, bath, large lanai, reserved parking space, shared pool, jacuzzi, BBQ grills. Near restaurants, shopping.
space: Our newly remodeled condo has a comfortable California king bed, a full bathroom with tub, full kitchen including a dishwasher, large living/dining room with a queen-sized sofabed, washer and dryer and a large lanai with separate seating and dining areas. There is a large flat screen TV with cable,  wifi Internet connection, games, puzzles, and books, and for the beach, chairs, umbrella, beach towels and boogie boards.
description: Aloha! Our newly remodeled one-bedroom condo is light and airy, a lovely place to come home to after exploring Kauai’s North Shore. Full kitchen, bath, large lanai, reserved parking space, shared pool, jacuzzi, BBQ grills. Near restaurants, shopping. Our newly remodeled condo has a comfortable California king bed, a full bathroom with tub, full kitchen including a dishwasher, large living/dining room with a queen-sized sofabed, washer and dryer and a large lanai with separate seating and dining areas. There is a large flat screen TV with cable,  wifi Internet connection, games, puzzles, and books, and for the beach, chairs, umbrella, beach towels and boogie boards. The condo is in Sandpiper Village which has an open layout with lawns and tropical landscaping. It includes a pool area with a large tiled pool, HOT jacuzzi, and two gas powered BBQ grills for your use. You can dine poolside at one of the many umbrella-covered tables or under the covered pavilion, or take your meal back to y
neighborhood_overview: Kauai's North Shore is possibly the most beautiful spot on Earth! Princeville is perched above legendary Hanalei Bay and has its own shopping center complete with a supermarket, post office, yoga studio, cafe, galleries, shops and restaurants. Come enjoy its golf courses, bike/walking path, secluded beaches, and sunset views. Outdoor activities abound-- hike, bike, kayak, zipline, horseback ride to a waterfall, windsurf, snorkel, stand up paddle board, take surf lessons, or just grab a beach chair, sink your toes into the sand and take it all in!
notes: Because the apartment is in a condo complex, there are some things that are out of our control, such as unscheduled pool maintenance, in which case not only the pool but the jacuzzi and BBQ grills are unavailable. As in most residences in Kauai, there is no air conditioning. During the late spring and summer months, in addition to the ceiling fan in the living room, a standing fan and a table fan are available for your use. Please turn them off when not in the condo. Internet access is not 100% reliable--our provider, Oceanic Time Warner, occasionally does maintenance and high winds and/or storms can interrupt service as well.  The condo shares a wall with the unit next door. While we did put in extra soundproofing, it's not perfect. If you are planning on spending lots of time indoors, this may be a problem.  Cell coverage from within the condo (and in Kauai in general) is much better with Verizon than AT&T (don't know about other carriers).  Your total includes 4% General Excise Tax
transit: The almost necessary way to travel is by car, although there is a public bus that runs from Kekaha on the south side to Hanalei on the north. Fares and schedules are available online (search Kauai bus schedules).
access: The condo is in Sandpiper Village which has an open layout with lawns and tropical landscaping. It includes a pool area with a large tiled pool, HOT jacuzzi, and two gas powered BBQ grills for your use. You can dine poolside at one of the many umbrella-covered tables or under the covered pavilion, or take your meal back to your place. There is one parking place reserved for your use.
interaction: We live in Berkeley, California, but if we are in Kauai during your stay, we will be happy to answer any questions that you may have. In our absence, our property manager will be glad to assist you.
house_rules: No smoking (not even on the lanai--you can step outside the driveway onto Pepelani Loop to smoke if need be). No pets. Sandpiper Village has residents as well as vacationers, so please be respectful of our neighbors and be quiet between 9 pm and 8 am. If you are staying longer than 3 weeks, there is a mandatory extra cleaning. Please observe the Hawaiian custom of no shoes in the house, and remove sand and mud before entering. The following will be deducted from the security deposit if lost: $25 for door key; $50 for pool key; $10 for parking pass.

host.host_about:
My husband Rob is an architect/developer and I am recently retired from working in IT at a large northern California utility company. We knew each other in our early teens and remained friends into our 20s. In 2004 we ran into each other completely serendipitously and a few years later were married in our garden in Berkeley, surrounded by friends and family. We are both interested in art, architecture and music, where his tastes are classically inclined and mine tend more towards the Grateful Dead and lately, everything ukulele.  We love hiking, reading, traveling and good conversation.

My first trip to Kauai was in 1975 and it was love at first sight. Smitten, and haunted by memories of green and blue and rainbows and Bali Hai, I moved there in 1977, just in time for my twin daughters to be born at Wilcox Hospital in Lihue.  We ended up moving back to the mainland a year later, but in the intervening years, we vacationed there many times as a family. One of the twins eventually heeded the island's call and in 2012 moved to Princeville with her husband and family. (You could probably count on one hand the number of days they have not been at the beach or on a wave since moving!) I hope to persuade my city-loving husband to consider retiring to Kauai. So far he has promised me a month per year.  That's a start.

We hope your stay in Hale Nani or Hale Nani Iki is a pleasant one.

reviews.comments: Our original airbnb apartment cancelled on us the last minute and Sarah was kind enough to let us book her place on an extremely late notice. The place was in a great location - very quite and private. All the amenities made it easy for us to settle down and finally relax. Thank you so much!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Sarah's place. The condo was immaculately clean. The kitchen is fully equipped for a professional chef. The location is fantastic.  Everything about this place it's just perfect!! : )
I would love to go back again.  
Sarah, thank you for putting so much TLC to the unit. It truly shows.

This place was absolutely perfect. Sarah has thought of everything. My daughter and I spent 4 nights here and were thrilled. Daughter sleep on sleeper sofa and said it was very comfortable. The location doesn't get any better. The condo is in perfect condition and very updated. Sarah was the perfect host and excellent about communicating. You are only 1 mile from the beaches at the St Regis (which has public access), hideaway beach, as well as Queens Bath. 

 I feel that if you are not satisfied with this condo, then nothing would ever satisfy you w/ a rental property. 

I will definitely be renting this place again.

The description of Sarah's Condo was very accurate- big open windows- very clean and the grounds are well kept (the Kauai island feeling). The Space is very close to Hanalei and down the street from the St. Regis. There is even a community space in the area to watch the sunset off the coastline. Kitchen has all appliances you need if you like to cook!
The place is great, and the host is very helpful. We definitely recommend this apartment to other people.

The entire experience at this Princevill 1BD hosted by Sarah Satterlee was fantastic.  Upon our arrival, we quickly realized what a great choice we had made in staying here.  The home was clean and cozy with all the amenities needed for a comfortable and fun family vacation in Kauai.  The neighborhood and surrounding area was beautiful and well maintained.  Gorgeous trails, breathtaking beaches, and a plethora of wonderful Princeville and Hanalei bay destinations were right outside our doorstep.  All the neighbors and people we met were extremely friendly and helpful. Many of them enthusiastically offered advice on places to go and things to do. Most importantly, our host went out of her way to make sure we had everything we needed.  Sarah was very thoughtful and helped make our vacation go smoothly.  I highly recommend her place and we hope to return next year.

Our stay at Sarah's condo was sooooo easy breezy - exactly what we hoped for arriving in paradise! The location was central to everything we wanted to do on the north shore. The condo was set up perfectly for guests including beach towels, beach chairs, boogie boards, and beach bag! We spent most of time at Tunnels Beach snorkeling with sea turtles!! We also enjoyed Hanalei Bay Area for our eating and shopping. If you want to support Hanalei's local artists community head over to the General Store. Sarah was super with communicating and providing a wonderful space for us to live in a dream in Kauai! I highly recommend staying at Sarah's and I hope to visit soon again! Mahalo!

Sarah was very good with communicating with us. Her place was very clean and neat. It's a great location and most of the neighbors are quiet and polite. The rate was VERY affordable and the one bedroom with full kitchen was perfect for us.
Sarah's place was perfect!! The condo was fabulous and a perfect location! Thank you so much, we will certainly be back!!

We love it!

The lodging is well.
You  have all was you need!
The contact with the landlord was fine.
We can recommend this.
We hope see you soon!

Sarah is a wonderful host - very responsive, and she has put a lot of thought into making the place comfortable and welcoming. The condo is conveniently located (one is not far from the St.Regis hotel beach, as well as a grocery store), and the terrace is so wonderful. Five stars!

My husband, myself and our two teenage children stayed at this perfect Princeville home. Our stay was beyond anything we could have expected. The home was very clean and stocked with everything you would need for your Hawaiian visit. It was also very peaceful, relaxing and we had plenty of space for all four of us. My kids shared the pull out couch which has an incredibly soft and comfortable mattress. The location could not be better too. Right in the heart of Princeville and a stones throw from hanalei. Sarah was amazing!! She was very helpful and very quick to respond if there was anything we needed. We felt like it was our own second home. We look forward to coming back next year and staying at Sarah's. I highly recommend this to anyone. Her home completed our visit to Kauai and made it perfect. Nothing bad to say. Thank you again Sarah for everything!!!!

Sarah was a great host! Very helpful and lovely. She was organised and knowledgable and helped us whenever we needed. The condo was magical. It was perfect for my father and I travelling together. It is in a Great location and felt very homey. Thanks again Sarah, I can't wait to return :D

This is truly a home away from home - Sarah left us a welcome sheet done in nice calligraphy in Hawaiian (?) and English poetry.   All amenities were as stated/photographed on airbnb site and more!
We were just sorry to not have met Sarah or Selina in person while we were there!  Neighbors were very friendly, and only loud during the weekend, which was understandable, and nothing to do with this home at all.  I would recommend this to all my friends, and would love to stay here again!
It was a perfect stay in Sarah's apartment. Everything was as expected and we did not miss anything. She was also very responsive and we can completely recommend staying there!

Sarah's condo was perfect for relaxing. It was comfortable, clean, and communication was easy. The kitchen had everything you could need. Sarah also provided beach chairs, umbrella, etc. The pool and grill facilities were great as well.

Sarah and her daughter Selina were amazing hosts! Even though we never had the opportunity to meet them in person, they were in constant communication, making sure we were well settled in. They even shipped us a forgotten item after return!

The apartment was more than we could have ever asked for. It was immaculate, spacious and we felt right at home. It was well situated among the Princeville resort hotels, with easy access to restaurants in Hanalei and hiking in Kapa'a and the Napoli coast.

Super Super Good!!! The room is big enough for a couple and very clean. I can find everything I need in the place. The neighbours were very firenly and also gave us some suggestions on food and good places.With Sarah's detail instruction we can easily find the villiage, car parking and room. It's walkable to Queen's Bath and The WESTINE, there is a small cliff swimming pool in WESTINE. We had a very good stay for 5 nights in this cando. I stronly recommend this lovely cando and hopefully someday I will be back.

This place was amazing for the two of us! A great place to come back to after a day of hiking, exploring, or snorkeling. It was the perfect place to be on the North Shore and we were close to everything we needed. It was also great to be able to cook most of our meals and do laundry! Sarah was very easy to get a hold of when we needed her and the place was very clean. We will be staying here when we are able to return!

Look No Further! This place was a dream!
- Great location
- Perfect Size accommodation
- Everything you need within reach

Sarah was a great host, she answered all of our questions very promptly, and gave us great feedback. This place had a great pool area (clean and quiet!), the kitchen was stocked with everything, the Princeville location was GORGEOUS and so close to many beautiful beaches.

The accommodation itself was super clean, tidy, spacious, and wonderful! Perfect for a couple looking for a getaway!

Sarah was very welcoming and easy to communicate with. We stayed here for 9 days and felt very comfortable in her home. It was clean and well organized. The neighborhood was safe, clean and well maintained. Thankfully, no parking problems. Occasional noise from neighbors across from the lanai (background music and talking on their lanai) and some road noise but fairly quiet overall. 

Mahalo!

Great place, we loved staying there. Place was very clean and had everything we needed, including a full kitchen, washer dryer, and plenty of towels. Very conveniently located in Princeville, a short drive to the St. regis beach or Foodland or Hanalei.  Sarah has been very communicative and the coordination to get to the place was easy. I think a lot of the condo units are rented out to visitors, so you may get a few loud neighbors but the complex was quiet during bed time.  Also, don't be alarmed if you can hear the next door neighbors really well, I think the walls are thin! Overall I highly recommend this place.
Great place! Loved the hot tub and this place looked better in person than the pictures!

Sarah was an amazing host. She is organized and meticulous, no question went unanswered. As a matter of fact, as first timers to Kauai, she went above and beyond in giving us information on activities and her favorite things to do.
The condo was IMMACULATE. Everything in the apartment was new and Sarah has planned for everything (beach towels, beach chairs, cooler-with bottle opener!, snorkel equipment, boogie boards) Even welcome macadamia chocolates!
The area of Princeville is BEAUTIFUL!!! Hale Nani was a home away from home and when we come back we hope Hale Nani will be available- we loved Princeville and would definitely ask Sarah to stay again!

Upon arriving the place was very nice and clean. Actually looks bigger in person than the photos. Sarah communicated everything very well and we had no questions about anything. We even used the snorkels and boogie boards which was a plus. On the downside, it's a bottom level condo and the walls are very thin so you can hear the neighbors upstairs and around you very well. It almost sounds like someone is in the other room at times. Also their was no ac in the unit so we had to sleep with the windows open with screens  because of this in the morning you would be awakened by anyone who starts a car or is even walking around the building. Also this caused a ton of flies to enter the unit.

Sarah, 

  Your place was so perfect for our stay. The North Shore of Kauai is a beautiful place and your place is the perfect place to get out exploring from. I truly loved the decor. It was so nice to have a washer and dryer and a full kitchen. We enjoyed using the beach gear too. The value for your condo is amazing, especially for island travel. We feel fortunate your place was available. We loved have dedicated parking, and access to the pool and barbecue. Our trip was truly wonderful because we had a great place to call home for 6 nights. I hope to be back.
Sarah was great. A pleasure to work with.  Very committed to Making you happy. Mahalo

Sarah is an excellent host and made us feel very welcome to his spacious appartment.  We had a full  kitchen, living room, a big bed and a lanai.   You also have access to the  pool area of the resort, the BBQ and to a private parking lot.

Sarah's 1BD is in an easy to find complex of nicely developed condos.  There is also a really nice bike/walk path running along the golf course with great views. The condo is clean and has everything you need and the California king bed is very comfortable.  Sarah stayed in touch with us and Selina was also available if necessary.  The only thing we would advise is that the walls are thin and you are close to neighbors who can be noisy but all was quiet around bedtime so not too bad. The north shore is beautiful & lush and Sarah's condo is conveniently located close to great places to see and also close to Foodland & restaurants.  It was a great value for the price.

Sarah's place was like a breath of fresh air on our trip. So nicely appointed, clean and perfect for our stay! Sarah was also so easy to work with, she was accommodating on our special request and always quick to answer all of my questions and concerns. There is a small studio attached, and yes the walls are a little thin, but it wasn't a huge deal for us (not sure I can say the same for our neighbors though!). Also, when you have all the windows open, it's almost like he neighbors across the walkway are sitting in the kitchen, but that wasn't a huge deal for us either. We would definitely stay here again if we ever come back to Kauai!

Sarah was a very welcoming host. Her place in Princeville is excellently located, and was exceptionally clean. Sarah has thought through every aspect of hosting and our stay in the beautiful Hanalei area was definitely enhanced by staying at her beautiful place. Mahalo Sarah!

We loved our get away in Kauai. We enjoyed the lushness of the north shore. The one bedroom charmer was clean, the complex is nice, the hot tub was hot. Our only complaint was the noise level of cars in the morning and not all people in the complex got the memo on being quiet between 10pm and 8pm. We were forewarned about the noise level. All in all a good value.
All was well.  Would recommend.

Don't sleep on this listing! It was the perfect home away from home during our stay in Kauai. Everything you need from a washer and dryer, every kitchen appliance in the world, extra beach towels, big king sized bed, queen pull out sofa, shampoo, body wash, pool, fast wifi! The works!! Great location, minutes from food land, shaved ice, and Queens bath. Beautiful home in a convenient location on the island. Definitely will be hunting for her listings when we return to Kauai. Thank you again, Sarah for your generous hospitality. Aloha

Wonderful communication with the host. Beautiful condo situated in an extremely convenient location on the north side of the island. In comparison to many of our friends who were also on the island for a wedding, this condo was spacious and a joy to come "home" to each night. It also served as a great central point for impromptu meet-ups with friends and family. 

Absolutely would visit again!

Sarah is an excellent, responsive host, and her condo in Princeville is exactly as described and shown on the listing. I slept on the sofa sleeper in the living room and found it to be as comfortable as you'd expect a sofa sleeper to be. I shared the unit with my step-father, and he told me that the bed in the bedroom was comfortable. There was a small amount of street noise that he could hear, but nothing that kept him awake.

From the other reviews, it seems as though some people have had issues with noise from other units. I had assumed that this would be noise through the walls, which I was a little nervous about. Instead, it's just the normal conversations of residents enjoying their lanais and having your own windows open to enjoy the outside air (no A/C, just fans in this unit, which is fine for how cool and comfortable it is at night on this part of the island). We could definitely hear them talking, as the units aren't too far away from one another, but no one was being loud or disrespectful of their neighbors. (Note: The proximity to other units and noise is the only reason it's a 4-star review instead of 5. I'd give 4.5 if possible.)

Finally, the condo is very well stocked with everything you could need to be comfortable for your stay. It was really nice to not have to worry about beach towels or chairs, and everything was clean and in great shape. All in all, this was a wonderful place to stay. Sarah's unit in Princeville was a perfect location for getting away from the busier parts of the island and still being within a reasonable drive to hikes, beaches, and restaurants. The hot tub after a long day of hiking was a welcomed reprieve as well.

Sarah was extremely kind, responsive, and informative. She made us feel very welcome. Her home is lovely and has everything you could possibly need for a wonderful stay. The unit is exactly as described. It was great having the washer and dryer, wifi, lawn chairs, boogie boards, lanai, and the well equipped kitchen (visit the farmers markets and the dolphin fish market in Hanalei to make your own delicious meals). The location is great- walking distance to Foodland, shops, and restaurants in Princeville. The unit has fans and with some windows open, it was the perfect temperature. We didn't find parking or noise to be a problem at all. 
Everything was great! Thank you again so much Sarah! We will look for your place again next time we head to Kauai!
Our host provided everything we could have needed for our stay.

This condo was clean, spacious, and comfortable. Sarah was a gracious host and made the process easy from start to finish. We loved the North Shore for its stunning scenery, and Sarah's condo was an easy driving distance to Hanalei for restaurants, and Tunnels and Anini Beach for great snorkeling. We could walk to FoodLand for groceries, Hideaways beach, and Queen's Bath from here. The walls are thin as others have commented so you can sometimes hear people moving around but we had no issues with noisy neighbors, everyone that we encountered was appropriate and respectful. The included parking spot was very convenient too. We would love to come back here.

Sarah's apartment has excellent location in the Princeville among golf courses in walking distance from famous Hideways Beach, Sealodge Beach, Queen's Bath, pretty close to the Rt.56. Apartment is cozy, clean and has everything for short vacation visit. We are pretty happy and grateful to Sarah for  spending our vacation in this nice place.

We had a very nice stay! The apartment was clean and ready with towels, cooking supplies, beach gear, etc. The check in/out process was nice as we could check out early as we needed to and did not have any difficulties. 

The community hot tub, pool, and has grills ended up being a very pleasant surprise as we actually used them almost daily.

I would definitely highly recommend this place.

We had a very good welcome at distance. Sarah was on holidays but her daughter managed to give us all required information. The condo was very nice in a charming residence (as in the pictures/description). A good base camp to discover the Napali coast, Hanalei...
All facilities.Big & confortable bedroom. Sofa bed in the living-room very unconfortable for adults (maybe ok for children).

Our family has a great time staying at Sarah's. Our two children slept well on the sofa bed and the parents were very comfortable in the bedroom! Everything is as described- very cozy and charming and really clean! We really appreciated the dishwasher and laundry detergent... And the snorkels and beach gear. It's the little things that make one feel so comfortable when traveling, and Sarah succeeds in every way. Thank you for making our visit so wonderful.

Sarah's place was perfect! My wife and I spent a week in Kauai for our honeymoon and the condo had everything we needed. Great location, fantastic price and everything you would need for an awesome week of hiking and beaching. If you're heading to Kauai, definitely stay here.

Sarah was very welcoming, and the space was exceptionally clean and together.  Altogether we had a  satisfying experience.
 I would recommend  staying here to anyone.

This place is perfect.  Nicely appointed, clean and convenient.  We explored most of Maui easily from here and were able to save money by self-catering.  The nearby Hanalei bay and local eateries were all of great quality. Would recommend!

This rental was fantastic, comfortable, and well appointed. We had everything we needed and communication was great before and after arrival. We appreciated the big comfy bed and all the great space. The bedroom is close to a street which can get a bit noisy if you are a light sleeper, but was not a problem for us. Would definitely stay here again!
First time Air BnBer, a great experience that encourages us to use it again.  Well equipped, up to date and attractive apartment, great location for exploring the North Shore.

Sarah's condo in Princeville was perfect for our trip to the north shore of Kauai. My only complaint is that it wasn't available for the entire week of our trip! The place was impeccably clean and recently remodeled with updated flooring and appliances and a really nice bathroom with a full tub. There were ample towels and amenities in the bathroom, and everything we needed to cook and eat in the beautiful kitchen. Sarah supplied us with masks and snorkels, a beach umbrella, body boards, beach toys, etc. for our stay and my son and I enjoyed many hours at the beaches of Hanalei Bay. Absolutely perfect in every way, and such a bargain to boot. Thanks Sarah we can't wait to come back and stay again!

Aloha!

My boyfriend and I along with 2 of our friends just got back from staying at Sarah's condo for just over a week. The place is just as described! Very clean, spacious, and very close to Restaurants, Food land, and beaches! We also had access to our very own parking spot as well as access to the pool which we loved! In addition to this, Sarah thought of just about everything to make our stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. She provided towels, boogie boards, beach chairs, beach umbrellas, dishwasher soap, fans, toaster, coffee machine etc! 

Coming all the way from Toronto, Canada I was a little worried about getting to Kaua'i and not being able to get in contact with our host if anything were to go wrong, but communication was not an issue what so ever. Even though we never met in person, Sarah was always quick to respond to any questions, and also provided her daughter who manages the property's contact information if needed. 

It was a great stay, hopefully we can come back next year!

Mahalo,
Kaitlen+Gang
Sarah was welcoming! The house is just like the pictures, very spacious and had a beachy feel. Close to beaches and in a good spot for exploring!

Sarah provided good instructions and was available if I had had any problems. The condo is very nice, but the lack of air-conditioning is a bit of a draw back in August or September when the temp and humidity are high. it was very convenient to the golf course and only a short drive to restaurants and a grocery store. It is a good location from which to explore the North shore of Kauai.

Sarah and her daughter Selina made sure my mother's and I stay went smoothly from the warm greeting to small requests. The condo was cozy and everything was tidy in its place. Everything you needed Sarah provided from beach necessities to kitchen measuring spoons. We cooked for our stay  it saved us a bit more and everything we needed was there. The place was at a beautiful location and peaceful a perfect getaway! -Mahalo

Beautiful condo in a great development. Super clean with a comfy bed. Full kitchen was nice to save some money by not eating out for every meal. Loved having access to bbq grills and pool. Washer and dryer were nice to pack less. Great location convenient to the Napali Coast. Nice restaurants that are close to the condo. No A/C, but seems like very few rentals on Kauai have it, so we dealt with it. I was a bit warm, but I run hot and my wife was fine. 
Sarah was quick to respond to questions. I would definitely recommend this rental.
Sara opened her home to us and made us feel welcome. Our stay was great. The listing was very accurate and her home was very clean. Thanks for making our stay in Kauai wonderful!

Wonderful spot. We had such a great time visiting Kauai. This was the perfect place for us to stay. It was clean, professionally maintained, and had all the amenities we were looking for, as well as a great location. We would book this place again. It was perfect. Thanks.

The Princeville condo is in a fantastic location for exploring the North Coast of Kauai. The condo is very clean/orderly, that is a huge plus. Kitchen area is great and well stocked. Extra stand up fans were awesome to stay comfortable as it can get really hot. 
   My only disappointment was the family living directly above the unit have  three 'free spirited' children who made tons of noise during my stay. To be clear this was not late at night, but I feel any person should have a reasonable expectation of peaceful/quiet enjoyment of the place they are staying regardless of the time of day. On this end I feel Sarah's hands are tied because the family upstairs is not technically breaking any rules. 
   In summary I loved the condo, but I did not love the neighbors.

Firstly, Sarah's place was VERY clean ... immaculately clean, which was such a delight! The check in process was incredibly easy and she even touched base with me during our stay to make sure everything was going well. We had a wonderful time and would easily book her home again.

We had a very easy check-in and enjoyed the local chocolates that were left for us. This was one of our favorite Airbnb stays to date, and we've stayed in them all over the world. We had everything we needed and then some, including a well-equipped kitchen (my girlfriend loved the electric tea kettle), a large bathroom and bedroom space, and a comfortable living space and porch, too.  The location is great - you're just a few minutes from a grocery store and dining, and it's the perfect spot to stay if you're planning to do more along the north shore of the island. It was a short drive to the Kalalau Trail (which was AMAZING) and just a few minutes away is a stunning lookout featuring mountains and taro fields.  We also enjoyed dining in Hanalei a few times. We'd love to stay here again and would easily recommend it without hesitation.
A good value for the area, clean, well equipped, good location. Not very private, and some street noise.

Sarah's place was spacious and very close to the grocery store which was convenient. We used the patio space every day -- it was lovely. Kitchen is fully equipped with all basic cooking tools available + extras. The place was extremely clean when we got there. I would definitely suggest this condo to others.

I loved this place!  Sarah was a great host.  Check-in was easy, the house was perfectly stocked, and her instructions were extremely clear.  Grocery store is nearby, great beaches are close (Anini Beach is my favorite), Hanalei is close too.  I would stay there again.

The place was exactly as described and perfect for our romantic getaway. We appreciated the amenities such as chairs and umbrellas so we could explore. Also laundry was a plus for us! Only downside was the loud neighbors upstairs, but they were quiet after 10pm. Sarah was a great host. Highly recommended!
The place is super clean and very nice, we really loved our stay there!

Sara's Hale Nani is a wonderful spot for a cozy getaway! Within walking distance of the famous and beautiful "Queens Bath" as well as near enough to Hanalei to allow a visit to shops, restaurants, the beach, and a good striking out place for the Hike along Napali Coast. A great little place, clean with a full kitchen! Two thumbs up!

What can I say, Sarah has the perfect spot. North Shore, 10 minute drive tops to Hanalei Bay beach, 5 minutes to shops, grocery store, restaurants around the corner in Princeville. 

Condo was exactly as described, all the amenities you'd need. It's awesome to come home after a long day or beaching or hiking and sit in the hot tub in the evening and relax.

Sarah is an amazing person. My wife and I are very grateful to have had to chance to meet her and be on the island when she was there on her vacation. I hope we can come back and stay with her again in a few years!
Had almost every essential kitchen, bath, and beach essential. Grill, indoor eating and screened in eating area.  Exceptional value for area.

We had two amazing weeks on Maui and Kauai in February 2017 and Sarahs wonderful accommodation made our stay super easy and comfortable. And it is only 10 car-minutes away from Hanalei Bay, which is to date the most beautiful beach I have ever seen.

Sooo clean! Perfect perfect location! I have stayed at the St Regis down the street many times at $800 a night and actually prefer the comfort and extra amenities (kitchen) at Sarah's for $100 a night.  We were 100% delighted we chose Sarah's.

Top things that matter to me in a vacation home:
1) Cleanliness
2) Ease of Use
3) Functionality

Sarah's place met all of my expectations and exceeded them. The place was spacious, kitchen had all the gadgets needed, the living space was opening and welcoming. Everything worked and the host was very responsive when we needed a few questions answered. The walls are half vented screens, so expect that the place won't exactly be totally sound proof. However, you'll get the fresh, lovely Hawaiian air flowing through all day! Loved the little touches, like key box (to ease anxiety over lost keys! etc), multiple sets of thick beach towels, snorkels and fins, Kauai guidebook, games and cards etc. 

We had our wedding and honeymoon in Kauai and Sarah's place was the perfect nest to come home to after a day's worth of adventures. Thank you!

Sarah's place is very comfortable. It is spacious, very clean, the bed is really comfortable and the kitchen is open to the living room and dinning room making it great for a night of cooking at home. There are a lot of things to do before you leave even though there is a cleaning fee: wash the towels, remove sheets, take out all the garbage, so make sure you leave time in the morning to get through all this. Highly recommended place!

Princeville ist ein sonniges wunderschönes amerikanisches Städtchen (gebaut ab ca. 1975) in von wunderschönen Golfplätzen Das Haus mit der Wohnung liegt ideal - zwar ohne Meersicht - aber sehr angenehm. Grosses Wohnzimmer mit hervorragend ausgestatter Küche - alles sehr sauber und in bestem Zustand. Auch das Schlafzimmer mit Kingsizebett und Schränken super. Der Swimmingpool mit Jacuzzi und Gasgrill für BBQ 1Minute entfernt, sehr ideal. Mit dem Auto zum Einkaufszentrum,Restaurants, Eisenwarengeschäft etc., ca. 5 Minuten - zum Strand in Hanalei ca.10-15 Miunuten. Uns hat's gefallen. Vielen Dank an Sarah.

My wife and I really enjoyed our stay here.  Sarah is a great host and we felt very comfortable and very much at home. 

The kitchen is very well equipped, we had everything we needed.  

The pool is well maintained, clean and well equipped. The BBQ area at the pool was spotless and also well equipped.

Lots of beach gear on the patio (chairs, boards, snorkel, umbrella, and a bit of misc) which came in handy.  

Walking distance to Queens Bath and a nice beach by the Westin which are both pleasant surprises.   Short drive to spectacular north shore attractions. And a very short drive to Princeville village shopping and eateries.

All in all, a great economical stay at a great location for exploring the island.

We had a nice stay at Sarah's Sandpiper condo. It proved a great location to extend the timeshare stay in Princeville by a few days and who doesn't want a few more days on Kauai? Very nice to only have a block or so transition to the next location. The condo was a spot on match to its profile and Sarah was very attentive but unobtrusive in offering any assistance one might require. I would clearly recommend this condo and will likely revisit it in the future. Thank's Sarah.....

Our stay at Sarah's place was truly lovely! We gave it 4 stars instead of 5 only because of the significant amount of road noise that infiltrates the condo (tip: fans and earplugs help)! the roosters carry on a fair amount, but we actually loved the roosters, as well as the many other songbirds that sang at all hours of the day and night! :) Sarah's home is very clean and well-appointed with kitchen appliances, as well as laundry facilities in the home which was a major plus! the sofa bed was super comfy for our kiddos, and the king sized bed was decently comfy (although not as comfy as our ah-mayzing bed at home...are they ever? LOL)! her home is conveniently located very close to grocery shopping (Foodland), ice cream (a must!), and has tons of beaches nearby to explore! we would have appreciated a few additional items already stocked in the pantry for ease of cooking-especially since we arrived too late to shop! Basics (such as coffee, sugar, creamer, olive oil, and a wider array of spices) would be nice additions to find in the pantry! but we made some ah-mayzing dinners with fresh fish we bought at the Hanalei Fish Market while we were there, and found everything we needed at Foodland. the neighbors in the complex (whom we had heard could be noisy) were thankfully silent during our stay! the little girls who live nearby were super friendly and very excited to see our boys each morning! neighbors, residents, and other guests at the pool area were quite friendly, and we loved finishing our busy days there! :) from Sarah's home, we were super close to highlights such as the Kalalau trail (for an EPIC hike); Queen's Bath (get to the parking lot at 7a if you want to drive there and find a spot); and we found ah-mayzing snorkeling at Anini Beach, Tunnels, and Hideawy. Sarah's snorkeling gear is of great quality and we REALLY appreciated having it there for our use! you can rent additional fins all over, as well as boogie boards-which we did because the boogie boards at Sarah's house were broken when we arrived. :( we took a day trip to Waimea Canyon and the Kalalau Lookout, and spent a truly beautiful week there! my husband and i, and our boys (10 and 11) had a really joyful vacation, and Sarah's place was a comfortable place to start and finish our days. it is small, so make sure you LOVE being uber-cozy with your travel companions! :) an added bonus was the guide book (The Ultimate Guide to Kauai)...what a GEM! thanks to that book we found some GREAT adventures we might have missed! like crazy-hard-to-find beaches, etc!!! we are grateful for the blessings of our trip and for the beauty of Kauai. thank you for hosting us-The Edwards Clan, Pollock Pines (Nik, D, Ben, & Sam) :)

The condo is homey and everything you need, down to the perfect guidebook. We loved having a place to come back to after long days exploring.  Sarah is wonderful,  great with communication, and took great care to make her place comfortable. Every part of the process was simple.   Would
recommend this place to anyone staying  Princeville!

If you are planning to be out all day exploring the north shore, this is a nice, well furnished condo to rest up in, very nicely decorated and thoughtfully furnished, with a very comfortable bed, very quiet at night.  It is a well maintained residential complex.  The pool is large, surrounded by a large lawn, and very nice for swimming, with a jacuzzi for great relaxation.   During after school hours, children might be playing on the lawn area next to the condo's patio.  The condo is located right next to one of the main access roads within the Princeville complex and is a little over a mile from Princeville Center.

Sarah's condo is the perfect place for a couple or family stay in Kauai. We stayed for our honeymoon and it felt like a home! Shops and the big grocery store, Foodland, are only a 5 minute drive, maybe less. We cooked most of our meals which was a huge money saver. Having the beach gear available is key that way you don't spend money on items you won't pack again. Seriously perfect! It's in between all of the best north coast beaches so only a quick drive away and when it rains it's a nice cozy spot to come back to. Oh and the washer and dryer were a great plus. Sarah is awesome, she is incredibly friendly and provides great information for check-in and check out. Though we didn't meet her in person her daughter is on site and available for any questions. Totally loved our stay and hope to come back soon.

We absolutely loved this condo! It is absolutely perfect for a couple like us - it was spotless and beautiful, and we could not have asked for a better location. It was super nice having a kitchen which we used daily, as well as a washer and dryer which helped us pack light on clothes. She even provided beach gear on the lanai for our outings, like snorkel gear, boogie boards, and beach umbrellas. We would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Great spot, we loved the all the beach supplies that were available.   Convenient to great places and shopping.  Sarah is a wonderful and responsive host.
