The apartment very well located for exploring the north shore of Kauai. It has everything you need and some perks like a guidebook, blender, snorkeling gear and beach stuff. Sarah was very communicative. We had a great time here!

This was the perfect airbnb for our north shore stay! The place looked better than the pictures and was extremely clean. It was so well equipped with everything from laundry detergent to kitchen and bathroom essentials to a maika'i discount card for the nearby foodland, board games, maps/guidebooks, etc. It was very spacious and relaxing and we will stay there again the next time we visit. Way better than a hotel! Loved it and the host was delightful.

This was one of the best places we've stayed at on Kauai. It was very clean, spacious and in a great location. Sarah communicated flawlessly and provided all the amenities we could have asked for. We will absolutely stay here in again in the future.

Great location for North Shore.  Super close to shops, restaurants and beaches.  Sarah's place was very clean and had all the basic items that you'd need for a stay.  Kitchen was well equipped, toiletries, and beach gear was all available. 
We had a couple of questions while we were there and Sarah's daughter was very helpful and responsive during our stay.  She even let us check-in a little earlier.  Would definitely recommend.
The condo is in a nice, quiet community located in Princeville. It's walking distance to Queen's Bath and a very quick drive to the beautiful Hanalei Bay and other gorgeous north shore beaches.

Sarah bájos lakása igazi otthonunk volt. Tiszta, jól felszerelt,kényelmes. Elhelyezkedése remek,kiváló kiindulópont az északi part felfedezéséhez. Esténként nagyon jól esett a mendence és jakuzzi mellett grillezni. Sarah remek házigazda, minden szükséges információval ellátott minket, roppant segítőkész volt. Mindenkinek ajánljuk eme lakást,ha a csodás Kauai-n járnak.
Very clean and spacious place, and Sarah was very kind and considerate when talking with us. This is a great location for visiting Kauai and we had a great time here!
Sarah's home was perfect. Highly recommend, it was very clean, equipped, spacious, and in a beautiful location. The communication was great between Sarah and I. The best place to stay in Kauai!

Great location in Princeville area. A place for stress-free vacation. The only decision you'll have to make is about a beach you are going to. Try as many as you like - they are all worth it. The only good food in 10 mile radius is at the local supermarket. The restaurants are not worth trying, at least for food. A few places are good for a drink.
Sarah's condo is clean, provides all promised amenities and totally is what you would like it to be. Don't expect great views but everything else is there.
We loved working with Sarah as she is very responsive, communicative and aware of her guests needs.

We adored this apartment and the location was perfect for us! The north shore is so beautiful and it was amazing to be able to find an affordable and extremely clean place to make our stay while on the island! We loved that there was a guide to Kauai book we flipped through it a couple times and it was very helpful. We were worried coming here with no A/C but the fans were plenty fine and we had no issue with being too hot while in the apartment.  We hope to come back one day or maybe even move there (we loved kauai that much!) I definitely recommend this apartment 5 stars!
Nice location and great value, would easily stay again!

Lovely apartment with a perfect terrace equipped with everything you would need for a perfect stay.
Sarah was a wonderful host - clear instructions, quick response to questions.
The location is a walking distance to a small beach next to St Regis and Queen's bath - two places it happens not to make sense to drive as the parking lots are tiny. For all other sites and activities you would need a car, as you would in general to be able to fully enjoy the island.

Thank you for the great stay! We appreciated the boogie boards, beach supplies, and helpful guest and guide book. The condo was very clean and organized, located in a residential and golfing condo area, a short drive from anything on the north shore. The walls did seem a bit thin, but not really a problem.
Sarah’s place worked great for our stay, location was perfect, great value, we enjoyed our stay

We had a blast staying at Sarah's home. It was conveniently located near the St. Regis and Princeville beaches, but a short 10 minute drive to beautiful Hanalei Bay. The condo was also very close to Foodland, so it was easy to pick up groceries for the week. We'd love to stay again when we come back!

This place is better than it looks in the pictures! Nice & tidy, has everything you need and more. Plenty of kitchen equipment to cook meals as well. Communication with host was very easy and efficient. Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the north shore of Kauai.
This place is way nicer than the pictures look. Everything is new, well maintained, and the neighborhood is gorgeous. Perfect spot close to a lot of North shore spots

Sarah was wonderful about communicating with us to ensure that we had no problems finding her place after a long day of traveling.  Her place was clean, spacious and had a well equipped kitchen.  It was convenient for exploring the North Shore.  We had a wonderful time there and felt very comfortable.

We loved our stay at Sandpiper Village in November 2017!  Sarah was easy to chat with, quick to respond, and provided lots of detailed information prior to our arrival. The place was easy to find and check-in was smooth with free parking and a lock-box key ready when we arrived. The unit is spacious and clean, with a nice living room, large kitchen, and very comfy king-size bed with fans to keep the bedroom cool. The full kitchen was very much appreciated; it was great to have a stove to cook on, coffee maker for our mornings outside on the lanai, and a blender for evening margaritas! Sarah's place also included the use of some awesome beach chairs, a cooler, snorkeling gear, and an umbrella which made beach days a breeze!

The condo is in a great location in Princeville, close to many attractions, beaches and convenient groceries at Foodland! The complex has a nice pool and spa hot tub, which we made use of after hiking all day.  Our favorites from our stay on the North Shore included: snorkeling at Anini Beach, the hike to Hanakapiai Falls (almost 7 hours round trip, but well worth it for the waterfall and time at Ke'e Beach after hiking!), Princeville Botanical Gardens (an amazing tour!), walking to Queen's Bath and going for a swim at low tide; more snorkeling at Tunnels Beach; ice cream at Pink's Creamery; Kalypso for their Happy Hour; and treating ourselves to brunch at the St. Regis.

We loved Sarah's unit and the overall vibe at Sandpiper Village. We would love to return to the North Shore of Kauai one day!  - Rachel and Alex
Excellent place at a great price. It was extremely spacious and the apartment has everything you needed and more.
Lovely, spacious apartment in a nice complex. Loved that everything you could need for the beach, a pack n play and a truly fully equipped kitchen were all provided - made life much easier.

Great stay! Better than the pictures, so nice to come home each night and cook in the lovely kitchen. We also used the beach gear a lot which was great! The Kauai guide was very helpful and used it almost daily! Close to the grocery store and 20-25 min drive to our favourite beach! (Tunnels on the north shore) Would love to come back one day and stay! Sarah was super quick at getting back to us with any need! Check in was very easy!
Nice little touches like boogie boards, snorkeling gear, and beach chairs and umbrellas
Amazing place to stay in Princeville. Would 100% recommend it. Very clean place with everything we needed and more. Communal pool and hot tub and barbecue is a nice bonus!!
A great little spot close to everything in the North Shore area. We loved staying there and definitely would again!
Large one bedroom apartment in a great location. It’s in a condo complex within a resort area. It’s close to several amazing beaches, the cute town of Hanalei, and the Napoli Coast.
Amazing apartment! Spacious, clean, and close to everything in Princeville. This place is probably comparable to a 4+ star hotel, but at a much more reasonable price. Will definitely come again!
Was a very nice place, we had a great time. Sarah had everything there that we needed. Linens were clean, no bugs to be seen. Pool and jacuzzi were nice to have nearby.
This is a very nice apartment, in a very nice location.    Clean, completely and thoughtfully furnished and reasonably priced.
Central location, we walked to both Sea Lodge and Pu’u Poa beaches (30 mins walk), hot tub was great on a rainy day, the north shore of Kauai is special!
Mukava asunto! Princeville on sijaintina erittäin kätevä. Rantoja ja vaellusreittejä  on tarjolla runsaasti ja 10 minuutin ajomatkan päässä löytyy Hanalein ranta ja ravintolat. Suosittelen!
Sarah was very kind and gracious throughout our stay in Kauai. Her home is beautiful and central to North Shore activities, yet it also feels close to nature. I strongly recommend staying here!

This place is great. Clean, homey, and comforting. Perfect place for a family or couple. Sarah’s little extra amenities were much appreciated. She provided snorkel gear, beach chairs, beach towels, a Kauai guide, plus guests personal recommendations in her guestbook; this all came in handy ! We had an amazing time. Thank you Sarah !
Loved the space and location, had excellent communication, will definitely be back!

Sarah's condo is a clean, warm, affordable place to stay on the beautiful north shore of Kauai. In addition, Sarah is very good at communicating all necessary info, and she's very thorough in providing everything needed.

Sarah was very responsive to our initial inquiry and any questions we had prior to our visit; as was her daughter, Selina, who manages the unit. The unit was very clean and offered amenities such as dishwasher and washer/dryer. Sarah left a very useful guidebook which we used for restaurants and things to do. Princeville is a walker's delight with paths all around, it has a shopping plaza within walking distance that has shops, a grocery store, and restaurants. Unfortunately Princeville is not noted for great weather. It is a very rainy area with little sun. Beaches are nice (but  I personally do not like to be on the beach in the rain and without sun). There are hiking trails, beaches, walking paths, and things to do in the area and  if you travel approximately 10 miles south (going toward Kapa'a)  the weather is less rainy. We were disappointed in the noise level due to traffic that goes on at all hours. Princeville is made up of many separate communities. There are many units behind the Sandpiper and cars and trucks pass through. Since the windows are open (no A/C) traffic is very loud. Another disappointment  was the lack of privacy while sitting on the lanai and not being able to keep the blinds open.  The units are very close together and neighbors walk by, as well as we can hear and see everything also. While sitting on the lanai in the morning having our coffee we heard a neighbor in the bathroom, not a way to start the day although we laughed about it. We were out most of the day as you probably will be so the location, cleanliness, hospitality, and amenities out way the disappointments. I would not recommend for long stays but a few days are good.
Everything about our stay with Sarah was fantastic. She was very easy to get in contact with and her place had everything we needed and more!

Sarah’s place was very large and spotlessly clean. Very well equipped and in a nicely landscaped complex. The pool was especially beautiful and we enjoyed it everyday. The best place I have ever stayed in Kauai. Would love to stay there again in the future!
Nice porch, nice hot tub, overall good location, some noise from upstairs, but that's to be expected.

Sarah's condo in Princeville is spacious, meticulously clean, organized and well equipped with everything a family needs for a great, relaxing vacation. The Lanai is perfect to relax, we sat there to watch the rain and drink coffee. The kitchen is well organized with everything you need and we enjoyed making several meals here at the condo.

But the best part for us for Sarah's hospitality, prompt communication, detailed instructions to check in/out and little touches like letting us know about beach advisory which I would not have known otherwise.
 
I highly recommend Sarah's condo for value minded travelers seeking a relaxing stay in Princeville.

So sad to leave Kauai as well as Sarah's amazing condo in Princeville! We sat on the lanai and drank coffee/ate breakfast every morning! There is a bird/dove (we named him Howie) that came and perched next to us for breakfast every morning too hah! Everything about this place is charming. And we didn't notice any crazy noises or anything but my boyfriend did say he woke in the middle of the night due to a door slamming and a couple people chatting outside. I think the majority of people here are super respectful and I only noticed peace and quiet. 
This place is equipped with EVERYTHING! Pots, pans,beach gear, shampoo/conditioner, etc., it's there.

This place is also really close to Hanalei, so you should definitely check it out!

Highly recommended !
Clean,comfortable ,accurately represented and centrally located!

We had a great stay in Sarah's space. Princeville is a great location for to see lots of great sights on the island and we will definitely be back! Sarah was a great communicator and organising everything was a seamless process.
Excellent location. The home is clean and spacious with a lovely lanei to enjoy breakfast. There is a nice community pool too. The owner, Sarah, is very attentive and responds to all inquiries.

Our stay at Sarah's was great. The location was super close to the Hanalei Bay Resort which is where our friends stayed so that was convenient. It was also really close to Foodland grocery store, also super convenient. The kitchen was well equipped and I appreciated the beach towels and cooler bag available for the beach. I would stay here again.
The perfect level of comfort!  A wonderful stay.  We felt so fortunate to stay in Princeville, an awesome location.  And the condo was a wonderful home away from home!!! Mahalo

Sarah‘s condo is ideal in many ways. It’s extremely well appointed, well located, with a beautiful and comfortable lanai.  Sarah and her daughter Selina  are both quick to answer any questions and handle any issues. We would come back and stay at any time.

Sarah's place was awesome. It was clean, and amenities were available. The area was so beautiful with amazing views and I loved that it is at walking distance from Queens Bath, which comes in handy since parking is limited. Really recommend staying here.
Clean and comfortable!

Sarah's condo was well equipped and very spacious. Good enough to live in full time . It is pretty much at the geographic center of Princeville , so you can quite easily walk to lovely secluded beaches and also to town center .The Foodland supermarket in Princeville is pretty good , so you don't need to stock up before you get there.
We enjoyed our stay at Sarah's place and recommend it .

This is the second time I have stayed at Sarah’s place. Her home has become my home. I was so comforted the moment I walked through the door. The place is in a great location, always very clean, quiet, has everything you need to enjoy everything that Kaua’i has to offer. I love sitting on the lani and have my coffee in the morning. I highly recommend Sarah’s place.

The apartment is really nice, even better than what the photos show and in a immaculate neighborhood.  Very quite and with all you need to have a great staying. Sarah was always ready to respond to any answer especially while expecting hurricane Lane. One of our best AirBnb experiences

We had a fantastic time at Sarah's place! The space was just perfect for the two of us.  There was a great supply of beach gear, and a guide for the island (which we updated). The bed was very comfortable, and we enjoyed spending time on the lanai and pool area.  The pigeons were so tame they ate out of our hands! Be sure to head just down the road to Hideaway Beach for amazing snorkeling, but check the tides, and wear good shoes. It's quite the vertical hike to get there. Mahalo for a great vacation, Sarah!

We had a great week at Sarah’s beautiful place. The area is great for exploring the North Shore of Kauai.
The apartment has a full kitchen and huge living spaces both indoors and outdoors which our one-year old loved. 
We would definitely stay at Sarah’s again.
Nice condo in good location. Private parking lot. Easy communication. Everything was Fine :)
Fantastic Airbnb! Would 100% recommend for anyone visiting Kaua’i.
Good location.  Nice place.  Nice pool and hot tub.
Well appointed condo in a great neighborhood. Sarah is an excellent host and communication was perfect.

We rated Sarah’s accommodation as 5 star. Perfect place for our holiday. Close to all amenities and the unit had a great layout. There is a lot of traffic using the road outside the bedroom, loud in the morning but quieter in the evening.

Wir hatten insgesamt eine gute Zeit in Princeville - das Apartment ist sehr geräumig, gut ausgestattet (u. A. um sich selbst zu verpflegen) und die Lage im Norden der Insel in Princeville ist super aufgrund der Nähe u. a. zum Secret Beach  und der Hanalei-Bucht (wobei ein Auto unbedingt empfehlenswert ist). Auch der Pool in der Anlage ist ein Plus. Persönlich etwas gestört hat uns, dass die Kommunikation zwar sehr schnell, aufmerksam und informativ ist, jedoch auch viele Anweisungen und Hausregeln enthält - das mindert das entspannte Urlaubsgefühl. Auch ist die Einrichtung schon etwas abgenutzt und der Balkon wenig einladend. Ausserdem ist die Lärmbelastung aufgrund der dünnen Wände gerade nachts störend. Das war in der Beschreibung zwar erwähnt und ist nicht durch den Gastgeber verschuldet, hat uns aber den Schlaf geraubt. Insgesamt hat für uns damit das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis nicht  gestimmt.

We spent a cozy week here for our honeymoon. The place was nice and open and very easy to get to. Very quick drive down to Hanalei Bay and good grocery stores and stuff nearby. The pool and Hot Tub was very cozy when the weather turned rainy towards the end of our trip. We very much appreciated the extra beach gear stored on the patio. It definitely came in handy. We could occasionally hear the other people staying around us as it’s a pretty cozy complex, but everyone was respectful and we had no noise problems to speak of. 

Thanks for a great week!

Sarah’s place was fully equipped with everything you could possibly need. It was very tidy and clean. The location was perfect. I recommend shopping at Walmart rather than foodland to save a buck. Scenic overlooks nearby. Some hidden beaches and friendly people. When we come back we will definitely be booking her place again. IT WAS PERFECT

Sarah’s place was wonderful! Very clean, spacious and comfortable. Great location!  Enjoyed the pool and grill. Sarah thought of everything and communication was great! We would definitely stay here again!

Sarah's condo is immaculate and very functional. It was great to have a spacious condo, and even more handy to have a washer/dryer. It you're adventurous, even just to catch the sunrise on a beach or outlook point, you'll probably end up muddy and wet. My husband and I loved the location, and we'd go back to Sarah's place next time we visit Kauai!

Sarah was extremely communicative during the entire stay and her booklet provided very helpful and thoughtful local tips. The place is in a lovely area of Kauai--very scenic and great for walks/jogs. Would highly recommend and stay again.

Sarah's place was fantastic.  Lovely location and wonderful amenities.  She has a cooler, beach chairs, snorkeling gear, umbrella, beach towels for your use.  The condo had plenty of space for our party of 3 adults.  There is a very functional kitchen with plenty of pans and dishes to be able to eat in.  (There is a Costco on the island.  Your grocery budget can definitely go farther!) We felt right at home and had a very comfortable stay.
Sparkling clean! Great place to stay in Princeville.
Awesome place on the north side of the island.  Photos of the place describe it perfectly. It was a great end to our honeymoon staying here it felt like home.

Thank you Sarah for allowing us to stay in your lovely place!  We loved all the amenities such as the full kitchen, dishwasher, and the washer and dryer!  Sarah had plenty of clean towels for the kitchen, bathroom, shower, and pool (including extra sets of each) and we enjoyed the extra blankets for the bed as well.  It had everything we needed and more.  The location was great, right near a supermarket and plenty of cool hikes and lookouts.  The TV and wifi worked well but bring a laptop if you'd like to watch Netflix or something other than cable.  Thanks again and I'm looking forward to returning!
Very nice place with great location. Very easy check in, and good communication with host.

집은 기대이상으로 넓고 모든 편의시설이 잘 갖추어져 있습니다.
호스트는 매우 사려깊고 세심하였으며 대화에 불편함이 없었습니다.
주변에 골프장등 매우 아름다운 환경과 가까운 거리의 해안경치와 특히 일몰경치는
매우 멋졌습니다.
특히 조깅을 즐긴다면 좋은 경치를 감상하며 기분좋게 달리수있는 곳입니다.

name: Cozy Apartment in Porto Center
summary: Cozy - facing south (there is a great light inside), spacious living room, well located (10 min walk to the central city hall), fully equipped (oven, washing machine, iron, dishes, etc), has elevator. It may be a bit noisy by morning because it faces a busy avenue but it will only bother if you are used to total silence - glass windows are doubled.
space: This very cozy and cute apartment is situated in the Fine Arts College's Avenue in the amazing city of Porto ( 7 minutes walk to the city hall, 15 min to the river, 3 min to the metro ).  You will have full access to the apartment which has a private bedroom with double bed, a totally prepared kitchen (oven, washing machine, microwave, toaster, dishes, basic ingredients for cooking, etc.), a spacious living room with a sleeping coach for two and a bathroom. Also free wi-fi internet. No TV sorry, time to clean your head! ;)  Wake up with a beautiful light in the house as it is facing south and discover the city by walking through uneven but charming streets. If you need to buy any food you just have to go down the building by elevator and you will meet in the same avenue small traders as a a bakery, a butcher, a fishmonger and a market. I will also be very pleased to indicate you the highlights of the city depending on the gender you like: cultural, arts, architecture, historic, social,
description: Cozy - facing south (there is a great light inside), spacious living room, well located (10 min walk to the central city hall), fully equipped (oven, washing machine, iron, dishes, etc), has elevator. It may be a bit noisy by morning because it faces a busy avenue but it will only bother if you are used to total silence - glass windows are doubled. This very cozy and cute apartment is situated in the Fine Arts College's Avenue in the amazing city of Porto ( 7 minutes walk to the city hall, 15 min to the river, 3 min to the metro ).  You will have full access to the apartment which has a private bedroom with double bed, a totally prepared kitchen (oven, washing machine, microwave, toaster, dishes, basic ingredients for cooking, etc.), a spacious living room with a sleeping coach for two and a bathroom. Also free wi-fi internet. No TV sorry, time to clean your head! ;)  Wake up with a beautiful light in the house as it is facing south and discover the city by walking through uneven but c
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is known to be one of the favorites because it is in the center but just a bit away from the big mess - 10min walking from the main square so the perfect distance. It is a very typical neighborhood with plenty of small sellers and cafés and plenty if people on the streets... Also known for the fine art university which brings to the neighborhood some young people. It used to be the richest area in the XIX century, so you will be able to see nice old houses but nowadays it is just the standard of Porto living style, being the rich area nearby the sea and away from center.
transit: The apartment is very well located and near of all public transports. It is 3min Walk to the metro station. 0min Walk to a bus (there are 2 bus stops just in front of the street door) And 15min Walk to the main train station.
access: You will have access to linens, towels, soap, shampoo and basic ingredients for cooking such as olive oil, salt, etc. the house is fully equipped for cooking.
interaction: I usually meet guests in the first day and if you wish we can meet for a walk during the stay.
house_rules: You just have to leave the house as you found it. Don't disturb the neighbors after midnight with too much noise and don't steel anything (I will leave books and several objects which I will need to check before you leave). If you break anything you will have to pay for it.    When the apartment is not rented, I live there. So there are some personal objects that I wish to maintain.

host.host_about: Artist and art professor. I recently decided to rent the apartment because I like to meet other travelers and it is the way I can pay for my own trips too.  I hope you enjoy your stay here!

reviews.comments:
Leatitia is a superb host. the only pity is, that we only stayed for one night in Porto.
Apartment is lovely, walking distance to the city centre and Leatitia has some really nice tips for eating and going out...follow them!

thanks for a nice stay and you are always welcome in Barcelona.

Hôtesse accueillante qui met à disposition tous ce qu'il faut pour notre confort et divertissement. L'appartement est à proximité de tous commerces, literie confortable, bonne répartition des pièces.Agréable séjour !
The apartment is really cozy and in a central located area. Laetitia recommended us some of her favourite spots in the city which were really helpful and nice. It´s a good place to stay!

I just returned from my Interrailtrip through western Europe with four friends of mine. For two nights we had the pleasure to stay in Laetitias lovely apartment in Porto. It is well located. Close to the train station and very handy to the center.

In fact, I stay only one night in Laetitia's appartment, but it was enough to appreciate the good vibes exuding fom this place. Moreover, Laetitia is a very nice person who will help you and will give you some good advices to visit Porto according to your stay. I definitely recommend her cozy appartment.
Jérôme

Très joli appartement, agréable et bien situé, avec une très jolie vue et de beaux livres. Laetitia nous a fait partager quelques bons plans
pour se ballader et manger; qui se sont avérés très utiles et agréables...
Fantastique ville à visiter en scooter ou moto pour pour circuler librement et profiter de la magnifique route longeant la côte jusqu'aux plages du sud !

Our stay at Laetitia's apartment was perfect. Laetitia welcomed us nicely and took the time to tell us about the unmissable places in Porto. Her charming apartment proved to be very clean, very handy and also well located. My girlfriend and I heartily recommend this flat for a few days or longer in the beautiful city of Porto.

Joli appartement, plutôt bien situé et décoré de manière assez original.
Bel accueil de Laetitia qui nous aura conseillé quelques adresses de premier choix dans un français impeccable.
Ravis de ce séjour dans cette ville merveilleuse.

Séjour très agréable dans cet appartement bien équipé, grand et décoré avec soin. Laetitia nous a bien accueilli et nous la remercions pour ses bonnes adresses. Très facile de rejoindre le centre à pied et quelques bons restaurants à proximité immédiate. 
S & J

Très bon séjour à Porto. L'appartement est agréable pour un couple. Facile d'accès depuis le métro (3 minutes de marche) et à 10 minutes à pieds (à peine) du centre ville.  
Laetitia est très sympa, parle très bien français et donne de bons conseils.
Nous la remercions pour tout.

Elodie et Bruno

Laetitia made me feel very welcome.  She gave great suggestions for sightseeing, and local restaurants and bars to try.  I had the comfort of a tourist, but the experience of a local.  The apartment is in a great location and is fully equipped.  And the price is outstanding.  I would highly recommend this place.

Apartamento agradable y bien equipado, conforme a la descripción. Cama cómoda, cocina, baño, todo correcto. Muy bien situado, cerca del metro con línea directa al aeropuerto, pero también es perfectamente posible ir andando hasta el centro (unos 10 minutos). Hay varias tiendas al lado: supermercado, panadería, cafetería. La calle es relativamente tranquila, únicamente la parada de bus justo delante de la casa causa bastante ruido si se duerme con las ventanas abiertas.
Laetitia es una buena anfitriona. Hubo un pequeño malentendido sobre los horarios de llegada y salida (culpa nuestra de no haber leído bien, era la primera vez que trabajábamos con Airbnb), pero Laetitia hizo lo posible para adaptarse a nuestros horarios. A pesar de estar a punto de ir de viaje, tomó su tiempo para informarnos de sus restaurantes preferidos, lugares de interés, transportes, etc. Pasamos 3 días muy agradables. ¡Gracias Laetitia!

Laetitia was a very welcoming and helpful host, with plenty of great suggestions for things to do and places to eat and visit. The apartment is lovely, exactly as described, and close to everything. Would highly recommend staying here!

Upon our arrival we briefly met Laetitia at her apartment, where she kindly explained everything and gave us some recommendations on her favourite places in Porto -restaurants, cafés, clubs, sightseeing basics-, which proved great! We really enjoyed her suggestions during our stay in the city, and hopefully the next time we will try the ones we missed  -not enough time for everything!. Unfortunately we could not say goodbye to her, as she was busy at the time we left. 
The apartment is nicely located close to the centre -you can easily walk to the main touristic areas. It is also very close to the Metro station Campo 24 de Agosto, which takes you directly to the airport. There are bakeries and small shops/supermarkets in the same street (even a bakery besides with fine pastries for breakfast) and, for those in need of a big supermarket, there is a Pingo Doce in Rua de Passos Manuel, at a walking distance of about 5-10 min.  
The apartment itself is cosy and bright: in fact, light  coming in through the big windows is one of the best things, and we really enjoyed sitting on the sofa in the living room to read after getting up, surrounded by light. The bathroom is a bit old-fashioned, but this is shown in the photos and we were perfectly fine with it except maybe for the fact that it lacked a bit more electric light as it has no window. Something unimportant, though! 
We believe that this is a good place to stay for anyone visiting Porto.

Laetitia provided helpful tips and suggestions for sights and restaurants in Porto.  The apartment is tidy and furnished with an artist's eye for detail.  Nice green view from the windows.  The apartment is not completely soundproof but this has an upside too, such as the occasional call of seagulls heard through the bathroom vent.  The (shared) wireless connection works better in the hallway or in the bakery next door, which makes a tempting range of pastries and sells a good cup of coffee for only 65 cents.  Pleasant neighbourhood with shops nearby, within walking distance from the centre. Easy metro connection to the airport.

Laetitia was very nice and speaks a good English and French ! The apartment was clean and functional,she gave us good recommendations about restaurant and other things to do. as a family of 3 we recommend this host and this apartment very near to Porto downtown area

Todo ha ido según lo esperado. Avisamos a Laetitia cuando aterrizamos en Porto y quedamos en el apartamento. Fue muy amable, nos explicó el transporte, los lugares que nos podrían interesar y nos dio recomendaciones de todo tipo que nos fueron muy útiles. El apartamento y el barrio son tal y como están descritos. Agradecimos mucho tener todo lo necesario para cocinar y lavar la ropa. El piso es muy céntrico y está estupendamente comunicado por metro y bus. Nuestra estancia ha sido perfecta.
Laeticia is a nice host who gave us a lot of informations. Her flat is cosy and confortable, close to down town.

Cosy and well located apartment at just a few minutes from the metro station. From there, it is very easy to travel across Porto. We had a great stay in Porto! 
The kitchen has everything you need for cooking. The rest of the apartment is well furnished with a personal touch of Laetitia.
Only a pity that the elevator was not working during our stay to reach to the apartment on the 4th floor...
As is mentioned correctly by Laetitia in the description, there is quite some noise in the street due to traffic.

If you did not plan your visit in advance, don't worry. Laetitia has a long list of recommended restaurants/bars/activities!

L'appartement est spacieux, agréable et très bien situé. 
Laetitia nous a parfaitement accueillis et donné, en outre, d'excellents conseils en termes de lieux à voir, restaurants et bars.

Laetitia nous a très bien accueilli, notamment en nous donnant plein de bons plans (bars, restos, etc.), nous en avons suivi quelques uns et avons passé un super séjour grâce à elle. L'appartement était vraiment très propre et bien équipé. Seul bémol, l'appartement est assez mal insonorisé, on entends pas mal les voitures, heureusement que le quartier est assez calme mais les mouettes se baladent en gangs à Porto ;) Globalement je recommande, on s'est vraiment bien senti dans cette appartement. Merci pour tout.
piso ideal para las familias. abajo hay panaderia y enfrente un take away con la comida portuguesa, ambos muy aconsejables

Laetitia's flat was as expected and well located for the city centre and it also had good transport links for rail and the airport. She was helpful with both information and recommendations when we arrived and queries we had during our stay. We travelled with our 20-month old daughter without difficulty. We would go back and stay.

The appartment is really well located with just a ten minute walk to the center or five to the closest metro station. Clean, light and it has all the equipment you need. The bed sleeps pretty well! Kitchen is well equipped and the bathroom is okay (water pressure is really low though).
We really enjoyed our stay. The apartment is very well located, cozy and clean. Thanks Laetitia;)
My parents were really happy about their stay at Laetitia's. Even though we book very last minute, Laetitia was caring and very available.
Genial!

We arrived late on a very wet evening and Laetitia warmly greeted us into her lovely home. Perfect for our stay in Porto - great location for city centre and 3 mins to Metro. Laetitia's tip of the restaurant across the road is not to be missed. I will be recommending this lovely apartment to any of our family or friends who may be lucky enough to visit Porto.

Laetitia’s apartment was perfect. 
I stayed there for 1 month and it felt like home. 

Perfectly located, and a very comfortable space. 

Wifi was fast and reliable. The bed was comfortable as well. 

Definitely would recommend Laetitia and her apartment. She helped make Porto feel like home. 

Thank you Laetitia!

We spent a perfect week in your apartment. Would definitely recommend! 
Thank you again for everything!

The kitchen was not fully cleaned.
Noise every night , have a pub in front of the apartament  and people dont care to laugh very hight.

Some things in the photos don't match, like the sofa and table.

The host have left the refrigerator, freezer, cabinets, wardrobe with her thing left a litle space for us or none in some cases like the freezer and cabinets loaded with old food. "bad for a 30 days rent"

She was rude against us because we arrived 40 minutes later, we have comunicated she before the delay, because we had a delay to take the rented car "common for travellers".
she ask us rude things like "you don't have gps?" and "the house is the only number 40 in the road", i never seen a treatment like that on airbnb before.

Every people traveling can got very easy delays..

The host ask every time about the apartment not how are our stay or if we need anything and every paper inside the house have a reminder "dont steal anything" its funny because the apartment is so simple and have nothing of value.. "rude again".

It would be better if she treated the guests as guests!

The flat from laetitia is really Nice! It Looks exactly like on the Photos or even Better. The Check in And even The Check out was really easy! Normally laetitia lives in her airbnb so it’s really Cozy and has everything what you Need! The flat is in a Nice area! Near to the supermarket, flat, City Center And Metro Station! We really enjoyed the Stay!

name: Art-Deco In The Heart of Sydney
summary: This charming 1 bdr apt has it all. Minutes walk to the CBD and even closer to the cafe and night-life hubs of Kings Cross and Oxford St. This sanctuary provides complete privacy and all the needed amenities to relax and rest between adventures.
space: Right in the heart of inner, east Sydney. Surrounded by some of the best cafes, bars, restaurants and galleries in the city you won't miss a thin. With train station 300m away and buses and cabs right outside the door, make the most of Sydney and then return to this cosy sanctuary for a good night's sleep.
description: This charming 1 bdr apt has it all. Minutes walk to the CBD and even closer to the cafe and night-life hubs of Kings Cross and Oxford St. This sanctuary provides complete privacy and all the needed amenities to relax and rest between adventures. Right in the heart of inner, east Sydney. Surrounded by some of the best cafes, bars, restaurants and galleries in the city you won't miss a thin. With train station 300m away and buses and cabs right outside the door, make the most of Sydney and then return to this cosy sanctuary for a good night's sleep. Access to the apartment and the downstairs laundry. Happy to help decipher the massive selection of bars, clubs, cafes all throughout the neighbourhood. Gyms are a 1 minute walk away, mention you are looking at gyms to join and you should be able to get a 3 day free membership. There is a fridge but no freezer.
neighborhood_overview: Gyms are a 1 minute walk away, mention you are looking at gyms to join and you should be able to get a 3 day free membership.
notes: There is a fridge but no freezer.
access: Access to the apartment and the downstairs laundry.
interaction: Happy to help decipher the massive selection of bars, clubs, cafes all throughout the neighbourhood.
house_rules: I've just moved out with my partner but this is still my home so please be respectful. That is all!

reviews.comments: Hugo was very welcoming when we first arrived and told us about his favourite local cafes and restaurants around the area which were awesome. The place was very artfully furnished and located conveniently next to the station. We would highly recommend his place. Loved it! Thanks, Hugo! :))

Hugo was very friendly, the apartment has a lot of small thought out nice touches to make your stay more convenient.  
The listing is very accurate, what you see on the photo's is what you get. The building is old but not noisy and the bed very comfortable. Good location for getting around Sydney, would recommend staying here to any of our friends!
Great apartment and great location, it's close to pretty much everything you need in Sydney!!
房子位于悉尼达令赫斯特街区,交通还算方便,周边餐厅很多,去超市也很近｡房间很干净,设施也比较齐全｡
Hugo was easy to communicate and a great host - would recommend.

Hugo place was lovely , very clean and comfortable . Gorgeous Art Deco building, location was amazing 
. Walking distance to all big attractions and city . Hugo was very helpful and flexible with all requests and even though he was out of the city his friend Oliver met me and was very welcoming and accomodating . 
Seriously a great host and place to stay , I'll be back
Sherrie
Great location. Clean. Cosy. Comfortable.  Close to cafes and Kings  cross. I would definately stay here again.
The apartment is very cosy and comfortable at such a great location! Couldn't meet Hugo but his friend was just as helpful 8) a great place to recommend to friends!

I had an awesome stay at Hugo's, the place is magnificent and efficient. Everything that you need is in one place, and the apartment's near to convenient stores, the train station, restaurants and hot spots! Both Hugo & Oliver was very attentive and easy to connect with. Would definitely stay at Hugo's for upcoming trips to Sydney. Highly recommended!
Great location, neat, tidy and extremely comfortable. Top spot!

I loved the place and the location. Hugo was communicating well before and after my booking. As he was overseas, his friend Oliver took care of the flat. He was very welcoming, solving my luggage problem and hat great tips for dining out. Thank you so much, I will be back.

I stayed at Hugo's with my Dad while we were travelling through on a road trip up the East Coast.  My Dad was in the bedroom and I was on the inflatable in the living room. There was more than enough space for the 2 of us and Hugo's home was exactly as expected.  Beautiful, homely and fantastically positioned close to the centre of Sydney.  

We loved the art deco style of the building and how Hugo had furnished the apartment.  Hugo's communication was excellent through out the whole process and checking in and out was made seamless and flexible. The weather was terrible during our stay but fortunately there was huge range of fantastic cafes, restaurants and bars in the immediate area. Great location!

To summarise, I would absolutely recommend Hugo's place to anyone visiting Sydney and we're sure to be back in touch next time we're in town :)

Thanks for everything!
The apartment is perfect for a Sydney visit - complete with everything you need. A range of tourist information was left fir us which was helpful.
Great location and everything clean and tidy.  Hug's friend who saw us in was great
Hugo's place was perfect for our weekend in Sydney. It was neat and tidy, conveniently located and had everything we needed. Thanks for having us!

Hugo's friend was on hand to give us the keys and show us the apartment. He was really friendly and very helpful! The apartment was very clean, tidy and in a really good location. Hugo had also left out some tourist booklets for Sydney and the local area which was useful for us. Perfect for our 1st trip to Sydney!
L'appartement d'Hugo est très bien situé. les photos sont fidèles à l'appartement.
Loved our stay at Hugo's. Lovely clean apartment which had a nice homely feel! Had a nice warm welcome from Oliver and thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Hugo's apartment. The location is absolutely ideal and the apartment is well outfitted for a comfortable stay in Sydney. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this place.
Thanks for a great stay Hugo! Apartment is in the perfect spot, bed was comfortable and had all amenities needed.  Would definitely recommend to all

Lovely apartment in very central location, perfect for easy access to trains and buses and within walking distance of the City and Circular Quay. Bright, compact and comfortable - a very enjoyable stay. Many thanks Hugo.
Es hat alles super funktioniert. Kommunikation und Schlüsselübergabe ohne Probleme. Die Lage istneinfach top. Gute Anbindung an Bahn umd Bus. So gefällt AORBNB:-)

Stayed here only a few nights and didn't spend much time in the place other than sleep. The laundry room was a plus for me since I put it tons good use. Location is excellent as it only took me about 10 min to sit in a train at King's Cross station. Good number of places to eat and grab drinks nearby. Internet was also quite fast. Overall, I had a good experience and stay at Hugo's place.

Hugo is a fantastic host and his place is amazing. He couldn't be there to give us the keys but he made arrangements with a friend that lives nearby.
There were several Timeout books with information about the city and Hugo also left a public transport card for us to use.
The apartment is really close to bars and restaurants and the night life of the area is a must ;)
It was a great experience!!

We really enjoyed our stay at Hugo's apartment. The location was prime as there were so many coffee shops and bars to walk to. Hugo was easy to communicate with and made sure that we felt as comfortable as possible. Thanks Hugo!

Hugo hosted us on such short notice which we were so appreciative for. His friend Oliver met us, let us in and showed us where everything was. He was extremely helpful, offered us his phone number if we needed anything. The apartment was super clean and had everything you need, and the location was awesome, literally walking distance to countless bars, cafes and shopping. We had a great time and will definitely stay at Hugo's next time we're back in Syndey.

Hugo's friend let me in and out and offered to keep my luggage until later in the day, which was very much appreciated.
The apartment is very well located and well kept, though the fridge wasn't working properly unfortunately but was getting fixed.
I'd stay here again :)

We had a wonderful time staying in Hugo's apartment. It had everything we needed for a long weekend away and was in a great location - very close to kings cross station and some local amenities. Also a few nice spots for coffee brekky! Hugo's fridge unfortunately broke during our stay however Oliver was very accommodating suggesting we use his fridge to cool down his beers as he lives close to the apartment. We did not take up this offer, but very thankful nonetheless.
The bed was comfy and although there was no air con available (which we knew upon booking) the fan in the bedroom did the trick. 
I would certainly consider staying in the apartment next time we travel to Sydney.
Thanks Hugo & Oliver!

I really enjoyed my stay at Hugo’s apartment. His friend Oliver was incredibly helpful and held our luggage till the apartment was available as well as holding it until we flew out after check-out. The apartment is perfectly located and walking distance to most areas as well as public transport. It is an easy walk to the CBD as well as Oxford St and many restaurants. The fridge was broken however that was not really an issue for us. Would definitely stay at Hugo’s again.

Hugos apartment is in a perfect location with lots of restaurants, bars and public transport close by. It is cozy and beautifully furnished. A nice extra where lots of interesting books about photography. The problem with the fridge was solved while we where there by replacing it. Happy to come back anytime! :)
The location is very good, a 3 min walk to Kingscross station and easy to find. The house is clean enough. Worth the price.
My partner and I were in Sydney and stayed at Hugo's place.  Great apartment centrally located.
Really good location, great communication

We had a lovely stay at Hugo's apartment! Hugo was very responsive throughout the process. The studio was very homely and had everything we needed. The biggest plus point was its location! Just a 5 minute walk to Kings Cross train station, and dozens of restaurants and bars within walking distance. Check in and check out was extremely smooth thanks to Hugo's friend Oliver, who even helped us get our luggage up the flight of stairs. We highly recommend this apartment and would definitely stay here the next time we are in town. Thanks for having us!
Believe all the positive reviews, great place to stay and check out Oliver's recommendation for Chester white!

Good location! Near train station, restaurant and supermarket.
Walking distance to the harbour 30 min wich you walk true the botanic gardens! The app has everything you need, Nice kitchen, livingroom and is clean enough. We wouldt like to stay here if we are in Sydney again. Thx to Oliver for the tips and help!

Thanks to Hugo and Oliver, we really had a good time in Sydney.The apartment is not only clean and tidy, but also in perfect location. It took us 5 minutes to walk to the train station and nearly 20 minutes to reach most of the places we want to visit. My friend and I love the apartment very much. We will recommend it to our friends.

Hugo's place is conveniently located near Kings Cross train station, and is about a 15 minute walk to the heart of Sydney CBD. It's close to the supermarkets and restaurants, everything one can ask for. The apartment is small but has everything that you need. Hugo's friend Oliver introduced my mum and I to the apartment while Hugo was away but both were available via text and Airbnb when I had queries. I would highly recommend Hugo's apartment.

hugo`s place iTs a great place!!

really nice home and really close to train station, also you can just walk to the best areas in city, 

the house its really full equiped and ready to stay!

we didnt know hugo, but he gave a contact to help us in everything!!! (thanks Oliver you were great!!),

if you are going to Sydney, this house its a must! !

Hugo's place was lovely! Exactly as he described and a great size for the two of us. It's far enough out of the city so you don't have the noise and traffic but still in close enough distance to public transport, supermarkets, and tourist attractions. It's also an easy walking distance to the city which we loved. I would highly recommend this place to people who are planning on getting out of their accommodation and exploring Sydney because for me it was a small space to be in for long periods of time. Having said that though, it was very liveable and comfortable! Thanks again to Hugo, and thanks to Oliver for being very hospitable on our arrival.

Thank you to both Hugo and Oliver for a great stay in Darlinghurst. Oliver was welcoming and friendly. Hugo also went above and beyond to help us out when we couldn't figure out the internet :) 
The place was lovely and set up well for our arrival. Thanks for a great stay!
The flat is perfect and very well located.  We enjoy the lovely king cross market recommended by Hugo. We really enjoy our week in this suburb.
I enjoyed my stay here. Hugo's place was cool and comfortable. Everything you need in an accessible location. Hugo was flexible and easy to deal with.

Hugo's place was very nice and very clean, and he went out of his way to make the stay easy and enjoyable. He was great at keeping in touch and I felt like he was available for help at any time (though I didn't need it.) The neighborhood itself was wonderful, and getting around Sydney was a breeze with Kings Cross station right down the road. Highly recommended.
Falta un punt de llum per poder llegir.

Hugo was out of town so arranged a friend to meet us at the apartment when we arrived. It was very easy to get to (we walked from St. James station) and in a nice neighbourhood. The building/apartment is very secure and in a good central location.  Good places to eat close by, Bloody Mary's for breakfast was a great spot.
Also probably the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in!

Both Hugo and Oliver were very helpful.
The apartment was clean and tidy and had everything we needed for our stay. The location was perfect as it was a short walk from a lot of things. The train station, shops and restaurants were only a few minutes walk away, and it was a 25minute walk from the Botanical Gardens and the Opera House.
Great location and nice apartment. Hugo and Oliver were both very helpful and responsive. Perfect for walking to the CBD, museums, and parks, with easy access to public transit.
Didn't get to meet Hugo but his friend Ollie is really friendly and Hugo was easily contactable. Apartment was really nice and location was convenient. I would highly recommend!

Lovely stay at Hugo's cozy apartment. Hugo and his friend Oliver were extremely responsive, helpful, and reassuring. The apartment was exactly as expected based on the listing. My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay and would come back anytime.

Really recommend Hugo's place. It's in the best location, and had all the things we needed for a short stay. Really clean and couldn't fault anything. Great communication with both Hugo and Oliver.  One of the best value places I've stayed in Sydney.

It was a very good place to stay, a good desk, TV and DVD, comfy bed.  And a great location, too.

Oliver (who met me) was very helpful.

It was a fraction on the small side for my liking for an extended stay.  

Regarding the kitchen, I'd rather not leave a permanent comment about a fixable problem, but I'd ask Hugo about the microwave and oven if you are planning to heat food.
We really enjoyed our stay because Hugo was very accommodating with our check in and check out time. It was a very central location. The apartment was spacious and the wifi was good.

Didn't get a chance to meet Hugo, however Oliver met with my friend and I and was very pleasant. He offered to show us around and was there when we needed him. Hugo was just a phone call away and was very accommodating.

The place itself had everything you need, very great location. Literally 5 min walk from the train station which connects to everything. It's a nice town, there are always people walking around so you feel safe. 

Our wifi shut off one night and we contacted Hugo in the morning and he immediately had it taken care of even refunded a night for the inconvenience when he didn't have to. Definutely a great Host, would recommend.
Hugo is easy going, really flexible to arrange check in and check out. The place is great, good location and clean. We really liked our stay. We recommend it!
Great stay. Quiet for this part of town and clean throughout. Thanks guys!
Our second visit - once again enjoyable and Oliver extremely helpful and generous with his time.

Modern old apartment block with absolute peace time quiet ability to block out any city life. Full mini kitchenette and business desk plus couch relax area combo. Massive main room with an offset seperate bedroom with full fresh air if desired. Thank you : )
Great little place. The location is perfect, lots to do near by and the train service at kings Cross is super handy. The hosts are top as well.

Even after our flight getting delayed and shifting our schedules around, Hugo and Oliver have been very patient and generous to us on our arrival. 

The place is located in a very convenient location sitting in between CBD and Surry Hills, and has nice cafes and restaurants close by. The apartment is very clean and was more than spacious for two of us. Their couch is a perfect for a quick nap while watching TV. It's a quiet neighborhood and had no problem falling asleep day and night.

Would definitely use again for our next visit to Sydney.
Oliver was very helpful, friendly and accommodating. Location was fabulous and the apartment was gorgeous, had everything we needed for our stay.

3rd time I've stayed here says it all.

Now with a microwave - thanks Hugo!

We had a great little stay at Hugo's place. It was perfect for a couple, very comfortable and very clean.  Great location in regards to transport (very close to the Kings Cross train station), cafes, supermarket etc.  We felt safe aswell.  I walked from the apartment to the Opera House, and it was a great walk via Darlinghurst St and through the Botanical Gardens. Thank you Oliver for meeting me to handover keys and instructions.
Great little place in central location. Helpful hosts. Thank you!

This place was great! Convenient access to public transport and within a long walk of the harbor.  The bed was very comfortable and it was a perfect place for 2.  Highly recommend for exploring the town.

Our trip was improved tenfold by the friendliness and hospitality of Hugo & Oliver. 
The space is beautifully decorated and conveniently located near hubs of cafe's, shops and transport. 

The hosts went above and beyond to ensure our stay was as comfortable and easy as possible. We cannot speak highly enough of our experience.
Hugo and Ollie made my first air BnB experience a good one, clean tidy apartment close to everything.. would recommended to others for sure!

Hugo's apartment is in a great location, walking distance from kings cross station, cafes and restaurants. The apartment itself is small and basic, a perfect crash pad if you plan to explore sydney and it's food and bar scene, but not a place you would want to spend relaxation time in. Hugo was very friendly and accommodating.
Great location!
Hugo's is a great space, everything you could possibly need for 1-2 people, amazing location with everything at your fingertips and amenable hosts. I had a great stay and would recommend to others!

I'm a regular visitor to Sydney and a regular at Hugo's, too.  It's one of the first places I look up when I'm planning a trip.  
This time full marks for bending over backwards to help me check in conveniently.
Nice small flat within easy walking distance to Kings Cross station, good bed -  very comfortable matrass. Recommended to stay for a few days.

Hugo's place is perfectly located for getting around Sydney, but equally for staying in the area; so many bars and restaurants and shops, you won't need to leave. The Opera House is only a 30 minute walk away - or 5 minutes by train! Bondi beach is 2 stops away by train.

The apartment is lovely; especially for single travelers. The bed is really comfy, it's got everything you need, and check in and out was easy-peasy.

I would recommend Hugo's place to anyone!

The location is great. Coles is right next to the place which opens till 12am everyday. If you walk out to Surry, you will find nice restaurants and bars. 

The place is cute and quite spacious for two people. It looks exactly same as the pictures on the website. However, the entire building is quite old, which makes sense that the place cannot be completely free from cockroaches and other bugs. 

There is a rule that you should use one towel per person over your stay, otherwise you are expected to leave a few towels for the next guests.

Perfect locations, in the same street there are a lots of bars and restaurants. I haven't meet Hugo, but a friend of his made the check in for him, really nice person. Both of them were so nice to me and answered all my questions. The apartment is cozy and perfect for 1 person or a couple.

Great location! Very central, animated and lively part of the city. We had a very pleasant stay and we thanks Oliver for his warm welcome and good advices. There is a great spot to buy ice cream around the corner. Don't miss it!

Hugo's place was great! Spacious and modern for two people, comfy bed, cute location, walkable to central or to bus transportation to the beach, close to a grocery store, had power adapters for us to use, check-in was very easy (with Oliver), WIFI, even had an umbrella we could use in the rain! I would highly recommend staying here. :)

Oliver was really great and flexible in checking me in. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) . Helped me hold on to my bags during my last day before going to the airport. Apartment was spacious with a nice kitchenette and seating area. Near to kings cross transit.

This place is great, close to everything - transportation, Coles, cafes and restaurants. I loved the wooden floor and interior, it's very cozy and I loved it. Oliver and Hugo responses very quickly, there was no communication problem. The only downside was bugs - cockroaches. So we sprayed insecticide, like every morning before we left.

Hugo's is one of my favourite places to stay in Sydney.  
I love the comfy couch to chill out on while watching TV/DVD, and the amount of bench/storage spaces to dump and stow my gear - and to find it again.
Great value and location

The place we stay for 4nights,location is very central ,about5 mins walk to the train station,but the room condition is not good enough,a little bite old design for everything,the day we check in ,host already tell us ,we may be see some cockroach around the kitchen area,then use the spray to spray them,but that is not a good method,the hosts must do something stop the cockroach.we will not recommen to any one else for this apartment,
Awesome central location close to everything. Despite being in the thick of it the residence is still quiet and getting a good nights sleep is a breeze. Thoroughly recommended.
The apartment is very well located, you can walk to some main attractions, close to public transport and places to eat. Oliver and Hugo very good hosts.
Awesome private little apartment. So close to Kings Cross station, it made everything so so easy. Oliver was really friendly and accommodating.
Great location near Kings Cross.

Awesome location! We were able to walk to the kings cross train stop. Street had lots of cute cafes and restaurants. It was a short walk to a local grocery store. There was a small refrigerator but no freezer. We found bugs in the kitchen and living space. When we notified the host and he told us that Sydney is known for its cockroaches. He thought the increase in rain over the last several weeks made it worse. He told us he would remedy the situation. Overall, a fine location for a few days. We loved Sydney!

Hugo's place was clean, easily accessible by public transport, beautifully presented and perfect location. 
We would definitely return for a second stay. 
Hugo himself is polite and eager to help in anyway. Thank you for having us.

A lovely and central apartment. Comfortable and well equipped. Loved the very cute bedroom nook. I was warned beforehand that the bath was leaking, but all the rest worked fine. The place is dark, but the bed is next to a big window so you don't suffer from it.
Brilliant place for a single or couple travelling. Good location for everything.
The place was nice and close to the train since I work in CBD. Lots of good restaurants around.
Great location, safe, simple but everything you need!
great value, location is epic.
It's always convenient to stay in this apartment.

1.in the room for 3min I witnessed COCKROACH on the kitchen table, living room wall, working space desk, the following days cockroaches are common also in bathroom, the LED screen of the oven( I doubt there's is a nest inside of the oven, cuz they come in and out from the oven door, and host even said to other ppl according to reviews cockroaches are well known in Sydney) COCKROACH IN ALL SIZE EVERYWHERE IN THE ROOM
 2. Plastic used bottle under the curtain, ate fruit core next to the living room TV apparently there is a big problem with cleaning service. TRASH SCATTERED IN THE ROOMI've been in the Airbnb in downtown too there isn't any situation like this. 
3. Good side you have a HUGE TV  and a soft bed. The heater is handy. Used to dry my hand drying clothes. Location next to the king cross, I can not say it is super downtown cuz it wasn't that central. But it is a bar&a restaurant street. Dominio  in walking distance 
4. The downstairs shared public washing machine is right next to the trash place with all over the dead giant body of cockroaches. You don't want to wash your clothe there. I did all my laundry by hands.
5 bathroom shower tap always leaking + the water sink in a TERRIBLE design+ cockroach activating zone. I CANT BEAR TO SHOWER IN SUCH A PLACE. Design:One tap with super hot water another one with super cold water. How am I able to mix them up by hands? I WONT RECOMMEND THIS PLACE UNTIL THEY SORT OUT THE COCKROACHES PROBLEM!
Appartement très sympa et très bien situé
非常好的房源,位置很方便,房屋设施便利

A cozy space situated in the heart of the city, the apartment was a great place to stay in. The apartment was well set up for my four day stay, reasonably quiet, and was close enough to restaurants and public transport.

Oliver was very easy to deal with, friendly and gave great recommendations around the area. The house was very clean, had everything you would need. Very central location. Can be a tad noisy during the night during the weekend

Appartement idéalement situé à a peine 5min à pied de la station king cross. Parfait pour rayonner dans la ville en utilisant les transports en communs. Sinon, à pied, il faut compter 30min pour rejoindre le CBD, ce qui est plutôt cool ! 
Contrairement à ce que certaines personnes m'avaient dit, le quartier de king cross ne craint pas. Je ne me suis jamais sentie en insécurité, même tard le soir.
L'appartement est très sympa, lit confortable, grande cuisine, télévision, machine à laver pour 3$ au Rez de chaussé. Le seul inconvénient est la baignoire qui commence à être vieille et rouillée, mais cela reste amplement suffisant pour prendre une douche. 
L'hôte est très sympathique et attentionné, donne de bonnes recommandations et s'assure que tout se passe bien et que l'on ne manque de rien par message. 
Je recommande ce logement !
Great place. Great location. Fantastic people to deal with. Highly recommend!
Love staying here, it has everything I need.
I always appreciate staying at Hugo's apartment.

Thanks boys!
Very cute apartment and photos don't do it justice 
Very convenient and you were very accommodating
Appreciate the last minute booking and enjoyed our stay! 
Sylvia and Gabe x
Clean, comfortable and in a convenient location. Thank you Hugo for the wonderful stay!
Thanks Hugo and Ollie - great little apartment in a super location. Ollie was very gracious with my late arrival. A top host!
Great location
Brilliant location, perfect for a week of exploring Sydney. Lovely host with great knowledge of the area too! Thank you, I would definitely recommend
Hugo's place is in a great location to were I needed to be and perfect for my needs. Recommended to anyone wanting to be be in the centre of the city experience.
localização bem central em Sydney. Dá para ir a pé à maioria das atrações turísticas e fica perto da estação de metrô. O apartamento tem tudo, confortável. Recomendo.

Thanks to Hugo, and Ollie, who welcomed me and showed me the ropes.  Great location, close to the CBD, the Cross, the train , was comfortable and has everything needed for a busy stay in Sydney.   Cheers Chris

Hugo's place is great, very clean, and fabulous location in Sydney.  We especially like the closeness to the Metro station, bus routes, and cafes and shopps at Kings Cross and Victoria Street.  The nearby gyms gave me free passes...wonderful!

Appartement très bien situé et chaleureux. Hugo est très accueillant et prêt à vous conseiller sur votre séjour à Sydney. Le quartier est vivant mais l’appartement est calme et permet de se reposer après des journées bien remplies.

I enjoyed my stay in Sydney! The host is very concerned and friendly! The location of the place is the heart of the city and has many chic and yummy bars and restaurant nearby. Many public transportation options are around the area that made my traveling extremely easy!
Everything was perfect.  A great base for exploring Sydney or just to stay in and chill if you need a break from the road.  I would definitely stay here again!
We loved staying at Hugo’s place. Awesome location. Close to transport, bars, restaurants. Comfortable bed. It had everything we needed. Great communication. We’ll definitely stay again
Thankyou Hugo and Ollie for having us at your Art Deco. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and being so close to everything was a huge bonus. Will be requesting to stay here again next time!

Hugo & Ollie's place is just perfectly located for exploring Sydney with the bustling Kings Cross just around the corner and lots of food and party options. And to top it all off, they are just the perfect hosts with great local tips and they make you feel really welcome. And definite recommendation for your stay in Sydney
Good
Good place to stay
Ollie is a fantastic host! The place is perfect and located centrally to near everything by either walking or transit.
I had a excellent stay at Hugo’s place. The studio is cosy and the location is perfect.
Excelent host and great location. Easy from the very first moment. A place that I will be booking next time I travel back to Sydney

I enjoyed my stay at Hugo’s place. It is exactly as pictured and situated in a great neighborhood surrounded by countless shops and restaurants, even a glorious supermarket that’s worth a visit just to browse. It’s easily accessible from the airport by subway train, just 3 or 4 blocks from where you get off. I was given excellent directions to the apartment, which is in a very secure building, up one flight of stairs. The unit was very clean, the water instantly hot and the strongest water pressure I’ve ever seen. The large desk and ample countertop made it really handy to spread things out, set up the laptop, etc. The wifi was fast. I didn’t watch any TV but there’s a huge one in front of a comfy sofa. The bedroom isn’t overly spacious but it has a large, comfortable bed and was more than adequate for me. I especially appreciated the room-darkening draperies in the bedroom. The place is quite quiet for being so close to the action outdoors. 

Ollie was a great host. He gave me a Sydney guidebook and pointed out places of interest, which was especially appreciated given that I hadn’t planned much in advance. He lives just a couple of doors down, so he’s at your service whenever needed. When I foolishly locked myself out, he was promptly there to let me back in. 

I highly recommend Hugo’s place to anyone. You could pay a lot more and stay at a place like the Waldorf Astoria. But I don’t like to pay a fortune for lodging when I can get a perfectly suitable place like this for a reasonable price.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and although I did not meet Hugo, Ollie was amazing in every way.  He went above and  beyond to provide me with information and suggestions and help me in every way he could.  I gained a new friend in the process too.  
The apartment is very conveniently located and the bed really comfortable.  I walked to most places and took the bus or train at other times.  This was my first visit in Sydney and it was a blast.  Thank you, guys.

Very responsive and helpful host. Apartment and building are vintage - a little rough around the edges, but clean, comfy, and nice to come home to at the end of the day. Building is safe (front door key access). 

Note - there is no freezer, and bedroom does not have a door (a thick curtain instead). 

Also - the bedroom is well circulated by the breeze if you leave the window open, but light sleepers might be interrupted by street noise (window opens to an alley between this building and the next). 

Small desk fan in lounge room works just fine, but not sure how building would be in summer (no a/c). 

Bathroom very well stocked with toiletries, and bedroom has handy shelving/hangers for clothes. A 10 minute leisurely walk straight to Oxford St. 

Good value for money given the location. A cute retro apartment.
Great little unit. Close to everything.
Great location, close to public transport and city. Host was excellent, would definitely recommend
Muy lindo el departamento, perfecto para una pareja. Muy buena ubicación.
Appartement calme et très bien situé pour un séjour touristique à Sydney.

Ollie was my host, and he was hugely friendly, helpful and prompt. I love the location of this apartment, and used it as my base for two nights and walked everywhere from there.

The bed is really comfortable, and lots of hot water in the shower... two of my priorities!

If you aren't looking for something fancy, but highly affordable and well located, this is the place for you.
We had a great time at Hugo's place. The apartment is central and has everything you need. The communication with Hugo was perfect. Would def go back!
An amazing abode in an amazing location with an amazing host . Highly recommended .

It is a great stay in Hugo’s place.
The location is perfect and Ollie is very nice. 

Will definitely stay here again :)
This is a small sweet vintage apartment in a fantastic location. Super comfy, great value. Host is very helpful and responsive and great. I will stay again if I can next time I'm in Sydney!
Such a good spot! Great location and beautiful little studio :)
위치 전철역 근처라.  편하고 호스트 너무 좋았어요 근처 마켓도 친절하 알려주시구. 챙겨주셔서 gooood

The location was outstanding and meant I could walk everywhere!

I also liked the apartment's New York vibe!

Hugo’s flat is good value for money and has a great location, only a few hundred metres from Kings Cross station and 15 minutes walk into the city.

The flat faces an internal courtyard which means it is a little on the dark side but also very quiet - much more than you would expect in this location.

Hugo and Ollie were great hosts and very helpful, especially when we accidentally left something behind. In summary the flat was ideally suited for what we wanted - a not-too-expensive apartment close to the city and train.
Was really nice. All you could wish for

This location is amazing, just 300m to the Kings Cross train station, and within short walking distance to pubs, cafes, and grocery mart.  The place was very functional, perfect for cooking my own meals at times during my 15 night stay.  The shower's water pressure was very strong and the hot water almost instantaneous (having a bathtub was a nice bonus).  The bed was very comfy with extra linens at hand, including plenty of large bath towels.  The oven didn't work nor was there a freezer as (both) stated in the printed instructions, but that didn't deter me from creating nice meals during my visit.  The portable space heater worked in a pinch when temperatures dropped a bit during the winter nights.  The unit backs onto a alleyway so not much natural light, but the interior lighting flooded the apartment nicely.  The apartment was very quiet, and very peaceful, just perfect after a busy day or night about town.  Check-in was a breeze, Ollie readily accommodated my early arrival and arrived seconds within my announced arrival on-site.  Ollie was very helpful, provided guide books in the unit and provided me with his own travel insight on places to visit in the local area.  Ollie was also quick to inquire about linen changes mid week, their laundering, including for bath towels.  Ollie was always just a text message away to offer any assistance when needed.  In summary, this place and Ollie as a host, made for a lovely hassle free 15 night stay in Sydney.  I definitely recommend this charming little place and I would return again.

Fantastic place to stay for those looking to explore Sydney, or those in town for work. Easy walk into CBD and great transport links. Apartment is clean and looks as per photos. Hosts were responsive and friendly throughout

The apartment is minutes away from the train station. It has a lockable from door to the building so very safe for solo travellers. 
It’s in an older building but maintained and all part of the Art Deco charm. Was very quiet at night. I’d stay again.

Ollie and Hugo are hosts with the most! This property is well positioned ~ close to city, public transport and some great restaurants and cafes. 
It was welcoming, warm and secure. I loved my stay and have no qualms in recommending this Airbnb and the hosts. 
Thanks guys ~ I’ll be back!
Mellie
Great location very communicative host
Such a great place in a great location. Ollie is a really great guy and easy to get ahold of if need be.
good location, clean rooms, kind host. Everything is perfect!

I stayed Hugo's place for five weeks. Few minutes to Kings Cross Station or takes only about 20min to CBD. Great place for exploring Sydney. There is almost everything you need in the room. Public washing machine is located in down stairs you will need three one dollar coins to use washing machine. Unfortunately I could not use internet for 4weeks due to failure but Hugo gave me a refund for recharge my data-usage for hotspot.

Great little apartment in Sydney. Super close to Kings Cross area for restaurants and bars. As well as several local cafes around. Not a bad walk into the actual city city (20-25mins depending on pace/destination and route). Communication was really good and we were able to leave our bags until our flight (obviously subject to booking demands). Convenient transport links nearby as well. Makes for a very good base to explore Sydney!
Beautiful space, stylish and great location. Awesome hosts always quick to respond and happy to help
Great location, just a 20 min walk into the CBD and nearby many shops. Neat, tidy, no frills place with great communication from Hugo and Ollie. Perfect for a place to sleep while in the city.

Ollie war ein sehr zuvorkommender Gastgeber. Das Check-in war unkompliziert. Er fragte gleich am nächsten Morgen nach ob alles in Ordnung ist. Bei Fragen stand er uns immer zur Verfügung. An Silvester durften wir auf der Dachterasse ein paar Häuser weiter an eine von ihm organisierte Party mit super Blick fürs Feuerwerk! Nochmals vielen Dank dafür!
Great location for New Year’s Eve!

A lovely apartment with everything you could need and more. The hosts were so friendly and extra helpful when we wanted to extend our stay. Fantastic location, 20 min walk to Sydney harbour and right beside train station and shops. Would highly recommend.

The location was very convenient and communication with the host wast fast and easy. We felt very welcome, Ollie was helpful and super accomodating for check in/out. Would book again if visiting the area, thanks Hugo & Ollie for a great stay!
I liked Hugo and Ollie’s apartment. It’s small, convenient and in great neighborhood, close to metro, supermarkets, cafes and bars. I would definitely stay here!

Cute, charming and comfy haunt to chillax in. Neat design touches, (Hidden by Airbnb) worthy and close to everything. 

Highly recommend.

This apartment is very well equiped and easy to live. There is one detail we did appreciate: there are USB plugs available! It may be a detail but we’re French and we need adaptors for all our devices. With USB plugs things were easier for us. 
This shows the nice attitude towards people who stay at this apartment. 
It is very well located also. Close to bars, restaurants and food shops. 
We loved staying there. 
And on the top of that we loved meeting Ollie we were talking with. He was here to warmly welcome us when we arrived. He was very reactive with messages and helped us with information about things to do (special thanks for the markets Ollie ). He also booked a taxi for us. 
And we had conversations through Airbnb chat about our days. That was so nice! Thank you very much Ollie

Great place to stay in Sydney in the centre of everything. Ollie was amazing with check in and out.
Thanks!

name: Suite Prestige - Bedroom with private bathroom
summary: Bedroom (with private bathroom)  highly comfort and convenient with furnished living room and equipped kitchen available.
