I have stayed at a few Airbnb places and usually the mattresses aren't great - these were great! :)

The suite is very spacious and lovely. It's much better in person. It's right across from the beach/park. We packed very light .. Beach towels ..provided..washer and dryer ..provided..We went beach hoping everyday even when its raining. $35 dollar in gas for total 6 days driving and free parking  :) only downside is that there are not many restaurants/shops around the area that stay open after 7pm. 7-11 is our only option for quick meals. If you are planning to stay away from waikiki, i highly recommend Nancy suite!! Would definite come bck when its not Hawaii rainy season.. Thank you Nancy!

Amazing house and amazing location, initially we though the house is bit far from the main city Honolulu. But after we reached the house, and seeing the neighbourhood we got amazed with the location(Beach infront of the house and hills in the back). The house was neatly setup, with extra comforters, towels. Nancy is really a nice lady, she kept on enquiring about our comforts till last day. This location is very near to Polynacian Center, kualoa ranch, Sunset beach.
Another nice thing about Kaaawa is, this part of the island is mostly rainy(at least when we were there) that makes it more beautiful.

Mahola Nancy(Second Hawaiin word I know apart Aloha :))

We will be back soon!

Nancy is the ultimate hostess.  From initial contact to seeing her wonderful house to leaving and getting back home, this was an incredible experience with regards to Nancy and interacting with this great lady.  My party had the best time and felt so at ease in this house, which is everything she says it is.  There is nothing overstated in her descriptions...Take them at face value and grab this opportunity to enjoy Hawaii the way you always thought it should be!  Mahalo, Nancy
The stay was clean and well equipped with towels, dishes, maps, etc. everything we needed was there! Our host welcomed us with Hawaiian chocolates and was easily accessible. Great stay!
Nancy was easy to communicate with, quick to respond, and generally an excellent host.  We loved staying here.  It's one of the prettiest spots on Oahu :)

Nancy's home is very nice.  Being right across the street from the beach, friendly neighbors, and having things provided such as beach toys for our toddler to play with, beach towels, etc. made this a great place to stay.
The host canceled this reservation 191 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Nancy's place was amazing!! So accommodating and very comfortable. Makes you feel just like home!!!! Stocked with just about anything you can think of or need. Across from the beach made for amazing morning walks! Hulk (the dog) was sooo cute and friendly we played fetch with him and he loved getting his belly scratched! Thank you Nancy for an amazing place to stay!!

Nancy was so easy to communicate with, she would respond very quickly and was very accommodating. Her place is very clean, spacious, quiet and in a beautiful location. She welcomed us with chocolate macadamia's and provided bottled water and coffee for us which we were very grateful for :) The photos don't do this place justice! We loved the welcome dog!

Kaa'awa is a somewhat remote location, but that is why we liked it! There was no one on the beach anytime we went! Just remember to bring food supplies with you because the only place closely you can purchase food/drinks is 7-11. This is the BEST place to stay if you have a wedding at Kualoa Ranch, it is also convenient to get to the North Shore and Sand Bar in Kaneohe. Crouching Tiger hike nearby is also very cool. A great place to stay away from the hustle and bustle of Honolulu!
The house was really comfortable with a great kitchen. Coffee, tea and other goodies for our use. Nice fresh beds and chilli air conditioning. When I visit Hawaii I will still here again. Thanks.

Our family had a wonderful stay at Nancy's home. The house was neat, clean and had all the basic necessities to get us started. The pictures really don't do it justice. Very grateful for the beach towels. The views were amazing and being able to walk across the street in the morning to the park and beach was awesome. Loved the home away from home local feel! Thanks Nancy for a great stay.

I absolutely loved staying here!  Nancy was the perfect host.  She answered any questions I had immediately.  The house was impeccably clean and well stocked.  Just the perfect size too.  The home is situated in a quiet neighborhood with the beach just across the street.  We were able to rent a car and check out so many of the sites just a few miles away.  
Staying here was a dream and would recommend it highly!  Thank you Nancy for making our stay perfect :)

Nancy, her family, and the neighbors were all very warm & welcoming. Nancy is a great hostess! She was readily available, a phone call away to assist us. She arranged surf lessons for our son, brought us an extra fan, and when we thought we might be in a situation with where we were scheduled to stay next, one phone call on a late Sunday evening, she welcomed us to come back and stay if we needed to. The neighbors, some of which are related to Nancy gave us information about the area, things we might want to go see and do, as well as local places to eat. The listing and pictures of the area are accurate. Across the street there is a green belt park area that goes down to the water, no more beach though, apparently two weeks before we arrived, the ocean washed that section of the beach away.

We stayed 2 weeks at Nancy's apartment and we really enjoyed our vacation. The apartment was comfortable, we did not put the A/C on (we don't like A/C.,,) and survived! The beach was just across the street which was nice. The traffic can be an issue: it is a little noisy. The kitchen is nice but don't expect to find everything if you cook a lot, we had to get creative!! 

We would definitively go back to Nancy's apartment if we go back to Oahu.

Nancy was WONDERFUL! Her response time was excellent!! Within minutes – She makes you feel like family!! Her home is beautiful and comfortable.  We had everything we needed!  The home is well taken care of, clean, no issues what-so-ever.  Beautiful neighborhood as well.  Exactly what we were looking for!  It’s also awesome that right next door you have a 7/11 – this makes it very much convenient.  There is a dog onsite (I believe the neighbor’s dog), but don’t be intimidated…that is the sweetest dog ever…I never heard the dog bark at all.  We actually felt protected by the dog. Nancy, thank you very much for lending us your home! We had a GREAT TIME.  I absolutely highly recommend this home. I will 100% stay here again – someday soon, hopefully! Mahalo!!
The house was perfect.  We had a great time.  Thanks Nancy.

Nancy was the absolute BEST!!

She provided exactly what I needed to feel comfortable while on the island and I am very satisfied with my visit!!!

WoW, WoW, WoW. Nancy is awesome. We entered a 2 bedroom unit welcomed with chocolates and a shining place. Clean towels, kitchen, bed, bathroom and everything else. Unit is right in front of the beautiful ocean once you open the door. Neighborhood is very quite and relaxing in the north shores of Oahu.
Nancy came to us the next day to welcome us in present and suggested us definitely check out the PCC center which we did and had an awesome experience.
Everything aside, there was a small problem that I have to mention and that is the unit's a very good place for 4 people. There is a 5th bed in the unit however it is not a comfortable bed to sleep on and the 5th person will be unhappy at nights if your party is greater than 4.
In conclusion, we had an awesome stay at Nancy's place in Kaawa. Definitely suggest to book it if you like to have a relaxing stay in a clean unit with a very good price in Oahu.
Very awesome place! Navy and family were wonderful!

Nancy's family made us feel very welcome during our stay. They were helpful, friendly, and have a very sweet dog. The house is in a beautiful location far enough out of the city to feel like a private sanctuary, but close enough to drive to any party of the island.

Nancy is an excellent host! She went above and beyond to make us feel welcome, including a nice welcome package as well as a parting gift. The amenities were great; having a washer/dryer available meant that we didn't have to pack as many clothes or underwear and the beach towels Nancy provided checked one more thing off of our packing list. 

The property met - and exceeded - my expectations. It's easy to find and has a nicely appointed interior. The two beds were very comfortable and I slept just as good as I would at home. The extra foldout bed was even comfortable enough for my teenage sister-in-law to sleep on without any complaints!

One of the things we enjoyed the most about our stay was the location. Kaaawa is outside of the major tourist areas, so we were able to avoid crowds and have some of the smaller, off-the-beaten-path beaches to ourselves. There are some great, if underrated, hikes nearby and the 7-11 next door makes it easy to find a late night snack or pick up any essentials you may have left at home.

If you like dogs, you'll love Nancy's neighbor's dog, Hulk (we didn't know his name at first so we called him Gus). He's the 'guard dog' and is a memorable part of our experience at Nancy's Paradise Beach House. We found several entries in Nancy's guest logs that mentioned how much they loved Hulk.

I recommend this place for anyone, especially families or couples, looking for a nice private residence to stay in that's away from the hustle and bustle of Honolulu or North Shore tourist hotspots.
Nancy is a very warm and filled with Aloha. Thank you for sharing Kaaava Paradise. Clean, thoughtfuly stocked, and provides great access to beautiful beaches in Oahu. Mahalo!

We stayed at this home for about a week when traveling with our friends.Our stay at Nancys house was awesome! Even though it was about a 30-40 minute drive to most popular places on the island it was well worth it. The house is located on the country side of the island which makes it that much more beautiful! We all agreed that the house is and has all you need on a trip. We are also thankful with the neighbor who was so friendly and resourceful when we had questions. The dog is also very friendly and not to be concerned about. We would definitely stay here again!
Nancy is the sweetest! Such a lovely location, as well.

Everything was very clean, water in  The refrigerator, a box of candy on the table.  The beach was right across the street and so we got to enjoy the sunrise in the morning and sunset in the evening.   I would definitely go back and use this home again .

Our group felt wonderfully welcomed and comfortable during our entire trip in Kaaawa!  The home was well stocked and ready for our group.  We were able to truly enjoy our Hawaii experience and even got the chance to use the charcoal grill to enjoy a steak dinner!
Stay here if you want to get away from the crowd. It's got a park directly in front of the house.  You can get groceries from food land down the street or the 7-11 next door.

nice location nearby the ocean, the house includes everything you could possible need, very clean and neat, Nancy has been very prompt and professional to respond all of my requests.

Nancy's place is definitely a place I'd love to stay again if I am visiting Hawaii in the future.

We are a family of four (2 adults and 2 kids aged 4 and 2) and the place was great for us. The area is beautiful and the host was always quick to answer my questions. We really appreciated the availability of a room with a washer and dryer (traveling with kids) and all sorts of equipment as well (beach toys, chairs,  umbrellas, snorkeling gear, cooler, etc). Awesome!
This is exactly what we were looking for regarding our stay on Oahu. Everything fit our criteria perfectly, and made for awesome memories! Definitely plan on returning❤️
Beautiful home and area! Kid friendly and easy ride to PCC on public transit. Loved our stay thank you Nancy!!

Great location, ocean just across the street at Swazy beach park. Host was very responsive and brother Ricky who lives upstairs really friendly. The place has everything you need for a comfortable laid-back stay at Oahu!
we were looking for something like a local and this was just the place, if you have seen the island before you will appreciate being away from Waikiki but able to go there if you want.....

Nice, clean, roomy and well equipped unit! It's the lower unit so to get a view you have to go outside. The beach across the highway is not a swimming beach, but it was nice for a stroll and to sit and relax. The highway is very busy, but the bedrooms are in the back away from noise. It was not what I hoped for but we still had a great stay with no problems. Nancy's brother and wife were very friendly and it felt comfortable to stay there. It was a nice first AirBnB experience for us.

The flat is very well maintained and functional. Kaaawa is a very quiet non-descript settlement but being mid-way on the east coast, it is an ideal base.  We were a family of 5 and found the apartment to be sufficiently spacious although outdoor space is limited. Nancy is an excellent host and dealt extremely quickly and efficiently with any issues that arose.

Nancy's place is superb due to its quiet location and beach access. There is plenty of parking and it is very family friendly. We had a 6mo baby and a 7 yo and all of us enjoyed the quick beach access. The 7/11 next door was super convenient. 
We didn't use the AC in the place as we let in the breeze from the ocean. There's outdoor taps to wash of the sand and Nancy provided us with beach towels and other sundries. Highly recommended!
Abhijit
I like the house and the location. Nancy is the most friendly host I have ever seen.

It's a wondeful immaculate downstairs apartment across the street from the beach park in the tiny town of Kaaawa
with the breath-taking mountains rising barely a few hundred yards away. Highly recommended!

This place is good and affordable compared to Waikiki. It's also close to a beautiful beach, though it's not that swimmable. There is Kaaawa beach very close driving distance. There was road construction and only 1 main road, which made driving to other destinations on the island a challenge. It's close to 711, but far from any type of larger stores like a Safeway. It's very rural. If you like to get away from the crowded Waikiki, it's a good place, just be prepared to drive a lot. Other than that, it's good place if you have kids and are looking for a budget.

Nancy's place was the perfect location for our stay. 15min to Polynesian Cultural  Center . Foodland and Tamuras and Longs also as close. 
 The home was more spacious than I had anticipated.  Both the bedrooms and linens were comfortable . The kitchen seemed well stocked to accommodate food preparation easily.   Since we were out and about a lot as  we had family staying close by in the plantation estate & this place was literally a 5min walk.  We only used the kitchen  for a few breakfasts and making coffee & tea.  The one shared  bath was also spacious . We met the brother and his family who lived upstairs.  Nice  folks .   Loved Hulk the super cute bull dog who hangs out all day.  We loved coming home and seeing  him.  Great parking and such convenience having 7-11 & gas station nearby.  
Mahalo ..many thanks for having us in your home!

We chose this rental based on the great reviews, so we were surprised when we walked in to find some droppings on the floor and lots of flies in the living room/kitchen area, one of the bedrooms, and the bathroom.  I understand this side of the island is more prone to bugs, but this was excessive.  We would've raised this to Nancy, but our stay was short (we arrived Friday late afternoon, attended a wedding Saturday, and left before dawn Sunday).  The shower curtain liner was also quite moldy - more than you would expect.  The positives.  Nancy responded to messages quickly, and set up a pack n play for our baby.  The kitchen pantry was nicely stocked so if you forgot something basic it was likely in the cupboard.  The AC in the main living area was nice to have, and the ceiling fans kept things sufficiently cool in the bedrooms.
Great location if you want to get away from the crowd. Also the location is very scenary, with mountains behind you and ocean in front. Very close to the north short. A hidden gem!
Location is far away from the touristy places but close to so many excellent beaches and hikes.
We loved our stay. Nancy was a pleasant and perfect host.  The place is equipped with a lot of extra beach items, chairs, umbrella, etc.

This home was perfect for our families needs. There was plenty of space, enough extra blankets , towels , etc. we were also pleased there was a car seat available for us to use and other small things to take with us to beach for the baby to play with . We enjoyed our stay

What a nice house, my daughter and her bridesmaids stayed and got ready there. Thank goodness for the air conditioning  and the close commute  to Kualoa Ranch where the wedding took place!  It also was very spacious and  would book it again for another.special occasion.  Thank you Nancy your home was great!
Lovely location with the backdrop of the mountains, great proximity to the beach and Kahana bay.  Hawaiian living.
The place is a great place in the country side of oahu. More locals than tourists. Simple and quiet. No worries

Nancy's place is good for a small family and is in a great location.  Living space is comfortable and there is a nicely-equipped kitchen that we used quite a bit.  There is only one bathroom so it was a little tight for 4 adults.  Please keep in mid that It's is a ground-floor unit without a front porch or balcony. Overall, a good value for our  family.

The place is perfect for getting away from the tourist centers. It's a great home base that's in a small local town, close to a bunch of great beaches and great hikes. 
Very well maintained and clean, has a 7/11 next door for all the basic shopping needs, and stores and restaurants a 5 minute drive away.
Really the ideal place for a home-base in Oahu!

If you have activities on this side of the island, it's perfect. Clean, spacious, A/C if you need it. The laundry is super convenient. The house is stocked with stuff we didn't get a chance to use like snorkeling, kayak. The kitchen is well equipped.

The neighbor has a bulldog who for the most part doesn't bother you except if you try to go to the neighbors door. The beach's waves are quite strong and probably not good for young children, but it's also very close to other beaches that are.

Excellent place. I would stay here again.

This is the perfect place for a family wishing to have a nice and quiet time in Hawaii. The house is close to several attractions, and beaches. You also have a couple of hiking trails nearby. Overall a great experience.
A truly peaceful Hawaiian house with spectacular views & convenient access to food & surf.

Nancys place is directly across the street from a beautiful beach! Very clean! The AC was a major plus. The neighbours are very friendly and helpful. Very close to many delicious local foods and markets!!
Clean, open, great space with amazing location.
great place good parking and supper clean! Nancy was great accommodating us even when we were changing the reservation due to travel time. :D

This property is amazing and the pictures don't do it justice. Literally across the road from the beach and in the most amazingly scenic location. Only 45 mins from Waikiki. The property itself is immaculately clean and ideal for a break away. Nancys communication was great. We cant wait to go back.
If you are looking for relaxation, quiet time, and beautiful surroundings I would recommend Nancy's place. Go shopping before driving out there. Then rest away.
No complaints, this place was handy for people to stay for my wedding.
In the country

We had a lovely time on the East Side of Oahu. The house was a close drive to Whole Foods in Kailua where we got healthy food. But with the 7-11 is right next door to the house, we were able to get plentiful cups of Kona coffee anytime of day. Yum. 

Clean, orderly and helpful. It was everything we wanted.
This is a perfect resting place if you want to go to the Polynesian Cultural Center (PCC) and get away from the hubbub of Honolulu.  Finish your day at PCC and you are minutes away from your bed!

We had a great time staying in the house. The house is very clean, comfort and walkable distance to a beach park. The host( Wu’s family ) is very friendly and gave us a lot of local tips. We really enjoy and appreciated the culture and people here. Hawaii is a true paradise!
Downstairs apartment ground level limited view of Ocean

We spent a week with our 2 little girls and had a great time! We chose to stay on Oahu East coast to be closer to the authentic local life and not the Las Vegas atmosphere of Waikiki. That was a smart choice! We spent time on the North Shore spots, Turtle bay (35min drive), at Aloha Shrimp (10min drive), at Kahana bay (3min drive), at the Polynesian Cultural Center (25min drive), at Kailua beach (45min) and Hanauma bay (60min). We cross the street to see the sunrise, and to the nextdoor 7/11 to pick up last minute food. The neighboor are really friendly and gave us tips about what to do around the place! We will be back!

Nancy is the perfect host! Kind, hospitable and super responsive. The apartment was clean and in a great location. We were able to use all the beach equipment and snorkeling gear and felt like family. Nancy replied to every question within minutes. Thank you Nancy!
Nice clean apartment. The extra bed is not very good. Good location.
Nancy's place was great, clean and a good location.

Beautiful! Thank you.  We had a wonderful time. Great location to so many different beaches and adventures. Having Ricky next door was helpful.  He was very imformative and super friendly.  Thanks again.
Great stay!
Loved the place

Although we never saw Nancy she was always available and the friendliest, most helpful host. The home was clean with many amenities. The air conditioning was nice to have after a couple of hot days spent in Waikiki. The beach park across the street was absolutely beautiful and we enjoyed watching the sunrise one morning and several walks during our stay. Brother Ricky was nice and helpful during our stay also. We loved seeing Hulk everyday. He reminded me of my puppies back home and it was nice to have him around. We might have spoiled him a bit, sorry. The location is breathtaking. Views of the mountain and views of the beach. Can’t go wrong. We will definitely stay again next time we come.
Great location for visiting all parts of the island. Comfy beds and stayed cool. Were able to accommodate our infant.

Great little place. The beach is easy to get to. Which we were the only ones on most of the time. It was like our private beach! And we loved Hulk the neighbors loveable bull dog. All the appliances were like New. Nancy was very accommodating.

Our stay at Nancy's place was great, everything was very clean and the space was well organized. She was super helpful with any questions we had before and throughout the trip. Close to the beach and a park so great for the kids.
일딴운 짚앞애 걔한마뤼까 있쑵늬다. 꾸래쒀 끄런지 또오옹냄쎄가나용. 위이치눈 꼭 랜트으카 허셔야해여.

Nancy said welcome to Paradise when we first checked in... that is exactly how we felt about our stay. Rooms, bathroom and kitchen were clean. Beds fits our needs and we slept good each night. The place is nice but we didnt spend much time there... Hawaii ;)  But everynight we returned exhausted from relaxing so hard, it was nice to have all our needs and wants met. We will glady come again and would be hard pressed to stay anywhere else. Thank you Nancy! Mahalo

Nancy is by far the most kindest and thoughtful host there is! She was SO quick to respond back. My family and I were having an absolute terrible first time experience with AirBnB an our original stay. We needed something quick and last minute due to having to leave our previous Airbnb immediately. Nancy responded back quickly with no hesitation! She knew we had two small children and she wanted to make sure we were comfortable and well cared for. 

Her home was very spacious. I love that there are two bedrooms. The beds were comfortable and she provided clean sheets and blankets. She has some extra in store just Incase. Her home is literally across the street from a very nice, secluded beach with a cute, little entrance. There is also a park across the stress before the beach which is perfect if you have children. Her home is far from the touristy areas which we loved. We got a feel of the island life. So peaceful, quiet with amazing views. The neighbors are quite and kind. Nancy also provides LOTS of sand toys, beach toys, snorkel gear and boogie boards. Which makes your experience that much better! I can’t express enough how thankful we are to come across her. She is just so kind. You cannot go wrong with booking her place! My family and I will absolutely 100% book her if and when we ever go back to Oahu! Thank you so much Nancy, for your amazing hospitality and love. May God continue to bless you and your family.

Mahalo!!!! 

The palomino family.
Nancy was a good host. I loved the fact the area had a kitchen and extra space to move around. She is attentive and tried to be as accommodating as possible.
Great place to stay. Nice, roomy, clean, quiet.  We all enjoyed it very much and would stay again.
Great place, great neighbors.

We enjoyed are stay here.  A couple times we walked to the beach across the street for the kids to cool off.  There’s a playground there, too.  It was nice being able to be so close to the State Farm Fair at Kualoa Ranch.  Lots of things to check out. Mahalo

Our family spent 2 nights at this apartment.  It definitely met all of our needs, and Nancy was a great host. She was very prompt in answering any questions we had.  The location was great--right across from a quiet beach that we had all to ourselves.  There was a bus stop right out front and it is easy to get anywhere you want to on the island with the bus system.  This is a great rental if you want to get away from the touristy areas and live like a local.
Great host. Very clean and everything we needed. Great location for a wedding we attended nearby at Kualoa Ranch.

This is a perfect place to unwind after a busy day of sightseeing, or to prepare for another day in paradise. While it's out of the way, this ground-floor apartment-like dwelling is perfect for those who want to escape the hustle, bustle, and crowds. Our family of four (2 parents and two adult children) had plenty of room for together time and alone-time. And the beach right across the street was a perfect way to relax at night (Hint: while the ocean is right there, you'll need to walk all the way to the left of the park to find the beach access point.) We enjoyed a magnificent 11-night stay without ever feeling crowded or cramped. And the laundry room was a God-send!! So glad we had the chance to live the true Hawaii lifestyle.
Great location, close to many things. Very surprise by the sea turtles across the street. Great facility for my family (3adults and 2 children’s).
Very pleasant stay  with a fabulously and very interesting host.
Right across the street from the beach and close to Kualoa ranch. Clean and perfect home for our stay.

We had a great time for the 6 days we stayed. We went to Hawaii for the spartan races at the ranch. Unfortunately they were cancelled, but with so much to do with in the area we still filled our time no problem. The neighbors are great, never had a problem with them. We used the snorkeling gear at the beach across the road. But with the “hurricane” that passed. The water was pretty murky, but still fun. Nancy was great to deal with. Answered any questions I had. Just a great time. I mean, how can you have a bad time in Hawaii.

I traveled with my husband and another couple and this space was perfect for us. The park and beach is directly across the street, we never missed a sunrise! The house is well set up. The kitchen had everything we needed, the bathroom had plenty of towels and the laundry is easily accessible and so convenient! We appreciated the location,  we did a lot of exploring of the north shore and the south, the house is perfectly located between it all. Nancy is an excellent host, quick to respond and very organized, her brother lives upstairs and he is the most hospitable person you will ever meet. I would recommend this home to everyone. We absolutely will use this AirBnb if we ever come back!
Great location if you would like to stay near kualoa ranch
Nancy is a great host clean guest house awesome location,  very easy to communicate with I'd recommend Nancy's house any time
Beautiful space, close to both Honolulu and the North Shore.

Here is all the things I loved about your place Nancy.

Great location across a beautiful beach to watch the sunrise
Private parking on property
Convenient outdoor shower
Well designed Zen garden
Comfortable outdoor sitting area
Close to convenient store
Spotless interior
More then enough hot water for the shower
The Indo  interior decorations
All kitchen amenities need to whip up a Thanksgiving meal
Air conditioning
Comfortable beds and comforters
Quiet interior
Everything was as described.  Good location for exploring this side of the island.
A “go-to” place to stay to enjoy the North side of the island!
Nancy was a great host. The house was everything we need to explore Oahu. The beds were really comfortable. We definitely recommend staying here.
Good space very close to Kualoa and the beach. Concrete floors were a surprise but I guess near the beach and sand it makes it easier to clean.

This place is perfect for an off-city vacation on Oahu. There’s a bus stop just in front and a parking place if you have a car. 

It’s located just across from the ocean - a perfect spot for watching the sunrise with a morning coffee. A short drive away are a lot of the beautiful sites on Oahu. 

The flat is fully equipped, very comfortable for 4 people and there’s a 7-11 just next door. 

Nancy has been very responsive and the booking / check-in / check out process was a breeze. 

Bring your beach equipment - towels, snorkeling gear, etc... and bug spray !

We visited here for 2 nights as a group of three. Nancy and the neighbors of this house was a very kind people. This house was clean, well organized, beautifully decorated with nice both Hawaiian and Asian taste arts, enough space for parking. Here is also located next to water, to gas station, to convince store, to restaurant and easy access to visit northern part of O’ahu.

(Below in Japanese)

3名で2晩宿泊しました｡家主のﾅﾝｼｰさんとご近所の方はとても親切です｡お部屋は清潔で整理整頓されており備品に過不足ありません｡ﾊﾜｲﾃｲｽﾄの絵画やｱｼﾞｱﾝﾃｲｽﾄの仏像の置物でﾃﾞｺﾚｰｼｮﾝされています｡駐車場の広さも申し分ありません｡建物の前の道の向こう側が公園でその先がすぐ海です｡ｶﾞｿﾘﾝｽﾀﾝﾄﾞ､ｺﾝﾋﾞﾆ(ｾﾌﾞﾝｲﾚﾌﾞﾝ)､ﾚｽﾄﾗﾝが隣の敷地にありますし､ﾎﾟﾘﾈｼｱｶﾙﾁｬｰｾﾝﾀｰやｸｱﾛｱ牧場などへも車で数十分で行けて便利です｡
Well located between the North Shore and Kaneohe.  Clean, comfortable and easy access. Definitely recommended!
친절한 이웃과 조용한 환경에 별 5개 드립니다.행복한 휴가였습니다
Great location, super tidy and views to die for. Mahalo!
You'll feel like you' (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable and quiet. Bring house slippers for downstairs unit.
Awesome location.
We loved this place on the way to the north shore. Totally a great location for kick off to any part of the island. The host was available, quick to respond to questions.

The place was clean, quick responses, easy entrance, short walk to the beach, limited ocean view, but still a beautiful view from the table outside the front door. Kitchen and bedrooms were well furnished. Air conditioning worked well and fans kept the place cool. Good convenience to 7-eleven and the beach. Would recommend.

非常满意和舒服的一次入住｡Nancy 给我提供了一切有可能用的东西,并准备了小零食和小礼品给我的孩子们｡事先告诉了Nancy 我有三个孩子,所以安全座椅､游泳玩具都帮我准备了三份,很是感谢｡
位置很好,旁边就有便利店,门口就有儿童乐园和大草地可以让孩子撒欢｡下次还会选择这里｡谢谢Nancy !
Her home was nice and very close to a beach. Very convenient.

We had a true aloha experience while staying at Nancy’s place.  It was a lovely way to slow down after the hustle of bustle of Waikiki. We had the beach across the street to ourselves and loved exploring the windward side of Oahu. There are numerous food trucks north of Kaaawa and the fabulous Waiahole Poi Factory to the south. Mahalo Nancy!

Very much enjoyed my stay at Nancy’s place in Kaaawa. All of the communication prior to the trip, even though it was booked pretty last-minute, was prompt and informative. The place is kept in a nice, clean condition and it is in a beautiful location with the beach right across the street and beautiful mountains out the back. The hospitality was great, and Nancy even left some nice gifts on the table!

name: Perfect 1BD in East Village
summary: Comfortable, clean bedroom with exposed brick.  Second floor walk-up.  Located right in the heart of East Village, makes it before for a solo-traveler. Enjoy gourmet kitchen facilities, washer and dryer in the apt and rain water shower!
description: Comfortable, clean bedroom with exposed brick.  Second floor walk-up.  Located right in the heart of East Village, makes it before for a solo-traveler. Enjoy gourmet kitchen facilities, washer and dryer in the apt and rain water shower!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Australian, now living in NYC.  I'm laid back, generous, easy to get along with, love cats, fit/yogi and enjoy cooking.

reviews.comments: The room was lovely, everything was clean and Kate was a great host... I actually had the place to myself which was great. It's an adorable spot, anyways no complaints here!

Kate es una excelente anfitriona. Ya que ella no estaba en casa dejo todo preparado para mi. Cerveza fria,toallas,hermosa cama,post its indicadores. El lugar es hermoso y muy bien ubicado y cerca del subte. Ademas si tienes temores debajo esta la estacion de policia. Hermosa experiencia! Muchas gracias Kate!!!!

name: Newly renovated historic brownstone
summary: This spacious apartment in a historic brownstone has 3 double bedrooms, and 1 and 1/2 bathrooms. The room has two windows and a closet. It's a beautiful garden unit in a recently renovated brownstone with old character and new finishing.
space: This spacious apartment in a historic brownstone has 3 double bedrooms, and 1 and 1/2 bathrooms. The room has two windows and a closet. It's a beautiful garden unit in a recently renovated brownstone with old character and new finishing, included in the Bedford Historic District. Everything is brand new including the central air and heat, marble bathroom, stainless steel appliances, and hardwood floors, as well as exposed brick throughout. The neighborhood is gorgeous on a charming brownstone street, close to plenty of hotspots on Tompkins, Franklin and Bedford Avenues (Hothouse, Saraghina (best Italian in all of NYC), bakeries, new restaurants, coffee shops and boutiques. Metro stations Nostrand (A/C) or Bedford-Nostrand (G). It's a rather extraordinary block, in a district that is under review to be designated as Bedford Historic District.
description: This spacious apartment in a historic brownstone has 3 double bedrooms, and 1 and 1/2 bathrooms. The room has two windows and a closet. It's a beautiful garden unit in a recently renovated brownstone with old character and new finishing. This spacious apartment in a historic brownstone has 3 double bedrooms, and 1 and 1/2 bathrooms. The room has two windows and a closet. It's a beautiful garden unit in a recently renovated brownstone with old character and new finishing, included in the Bedford Historic District. Everything is brand new including the central air and heat, marble bathroom, stainless steel appliances, and hardwood floors, as well as exposed brick throughout. The neighborhood is gorgeous on a charming brownstone street, close to plenty of hotspots on Tompkins, Franklin and Bedford Avenues (Hothouse, Saraghina (best Italian in all of NYC), bakeries, new restaurants, coffee shops and boutiques. Metro stations Nostrand (A/C) or Bedford-Nostrand (G). It's a rather extraordina
neighborhood_overview: This well kept secret enclave attracts many artists and young families. The neighborhood is gorgeous, and the apartment located on a charming brownstone street, close to plenty of hotspots on Tompkins, Franklin and Bedford Avenues, great restaurants such as Hothouse, Saraghina (best Italian in all of NYC), Scratchbread, bakeries, coffee shops and boutiques. To quote the New York Times about the Bedford Hstoric District which the house is part of, the brownstones and small apartment buildings nestled in the Bedford Historic District are for the most part "drop-dead gorgeous. The 800 largely intact residential buildings, representing Italianate, Queen Anne, Romanesque Revival and Renaissance Revival styles, are executed in rich rusts, browns and terra cottas, and adorned with gracious bowed windows, generously proportioned stoops and adorable little turrets." The result, in the opinion of the New York City Landmarks Preservation Commission, is “an extraordinary well-preserved late-19th-c
transit: With Metro stations Nostrand (A/C) Wall Street is just 4 stops away, and with or Bedford-Nostrand (G), Williamsburg and Park Slope, Green Point, Fort Greene, a 3 stops away.
access: Guests will have access to all common areas, their bedroom and both bathrooms. This is not a space for pets or to throw any parties.
interaction: We enjoy interacting with our guests. I am a French Literature Professor and a pianist from Paris. We make sure our guests have what they need to enjoy their stay. We love to travel and both have grown up with people from all over the world. I am fluent at French and Italian.
house_rules: - The house is shoeless, so we keep the floors squeaky clean.  - Unfortunately there can't be pets in the house, and we do not allow parties.  - No smoking inside the house.  - We are asking our guests to refrain from ever downloading free music or movies, as one of our guests recently did, exposing us to potential hefty lawsuits. Should you wish to watch movies or listen to music online, please kindly use legal sources such as Amazon, Netflix, iTunes, etc. to enjoy movies without breaking the law. Thank you.

host.host_about: I am a Professor of French Literature and was born and grew up in Paris. I have lived in several countries and speak French, Italian and English. I also was trained as a concert pianist and have traveled all around the world.

reviews.comments: Loli and Natti made the whole experience seamless. Communication was very easy because Loli is French and everything was planned in advance. They gave me directions to come from Newark and picked me up at the metro station. Everything was better than I expected: their place was spotless and the floors were gleaming. Walking in the historic Bedford District neighborhood was amazing, and when I entered, the garden apartment was beautifully decorated and artistic. The room was super comfortable. With the A train, I was able to get to Manhattan in 4 stops! If I need to come back to NYC, I know where to stay! Merci encore!

I was just in New York City for a conference at CUNY Grad Center and consider myself very lucky to have found the ideal sanctuary in Loli and Natti's room. Not only were they charming and attentive hosts, engaging with me exactly as much as I desired and never more, offering the kind of advice on transportation and dining that only locals can give, but the interior was spotless and more like a luxury Manhattan apartment than I have seen in Manhattan. My room was spacious, elegant, uncluttered, immaculate and full of natural sunlight. Though the house is a classic Brooklyn brownstone, everything about their apartment - from the paint to the tiling to the appliances - was brand-new and yet somehow designed to feel warm and personal. I can't believe what a good deal this is for the level of refinement that Loli and Natti provide. Highly recommended.
Loli and Natti were amazing hosts. They made me feel very welcome and the place was immaculate. The bed was comfy and I slept well there. I would recommend the place and the hosts!

AMAIZING!!! thanks for everthig! i love it to be there, so friendly, clean, perfect.
100% confortable.

I had never heard about Airbnb before, but now I'm glad I experienced it firsthand... The host was amazing and the apartment was stupendous! The room I stayed in was perfect and the bed was awesome... No complaints here! If I'm ever in NYC again, I hope to stay with yall... Thanks for everything guys... Yall made the experience 10x better...

So, so lovely. Loli and Natti are people of remarkable openness, considerate, and exceptionally friendly. They were caring (before, during and after I stayed at their home). Two people you absolutely need to meet!
Besides being lovely people, they have a well-located apartment that allows you to visit both Brooklyn and Manhattan (easy access with the A express train). The room is spacious and super quiet, with view on the private garden. I definitely recommend organizing your stay with Loli and Natti. I will stay at their home again in the future!

What a joy it was to stay at Loli and Natti's. The room and house was not only comfortable but an aesthetic delight. Proof of the comfort of new bed was how well I slept. Room looks out on an inner courtyard, enhancing the sense of privacy and quiet in the middle of the city.The hosts took great care to meet my needs. The neighborhood felt safe and was interesting if you like historic areas. All in all this lodging  was a great value and made my visit to NYC a real vacation. 
I would return in a heartbeat.

Hi, Loli and Natti were ideal hosts, they made me feel very welcome and were very helpful with directions and things to do while I was there, and generally made me feel quite at home. Their flat was very nice, and the room was lovely and was ideally placed for me. I never really know what to say in these reviews, so I should probably just say, that I would thoroughly recommend them without reservation,  and the next time I head to New York, I hope they would be kind enough to allow me to stay again.

This was my first experience with Airbnb, and I cannot say enough good things about my hosts, Loli and Natti.  Loli provided very clear directions to the apartment from the airport, and they were both there to welcome me even after my flight was delayed 2 hours.  My room was even more pleasant than advertised, with windows that looked out on a private garden.  Loli and Natti both provided tips and suggestions on restaurants, museums, parks and attractions that I should visit on my trip.  In addition to being attentive and helpful hosts, they very graciously accommodated my schedule as I came and went.  This was my first trip back to NYC in 20 years, and Loli and Natti (and Phillip!) made it a wonderful experience.  I cannot thank them enough.

==English version below==
Loli et Natti m'ont considéré comme un membre de leur famille. J'ai passé des moments inoubliables et certainement uniques puisqu'ils mont fait une sruprise le jour de  mon anniversaire. 
Leur pied à terre est très commode à la fois pour visiter Manhattan et Boorklyn. 
Loli d'ailleurs énormément de temps à chercher les bon plans et Natti m'a conseillé pas mal de sites à visiter.
Je recommande vivement de passer un séjour chez Loli.
==
Loli and Natti were just wonderful and considered me as part of their family. I had the opportunity to celebrate my birthday with them had a lot of good suprises.
Both spent a lot of time searching for the best plans to visit Manhattan and Brooklyn.
I strongly recommend spending some days with them.

Loli was very hospitable and welcoming, even though I got in late ans had a short stay. Our enjoyed a good conversation with her and Natti. They offered me water or something to drink right away and were very helpful with finding the subway and getting situated. Great place to stay. Great host. Nice, comfortable, quiet bedroom, and enjoyable to get to talk to Loli for a bit when I first got there. Merci pour le petit sejour... c etait vraiment sympa et agreable. 

Tom

Loli and Natti were great hosts, helpfully stayed up late to accomodate my late-arriving flight, and provided me with everything I needed for my trip. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend their place to a fellow traveller!

I stayed three days at Loli's and Natti's home in a nice neighborhood in Brooklyn. Both made me feel at home right away and provided me with advise and guidance as to where to eat and what to do. 
Their apartment is newly renovated and the guest bedroom is comfortable and very suitable to host a traveler.
I was very pleased with the overall experience and should mention that the price is very attractive and fair. 
Thank you both for sharing your home with me.
Frank

Kind-hearted hosts, cozy room, soft bed, and perfectly hot shower that I didn't want to leave. The description of this listing is accurate; you get exactly what is promised. While I didn't interact with Loli and Natti as much as some of the other reviewers (I was exhausted after my days  trekking through the city and tended to shut my door and flop onto the aforementioned soft bed), every interaction I had with them was pleasant, and they were always making sure I had everything I needed for my stay. If I have friends looking to stay in Brooklyn in the future. I would recommend this place without hesitation!

Loli was very nice and welcoming. The room was lovely with a view into the back yard garden, and clean with fresh sheets on the bed, clean towels and some packaged slippers that I didn't end up using. She offered lots of information on local restaurants and events happening in Brooklyn. I was in town visiting my brother so I didn't hang out around the apartment much, but when I did it was very nice and quiet. I enjoyed my stay.
Loli was a fantastic host. The room was comfortable and clean.
Loli's place was absolutely cool! She also prepared the bubble bath and cute chocolates
Loli and Natti were so gracious and inviting -- I honestly have never felt so welcome and included in anyone's home as an airbnb guest, ever.

The best experience of Brooklyn.
I wish I could have stayed longer.

This was probably my best Airbnb experience so far! Though Loli was out of the country, she was so helpful in making sure that I was taken care of. She put me in touch with Natti, who was just the absolute best! Everything from check in to sightseeing and restaurant recommendations, our late night chats, and even calming me down while I was panicking about flight delays! He really made sure I had everything I needed to feel at home, and that's exactly how I felt. The place is absolutely gorgeous, very clean, and well taken care of. I would recommend this place to anyone, not just for the beautiful home but for the amazing hosts!
Nice apartment. Was made to feel very welcome. Would love to have the option of staying there again next time I am in NYC.

What a great journey did I had in the last days!!! When I did arrive in New York around Penn Station I thought what a hectical place,but everything changed when I did go to Brooklyn and met Natti. Loli was at a busines trip to Greece so I had not the honor to meet the other half of a great team but Natti gave with their beautiful home thé place to relax what you need. The house is in a nice safe neighbourhood,very clean bedroom, bathroom and a great hospitality. What do you want more?I can give only compliments and miss the place already. 

Loli and Natti.......keep doing this great work
It was a pleasant stay. Natti speaks fluent Chinese. He was very kind and always willing to give me advice and help.

This was my first Airbnb experience. Newly renovated brownstone was a perfect choice, not only because of comfortable stay, but must of all for people I met the re! Loli accepted my request at once and after that she was giving me all necessary info about my journey in NYC for like a month prior my arrival, so that I'm very thankful ! That's why When I finally met her was like we know each other for a long time! We also had interesting conversations in the morning, When I had breakfast and Loli didn't miss to prepare me an italian espresso which I adore! I didnt' have much time to talk with Nati. At the moment was very busy, but all we said was very interesting. And there is the third, Who is never mentioned,Phil. He used to be very busy, but it's very kind and helpful person! When I left this place, was like leaving my home. Highly reccomended place to stay!

Loli is a great hostess! She was ready to help and knowledgeable.
Everything was a she describes it and is very clean. I slept very well and comfortably and cool. It was in a good location for transportation with lots of good food eateries in the neighborhood. Thanks Loli and hope to see you again!

Loli was a kind generous host, generous with her time, her coffee and her helpful travel tips in regard to getting around. The neighborhood is relaxed, with lots of eateries and good connections to buses and subways. 
I would definitely come again!

Staying with Loli was the perfect intro to NY! she gave me a long list of amazing places in the Brooklyn area to check out for food an culture; she introduced me to her wonderful friends; i was looking for an apartment and she was really helpful there too; and we had lovely conversations over coffee in the morning!

the room and house has everything you could want and then some. Highly recommend staying here!
I felt very welcomed by Loli and Netti. Their home is cosy, and the room was very comfortable. I'd definitely recommend them to my friends.

The photos show a beautiful home, so that is to be expected, but the people of the home are the most beautiful part.

Natti was a wonderful man who always had coffee/espresso and toast in the morning, and always a song on his mind and in his step.

Loli was just as interesting as described in her bio, and she glows with kindness and generosity.

Unfortunately we were only there for a short time, but the time spent was enough to want to return.

10 minute walk to the A & C train, short Uber ride to Williamsburg.

Loli was very welcoming and accommodating with me arriving an hour earlier. The stay was warm and the location isn't too far from public transit! I recommend walking to this lovely coffee/breakfast/cafe place call Stonefruits! Very cute!

I felt at home even before I arrived and that feeling never changed. She thoughtfully guided me and delicately provided a comfortable  stay.
The neighborhood was friendly. Easy to access with A express train -one of the main lines to major spots in Manhattan
非常温暖的住宿体验,房间布置漂亮,交通方便｡Loli&Natti非常好客,给了我很多旅游指南和帮助,让我的旅行增添更多美好的色彩,谢谢你们｡

Not only is the room and the flat wonderful, being very clean, tidy, quiet and comfy but also are Loli and Natt most wonderful hosts. Both really make your stay in NYC or Brooklyn worthwhile. They really live the idea of Airbnb. They make you feel very welcome and do everything that you enjoy your stay at their place and in the city. Also both are very charming and smart people and you definitely do not mind any minute you spend talking with them. I can only most highly recommend to stay at their place if you visit NYC!

Bei meiner Ankunft war Loli im Ausland, ich wurde aber sehr herzlich von Natti empfangen. Er hat sich sehr bemüht, dass ich mich wohl fühle. Nebst vielen Tips für empfehlenswerte Sehenswürdigkeiten und spezielle Orte sowie vegane Restaurants hat er jeden Morgen Kaffee für mich gekocht und feine Toasts zubereitet. Ausserdem hatten wir sehr interessante Gespräche. Das Zimmer war sehr angenehm, ruhig und sauber. Da es auf der Rückseite des Hauses zum kleinen Garten hin liegt, konnte ich in der Nacht sogar bei offenem Fenster schlafen, was ich sehr geschätzt habe. Die Wohnung ist klein, aber gemütlich und liebevoll eingerichtet, die Nachbarschaft ruhig und angenehm. Loli habe ich nur noch ganz kurz vor meiner Abreise kennengelernt, aber wir hatten im Vorfeld immer wieder Kontakt per E-mail. Sie hat sich sehr bemüht, dass alles klappt.

Loli und Natti wohnen in einer Wohnung in  einem Brownstone House in Brooklyn. Die Straße an sich ist ruhig,  einen Straßenblock weiter tobt aber - insbesondere am Wochenende - das Leben. 
Loli und Natti sind genau wie aus dem Inserat zu interpretieren geht,  zwei hoch interessante Persönlichkeiten.
Ich hatte vor allem mit Natti zu tun, weil Loli für ein paar Tage verreist war. Er hat sich hingebungsvoll um mein Wohlbefinden bemüht - und das ist ihm auch gelungen,  mir hat es extrem gut gefallen! Unsere Gespräche gingen weit über die üblichen Airbnb-Gespräche hinaus.

Best Airbnb experience so far, no kidding! Not only did Loli and Natty saved me from being homeless literally last minute but as it turned out their apartment is amazing and those two are my favourite airbnb hosts! We spend some time together, ate, talked - I felt like I knew them from my previous life. Could not recommend more, do yourself a favour and make sure to visit Loli and Natty (you can thank me later).

This was my second stay here, after having so much enjoyed my NYC experience last time at this Airbnb. It was even better! Loli had the whole garden planted, lighted and furnished, providing the perfect retreat from the business of the city.  At this place it was possible to sleep very soundly in the city that never sleeps. Little welcoming touches such as the high quality morning espresso and chocolates were delightful. Basics such as cleanliness were, in my experience, on a par with highly rated hotels. I look forward to my next trip.

Loli and Nati were such warm hosts that made me feel immediately at home. Their place was super clean, and had an artsy feel to it, which was inspiring as well as calming. Being there inspired me to start writing again!

They gave me suggestions on what to do/where to go based on what I liked, and spent time getting to know me as a person, instead of just a guest. It added a social element to the stay that I couldn't have gotten from a hotel, which is nice because my friend that was supposed to go on the trip with me had to cancel due to a medical incident, so I was on the trip by myself for the first couple of days.

 The neighborhood was safe and convenient to the nearest subway station. Brooklyn itself is a melting pot of different ethnicities and the food/restaurants in the areas reflected that melting pot.

The reasonable pricing, warm hosts, charming/clean place, and interesting/safe neighborhood makes this stay a great decision. I'd definitely stay here again when I come back to NYC!

There are not enough words to show how great these people are. Natti and Loli are warm, generous, thoughtful, considerate, smart and kind. They make you feel like being home. It comes with the whole staying experience. Since this is my first time away from my own country, it's not quite possible to make me feel this way. Yet Loli and Natti managed to do a great job. The room is pretty much as how they put in the description, clean and beautiful in a good neighborhood. If these are what you looking for, then this is your place. Otherwise, don't bother. Loli and Natti are too good for that.

I fell in love with Loli & Natti  even before I began my trip. From their clear, friendly communications to Natti's kindness in meeting me at the subway to guide me home (& carry my bag, which seemed to have gained 20 pounds!), they couldn't have been kinder or more helpful. Natti had arranged for me to bring home a delicious meal from a nearby Jamaican restaurant, and set me up in the pretty little garden outside my window--a thoughtfulness that was echoed many times during my 3 nights in Brooklyn. (I used to live in Greenwich Village, and "Bed-Stuy" was a revelation--I loved it.)

The room couldn't have been better, with a comfortable queen-size bed, pretty appointments, and a fresh lily on my bed table. With fresh air coming in from the garden and utter quiet in the room, I slept like a baby every night.

Loli and Natti, a teacher of French literature and a musician/actor respectively, are vibrant, interesting people. They gave me good breakfasts and afternoon tea, and generally looked after me like a favorite aunt. I would return with great pleasure, and recommend 
this charming B&B to any visitor who loves good company, good taste, and comfort. 

Thanks!

Loli and Natti couldn't have been more welcoming, considerate, and helpful. Natti gave me yummy breakfasts, and Loli was the tour guide par excellence when it came to finding my way around Brooklyn and New York and making good suggestions. My niece and I loved our quiet, peaceful room looking out into the garden -- we hope to be back!

Anne

Le logement que j'ai occupé à Brooklyn pendant mes deux semaines passées à New York est relativement bien situé. A une dizaine de minutes à pied se trouve la station de métro la plus proche. La ligne A s'y arrête. Si vous prenez la direction "uptown", Manhattan (qui concentre 90% des "incontournables" de la Grosse Pomme) est à seulement quatre stations. En sens inverse, cette même ligne vous conduit directement à l'Airtrain (sorte de tramway aérien) qui vous dépose à l'aéroport JFK. Si donc vous souhaitez loger chez Loli, je vous conseille vivement d'atterrir à cet aéroport.

      Vous trouverez à Marcy Avenue plusieurs épiceries qui pourront vous être utiles à quasi n'importe quelle heure de la journée qui pour un jus, un hamburger, un gâteau, un retrait d'espèces, etc...

     La chambre, calme (pas un bruit), lumineuse et donnant sur le jardin à l'arrière, est munie d'un très grand lit.

     Les petites attentions étaient là, et j'en fus sensible : carte de métro mise à disposition, petit paquet de délicieux chocolats, changement de la literie, chocolat le matin (que je n'ai jamais pris tellement j'étais pressé, à chaque fois, de partir à la découverte de "la ville qui ne dort jamais")... Et quand il me manquait quelque chose, Loli s'en occupait tout de suite. Ainsi acheta-t-elle aussitôt des cintres et une couette pour me satisfaire. Je pourrais résumer cela en une seule courte phrase : "aussi tôt dit, aussi tôt fait".

     Nous ne nous sommes guère vu pendant mon séjour, Loli et Natty ayant dû chacun s'absenter quelques jours et moi me baladant incessamment à New York. Cela ne m'a pas trop dérangé dans la mesure où quand je rentrais à Brooklyn après avoir marché, marché et encore marché (prévoyez une bonne paire de tennis si vous comptez vous rendre dans la Grosse Pomme), je ne demandais qu'à prendre une bonne douche puis aller me coucher.

   Le jour de mon départ, m'attendaient devant ma chambre deux cadeaux. Encore merci.

Loli and Natti  were both very welcoming and accommodating. Although my stay was short, they seem to have a wealth of knowledge of the area and NYC. The apt was very clean and nicely appointed. In a nice area close to restaurants and transit. I would definitely stay there again for short or longer stays.

Accueil très chaleureux de la part de  Loli et Natti.
Leur appartement est  agréable, proche du métro, dans un quartier calme et sécurisé, proche de Manhattan et idéal pour découvrir brooklyn. 
Tous les deux se sont montrés bienveillants, toujours prêts à m'indiquer les visites intéressantes aux alentours, et soucieux de rendre mon séjour chez eux confortable.
Je recommande vivement ce logement et vous remercie encore, Loli, Natti, pour votre accueil.
Staying with Loli and Natti was like visiting old friends. They have a charming, comfortable apartment brimming with positive energy. It was a pleasure to meet them both.

Extremely "Homey" apartment with two of the kindest most heartwarming people I have ever met. Easily, one of the best places I have ever had the pleasure of staying in. Thank you Loli and Natti for your incredible hospitality and positive vibes :)

My husband and I had so much fun chatting with Loli and Natti during the brief time we stayed with them.  It was very convenient to our friend's place in Williamsburg.  Loli and Natti were great!  Thank you!
I just want to say thank you to Loli and Nati... The experience was AWESOME :)....

I had a very warm welcome at Loli's and was made to to feel at home straight away. As a first time airbnbr I was a bit nervous but I soon felt very comfortable as I was shown my lovely room just as described on the site. The whole appt has been lovingly and tastefully decorated and  it is super clean and tidy. The bathroom is great with a bath and a super shower. I was given some great advice as to where to eat in the area (Saraghina a truly fantastic Italian). The area has some lovely houses in it (Brownstones) and is very friendly.

Loli and Natti were amazing hosts. Every great review they've had so far has been very true. They are very welcoming and I felt very much at home during my stay. They have a very nice, quiet, and clean home that they decorate nicely, and the room I had was perfect. I was provided with a comfortable bed, towels, and hairdryer. They have a 3rd room mate, but he's hardly there. I still felt I had lots of privacy, and having two washrooms helped a lot. Due to our schedules, I didn't get to see them too often during my 4 night stay. But they offered me great suggestions for food places in the area and sites to see around NYC. I would consider staying with them again if I come back to Bedford-Stuy.

The neighborhood is nice with very old buildings like the rest of Brooklyn. It's very residential, lots of families, a church, and an elementary school or two, and some of the inner streets might be very quiet. There's quite a few cheap eats between the apartment and the Nostrand train stop. Nostrand street is very active due all the businesses running there. If you feel safer walking down a more active street, especially around the late hours, Nostrand would be good. There's a also a few grocery stores and laundry all within walking distance.

Loli and Natti were excellent hosts.  The day we arrived we were welcomed as if we had been friends for ever.  They explained to us the neighbourhood, how to catch the subway, parking, restaurants in the neighbourhood,etc.  The neighbourhood was very safe, we were able to walk to the subway easily to get to Manhattan, using the A train and spent our time exploring NYC, non-stop.  In the morning a tray was set up for us to have coffee and on our return after a long day it was so nice to slip under the covers for a good night sleep.  Very quiet and restful.  We highly recommend staying and would return again for sure.  Thanks so much.

This was my first Airbnb experience and what a great one it was.  I wasn't able to check in until much later than expected, and Nathanial made me feel at ease.  He even came out to join me at the Veteran Artist Program event where we were able to talk for awhile and learn a little about each other.  When I arrived I was shown around the gorgeous apartment where I had fresh towels, chocolates, and even a pair of slippers waiting.  Sitting on the table was everything needed to French Press my coffee in the morning and was given instructions on using the boiler for the water.  In the morning I was able to get some work done while drinking my coffee and later Nathanial came in and we had a great conversation about the event, and about the neighborhood as well as the history of the house.  I couldn't be more impressed.  I even was able to get free parking on the street just as Loli recommended.  I would stay again and would recommend to anyone coming into the area.

Natti (Loli was away during my time there)was a great host gave me lots of good advice on what to see and where to eat and was great company.  I had a really great time in New York in a friendly neighbourhood. Thank  you thoroughly recommend
Lovely room in a neighbourhood that felt like home. Beautiful architecture, fantastic local food and good transport links to the big attractions. Warm and friendly hosts

Where do I begin? 
As a first time solo traveller, solo air Bnb guest and first time trip to America. 
Loli and Natti were absolutely amazing.
They were so welcoming for a nervous first timer from London, and made me feel right at home.
From helping order pizza, to small notes in the morning, to even the nicety of allowing me to steal the shower as I was running late. These 2 are truly awesome hosts with a charming style and a beautiful home.
My only regret is I did not stay longer as I was in a great location, with lovely people and my own beautiful room! 
Thank you guys! It was wonderful!

There are more cons than pros staying in this apartment based on the fact that much Loli wrote on her page is somewhat fallacious or misleading and so while I enjoyed aspects of my stay I couldn't recommend it. Firstly she says she lives a block away from the subway. Untrue. She lives half a mile away and it takes an average of 15 minutes to walk there. She doesn't mention that you have to share a bathroom so you need patience. She lives in a very outside area of Brooklyn but once you get to the subway train connections are certainly efficient. You share the apartment with Loli and her husband and if he's home a third person again not mentioned. Fortunately for me he was out of town. They are slightly but overly helpful the bed is a thin mattress which I found uncomfortable. This is definitely not worth the price.

I thoroughly enjoyed staying at Loli's house.  She was a warm and inviting host with many tips on getting round the area.  The house was just as described and the bed was super comfortable.  Many special touches were added such as water and yummy chocolates upon arrival and I even received a NYC t-shirt as a gift when I left, such a lovely touch!  As a single female I didn't feel 100% comfortable to walk around the neighbourhood at night, but other than that I found the area gorgeous, and full of history.
I was made very welcome, warm, friendly and generous with their time and their home. A good location with good public transport, shops, cafes and lots f atmosphere. Perfect air b and b hosts!

Loli and Natti were most welcoming, very nice and with lots of great advices. The apartment is newly renovated, clean and I immediately felt at home. The train station is around 10 minutes to walk, but the neighborhood seems to be very safe, so that didn't bother me at all. My stay in Brooklyn could not have been better. Thanks Loli and Natti for being such great hosts.

This is a great place to stay in NY. Clean, nice, warm and friendly. The nearest subway station is about 10-15 min away on foot. Downtown is about 30 min depending on where you get off. I was greeted by Natti who took care of my bags. Natti knows a lot about local places and things to do and his recommendations were spot on. 
Loli was amazing as well and she helped me with places to dine...  All of them were awesome.
As it is that time of the year, I had a

Very nice place and welcoming hosts. Good bed and great general decor - there was even a real Xmas tree in the bedroom, and chocs by the bedside! Loli gave us lots of help with where to visit and Natti ran out into the rainy street in his slippers to get us a taxi for the airport when we were stuck. That was special! It's a bit of a walk to the subway but the train is good, being the express A Train. Plus, Loli and Natti were relaxed about us putting milk etc in the fridge. I would definitely stay here again and was torn between rating it 4 or 5 stars.
Loli and Natti were super nice and very welcoming! Exceeded our expectations, we would definitely recommend this room.

Loli made me feel at home straight away and was most helpful in informing me of attractions in the area. The apartment was beautiful and the atmosphere in it very calm. The description of the area is accurate and I felt safe walking to and from the subway stations when I used them.  Parking on the street was good and I had no trouble finding a place for my car whenever I returned. 
The neighborhood is a fascinating mix and people that I passed on the street greeted me with a friendly hello. I wish my stay had been longer so that I could explore more of the surrounding areas. 
I would highly recommend this listing.

Loli's home is comfortable and lovely. I enjoyed my stay at her apartment. Natti is fluent in Mandarin, and we had some interesting conversations. Thank you, Loli and Natti. 
The location is okay, about 10-minute walking distance to G or A/C. It's a little long for me. Closer would be better. I can't say I enjoyed the neighborhood, but it was okay. Overall, it's good for the price.

Loli and Natti are AMAZING hosts! They took their time to explain the great places around the neighborhood. They have great tips that only the locals would know about. Also you are greeted every morning with a cup of coffee or tea which was perfect before heading out. If you are looking to explore Brooklyn this would be a great place to stay.

This cozy apartment is located minutes from a subway entrance and conveniently placed in a safe and beautiful part of Brooklyn. We drove out by car and had no problems with parking. Just be cautious of the street sweeping times. 
The apartment and room were so clean and well kept. We felt at home right away. 
Our hosts were very gracious and welcoming. They gave us great food tips and places to visit. I can't say enough things about them. We even celebrated the New Years with a little wine before bed. Cheers!
Loli and Natti were extremely hospitable hosts. I enjoyed their company.

The apartment is definitely worth its price. It is almost central located. It should take you a 10 minutes walk to get to the subway stations (A/C/G line) and from there 4 stops to get directly into Manhattan or Williamsburg. 

The apartment is very nice, you have to share the kitchen and the bathrooms with Loli, Natti and Phil. This was never a problem. The kitchen and the bathroom are very nice decorated. The bedroom is spacious and I really liked the big and comfortable bed itself :). The only thing might be that the WiFi-connection is sometimes kinda unstable..but that doesnt matter - in NY there are better things to do than browsing ;)

Natti and Loli are very nice hosts - I got a lot of information before my arrival (laundry etc.) and they gave me a lot of useful hints where to get breakfast, dinner etc. (you really should follow their recommandations). Besides that I had the pleasure to enjoy with them their birthday partys and one of Nattis shows. Sometimes Loli took me in her car to my work (when she left Brooklyn for her work as well). Loli and Natti do really care about the wellbeing of their guests and are interested in the person itself. I really apprceciate that. You might meet Phil sometimes in the apartment - he is a very nice and helpful guy as well.

To come to an overall conclusion I can really recommend the apartment of Loli and  Natti for a (business)trip to NY.

Loli was absolutely awesome. She is so nice and introduced me to her friends and we had so much fun! I had a really great week in her apartment. Her apartment is so lovely furnished and my room was spacious and had a great view on a nice garden. In the surrounding area are lots of delis and great food. I really enjoyed the time at Lolis apartment. I hope I see her soon again!

I enjoyed staying here. Loli is absolutely lovely. She really wanted me to get out the most of my stay giving me useful tips and even inviting me to a friends birthday party. I really appreciated that! This is why I love staying in Airbnb places. You really get the feel of living here and even a chance to get to know people. And it was awesome to hear her play the piano! There is a organic cafe just a little way down the street that I liked a lot, Doctors Cave. I also appreciated that the room was so quiet and it was lovely to soak in a hot bath after a long day out. I can absolutely recommend staying here!

Loli was an excellent host and did everything to make our stay in NYC a wonderful experience. The apartment is located in a lovely part of Brooklyn, with easy public transport access to Manhattan. A real recommendation for a stay in NYC!!

My trip to New York was very well Molly and Simon we're both very accommodating. Molly and Simon both offered things to do and places to go along with places to  eat which was very helpful being  I'd  never been there before. The location was great very easy access to the trains. I definitely will be back in if I plan to stay in that area that's a great location

Loli was the perfect host. She did everything to make me feel at home and is also a fascinating person, multi-talented and multifaceted. We had some great conversations and I'm sure we'll keep in touch. Thank you Loli for a wonderful week!

This was really a great experience. We were welcomed by one of Loli’s closest friends and we had even the opportunity to practice our French. Loli gave us ample information on where to eat and what to do. This already gave us the feeling that we had to stay one week extra. The addresses were great places for food and in close proximity of the apartment. Also close to the metro so it is easy to travel from Brooklyn to Manhattan without too much hassle. 
We enjoyed the tranquillity of the apartment and the neighbourhood. Great place to stay!
Super séjour à NY en très grande partie grâce à l'accueil chaleureux et aux très bons conseils de Loli, je recommande chaleureusement !

Loli is a very kind person. She gave us lots of good advices to see the less turistic aspects of NYC and has always been really helpful in many ways. Her house is nice and well-located and the bedroom was comfortable. 
Just two things were not perfect: the toilet flushing didn't work well and the level of cleanliness is not very high, but in general it has been a really positive experience.

Cordial hostess. Immaculate domicile. 
Convenient location.
Highly recommend.

Super séjour chez Loli... appartement très bien situé (5min à pieds du métro A) quartier de charme avec un super endroit où prendre un bon petit déjeuner. 
la chambre est bien aménagée et est tout confort, très calme. Je conseil cette adresse pour découvrir brooklyn, au centre de toutes les activités. 
Merci beaucoup pour le séjour Loli, au plaisir de se revoir à l'occasion...

We've stayed in many AirB&B places - and often its been a bit pushing it. This was not the case. Loli's place is beautiful once you're passed the street fascade. Loli is very helpful in every way. It was pleasant staying in her charming place and she dies her best to make one feel welcome.

Loli is a lovely host and very welcoming. The room is clean and bright and she included special extras like a rose in a bud vase and an assortment of chocolates as well as an iron and ironing board in the room. 

I was able to find street parking minutes from the apartment. Loli provided me with directions and recommendations to area restaurants. She is a proud resident of Brooklyn and represented her borough well.

Although I arrived later than expected, she welcomed me with a cup of tea and getting to know each other conversation.  

I hope to stay there again.

we enjoyed thestay in Loli's house very much! she is a perfect host. my husband and me were welcomed by nice tea and many useful information about brooklyn. actually that district is much safer and quite than our thought. we definitely will recommend her to our friends.

Loli was very welcoming to my daughter and I and was always available during text if and when we had questions.  I changed our plans the day of arrival re: when we were to arrive, and she was accomodating to our needs and was able to be available to show us the apartment and get us settled in.  The apt. was about a 15 minute walk from the subway and the ride into Manhattan was 30-40 minutes.  There were many places to eat near the subway station and one breakfast restaurant just a couple blocks from the apt. that was very delicious.  
She was available in the mornings to make suggestions for sights to see in the city and took time to send us links via text to make our experience enriching.  
Her home was lovely and the bedroom was very comfortable.  She has a roommate who we only saw glimpses of.  He did not seem to be part of the air BnB experience and was not interested in socializing.

Loli was awesome! She went out of her way to accommodate my schedule for checking in, making sure my evening plans weren't altered. The apartment was beautifully decorated and clean, and as an added bonus, has a wonderful private garden. The apartment is on the Express A train which made me extremely easy to see all the landmarks of the Big Apple (the HighLine, Soho, Chelsea, the West Village, Cnetral Parl, the Lincoln Center, Harlem and even the Cloisters) directly form the local subway station. Loli includes a list of local eateries, watering holes, and great places to check out. Next time I'm in the city, I'll definitely stay with her.

Loli was a great host! Her place is quaint and cozy and accessible to a number of good local establishments nearby. The train was also only a short walk away. My brother and i were quite comfortable during our short stay with her. :)
Loli es una anfitriona genial, te ayuda a conseguir todo lo necesario para tu estadia. Te da recomendaciones y siempre es super amable, haciendote sentir como en casa

Loli was a very welcoming host. She accommodated us dropping our things off early due to our early arrival into the city. She gave us recommendations around the neighborhood and her location was less than a 10 min walk to the train station. Very friendly, clean and spacious room.
Loli was great. She really made me feel at home.

I really enjoyed this very tastefully decorated apartment, the beautiful and peaceful garden, the cleanliness of the house. My hosts were very helpful and warm and made me feel at home immediately. the location is very convenient on the express A train which is only 4 stops away from the main attractions of Manhattan. I recommend it to everyone.

Mon fils et moi avons passé un tres agréable séjour chez Loli. Son appartement est bien situé,  proche de la ligne A du métro qui dessert directement Manhattan. Il est décoré avec beaucoup de goût, la chambre est au calme et le lit était très confortable. Loli qui était présente tous les jours a été d'une grande aide pour nous aider à déterminer les meilleurs itinéraires de visites et nous donner les bons plans à moindre coûts (visites, restos, spectacles). Elle s'est montrée très serviable et sympathique envers nous, toujours de bon conseil. Je la remercie pour tout et je recommande son logement.

Loli took care of my wife and me in a very nice way, just the right way. In the morning we always had a chat while drinking coffee and listening carefully to her wonderful suggestions off the beaten track in New York. Glad we trusted her, so we experienced some unforgettable moments in this city of too many possibilities.
The room was clean, quiet with lots of fresh air. We found everything like described in her offer, nothing to add here.
Whenever we come back, we will try to stay at Loli again.
