We had the pleasure to spend 3 nights at Loli's beautiful place. She was very welcoming and always willing to help. Thanks to her, we discovered some hidden places in NY that are far from the touristic areas. The room was clean and had everything we needed. Transport to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn is convenient. We only had some troubles on Sunday (due to subway maintenance works). We can highly recommend Loli's place for your stay in NY! You will enjoy

Loli is an incredible host! she is very kind an helpful with everything, not only with the tips for the city and stuff, but also with helping out with any other thing. Her house is amazing, the room is quiet with a view to the back patio that is very nice. The location is great, you can walk to a bunch of subways stations that will drop you on any part of NY.
I definitely would recommend to anyone to meet her, and stay at her place. And we'll be very please to host her as well if she came down to BsAs

I returned to Loli's place with great pleasure!  Loli is a classical pianist and it's always amazing to listen to her play. Loli's apartment is gorgeously decorated, and the room is very bright with view on the private garden in full bloom at this time of the year. Loli invited me to a BBQ at friends' house and we had a lot of fun. The house is immaculate and conveniently located on the express A train, 3 stops away from Manhattan. I plan on coming back again soon.

Staying with Loli was great! She is a great hostess and has a lot of good tips about what to do and where to go in the city! If you stay with Loli you should really follow her guide, it is great! 

The apparent is cozy and the room is nice! It also had one of the best Airbnb beds I have ever slept in!

The location is also good being close to both the A line as well as busses and another line.

My friend and I enjoyed staying with Loli. She took careof us even before we arrived. The room was perfect with a view into a small backyard. The area we loved...its in a process of change and you see all kind of people there. It is safe walking around and at the corner bedford/monrose is a citibike station (5min walk). Riding the bike is a good way to get around. It only takes you 25min to Wilhelmsburg Bridge (there u can change the bike to go to Manhattan). Everyday Loli gave us tipps near by or elsewhere. Unfortunatley, we did not had a chance to do all things- we need to come back. We would always stay with Loli again. Thanks for your hospitality.

Nous avons passé deux très belles semaines dans maison de Loli décorée avec goût.
Le jardin est très agréable pour bien se reposer après de longues heures de marche.
Loli nous a accueilli très chaleureusement et nous a présenté un couple d'ami Dorothée,Jason et leur petite fille Joyce avec qui nous avons dîné.
Loli était absente lors de notre séjour mais toujours disponible au téléphone si besoin ainsi que Dorothée.
Merci encore Loli et oui je vous recommande très chaleureusement.

The space and location of Loli's apartment was fine, but I couldn't recommend staying there.  During the time of my stay, Loli was in France due to a family emergency.  She had a caretaker taking care of the apartment.  Unbeknownst to Loli and myself, the caretaker was staying there with her family which included her young two year old.  So there were up to 6 people staying in the house (on one night the other housemate had a guest) and sharing a bathroom.  This was quite a different experience from what I expected or desired.  To compensate me for my troubles, Loli offered me 'one of her favorite bottles of wine'.  But, this never materialized.  The bathroom was sometimes dirty (of course with 5 people and a baby) and the air-conditioning was on intermittently and the wifi was very slow and weak.   My previous experiences with Air Bnb in NYC had been great, so this was very disappointing.

Staying with Loli was a delight. Although she was traveling during my arrival, she was highly communicative and assured that friends of hers (also lovely people) would be there to welcome us. When I ended up needing a place to crash for an extra night, Loli jumped into to help out by offering an extra bed! Due to this extra night I got the chance to meet her, an experience I'm glad to have had. Loli is gracious, kind, and great to talk with.

The apartment itself is beautiful: in a great area near various interesting neighborhoods, with a heavenly backyard, all amenities, and a comfortable guest room.

Staying at Loli's comes with my highest recommendations.

Loli has a very tastefully decorated house with a beautiful private garden. I am a return guest and always enjoy her elegant style, her warm welcoming and the artistic and musical atmosphere of her house (Loli is a concert pianist). It's a real value to find such a beautiful space 4 stops away from Manhattan. I will always return to her place if I need to come back to NYC.

Loli is a great host, very helpful and friendly. Her place is really nice, the bedroom is neat with a view on the lovely garden,  the bed is very comfortable. I stayed there with my son and we both enjoyed talking to Loli and her friends.
She also has great tips about where to eat, what to visit and you are never disappointed!
I highly recommend the place! I would definitely go back to Loli's next time I visit NYC.

Loli's place is a little oasis in Brooklyn. From the moment we arrived to her house we felt welcomed. It felt like home to us! Upon arrival Loli reached out to us to make sure we were on our best route possible and helped with parking in the neighbourhood. She was kind and very helpful. Her house is located in a friendly neighbourhood short walking distance to metro and bus stop. Our bedroom and bathroom were nice and clean. We loved her patio!!
Loli provided us with a brochure of important and unique places in NYC. It was an interesting mix of the famous landmarks and not so known gems in different parts of town. We are very glad we chose Loli's to be our home away from home! 
We will be back:)

Loli was such a great host again! Not only Bed Stuy is a great neighborhood full of friendly families and great architecture, but also Loli was very welcoming and intersting. I could always ask her for help and advice as she is very knowledgeable about both the neighborhood and New York in general and has secret addresses for non touristy activities. The apartment is extremely clean and large and the yard is an amazing addition in the summer. I really enjoyed my stay and will satyagain at Loli's when I come back.

Loli is a very graceful lady who offered a lot of help and lots of information. The neighborhood is rapidly changing, but coming back late at night can be challenging as some young men in the area look as they may be willing to take advantage of you not being part of the scene. We felt uncomfortable twice with two characters approaching us. Everything else wa excellent . On our last night, we stayed until 2:30 AM, and Sunday morning the noise created at 8 AM was incredibly high.
It was Great!!!!

Loli has been lovely from the moment I booked the room until we left her lovely place. She has been extremely responsive and helpful before my trip to New York, and once there she made our life extremely easy as she helped us find our way to get to hers, allowed us to drop our luggage before the actual check-in time so we don't wander around with heavy bags. She welcomed us really well and made us feel completely at ease. She has a sort of flyer ready for her guests, with recommendations of things to do, restaurants etc in NY..and I felt like it was a really nice attention for her guests. The room was extremely comfy, and the whole place super clean.The neighbourhood is pretty mixed and we had the chance to meet and talk to lovely people, and had a yummy lunch and dinner in a senegalese restaurant, best food we had during our trip in NY (not easy to have good food some times there). The train is 10 / 15min (when you're slow or/and tired :) from Loli's and pretty convenient to get anywhere around.
Would definitely recommend Loli's place and would love to come back if I have a chance.
Thanks Loli! and take care!

My train was very late getting into the NYC,  but Loli was flexible with my arrival even though it meant a change in her own plans. Her home is neat and tidy. I was safe and comfortable in her home. The neighborhood is friendly and the people are helpful. I had no problems getting to my daughter's dorm in Manhattan using Loli's directions. I will definitely stay with her when I visit my daughter at school.

Het was een fijn verblijf bij Loli. Ze gaf  leuke tips over NY en heeft ons zeer goed ontvangen. De reden van onze reis was de 18de verjaardag van mijn dochter. De verjaardagskaart en cupcakes van Loli waren een hele fijne verrassing! De buurt voelde ook 's avonds heel veilig aan. Een aanrader!
A very comfortable and clean room in a nice neighborhood.  Would stay here again, for sure. Thanks, Loli!
Lovely

We enjoyed our stay at Loli's place. The room is a good size, comfortable and quiet at the back of a basement apartment. The neighbourhood is a good value base for exploring New York and convenient to two subway stations.

Loli is a great host. We'd enjoyed it to be her guests. The room and also the house is beautiful. She always had good ideas were you can go for sightseeing, to eat or go out. Thank you for everithing. Brooklyn is great. And also when she plays the piano for you... Thank you Loli and lots of love from Thomas and me.

Loli is a wonderful, caring host who made us feel at ease in her charming and clean, newly refurbished home (with an espresso machine) close to busstops and the subway - a perfect base for exploring Brooklyn an Manhattan. 

The good size room was quiet with a comfortable bed, overlooking the back yard. Lori also had great suggestions where to go. All together the stay with Lori made our week in NY eventful and rich. After intense days it was so nice to return to Lori's peaceful and quiet home. If you are lucky Lori will play the piano for you. We had a lovely last breakfast with Chopin...

/Ingrid and Anneli, two sisters who would love to come back and explore more.
Loli is an excellent host with a beautiful place. Gave great recommendations for places to eat and things to do. Would recommend! :)

Wir wurden freundlich von Loli empfangen und haben mit ihr zusammen Kaffee getrunken. Loli hat unsere Fragen beantwortet und noch viele Tipps gegeben. Das Zimmer war ausreichend groß und lag ruhig zum Garten hin, die Ruhe der Wohnung tat gut nach den Stadterkundungen. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet.  ES war angenehm,  dass wir im Wohnzimmer frühstücken konnten. Wenn Loli Zeit hatte,  haben wir uns unterhalten,  was interessant und nett war. Am Abreisetag durften wir die Koffer im Keller abstellen,  obwohl schon neue Gäste kamen. 
wir können Lolis Wohnung nur empfehlen  , denn es war ein Stück "zu Hause auf Zeit. "
Brooklyn war auch eine besondere Erfahrung,  denn man fühlte sich dort nicht so wie ein Tourist....
Loli's place is really nice.. She made it really easy for me and the place was great. Had a nice long sleep...Thanks!

Loli is just such a great host! She opened her heart and home for us and really made our trip special! Her apartment is so wonderful and unique! It was our first airbnb experience and we would definitely would come back to live with her on our next trip to New York! Thank you so much!!

I truly adore coming back to Loli's gorgeous place. I am a regular and it' gives me great pleasure and peace of mind to know I always have a quiet, beautiful, immaculate place to stay at when I visit NY for Yale.

De kamer in Loli d'r huis vonden we heel fijn. Loli is heel gastvrij en heeft ons hele leuke tips gegeven om ons bezoek aan New York te doen slagen. Het is een zeer levendige buurt waar van alles te doen is. Met de Subway is het heel eenvoudig om in korte tijd midden in Manhatten te staan.

Loli is a warm, friendly host, and her home is clean, comfortable, and inviting. Very easy to relax here after a long, busy day in Manhattan. Relatively short walk to subway stop, quick ride to Manhattan. Neighborhood is just fine... we walked to and from subway, restaurants at night with no worries whatsoever. Would definitely stay with Loli again. (And shout-out to Miren, Loli's fun and gracious roommate!)

Everything is perfect.
Yes,everything!
You will love it.
I promise.
Lovely apartment in Brooklyn with a huge room.  Loli is a great host with so many helpful tips and suggestions.  Subway is very close and takes about 40 minutes to get to Times Square
Great location for exploring the city, really close to the subway with lots of nice local places to eat nearby. Loli was a great host who really knows the area. Thanks!

The hostess, Loli, is a treat. Calm, delightful and helpful. The flat is charming too. Definitely a one-off and an excellent and very safe introduction to Bed Stuy and Brooklyn. Warmly recommended for visitors who don't need to be in Manhattan

Another fantastic stay at Loli's gorgeous place. Loli's garden-apartment is exquisitely decorated, clean, fresh and chatting with her is always great fun. The room is spacious and bright with two windows overlooking her private yard. And if you ask, she will treat you for a private classical piano concert!
Besides the appeal of the house, the building is historic in a neighborhood that has quite amazing architecture not yet invaded by chains and Starbucks, but rather small family owns restaurants and cafés. Can't wait to visit again!
Loli was very friendly, responsive, and accommodating.
Lovely host!
Loli was a wonderful kind host!!!

Really cute place and lovely garden especially if you visit in the summer. Loli is extremely warm and personable and I felt welcome in her home. The apt is clean and the bedroom very cozy, peaceful and comfortable and I slept really well. I found the neighborhood pretty safe and there were some nice cafes and restaurants not too far away which I liked. It's a bit of a hike to the subway but the fact you have the G, A and C trains and B52 bus gives quite a few options for getting around. I would stay here again ..

Loli was a fantastic host, who kept in contact with us right from when we first booked her place. She was very welcoming and made us feel at home, with plenty of information about what to do in the area. We were late checking out and Loli was still very accommodating which we were very grateful for! Thank you for a wonderful stay Loli!

Loli was great! My Uber got lost at the airport (go figure) and I got to her place a little later than planned. She needed to hop on the road late that evening, but was still so patient and welcoming when I finally arrived. She met me at the door, showed me around the place (looks better in real life than in pictures), and even made sure I had a nice cup of tea before she left for the evening. Loli is a great host and the place is adorable.

Lolli was an absolutely amazing host!!! Her apartment in Brooklyn is perfectly situated and easily accessible from Manhattan.  In addition, the apartment itself was extremely nice and clean.  She does everything to make sure your arrival and stay run smoothly. Would definitely recommend staying here and we'll be back!

Nous avons été très bien accueillies par Loli. Son appartement a une ambiance tamisée avec une jolie décoration. Elle a tout mis en oeuvre pour que notre séjour se déroule le mieux possible, et nous a conseillé des lieux typiques que nous n'aurions  pas visités sans son aide. Elle nous a même accompagnées découvrir le quartier d'East Village, autour d'une petite glace artisanale. En somme, elle nous a épaulées avant et pendant notre voyage, et nous sommes très heureuses d'avoir fait sa connaissance ainsi que celles de ses amis. Un très beau voyage, merci encore ! Nous vous recommandons Loli sans hésitation !

Loli's place had everything one should value in an AirBnB-- VERY clean, spacious, beautiful interiors, pretty neighborhood, proximity to transport (very easy to get to Manhattan), and above all, a WONDERFUL host. Loli is that rare mix of being very intelligent, interesting, and genuinely nice. No matter the circumstances, she will make sure your stay is better than you expected (she has the best recommendations and puts personal effort into improving your trip). You won't go wrong with this AirBnB.
Loli is great lady I never met in my life :) she is best

Loli est une personne très serviable. Elle a la patience et la gentillesse d etre toujours a l écoute pour que vous profitez au mieux de votre séjour. Le logement est idéalement bien placé, à quelques rues du métro.
Génial

Staying at Loli's beautiful place again was an immense pleasure. I particularly enjoy the peace, the windows overlooking the garden, the exquisite decoration and Loli's skills as a host. She is always there to help while respecting her guests' space. I am really into the Bed Stuy neighborhood which is moorland more artistic and vibrant and the extreme convenience of the Express A train which takes me to Manhattan in 4 stops! I recommend Loli's place to everyone!

Loli was a pleasant and generous host. Her home was very clean and close to public transportation as advertised. She was very informative with any questions I had and gave great suggestions on how to spend my day when it unexpectedly rained.

Excellent weekend stay at Loli's - she was incredibly accommodating and communicated everything very clearly from directions to ideas of things to do!  Our room was everything I could have asked for in a place to stay, clean and comfortable. Very much enjoyed the location and vibes and would definitely stay here again! :)

Loli's place is lovely, clean, and cozy. Loli goes out of her way to make sure you have everything you need  (even if your in too much of a rush sometimes to even notice everything she's arranged for you!). Excellent place to stay :)

Le surnom que je donne à ce super host est "loli les bons tuyaux" ! :-) Suivez ses conseils, ses adresses qu'elle vous laissera dans sa brochure. Loli n'hésitera pas à discuter avec vous. Allez-y les yeux fermés !

Loli has a little hidden gem in this lively residential area of Brooklyn. She is a very accommodating and helpful host, all the creature comforts were provided. There are some awesome cafes on the way to the subway where you have access to the express line, very handy! Room and furnishings were really comfortable. We highly recommend using the "Detour" app for an amazing audio walking tour of the Brooklyn Bridge, narrated by Ken Burns himself! Absolute highlight.

Nous avons passé un agréable voyage chez Loli. La chambre était spacieuse et nous avons pu profiter de l'appartement aisément ainsi qu'y préparer nos repas. L'endroit se trouve à environ 10 minutes de marche du métro qui mène directement à Manhattan, ce qui est un plus.
It was just great. Loli was very communicative and all was perfectly prepared. The flat was nicely located and NYC - well, no words needed :-)
Very pleasant place, and tastefully done up. Hosts were gracious and prompt to respond to any questions.
All things were in order and no issues at all. Thanks for being a great host. Staying at Loli's was an excellent experience.
The apartment is awesome! I would like to live there :) room is big, it's close to the metro station, the kitchen is available. Nice, cosy and clean apartment. Everything was great :)
You will appreciate the cleanliness, the quiet, the patio, and the comfort.
Plenty of space for me. Kitchen facilities good. Location in Brooklyn great: people very friendly.
Very nice stay. Everything we wanted was there, and the extras were literally in the bodega (corner store) next door! Excellent!
Very good location and wonderful backyard!

We stayed at Loli's place in June 2017. It was a home away from home during our stay in NYC. Loli was very helpful and very fast to respond via email. Unfortunately we didn't get to meet her, but Olivia was great! I would definitely recommend this place when visiting NYC :-)
Loli est avenante est pleine de bon conseil.
Great communications with the host! So fast in replying message and provide information we needed. Clean room and located in nice neighborhood!

Loli is a super warm and pleasant host. Although she was away on business during our stay, she was always responsive and shared her recommendations with us whenever she can. Olivia is also great too, yet we also didn't get the chance to meet with her in person. They worked things well and we had no problem entering the apt and getting around. The room is spacious, clean and almost has everything you need. Thank you both!

Loli was great at communicating with us, providing clear directions and instructions, and answering any of our questions really promptly. 
The apartment was clean, easy to access - a 5-10 minute walk to the subway. It was a bit warm in the hot NY summer, but the fan in the bedroom certainly helped. 
Thank you Loli for your attention to detail.
Great value here! The host was so nice and accommodating. We needed to check in early and there was absolutely no problem. The place was clean and quiet. Would definitely stay again.
Great place, highly recommend

I stayed in one of Loli's room for an entire month and the space was perfect. The kitchen had everything I needed for cooking, and my bedroom was perfect. The bed was comfortable, the neighbourhood was relatively quiet (considering it is in the middle of Brooklyn!) and the Deli next door was stocked with any sort of emergency supplies. Loli and Olivia were great hosts- very tidy! 
I would absolutely stay here again and with access to the A train 10 minutes walk from the apt. that gets you pretty much anywhere, and a bus stop 2 minutes away- the location is great!
Lovely apartment with a very comfy bed and friendly hosts!

We had a wonderful stay at Loli's home! :) The appartment is well decorated and very clean. We arrived pretty late and Olivia, the friend of Loli, welcomed us. She gave us a great recommendation for a yummi and fresh sandwich close to the appartment. Thanks again!:) 
Moreover, Loli prepared a brochure in the room with great recommendations to visit and to eat! We regret that we didn't have a better look onto this brochure as there are some good insiders. 
We met Loli at our last day for the check out, however, she was available during our whole stay which we highly appreciated! Loli is very lovely, friendly and welcoming. It was a pleaure meeting her! She allowed us to keep our suitcases in the appartment (after check-out) and she arranged a taxi for us in the evening. Thanks again!:) We can highly recommend Loli!!

Mein Aufenthalt bei Loli war perfekt. Loli hat mir gute Tips gegeben. Sie ist sehr freundlich. Wenn Loli abwesend war, dann war Olivia dort (für meine Abreise).
Das Zimmer ist angenehm und sauber. Sehr ruhig, mit Fenstern zum Hinterhof. Eine immer bereite Kaffeemaschine und ein großer Kühlschrank standen zur Verfügung. Theoretisch könnte auch gekocht werden, dies habe ich aber nie gemacht. Vielen Dank Loli!
Je recommande!! Vraiment très bien et hôte tres gentille !

très bon séjour chez Loli, qui nous avait bien briffé avant notre arrivée, ce qui est super agréable ! 
l'appartement est situé dans un quartier résidentiel de Brooklyn, à environ 900m du métro.
Loli a pleins de bonnes adresses pour les petits dej aux alentours, ce qui est bien agréable aussi.
Le dernier jour nous partagions notre salle de bain à 4 ou plus de personnes, ce qui peut faire un peu bouchon lorsqu'on est (comme nous), en plein décalage horaire ;)

Loli was a wonderful host. Very clean apartment, convenient location. She was great at helping us find our way around and had helpful recommendations for our stay in Brooklyn. Would definitely recommend and hope to be back.
It's a lovely room in Bed Stuy with beautiful decor. There's quick access to the A and C train and lots of cute places to eat in the area. Highly recommended.

J’ai adoré mon séjour chez Loli.Sa maison est agréable et très cosy et de plus très bien située.Le métro est à cinq minutes à pied et on peut accéder à tous les coins de New York (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande vivement ce Rbnb,de plus Loli est une personne très agréable ,intelligente et (Website hidden by Airbnb) reviendrai c’est sûr !
Assia
Loki’s Home was very clean. The bed was comfortable, and she was a kind and helpful host.
Loli was very hospitable and made us feel right at home.

Het was opnieuw een zeer goede airbnb-ervaring! Loli was een zeer warme gastvrouw die zich zeer flexibel kon opstellen! Communicatie verliep zeer vlot en direct. De kamer was ideaal met een goed bed waar we elke nacht zeer goed geslapen hebben. 10 minuutjes wandelen naar het dichtstbijzijnde metro station maar voor die prijs kan je je geen beter verblijf wensen in New York!
The place is good, hostess is great. But neighborhood was little scary. Convenient for this price.

We enjoyed our time there! About our staying, it was okay. The apartment is nice and quiet. It is near the subway station, what is perfect and have many places around to get food. The most important thing is the facility to communicate with Loli and her roommate.

Just the garden was not like in the pictures (messy) and the half bathroom is different as well. We got some stained sheets also.

Should improve cleaning too!!

The place was amazing and I highly recommend staying at Loli's for anybody visiting NYC/Brooklyn. Even though Loli wasn't in the city she was always available to communicate and made it easy for us to get to the apartment (directions, suggestions for food, etc). The place is super clean, tastefully decorated, and you have all the necessary items for bathroom/kitchen. The place was also very warm even though outside there were close to -25 celsius :p  However beware light sleepers, the upstairs neighbours have a dog and make noise during the night.
The place is also about 10mins from the subway so you can get to NYC fast.

Bairro tranquilo sem problema nenhum mesmo voltando à noite. Mercearia ao lado donos encantadores . Bom espaço do ambiente lugar bem aquecido banheiro com bom chuveiro . Quando tivemos contato com a host foi muito amigável.
Muito gentil deixando para o casal chinelos de quarto e bombons nos fazendo sentir bem recebido.
Todas as noites barulhos absurdos pela vizinhança de cima.Acreditamos que para aperfeiçoar o atendimento a host deveria fazer uma vistoria na entrada e na saída de cada hóspede para evitar possíveis constrangimento de ambas as partes.Glaucia e Mário

Great location near the A train! Lots of fantastic restaurants within walking distance. Also close to the fabulous Brooklyn Botanical Garden! Loli was a gracious and wonderful host. She gave us lots of great suggestions and recommendations. We really enjoyed our conversations with her. Our room was clean and very comfortable. Thanks for the filtered water - a nice touch for thirsty guests - and one less thing we had to buy. It was also nice to have access to a refrigerator for all our leftovers. We were a little worried at first about sharing the bathroom with the other Airbnb guests who were in the other bedroom - but we had different schedules so it worked out fine. This Bed Stuy find is a real gem. Thanks, Loli!
Clean and very thoughtful
Loli is the greatest host you could ever image. All of her recommendations are gold and she apartment is a great safe place. I’m definitely staying at Loli again when I’m visiting NYC.

Very nice, clean place provided with a lot of hospitality and wonderful local restaurant recommendations for an authentic Brooklyn experience. We felt very comfortable and would recommend this place for anyone looking for a room in Bed-Stuy. Thank you, Loli.

Loli’s place was perfect for my sister and I. It was warm and cozy! I loved the lighting of the place as well - great ambiance. Plenty of amenities available for use, too. Just what we needed to stay comfortable in New York. She was a wonderful and helpful host. Thank you so much for making our vacation much more sweeter than expected! Lovely person! :)

Super accueil, petit nid douillet au coeur de Bed Stuy. Loli et Olivia ont été aux petits soins avec moi.  Appartement très agréable,  super joliment décoré. C'était chouette de pouvoir echanger et en même temps d'avoir une grande chambre où se retrouver tranquille. Je recommande vivement cette hôte.
Loli’s home is a perfect shared space- a beautiful location, clean, comfortable and safe.

Amazing host!
Would repeat!
I felt very comfortable.The location was convenient . I would recommend staying here. Loli was a very nice hostess. Home away from home.
Gute und völlig ausreichende Unterkunft für den Besuch von New York. Sehr freundliche Gastgeberin. Gefühlt hatten wir die Wohnung für uns alleine. Empfehlenswert!
Great spot very relaxed not to far from the subway and a great neighborhood to explore.
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour chez Loli. Ses recommandations, son hospitalité et sa gentillesse ont contribué à rendre notre voyage vraiment sympa!
Great location close to public transportation and just a wonderful little apartment with great atmosphere. I really loved my stay

Wir wurden sehr herzlich empfangen und konnten uns immer gut mit Loli unterhalten! Sie hat uns auch tolle Seightseeing-Tips gegeben, die etwas abseits der bekannten Touristenpfade waren! 
Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet und unser Zimmer war auch gut :) Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden jederzeit wieder zurückkommen! 
Merci pour tout :)
No estuve mucho con loli, pero los pocos minutos que interactue me pareció genial, amable y predispuesta
Loli's place is great, very clean and near to public transit, the check in was easy and she was always available to any question.

I stayed at Loli's place for 5 days together with my mom. I lived in NYC before and went back with my mum to show her the city. The location is absolutely perfect, especially if you (like us) want to explore Brooklyn as much as you want to explore Manhattan. Getting to Loli's place from JFK-airport is also more than easy, due to the fact that the train stops a 10 minute walk from the apartment at Nostrand Ave. 
The apartment itself is nice an cosy. Loli is a really nice person who makes you feel at home. She even invited us to join her and her friends for dinner (twice!). Would definitely stay here again when coming back. The only thing that might be handy to know for future guests: the garden is only accessible via the room of Loli's roommate, so sometimes (especially in the weekends in the morning) you won't be able to access it. We didn't bother though, but it's nice to know!

We had a great stay at Loli's place in Brooklyn; her place is clean, the bedroom is spacious (has a heater and fan), and it's about a 12 minute walk to the nearest subway station into Manhattan. Loli is really friendly and helpful - she suggested places to eat and a car service that took us back to the airport (Brooklyn to LaGuardia for $30). She also gave us access to her fridge and her other belongings (plates, kitchen, towels). Also her instructions to get to her place were really clear and we didn't have any trouble finding it. We met another Airbnb couple who were also staying at the same place and they were really friendly. Although it was a bit challenging at times using the bathroom in the morning there was a half bathroom beside the main bathroom to accommodate. If another occasion arises we'd definitely stay here again!
Bra lägenhet!

Loli’s place is amazing ! It’s around 10mins walk away from the A subway connecting us to Manhattan. We enjoyed the recommendation provided by Loli and also small touches such as a pack of chocolate in our room. Overall it was a truly amazing stay and we highly recommend it !

Loli's place is very nice. It's wonderfully decorated and very comfortable and clean. It's in a great location with easy parking (if you have a car like me). Loli  was very responsive and made it easy to check in and out. She also provides a local guide, which is helpful. I will definitely stay there again.

Loli's place was great! Loved the location near the line into Manhattan. The space was clean, hospitable, and friendly. And, the bed was really comfortable! We shared a bathroom with another guest in the house but this was never an issue. If you are in Brooklyn I would highly recommend staying at Loli's place!

Loli's place was great! Easy check-in. Loli is very great at communicating with guests, and provided lots of tips for the city (and even made materials for guests to look at!)

It was a clean and charming space. The room was big.

Highly recommended!

Good location in Bed- Stuy.  
Didn’t like the plastic cover on the mattress, it made for a noisy night sleep.
Well kept clean and helpful.
Gezellig appartement op prima lokatie.

La casa de Loli es muy linda , sumamente limpia . Y cerca de todo 
Ella y Olivia estuvieron muy atentas a lo que necesitaba .
Volveré seguro si estoy en N York
Awesome place in the heart of Brooklyn!
Nice nook in nyc.  Clean and good location.

Although we didn't meet Loli in person, she was really good at responding to our questions and arranging for our stay. The apartment was comfortable and nicely decorated, clean and tidy. It was located centrally, and we walked to a lot of interesting and enjoyable places in the vicinity, helped by Loli's useful guidance. We couldn't have wished for more during a short stay in NYC.

Pros: cozy room, pretty clean, big bed, sufficient space, kitchen could be used without any problems, quiet & calm, lovely garden room w/ big windows, well tempered (nice and cool), efficient communication with host

Cons: location (access to public transport- lots of walking), neither natural light nor windows in the common area

J'ai passé un super moment chez Loli! l'appartement est top! Tout est simple, c'est un lieu de vie très agréable. J'ai testé des adresses qu'elle avait mise dans un classeur a disposition dans la chambre, de super adresses!! Je retournerai chez Loli sans hésiter!!
Nice place. Near subway. Quiet for a city location. Pretty.

Loli’s home is beautifully decorated, cool and cozy. When we had any questions the response time was fast and detailed. We enjoyed ourself very much her apartment is close to a few bars and restaurants, and the packet Loli sends you after you book her place is such a good guide of Brooklyn! Overall made our weekend that much more enjoyable.
Cool place, neighbourhood, friendly artistic vibe
Loli’s pla e is great and as described. It was very clean and check in was easy, she also emailed a brochure with things to do. I would recommend Loli’s place and I would book again.

Loli was very easy to communicate with and we very much enjoyed the information she sent us in advance. We also absolutely loved the neighborhood the house is located in! We were however a bit disappointed because we thought the cleanliness could have been better and it was unfortunate that we could not access the garden at that time.

We loved staying with Loli and her roommate.  The place is adorable and sparkling clean.  Loli promptly responds to any questions you might have (and you will have several about NYC).  We loved her "Welcome Brochure" that included Bed-Stuy neighborhood and overall NYC recommendations.  We could not ask for a better host and would stay here again in a heartbeat.

I cannot say enough good things about Loli’s place, but I’ll try...
1. The apartment is beautiful and room is spacious and super comfortable.
2. Communication was amazing before and during my stay.
3. I arrived at 1am but the instructions given to find the key were super easy!
4. Location is great for subway and local places to eat- you must read the guidebook Loli has prepared!

Thank you so much Loli and Olivia for my amazing stay

This is a lovely, clean so place to stay and a great value. Loli was super quick to communicate even though she was traveling during my stay. Excellent place; I'll definitely stay here again the next time I'm in Brooklyn.

Loli's home is wonderful. Very well-located (I found the A/C train to be very convenient to lower Manhattan), very clean, and simply a comfortable place to stay. 

Although we didn't get to interact due to non-overlapping schedules, Loli was very communicative and made sure that my stay was comfortable. Wonderful job, and I can't recommend her home enough!
The place was very well kept and enjoyable to stay in. Loli was our of the country but her roommate was very helpful and Loli continued to keep up with me through messaging. Highly recommend!!

Loli’s place was convenient and clean.

Loli’s roommate welcomed me and showed me the apartment’s available features, and made pleasant small talk. 

It was very helpful to leave my bag after checkout for a later pickup on my departure date. 

Would recommend this apartment while exploring Brooklyn and beyond.
It was a great experience in here and have had a wonderful time staying in Loli’s house. Everything are very clean and Loli and Olivia are very helpful and nice.
Just as described. Beautiful little apartment. Loli was a great host and I’m glad I stayed out there
Loli was helpful and her place was charming. Would definitely stay there again.

Loli was a nice host who made sure we have a few options what to do during the next day, always giving ideas and local hints & tips.

The garden in pictures wasn't available for visit (door said, private), but the apartment met our expectations.

If you're OK to walk a bit from the metro and having little sound isolation (issue with many apartments) then Loli's place is a very good option. Definitely an interesting neighborhood where real Brooklyn can be still seen and enjoyed. Will enrich your experience!

Loli's apartment is lovely and Loli was so kind and helpful, making our stay such an enjoyable one. This was our first time to Brooklyn and we would certainly recommend Loli's place. Very clean, homely and with all the amenities that we needed. The location is very convenient for Manhattan and the local has some great places to eat. We recommend  Saraghina for an amazing atmosphere and delicious wood fired pizzas. Also close by was Le Paris Dakar for excellent home-made style crepes for breakfast.
very nice place to stay
Loli has a lovely place. It's neat and clean. I would definitely book it again.

It made our New York trip more than a cold room, instead it was a warm heart in the middle of Brooklyn I won't soon forget. We made fantastic memories here and Loli helped us feel and achieve that. She was more than a gracious host but also an expert guide and a silent yet giving person. She has my thanks and gratitude.

Sehr hübsche Wohnung, Verbindung nach Manhattan ist gut (Metro, ca. 15 min zu Fuß zur Station), bissl Staub hinterm Bett, aber sonst recht sauber. Wir hatten unsere Ruhe und einen schönen Aufenthalt in NYC :)
We really enjoyed our time at Loli’s place. The space was great, and Loli was excellent at providing local recommendations!
J'ai bien aimé le quartier de Brooklyn, l'aéroport JFK n'est pas très loin et la chambre est très spacieuse.
Loli’s place was comfortable and clean. The room was significantly quieter than expected. Her brochure was a nice touch as well.
Had a wonderful stay at Loli's. She added extra effort and thought in making the stay comfortable. Would highly recommend her place.

Wir fanden es großartig. Bett war super. Alles sehr sauber. Super als Ausgangspunkt zum
erkunden von New York.
Its in Brooklyn need i say more and what a great place to stay you will not be disappointed yeah its not uptown NYC but that has its disadvantages loved it here
A comfortable, cosy room with a friendly host who gives plenty of information at the area.
A recommander! Emplacement super chouette! Hôte accueillante et attentive, pleine de bons plans!
Appartement très calme, fonctionnel et propre! la chambre située côté jardin est très tranquille, on ne se croirait pas en ville tellement c'est calme!
Nice and cozy place to stay.

This is an absolute gem - my best airbnb experience to date. The apartment is so charming and cosy, with a really warm atmosphere. There were so many small but telling details - a note on the door to welcome me, slippers laid out, filtered water in the fridge... The shower is great, the bed incredibly cosy, good hairdryer, plenty of clothes hangers, even an umbrella. The location is great and perfect for exploring Brooklyn. Loli was also great at accommodating my request to leave my suitcase in the apartment whilst I took a last day of meetings. I cannot recommend enough!
A really nice and unique space in a great and interesting part of town, and close to transport links too!
We enjoyed our stay (it was very cozy and so convenient to many area gems)!
Responsive host, quick response. Provided detailed info and tips. Smooth check in and kindness to let me leave my luggage after check out.

The location is ideal for whoever wants to have Manhattan in its doorstep while enjoying the laid back vibe of Brooklyn. Metro connection is perfect and very frequent. The flat is nicely decorated, very clean and well equipped. Special mention to Loli for : 1) sharing all the tips to make you feel like a local and 2) making you that you feel at home. Couldn’t have chosen better place to stay!

My boyfriend and I had some great days at Loli's place in Brooklyn. The flat was very clean and we had everything we needed: sheets, towels and various information on sights and restaurants. The communication with Loli was excellent and the check-in/check-out was super easy.  We highly recommend the apartment for a trip to New York.

Nice room! Nice location! Perfect for sightseeing in Brooklyn and Manhattan. 
Loli was very helpful.
This is a nice place to stay and the home is decorated very well. Loli provides great tips on what to do in the area and good places to eat. It was a very good experience.
Loli is easy to communicate with and hosts a cozy and clean home that is perfect for those looking for a conveniently located place to stay in Brooklyn.

This was my first experience as an Airbnb guest and I would definitely use Airbnb again. 

Loli was a kind and considerate host before, during and after my stay. She was quick to reply to my messages and gave very clear instructions on how to get from the airport in Newark to her apartment and also how to get into the apartment. She messaged to find out if I'd arrived.

When I got to the apartment even though she was not there throughout my stay I felt welcomed and comfortable. Little things such as a welcome note on my bedroom door and chocolates were lovely touches. Loli also left information re Wi-Fi, travel and places to eat and see.

I left a little after the check-in time and she was flexible.

Appartement propre, situé à moins de 10 minutes du métro. Légèrement sombre mais nous n’y étions que pour dormir, ça ne nous a donc pas trop dérangé.
Quant à Loli et Olivia, elles ont été très disponibles, très réactives, attentionnées, de bons conseils....
Nous gardons un bon souvenir de ce séjour new-yorkais.

J'ai passé un excellent séjour ! Loli est très réactive pour répondre aux messages et est toujours prête à donner des conseils sur les visites de New York et Brooklyn. L'appartement est très joli et  idéalement situé, tout proche d'une grande station de métro. Et le quartier est très agréable tout comme ses habitants.
Loli and Olivia are so nice! The room is really cosy and very clean, i slept very well. The apartment is well located, 10minutes from the A and C train. I recommend this place!
A lovely, accommodating, and stylish place. Clear instructions, and recommendations to nearby locales & venues were provided, as a nice touch.
Great host, beautiful place! Very kind and responsive!
Appartement charmant, très propre et bien aménagé. Loli nous a très bien reçu et nous a indiqué le meilleur de Brooklyn.

J’ai passé dix jours chez Loli et sa copine Olivia. Ma chambre était super propre et confortable et je me suis senti complètement bienvenu chez elles. Le quartier aussi est très sympa et avec leurs suggestions j’ai eu l’opportunité d’aller à de merveilleux restos locaux et cafés. Merci, Loli et Olivia, pour toute votre hospitalité !
Loli is very knowledgeable about what to do in New York. If you get bored while staying with her, its your own fault!

Loli's place was exactly as described and is in an exceptional part of Brooklyn, easily accessible to public transport and the neighbourhood is filled with friendly locals. Loli is a fantastic host with a beautiful heart ,who takes great initiative in making her  guests feel welcome and comfortable. She provides great suggestions and she  turned many opportunities into great blessings. I could not recommend her place enough! Thank You Loli for the experience of a lifetime.

Nice and clean place, close to subway, warm enough, everything at basic level you need. Neighbourhood could be nicer, but probably safe. Host respects privacy and is very responsive and helpful. Slippers- a nice touch. Thank you, would recommend.
Loli is so nice and helpful and her house is clean and close to do much cool stuff! Definitely recommend her
As My first time in NY C I was pretty intimidated but Loli"s thoughtfulness made it a breeze. Amazing hosts
It’s a lovely place! Loli is incredibly quick with her replies, very caring and her recommendations were very helpful. We had a great time!

name: Bright UES Gem Near Central Park
summary: Spacious one bedroom apartment on the top floor of an elevator building. Eight windows fill the space with light. Tree-lined block in a very safe neighborhood, steps to Central Park, museums, transit and delicious restaurants.
space: Spacious one bedroom apartment on the top floor of an elevator building. Eight windows fill the space with light. Tree-lined block in a very safe and beautiful neighborhood, steps to Central Park, museums, subway and delicious restaurants. Our home is a charming quintessential New York City apartment in the heart of the Upper East Side. We are located on the top of a five floor brownstone elevator building. The first thing you'll love about the flat is the natural light coming through all eight windows.  Some of the amenities we offer are heaters during colder months, air conditioners for the hot summer nights, free WiFi, and the spacious yet cozy layout. There's a great kitchen that has a breakfast nook. We have a full size bed and a very comfortable convertible Ikea couch for two additional people to sleep on.   The 6 train is within short walking distance from our apartment, which is also near wonderful attractions, like the Whitney Museum, the MET, and Central Park—where you can ca
description: Spacious one bedroom apartment on the top floor of an elevator building. Eight windows fill the space with light. Tree-lined block in a very safe neighborhood, steps to Central Park, museums, transit and delicious restaurants. Spacious one bedroom apartment on the top floor of an elevator building. Eight windows fill the space with light. Tree-lined block in a very safe and beautiful neighborhood, steps to Central Park, museums, subway and delicious restaurants. Our home is a charming quintessential New York City apartment in the heart of the Upper East Side. We are located on the top of a five floor brownstone elevator building. The first thing you'll love about the flat is the natural light coming through all eight windows.  Some of the amenities we offer are heaters during colder months, air conditioners for the hot summer nights, free WiFi, and the spacious yet cozy layout. There's a great kitchen that has a breakfast nook. We have a full size bed and a very comfortable convertible
neighborhood_overview: We live on a quiet tree-lined street with apartment buildings and pre-war brownstones. There is a 24/hr pharmacy on one corner and the historic burger joint JG Melon on the other! It is a beautiful neighborhood and you get a great taste of life in New York City without feeling overwhelmed by any hustle-bustle. Central Park is so close, as are some of the best restaurants in the city. We look forward to sharing our local secrets with you! :)
notes: Lauren is a travel journalist, specializing in New York tourism. So you can enjoy the perks of having your own personal concierge.
transit: There is a bus stop on the corner and the 6 train is a five minute walk away. Plus taxis are everywhere so you'll always have nearby transit to take you around town.
interaction: We are very communicative with our guests, and are available if they need anything.
house_rules: No smoking. No pets please. And be respectful of our home and neighbors, thanks!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Entrepreneur, cyclist, wife, travel writer.

reviews.comments: Lauren was a wonderful hostess. A yummy loaf of bread, fresh juice in the refrigerator and lots of suggestions for places to eat and taking advantage of NYC economically. The apartment was spacious, clean and bright. Comfy bed and plenty of space to spread out luggage. Classic older brownstone apartment for a real feel of NYC as you see in movies set in NYC.

Lauren's place was wonderful! It was near great shops, restaurants, and Central Park!  The apartment itself is a great size for the area and is clean and comfy. I was pleasantly surprised to find and elevator upon arrive with my 55 pound bag! Lauren is so sweet and accommodating. I would love to visit again in the future!

Lauren and her husband were very nice and friendly to us. Due to circumstances we kept changing our arrival time but Lauren was very accommodating and we manage to get into apartment in no time at all. Due to some problems we decided to cancel our stay after we arrived but Lauren was very understanding and sweet about it, I couldn't have asked for a better host. Highly recommended!

Lauren was a very communicative and responsive host. She waited 2 hours for me during check in when my flight was delayed and came over almost immediately when i had an issue with one of the kitchen appliances. Her apartment was very conveniently located in a safe neighbourhood with the subway, good restaurants and shopping all within walking distance. Her apartment was fairly clean, spacious and well equipped. Lauren even left a bottle of wine, a packet of madelines, books and brochures about NY as well as her recommendations of things to see, do and eat for me. I would love to stay at Lauren's again when i next visit NY as i had a very positive experience at her apartment. Thank you Lauren :)

Lauren was an amazing host! She was so accommodating to several schedule changes up to check in day. The apartment was neat and tidy and had such a cozy, comfortable vibe. It was amazing how close we were to the Lexington shops and Central Park. Lauren was ever so helpful in recommending places to eat and things to do. She left us small goodies and great visitors books an a stalked fridge to make our trip that much better. Can't wait to make my way back to NY!
Lauren has been very nice and the apartment is nice too. It is quite small but with a lot of light.

Lauren and Vince were spectacular! When I had a minor difficulty in the apartment, Vince came over SO fast, not only straightened it out, but took out all the small kitchen appliances for me to use so I wouldn't have to fish for ANYTHING!

The next day, Lauren shifted her entire schedule to meet me in Central Park with an extra set of keys when I, completely transported by the vision of the Metropolitan Museum ahead of me, left my bag on a bus (I got it back!).

The apartment is big, I thought, with a charming bedroom with a charming street view, that almost does the job all by itself. The windows are amazing - you feel like you're on an enclosed deck, looking out, with tremendous space between you and any other buildings. 

The couch is incredibly comfortable - that was SO important for me - and the dining table was crucially  helpful, too. I slept great on the bed. Love NYC! Thanks, Lauren and Vince!

This was our first-ever AirBNB experience, and it was wonderful.

As the date of our reservation approached, Lauren kept in contact with us.  And on the day of our trip, I was able to text both her and her brother, who was going to meet us with the key, updates.  They responded promptly back.

We were met in front of the building shortly after we arrived and we were very grateful for the help with our luggage and the working elevator.  (We had forgotten how narrow hallways are in Manhattan apartment buildings.)

The apartment gets a good deal of sunlight, which we enjoyed, though you can put down the shades for privacy.  It has everything we needed and lots of things (like the TV) which we never used.  The shower had hot water, the Air Conditioners blew out cold air, and the bed had fresh sheets and was comfortable.  We have both lived in NYC, so we knew that apartments are narrow and storage space is at a premium, therefore, we knew what to expect.  They have done a great job of trying to make as much free space as they can in their apartment, and that was very much appreciated.  They also cleaned out a drawer in the dresser for us and left us a bag of mini-muffins as a Welcome to NYC treat.  We instantly felt at home. 

And the neighborhood is wonderful.  Coffee, Bagels, Diners, Grocery stores and Pharmacies, and Restaurants and Bars galore,  are within a short walk of the building.  (Try the Belgian place if you are in the Neighborhood.  Say Hi to Remy for us.)  My wife found a Yoga place a couple of blocks away, and I was able to walk a little ways to Central Park and go jogging.  We were also able to rent bikes from Peddle Pushers (get helmets and a lock) and take them around the city and across into Brooklyn for the day.  Bike lanes are available on 2nd and 1st Ave.  

In conclusion, if you are considering this apartment, book it.  The pictures are accurate, the description is accurate, Lauren is pleasant and responsive, and you would be hard-pressed to find a better neighborhood in the city.  We had a fantastic stay and would recommend this place to family and friends.  Not to mention, we would gladly stay again.

Tips:  

Don't put stuff on the stove, the pilot lights are always on and the top of the stove stays hot.

Shut the door to the office to keep the bedroom cool at night.

The shower pressure can take off skin.  I'm not complaining, but be careful.

There is no coffee maker, but there is a Dunkin Donuts around the corner, so I was pleased I didn't have to make my own. (There is an espresso machine but it frightened me.)

Lauren and Vincent are a super nice couple. When I got to the apartment it was all smiles with no disappointments. The place was bright and clean with everything you would need to feel like a temporary New Yorker. Lauren was always responsive and they even made a list of all the cool places to eat and do in the area to my request. :) I would stay there again for sure. 

Thanks Air BnB and Lauren for a great experience!
- William

We just spent 3 days in this apartment and we loved it. Lauren is a wonderful host and the apartment is very convenient and ideally situated in UES, very close to many attractions and the subway. I highly recommend this place !

Le logement de Lauren et Vince était juste parfait. On s'est senti comme chez nous. 
D'abord grâce à Lauren, qui est très attentive et réactive aux messages qu'on a pu s'envoyer, jusqu'à notre retour chez nous en France. Elle est très arrangeante concernant le check-in et le check-out. Une bouteille de vin blanc nous attendait à notre entrée dans l'appartement, ainsi qu'une liste de commerces, restaurants et points d'intérêts dans les environs (petit supermarché, restaurants pour bruncher, luncher, diner, bakeries !). Toutes les questions qu'on aurait pu se poser avaient déjà leurs réponses !
Ensuite, l'appartement en lui même est plus grand que ce qu'on imaginait grâce aux photos, et super confortable (le lit est génial). Lauren et Vince avaient laissé à notre disposition des serviettes propres, et un tiroir libre pour ranger nos affaires dans la chambre. On s'est vraiment sentis bien accueillis. 
L'immeuble et le quartier sont très tranquilles. On a adoré vivre pendant 7 nuits dans cet appartement, dans ce quartier, très sûr, plein de boutiques et de restaurants, tout près du Met et de Central Park. On s'est pris pour des new yorkais !
Les deux clim ont été bien utiles pendant les grosses chaleurs. 
Nous conseillons sans hésiter cet appartement, et y séjournerions à nouveau avec grand plaisir.
Merci encore, Lauren et Vince !
The flat was comfortable and as described in the listing, and Lauren a fantastic, extremely welcoming host.  Would surely stay there again during my next trip to NY.

Lauren and Vince's apartment was spacious and quiet, with lots of natural light, stocked with all the essentials, and in a great part of town. Lauren was responsive, friendly, and thoughtful - she gave us a gift card for a local baby store, a quick, but thorough tour of the apartment, and lots of notes and resources for the neighborhood.

Had a wonderful time visiting New York. The location of Lauren and Vince's apartment worked out great for us as we were visiting family close by. Quiet secure side street, elevator to the fifth floor, close proximity to Central Park and the subway, as well as many fine dining and drinking establishments nearby only added to our enjoyment. Thanks again for the wine and hospitality. You made our first Airbnb experience a memorable one.

We only stayed two nights, but everything was great! Lauren kept in contact with us on the morning we were supposed to meet and was very accommodating. Everything was clean and working and it was a wonderful experience!
She is a very warmhearted girl,scrupulousl.The house location convenient and sweet!

Our host met us at the prescribed time and was ready with books about the neighborhood, lists of their favorite local restaurants/shops and even some fresh cookies from a local bakery. She was fantastic! The neighborhood was exactly what we were looking for. Ideally situated close to everything, the location was nothing less than perfect for us. We could walk to many of our activities or easily catch a cab on the corner when necessary.  This was the perfect place to stay for our weekend getaway.

name: BEACH LIFE  ❤ 3 min walk to town wharf & beach
summary: "There is an option of the second room being negotiable to be available. " Live by the beach, surf, relax.. Simply enjoy your holiday! :-) Get a full experience of Manly - one of the most beautiful Sydney beaches.  Our place is just 3 mins from the beach, ferry, cafes, shops and restaurants, 15 mins to Sydney CBD by ferry.
space: Amazing location in Manly, very close to the beaches, public transportation and shops, great cafe just across the street. Our 2 bedroom apartment is clean, bright and cozy, it's got two balconies, leather loungesuite. surround sound system, and fan in bedrooms. FREE WIFI.

house_rules: We welcome clean and tidy people :-) Respectful as I work from home during the week :)

host.host_about:
Easy going business professional that enjoys having fun & meeting great people.

Love surfing, snowboarding, skating, yoga and music. I run a Concierge Service so I can assist with what you may need to find to enjoy a seamless and enjoyable stay.

Would love to host clean, respectable, professionals to have a laugh and have a great stay.

Jonny

reviews.comments: Jonny was a really nice and kind host and everything was as expected. We enjoyed staying there and if we'll return to Manly one day, I won't hesitate with booking his accommodation again. Highly recommended!

Jonny was a lovely guy that made us feel very comfortable in his home. The apartment is fresh and clean with a comfortable bed, it is in a great location with just a few minutes walk to the centre of Manly and the Wharf to get a ferry to the city.

Disfrutamos de una agradable estadía en lo de Jonny principalmente gracias a la calidez que recibimos de su parte. Jonny es una persona amable y divertida, siempre abierta a conversar y reirse. El departamento está muy bien ubicado a corta distancia del Corso y las mejores playas de Manly pero se mantiene en una zona tranquila, lo cual es muy bueno. Quedamos totalmente satisfechos y lo recomendamos!
Jonny is an awesome host! His place is super clean and comfy! Could not recommend this highly enough!
Jonny was super friendly and welcoming and made Alex and I feel very comfortable. We felt very at home in this apartment that is in an amazing location for exploring the north shore and Sydney.

Very friendly and gave us suggestions of places to visit. 
Nice & clean room
Close to CBD

I stayed with Jonny for 3 weeks while I was waiting for my new apartment to become available. He is a great host and, more importantly, an extremely friendly and fun guy to hang out with! The place is clean and tidy and very well located to enjoy everything that Manly has to offer.
Greatest beach mate of all time.

Jonny's place was perfect for us! Really awesome location short walk from bars, restaurants, and quite a few beaches.
It was clean and tidy and he was super friendly. Would definitely stay again should we visit Manly again.
My parents had a lovely stay at Jonnys  flat. Everything was clean and tidy and Jonny is a realy helpful and nice person. My parents would stay again at his place, definitely recommendable!

Great host!
Great stayed!
Great apartment!
Great location!
Great surfing!

Thank you everything,Jonny!!

Although I have arrived later than I initially confirmed, Jonny kindly left keys for me to get into the accommodation without any hassle. The house was tidy and comfy. Also the best location if you want to enjoy Manly beach.

Jonny was great! A good host to have, very friendly, and fun to be around. I was in Manly completing my open water diving certification and he was great with the flexibility of our schedules for the day. His location is close to the Corso and 2 beaches. It really is an amazing place to be. Thank Jonny for also being supportive with Zoe. I would recommend him any day.

Jonny has a nice flat in a really good location, the ferry and beaches are very close. The flat is bright and clean and even has enough storage for some surfboards :) It's a good place from where you can explore manly.

El departamento estaba muy bien ubicado. A una sola cuadra de la playa y del puerto. Manly es un hermoso lugar para conocer. Y el alojamiento de Jonny tenía todo lo necesario para complementar la experiencia. Es súper lindo y limpio. Sobre jonny es una persona súper agradable, compartimos viendo una película y nos dio algunos consejos donde ir . También cuido de algunas cosas que se me quedaron. Totalmente recomendado .
Jonny is a great host, always in communication and helpful.  The location is close to the main beach, bay, shops and restaurants.  It is about a 4 block walk from the ferry.
Great location. Jonny was very accommodating with our early check in time. Pleasant stay.
Thanks Jonny, we had an awesome time at your flat. There was nothing missing and we felt more than welcome.

name: Charming and quiet historic terrace
summary: A quiet street in vibrant Balmain, close to the water and 10 mins by ferry or bus to the city. Three bedrooms sleep 4 comfortably, with a cosy sitting room, separate dining room, kitchen and courtyard. Are you happy to feed (and pat) our two cats?
space: The house is an attractive restored historic terrace about 170 years old, with a modern kitchen and bathroom. The double bedroom is downstairs, as is the bathroom with shower. Upstairs are two single attic bedrooms. A separate cosy sitting room with TV is an inviting space to relax, and the airy dining and kitchen space opens through French doors onto a sandstone courtyard with outdoor eating.
description: A quiet street in vibrant Balmain, close to the water and 10 mins by ferry or bus to the city. Three bedrooms sleep 4 comfortably, with a cosy sitting room, separate dining room, kitchen and courtyard. Are you happy to feed (and pat) our two cats? The house is an attractive restored historic terrace about 170 years old, with a modern kitchen and bathroom. The double bedroom is downstairs, as is the bathroom with shower. Upstairs are two single attic bedrooms. A separate cosy sitting room with TV is an inviting space to relax, and the airy dining and kitchen space opens through French doors onto a sandstone courtyard with outdoor eating. Guests will have the house to themselves, except of course for our two self-sufficient cats, Storm & Zephyr - who just like a meal each morning and evening. Use of washing machine, dishwasher, tv and dvd and wireless internet. We will be out of town but a friendly neighbour will be your contact and can help with any problems. Our street is tranquil, but
neighborhood_overview: Our street is tranquil, but we are just five minutes stroll to bustling Balmain with fabulous cafes, restaurants, designer clothes shops and Saturday market. At the end of the street is a beautiful waterfront parkland with great children's playground.
transit: Ferry from the end of the road to the city in ten minutes, and buses go to the city from Balmain frequently - and take 10-15 minutes to get there.

interaction: We will be out of town but a friendly neighbour will be your contact and can help with any problems.

host.host_about: I live and work in Balmain and love it - it's very vibrant and the house is close to the water and lovely waterfront parks and walks.

reviews.comments: Sally was excellent to deal with, location of house was perfect for seeing Sydney handy to both ferries and buses.  Very Homely
Had woundeful stay in your home. Stay was made special with loving cat's

Thank you Sally for such a beautiful house. The house is not that big but we find very thing we need. Perfect position to the ferry and the New year fireworks. The decorations and pictures on the wall give us lots of inspiration.

name: Beautiful apartment near dining, professional hubs
summary: A well-appointed room in a two-bedroom apartment in the heart of the Sydney CBD and nestled on the harbour steps from Barangaroo and the International Convention Centre Sydney. Darling Harbour and the acclaimed Sydney ferry service are on your doorstep. Located within walking distance from Sydney's iconic destinations, including intimate bars and cafes, all modes of transport and shopping heaven are mere minutes walk away. Private bathroom, beautiful bedroom and everything scrupulously clean.
space: You will have the benefit of a very comfortable queen size bed, access to plenty of wardrobe / closet space, your own bathroom.
description: A well-appointed room in a two-bedroom apartment in the heart of the Sydney CBD and nestled on the harbour steps from Barangaroo and the International Convention Centre Sydney. Darling Harbour and the acclaimed Sydney ferry service are on your doorstep. Located within walking distance from Sydney's iconic destinations, including intimate bars and cafes, all modes of transport and shopping heaven are mere minutes walk away. Private bathroom, beautiful bedroom and everything scrupulously clean. You will have the benefit of a very comfortable queen size bed, access to plenty of wardrobe / closet space, your own bathroom. There is no cooking other than using the toaster for your toast each morning.  Cold water is on hand at all times. There is no microwave and therefore no facilities to heat food. You are free to bring takeaway in, please sit at, the kitchen bench and not the formal dining table. You will have access to the balcony with water glimpses and a lovely cityscape view.  There is
neighborhood_overview: Steps from the King Street Wharf entertainment precinct, moments from Darling Harbour, down the street from Barangaroo - the largest urban renewal project in Sydney's history - and an easy walk to any point in the CBD, you will be staying within easy reach of Sydney's dining, entertainment, and drinking venues.  You will be near the harbour and in an entertainment area, therefore there is some noise from traffic and people. When windows and doors are shut there is virtually no noise. However if you like to sleep with your window open there is traffic noise.People who are city dwellers and global travellers claim there is no noise.
notes: I have a home office, and at times I am quite busy. Please don't think I am being unfriendly, if I am not talking to you, I am just working. I am also often out, attending meetings. I am always available if you have any questions or concerns.
transit: You will have the benefit of easy access to public transport to any point in Sydney. You will need to purchase an Opal card (Sydney's touch-on, touch-off integrated ticketing solution) at any corner store, news agency or at the airport.  Once you do, Sydney (and NSW) are all accessible. If you are flying into Sydney Airport, your room is a 21-24 min train ride (running every 6 mins during peak hours) and an easy 7 min walk away.  If you want to lap up the sun at Bondi, you'll be a 45 min bus ride away.  Taronga Zoo is a pleasant stroll to Circular Quay and a 12 min ferry ride away.  These are just some examples, but hopefully you get the idea!
access: There is no cooking other than using the toaster for your toast each morning.  Cold water is on hand at all times. There is no microwave and therefore no facilities to heat food. You are free to bring takeaway in, please sit at, the kitchen bench and not the formal dining table. You will have access to the balcony with water glimpses and a lovely cityscape view.  There is an internal laundry with washing and drying facilities in your bathroom which you may use. Ironing facilities are also available.
interaction: The benefits of inner-city living and being located on the harbour are enormous, and I am more than willing to share some insights, tips and recommendations of places to go, eat, and drink. You will be able to walk everywhere, or catch a ferry, train or bus - all are within minutes of your accommodation. I work from home on occasions, so may not always be able to chat even if I am home.  That said, it goes without saying that I'm more than happy to do my best to help out with any challenges you may face during your time in Sydney.
house_rules: You should aim to keep the living room - a shared space with the host - in the same state as you find it.  That is, tidy.  Feet with shoes on are not to be placed on the furniture.  Please place glasses/cups that you are using, onto drink coasters provided. If using your laptop on the dining table always use the placemat provided.

host.host_about: I would prefer guests who are closer to my demographic and in Sydney for work, conferences or have a busy tourist schedule. I love living in the hub of Sydney, on the water - next door to Barangaroo and sitting on Darling Harbour where there are many wine bars, restaurants, good food, cafes and a short stroll into the city. I enjoy theatre, art house cinema, galleries, exhibitions, good wine and food. My guests have told me my home is five-star accommodation. My apartment is at all times scrupulously clean. I am a vegetarian and I would prefer no meat is brought into the apartment.

reviews.comments: Suzie was most welcoming, and our first Airbnb experience couldn't have gone better. The apartment is exquisitely furnished and feels very homey. It's posh yet comfy. The bed (including the bedding) is on par with upper-scale hotels. Suzie gave us a lot of privacy but was readily available to answer any question. The bathroom for our own usage also has the feel of chic hotels, with an assortment of high-end products. The location is great, between Wynward Station and Darling Harbour. The room is next to a road, but soundproofing is good and I slept well even without using ear plugs (Suzie provides high quality ear plugs should you need them). To sum up, my sister and I would go back in a heart beat.

Sydney has stolen a piece of my heart. It was such a pleasure to stay with Suzie in her gorgeous, well- kept home. Her place was filled with charm and great details that made you feel like you were in a 5* hotel. The bed was exquisite and Suzie went the extra mile to make sure I had everything I needed to make my stay comfortable. Suzie was the most wonderful hostess! She gave great directions, offered ideas of what to do and also gave me space to do my own thing. She lives in a great area that is close to most of the major tourist attractions. I would definitely consider staying here again.

Absolutely brilliant experience from the second I arrived to the second I left.
The apartment is beautiful and immaculately clean.
Suzie met me upon arrival around 7am and was so helpful in orientation and advice of the area.
The location is ideal- 5 minutes to the centre of the CBD.
This is my favorite Airbnb house and host so far and would absolutely return to stay again on my next trip to Sydney!!
Thank you Suzie!!

Suzie was very welcoming - meeting me at the entrance to the building and showing me around the unit. Suzie's place is very tastefully decorated and well appointed. It was very well located for where I had to go and I felt safe walking around the area. It is close to a busy road so there is a bit of background noise - so the earplugs are useful for sleeping! Very comfortable bed. Suzie was relaxed about having me stay around on the Sunday while I did some work. I enjoyed our chats. I'd recommend staying with Suzie.

Suzie was a brilliant host. Her apartment is well situated providing walking access to most CBD locations. Her apartment is tastefully furnished, clean and tidy. The added bonus for me was internet access included. David

Quedarme en el departamento de Suzie, durante mi primer fin de semana en Sydney, fue perfecto! 

Suzie me mandó con tiempo las indicaciones adecuadas para llegar a su departamento y estuvo atenta a mi llegada. Me enseñó todo lo necesario para sentirme cómoda en el edificio y me ayudó en la elección de los horarios y recorridos de los buses, del tren y de los ferrys. Fue una gran ayuda al organizar mis paseos. 

El departamento está a un paso de Darling Harbour, con restaurantes, cafés y varias atracciones. Una estación del ferry está a 5 minutos. Es un barrio muy central y accesible, muy cerca del metro y buses. 

El departamento es precioso. La pieza es tal como la muestra en su aviso y llegar a descansar a esa cama después de 8 horas de caminar por Sydney, fue el broche de oro de unos días geniales! 

Volvería feliz a Sydney y de todas maneras a ese "lovely room"! 

Gracias Suzie!

I am still under a great impression from my stay at Suzie's place: I enjoyed it a lot! She is the most caring host: pro-active, kind and welcoming. The real life experience exceeded far beyond my expectations. The place is located in the heart of Sydney: in the safe, clean and beautiful neighborhood, right next to the Harbor. The room is light, spacious, clean, and well-decorated.  I'd like to thank Suzie for her hospitality, it was a lovely stay! Thanks!

Suzie's appartments is very central, beautifully furnished and homely. The bedroom is generous and guests have their own bathroom. Everything was spotless. Suzie is very friendly, caring and easy to connect with. It was lovely to stay with her and will definitely come back again some time in the future.

A gorgeous and stylish apartment perfectly located for business or fun right in the heart of Sydney. Suzie is a delightful host - despite being busy with her own work  found time to provide a warm welcome and orientation tour from the stunning balcony overlooking town. Comfy bed, full privacy with own bathroom fully appointed with all the luxuries and conveniences of a 5-star hotel.

Suzie is a great hostess, very pleasant and ready to assist you if you need any help. Her apartment is extremely well located, within walking distance to the city as well as public transportation if needed. It is also lovely furnished and the room in question is very comfortable and spacious. I highly recommend it!

I really enjoyed my stay at Suzies place. A very, very clean, well located and stilish place to be. Suzie was very supporting and carrying and offered by the way a delcious breakfast. Also she was very flexible regarding extending my stay and finally the check out time.
An unreservedly recommended place for the perfect sydney Trip. 
Thanks a lot Suzie for being such a fabolous host!
Tanja

Suzie was an incredibly welcoming host, giving me tips on how to see the city and providing a comfortable home for me to stay in for a few days. The location of the apartment is ideal for exploring Sydney's CBD and the Darling Harbour area.

I had a great stay at Suzie's airbnb. Suzie is really nice and helpful. She does a lot to make you feel at home and the room is great. The apartment is located very well in City close to the harbour, and everything is within walking distance.

Un séjour parfait chez Suzie !
L'appartement est très joli et très bien situé à 2 pas de Darling Harbour.
J'ai également été très bien accueilli par Suzie !
Elle a été aux petits soins pour moi, et m'a indiquée avec précision et enthousiasme les lieux à voir de Sydney.
Bref un hôte à recommender si vous voulez visiter Sydney !!!

I told Suzie that this is prob my best Airbnb experience. Generally I had busy schedule in Sydney so I didnt spend a lot of time staying in the apartment. However every pieces of the furniture is absolutely amazing and they make the place so unique I think. Also I love the little budda in her balcony. My bedroom is very comfy and I have own private restroom!!! Suzie is a super nice host and I told her that I will def call her next time when I visit Sydney. Thank you so much Suzie

I had an excellent experience staying with Suzie. Suzie's apartment was very well kept and quite comfortable. It was located in a great area that had a lot of energy, which was great for site seeing. And Suzie's hospitality was excellent. She made sure I had everything I needed to have a good time during my stay. Thanks Suzie!
A lovely home away from home. Great host. Perfect location.
Suzie was a great host.  She has a beautiful apartment in Sydney and was very close to everything I needed.  Wish I could've stayed longer.
Suzie was an amazing host. The listing accurately describes the property. Suzie was extremely organised and made the check-in and arrival process a breeze. Highly recommended!
Great house. Very neat and organised. Absolutely enjoyed my stay here. Will stay again if I come to Sydney again.

Suzie was a lovely host and I will be back. She did a great job checking me in, making sure I knew where everything was & ensuring I knew how to get to my destination the following morning.
The room was lovely, bed ridiculously comfortable & those pillows were just right. She had everything you needed & more.
Thank you for having me Suzie.

Really wonderful stay!

I needed to be at Darling Harbour for work this week, and Suzie's place is right there. Perfect central CBD location.

The room and the apartment are even nicer than described and shown n the photos. It's not a big place (expected in this location) but it's exquisitely appointed and meticulously clean.
