You get a room with a very comfy bed, and space to unpack your things. You also get your own bathroom with tub and shower. There's a sitting room, balcony: just really nice. 

And Suzie is lovely. I was very busy and we didn't cross paths much, but she was friendly and accommodating on the details of my arrival, and made it easy to live in her home for a few days. She added several nice touches, like fresh fruit in my room that was replenished.

The only thing that might be a worry for some folks: this is a downtown location and there's a busy freeway nearby, which could be a problem if you're the sort of sleeper who needs absolute silence. But it's not a worry after all, as Suzie has a supply of earplugs in the bedside table!

If you want a chic central apartment to be close to the action, Suzie's got your place.

I really enjoyed staying at Suzie's. The bed was comfy, the decor was interesting and I felt very welcome. The apartment is close to transport, darling harbour, George St and lots of other city landmarks. I would happily stay with Suzie again.
Yes

My stay at Suzie's was first rate.  The apartment is in a fantastic location and the room was everything (and more)as described in the listing. A very comfortable base for my 2 days in Sydney. Certainly my best AirBnb experience so far. I would heartily recommend and look forward to staying again in the future. Suzie is a great host!

Suzie was the most gracious host!  Her private room is spacious, cozy and clean.  Her home is in the best location for everything Sydney has to offer.  Ideal access to both the train and ferry systems and a block from the Darling Harbour waterfront.

Suzie was great. I had great communication with her from the start. She was also very flexible with my check in time. Her place is located near everything I wanted to see during my brief time in Sydney. It was also clean and I had my own bathroom. I would definitely stay here again.

Suzie's apartment was a great stay! Everything was clean and the bed was comfortable. There is some noise at night from the road but it wasn't a problem for me. She has ear plugs if you are noise sensitive. Her place is a great location to explore the city by foot, ferry, or bus. Suzie was a reliable communicator and even let me check in early due to my flight arriving in the morning. She was very knowledgable about the area and answered any questions I had.
Suzie's apartment is immaculately maintained, very comfortable and in a great location. She was easy to communicate with and was an excellent host. Highly recommended.

A lovely host and lovely apartment - I would highly recommend at stay at Suzie's. The guest facilities are excellent - with a very comfortable bedroom with ample storage, and full bathroom facilities for your private use. Although being in an extremely central location, the noise of the city traffic did not bother me in the slightest (I slept sooo soundly!). The location is excellent, with numerous restaurants/cafes and the Darling Harbour ferry service just a 2 minute stroll away. The nearest train station is only a short walk too. Suzie herself was a very warm and helpful, but also unobtrusive, host - perfect for this fairly independent traveller.
I would certainly seek to stay again at Suzie's for any future visits to Sydney.

Suzie was a great host, she was very friendly and had some great tips on getting around. The apartment is in a great location, so close to the beautiful harbour and the city. 
I would definitely recommend staying here!

Suzie was great, making the time to meet me once I got into Sydney.  The flat is in a great location, right in the heart of everything, and absolutely immaculate.  

The only thing to note is that if you're a very light sleeper then you may notice the traffic noise - although this wasn't a problem for me!

The apartment was in the perfect location, close to the restaurants at Cockle Bay Wharf, 5 minutes to the new mercantile walk restaurants and shopping, and a short ferry ride to circular quay. The apartment was comfortable, very clean and beautifully furnished. Suzie was a wonderful host.
Suzie is a great host and has the best location in my opinion. She also accommodates the interests of her guest (s) and has great recommendations. I highly recommend her place. Thanks a bunch Suzie!
I had a great stay at Suzie's place. The apartment was beautiful and well located and Suzie was a gracious and helpful host!

Suzie was a great host and she gave great advice on a quick tour around the local area on my arrival. Although she went to work on the day I was leaving she managed to accommodate a reasonable check-out time for which I was grateful for. 

The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures. There are a number of ornaments, paintings, books etc which add character to the place. The bed was comfortable and spacious with plenty of closet space. Although not an en-suite the private toilet/shower was also very clean and large with toiletries provided. There is a decent balcony area and large lounge/dining section, though I spent most of my time in my room so cannot really comment on this. As mentioned elsewhere, the bedroom is close to a busy highway and so traffic can be heard when the window is left open, and also a little noise can be heard at night when the window is shut...but I managed to sleep through this without an issue.

The apartment is in Darling Harbour and a few minutes from the ferry stop which can be used to get good views of the Harbour Bridge/Opera House. There are many restaurants/bars/clubs a short walk from the apartment and the main city centre where all the shops are is about a 10-15 minute walk away. After visiting Sydney I personally thought that Darling Harbour was the best location to stay in and would not hesitate to recommend  Suzie's apartment to anyone!

Mitul

Suzie was a very gracious and friendly host-- she even gave me a tour around the neighborhood when I arrived-- and her apartment was a beautiful space. I could not have found a better home base for my first stay in lovely Sydney. Definitely recommended for independent and curious visitors.
Beautiful place close to everything you could want. Very secure, warm in winter, beautifully set up... and Suzie is just a lovely hostess. I would definitely stay here again if given a chance. :)
Great place to stay. Really central and great host.

Suzie was absolutely wonderful in helping me get set up and make the most of my short time in Sydney. She was full of great recommendations and useful directions and was incredibly friendly. It's a great central location and a short walk to just about anywhere or an even quicker train ride away from everything. The apartment was extremely clean and Suzie has everything you might need available, including power adapters for international travelers.
The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Beautifully setup apartment at the edge of Barangaroo in Sydney. Close to everything, a stylish, calm place to stay.
Great location, nice space, friendly and responsive host.

Perfect location, right in the centre of Sydney. The apartment was extremely clean. 
Suzie is really kind and friendly. She allowed me check in late and was always able to help me giving me directions.
I would definitely recommend to stay at her place.
Great location to Kings Wharf and Wynward Station!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
This is a lovely stylish apartment. Great location near cafes, bars theater and transport connections. Suzie is a great host. One of the joys of airbnb is meeting interesting people like Suzie.
A sparkling clean, very central, stylish place right in the middle of Darling Harbour.
Suzie is lovely, the apartment is immaculate and the interior is beautiful. As for location you couldn't get much better, next to Darling Harbour with amazing places to eat and the CBD so close.
Great place to stay
A clean private room very close to CBD, darling harbour and museums. The road noise at night may be a tad loud for some.
Suzie is such a friendly and attentive host. Makes you feel welcome in her immaculate place. Was a great stay - super handy to the conference center!
great stay, great location, excellent host

Excellent location, you couldn't be better placed for accessing the city.  It's a short walk to everywhere. Darling harbour is full of bars, restaurants, cafes shops and so on, with plenty to do and see. 

Oh and the bed is so comfy,  slept well every night. please note this is a city location with city noises.
Great apartment, couldn’t use kitchen for cooking, but Suzie was a great host
Suzie is a great host, very helpful with directions, her home is enviably tidy and walking distance for everything I wished to visit.
Very nice and clean apartment. Very nice and lovely hostess.
Venez y habiter sans hésitation. C’est près des coins les plus visités de la ville. En plus volet qualité prix vous en trouverez plus que vous n’attendez

Lovely place in a beautiful neighbourhood, close to the waterfront and within a walking distance to most Sydney attractions. Subway is 3 minutes away.
Although I've seen pictures of Suzie's place it surpassed my expectations. Beautiful furniture, a mix of modern and Asian - style. Super clean and with all the conveniences you might think of. Very (!) comfortable bed.
And most important: Suzie, my host. My superhost. I already miss our discussions about Australia, world politics and ... life. I'd like to come back one day.

Susie’s apartment is beautiful. Really easily accessed and the location is perfectly positioned for the city, Darling Harbour and the new Bangaroo area. 

Suzie is charming and communicative. 

Would definitely recommend :)
Everything is as shown on the website.  Susie is a great host - very friendly but not at all intrusive.  Excellent security.  Easy instructions, good communication.

Suzie was a fantastic host. She methodically introduced me to all the details of the space, ensuring I had everything I needed. The apartment was exceptionally clean and stylishly decorated. Above and beyond, Suzie was very warm and welcoming. Ready and willing to provide local recommendations, but also respecting when to give privacy. Very enjoyable stay.

Suzie was an awesome host. She was very thoughtful and looked in to all my needs. She gave me some great tips to explore the city. The location was fantastic too, it’s very close to all the attractions. I would definitely stay at Susie’s again. Thanks so much.

Suzie’s space is awesome for going to barangaloo, which is hot spot for trendy people.

The house is, of course, very clean and has spacious room for the guest. It was impressive for the amenities as like the hotel. She offers enough towels, so don’t worry about the thing you didn’t bring.

Anout the host, Suzie is also very warm and not intrusive as other people’s comment below. In other words, you can have enough time to relax your minds. 

One thing you be noticed is suzie’s location from the Museum station has a bit slope. (weak though) So it’s better to take an escalator near David Jones. :) it will help you a lot.

Suzie is super nice❤️ Very patient. Best host ever. The place is closely near darling habour and suitable for walking around. I really recommend Suzie’s apartment to people who want to enjoy their journey in Sydney.
Suzie's place was excellent and the hospitality great. Would stay again :)
Suzie is a great host! Respond quickly and very helpful. She gives me some really good suggestions about transportation and food. I had a great weekend there!

I stayed at Suzie's for 4 nights on a business trip. It was very convenient to coffee places and harbour views. As others have mentioned, the ear plugs came conveniently as the apartment is close to traffic. Bed is super comfortable and the fan worked well at cooling down the room at night (it was very hot in Sydney that week). Access to the fridge allowed me to make my own breakfast in the morning. Bathroom is not connected to the bedroom but Suzie was rarely in the path in between so was not an issue at all. Apartment is in a very secured complex and close to the Wynyard Station to get to the airport in 30 min. Suzie also gave me lots of local recommendations. Recommended for business trips where you spend little time in the apartment.
Upmarket decor, clean, super comfortable. Excellent location. Lovely host!

Suzie’s appartement is really great. It’s clean and very well located. 
Suzie is nice, reactive and will answer to all your questions.

name: A stunning bedroom in Maroubra Jcn
summary: I am renting one room with balcony and toilet in my apartment Maroubra Junction. Highly accessible: - 1 minute to shopping centre - 20 minutes to Sydney Airport - 20 minutes to Sydney CBD - 10 minutes to Maroubra Beach - 20 minutes to Central Station
space: The room will be equipped with a cozy queen sized bed, large and spacious cupboard, study table and free unlimited internet access. The big balcony allows you to do various activities such as suntanning.
description: I am renting one room with balcony and toilet in my apartment Maroubra Junction. Highly accessible: - 1 minute to shopping centre - 20 minutes to Sydney Airport - 20 minutes to Sydney CBD - 10 minutes to Maroubra Beach - 20 minutes to Central Station The room will be equipped with a cozy queen sized bed, large and spacious cupboard, study table and free unlimited internet access. The big balcony allows you to do various activities such as suntanning. Shared: Laundry Area Kitchen Living Room Swimming pool Gym I love interacting with guests. However, this is usually can be done only in the morning or at night as I am working full-time. I always try to address the tenants' concern to make their stay fun and enjoyable. I am a foodie and have tried many foods around Sydney so if you need any suggestions with food, I will be more than happy to recommend you one. Pacific Square is the best place to stay as if you need anything, you can run to the supermarket (which is just downstairs) and it
neighborhood_overview: Pacific Square is the best place to stay as if you need anything, you can run to the supermarket (which is just downstairs) and it closes till midnight. Food around here are fabulous so you never be hungry. So, I think this place is terrific to stay for whatsoever reasons (travel for leisure or business purpose).
transit: The bus is also accessible as there are many buses that take you to Sydney CBD ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , and M10) and Railway Square (393 and 395). Airport is just 25 to 30 minutes by bus 400 from opposite the apartment.
access: Shared: Laundry Area Kitchen Living Room Swimming pool Gym
interaction: I love interacting with guests. However, this is usually can be done only in the morning or at night as I am working full-time. I always try to address the tenants' concern to make their stay fun and enjoyable. I am a foodie and have tried many foods around Sydney so if you need any suggestions with food, I will be more than happy to recommend you one.
house_rules: No party/celebration in the premises during stay No pets allowed No smoking

reviews.comments: David was a very accommodating and welcoming host! The place had a fantastic view as promised on the description and the bedroom was nicely set up for my arrival. I had a great stay and would recommend David's place for anyone looking to stay in the vicinity of the Eastern Suburb beaches or the university.

I loved it! David is the best next door neighbor we could have :) he helped us a lot and was extremely nice during our whole stay at his place. The location us super comfy as well, so there are a lot of buses going to the city, beaches and pretty much everywhere. I came to Australia with my mom and at David's place we had our own bedroom as well as bathroom. We could use kitchen utilities, iron and washing machine too :) To sum up it is a great place to stay and we didn't hesitate of doing so! Thanks David!! :)))
It's a very convenient place, close to transport and shopping center. David is very nice and helpful.

name: Big Manhattan Apartment 3 bedrooms big Living Room
summary: 1,500 SF (150 m2)  loft/apartment, recently renovated. Full floor, bright apt,  windows facing east-west.  Great live/work space with spacious living room. 3 big Bedrooms/3 Beds; extra mattresses available.  Can sleep up to 8 guests. Dishwasher, washer, dryer in the apartment. Close to subway and buses, plenty of taxis, Uber. Walk to Noho, Soho, Tribeca, Greenwich Village, Union square. If you will need help with luggage you must ask before you book the apartment.
space: Great Manhattan live/work/artist loft in East Village/Lower East Side (LES). This comfortable Loft is a live work dream.  Big space, new furniture, renovated apartment/loft. This is a three (3) bedroom loft/apartment with a very large living room. Sunny/bright apartment with 4 windows in the front and two windows in the back. The living room is very spacious and bright: in front there are 3 comfortable sofas, one is big and wide, it can accommodate for extra guest (it doesn't fold out open); there is a work desk  and there is a big dining table. There is an open, eat-in full kitchen with a table.  There is one full spacious bathroom.  4th Floor walk-up, wide stairs. Old style manual service elevator to be used only during check-in and check-out for the luggage. The hallways, stairs are clean, recently painted. There are two twin beds and an air mattress available upon request. The bedrooms are big enough to add another bed for extra guest.
description: 1,500 SF (150 m2)  loft/apartment, recently renovated. Full floor, bright apt,  windows facing east-west.  Great live/work space with spacious living room. 3 big Bedrooms/3 Beds; extra mattresses available.  Can sleep up to 8 guests. Dishwasher, washer, dryer in the apartment. Close to subway and buses, plenty of taxis, Uber. Walk to Noho, Soho, Tribeca, Greenwich Village, Union square. If you will need help with luggage you must ask before you book the apartment. Great Manhattan live/work/artist loft in East Village/Lower East Side (LES). This comfortable Loft is a live work dream.  Big space, new furniture, renovated apartment/loft. This is a three (3) bedroom loft/apartment with a very large living room. Sunny/bright apartment with 4 windows in the front and two windows in the back. The living room is very spacious and bright: in front there are 3 comfortable sofas, one is big and wide, it can accommodate for extra guest (it doesn't fold out open); there is a work desk  and there is
neighborhood_overview: The building is conveniently located in Lower Manhattan, at the border of East Village and LES (Lower East Side), near subway, galleries, great restaurants, coffee shops; in between Tenement Museum, The New Museum, famous old Katz's Delicatessen, Economy Candy Shop, Whole Foods Market, Beauty & Essex. In walking distance to NoHo, SoHo, East Village, NY University, Greenwich Village, Chinatown, Little Italy. The Lower East Side is prime shopping and dining territory The arrival of the New Museum on the Bowery several years ago drew numerous art galleries to the LES. And now the City just opened the Lowline Lab here (World’s first underground park); see info on its website.
transit: Express/Select Bus Service M-15 and Subway Station is one block away. CitiBike is available for renting bicycles. Plenty of yellow taxis and Uber service available. Subway Stations: F to Second Ave ( First Ave entrance is closer). F,J,M,Z to Essex-Delancey . In walking distance to 6, B, D, N, R subway lines. M-14A bus line to Chelsea Piers, M9 bus line to Battery Park City and other bus lines. Nearby parking garage and metered street parking in front.
access: 3 bedroom floor through apartment.
interaction: I'll be available to provide you with the keys and I'll be available if needed.
house_rules: No smoking. Please do not push around, remove or relocate the furniture. Ask for help if need to. No loud music, no excessive noise, no heavy drinking, no smoking at all, no out of control parties-events. Describe and ask for permission if there is an event, like "mother's birthday". I am always around and I do not allow "crazy parties"; no overcrowding apartment.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I have been living and working in Manhattan for 25 years. I have operated successful businesses in the neighborhood for a long time. I love my apartment and the neighborhood. I love to travel. I play soccer and listen to classical music.

reviews.comments: The best thing about this apartment is the space - it's big! Jango was there to greet us and show us around and was a great host. The apartment had only just been refurbished, and there were some items like one or two kitchen utensils that were missing, but he provided them quickly. He was always on hand and gave good advice on places nearby - shops, restaurants, etc. New washer/dryer and dishwasher; the oven is gas. Air conditioning works great. The third bedroom has no window but gives onto the living room. Very close to Delancey/Essex St subway with F line that goes straight to Midtown and J line that goes to the Financial District. All in all a great place to be for our holiday, thanks Jango!

Jango has a nice space here.  It was quite comfortable for the six of us.  And Jango was helpful, prompt, and available as needed -- an excellent host.  

We were pretty much out and around all the time and just used it as a place to sleep at night, so I can't comment on use of the kitchen.  It's an enjoyable neighborhood, with places to eat close by and a variety of transportation options.  The stairs weren't a problem for us.  The air conditioners worked well.  It was enough above the street not to be too noisy at night.

It's definitely not for those who want something fancy.  The furniture is basic and the floor is creaky.  But it served our needs perfectly and was a very good value.  There was lots of space both in the bedrooms and public living areas.  I'd happily stay there again.

We loved our stay at this apartment! Jango was a very gracious host: helpful, friendly, patient, respectful of our time and privacy -- delightful. The apartment is exactly as pictured on this site. The three beds were very comfortable. (The sleeping space is much more appropriate for 3-6 people. We made it work with 8, but it wasn't ideal.) We were also happy with the location: the area is vibrant, with many quaint stores and eateries. On our first night, we were thrilled to find fabulous pizza slices a few doors down and a lovely market around the corner. We traveled with school-age children, so we didn't take advantage of the area's many bars...we feel like we missed out just a little. The apartment is a close walk to the subway (a short block and a half? Quite easy) and Jango gave great directions from the subway station to the apartment. My travel companions all wanted to share accommodations for our trip, and we felt this was a good choice for the price in Manhattan.

Jango is a fantastic host and made us feel very welcome in NYC. The flat was as described: roomy, good beds, comfortable, well decorated, with all things necessary to make our stay very enjoyable! Although everything was fine, the finishing is quite average and the flat would need some work in my opinion. With this being said, Jango was great and even guided me to his free on-street parking space when we checked in and we could leave the car there for free for 3 days! We were travelling with our three young boys and there was ample space for everyone. It was very hot in NYC during our stay and the flat has more than enough AC to cool the place down. The flat's Lower East Side location is fantastic in a very special way and totally worth discovering. Essex market right across the street, subway is minutes away, awesome restaurants next door, public swimming pool a walk away, Nolita, Little Italy right there! We had an awesome stay, thank you Jango!

Note that this is NYC, so there is always a buzz, with background noise, but who travels to NYC for peace and quiet?

This apartment is a gem!! We are so happy that we found it - our vacation was perfect because of it. Jango is a great host and a very kind person. He made sure that everything is good and comfortable for us and that he have what ever we needed. Thank you so much Jango!! We hope to rent your apartment again during our next stay.

Our stay at Jango's apartment was excellent, we couldn't have found a better place to stay in the Lower East Side. It's a very spacious and comfortable place to stay, Jango was an extremely kind and helpful host. We hope to stay there again in the future!

Quick response, great flat, brilliant location.
Jango was very helpful during our stay. Recommended!

We had a lovely stay at Jangos place. It is a big apartment where everything worked out good. Maybe a little bit noisy in one of the bedrooms but it is New York... :)
Jango also gave us excellent information and service. We are very satisfied. The neighborhoud is just perfect, especially if you are not visiting the city for the first time. 

Lisa
Jango was helpfull and very accomodating. His appartment was clean and well kept. Everything we expected in a great location.

Jango est très sympathique. Avant et pendant notre séjour il a répondu instantanément à nos messages. L'appartement est conforme aux photos, et est très bien équipé. Toutes les pièces sont grandes, et pour les trois couples que nous étions s'était parfait. La situation est également appréciable avec une bouche de métro à l'angle de la rue. Pour les courses, il y a un petit marché juste en face et un grand magasin Bio (la chaine Whole Foods) à 10 minutes.
Vous êtes également à deux pas du célèbre diner Katz's immortalisé dans le film "quand Harry rencontre Sally"
Le seul point négatif est l'isolation phonique. Si vous avez le sommeil léger, cela peut être un problème. Mais si, comme nous, vous avez des journées bien remplies et des boules Quies, vous passerez un excellent séjour.

Der Check-in hat gut geklappt, Jango war sehr flexibel und freundlich. Die Wohnung war sauber, großzügig und sehr gut ausgestattet. Die Lage ist angenehm, in der Gegend gibt es viele Restaurants und Kneipen. Ich würde die Wohnung sofort wieder buchen.

I had a great stay at this property. The property was clean and spacious. The area is young and exciting with lots of great bars and restaurants nearby. Jango was also a very accommodating host. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Jango was very nice and helpful. The apartment is very nice, great location. There was just one terrible night when the people above us had a party until 3 in the morning. Unfortunately the sound isolation is rather bad. Everything else was great though.

Jango ha sido un gran anfitrión. Ha nuestra llegada estaba esperándonos en el apartamento. Es un tercero sin ascensor, pero dispone de un elevador para subir todas las maletas hasta casa. El piso es tal cual aparece en las fotos. Muy grande con tres habitaciones y un baño. El equipamiento es genial, dos sofas grandes y butaca grande, tres camas grandes muy cómodas, lavadora y secadora nuevas, televisión con mil canales, la calefacción funciona bien. La situación es genial, con el metro, restaurantes de todo tipo y supermercados cerca. Por poner alguna pega podría decir que la habitación que da a la calle es un poco ruidosa, pero vamos, que estas en NYC y es entendible.
Relación calidad precio inmejorable.

Lägenheten var ren, välstädad och motsvarade bilderna och våra förväntningar. Perfekt boende för oss (3 vuxna par), varsitt sovrum och stora gemensamma ytor. Nära till tunnelbana, som vi använde dagligen och lägenheten ligger i ett område med många restauranger, barer och små butiker. Jango var en mycket hjälpsam värd, och såg till att vi hade en bra vistelse.
Jango fue un gran anfitrión.  Muy amable y el apartamento muy amplió y cómodo.  Muy completo con todo lo que uno puede llegar a necesitar.

We had a great stay at Jango's place! The flat is *huge* for Manhattan -- we were a party of 7 adults and we had plenty of space. The living room was even large enough for us to all sit comfortably, and the bedrooms actually have furniture (i.e., they're bigger than just the size of the bed!). The apartment was clean and well-appointed with anything we needed. It looked exactly like the pictures and description.

The location is perfect, especially if you want to focus less on tourist attractions and more on getting to know Manhattan. The subway is a few blocks away, and we found a great basement cocktail bar and a few late-nite pizza spots on the block. It's an easy walk to the East Village, Alphabet City, St Mark's, Soho, Chelsea, bridges to Brooklyn, and even Midtown.

Jango was a great host! He met us personally to let us into the flat and show us around. He was incredibly accommodating, responsive, friendly, and easy to communicate with.

I will note that the flat is in an old building, like many in New York, and the walls are thin and the floors are creaky. Noise from within the flat and the other units (including a bar/club on the ground floor) traveled pretty freely through the building. This wasn't a big deal for us, since we were out late and sleeping hard, but if you have very light sleepers, early to bed/early to rise-ers, or small children in your party, it's something to be aware of.

Overall, I would definitely recommend Jango as a host and this flat as a home base for your NYC adventures. I would absolutely stay here again!
We wouldn't hesitate to stay again.  We felt like home.  Very comfortable.  There is a market very close by.  The area is great and the host is very kind.
Jango was great and very accommodating. Very cozy place indeed.

Jango's loft was just as described, maybe even better. It is the most spacious apartment I have ever seen in Manhattan. It easily sleeps eight people with comfort. Jango was super helpful and everything was just perfect. The market across the street was perfect to buy some groceries to make breakfast or pack a lunch for your day. We really appreciated that there was lots of Lower East Side nightlife walking distance from the loft - great neighbourhood (if a little gritty) and lots of friendly folks around on the street all hours of the day or night. We felt safe and looked after the whole time. A++ listing. We highly recommend and this will be our new NYC home every time we visit.

Jango was very welcoming and met us at the flat with the sets of keys as well as showing us around.  The flat is in a great area - much more 'real' than west village and other places I've stayed in NYC but still absolutely safe and loads to see and do.  The flat was warm (it was -1 outside) and had everything we needed including a great shower.  I would definitely stay there again.

Jango is very nice and welcoming. the loft was just as described. we felt like at home.
We had a wonderful time, thanks to Jango!

Jango es extremedamente amable. Siempre estuvo atento a nuestras necesidades, listo para ayudarnos en todo momento. Y un perfecto caballero! El departamento estaba limpio, al igual que la ropa de cama y toallones. Estaba completamente equipado. La ubicación es muy buena, a tan solo una cuadra del subte y muy cerca de Little Italy, Soho y Chinatown. Quedamos muy contentas con haber elegido a este anfitrión. Lo recomendamos!!

This apartment is amazing! Spacious! The rooms are all big. The Bathroom is great! Living area is lovely. Kitchen is great everything is fully functioning. The location is great! Would definitely stay here again. 

Jango is very helpful and provides everything!

Jango met us at the apartment on our arrival and helped us up to the 4th floor with all our luggage.  He was extremely helpful throughout our stay allowing us to check in early and also leave our luggage till 3 o' clock on the day of our departure.
The apartment was well equipped, clean, spacious, comfortable and satisfactory in every way.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in New York

It was amazing. Great amount of space especially for NY! Close to the subway and located right in the middle of a great neighborhood with lots of restaurants and bars. We all loved it! Only small thing was that the neighbors upstairs tend to be a bit heavy footed while running around. But didn't wake us at all! Def a place to consider again when taking the whole family

Jango's apartment was spacious and comfortable for our group. It happened to be super hot during our stay, and the AC worked great for the got week we were there. It's worth noting that one bedroom doesn't have its own AC unit. 

The neighborhood is fantastic. Walkable and easy to grab anything within a few blocks. It can get loud outside during the day (and night) but it's all within reason for a dense NY street.

Jango was very attentive to our needs and was always helpful during our stay. Would definitely stay again.

Jango's place was exactly what we were looking for. We could easily fit 6 people in the 3 different bedrooms. Jango was responsive and very helpful. I recommend this place for anyone with a big crew who need lots of space.

Some things to note is that there are lots of stairs (4 floors) and the floor squeaks a bit.

Jango's place is perfect for a group visiting New York and wishing to have a true downtown experience. Very comfortable living arrangements, and very conveniently located, and Jango was a very gracious host with plenty of recommendations and great communication both leading up to and during the stay at his apartment. Would highly recommend his apartment to anyone considering downtown New York.
The host was very helpful and helped us bring up luggage, we felt welcome and comfortable.

Nice apartment, really spacious and appropriate for a large family group (we were 5). The position of the apartment is also excellent, close to metro, grocery, a nice market across the street and many restaurants and bars in a very animated area, a bit noisy particularly during week-ends. We really enjoyed our visit to New-York and Jango was excellent with us.

We stayed at Jango's apartment for one week and Jango has been a great host, helping us with our luggage and showing us all the facilities of his apartment.

The apartment is exactly as depicted in the pictures although it could be a bit repainted here and there. It  was big enough for our group of five people and the washing machine and dryer came in handy to wash our clothes.

The apartment is located in a dynamic neighborhood which is full of bars so we had trouble to sleep at night since there was a LOT of noise in the street until 3-4 am. If you are traveling with a group of young people and like to go out then this apartment is the perfect spot. However I would not recommend it for families with young children.

Thank you Jango for your welcome, overall we had a great stay and enjoyed our week in New York.

Cheers from Brussels!

Jango was a great host!  He helped us with our luggage when we arrived and when we left, and was very accommodating when we told him our train was delayed.  The place was perfect for two families with young kids.  Close to the subway and grocery stores, which was nice.  Thanks Jango!

Nice apartment, perfect for a family wishing for a 'real NY experience' in a lively neighborhood. Jango is a fine host, making sure that we had everything we needed, with great communication skills. We'll return!

We stayed for 6 nights and were very pleased with the apartment.   It was as described and indeed comfy and large.   The three bedrooms were all very comfortable and spacious with plenty storage and hanging space.   The living area was large and had plenty seats for all 5 of us.   The bathroom was large with a bath and shower, although the water did take a while to heat first thing of the day.    We did not use the kitchen a lot but the presence of a washing machine and tumble drier was very welcome.   All in all the apartment was well furnished and very comfortable.

The neighbourhood was a mixture of local shops, eateries and bars and not too noisy at night.   There are plenty restaurants in the vicinity including the famous ( but expensive) Katz Diner.   The entrance to the building is small and there are 4 flights of stairs to climb to the flat, although there is a service lift for luggage, which was great!  There is a subway station nearby but you can walk to many downtown attractions if you are keen.(Hint: if you are staying for 6/7 days a 7 day pass on the subway is worth the $30 charge)

Jango was an excellent host who was there to greet us and came over on our departure day to help with luggage.   We had a slight problem with the internet first day which was outwith his control but he kept us updated on the progress to restore which happened on the second day.   He was very helpful and even invited us to stay an extra 2 days free of charge!!   Unfortunately our flights back to the UK had been booked for some time.

I would certainly recommend staying here for comfort and can highly recommend Jango as a host

We had a great time in New York! Jango's apartment has great location with walking distance to loads of great restaurants, bars, breakfast spots and attractions around Manhattan.
Williamsburg bridge is only 5 minutes away and perfect for a morning walk or run.
The apartment is very spacious and has all the amenities you'll need.
Jango was very helpful and always easy to reach if we had any questions.

Jango met us at the apartment. We felt very welcomed, and Jango is a good host.  The apartment is big, and we were 7 people there for 6 nights, and never felt crowded. Jango keeps it very well equipped with a lot of things, and we felt so pleased with this! Also the kitchen is of very good standard ! The location of the apartment is absolutely good. Walking distance to a LOT of the downtown places of interest, and also bus and metro stops only a couple of minutes away. Lots and lots of bars and restaurants nearby! We were absolutely happy about our stay here, but if I have to mention something negative, it would be that it can be a bit noisy especially at weekends, since the outside isnt so well isolated, and there are some bars and Essex street right outside. The stairs up is allready mentioned in the ad, and for us it wasn't a big problem. I mean, you won't be walking them up and down all day:-) The floors of the apartment are very squirky, but hey, it's an old building. We would definately stay here if we come again.

J ai eu de bons contacts avec jango avant notre arrivée ; jango est très prévenant , a l écoute . Le logement est très correct , jango met tout ce qu il faut pour rendre notre séjour agréable . Nous déplorons juste le nombre de salle de bain ou salle d eau et 1 wc intégré dans cette salle de bain et une mauvaise isolation de l appartement .
Super accueil personnalisé, emplacement de choix et appartement conforme aux photos ! Gros lave linge et sèche linge avec lessives fournies ...
Excellent service from Jango, including tip for a very good diner nearby. Nice location with lots going on in a buisy neighborhood.
Jango and the place are great! During the weekends there might be party's and it can get pretty noisy. Everything else was perfect!

We had a great stay at Jango's apartment. On first impressions we weren't quite sure as the front door and stairwell are not super welcoming, but don't let it worry you! The apartment was huge for NY and just what we needed. A reasonable price in a great location, with space for 6 women who were in NYC for a Christmas weekend away. Loads of fantastic restaurants nearby - Root & Bone for dinner, and Remedy diner and Clinton St Baking for breakfast were our favourites. Thank you Jango and Cengiz!

We actually didn't meet Jango but his brother, but they both communicated well. Jango's place is spacious and very near to a subway station. There is some noice because of a living area. We had a good time!

Jango is a friendly and welcoming host. However, six nights out of eleven we had little sleep because of the noise in the apartment directly below, or on the first floor, or above. We slept with ear plugs for the street noise but still felt the music vibrations through the building. It seems that the apartment directly below is not a residence but a party venue with very loud music.
Jango's apartment is large and the kitchen is well equipped and the bathroom very serviceable.
I would 100% stay here again. Jango was very communicative and the place is exactly what it looks like in the photos. Great area. I don't have one complaint!
L'appartement est très bien situé et très bien équipé.  Le propriétaire est très serviable.  Nous y retournerons!
Jango was a flexible and communicative host, and the apartment was very spacious and clean.

We had a great week in this central location which is also close to the subway. The apartment is spacious and comfortable with everything you need. There is a 24 hour shop, a market and a wine store to hand. There are bars and restaurants in the street which makes a lively buzz. 
6 of us stayed so there was sometimes a wait for the bathroom., as there is no separate toilet. 
I would come again!

Jango is a perfect host and the flat is large and a perfect start to explore Manhattan and the rest of New York. Essex street is quit busy so Friday and Saturday become a little louder. Three bedrooms make it the right spot for a family of four. We hope to be back soon.

We. (3 couples) just spent 5 nights at Jango's place. We loved it. It was spacious and clean. Jango left us coffee beans and a grinder and we loved that. We are serious coffee drinkers.There are three bedrooms all with queen size beds, an eat in kitchen, a dining room and a comfortable living room- just as the listing suggests. The location is convenient with plenty of restaurants and stores and the best is the Essex Market right across the street. It is a large open space market under one roof- European style. A subway stop is at the end of the block. Just remember though - there are four flights of stairs and no elevator- not a problem for us- but for some it could be.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour !!!!
Jango est un hôte très accueillant, de bon conseil et toujours prêt à rendre service.
L'appartement est formidable : spacieux (avec son grand salon et ses trois grandes chambres) et bien moins bruyant que ce à quoi nous nous attendions à New York. La literie est très confortable et Jango avait mis à notre disposition un grand nombre de serviettes de toilette.
La présence d'une machine à laver et d'un sèche linge est un vrai plus pour les séjours plus longs...
Il y a tout ce qu'il faut à proximité (petit marché sur Essex street, Union Market à 100m sur Houston street....)
Bref, nous nous sommes senti chez nous, ce qui est appréciable (surtout pour les enfants) après avoir marché toute la journée dans Manhattan.
Autre point très positif : la situation de l'appartement !
Le métro est au bout de la rue et l'accès à tous les centres d'intérêts de la ville est très rapide...
Nous recommandons vivement cet appartement !

Jango was incredibly helpful in facilitating check-in and out for our stay. The space is huge and easily accommodated the number of guests we had. The rooms are big and light filled. One thing to note is that there is a four floor walk up to the apartment. The location is lively and right in the middle of the Lower East Side next to lots of shops, restaurants, markets in a high-traffic area.
Quartier génial, l'appartement est très sympathique et Jango nous a très bien accueillis.
Jango was very helpful and the place was great and exactly as described. 8 of us stayed and it was definitely spacious enough  Would definitely return

Jango is a great host. Careful and accurate. We really enjoyed the week in New York. Great location for people who like to enjoy the life and rush of the New York City.
Highly recommended!
Great place in a great location.  Jango was helpful and very responsive.  The apartment was large and had everything we needed.

Absolutely loved this place.
Excellent location and amazing space. 
Jango's communication was great throughout which made our stay even better.
Highly recommended!

Great location! Great apartment! Great host! Jango was a nice and friendly host, who kindly stuck around an extra couple of hours following an unexpected delay at the airport to show us around the apartment late at night. He was only too happy to do so and explain everything we needed to know in detail. On our last day Jango also allowed us to leave our luggage past the original 11am check-out time whilst the apartment was being cleaned, until we needed to leave at 8pm for our 11pm flight. So we were able to enjoy a whole day exploring NY further without having to drag suitcases around - which was a HUGE help. The spacious modern apartment was nice and clean, and in a great location with lots of cool bars and restaurants all in short walking distance, as well as the subway. It was the perfect apartment and location for us five fellas on our mini-holiday from the UK.

Great apartment in the Lower East Side of NY and close to a subway stop. Property is quite big and exactly as described.  If staying on a weekend bring ear plugs for the front bedroom which I had already read on other reviews so no surprises and hey its New York. Jango was very easy to deal with and met us on arrival and departure which was great. Definitely recommend staying here.

The appartment is large and well furnished.

It is closed to the subway.

We had a great time at this apartment. Check in was very easy with Jango there to meet us, and communication was great. The flat itself was spacious, comfortable and in a good location to get around Manhattan. Thanks very much for having us.
We organized a college roommate reunion in New York, and Jango's place was perfect for accommodating several people's sleeping needs. Highly recommend it!

Checkin and communication were really smooth, thank you Jango!
Appartement is very spacious and perfect for larger groups. Location is ok. We can only recommend Jango and his appartement!
Great place to stay in Manhattan!

Très fidèle aux photos
Un appartement très spacieux et un hôte qui est à vos petits soins. Il nous a même demandé comment se passer le séjour pendant que nous étions là. Grande disponibilité tant à notre arrivée qu'à notre départ.
Great host; great apartment; comfortable and clean in a vibrant area with loads of restaurants, bars and amenities around the corner. Good value

Jango is a great host, very good at communicating, and responsive with our questions and requests. 
Great location, some traffic noise, but overall worked really well.
Attentive host, rare spacious apartment in a central neighborhood. Highly recommended!

This is a spacious but not flashy apartment in an area which is definitely not up market but which has a good selection of eating places nearby and a relaxed and friendly atmosphere.

Jango was a friendly and welcoming host, and everything in the apartment worked well.

Only niggle, which is made clear in the advert, is the three flights of steep stairs. I would also say that the stair area, which is shared with other apartments, could do with a lick of paint!

But generally this is a good value clean space to base yourself in.
Great host and great apartment. What more could you want? Jango was awesome and the apartment location is amazing!!

Great place. Great look and very central. The apartment is really huge for a place in Manhattan! 
Jango is a very nice host, very welcoming and very helpful. 
Worth to note that i have never seen a place made so convenient: all appliances are very useful and all working. And you will find endless supplies of toilet paper, detergent, coffee... Everything you need!
Place is perfect location to my favorite spots in the city. A plus is that the spot is huge! Great place to book!
Jango's place was not only large, it was in a great location. Right next to the train and in the middle of a lively neighborhood.

Jango was a great host and the apartment was perfect for my friends and I.  We arrived on Thanksgiving afternoon 2017, but it was still no problem meeting up with the host and getting the keys and a quick tour of the apartment.  Each of us got our own room which was perfect.  The apartment is definitely on the larger side for a NY apartment.  Communication with Jango was always quick and thorough.  Unlike my previous AirBnB in NY, this apartment had PLENTY of towels.  Large ones, small ones, and medium sized ones.  None of us had to use the same towel twice and there were still many more unused.  It was great.  And the host was flexible with our late checkout request.  Keep in mind that this apartment is on the Lower East Side so it's not going to be super quiet.  If that's what you're looking for, you probably shouldn't stay in the LES period.  I would highly recommend this place.
Super super place in an amazing location. Thanks Jango, we’ll be back ☺️
Very spacious, gorgeous large apartment right in the heart of LES. One block from trains, cool bars and restaurants on the street and very lively.
Good location. Easy checkin and checkout.  Would stay there again.

We couldn’t really fault Jango’s apartment. It was exactly what we were looking for! Jango himself is a fantastic and clear communicator. Thank you! 

*the lower east side neighbourhood is fantastic! Eateries on every corner, around the corner from the famous Katz deli, bars, shops. Yet has a different feel - more ‘real’ new york to the upper east sides. 

*walking distance to Chinatown, little Italy, east village, Chelsea, Washington Square Park and more! 

*2 min walk to the uptown subway lines! So easy!!

*2-3 min walk to any subway line actually. 4 stops to 34th street, 5 maybe to Central Park/ Rockefeller. No time at all! 

*spacious, 3 bedroom loft. Huge actually! Just as noted in Jango’s pictures and description. All beds extremely comfy and well made up. 

*fully functional kitchen 

*it is important to note that there are 4 flights of stairs when thinking about getting your luggage up or small children - we did it no hassle and am sure most will be able to if in a fit enough state. 

*it can be a little noisy (from above apartment or the bar below)  but it really didn’t bother us! It’s nothing unbearable but worth mentioning for people wanting complete silence.  

There were 3 couples staying in Jango’s place and it really made our stay! Such a cool place and area of New York City. We could have spent weeks more here! Thank you jango!
Very spacious apartment, specially for NYC! Great place and great host!

The department is perfect. The location is excelentt! In one of the most entertaining neighborhoods of Manhattan, between bars, shops, subway nearby, etc. Between the East Village and the Lowe East Side, a few meters from China Town! Jango, responded easily, very cordial and helpful. Always available to help. The apartment is very independent and is as it appears in the photos. It has a very well equipped kitchen to make a comfortable stay. This is the best Airbnb I've had. I would definitely go back to the Jango apartment! They will not regret it.

Casa muy bien localizada y comunicada. Muy amplia. 
El único inconveniente es el ruido de la calle que hay en una de las habitaciones.
Very nice and spacious apartment. Clean and tidy with everything you need (towels, bedsheets, etc.). Street fairly noisy, but would assume that this is normal in Manhattan.

Great location, amazing value with a thoughtful and helpful host.

Would definitely recommend to friends and visit again.
The appartment was great, roomy, comfy and authentic (and very clean !). The best location ever to visit Manhattan, very well connected by the subway to many things you could want to visit ! Perfect.
Jango's place was great.
Parfait!
Great location for LES bars and restaurants, Metro is within 200m, enough space in the clean apartment, good internet connection, welcoming host. We enjoyed our stay.

This apartment was a great place for a large group. Really spacious rooms and close to really great restaurants and bars.

It isn’t the quietest place to stay but NY is the city that never sleeps- nothing a pair of earplugs won’t fix!

There is a 7/11, union market and the Essex Street market all within very short walking distance.

We also ate at some great places all within close walking distance of the apartment including Russ and Daughters, Lombardi’s, Char Sue, Cafe Mogador, Balvanera, Remedy and Katz’s Deli.

A great area with very easy access either on foot or on the subway to all the sights and experiences in NYC.

We got a taxi from JFK to the apartment on arrival but braved the subway and Airtrain on our way back which was absolutely fine (only one change).

A great experience all round. Jango was quick to respond to any questions we had. Would definitely recommend!

Jango est très sympathique et avait tout organisé avant notre arrivée, mais nous n'avons pas eu le plaisir de nous rencontrer. Son appartement est très propre, et très spacieux, avec 3 grandes chambres. il est à 2 minutes de 2 lignes de métros, ce qui permet de se rendre rapidement dans tout Manhattan. Le quartier est très animé et vivant, avec plein de petits bars et restos (et notamment Katz à 5 minutes à pied). Cet appartement a largement contribué à ce qu'on passe des vacances exceptionnelles à NYC.

We had a very enjoyable time at Jango's place. The hospitality and care provided during our stay was first rate. We all had an amazing time in New York due mainly to staying at this apartment. We loved the location, the spaciousness, the decor and the assistance Jango gave us when we needed it. We will definitely stay at this apartment when we return to New York and will recommend  Jango's place to all our family and friends back in Australia. We miss LES already.....we were all very comfortable and happy living the New York life in this space. We were also thankful for all the daily essentials that were provided like handwash, umbrellas, dish washing liquid, paper towel, etc, this was very much appreciated. Thank you, Jango!!

.
Jango's place is in a great location, the apartment was clean and Jango was attentive to our needs

Es una excelente opción de estancia, muy céntrico y con buena ubicación!
La zona no es la mejor la verdad, el edificio esta feo de la fachada pero el departamento es como se ve en las fotos. Hay mucha vida nocturna, pero cumple perfectamente con el objetivo que es tener un lugar lindo para quedarse!
Jango es excelente anfitrión, muy amable, respuesta rápida y muy atento. Trata de siempre estar al pendiente y de ayudarte absolutamente en todo.
Ampliamente recomendable!

We had a great stay at Jango’s flat. It is faithful to the photos, with 3 large bedrooms, a very well equipped kitchen (with dishwasher, washing machine...) and a nice leaving room. It is close to the subway station and in a lively area, with a lot of restaurants and bars. Communication with Jango was very easy. He was very welcoming and responsive. We would definitely come back !

This place is a pleasant surprise for its over-generous space and all the little touches for a comfortable stay. As a three bedroom unit near a subway station with lots of restaurant choices, this place is super value for your money!  

P. S. The climb upstairs is good exercise!
Fantastic location and huge apartment for Manhattan. Would definitely stay here again on another trip!

Jango's 3 bedroom apartment in the Lower East Side was a wonderful surprise in all aspects of a place to stay in the Lower East Side.  Jango was very accommodating with communications and questions we had for his place.  I recommend his apartment to anyone staying in the Lower East Side.  Great location.  Close to may clubs, restaurants and bars.  Very lively area.

We really enjoyed our stay in this classic walk-up Lower East Side apartment.  We loved the  vibrant locale - lively yet relaxed.  The flat itself is very well equipped, with its own unique  and functional furnishing style.  It has loads of space available for storing your stuff - clothes, toiletries and food, and was lovely and clean.  We liked the AC and the powerful fan in the bathroom.  The beds were comfy too.  Yes it could be noisy outside, but hey, this is a funky area of central NY, and it was nothing we couldn't cope with.   Jango was an excellent host, speedy at communications, with helpful local advice, and also kindly allowed us to keep our bags at the flat on the day we left, which was so useful as we had a late flight.

Jango is a great host. He allowed us to drop our bags off early so we weren't dragging them all over the city. The apartment is HUGE and 6 of us stayed very comfortably. Location is great. There's a subway station a block away and plenty of great bars and restaurants nearby. We had a great stay with no hiccups at all.

The seven of us really enjoyed our stay at Jango's apartment. This is a great apartment for a larger group, very spacious and relaxed a great haven at the end of a hard day exploring. We all brought earplugs with us, but none of us used them in the end, and it was nowhere near as noisy as we anticipated. The range of food options within walking distance was excellent, as was accessibility to the subways and general sightseeing. The Essex Street Market across the road quickly became a favourite place to stock up on breakfast things and snacks each evening as we came home from exploring. The apartment was well provisioned for cooking at home, there were plenty of extra towels and amenities generally. Thanks Jango for making our stay so comfortable and easy!

Great place to stay! Cozy, comfortable beds, new appliances in the apartment, plenty of extra linens and towels. Walking distance to subway and awesome grocery store up the street. Will definitely go back!!
amazing location, and surprisingly very spacious for a nyc apt.
This is an extremely spacious apt! We were a party of 5 and were very comfortable. The apt is clean and in a fun part of NYC.

Very spacious flat (perfect for my family of 6) for an affordable price compared to NYC standards. Close to iconic neighborhoods (Soho, Chinatown, Brooklyn), plus nice organic super market at a 5min walk. We really enjoyed our stay there!

Logement très bien situé, près d'un marché, d'épicerie, de restaurations, du bus et métro...Logement vraiment très spacieux, 23 m de long! cuisine bien équipée, SDB propre et spacieuse: grand réfrigérateur, cuisinière gaz avec four, hotte à extraction pas assez puissante, batterie en inox, grand lave linge + sèche-linge, avec tous les produits.
Très bon Wifi. Le parquet bois est très usé, nombreux meubles usés mais très sympa. 3 étages à monter assez raid. Place de parking payant juste devant l'entrée: pratique lorsqu'on a beaucoup de bagages. Très bon rapport qualité-prix. Piscine municipale gratuite à 10 mn.

Apartment is perfectly located, near a few of the main subway lines and attractions. It has also everything you need (i.e. dishwasher, washing machine, AC, vacuum cleaner, etc.). Furthermore, Jango is a super host as he cares for his guests being comfortable and having all they need. We were 5 adults and 1 baby and we were super comfortable.

Great location right in Lower East Side with access to lots of bars and places for brunch. The apartment is big with three full size double bedrooms. We didn't use them but there was also a high chair, cot and childs bed too. Jango was extremely efficient in replying and being available for any questions. I would book again.

Jango is a terrific communicator and takes good care of accommodating his guests. He makes sure detail of things like how to get in, for example, are very clear. He’s flexible on things like dropping off luggage. He responds almost instantly to questions and gives thorough and thoughtful answers. His website description of his place and amenities is spot on. In short, Jango’s a great host! 

Some observations on the place itself:
- Spotless cleanliness
- All the amenities you’d need
- Especially a very nice kitchen, well supplied
- Flexibility of accommodations; for example, a high chair and crib are there
- Very convenient to a grocery store and subway stop, both about 1-1/2 blocks away
- All guests felt very safe
- Tips supplied on cool stuff to do locally 

We’d certainly stay here again. Highly recommend both Jango and his place.
Good spot for entertainment and access to transportation.

We’ve had a great stay at Jango’s place. It’s very spacious and clean. 

The beds are small but comfortable. It can get quite noisy due to the construction site across the road and the traffic / nightlife in the street.

The location is very convenient located close to the subway and to a couple of great restaurants and bars.

Would definitely recommend a stay, good value for money!

We enjoyed our stay to NY in Jangos Apartment. Everything that you see in the Pictures is exactly what you get. 
Jango is very hospitable og helpful all the time - and very flexible.
The Apartment is close to cafes and restaurants - SOHO (super shopping) and Subway to the rest of Manhattan.
I would recommend Jangos Apartment and would love to come back some time.

The flat was spacious and in a good location to explore New York with loads of local restaurants for dinner and brunch in easy walking distance.  Jango was charming, helpful and very easy to communicate with at all times.

This is a very spacious apartment in an older style property. There are 3 large double bedrooms, a large living dining room and a kitchen with dining table. The location is great for bars, restaurants and local hipster boutiques. There are also loads of playgrounds so both the adults and kids in our party were happy! The metro is at the corner of the street and we felt very safe in this neighbourhood as well as close enough to both downtown and midtown. I would stay here again just for the location. 
The only minor downsides are there is only one bathroom, there are 3 flights of stairs and the main road is a little noisy. But for the space and location you’d be hard pressed to do better. Jango was also very good at communicating and very kindly allowed us an early check in and late check out so we were very grateful for that!

Jango's place was great. It was conveniently located and an easy 15-20min to get anywhere else. Only thing is that there is a hookah bar below us, so it gets really noisy on a Saturday night. But other than that, the value and location of the place was great. Jango is a text/phone call away and he was able to accommodate our bags being left at his place when we had an early flight in and late flight out.
Perfect location, great place for families, staying with Jango every year

Overall, we had a nice 4-night stay over Thanksgiving Weekend.  Jango was very responsive and met us when we checked in and let us use the freight elevator to bring our luggage up to the fourth floor.  He offered it again when we left but we did not need it.
The apartment looks just the photos and has all the amenities as listed and it is convenient to the metro, stores, LES, etc.
Jango was also quick to respond to our loss of internet one evening (ended up being a cable company service problem) that was fixed by next morning.
The apartment floor is 'spongy' and it squeaks.  There is an apartment above this one and you can hear the movements from above.  For two nights, that apartment played music late at night and one could hear the bass thumping.  We brought this to Jango's attention and he said he would contact them which he must have done because we did not hear the music for the remainder of our stay.
It should be noted that there is a Hookah bar on the first floor and one can smell that scent in the downstairs stairwell and that the smell rises into this apartment over the course of the night, especially if the bar is busy.
In addition, there is music coming from venues behind the apartment, particularly the sounds of bass thumping,  that you can hear in the back bedroom late at night.
Jango's place was great, everything you need and want to feel like a local. We love New York and will definitely stay here again! Side note, Champion Pizza is super delicious and affordable!

Great location and spacious apartment.
A little noisy from the street in the front bedroom,  but it is the city that never sleeps!
Very easy to get to with the train from JFK.

Jango’s place exceeded our expectations.  The place is very big (rare in NY) and located in a great spot that is accessible via the subway to other touristy spots.  There are also plenty of places near the apt to grab drinks and dinner.  The place itself has a washer/dryer/dishwasher  which is useful during a longer stay.  Jango himself was awesome- he was very communicative and we felt we were in great hands!  We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend the place.

Jango est un hôte très sympathique et attentif. L'appartement est très bien situé, proche du métro et dans un quartier sympathique.  Il est très spacieux. La cuisine est équipée et Jango n'est vraiment pas avare en serviettes de toilette  ce qui est très remarquable.
very well located jango is very reactive and the flat is perfect for a group (3 couples or à Family)

If you stay here, be prepared for the Hooka lounge on the first level.  The noise was unreal.  There is a loudspeaker, music and people yelling out in front until 3am.  We had that 3 nights in a row because we stayed Sunday night before MLK day.  If I would have been forewarned - I would have no problem because I would have been prepared / or not booked it.  The location is amazing & Jango is very friendly and communication was excellent.  The photos are deceptive.  Looks bright and airy.  the pictures must have been taken 10 years ago, because paint is warping, the lighting is awkward (have to go into someones bedroom to turn on and off the light in the living room), musty drapes etc...
With that being said, there really isn't much alternative if you are traveling with 3 couples and are staying more than 3 nights - so I recommend under certain circumstances.

Nice place to visit New York City, everything is quite close and the appartment is big . There is everything needed at the apartment ! The only bad point was the noise in the room just in front of the street, it’s like there are no windows. Good only for heavy sleepers ! 
Apart from that i recommend this place !

This is a large apartment with three good sized bedrooms. The apartment is located a short walk from the subway and the area is colourful but not dangerous. 
The apartment was very clean, and we were happy find it nice and warm in a sub-zero New York. Be careful of the floorboards which gave us splinters - do not walks around barefoot!  The floorboards also mean that you will hear people walking overhead which can be confusing.
The stairwell is scruffy and not as well looked after as the apartment itself. There are lots of stairs, but we got used to them. The only problem can be that the lift to the flat is only available if Jango is there so make sure you co-ordinate with him to avoid carrying your luggage.
The host, Jango was responsive and helpful. He had to sort out both the blocked toilet and the Wi-Fi within the first 24 hours and responded quickly in both instances. He also let us leave our luggage I the apartment until our late flight which was a real help.

Overall a bargain in Manhattan for such a big space!  We traveled as 2 parents, 1 toddler and a grandparent for a wedding weekend.  The 3 floors to walk-up are tall floors so if unable to use the elevator for check in/out, be prepared.  The space was clean and fairly accurate to the pictures.  The floors were a little more worse for the wear than I expected from the pictures or description.  My toddler crawled on them but we avoided having him on the bare wood as much as possible to avoid splinters.  

Unfortunately, the weekend we were there, the bar downstairs was very busy and at 4 am on Friday, the bars in the area must have closed because it sounded like the entire bar was outside our window shouting.  We (the parents in the group) were in the front room facing the street and  did not sleep well any night.  I saw this in reviews but some said they didn't hear anything. I guess it just depends on the weekend.  Luckily, our toddler was in the room with french doors which was located in the center of the apt, away from the outer walls.  My mother-in-law in the back bedroom heard thumping from music late at night but did not have loud voices to deal with.  Overall she didn't have major noise issues.

Another factor to the bar downstairs is the smell.  Fortunately, a very minimal amount of the hookah smell made its way into the apt. My mother-in-law has very sensitive smell and didn't have issues.  You could smell it walking by the door but otherwise it was fine.  Once you stepped into the hallway, the smell was much stronger.  Also, the smell of tequila/liquor at the bottom floor in the morning was quite strong.

Overall, the place is a great value and I would recommend it to a group looking for a budget-friendly place to stay in a good neighborhood.  Be prepared with earplugs if you're in the front room.

name: Stylish 3bed house with pool - Bondi/Tamarama
summary: Modern, light and super stylish family beach house in Bondi - 10 min walk to Bronte, Tamarama and (the famous) Bondi beaches. Enjoy all the mod cons and cool off in your own back garden plunge pool. Best suited for a family of 4-5. Min 7 nights. Discounts for stays over 14 days.
space: Gorgeous family beach house close to Bondi Beach - minutes to the beach and perfect base for a family holiday or executive stay.
description: Modern, light and super stylish family beach house in Bondi - 10 min walk to Bronte, Tamarama and (the famous) Bondi beaches. Enjoy all the mod cons and cool off in your own back garden plunge pool. Best suited for a family of 4-5. Min 7 nights. Discounts for stays over 14 days. Gorgeous family beach house close to Bondi Beach - minutes to the beach and perfect base for a family holiday or executive stay. The whole house is yours! We will be overseas - our house is yours for the duration. Easy walk to everything, super quiet street but can be in the midst of the Bondi scene in minutes. 5 min walk to bus stop on major route to central Sydney and CBD (travel time 20-30 mins) 5-10 minute walk to Sydney's famous Bondi beach, Tamarama and Bronte beaches, the coastal walk... 2 mins walk to local shops (grocers, wine shop etc) This is our family home and strictly not a party house.
neighborhood_overview: Easy walk to everything, super quiet street but can be in the midst of the Bondi scene in minutes.
notes: This is our family home and strictly not a party house.
