reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our time here. The house is absolutely amazing; the host friendly and informative and the location was superb. Thanks to Niki and family.

We loved this home - so quiet and family friendly, yet so close to everything. We could walk to all the great beaches - Tamarama, Bronte and Bondi, and enjoyed having great shops and cafes just a couple of minute's walk away. Nicola's home is a lovely way to experience the best of Sydney life and she was great to deal with - super responsive and helpful with local information.
A terrific location close to everything Bondi has to offer.  Fantastic communication from the host Niki.

name: Retro Apart in city center near Galata Tower
summary: Modern and cozy 90m2 apartment With rich historical neighborhood Galata, located below beyoğlu area between Tophane, Karaköy and Galata Tower triangle, is decorated with contemporary style. Apart is close to Taksim Tunnel - Şişhane (Sishane) metro by 100m walk.
space: Contemporary and brand-new decorated apartment is located close to Galata Tower, one of the symbolic statue of Istanbul. With high ceiling and light richness, the apartment offers guests a comfortably spacious. It consist of comfortable bedroom for two person (european king size 160x200 bed) and a convertible spring loaded couch suitable for one/two person ( Double 140 x 190 couch).
description: Modern and cozy 90m2 apartment With rich historical neighborhood Galata, located below beyoğlu area between Tophane, Karaköy and Galata Tower triangle, is decorated with contemporary style. Apart is close to Taksim Tunnel - Şişhane (Sishane) metro by 100m walk. Contemporary and brand-new decorated apartment is located close to Galata Tower, one of the symbolic statue of Istanbul. With high ceiling and light richness, the apartment offers guests a comfortably spacious. It consist of comfortable bedroom for two person (european king size 160x200 bed) and a convertible spring loaded couch suitable for one/two person ( Double 140 x 190 couch). Guests can access any provided equipments in the house. Also they can access the top terrace with an extra care to the other users in the building. Only the locked areas in the apartment and the general settings of the equipments such as Wi-Fi systems, Smart TV, Heat system in the house is off-limits to customers to alter their settings. During guest
neighborhood_overview: Neighborhood called Galata Quarter, hosts one of the city's most striking landmarks and historic peninsula, Galata Tower. From 1348, it has been dominating the skyline and witness many historical events over the city. Around the Galata / Karakoy quarter, urban living style attracts many tourists around the world to witness how the history mirrored on the buildings and how the population has changed through the historical timeline.
notes: Apartment is located close to the lighting equipment commercial zone that during the day the district might be busy in week days.
transit: The apartment is very centered that it is 5 min walk to everywhere you want to go. For 5-10 min walks, guests can reach both the end of the Istiklal Street, Tunnel (3rd oldest metro tunnel) and to Karaköy square. The nearest metro station, and bus stations are 5 min away from the apartment that it is easy to transport any direction you ask for.  By tunnel, it is easy to go to Ferry ports to make a Bosphorus daily tours..  For parking, there is two parking spaces close to the apartment (3 min) which is not free of charge. There is an hourly fee systems on these parking spaces.   There is three transportation way you can choose to come from airport. One and the lowest price is using the metro and public transportation lines ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) Getting a registered taxi/cab is another option to get from airport. More relax and easy way is getting to apartment is to rent a private car delivery system. In Galata area there are Mosques, Synagogues, Rum Armenian and Gerogian Churches
access: Guests can access any provided equipments in the house. Also they can access the top terrace with an extra care to the other users in the building. Only the locked areas in the apartment and the general settings of the equipments such as Wi-Fi systems, Smart TV, Heat system in the house is off-limits to customers to alter their settings.
interaction: During guest's staying, they can reach me via an e-mail for general questions, try to replied as quick as possible in the same day. For quicker response guests can send text (sms) or whatsup messages. For the emergency cases guests can call me from cell phone anytime they need. The missed calls try to be recalled again as soon as possible.
house_rules: There is No smoking in the house. However you can have your cigars / cigarettes on small balcony in living room area.   Please respect to whom lives in the building, by keeping the building common areas (corridor and common terrace) clean and no loud music between the sleeping hours (23:00 until 07:00).   Due to old city and narrow streets, there is no garbage container system. The garbages are collected in front of the building around 20:00 - 22:00 hours everyday.

reviews.comments:
The place is cozy and has a artsy feel to it and looks exactly like on the photos. Area couldn't be any better, close to Shishane metro station and you can actually see the Galata Tower from the window ;)
Overall I was extremely satisfied with the place and recommend highly !

My recent stay in Istanbul, Turkey was a joy thanks to Alpay and his apartment I rented through Airbnb for a 7 day visit.  Alpay has a beautiful place which is comfortable and exquisitely decorated. Upon my arrival Alpay took a great deal of time showing me how to enjoy his apartment and even walked me around the neighborhood pointing out markets and restaurants so that I would feel comfortable with my surroundings.
The apartment is well located in the Galata Tower District and is an easy walk to dinning and many of the famous architectural sights. I will definitely recommend Alpay’s apartment to any friends wanting to visit Istanbul

Regards,

Randal
Wonderful Host. Met us and showed us the apartment and the neighborhood. It was an excellent way to arrive. The apartment is lovely we had a great time.

Alpay welcomed me although I was arriving very late and showed me his beautiful place.. His appartment is just fantastic. Lovely furnished and in perfect condition, super clean and just the best place to stay. Close to Galata and Metro, just 15min walk to Ferry. I like it a lot and recommend it to everybody.
Alpay is a very nice person and was again a great host. I will come back soon as I very much like his flat.
I really like Alpays' place a lot. Calm and central. Alpay was as always very friendly, filled me the fridge with some breakfast material, all great. Hope to be back soon.

Alpay indeed the wonderful host. Very friendly and easily to communicate with. He provide lots of valuable information for us during our arrival.

What you see is what you get from the pictures he provided. His apartment is so cozy and comfortable. Quiet and calm during night time. You may have a very good rest all the time.

His apartment is very near to Taksim Tunel and Sishane metro. Few minutes walk to Galata tower, Galata bridge, Karakoy Hipster areas and to any other tourism spots.

I would highly recommend to anybody if you plan a visit to Istanbul. You will love his place so much. Me and my wife love his place Truly Deeply and Madly.

Once again, Thank you so much Alpay. Nice to meet you :D

Best Regards,
Jonathan Ong & Wife

We’ve had an absolutely amazing experience. The apartment was just as shown on photos, impeccably styled, clean and with all we needed: comfy bed, hot water, soft towels, coffee, wine and sunlight. Alpay is a great host who is always online and willing to answer any questions. Our first trip to Istanbul was a great journey thanks to him as well. Highly recommended!

Alpay was very helpful and welcoming from the beginning, helping us to carry our luggages up the 3 floors. Alpay loaned us his 4G hotspot as we had no wifi due to a problem with the provider in the area, which was really convenient.

The appartment is very well decorated with some vintage stuff and literally spotless. The street is full of life during the day, many shops selling electrical products but no tourist stuff. Very quiet at night which is not the case everywhere. Within 3 min walk you can reach Galata tower  or SALT Galata (contemporary art center, library and café) down the street. Galata bridge + Karakoy ferry pier to asian side are around 5 min by walk.

One of the best experiences I've had untill now.

Truly an outstanding Apartment and Host! The apartment is above any 5 star hotel. The location could not be more perfect you can sit on the couch and see Galata tower out your window! The pictures do not do this place justice it is decorated amazingly... it should be in Dwell magazine! Everything is here, you could not want for anything. Alpay speaks English perfectly and his hospitality is unparalleled!
Amazing and cozy flat! The location it’s perfect and Alpay is very kind and available for everything. He gave us very nice recommendation. Super good experience in Istanbul!!
Alpay has thought of everything from your arrival to departure. Flat is very calm and stylish. Everything was excellent. Thank you again.
Absolutely fantastic place. One of the best Air BnBs I have ever stayed in. Quiet at night. Great location. Beautiful inside.

name: Ocean & golf course views!! 3 BR/2BA Sleeps 7
summary: Our Kona Vacation Villa is a spacious 3 bedroom (2 bath) condo offering spectacular sunset views, nearby ocean and beach access, restaurants and entertainment, art and culture. Room for the whole family with beach gear and many amenities! Since 2012 we have hosted hundreds of guests including families, couples, and business travelers. We live at our nearby Equestrian Center and continue to enjoy sharing the Kona experience with our visitors!
space: Our spacious home on the golf course (18th tee) has fabulous views and comfortable furnishings. BBQ on your own lanai! (Unavailable in many other condos) King, Queen, 3 twins (and a futon); 3 pools on site, hot tubs, tennis and pickle ball.  Walk to beach, shopping, snorkeling & many ocean adventures! Wi-Fi, cable, XBox, large flat screen in living area, smaller in loft and 2nd bedroom.  Fully stocked kitchen for cooking & dishware for a crowd. Large dining table on lanai.  We provide boogie boards, snorkel equip., coolers, umbrella, beach bags & chairs: A LUXURY VACATION ON A FAMILY-FRIENDLY BUDGET! Beautiful lanai with fantastic ocean/sunset view, right on the 18th tee of the Kona Country Club Golf Course   Walk to Keauhou Bay and the Keauhou Shopping Center where there is a Tri-plex movie theater, an excellent grocery store with many local foods, a Saturday Farmer's Market, many great restaurants, CVS/Long's, Urgent Care and other shopping opportunities:  A VERY short drive to Kahal

We live at our nearby Equestrian Center and continue to enjoy sharing the Kona experience with our visitors! (Unavailable in many other condos) King, Queen, 3 twins (and a futon); 3 pools on site, hot tubs, tennis and pickle ball.  Walk to beach, shopping, snorkeling & many ocean adventures! Wi-Fi, cable, XBox, large flat screen in living area, smaller in loft and 2nd bedroom.  Fully stocked kitchen for cooking & dishware for a crowd. Large dining table on lanai.  We provide boogie boards, snorkel equip., coolers, umbrella, beach bags & c
neighborhood_overview: Country Club Villas is near the south end of the Ali'i Drive (waterfront) resort district. Walking, running, and biking are very popular in this neighborhood.Being outside of "town"  is less crowded but with excellent access to all of Kona's activities (many available at Keauhou Bay, just across the golf course) and travel to all the Big Island adventures. Keauhou Shopping Center is a 5-minute walk and is our "go-to" for grocery shopping.
transit: Designated parking just steps from the entrance; visitor parking for additional vehicles nearby. There is a "Kona Trolley" system  (info in condo) that runs all of Ali'i drive and into town for additional shopping and restaurants/entertainment.
access: You will be pleased with the spaciousness of this condo (1240 sq ft).  There are books, games, videos and beach toys for your use. Books in loft are to share and take home if you like. Living room has an assortment of books on visiting the Big Island, the Hawaii atlas, hawaiiana flora and fauna, sea life and much more!
interaction: Cyndy and Pat live just minutes away. Cyndy has lived in Kona since 1979 and Pat since 1998. We are happy to share our experiences and local knowledge with our guests.  (At Horseplay Equestrian Center just up the mountain from the condo Cyndy teaches english riding and boards horses.)
house_rules: 10 PM to 8 AM quiet hrs

host.host_about:
Kona, Hawai 32+ years.
Mother, grandmother, wife, friend, riding instructor. 
Love: reading, music, riding, silence, listening, learning...

reviews.comments:
This condo was great and Cyndy could not have been a better host! Just a short drive from grocery stores, restaurants and downtown Kona made this a great location. The view from the back balcony (overlooking the golf course) was so beautiful and a great sight to wake up to. 

Cyndy provided all of the information we needed, as well as all kitchen necessities and food/cooking basics. Aside from the kitchen, the bathrooms had plenty of toilet paper, the closet had any towels/sheets we needed and then some. All beach towels, coolers, beach chairs, umbrellas, boogie boards and other beach/water accessories were provided and GREATLY appreciated.

Make note that the condo is not air conditioned, but that is VERY common and to be expected at most places in Kona. My group was very excited about the board games, however they were definitely a bit outdated, and missing some pieces. The remotes to the ceiling fans in the living room were a bit confusing and we couldn't figure out the lights (the lamp on the side table wouldn't work) so it was a bit dark at night.

Aside from those very small things, this condo was so wonderful for our group and we definitely recommend it to others.

We couldn't have asked for a better stay! Cyndy's place was immaculate, well stocked and sparkling clean. She offered us great advise  from directions to local eateries. Her place has a fantastic view of the ocean and golf course, is close to everything yet just far enough away from the noise to enjoy a peaceful evening. Cyndy was very polite and thoughtful. Truly a 5 star host! would go back anytime

name: * You Will Save Money Here
summary: This is a cozy private room with ensuite bathroom, located in the quiet part of Sultanahmet area. You can easily reach the main square within 5-6 mins on foot, and have the chance to visit all the major attractions of the Old City. We serve local style breakfast plate in the mornings at our rooftop terrace. Also, we have a 24/7 front desk agent to assist you with anything you might need.
space: The room has one French bed, satellite TV, mini fridge, internal phone, A/C (for summer) and central heating (for winter).  Free Wi-Fi connection is available throughout the building for our guests’ use. You can buy water, snacks, and other items you might need from the grocery store nearby. Upon request, we can provide airport transfer service to/from both Ataturk and Sabiha Gokcen Airports. For pricing and service details, it will be enough to send us a message. Our place is located in a pretty quiet and safe area of Sultanahmet, so you don't have to worry about most of the grossly exaggerated news you hear on media. There are also many restaurants and cafeterias in the area, which are usually open until 1 AM. If you will be travelling with your own car, we usually have free space in front of the building. If not, there is a parking lot with reasonable fees, where you may leave your vehicle until some space becomes available.
description: This is a cozy private room with ensuite bathroom, located in the quiet part of Sultanahmet area. You can easily reach the main square within 5-6 mins on foot, and have the chance to visit all the major attractions of the Old City. We serve local style breakfast plate in the mornings at our rooftop terrace. Also, we have a 24/7 front desk agent to assist you with anything you might need. The room has one French bed, satellite TV, mini fridge, internal phone, A/C (for summer) and central heating (for winter).  Free Wi-Fi connection is available throughout the building for our guests’ use. You can buy water, snacks, and other items you might need from the grocery store nearby. Our place is located in a pretty quiet and safe area of Sultanahmet, so you don't have to worry about most of the grossly exaggerated news y
neighborhood_overview: The building is situated at a very convenient location, it is just a few minutes of walk to Sultanahmet Square Just a few steps to historical places in walking distance as below; Blue Mosque – 5 mins Hagia Sophia Museum – 8 mins Topkapi Palace Museum – 12 mins Basilica Cistern – 8 mins  Roman Hippodrome – 5 mins Gulhane Park – 15 mins Grand Bazaar – 25 min Egyptian Market – 35 mins on foot, 15 mins by public transit Eminonu & Karakoy Districts – 35/40 mins on foot, 15-20 mins by public transit
notes: Definitely no extra guests from outside allowed in the rooms or at the terrace. You may have your guests in the front desk area.
transit: The nearest public transit is the tram stop of Sultanahmet, which can be reached through 8-10 min stroll. With the tram, you can easily reach Beyazit, Eminonu, Karakoy, Kabatas, and Taksim (with connection). Grand Bazaar is located in Beyazit district. On one side of Karakoy, you may find all types of industrial shops, selling tools, machinery equipments, building materials, etc. and on the other side, there are many newly opened chic restaurants, bars, bistros, through its tiny streets. Taksim is famous for its shops in day time and its nightlife until the morning :) One tip about Taksim, only go to places that has good feedback. From Eminonu, you may take a ferry across Bosphorus, either to Uskudar or Kadikoy, both of which are residential districts of Istanbul on the Asian side. Kadikoy is more lively usually until late evening with its cozy coffeehouses, restaurants, bars, etc.  Apart from those places nearby, here are the ports of entry into Istanbul for you: Ataturk Airport – 20
access: All rooms are private in the building. The rooftop terrace and the front desk area is always available for our guests’ use.
interaction: I and my colleagues at the front desk are always available for your assistance on directions, calling a taxi, ordering food through restaurants’ delivery, sightseeing tour arrangements, etc. It will be sufficient to stop by the front desk.
house_rules: *no pets *no smoking *Please do not throw anything into the WC ,pipe can be blocked easily ‘’

host.host_about:
Greetings from Istanbul :) This is Alihan, born in 1986 in Tarsus/Mersin. I have been through many areas of tourism business and currently engaged in both being a travel consultant and a host here at Airbnb. At our various rooms in Sultanahmet area, I'd be delighted to guest you at one of our accommodations ;) With years of guest satisfaction and understanding of hospitality, I am sure you will be enjoying your stay with us.. I am currently working as Travel Expert on Efendi Travel Istanbul and Reservation Manager at Deniz Houses Hotel and Naz Wooden House Inn Hotel in Istanbul. 

I, myself, like to travel single and explore on my own without any hassle, taste different things, travel to quiet locations and get away from the crowds much as possible. In Istanbul, whichever type of traveler you might be, you can always find an aspect suitable for yourselves. Just come over here and discover this beautiful city..If you would need any suggestions, I and my colleagues at the accommodations will be happy to assist you ;)

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed in this hotel. Me and my friend had a good time in Istanbul. The host was really nice, they will give you a nice experience.
Kamil was responsive to all of my questions.His staff was very helpful . This was a in quiet part of town very close to the major sites and the Tram
Staff was very friendly and helpful. Had trouble with air conditioning and someone came immediately. Was not able to solve problem but an least was able to meet the room comfortable.

Great location in the old city, very good breakfast included, wonderful staff on reception who take their role as host seriously,  great value.  Thanks for all your help in navigating the city and helping us  have an enjoyable experience.

Hôtel très bien située dans le quartier le plus touristique de la ville. La chambre était propre et confortable. Le personnel très sympa et toujours là pour répondre à vos questions. Très bon rapport qualité prix!

Immer wieder gern, super Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis! Es ist kein klassisches Airbnb, eher eine Pension. Das Frühstück ist gut, Tee und Kaffee stehen den ganzen Tag bereit. Da die Zimmer täglich geputzt werden, ist alles sehr sauber. Durch die zentrale Lage kann es nachts schonmal etwas lauter werden, aber dafür wohnt man mitten im Zentrum von Sultanahmet.

This review is for our second reservation at the same hotel on our trip, after we returned to Istanbul after visiting other sites in Turkey. I have reproduced the same review from our first stay at the hotel:

Our stay at Sultan's Inn was a wonderful experience. I and my friends chose this place because of all the positive reviews it had received, and our experience corroborates everyone else's reviews! Sultan's Inn is an affordable and well-organised hotel. Our rooms were cleaned and tidied up everyday while we were out, dirty dishes were replaced and clean towels were provided. We never needed to request anything because it was all taken care of seamlessly.

The staff at Sultan Inn is very courteous, friendly and professional. They are well-informed about local sights and the ways to reach them. Sometimes their recommendations for guided tours and transport options are more expensive than the alternatives we found by ourselves, but their recommendations were still useful nevertheless. In particular, the hotel's airport pickup service is more expensive than local taxis. But this service was useful for first-time visitors to Turkey like us, since we'd have otherwise found it difficult to navigate our way to the hotel from the airport.

Also, the breakfast buffet is one of the best we've ever had, with a really sumptuous selection of foods for every taste! I'm not typically a morning person, but I woke up extra early just to make sure I got a crack at those amazing sausages, boiled eggs, baked potatoes, black olives, creamy yogurt with three different flavours of jams, chocolate brownies, and much more!

Finally, Sultan's Inn is very conveniently located at the heart of the Sultanahmet district in Istanbul. The area is fairly touristy, and Istanbul's local residents don't frequent it much. But for those of us visiting the city to take in all the famous sights like the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace, most hotels in Sultanahmet are a mere 7 to 10 minutes walking distance from all these places. In partcular, Sultan Inn is situated at an intersection with a taxi stand, so for residents in need of private transport, it is very easy to find one right outside the hotel.

My only point of dissatisfaction was that the rooms were smaller than we expected. The photographs posted on Airbnb appear slightly 'stretched', giving the appearance that the rooms are longer than they really are. This could be just a function of the camera that was used to take the photographs, but it is worth bearing in mind for visitors who plan to spend a lot of time in their hotel rooms. Sultanahmet is so beautiful that we were barely in the hotel except at night, so it didn't really affect us.

All in all it was a good experience, and I would recommend this hotel to anybody visiting Istanbul!
Great place to stay, helpful staff and just so close to beautiful places to visit. Even though we were but two days the whole experience was rich in every sense and will stay with us.

Alihan i personal ochen gosteprimni, na terasse vidno Sultanahmed jome i mramornoe more. Blisko v sentre i tramvaynie ostanovki, 2 ostanovka do GrandBazara, 2 ostanovka do Eminunu to tuda v storonu Azia Uzkuder. Ya dovolen mne ponravilsya sposibo personalu.
All good perfect for cheaper price
Очень в хорошем месте, дёшево.

Nice hotel with friendly people in a very central area, just a very short 5 minute walk from Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. Tons of great Turkish restaurants in the neighborhood too. The walls of the room we stayed in are somewhat thin, so noise from cars passing by on the street or people talking in the hallway may be an issue for light sleepers, but otherwise I have very little to complain about.
Excelente ubicación a pocos minutos de la estación de Tranvía,  de la mezquita azul y Santa Sofía, casi todo el centro se conoce caminando .  Buen servicio en el hotel y personas amables.

name: 1BR 5 minute walk to Times Square
summary: An amazing sunny one bedroom apartment just steps from one of New York's trendiest neighborhoods and a short walk to Broadway and Times Square.
description: An amazing sunny one bedroom apartment just steps from one of New York's trendiest neighborhoods and a short walk to Broadway and Times Square.
house_rules: Please kindly remove your shoes on the rug. That's it!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm from a suburb of Sacramento Ca, called Folsom. My mom has owned a dance studio since I was 3 so I grew up tap dancing and that's what I'm still doing today. I've lived in New York for 8 years now and have done Broadway, Cirque du Soleil, and national and international tours and will probably continue to do so as long as these feet keep tappin'. I have a love affair with New York City but sometimes I need to GET OUT! I've stayed at many B and B's in the Hamptons and New England, but AirBNB seems to be the way to go these days! What else? I'm an avid snowboarder, semi expert dart player and play in 4 different NYC softball leagues, from the Broadway Show league to competitive men's leagues. I love the Boston Red Sox, The Green Bay Packers and the Sacramento Kings. (Odd combination, I know)

reviews.comments:
Quick Summary:  Perfectly clean, Great location, Excellent Host.


Luke made my New York Experience perfect. The apartment is right in the Hells Kitchen area, 5-minute walk from time square, great food and coffee. Luke was highly responsive to text messages and communication. This will be my top place to stay when I come back.

Luke was the perfect host! He is of extraordinary kindness and very responsive. He was attentive and tried to make our stay as special as possible with insider recommendations.
 The communication was very good although, unfortunately, we didn't meet in person. His friend, Cliff, who lived two blocks away and was also incredibly nice, handed the keys to us.

The apartment is in the middle of the theatre district in the trendy neighborhood, Hell's Kitchen, Manhattan, 5 minute walk to Time Square. The subway is just a few blocks away. It is the perfect neighborhood if you are in NYC for the first time, as we were, and if you like to feel the heartbeat of this great city. It is full of delis, bars, cafes, restaurants and, obviously, theaters. 
We felt very safe at any time and had no problem walking around alone at night.

The apartment is even better and bigger than on the photos, tastefully furnished and clean. There is AC, Wifi worked perfectly, the bed is comfortable. Only tiny disadvantage, it is on the 5th floor without elevator and narrow stairs, but that didn't affect our experience.
For light sleepers it is recommended to bring earplugs, as AC and the street are quite loud at night. 

All in all we had an amazing week in NYC, not least due to Luke and his lovely apartment!

We would definitely come back again!

We had an absolutely wonderful visit at Luke's apartment!  It is literally PERFECTLY located - less than a five minute walk to Times Square, the subway, and no more than 15 to Rockefeller Plaza.  The entire city was at our fingertips!  

The apartment is exactly as described, and it plenty large enough for a couple to share.  It was clean, cozy, and that VIEW out of the window at night is incredible.  Best part?  Luke is warm, hospitable, flexible, and incredible helpful.  Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Pictures do not do this place justice. it was awesome staying here! will definitely be staying here again. only "bad" thing is going up 5 floors with no elevator.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The place and location were great - exactly as described. The apartment was neat, clean and the host kindly left us coffee and water bottles (perfect after a long flight in!).

Thanks for an excellent stay!

Great place - clean, comfortable, apartment, eactly as advertised. I was in the city for business and it was a great space to sleep and work. I didn't meet Luke in person but he gave very clear instructions on how to collect the keys and was easy to reach by text at all times.

Easy to communicate with. Had a minor issue on how to open front door and he got back to us quickly. Easy to pick up keys. Place was as described and very clean. A little loud bc bedroom window on major street but otherwise no complaints. Would stay here again.

Both Luke and his apartment are exactly as described by everyone else--simply fantastic.  Luke made everything easy.  The apartment is really clean, well laid out, has lots of natural lighting, and is close to just about anywhere you need to go.  And I found the walk up 5 flights of stairs to be invigorating.

Apartment is even better than listing depicts!  Great size, very clean, comfortable, and "homey". Much larger than I was expecting for a New York apartment. Excellent location!! Convenient walking distance to most "tourist" and midtown areas, and easy train or taxi ride to lower manhattan. Luke was very accommodating and super easy to work with. We absolutely loved staying here, and would definitely stay here again in future trips.

Luke arranged the key for us, and the hand over was smooth.
The apartment was just as listed, and location was great.

El apartamento de Lucas es genial! Es un lugar perfecto para descansar de los intensos días descubriendo la ciudad , a 5 minutos de Times Square y en un barrio lleno de bares y restaurantes,lo recomiendo y volvería sin duda !  Luke es un anfitrión atento y muy amabl (Website hidden by Airbnb) Lukes apartment is great! It is a perfect place to rest from the intense days discovering the city, 5 minutes from Times Square and in a neighborhood plenty of bars and restaurants  I would definitely recommend ! Luke is attentive and very friendly host.

Luke's place was fantastic!!!  Talk about living the NYC life. If you want to know what it is like to live in the BIG city then this is the place. You could not ask for a cooler place, the heart of everything is just minutes away. 
My daughter had an audition 2 blocks away and Luke's apartment just made the trip that much nicer. She didn't get the part but just staying at Luke's  apartment right there was more then pleasing for her. She and I really like to visit NYC. 
He was a very good host even though he was leaving 2 hrs before we got there. The communication between Luke and myself was great, we ended up texting back and forth the entire time. 
I would not think twice about staying at his place again.
Luke's place is amazing! It's the perfect location for the 1st time NYC tourist. Luke was so easy to get in contact with and was an exceptional host. No need to improve anything, it was perfect!
Lovely space, located in a fun part of town, great host and excellent base of discovering New York!
Super emplacement !

Luke and his place were fantastic!
Easy, clear communication, even with my late arrival.
One of the most surprisingly spacious places I've stayed in Manhattan, close to everything, easy to get to from the JFK "E" train, and super clean.
Luke was a great host and I hope to be back!

Luke was very accommodating and quick to respond. His apartment is located in a great neighborhood, convenient to everything, we walked everywhere! Apartment was clean and organized, fantastic TV in the sitting room, for those evenings where you might want to stay in. I would recommend without hesitation Luke's apartment. Will definitely recommend to friends!

Luke's place is awesome. Great living space and even more amazing location. Super easy to walk to Times Square, public transportation, Hell's Kitchen, Bar's, The High Line, Central Park and more. Luke was great to communicate with and super accommodating. Will re-book on my next visit to NYC!
Couldn't recommend Luke's apartment enough, central location, great space, clean and comfortable. It has everything you'd want from an airbnb, perfect home base for exploring New York.
Great stay! Great location!

Everything was as expected. The apartment was very central, we walked everywhere. Times Square is really close. Also very close to shops, restaurants, laundromats. 

All in all it was a great place for the week we spent in NY.

Great communication, nice walk-up apartment with everything you need to be comfortable, Hell's Kitchen access to great restaurants Super close to Time's Square if you want that.  A bit noisy, but only in the bedroom.
Luke's place is in a great location! Also, he is easy to communicate with and very accommodating.

The location of the apartment was perfect and communication was a breeze with Luke. We could not have been happier with our authentic NewYorker-vibe for our trip to the city. We found great spots in the neighborhood and can't wait to go back soon-- I highly recommend and will rebook with Luke on future trips!

Check in and out really easy. Luke (and his friends who help him with the place when he's away), all made sure that we had the best time in NYC. 

If you've never been to NYC, you should know it's a really noisy city, and you may want to have earplugs. I think it applies to every place in the city though :)

The apartment is great, great comfy bed, great bathroom and living room.
Great place to stay in NYC, very good location. Near Times Square, metro stations and many restaurants and shops. Apartment was nice, clean and cozy. Would recommend this place to everyone!
Cool place.. exactly what I think of when I think New York. Great location was able to walk basically anywhere. Luke was very helpful and easy to get in touch with
Absolutely phenomenal place - beautiful, spacious apartment within a ~3 minute walk of Times Square. Lots of bars and restaurants in the area. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again!
The place was great, a short walk to everything and luke was such an amazing host. Perfect spot for tourists wanting to see NYC

name: At The Heart Of The Old Sultanahmet
summary: Great for families.  We offer you a cozy apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the ground floor.  The apartment is just 2 minutes away from Bluemosque and Hagia Sophia by walk. We can accommodate up to 7 people.
space: My apartment is just 2 minutes away from Bluemosque and Hagia Sophia by walk. The apartment is in a really great location very close to all the sights but still quiet at night.
description: Great for families.  We offer you a cozy apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the ground floor.  The apartment is just 2 minutes away from Bluemosque and Hagia Sophia by walk. We can accommodate up to 7 people. My apartment is just 2 minutes away from Bluemosque and Hagia Sophia by walk. The apartment is in a really great location very close to all the sights but still quiet at night. host.host_about:
Hayatın kısa olduğunu ve her anını değerlendirmek gerektiğini geç farkedenlerdenim ben de.


4 yıllık hostel işletmeciliği ve 3 yıllık dijital pazarlama deneyimimden sonra kendime daha fazla zaman ayırabilmek, yeni insanlarla tanışıp yeni tecrübeler edinebilmek adına AirBnb'de hostluk yapmaya başladım.

Yolculuk yapan insanlarla tanışmaya bayılıyorum.

Kendime ayırdığım zamanlarda bol bol geziyorum, İstanbul'un çok da bilinmeyen yerlerinde kamp kuruyorum, bisiklete biniyorum ve fotoğraf çekiyorum.

Çok önemli bir sıkıntı olmadıkça misafirlerimle yüzyüze de tanışmaya gayret ediyorum.

Yolculuk yapmayan insanların hep bir yanlarının eksik kaldığını düşünüyorum.

reviews.comments:
Mahmud is a great host. He made our stay a memorable one.
We( I , wife, father,mother and baby) reached very late at around 1 am in night.Mahmud was waiting for us. He welcomed us very well .He had arranged some food in refrigerator that helped us to eat at that time.

Apartment details:
The apartment is exactly the same as mentioned in the listing. 

Apartment is very comfortable and 4 people can stay very comfortably.
This apartment has every thing that you need on day to day basis.
The kitchen is very well equipped with gas stove, fridge, microwave, washing machine and lots of utensils.
the 2 bathrooms are very clean . 1 is very big and has an awesome shower.

Location:
Apartment is located in heart of sultanahmet. It is 4 to 5 mins by walk from hagia sophia , blue mosque, topkapi museum. We just had to step out of Apartment and pass by a lane near 5 star hotel 4 seasons and we come out near hagia sophia . There are lots of awesome restaurents nearby.
We found indian restaurent also near tram station. There are restaurents of all countries.
Tram station is 5 mins by walk. Tram connects to all important places like taksim, grand bazar, spice market etc.
Grand bazar is 15 mins by walk but it is better to go by tram as station us near apartment.
a big super market is just 500 metre near hagia sophia.

Conclusion:
We were very satisfied with the services, apartment and the location.
Istanbul is awesome. We were there for 3 days but felt that 3 days were very less.
We will visit turkey again and stay again in the same apartment.

Mahmud made us feel very welcome. He provided breakfast essentials and that was a relief after a long journey. He also gave us an Istanbul card to use the public transport. He was very helpful throughout our stay and was available whenever we needed anything. There is no daily cleaning service and as we were staying for 10 nights we paid extra for the apartment to be cleaned on alternate days.
The apartment was exactly like the photos. The second bathroom is basically a toilet only as the shower does not have a cubicle.  
The location was excellent. Close to everything so that we did not have to use a taxi. The tram station was a 5-10 walk. Although we were so close to the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace and many restaurants, our street was nice and quiet.
I would highly recommend this apartment.

Ev mükemmel bir lokasyonda Sultanahmet ve Ayasofya'ya 2 dakikalık yürüme mesafesinde. Sanırım yeni dekore edilmiş bir ev,her şey yeni ve çok temizdi. Buzdolabında bulduğumuz kahvaltılıklar ve içecekler çok güzel bir süpriz oldu :) Mahmud Bey'e misafirperverliği ve yardımları için teşekkür ederiz.

The flat is amazing and Mahmud is a fantastic host. It is exactly as shown in the photos, spacious and in an excellent location in the heart of the old town, within walking distance of all the major sites. The beds are comfy, and there is AC if you need it. 

Mahmud went above and beyond to provide us with basics like enough fresh drinking water for our stay, some bits and bobs in the fridge and plenty of toilet roll, as well as washing powder for the washing machine! Communication was quick and smooth, and Mahmud was very flexible given there were four of us arriving from 3 different places and different times!

Istanbul is a great city, and I would totally recommend staying here!

Mahmud was a truly excellent host and the apartment was clean and beautifully decorated. He went above and beyond to make sure our stay was the best. We spent time going over the map of the city and talking about things to see and eat in Istanbul. He was great at communicating and answered all of our questions. He had in depth knowledge of Istanbul.

We had a wonderful time in Istanbul at Mahmud's place. He is extremely nice. He waited for us at the house although we were late. He took time to look after us and tell us places to visit in Istanbul. He also helped us with the travel card which saved us lot of efforts. The house is extremely well located and connected. It had everything you will need during your stay. We went during the Ramadan time and since blue mosque was just 2 mins walk , it was quite a hustling bustling place. I stayed here for 4 nights and highly recommend this place.

Mahmud's "Guest Apartment" was absolutely wonderfully situated – literally a stone's throw from Aya Sofia, the Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace and all the "old part of Istanbul"...

Its rare to find a two room apart at this price and the layout was both functional as well as being well appointed – as in the pics.

Mahmud himself is a "prince".  Courteous, delightfully genteel, concerned and totally hospitable:  of all the AirB&B places I've been to, this hospitality was most liberally and generously expressed by his having stocked the fridge with enough breakfast basics for the four days we were there.

The only weak link is the WiFi connection which is somehow shared with the guest house next door and because it has to travel through a number of walls, only works in the front part of the house... But who needs WiFi when on vacation – Right...? :))

As a longtime and often visitor to Istanbul, this has been one of my better trips – and its success has been in large part due to the professionalism of the service offered.

And "yes" – I would most definitely recommend this Listing...!

Thank you, Mahmud...!

我也是看了其他游客的评价才选择了Mahmud的房子,结果真是象评价里说的那么好!房子的位置绝佳,就在蓝色清真寺和索菲亚教堂的旁边,但又很安静,离老皇宫走路10多分钟也到了｡我们早晚都会经过这些美丽壮观的著名古迹｡房间非常干净,宜家风格｡我们两家人,所以有两个卫生间十分方便,厨房的设备和餐具也很全｡附近超市的东西足够我们早餐食用,Mahmud又准备了些｡每天我们都是阳光早餐,而且有只小猫准时在窗台等候我们喂它香肠｡Mahmud特别友善,聪明,做事情周到,说英语速度有点快｡第一天到达后,给我讲了一大堆包括行程和买东西等等,都快成我以前的听力课了,非常有趣｡我们去之前正赶上新闻里的土耳其反华,所以特别纠结｡朋友一家都不想去了｡我每天通过邮件询问Mahmud,反馈到真实的信息,真是耐心和温暖｡果然,我们在伊斯坦布尔的四天,安全而且快乐｡谢谢你,Mahmud｡

The apartment is fantastic, in a great location, lovely and clean and well fitted out. It is a good place to be with children as it is near the attractions, and has a high chair. Mahmud is a great host, friendly, and happy to help with any questions. Our child was sick while we were there and Mahmud went out of his way to help us, snd was so lovely.

We had a wonderful stay in Mahmud's apartment. Great location, lovely rooms, air conditioning and well-equipped kitchen. It was extremely hot during our visit to Istanbul so coming back to the apartment after a day of sightseeing was a welcome and comfortable relief (it also helped that the apartment was such a short walk from the main attractions). Mahmud himself was a great host - we arrived early before the check-in time but Mahmud let us drop off our luggage and made sure the apartment was ready for us as soon as possible. He lives close by to the apartment so was always at hand for help if we needed it. All in all, highly recommended!

It was a lovely stay at Mahmud's apart. the apartment was on the ground floor  exactly like the pictures  every thing was perfect.  The apartment is located on a nice and quite street. The blue mosque, Hagia Sophia, Sultan Ahmet medan, and Arasta bazar are just about 2 minutes or less away. Also restaurants and coffees are near to us.
 Mahmud was so generous with us he put some food in the fridge and provided a fresh bread and also a water for drinking. He suggested some plans for visiting the area .I recommend this apart u should really stay at :)  
Thank u so much Mahmud.

الشقه روعه تقع في الدور الارضي  نفس الصور المعروضه بالضبط  مسجد السلطان احمد واياصوفيا واراستا بازار وساحة السلطان احمد  كلها قريبه تقريبا دقيقتين او اقل  والمطاعم ومحلات القهوه قريبه  الشارع جدا هادي وجميل وكمان البقالات قريبه المطبخ مجهز بكل شي  محمود كان شخص رائع وكريم وفرنا لنا خبز طازج ومويه للشرب  وحط في الثلاجه بعض الاكل. ماقصر اقترح علينا بعض الخطط لزياره الاماكن السياحيه وعلمنا بكل شي يخص المنطقة رائعة جدا وانصح فيه

Mahmud's apartment in Sultanahmet was just what our group of three needed to enjoy our experience in Istanbul. It's walking distance to Aya Sofia, the Blue Mosque, Topkapi (s a quieter neighborhood so it may take 5-10 mins of walking the streets). Highly recommend staying at this property!

Excelente experiencia. Mahmud fue muy atento y se ocupó de que todo estuviera a la perfección. El
Departamento es muy cómodo, todo funciona bien. Esta muy bien ubicado. Volvería a alojarme aquí.

The flat is ideally located to discover Istanbul's historic sites. The flat is located in a quiet street about a minute walk from Sultan Ahmed mosque. The description was accurate.
The flat is superbly organized and all appliances are in full working order. It was clean and accommodated us with our three children very nicely.
Mahmud was there when we arrived. He was very kind and helpful. He made us feel relaxed and welcome. He gave us a lot of tips regarding visiting interesting sites in Istanbul. He organized our pick up and our transport back to the airport. He was available to help on most days.
I was sure we will be back to this flat at some stage in the future. I will give the flat and Mahmud 10 out of 10.
I would have no hesitation in recommending the flat and Mahmud to anybody. You will never regret staying in this flat and you will be delighted to deal with this lovely man.

We are four girls, who have been staying in Mahmouds apartment for six night. 
Mahmoud welcomed us with Turkish specialities in the fridge and he guided us in what he would recommend us to see in Istanbul. We exchanged phone numbers and was told to contact him if we had any questions or if anything in the apartment was wrong. One day we had a problem with the heater for the water, and there was no warm water. Mahmoud came immediately and had it fixed very fast. 
The apartment was very nice and clean and the location is perfect. The only thing that wasn't perfect, was creaking beds. 
We would definitely recommend others to stay at Mahmouds place.

This apt is fantastic, as well as the host. Great location and neighborhood - 3 mins walk to Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia, lots of cafes nearby. Great apartment - white IKEA style and super clean, beds, even sofa beds are comfortable. Our host, Mahmud is so nice, he welcomed us in person and gave us a city map, a metro card, and some tourist recommendations. Communication with him is very effective. The apt is on ground floor so you don't need to worry about heavy luggage. Overall speaking, unforgettable experience for my first stay in Istanbul. I will remember the breezing nights walking from bars to home with lovely dogs following. I will definitely come back to Mahmud's apt next time if it's available. Highly recommend. : D

Mahmud was a fantastic host. He arranged our airport transfers and greeted us in person even though we arrived past 10pm in the evening. He was also very thoughtful and left us some breakfast supplies for our convenience.
The apartment was very clean and is as shown in the photos. Location is very central, within 5-10 mins walking to the major attractions in Sultanahmet, and is very close to restaurants as well.
My friends and I definitely enjoyed staying at the apartment, and would stay there if we visit Istanbul again!

محمود شخص رائع، بذل كل ما يستطيع ليجعل رحلتنا مميزة. أجاب على أسئلتي الكثيرة بكل سعة صدر. رتب لنا وسيلة نقل من وإلى المطار بسعر معقول، كذلك وفر لنا بطاقة استخدام النقل العام في اسطنبول، كما وفر لنا جالون ماء كبير ووبعض العصائر والمأكولات الخفيفة.

الشقة جميلة جداً، وهي مطابقة تماماً للصور المعروضة والوصف المكتوب عنها. وهي تقع في شارع هادئ جداً على الرغم من أنها تبعد دقيقتين فقط مشياً على الأقدام من جامع السلطان أحمد ومتحف حاجية صوفيا. يوجد بجانب الشقة بقالتين صغيرة، وصالون حلاقة، ومغسلة، وعدد من المطاعم والمقاهي.
محطة الترام القريبة منها هي محطة السلطان أحمد، وهي تبعد أربع دقائق فقط مشياً على الأقدام. ويوجد حول المحطة عدد من محلات صرف العملات، والكثير من المطاعم ومحلات الحلوى التركية.

الحي هادئ جداً، وهو في المنطقة المركزية وهو ملاصق لميدان جامع السلطان أحمد، وحديقته، ومتحف حاجية صوفيا،  وفي هذا الميدان العديد من فروع ومندوبي شركات السياحة والتي توفر رحلات متنوعة داخل إسطنبول وإلى المدن المجاورة لها مثل بورصة وما حولها.

هناك فرصتان للتحسين في هذه الشقة، وهما ضعف الإنترنت خلال المساء، وكذلك عدم وجود قنوات تلفزيونية بغير اللغة التركية، وقد وعد الأخ محمود بحلهما.

أنا أنصح بشدة بالتعامل مع محمود والاستفادة من هذه الشقة لمن يحتاج لسعتها وقربها من المنطقة المركزية.

Mahmud is a wonderful person. He did his best to make our journey a distinctive one. He answered all my questions. He arranged for us the transportation to and from the airport at a reasonable price, as well as provided us with a card to use public transportation in Istanbul, also provided us with a gallon of water and some  juices and snacks.

The apartment is very nice. It is completely identical to the photos and the description. It is located in a very quiet street, although it is only two minutes walk away from the Sultanahmet Mosque and the Museum of Hagia Sophia. Near to the apartment, there are two small grocery shops, a barber shop, a laundry, and some of restaurants and cafes.

The nearest tram station is Sultanahmet station, which is only four minutes away on foot. There are around the station a number of currency exchange shops, and a lot of restaurants and Turkish sweets and delights shops.

The neighborhood is very quiet. It is in the central area and next to the square of Sultan Ahmed Mosque, its garden, and the Museum of Hagia Sophia. In the square, there are  many branches and representatives of tourism companies which provide a variety of trips in Istanbul and the neighboring cities such as Bursa and its surrounding.

There are two opportunities for improvement in this apartment. The Internet connection was weak during the night, as well as the lack of Non-Turkish TV channels in the cable. Mr. Mahmud has promised to improve these two points.

I would strongly recommend to deal with Mahmud and to take advantage of this apartment for anyone who needs its capacity and its location in the central area.

Many thanks to Mahmud and Airbnb

Mahmud was extremely friendly and helpful. He met us late at night and was always on hand to answer questions or provide info. The accommodation was perfect - clean and tidy, and so close to all the main attractions in Istanbul old town. We pushed the small single bed up against the double for our baby to sleep on next to us, which worked well.
房子位置非常好,距离蓝色清真寺和圣索菲亚大教堂都只有100多米的距离,周围也有很多餐馆,非常方便｡房子的装饰也非常温馨,干净,设施都很新｡重要的是房东人非常友善｡下回去伊斯坦布尔还会再去住

Mahmud is a great host. He was waiting for us very early in the morning and helped us with the early checkin.

He is very helpful by providing us with the transportation card of Istanbul and answering questions like cellphone card, recommend restaurants, transportation and other useful information instantly by (Hidden by Airbnb) .

The apartment is just the same as the pictures on the Airbnb. Very clean and cozy. Equipped with Ikea furniture. There are many kitchen appliance so that we can easily cook by ourselves.

The location is the best and convenience. 3 minute  walk from Blue Mosque and AyaSophia, and 5 minute walk from Sultanahmet tramway station and Topkapi Palace.

Highly recommended place. I have already shared the apartment with my friends and other travelers who will go to Istanbul for sightseeing.

Mahmud's apartment in a great location, you can walk to Blue Mosque in two minutes, and walk to the tram in five minutes which can take you to all the beautiful places in Istanbul. There are many lovely restaurants and cafe around the apartment. Every thing in the apartment are new, you can live comfortable there. Mahmud is a really nice man, he arranged the airport transfer for us, and waiting us even our flight is arrive at midnight. He bring us the breakfast on the next day, the bread and juice are really delicious. He also give us many useful information about Istanbul travel, and provide a traffic card for us which can make us easy to take the Tram and Metro in Istanbul. I will suggest every one to stay here when they travel to Istanbul, very nice stay here.

Mahmud was really helpful and a kind host! We told him that we'll arrive at his place few hours earlier than the check in time without specifying the time. To our surprise, when we reached at his place, he was there waiting for us from the morning (Really sorry about that). The apartment was great and located at the ground floor which is quite convenient since we brought many heavy bags. It was clean and looked exactly the same from the pictures.  The apartment is 10 mins away from sultanahmet tram station and located very near to hagia sophia and blue mosque! The best part about staying at this apartment is that we get to see blue mosque and hagia sophia every single time we walk back to the apartment. Thank you mahmud for your hospitality and we'll definitely stay at your place when we come back to Istanbul one day!

Great apartment in a perfect location for being right amid all the main sights of Istanbul. Mahmud was very helpful, met us at the apartment despite our arrival being after midnight and returned the next morning to offer more advice.  He also left us a travel card for the public transport system and basic supplies in the fridge - most welcome!

Great stay ! The place is clean and cosy, very well located for a first tip in Istanbul. Mahmud is very nice and available. We could check in and check out easily thanks to his flexibility. Thank you again !

Everything was perfect! Starting from Mahmud's welcome, the appartment itself, the location. This was our first AirBnB experience and we would definetely recommend 
a) using the service
b) Mahmud's appartment

Mahmud was gastfreundlich und hilfsbereit. Die Wohnung ist sauber und gemütlich. Super Lage!!! Alles war einfach und toll. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Danke Mahmud!!!

كانت هذه أول تجربة حجز لي خارج نطاق الفنادق، وهي تجربة بالفعل موفقة ولله الحمد ومحمود رجل ثقة وأعانني في بعض الأمور كالحصول على تاكسي وتوفير بطاقة الترام من لحظة دخولي للشقة والتي بدورها كانت في مستوى أفضل مما توقعته وموقعها من أفضل مواقع السكن في منطقة السلطان أحمد.
ولن أنسى صنيع محمود عندما نسينا الجوال في الشقة ونحن في طريقنا للمطار فاتصل فوراً بصاحب التاكسي وانتظر خارج الشقة في الجو البارد، فشكراً له.
...
Most reviewers already said what I want to say, this apartment really deserve all the positive reviews to date. Great location, great host...etc
At last night he arranged a taxi for transporting us to the airport, after a minutes he called the taxi immediately because my wife forgot her phone! Thank you very much.

Really Cosy apartment, super convenient location, in a quiet and very safe area, near mini markets, all key touristy locations is a very short walk away and most importantly.. A really Superhost. Warm, friendly, informative and ever will to help with anything. Mahmud is not just a superhost but also a super concierge! As we left his flat, it was like leaving a friend. Thank you for the great hospitality sir.

Very cosy and spacious apartment, clean and well furnished. Best location possible for tourists, conveniently located actually 5 minutes by foot from Hagia Sofia/Blue Mosque/Cisterna Basilica. Mahmud has been extremely friendly and helpful, unfortunately I wasn't able to meet him in person. Very recommended especially if you're going to Istanbul with the primary intent to visit the ancient city. Perhaps Sultanahmet is not the most vibrant neighbourhood of the city, but quite and clean, with no doubt the most fascinating and rich in history.

TWO THUMBS UP! 
All of us were very pleased with Mahmud's Apartment.

To begin with, Mahmud is easy and pleasant to deal with. He replies via (Hidden by Airbnb) instantly. Even though I arrived late (due to loss baggage issues at the airport) and he had other obligations, he still waited for me at the apartment and even gave me a quick lesson over the map (which he provided together with the Istanbul Public Transportation Card) on how to get to the nearest Tramp Station, grocery store, recommended restaurants, money changer, places of interest and etc. Mahmud was also kind enough to provide us with fresh bread, milk, juice, eggs, cheese and etc! upon our arrival.

Pictures and descriptions are all accurate. Kitchen and bathroomS well equipped. Beds, chairs and couch all comfortable. Individual doors to every room for privacy. 

Location, location, location. Mahmud's GROUND FLOOR Apartment is a 4 minute easy walk (no steep slopes) to Sultanahmet Tramp Station. The fact that you are walking by (between) Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia makes it a very scenic walk. Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace entrance, Arasta Bazaar, Turkish Islamic Arts Museum, Basilica Cistern ALL within 5 minute easy walk from Mahmud's Apartment. Even with such close proximity, the apartment is still peaceful and quiet day and night.

I HIGHLY RECOMMEND Mahmud's Apartment for your Istanbul visit.

Mahmud was an excellent host and was present when we arrived. He was very helpful and courteous. The house was clean and well maintained. Bathrooms were clean and everything worked. Throughout our stay Mahmud was available via phone and visited us frequently. Overall we enjoyed our stay and would recommend him.
Fantastic! The apartment was very warm, clean and tidy. Mahmud was very generous and helpful host. Fabulous location with all the major attractions of Sultanahmet within a couple of minutes walk.

Mahmud was a great host. Sat down with us on the first day with a map and showed how to get our way around. Generous with his information. Even offered to bring us around his hometown of Bursa. 

Location of his flat was also really convenient! Really love my stay there!

Sultanahmet vs Taksim Square. The decision was not easy. After I booked Mahmud's place my friends on the trip kept suggesting we cancel this one and book something at Taksim Square. But when all four of us moved to Mahmud's place we realised what a wonderful decision it was. His house may be a trifle small for four but it's very well appointed, tastefully decorated and well located. You could walk to Blue Mosque or Hagia Sophia in three minutes. His flat is close to anything that is mediaeval in Istanbul. We went to Taksim Sq but were not impressed at all. It's noisy and unruly. Sultanahmet is the place where you can spend days without getting bored. There is so much to see. Mahmud's house is in the middle of all the touristy attractions and yet the lane is sublime and quiet. 
To top it all Mahmud is a non-interfering, 24x7 available host. He is incredibly helpful and amazingly friendly. All four of us spent five nights there and we all felt we had the comfort of home away from home. Thanks very much Mahmud for being a class host. Cheers
Great Apartment. Mahmud is extremely helpful Host. The location is good walking distance from old town major sights. I would stay with Mahmud Apartment again If I travel  in Istanbul.

Mahmud was an excellent host. Apartment was exactly like in the pictures, very cleaned. Bathroom & kitchen were well equipment (plenty of utensils in the kitchen, almost 10 towels, etc. ). Because we had a small kid with us he arranged for us a child seat, opened the central heating (outside were 18-20 degrees).

I have traveled around the world staying in hotels from 2* up to 5*. This was my first time when i have used Airbnb but due to the way Mahmud served us (always smiling, always helpful, great English)  I can say it was one of the best accommodation used.

Wonderful place where you can call home for few couple of days when in Istanbul. House is well design and complete with what you need during your stay, location is convenience for Sultanahmet area; not too far, not too noisy. More importantly since I was with my parents, they feel comfortable at the place.
Mahmud is such a great host. Yes, he deserve Super Host status... 
Highly recommended

it was my 1st using two air B&B I was worried about the quality....BTW, I arrive before my check in time and he welcomed me the home was amazingly clean and cozy... and he has put some food fore us in the refrigerator....
all in all it was a great experience

太棒的体验!房子距离索菲亚2.3分钟路程｡Mahmud太热情,英语是土国十几天里听到最好的,最没口音的,差不多一次就能懂,哈哈哈!另外给我们准备了公交卡让我们充值使用,还自己备注了地图上的重要景点,超市等等｡五个人住正合适,厨房做了两顿中餐,Mahmud还在冰箱放了饮料面包鸡蛋给我们｡最最重要的是,有两个厕所,这点很重要!真的去哪都很方便｡我们住了四晚,这里必须给出最高评价!强烈建议朋友们来!在3月土耳其爆炸频发的时候,我发信息给Mahmud,他还安慰我,真是太nice!
Mahmud is the greatest host ever! Loved his place! Super beautiful decor and amazing location! I'll definitely stay there again when I return!

Staying in Mahumuds place was a breeze! He was there to welcome us and he had stocked his very lovely house with some food for breakfast and fresh water. 
He was very accomodating and always helpful. His house is central in a lovely neighbourhood, close to all the historical sites, the tram station and still manages to be peaceful and quiet. Lots of grocery shops and restaurants nearby. My family and I really enjoyed staying there.

One of my best AirBnb stays! The apartment is beautifully decorated, newly refurbished and super comfortable. It's situated in the heart of lovely Sultanahmed, just steps away from the Blue Mosque, Aya Sophia and other historical sites of the zone. It's nestled in a cobblestoned, cosy street next to some of the best restaurants (including Palatium Cafe). But the best of it all is Mahmud, a wonderful and kind host who is there anytime you need him. He took time to explain us how to move around and what to see and was there when we needed him. Unfortunately, we were in Istanbul during the military coup but Mahmud was there for us and his apartment was the best shelter we could imagine during this turbulent time. We ADORED your place Mahmud and we will surely come back!

The host was very good 
Fantastic location 
Good rooms and bathrooms 
Every thing in sultanahmet is near to you
Thank you my friend muhamed for your hospitality 
There was a small problem with water in all of sultanahmet in first day but muhamed helped us to find solutions for it (a very good man)

Placed at the centre of the core city, Mahmud's apartment is perfect for the tourist's for stay and move around in the city.  A few minutes walk from the tramway, a few minutes walk from the Sultanahmet park (which is surrounded by the sultanahmet mosque, Hagia Sofiya, museum, etc), and also great restaurants and dessert cafe's. As for the apartment it was neat and tidy with all basic amenities. Mahmud is a great host, who knows everything about the city from best cafes to restaurant to how to reach a particular place etc. Highly recommended place to stay at a reasonable price.

Mahmud is like your best friend in Istanbul and his appartement is the place that you always spend your vacations in Istanbul! This is the best experience of a place that I got via airbnb! I recommend his hospitality to all the traveler to Istanbul! If you have chance to visit Mahmud just go for it ( if you are lucky enough)!

Location was perfect. It was close to main historical places and the tram station as well. The house is complete with all your needs, it is just like a typical home. The host/owner Mahmud is kind, helpful and has attended when we needed something. Overall the house is just the perfect place to stay when you are in Istanbul.

If you are visiting Istanbul look no further. Mahmud's apartment was great. The location is walking distance to the main sites and plenty of eating opportunities. Public transport is close by. The apartment is as pictured, clean and comfortable for 4 people. I would highly recommend this apartment.
Everything's perfect. Mahmud's place is very clean and his hospitality is really good. I totally will stay at his place next time. He deserved to be super host :)
Great host and great flat in perfect location 5 min walk from Blue Mosque and many other sites.
老板很负责任,从定了房一直到入住,他都在反复确认行程和时间,以方便顺利交接｡房子很好,朋友决定伊斯坦布尔的一周就交到这里来了｡
We enjoyed our stay here..everything is perfect...i have no complaint at all..Mahmud  is great host. I will definitely come back here, thanks

We stayed for 5 nights at Mahmud's apartment.  It is spacious, cozy, modern & fully equipped. The 2 bathrooms & the location which is just 5 minutes away from the Blue Mosque, Aya Sofya, and the tram station are a big plus. There are grocery stores, cafes and restaurants in the vicinity of the apartment which makes it convenient to get our daily needs. Mahmud made several recommendations to us and even went to great lengths to explain how we can get to Bursa for a day trip. The Istanbulkart which we used for the tram & ferry rides was also provided by Mahmud (please return it to Mahmud so that his next guests can use it). He even provided us some food and ingredients in his fridge and kitchen. He also addressed whatever concerns with us immediately, which we truly appreciate. Mahmud is truly a Superhost!

Good apartment. Mahmud was very helpful. Location is excellent within walking distance to Blue Mosque, Hagia Sofia and Topkapi Palace

Also within walking distance to Sultanahmet Tram Station.

We were spending our time at Mahmud's apartment on December 23rd - 28th 2016. Mahmud is  really a superhost,  he was easily to be contacted everytime we needed him.  The house is very clean,  the first impression when we get there is the house is super comfy, very cozy and warm, and had a very nice (Website hidden by Airbnb) like greets us with its unique scents.. All the rooms have a nice view.. All the heaters are awesome. We spent our time in Istanbul in the most cold weather that time, but in Mahmud's place, we never felt any cold, we felt warm all the time. As a parent, I am very grateful for this bcoz we brought our lil baby n his 2 elder brothers, and obviously it helped us alot (to feel warm all the time). The surrounding environment and neighbourhood are very safe and friendly.. 
And the location is very accessible by feet to all tour objects and the places of interest. 
After all, the apartment has only one little minus,  that is the drainage hole in the shower box in the main bathroom was not working well,  even though  the water would slowly going out after very long time.  But of course it can be manageable easily. 
All in all,  we loved to be there and one day if we would go back to Istanbul, for sure we would like to try Mahmud's other apartment that have a sea view. 
We are highly recommend the host and his apartment !!

Mahmud is a great host. He helped us to arrange a taxi from the airport, gave a lot of useful information about the places to see, nearest restaurants, shops, etc. The place was exactly as described, several minutes walk to Haya Sofia and Sultanahmet Mosques. Apartment was clean and well equipped with everything we needed for a stay with our kids. I loved the place the minute I came in and would certainly recommend to everyone who wants to spend time in Istanbul in a place which will feels like a home and not like hotel.

We were 2 couples, with a couple of days to visit Istanbul. The location was perfect for us, we walked all around Sultanahmet. We never felt unsafe.
The appartment was clean and warm (it was snowing outside !), and Mahmud was a perfect host. He recommended us some places to visit or eat. He also booked us a taxi when needed.
We definitely recommend this appartment !
****
Nous étions 2 couples avec seulement 2 jours pour découvrir les lieux principaux d'Istanbul. Localisation parfaite, à 2 pas de la Mosquée Bleue et de Sainte-Sophie. Nous avons pu tout faire à pied.
L'appartement était propre, très bien chauffé.
Mahmud nous a très bien conseillés sur les lieux à visiter ou pour dîner.
Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir !
Mr Mahmud is a very nice person, helpful and super friendly. His apartment very clean, cozy and easy access to public transport. It's only 200 meter from Sultanahmet Mosque. Everything is superb!

The apartment is great and close to everything that you would need. A lot of shops and restaurants around. Just few minutes walk to Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace and the Tram station. Mahmud is a great host and very helpful. Would definitely stay here again if I am in Istanbul.

Mahmud's place is a good choice. It's very close to Sophia and Sultanahmet and if you want to explore other areas you can go to Sultanahmet tram stop and move easily all over the city. The apartament itself is very cosy and Mahmud tries to help as much as he can. I definitely recommend this place.

We stayed at Mahmud's place for a few days last week as we wanted to explore Istanbul.  Mahmud was a great host, always available when we needed him.  His place is very central in old sultanahmet, just few mins from blue mosque, Hagia Sophia and other monuments.  The place was cozy as we were 6 people but totally doable.

Mahmud was an excellent host. He met us when we arrived--earlier than check-in, but he didn't have a problem with that. He explained everything in great detail and pointed out some nearby restaurants. His apartment was very clean and spacious. The location couldn't be better...literally a 2 minute walk from the Hagia Sophia. He graciously allowed us to check-out late on our last day because we had a late night flight. Everything was perfect, I would definitely recommend Mahmud and his place to anyone!
La disponibilità di Mahmud è stata impeccabile. Comunicazione in inglese ottima.

Мы с семьей останавливались  в квартире Махмуда на неделю и нам все очень понравилось. Во-первых, прекрасное расположение в историческом центре, в пешей доступности до основных достопримечательностей. Во-вторых, очень удобная современная и светлая квартира со всем необходимым для пребывания семьи. И конечно, очень внимательный хозяин. При встрече Махмуд дал нам много полезной информации о достопримечательностях, транспорте, кафе, магазинах и даже позаботился о нашем завтраке. Пожалуй, это один из лучших опытов с Airbnb, с удовольствием вернемся сюда еще раз.
We had a lovely stay in the Mahmud's apartment ! The flat is modern, well equipped , bright, and located in the old center within walking distance to snowing attractions. Mahmud is  a perfect host, very responsive and understanding. We can definitely recommend and looking forward to come back !

Alle positive Aspekte werden bei anderen schon gesagt haben. Ich würde nur nur hinzufügen, wenn wir zu hause erreicht hätten, haben wir im Kühlschrank viel zu Essen gefunden! Außerdem hat Mahmund uns für 4 Tage Trinkwasser vorbereitet, ohne gar keine Zahlung.  Am Ende wollte ich sagen, das Haus ist noch größer, als was in der Photos aussieht!
Great location, just down the hill from the Blue Mosque and Hague Sofia.  On a almost dead end street so it was nice and quiet.  Area was very walkable.  Mahmud was available whenever we needed.
This place is awesome, just two blocks from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofía on a quiet street with shops and restaurants everywhere.
All i can say go ahead and rent this place don't hesitat

Mahmud is a great host! Very friendly, helpful, reachable anytime with prompt response. He made everything so organized and very easy for us. Our flight was later in the day and he accommodated us for a longer check out. His apartment is fully equipped with everything a household needs. Very clean, bright, and first floor in a small building. The location is amazing, only 3 minute walk to Sultan Ahmed Mosque. 
We were 5 adults and a child and it was just perfect. Thank you Mahmud for this great experience ☺️

Mahmud es un excelente Anfitrión, nos dió indicaciones de cómo llegar desde que estuvimos en el aeropuerto, y estuvo pendiente hasta nuestra llegada, la comunicación también fue excelente, el apartamento es hermoso muy limpio y el vecindario muy tranquilo, además está ubicado a pocas cuadras de la zona turística de Estambul, súper recomendado este lugar para hospedarse :)

Location is strategic in tourist area, so it's easy for you for exploring, walking distance for some of places i.e. Blue mosque, aya Sophia, basilica, tokapi palace and etc. its recommended to stay when you're in Istanbul. Mahmud was helped us to arrange airport pick up/drop with reasonable price of course. Overall, it's perfect!

Wish I could give this more than 5 stars. Unbeatable location just a 2 min walk from all the main attractions. Can't get enough of walking out everyday between the blue mosque and hagia sophia. Beautiful cosy house which is very clean and can easily accommodate 4-5 people. Also the owner Mahmud is extremely friendly and very helpful, weather it was allowing us a late check out, helping us with information and taxi rides etc. Thanks for a lovely stay in Istanbul.
Excelente localização, anfitrião atencioso e amigável e o apartamento é como descrito. Recomendo!

Все было отлично! Место замечательное: тихое, самый центр ( в трёх минутах от голубой мечети). В квартире есть все ...от шампуня до продуктов, неожиданно приобретенных под наш заезд. Сам хозяин очень радушный и отзывчивый. Конечно же если ещё вернёмся, то сюда. Рекомендю!

I have rented a few places in Istanbul and this was by far the best. The apartment was spotless, nicely furnished and possessed a great deal of charm. It is only a couple of hundred metres from the Blue Mosque, in a quiet street dotted with quaint shopes and lined with some of  the most beautiful Ottoman style hotels.
As fa as our host Mahmud is concerned, I cannot say enough good things about him. He was absolutely incredible. He received us as one would receive his family. He sat dowhn with us and told us about all the great spots in Istanbul.
Our luggage did not arrive on our flight and Mahmud got in touch with the relevant people and made all the necessary arrangements so that we could have our luggage the very next day.
If you are visiting Istanbul, look no further because this  the place for you.
Thank you Mahmud for making us feel so welcome. We look forward to our next visit.

Had a great experience! We had everything we needed in the apartment (towels, shower accessories, some food for breakfast to settle in for the first day). We also had help planning our trip in Istanbul, which couldn't have been done without Mahmud. Very polite and understanding. There was four of us staying and we are all pleased for choosing this place.
l'appartement de mahmud et très bien situé propre et agréable.mahmud est un hôte agréable gentil est très serviable,un grand merci

Mahmud was really welcoming and helpful. He understands the detailed needs of his gustes. We really cannot say it loud enough , THANK YOU very much Mahmud for making our stay very comfortable and nice. The  level of cleanliness was above excellent. Air conditioning worked great. Toiletries were readilly  available. The kitchen was extra-ordinarly well equippe (Website hidden by Airbnb) ( +efficient washing machince+ ironing table).Thank you for the refreshments in the fridge, it really helped us alot when we arrived at one o'clock in the morning. Mahmud helped us to arrange transportation from the airport to his apartment , and he was there waiting for our arrival at the door step at one a.m. ( one O'Clock in the early morning). He showed us arround the apartment and gave us very useful advice about the area and public transportation. Wi-Fi- was fast and reliable. Free drinking water is provided by Mahmud. He  made our holiday in Istanbual remarkable, as the apartment was only few minuites walk from Blue Mosques and the other popular tourist attractions. We are looking forward to stay in his apartment again.We would definitely give it more than five stars.
 Izzeldin Ahmed and family.

place was clean and very spacious as seen in the pictures. mahmud is more than helpful and helped us with all the information we needed. he provided us with a metro card and heaps of food in the fridge. he also recommended an absolutely amazing view for dinner. this location is perfect its right in the middle of everything. would stay here again and recommend it to everyone!

Where do I begin! Mahmud, is a phenomenal host and his place is perfect!!! The location of the apartment is in walking distance to every major site in the Old City "Sultanhamet" ...steps away from the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapi-Palast, and you can also take a 10-15 minute walk to the Grand Bazaar and Spice Market. There is also a local Bazaar within 2-3 minutes of the apartment. We had full wifi access, air condition, 2 full bedrooms which could actually accommodate a group of 5 or 6, 1 full bathroom and 1/2 bath with shower access, washer and area to dry clothes, iron/ironing board, TV access in all rooms, menus for near-by restaurants, and he also provided food for breakfast, bottled water, and soda(kitchen is equipped with all cooking needs and accessories)!!! Everything you need is in his place and if you need anything extra he was just a phone call or text message away. Mahmud, was extremely helpful prior to our arrival. He answered all questions I had, arranged transportation, and provided information on all sites and areas. His place felt like home to us and we look forward to visiting Istanbul again in the future!!

l'appartement est très propre très agréable pratique en plein centre d'istanbul ça nous a permi de passez de bon moment en famille. mahmud un hôte exceptionnel très serviable communicatif c'était super on reviendra.

Perfect location about 5 minutes walking from the Blue Mosque, entrance to Topkapi Palace, and Hagia Sophia. Mahmud let us and spent about 30 minutes with us showing us the apartment, going through the map of Istanbul, recommending activities and restaurants and even teaching us a few Turkish phrases. The house was nice and the entire stay was wonderful.
Highly recommended. Muhmod will do every effort to ensure nice stay in his place.

Mahmud arranged his cousin Mustafa to guide me to his apartment as he will not be in town for a few days. However, I did not find any inconvenience. Mustafa was really welcoming and he tried his very best to guide me to places I'm looking for. 

The apartment was easy to find. It is literally 2 mins walk away from Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. It is 5 mins walk from tram. Very convenient. 

The apartment was stylish and clean. It looks exactly as shown on the picture. We all love the place. 

Highly Recommended.

We were 5 adults .. and this is the first time we use this app, we really enjoyed the 3 nights stay.. Mahmud is a really nice and helpful guy.. the apartment is clean and fitted, very near to the tram by walking and to the blue Mosque, and other old town places
房子距离蓝色清真寺走路5-10分钟,IST机场打车来回是50-60里拉左右｡房东很热情,问了好些问题都尽力解答｡然后他好像每天都在附近晃悠……随时都能帮忙的｡有两个房间里可以把两张沙发变成床,但要提前说｡推荐
Very nice place and mahmud was very helpful
