neighborhood_overview: Take leisurely walks along the river and watch the fishermen. To play mini-golf in Passeio Alegre Garden.
transit: Bus, taxi or the electric bus.
access: Foz Velha is truly a special location where one can has a real feel of the old fashioned and picturesque local activities along with ample choice of modern restaurants,bars and beaches within a 3 minute walk. We offer a bed and breakfast service for individual guests and also the opportunity to rent the whole house for self-catering holidays.  We happily work to meet the best expectations of our guests by offering personalized services. We are ready to cater for special requests that can include airport pick-up,meals,car rental and guided tours in the Porto region and the fabulous Douro Valley.
interaction: Total availability for our guests.
house_rules: The house is in excellent condition.Please treat it as though it were your own . We accept pets until 4 Kilos. No-smoking policy inside the house.

address.government_area: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

reviews.comments:
Rosario was the sweetest host, we really loved her! She made us feel very welcome, offered us some of her delicious cake and cherries at our arrival and was very helpful about tips where to eat dinner, breakfast etc. 
The house is beautiful, newly renovated with very good taste and very comfortable, we even had our own little terrace. The location was ideal for us, since we wanted to stay close to the beach and not in the busy centre of Porto. The house is only 2 minutes from the sea, and we biked around the seaside and riverside, which was perfect for exploring the city and surroundings. There is also a tram going to the city centre and it was very convenient to take. I definitely recommend this place and Porto in general was a very happy new encounter. Will definitely be back and would love to stay at Casa das Laranjas again. Thank you Rosario!

name: Wow Historical Brooklyn New York!@!
summary: Beautiful two bedroom apartment located on a quiet tree line block, in the heart of the Caribbean community, a short 15 minutes walk or 5-7 minutes bus ride from the Subway station, only minutes to shops, Laundromats, and takeout restaurants.
space: The rooms are cozy with a homely feel.. Wireless Internet and cable television is available free of charge. The rooms are double and Quad occupancies. Clean towels and linens will be provided if needed.  You will feel like you're at home with a touch of hotel hospitality.  Brooklyn offers a variety of sightseeing attractions. Discover a city booming with museums and parks. The home is only a distance away from Coney Island, Williamsburg Art & Historical Center, Brooklyn Botanical Garden, Brooklyn Museum, Metro Tech Center, Prospect Park and Brooklyn Promenade.

host.host_about: Fit and sporty. I'm into fitness and speed (running speed that is). I had a brief  professional football career (Arena League). LOve Pets. I will rescue every stray and abused animal when I have the resources.  I have never met a stranger. I love to love, everyone is equal. Non judgmental and selfless. Laughter will always make your life better so my first objective is to make YOU laugh.

reviews.comments: thank AI very much for all.  AI is very kindly and helpful. We are satisfied with his appartment. My feet hurt, he gave me help; our friends have problem with the other hotel, he solved their problem without hestation. My friend booked the flight with a wrong date, he picked my friend back to the appartment and took her to the airport on the next day again.  thanks a lot...

In Al's house I feel like at home. it's nice, clean, comfortable and silent. He's considerate people. He decorated the the room with fresh flowers everywhere. We three live in a bedroom which reminds me of the time in dormitory in university. Everything in the kitchen can be used and cooked if you have time. Parking is also convenient.  In the nearby block, there 're many Chinese, Carriben restaurants, groceries.
Right at home

Al is the best host ever. He is nice, friendly and always willing to help. His place is clean, cozy and spacious. He even toured us around the area and showed us where to go, what bus to take etc. I would recommend his place. Bonus, his dogs are so cute.

Me and six friend went to Al's home for 4 nights and it was amazing! Al  was really nice and very helpful, first we helped with all our luggage (and believe me, it was a lot!), after he recommended us places to go and where to find basic thing like the bus stop and the train station.
The house was great for us, the rooms was clean and comfortable with individuals beds. It has a kitchen with pan, plates, cups and everything that we needed. I was a little far from manhattan, but was really ease to go: a bus and a train. 
A totally recommend him, it is awesome to a friend trip! Thanks for everything Al :)
Al was a pleasure to deal with, extremely kind and funny!

Al was such a nice kind host when we arrived he showed us around the area and helped us know where nearby stores were located and how to catch the train. Very comfy place nice and clean made us feel comfortable like home and we enjoyed our  stay would defiantly consider to stay here again! Thank you for everything

Al is a great host, me and my family stayed at his place and we had no even one complain. We were a family of 8 including one little girl 3 years old, Al even had a little bed for her, that was definitely a plus. 
The place was clean, in a nice and quiet area. Al was very helpful all the time and he even showed us around talking about the good places to eat, where to wash our clothes and he explained to us how the buses work. It was a pleasure deal with him and I totally recommend  his place if your looking for a comfortable place to stay in while you visit NYC.
The Apartment is really amazing, and Al is very nice and he is a great host, definitely will come again to him
My first experience with AiBnB was excellent. Al is a nice person and his apartment is very comfortable. Thanks Al for everything!

El sitio esta muy bien ubicado, cerca al metro y a las paradas de buses. supermercados y sitios para comer muy cerca y tambien del aeropuerto. Al es una persona muy atenta y servicial. Es la mejor opcion que pudimos tomar. Estamos muy agradecidos. Gracias Al por todo! Dios te bendiga y cuide amigo!

El espacio está bien para 8 personas. Tiene acceso a los servicios de transporte como autobús y tren subterráneo. Cuenta con todos los servicios de un departamento. El problema es el aroma por las mascotas y tiene insectos como cucarachas.

Al was very nice and accommodating. We really enjoyed our stay at his place.  We have future plans to stay with him again. We were able to get to subway station easily and there were plenty of stores and restaurants that were a block away. Overall, it was a great experience. Thanks Al

Al's place could do with a few repairs in the bathroom, but the rooms were great, and the apartment was sufficient for our needs. Easy access to public transport. Shops nearby. 
Most of all Al, was a wonderful host, answering questions, giving advice when asked, offering help.We are grateful to Al, because his help got us up and running and we made good use of our time there. By the end... I loved the place.

Al is a really great host. He's always available to answer any questions you may have. The house is in a location that is easy to access public transportation. There's bus stops about a block or two away from the house that take you right to the subway. There's also a bunch of Caribbean food places and grocery stores/markets in the neighborhood. Overall, staying at Al's place was great and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a nice place to stay in Brooklyn.
Al was very helpful and flexible. Any problem he would try to help with anything!  It was a great place!
Al's a really friendly and kind host! His place is comfortable to stay at & it is quite convenient to get around. It's a great place for a big group of 6-8 people.

Al is the best host you'll ever meet. Has everything ready for you when you arrive and then goes above and beyond by offering his help if you need anything. My friends and I had a great time at Al's and we can't wait to be back. If you're planning a trip to NYC book here first.
War soweit alles Ok, wahr aber sehr kalt.

The apartment is near bus stops that takes you to the subway stations. It's 40mins to 1 hour away from the city between taking the bus and subway. The apartment is homey and has everything you need. There are Caribbean restaurants nearby. Al was a great host and went above and beyond the first day helping me pick up my friends from the airport. We had a great experience here.
Al is a very good host.He pick up in the airport when we arrival.When we have any questions,he always answer us. In his house,it has a kitchen for us to cook.Al is nice and kind.
The place was great and comfortable to live in. Al is a great host and always here to help.

Al is a gracious host, very friendly and accommodating. I tripped the breaker on accident and he was there within 10 min. to fix it for us. It is smaller but cozy, lots of beds. Parking only on the road but we didn't have any issues with that.
Al was very helpful to find or way in this big city. His place was big enough to accomodate the 7 of us, and conveniently located.
AL nice guy and the house as well.
Al est super!!! Disponible surtout et abordable. Mais si pointilleux sur la propreté... !
If you are looking for a place to just sleep at while you visit New York, this place is really good

Al est très disponible et arrangeant. 
Appartement idéal pour un voyage entre amis !

S'était juste super pour nous , on était 6 adultes en vacances pour 11 jours et nous avons adoré notre maison et AL ,  s'est un chouette personnage, d'une grande gentillesse... le lieux est cool , cartier tranquille , pas loin du métro et de toutes commodités.. 
Nous avons passé un super séjour ... 
Merci AL... bisous de nous tous
This is a place you must live in if you're in Brooklyn
Al was a terrific host, helped out with parking, and even walked with us to show us what was around the block. We were a group of six and fit in very cozily. Would highly recommend Al's place, 10/10.

A good choice if you're looking for an affordable place to stay in New York.
The subway is a 15-minute walk from Al's location.
Easily accommodates up to seven guests.
A good place to stay, leave the luggage and have a nice experience in Manhattan.
Es un lugar muy agradable y tranquilo. Regresaremos

Al was incredible! A gracious host, knowledgeable explorer, and loving pet owner. He hosted us in a clean and warm environment and was accommodating till the end. Definitely recommend; if you’re staying in the city it’s a wonderful place to be.
Excelente servicio de Al y la ubicación de su casa es excelente a dos cuadras pasa un camión que te deja en el metro y el metro te lleva a todas partes :)

L'appartement de Al était dans un quartier réellement peu fréquentable et loin du métro.
L'appartement n'était pas en bon état (de très nombreux cafards dans la cuisine et la salle de bains sont apparus pendant notre séjour). Une odeur nauséabonde prédomine à l'entrée de l'appartement ainsi que dans la salle de bain. 
Les poêles et casseroles étaient entièrement brulées 
Cependant Al a été un hôte sympathique.

Al was very welcoming and accommodating when we arrived to his apartment. The apartment was just what we needed for a large group looking to see New York. Public transportation was only a few steps away and we enjoyed the great Jamaican food in the area.

Al ' s rental was perfect for lodging our family of 6 people during a week. Public transportation was easy to reach, even if a bit long, roughly one hour door to door with Manhattan, but we knew it before copine there. Al himself was very nice and helpful, and reactive, each time we had a question. The place is however not ideal if you want to cook or eat there (no big table, not enough chairs for 6), but of course you can find plenty of places to buy food around. The ratio quality/price is excellent for New-York. Thank you Al !

Great value for our stay in New York.

Al is a super host and very helpful with all our need.
Al was a great host. The apartment is good and has great connections to bus and subway. The neighboorhood is also nice with lots of restaurants and grocery stores a couple of blocks away.

Everything were in walking distance. We really liked the grocery stores in almost every bus stops. Public transport was easy to use. All bus stops were in short walking distances. We could manage back home from everywhere at anytime.

The Al’s apartment is great, even though we were group of 7 we had enough space. The neighbors were super nice to us, the subway is about 15 minutes from the apartment (by walking) by there is a lot of buses that can you take to the subway station or wherever you need. Al was amazing host and he gave us a lot of great tips. If we will ever be in NYC again we will definitely stay there again. Thank you!
Al was so friendly. He helped us. It was nice to stay with him.
Communication was quick and Al was friendly

Al's place was perfect for four of us for a weekend in New York. He met us and showed us to the upstairs apartment that was super spacious and had thoughtful touches in every room like air fresheners and bottle of water and some snacks! Easy to get Ubers around or 20 minute walk to subway.

Al was the best host for us so far with Air BnB, he was very friendly and helpful. He welcomed us with a fruit basket and guided us through the transportation mode throughout the city. He even introduced us to the locals so that we can inquire more about the food options nearby as per our choices. He was helpful when our flight was delayed and he managed to take care of our luggage for some extra time. No question about his hospitality, he is a cool person.
About the place, I and my friends had planned to only take rest at night and to stay out most of the time for visiting the attractions in NYC. If that's what anyone is planning then this is the best place offered at a reasonable rate in NYC. Overall, it was a good experience for us staying at Al's home.
This place was awesome clean and spacious would stay again next time I’m in the city Al was quick to response when we  had a question great guy

Our stay at Al’s place was excellent! First, as soon as I sent him a message to let him know we had arrived; he went outside to help us out with our luggages. Then, he showed/ explained and even went with us to show us around and how the city works. Finally, he treated us with a wine bottle at the end of our stay. House was cozy , it made us feel at home. In addition, it is close to the subway and is very spacious. My family and I are very content with our stay ; we were 6 adults & 2 children. We stayed for 10 days and enjoyed every single minute of it! Thank you Al for everything!!

name: Stunning Waterfront Marina bay house in Sai Kung
summary: Beautiful Hong Kong Waterfront house, full 180o sea view from all floors, situated at Sai Kung Marina bay, Very peaceful area, 30 minutes drive to Central or Tsimshatsui, accessible by public transport , Bus and 24 h minibus. Taxi ride to city cost about 150 hkd - 10 min fm Sai kung
space: Most stunning full sea view , waterfront house in Hong Kong, near boat clubs, golf, fishing, sport center, tennis, squash swimming pool, famous seafood restaurants, holidays place near vibrant city
description: Beautiful Hong Kong Waterfront house, full 180o sea view from all floors, situated at Sai Kung Marina bay, Very peaceful area, 30 minutes drive to Central or Tsimshatsui, accessible by public transport , Bus and 24 h minibus. Taxi ride to city cost about 150 hkd - 10 min fm Sai kung Most stunning full sea view , waterfront house in Hong Kong, near boat clubs, golf, fishing, sport center, tennis, squash swimming pool, famous seafood restaurants, holidays place near vibrant city All the house, parking space, terrace dining area. see stunning quite area pictures... Public transport, bus and 24 h minibus, easy cheap taxi on 5-10 min call.

reviews.comments:
Fantastic house
Awesome view outside
Nice house owner 
Valuable choice

We stayed a weekend at Sai Kung, Guillaume was an attentive host, showing us the place and the activity around.
The view from the large windows are nice, you can see the marina and the mountains, the atmosphere is quiet, close to nature.
The house herself is pleasant to live, with 2 bedrooms, kitchen, balcony and terrace all very bright.

Guillaume is a wonderful host. He came visit us and ran through a tour of his beautiful house. The sea view is truly stunning. 
House decor is nice, maintained in a good shape and clean. Guillaume also offered lots of useful suggestions on interesting places near by, along transport tips so that we can arrange ahead on check-out. Our family had a great time staying at his house.
A new experience in Sai Kung which we known it long time ago!
The host canceled this reservation 52 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
房子设计得不错,位置也临水,就是入住的时候,房子里没打扫干净,地面灰尘,头发很多｡房主赶快清理,但是我们坐在里面,人家打扫,还是很不自在的｡房主人不错,租车,租船很多信息都会给到你
I organized the house for some friends of mine. They said they had a great time. The perfect wkd with friends. Thanks
非常美好的体验,房东人很好,有机会还会再租的
I like this villa a lot! Nice view, beautiful (Website hidden by Airbnb) owner is helpful. We had a great time!

We really enjoyed our stay. A very spacious home and beautiful views from all three floors.  Great hiking nearby and just a short cab ride to Sai Kung.  This is a one of a kind property!  Couldn't have had a better stay.  Thanks Guillaume!!!
Great stay in a nice location

The sweeping views of Shelter Bay and the beautifully appointed villa were amazing, in a perfectly tranquil location a the edge of the water.
Make sure you take a hike to the secret beach (Trio Beach) and go into Sai Kung town for the best egg tarts and pineapple buns around at Sai Kung Cafe and Bakery.
Amazing house in a great location.

Beautiful Place! A bit cold but I guess I just had bad luck checking in during the coldest days in HK! Could totally imagine how much more lovely this place will be in summer when you can fully enjoy the outdoor space!
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Stylish Flat in BCN city center

space: Bright apartment which has been recently renovated . Direct access to the balcony from the bedroom. Perfect situation: Located on a quiet street in central and bohemian district of Gracia, only a few blocks from La Sagrada Familia and Park Güell, and few minutes from the beach (direct subway line ), 10 minutes from Paseo de Gracia, Las Ramblas and Plaza Cataluña. Parking lot a few meters away.
description: Completely renovated beautiful apartment in Gracia, one of the trendiest neighborhoods Perfect for couples on holiday in BCN Only 9min walk to Sagrada Familia, Parc Guell 15min , 10min by subway to the beach (direct line), 10min Paseo de Gracia Bright apartment which has been recently renovated . Direct access to the balcony from the bedroom. Perfect situation: Located on a quiet street in central and bohemian district of Gracia, only a few blocks from La Sagrada Familia and Park Güell, and few minutes from the beach (direct subway line ), 10 minutes from Paseo de Gracia, Las Ramblas and Plaza Cataluña. Parking lot a few meters away. Wi Fi Air Conditioning Gracia is one of the trendiest neighborhoods of Barcelona. PETS: Pets are not allowed in the apartment. MUSIC: In order to do not disturb the neighbors, music is not allowed after 10 p.m.

host.host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

address.suburb: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova
address.government_area: el Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

reviews.comments:
Nous avons été enchanté par notre séjour en amoureux dans cet appart, près du quartier bohème et branché de Gracia.
David nous a très bien accueilli, il est chaleureux, sympa et serviable. Merci David !
Le quartier est calme mais tout près de la Sagrada Familia et de l'animation de Gracia. L'appart est très confortable et décoré avec goût, avec un agréable petit balcon pour prendre le petit dej ou l'apéro.
Nous avons pu profiter de la formidable fête du quartier de Gracia tout en logeant au calme à proximité.
Bref, nous recommandons et y reviendrons :)

Cléa et Jeremy

Tanto el trato con David como el apartamento, han superado mis expectativas. 
David es encantador, educado, amable, en todo momento se ha mostrado disponible para ayudarme en lo que necesitara.
El apartamento es mejor que en las fotografías, más espacioso, acogedor y está lleno de detalles, además de muy limpio.
El barrio es perfecto si se quiere estar conectado con el centro en pocas paradas, o dar un buen paseo, y a la vez disfrutar de la tranquilidad, la calle es muy silenciosa. Está muy cerca de la Sagrada Familia y otros lugares interesantes.
Si traéis coche, en unas pocas vueltas, se encuentra aparcamiento gratuito en la calle sin problema, al menos en el mes de agosto que es cuando yo he estado.
Sin duda muy recomendable.
L'appartement était très propre et situé à côté de la Sagrada Familia, rien à redire dessus, nous étions très satisfaits de notre séjour.

David is the perfect host ! He was very attentive and kind. Before our arriving David gave us information how to get to apartments, so we found it easy, and then he picked us from the metro station. The location of his apartments is very good. It is located on quiet street, so it's very safe in the evenings. By the way there are a lot of shops and supermarkets, so we could buy everything we needed anytime. It took us 10 minutes to get to the centre of Barcelona and 25-30 minutes to go to the beach by the metro. But we preferred walking there. It took 1 hour for us. Barcelona is really amazing city. It is full of fantastic views and places. Furthemore it is very different. And we were pleasant to walk a lot.
As for apartments. It's better as shown in the photos. Very nice, clean and tidy. The flat is set out for guests, you will find everything you need. As the apartments are cozy and has very good atmosphere, our 10 nights staying was comfortable, we really didn't want to leave it !
There is no one minus in this place. It was much better what we expected and we had an amazing time in Barcelona!
Thanks a lot, David. You've been so nice and caring for us!
Exceptionnel ! L appartement est parfaitement équipé, nous avons très bien dormi et nous nous sentions comme chez nous. Il est situé dans une ruelle très calme et bien situé. Merci à David!

My girlfriend and I had a wonderful stay at David's flat for two nights.  The flat is a nice one bedroom apartment and served our needs well.  It's in a slower-paced area of Barcelona very close to Sagrada Familia and Park Guell, and within walking distance to several great cafe's and restaurants.

David himself was an exceptional host.  He was very attentive, flexible, and responsive to any questions we had. He made sure we had everything we needed, and even provide us with his own recommendations for area restaurants.  In the end, David went out of his way to arrange taxis for us upon our departure, which we certainly appreciated.

If you're looking for a place to stay in David's area of Barcelona, I would get in touch with him.

Cheers

Super appartement, très propre et décoré avec goût, bien situé, dans un quartier calme. David est un hôte très ponctuel et sérieux. Il nous a accueilli avec un grand sourire et un petit coup de main pour monter la valise dans l'escalier ! 
Bref, une très bonne expérience ! :)

David was there when we arrived and made us very welcome. He showed us around the flat which was very clean, well appointed and exactly as we had been led to believe. He very kindly provided us with details of places to visit and recommended a very good place to eat. The flat is well located being within easy walking distance of a number of attractions and restaurants and with easy access to the metro system.

The apartment is located in a quiet street close to Sagrada Familia and public transportation. It has been totally reformed just recently with a lot of style and it is very clean with living space to the small street and bedroom to the patio. The host David was very helpful at the arrival and also throughout the entire stay.
This is the perfect place for a couple to spend a few days in the city of Barcelona - highly recommendable.

Great apartment, very clean, quite and comfortable!
Metro is just nearby and  there are few good restaurants in a walk distance. David is very nice and helpful host throughout the entire stay.

David is the most amazing host..nothing was too much trouble for him and he was very very helpful - communication was great. The apartment is fantastic and even better than the pictures show (clean/ good quality finish/brilliantly furnished) .. it is well stocked with everything that you would need. The location is also great with good transport links and amenities.. I think it was amazing value for money and I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone!! See you again soon David x

I've spent four nights at David's place with my mum. We both (34 and 66 years) loved the appartment which is really tastefully furnished and full of nice details. It is more than fully equipped and you can for example enjoy your Nespresso-coffee in the morning or take a very comfortable shower in the modern bathroom. 
The appartment is located in a quiet and very nice 'spanish' street from where you can easily walk to e.g. Grácia (or other neighbourhoods) or take the metro to wherever you wanna go. The place is very quiet but at the same time really close to all the important spots in Bcn. 
David is a really friendly host who is always there with a helping hand or great advice. I highly recommend to stay in David's flat and would always welcome him as a host in my place. And so would my mum. ;-)

David est très gentil et très acceuillant  . Il répond aux mails comme aux appels tel et tout a correspondu à nos arrangements . 
L'appartement est bien conçu et très bien placé , pour aller à pied ou en métro dans toute la ville .
Nous avons alors profité à notre convenance de la belle et si vivante Barcelone . 
sylvia et Gavroche .

It was cozy and clean apartment. And also very convenient to access for public transportation nearby. I believe it located in very safe environment as well.
The host, David, was very kind and gentle. 
Wanted to stay longer then two night!! It was very good :-)

David is vey responsive to my inquiries. He is warm and polite. He gave me very detailed direction. 

David's place is clean, modern and cozy, walking distance to metro station. You can walk to sagrada familia too, but need to take metro to Gothic quarter, where the main attractions are.

El alojamiento es aun mejor q en las fotos.Un piso muy bien decorado y equipado,en una zona tranquila y en pleno barrio de Gracia.
David nos recibió en la casa,fue amable y atento en todo momento.
Estancia muy recomendable para aquellos viajeros que quieran disfrutar callejeando por BArcelona.
房子的位置很不错,坐落在安静的街区,但是离地铁站joanic很近,可以通向任何你想去的地方｡圣家堂步行就可以到达｡旁边有超市和菜店｡房间厨房可以用来做任何你想吃的菜肴｡房东人很好｡很热情的为我们解决一切｡本来我们打算住2天,太爱这个房子了,我们又续了四天:)
又住了4天,依然不舍得走,,,太舒适的房子!

David wasn't available to greet us, but send a friend who showed us the flat and gave us pointers.  The flat was as described, very nice, quiet, spatious and bright with high ceilings throughout.  The kitchen is well equipped and has everything you need to prepare dinner and we made use of that and spent some evenings at home enjoying the flat and resting from sightseeing during the day.  If you wanted to go out in the evening, the nightlife of Gracia proper is only 10min down the road.  Similarly Sagrada Familia is only about 10 by foot in the other direction.  The nearest tube station Joanic is also 8-10min away.  It's located on the yellow line which is very convenient if you want to go and see the Ramblas, Gothic quarter or El Born.  We can highly recommend the flat and would consider staying there again in the future.
The apartment was really beautiful and cosy as you can see it from the pictures. The location is wonderful in Gracia, everything is closeby and David is a really nice host and supportive.
La estadía fue estupenda! El departamento es tal cual se lo describe. Muy lindo, amplio, limpio.  Todo espectacular! Me sentí muy cómoda

The flat was amazing, the title is very accurate, it is a quite stylish and lovely decorated. Has all the amenities required and much more. 

Literally 10 minutes walking from La Sagrada Familia and about 7 to L4 metro line which takes you to most touristic stops in BCN.

It is very well located and there are many nice restaurants within a 15min radius(We liked Tivoli for tapas, El Glop for paella & La Paradeta for seafood)

David wasn't available to meet us as we arrived at an awkward hour, but was very flexible enough to find a solution for someone to greet us and let us leave the luggage before we headed into the city. Was also kind enough to give us some restaurant recommendations. Top marks for that.

Thank you for everything!!! I'd fully recommend anyone this lovely flat.

A very clean and bright apartment with all equipments. 
A quiet neighborhood close to metro station.
And David is very available and welcoming! Thank you very much for your friendship!
A true "coup de coeur"!

Merci à David pour son accueil, l'appartement été très agréable et propre dans une rue au calme proche du métro. Petit bémol (bien que ceci ne nous aie pas dérangé outre mesure) concernant la télé qui n'a pas été configurée avec la box, c'est regrettable car ceci est inclu dans les prestations. Prévoir donc un ordinateur portable si vous souhaitez en bénéficié. Hormis ce détail nous recommandons sans hésitation cet appartement !

Séjour très agréable dans l'appartement cosy de David... Nous n'avons pas eu la joie de le rencontrer car il était en vacances durant notre venue ...mais sa soeur et son beau- frère nous ont été d'une grande aide et très réactif quand nous avons eu besoin d'eux concernant un petit problème technique :-)
Le quartier est très agréable ...calme et à deux pas des animations de "Gracia" ...
Nous avons connu Barcelone sous un ciel gris durant cette semaine ... mais avec plein de soleil dans le cœur malgré tout ...grâce à l'accueil chaleureux des Barcelonais que nous avons pu rencontré...:-))

Tuvimos una estancia espectacular en el piso de David. El piso está muy bien equipada y bien situada en un barrio simpático. Hay cafés y bares al lado, hasta la Sagrada Familia se camina unos 10 minutos. David es además un comunicador espléndido: Cuando sabía que él no iba a estar por un viaje les preguntó a sus padres que nos esperaran para darnos las llaves. Y ellos nos esperaron aunque tuvimos mucho retraso y llegamos tarde. Muchas gracias por todo, David!
Miko

David was a wonderful host always willing to help with any problem. The apartment is conveniently located within short walking distance from Joanic metro station - basically less than 10 min by metro from Diagonal and within walking distance from la Sagrada Familia. We were traveling with our 1,5-year daughter and were amazed by the attention to every tiny detail for providing cozy stay in the apartment - it had everything one may need - all kitchen equipment (incl. dishwasher, microwave oven), utensils and even several portable (was very helpful during several pretty cold nights at Barcelona). This apartment is perfect for young couples and families.

David offered us a warm welcome. The appartment is maybe even better than on the pictures. Extremely well equipped, which was important to us since we stayed a whole week and cooked quite often. Also, the location is perfect: Everything is close by, restaurants, bars, supermarkets... except if you're looking for tourist traps ;-) And at the same time the appartment is extremely quiet. We slept very well. Thanks a lot David!

David is a great host, answered right away to the request for the booking and wellcomed us warmly, giving us very important tipps.The appartment in Gracia was very fresh and well-equipped in a beautiful old building with a cosy balcony on the inner side. The kitchen and bathroom have a modern high-value design and were very practical. The appartment is perfectly situated, since it's 10 minutes from Sagrada Familia and 15 minutes from Parc Güell.  All the necessary stores, pharmacies etc. , as well as bars and restaurants are located within 5 minutes from the appartment. There is a direct metro line to the beach and Passeig de Gracia! We would really recommend staying in David's appartment!
David est très accueillant, il se tient à votre disposition durant toute la durée du séjour.

Alles wunderbar.Kontakt mit David war einwandfrei. Flexible Anreise-und Abreise Zeiten. Wohung war mit allen ausgestattet was man braucht . Lage war auch sehr gut,5-7 Minuten zur Metro und ca 10 Minuten nach Gracia. Tolle Metro Verbindung die direkt ans Meer geht .
One the best vacation in my life! Certainly part of that was David and his apartment. Nice and well equipped apartment. Close to metro station. David is nice and helpful person.

a great place! great location and commute to other places, the apartment is well equipped so you really feel at home there. David is probably the nicest and most helpful host I have ever had on airbnb :) really recommendable!!

Nous avons passé un agréable moment dans cet appartement.
Tout était conforme et David nous a très bien accueillis.
L’appartement semblait même plus grand grâce aux hauteurs sous plafond.
Nous nous sommes sentis bien tout de suite.
Il a été disponible, malgré un retard de notre avion de plus d’une heure.
Il communique très bien avec tous les médias ( (Hidden by Airbnb) , SMS…) et est discret et poli.
La situation de l’appartement est très bien car non loin d’une station de METRO (transport à privilégier) et d’un quartier très intéressant : LA GRACIA.
Le quartier est calme. Mais nous sommes tout de même dans une grande ville

Amazing spacious apartment in a great location close to Sagrada Familia and Joanic metro station. Apartment was clean with plenty of natural light and very comfortable. Just note that there are 4 flights of stairs so be aware if you have many suitcases, but this is common in Europe. Thanks David, hopefully we will be back in Barcelona one day soon!

We had a fantastic stay in David's beautiful apartment. David meet us on arrival and showed us around the apartment. He was very helpful and gave us some great local knowledge about shops and restaurants. 

The apartment was very well equipped and had everything we needed. It was also in a great location with lots of interesting shops, bars and restaurants within walking distance. There are various squares in the area that are perfect for sitting and watching the world go by. 

We would definitely recommend staying in this apartment and look forward to our return visit.
David's apartment is very bright and modern, in a quiet part of Barcelona. We enjoyed our stay very much!

We had a lovely stay at David's apartment. It was clean and cozy and had everything we needed. It's situated in a lovely neighborhood near many tapas restaurants and cocktail bars. We had a lovely time there! And the metro station was only a 5 minute walk away. 

David was very attentive and a great host. 

I definitely recommend it!

Rigtig dejlig lejlighed og meget imødekommende vært. 
Lejligheden ser ud nøjagtigt som den gør på billederne og er super lækker. Desuden ligger den i gå afstand til La Sagrada de Familia og metro til stranden!
David har været super imødekommende selvom vi kom sent om aftenen. Og selvom vi ikke har haft brug for noget i løbet af ugen, har han været til rådighed og hjælp, hvis vi skulle have haft brug for det.
Beautiful apartment, great location, highly recommend!

David was very understanding and helpful to me and my friend even tho we took a wrong train from the airport and came 2hours late to the apartment. He gave us some nice tips and left us feel very welcome. He had printed the subway map which was very useful!
The apartment was nicely equipped and the area is quite safe and quiet. A big plus is the L4 subway (nearest station 5mins from the apt) that takes you to many of the places where you want to visit. We really liked our stay!

David was a very welcoming and helpful host. Communication was extremely easy as was check in and check out. 

The apartment is located in a great area with plenty of shops, cafes and restaurants and is close to public transport. The area is easily walkable and this really helped us with a small child. 

The apartment was great. Spacious, bright and recently renovated with all the facilities we needed.

Highly recommend David and his apartment. We'll be back!

We were delayed upon arrival but very kindly David was waiting outside. The apartment was spacious, very clean and lovely, exactly as so in pictures. Perfect apartment for couple days in Barcelona, with close Metro and everything you need. Would highly recommend.

David a été très prévenant, toujours rapide à répondre aux mails. L'appartement est conforme aux photos: Moderne, confortable, très bien équipé... Le quartier est calme. L'appartement est idéalement situé par rapport aux commerces, station de métro... C'était un très bon séjour en amoureux !!!!

The apartment is really nice and comfortable, and is equipped with new interior. David is a really nice host, he prepared a lot of info for us and was really good reachable. The neighbours were loudly during our stay. We were unsure which neighbours it were, so we didn’t contact David about it. The bathroom is beautifull! There weren’t any washcloths so you might consider bringing them yourselves (just a tip). Overall we had a great stay!

Very nice appartement, if you don't mind climbing some stairs. The appartement is sunny and the living space is pleasant. The air conditionning is a plus in hot summer day. The kitchen is well equiped.

It's well situated, in  à quiet neighborhood close  to 2 metro station.

We had a very nice stay.

We had a fantastic stay at David's beautiful apartment! It's exactly as it looks in the pictures and has everything you need for the perfect self-catering stay. 

It's 15 min walk to Vila de Gracia and 5 minutes walk to Joanic metro station which is a direct line to many useful stops including Barceloneta (beach) and Jaume I (El Born area with lots of lovely restaurants/bars)

The living/dining area enjoys sunshine through the double doors in the morning and then you can sit out on the balcony later on and enjoy the evening sun.

All in all couldn't fault the apartment and David was a wonderful host and made sure we were comfortable. We'll definitely be back!!

David is the best host! He was so welcoming and helpful throughout the visit. The flat was gorgeous and a great size. We loved our stay! The location was great as it was easy to get to the beach, city centre and major attractions. But also, there were loads of good bars and restaurants nearby to the flat. Highly recommend this place

David was a caring and helpful host. He met us at our convenience to let us in and showed us the features of the apartment. I was not familiar with the technology of his TV and he came and showed us how to use it. The location Waze great - a short walk from Sagrada Familla. However, if you don't like stairs... it's in a walk up on the fourth floor.

We had a wonderful stay at David's place. The flat is tasteful and beautifully decorated as well as being very well stocked. The bed is extremely comfortable!

 The neighbourhood of Gracia is lovely and far from the touristic crowd of El Born and the Gothic Quarter, felt a sense of breathing space and that we were staying in a place where actual locals lived.

Lots of lovely shops and restaurants a 5 min walk away. Well connected and close to the metro.

David as a host was exceptional and very communicative and flexible.

Would definitely stay there again. Thank you for everything!
Nice modern place that's near city and train station.  David is v nice to check us in late at night and help me w my gf luggage up the stairs.

Flat is as advertised. It's big and everything works....even the smart tv and Netflix. One good feature is that it very quiet. Another is that it is a shortish walk to Joanic station on the yellow line which is very useful.
The apartment was comfortable and well equipped. David was very helpful.

Meiner Mama und mir hat es sehr gut gefallen. Das Appartment ist in einer ruhigen Wohngegend, gut ausgestattet, hell, groß und sauber. Gerne sind wir am Abend noch auf dem kleinen, gemütlichen Balkon gesessen. Das Zentrum von Gràcia, Sagrada Família und Park Güell haben wir zu Fuß besucht, alles andere war gut mit der Metro erreichbar. Der Kontakt mit David war unkompliziert, hilfreich und sehr nett.

Great modern flat near Gracia in northern Barcelona . We found it brilliant as we visited saint Pau and Sagrada Famillia on foot , both of which were brilliant . We had fun eating in Gracia in the evening . We were also able to walk to park Guell . The metro to the centre (3 stops ) was handy for getting back into the centre . We would definitely recommend this funky flat . David was welcoming and the flat was very clean .

David fue excelente como anfitrión, muy respetuoso, confiable y buena onda. Facilitó la entrega de las llaves del piso y nos indicó perfectamente y con paciencia todas las cosas que implicaban el uso funcional del piso.
La ubicación del piso es excelente: a pie es cerca de todo, y esta lejos del bullicio turístico. Esta a unas dos cuadras largas de la entrada de metro de Joanic (L4). Para una estancia larga también es recomendable, dado que el piso esta equipado con todo lo necesario. Nos sentimos como en casa. Cómodo, super limpio y muy funcional.
Eine sehr schöne Wohnung, die nicht in mitten des Zentrums liegt, aber sehr gut mit der Metro angebunden ist! Hell, modern und sogar eine Nespresso-Maschine war dabei ;) Vielen Dank!

L'estada al apartament del David ha estat molt agradable per als inquilins que hi han estat:Una parella de mitja a edat,que han estat molt a gust. Carrer tranquil,amb bons descabs i prop del metro de Joanic que permet etar ben comunicat.
En David ha estat molt arent abnas i després de la trobada. Ho recomanem!
David is a very kind and precise host! We strongly recommend him and his beautiful apartment!!!! ;)

David's place was amazing for us, nice, modern and spacious with everything you might need. The location is superb, close to public transport and walkable distance to La Sagrada Familia and the always nice Gracia neighbourhood with all it's bars and restaurants. We definetely recommend it and would stay here again when we visit Barcelona again. Communication with David was easy and he is very nice and accomodating, even when our flight was delayed and we arrived late to meet him.

We had a wonderful time at David's place!
It is located at a quiet neighborhood yet very close to the city center and to the metro. Walking distance to the sagrada familia.
The apartment itself is absolutely beautiful, stylish, spacious and is equipped perfectly with everything you'll need. 
The communication with David was very easy and he was very helpful and kind.

Would very much recommend staying at his place! Perfect!

Séjour plus que parfait ! 
Un hôte agréable, un appart magnifique, ( un lit incroyablement confortable à mémoire de forme) ... et bref que du bonheur! 
À cela s'ajoute un emplacement idéal, à quelques minutes à pied de la Sagrada Familia , du métro et de quelques petits bar à tapas fabuleux dans le quartier de La Gracia. 
 Merci!!
David非常热情亲切的给我们提供一切帮助｡房子很大很宽敞 就是靠近主卧里的窗户安全锁似乎是有点问题 社区很安静友爱步行10分钟就可以到圣家族!天天看夜景的感觉真是太棒了!交通便利 到处都是地铁口公交站 可以去任何想去的地方｡谢谢David提供的舒适的房子 巴塞罗那的一切真真的太迷人 大爱!(^^)
David's flat is lovely and great location. Great comms and on hand whenever we needed him. Very flexible with check-in and out. Great stay and highly recommended.

Perfect! David is an amazingly nice host, very easy to approach, super responsive and always keeping an eye down to the last detail. 
Can only recommend a stay at his place!

Heel prettig en zonnig apartement. Rustig ook en toch dicht bij metro joanic en wijk Gracia. Voldoende bestek, servies en glazen. Basisproducten in keuken aanwezig. Allemaal prima. Prettig contact met David. Alles opperbest gelopen. We komen terug.

Première expérience Airbnb concluante. David est une superbe personne qui répond à toutes questions et donne des bons conseils. L'appartement est très bien équipé et confortable et celui ci est bien situé des transports en commun et de la Sagrada Familia (10 min à pieds). Nous te remercions infiniment ;)
Kevin & Pauline

The apartment is in a great location with easy access to public transport which I think is good value if you buy the ten trip pass .The accommodation is very clean and we'll looked after with plenty of space to relax after the long walks around the city. What more could you want a big thank you to David for being so flexible as well. We would highly recommend this apartment
Outstanding location in a quiet setting.

David's place is great and it would have been the perfect place for us if it hadn't been for the refurbishment of the downstairs apartment, which was extremely noisy. It meant that we couldn't really be in the apartment during the daytime, which we intended traveling with an infant. However, David obviously couldn't do anything to help us with this situation which is totally understandable. David's apartment is spacious, clean and bright and we enjoyed having a drink on the sunny small terrace in the late afternoon.

Casa estremamente confortevole, pulita ed accessoriata, proprietario disponibile e gentile, pochi minuti a piedi dalla Sagrada Familia ed ottimamente connessa con i mezzi pubblici. Zona residenziale carina in una via tranquilla, negozi e servizi in zona

We had a perfect stay with our 2yo girl at David's place. The flat is even better than on the pictures, we've enjoyed the location, very near to metro, bus and commodities as well as the equipments of the appartment. David was very responsive to our requests. Perfect place to live Barcelona from the inside!
Absolutely as it looks perfect location and easy to get too! Thank you so much
We very much enjoyed the apartment for its cosiness, design, location and the hospitality of David.

The apartment is really lovely and quite spacious. It is an easy walk to the metro and we found a great bakery nearby (Farina & Sons, try it!) for breakfast. Everything is very well-decorated, clean and in great condition.

Amazing apartment and an amazing Host. The communication was great if we had any questions or needed help, David was there to help us out. 
We truly enjoyed our stay in Barcelona.

This apartment is without a doubt the best airbnb we've stayed in so far. David was beyond helpful and made our stay easy and comfortable. The apartment is located outside of the centre so you can get away from the hustle and bustle of the city centre. 
You can easily walk into the centre and take in all the beautiful architecture along the way or you can take a few stops on the metro and get straight to it. 
Highly recommend staying here, we will definitely be back!
Great place, as described. David was very helpful and responded very quickly to any queries. Would happily stay again.
Great location.  Very easy to get to  from the metro.  Sagrada Familia in walkable distance.  Beautiful apartment, very stylish, clean and quiet. David was very helpful too.

El departamento es justo como se ve en las fotos y la limpieza excelente. El host muy agradable y servicial, siempre está al pendiente. El lugar está a unos 7 min de Sagrada familia, bien comunicado debido a la cercania con multiples lineas del metro.
Disfrutamos mucho nuestra estancia.

Nice light bright airy apartment.  Location is away from main tourist area of La Rambla which we loved as it was quiet and not the craziness of La Rambla. Close to train station so you can get anywhere you need to. Host was extremely helpful allowing us to check in early and exit late      Plenty of local places to eat and drink within walking distance and supermarket close by.  Overall an excellent place to stay. Thank you David
Amazing place, really stylish, a bit far from main attractions but perfect if you want a quiet neighborhood. Would really recommend it!

David's place was beautiful, comfortable, and well-equipped for our three day stay in Barcelona. We absolutely loved the residential, yet hip feel of the Gracia neighborhood. His apartment was both walkable to the attractions, and very close to the public transit. David's was very communicative and kind the whole way through, and he even carried my very heavy bags up all the flights of stairs. I highly recommend David and his apartment!

Great host very hospitable and great communication from the initial booking to being in Barcelona. The apartment is stunning and would definitely stay there again as and when we come back to Barcelona. Highly recommend

Amazing flat + amazing district + amazing host = best trip ever :) 
Thank you for your kindness and your patience !
See you soon !
Isaure & Marco

We can't stress enough how very helpful David was with all of our needs and queries, the apartment itself is a beautiful place to relax after exploring the city, very close to transport links and the La Sagrada Familia.

The kitchen has a lot of equipment to make your own dinner which can be enjoyed on the balcony or the dining table.

David was very helpful and we were able to communicate with him easily when we needed. He is an excellent friendly host. The apartment is very spacious and modern with cool decor and a balcony. Excellent location in Gràcia, a quieter village-like area away from city centre but easily accessible via 2 metro stops, Joanic (5 minute walk) and Sagrada Familia (10 minute walk). You can take the yellow line from Joanic to Selva de Mar if you want to go to a less touristy beach. There are plenty of restaurants/bars in Vila de Gràcia to enjoy which has a lively atmosphere at night. I would recommend Gola Taperia. We stayed the 3rd week in August during La Festa Major de Gràcia (200 year anniversary this year) which made the experience all the better as you can wander through the beautifully decorated streets and get a taste of local life. Would definitely recommend David's apartment for an alternative experience to city centre.
Nice and quiet place to discover Barcelona. I recommend it.

This was a fantastic apartment to stay at during our stay. David was a fantastic host who was there to greet us when we arrived and provided fantastic assistance to our needs. Not that there were any. Everything in the flat worked perfectly never had a single issue or complaint with anything. The flat itself was light and inviting. Good shower and comfy bed. Great open plan kitchen dining room for entertaining. The suburb that it was in was quite and chilled but not too far away from some great bars and restaurants in the local area. It provided a great representation of the local culture of Barcelona which provided a retreat from the tourist hotspots of the city. However when you wanted to get to said tourist hotspots the public transport available from the apartment is perfect: buses to park Guell only 10-20 minutes, bus to camp nou only 30-40 minutes, easy connection to Tibidabo and the L4 metro line from Joanic meant we were minutes away from the city centre and the beach. The icing on the cake was the Sagrada familia only being a 10 minute walk from the apartment. Anyone planning a trip to Barcelona, I would highly recommend this apartment. We may even use it in the future ourselves, if and when we decide to return to the city.
Nice and clean apartment. The host was very helpful and easy to communicate with.

David provided a perfect place for a brief trip to abarcelona. We stayed 4 nights and the place was clean, quiet and exactly was we expected. The location is north of the major tourist action but we are big walkers and enjoyed the opportunity to experience a different part of the city than the main thoroughfare. The Sagrada Familia and all of the cafes around it were a brief walk away. David was extremely accommodating in meeting us when our plane was slightly delayed and a recommendation that he provided to us for dinner ended as a favorite of ours by the end of the trip (Bar Cañete). 

All-in-all the place provided exactly what the pictures and description shows and I would stay there again during my next trip back to Barcelona.

David’s place is lovely. Very clean, and comfortable. He has all modern appliances which work perfectly, and the kitchen is well equipped. He is an excellent host, met us on our arrival and came over early morning when we were leaving. 
The location is good, lots of cafes and shops nearby. It is also close to transportation, buses and metro, so very easy to get around.
I would highly recommend David’s place.

Fabulous apartment with everything you need for a comfortable stay.  Gracia is a beautiful neighbourhood where you can really feel that you are living like a local. David is a fantastic host so friendly and welcoming.

We stayed in David’s apartment for two weeks in November. The apartment was very comfortable and even more beautiful than in a picture. Location is excellent – close to metro station. You can get anywhere in a city within 10-20 minutes. The neighborhood itself is very nice too – lots of shops, bars 
and restaurants and at the same time is very quiet and safe. We are glad that we’ve chosen this place.

David was an excellent host, the apartment is very clean and tidy with all the amenities you need (including a great shower). David is really helpful and friendly and had some great recommendations for where to eat. Would definitely stay there again.
The apartment is exactly as described. David's communication was excellent we would definitely return.
Great host, perfect location and lovely apartment !!

L’appartement de David est parfait: dans un quartier animé mais à l’écart du bruit, rénové avec beaucoup de goûts, très très bien équipé, la machine Nespresso est vraiment un plus, climatisation réversible dans tout l’appartement ....
David est très sympa, ponctuel et réponds très rapidement à chaque demande.
Beautiful and stylish apartment in a quiet residential area very close to Sagrada Familia. Would certainly return and would highly recommend.

David’s place was absolutely beautiful and comfortable! The decor was on point. The location was fantastic as you were a short walk away to public transportation, great cafes, and Sagrada Familia. Most importantly I always felt safe. David was very responsive and was flexible in allowing me to drop off my bags first before the actual check-in. I would definitely stay here again when I return to the beautiful Barcelona.
A very beautiful flat. I can totally recommend it.

David’s apartment is wonderful. Quiet location. Walking distance to Sagrada Familia, the heart of Gracia, Metro, Gothic Quarter, and many small shops. It’s very peaceful, well designed, and comfortable.

David’s place was exactly as described in the add and the pictures are spot on. The place was very easy to get to on the metro and very clean. 

Full size kitchen was nice and there’s a dishwasher. Netflix on the tv too. 

The location is close to sagrada familia,  but it’s quite a walk from the gothic quarter and la boqueria market. 

Overall, this was a great place. 

Only downside is there’s no elevator, but that’s no ones fault! Just be ready for a hike up the stairs.

El apartamento de David está equipado con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días agradables en Barcelona. Ubicado en un barrio muy tranquilo, el piso se encuentra cerca del Park Güell y muy cerca de la famosa Iglesia Sagrada Familia. Además, a pocas cuadras, tienes la estación de metro Joanic, si deseas ir, por ejemplo, a La Rambla o a Plaza Catalunya.
Fue una muy buena experiencia. Lo recomendamos.

The apartment on the fourth floor is very big and equipped with almost every thing, especially the balcony. It takes 10 mins to walk to the Sagrada Familia, or you can spend 6 euros to go to Passeig de Gràcia by taxi. It’s really convenient to check in and out. Everything about the apartment is good except the stairs,  it is so narrow that it’s quite difficult for us to go up and down with luggages. We would still recommend this studio.

Beautiful spot a bit tucked away from the big tourist spots. David was great-you can tell he’s done this before-! He was very communicative and had a little “Welcome Binder” full of useful information. Would absolutely recommend.

Comfortable flat within easy travelling distance of the many attractions in Barcelona. David was excellent with his communication, both before and during our stay. Good local shops and a few bars, and only 12 minutes from the centre by metro. Walking distance to the Sagrada Familia. Recommended.

David’s apartment is comfortable and in a beautiful residential block, a short walk from some of Barcelona’s most famous sights. He was very proactive with communications and flexible with check-in and check-out which which helped us immensely.

Loved our stay in David's flat. It was a great location and quiet and clean. David was really good at being in contact as our flight was delayed and it was easy enough to get from the airport to the flat via the train and metro and meet the cleaners for the keys. The metro is about 2 minutes away and there's good buses nearby too for Parc Guell.  We found some lovely restaurants about a 10/15 min walk away.

Location is good, really 10 Minutes Walk to Sagrada Familia, and very close to metro, however for us as couple with baby was still difficult(not all metro stations have lift, and the electric stairs are almost only for going up, not bothways) . Restaurants in the neighbourhood re really helpful, but most of them (or the ones with good reviews) are opened from 8 pm for dinner. I assume this is the spanish standard, however we find it too late for dining...

Communication with David was very good, he answered promptly and waited with the check in (our plane had delay, so it wasn't really our fault plus we had to carry the baby buggy through the metro stations with limited lift)

In our welcome map we were told to be quiet after 10 pm, well the neighbours were first after 2 am quiet. The walls are so thin, could hear the high heels on the stairs and a special smell(marijuana?!) was coming through the window in bathroom.

All in all the appartment was clean and well equipped to cook, for young couples should be perfect, but don't expect 4 * hotel.

Même si l'on n'a pas vu David car il travaillait à l'extèrieur, il a été rapidement disponible pour répondre à nos questions. L'appartement est bien situé dans une rue tranquille.
Les voisins ont été quelquefois bruyants.
Thank you !! Fantastic appartment and very good position ! David is a kind guy !

El departamento es tal como se ve en las fotos, limpio con todos los servicios. La comunicación con David fue muy buena, la llegada tal como lo habíamos previsto. Lo único negativo es la escalera a pesar de ser un segundo piso hay q subir cinco tramos de una escalera empinada y angosta, es la única contra que encontré el resto resultó todo más que bueno.

Un très bon séjour!
Les points positifs : appartement fonctionnel agréable et l’accueil de David.
L’appartement est près du Parc Güell et de la sagrada mais prévoir de prendre le métro pour le centre.
Un bon rapport qualité prix.

A lovely spacious apartment close to La Sagrada Familia and local restaurants and bars.
The metro is also close although we walked to most places including Park Guell.
David was a great host and accommodated our late night arrival time and check out a little later.
Thanks for a great trip.
Great location, walking distance to Sagrada Familia. Light, spacious, very comfortable apartment. David was extremely helpful. Highly recommended.
un appartement clair, propre , calme,  très agréable après une journée de visite. Situé dans un quartier très sympa et proche des transports. Nous le recommendons.
Nice apt, nice area :)

We had a great stay at David's apartment. He was so helpful from the beginning until the end, and so very accommodating with all our needs. It was a quiet place, very near the metro, and spacious enough for a few days getaway. It was clean and welcoming. We highly recommend it.
Great host and great apartment. Would highly recommend!

Though we didn’t get to meet David personally, everything about him as a host was perfect - he was so quick to respond and nothing was too much to ask. In regards to the apartment, it was everything we wanted it to be: it looked exactly as it did in the photos and everything functioned perfectly. The only thing we had trouble with was working the television, though again David responded almost instantly to help us with our problem. Would definitely recommend 10/10!!
Great central place! Excellent communication from David. Nice and cool apartment.
Such an amazing flat! Chic, clean and  great location. David is a brilliant host, would absolutely come back.

This was a lovely apartment, clean stylish and everything you need. We didn’t cook because of the great selection of restaurants locally but if you wanted to the kitchen Is fully equity. Try la pepita or la cava in Gràcia. This was a great location close to the cool shops in Gràcia, the main tourist attractions and the tube to get to the beach. David was helpful and flexible with check in and out times. Thank you!

This is a very nice, stylish apartment in Barcelona! The proximity to metro stations made it easy to get to the center and most of the major tourist sites, while La Sagrada Familia was just a short walk away, making for a nice evening stroll. There are plenty of stores, cafes, and restaurants within walking distance of the apartment, however, we found that we had better experiences with places closer to the center. Still, this apartment is great to have as home base, and David's tips were very helpful! Check-in/out process was very simple!
I felt very comfortable. The apartment was well equipped and in line with my expectations.
Great flat and great host. Although I didn’t meet David personally, he’s mindful and quick to reply to make you happy

The apartment is a five-minute walk from the metro in a lovely quiet street and away from the centre, which we wanted.  The sixty stairs were not a problem for us, though you need to bear in mind.  The cleaner let us in and gave us the keys.  It is a bright and very attractive apartment, well equipped kitchen, spacious, comfortable beds, and with the aircon just outside the room, not too noisy at night.  Blinds also kept the place cool for our August stay.  There are good supermarkets nearby.  We recommend a restaurant called A Veiga, just around the corner on Carrer Sardenya, which serves excellent Catalan food and is very good value.    David responded quickly to our requests for information about local facilities and was very understanding when our carelessness resulted in him having to call out a repairer!  All in all a very good experience.
You can expect a very responsive and helpful host in a great neighborhood!!!

David's apartment is conveniently located  near the trendy suburb Gracia and the main attractions Gaudi's Sagrada Familia and Park Guell. It is also very close to the subway to the city and airport and easily accessible by foot. The apartment is clean and spacious and located in a quiet lane. David added nice touches to the apartment too. For longer rentals, it would be useful to add a washing machine and dryer to the apartment.

What an amazing place in Barcelona! It’s perfect for amenities. A bit further from the city so it’s nice and quiet but still so accessible to the central area where all the tourist attractions are. Best to take your time and enjoy the neighborhood as everything you want and need is at your doorstep. The apartment was also so cosy and clean and David was great with communication. Really enjoyed our stay and would stay in the apartment again next time we’re in Barcelona.

Davids place is spacious and clean. It is typically on a quiet street, but there was a lot of construction noise between 9 and 6 right next door during our stay. David had made us aware of it about a week before our trip, and was generally very responsive and flexible.

This place was awesome! Very close to many of the tourist destinations but also still have you that authentic neighborhood feel. Our host, David, we extremely flexible with our check in and check out times. He left us a copy of the train map and gave us some directions on how to get there. The place was very clean and well stocked with amenities!

Very close to metro station, 10 min walk to sagrada familia, good value for money - place was very clean and location convenient. David helped us out with checkin even at midnight which was great. All in all, a good place for families

Overall a really nice apartment with some small disadvantges regarding the "older" bedroom and bathing room, which both need some renovation in the near future.

David on the other side was a really great and kind host and helped us a lot regarding questions of the area and so.
Perfect place to spend a long weekend in Barcelona

It's a great place. David was extremely helpful by providing quick responses to any inquiries. The apartment is also equipped with the washing machine so I was able to do a laundry after previous trips without leaving the flat.
Absolutely amazing place to stay in Barcelona.  Right up the street literally from Sagrada Familia.  Easy to get all over town.  I had a blast staying at David's AIRBNB

David was lovely, and quick to reply with any queries. The house is in a good location and nice space for a couple to share. The bed was insanely comfortable and the balcony catches the sun in the afternoon. 

We did have issues on our first two evenings with noise from people downstairs. Not sure if it’s a common thing but there is very little sound proofing and we were kept up till early in the morning unfortunately on two occasions. We later found out it was bank holiday which probably explains it! Obviously this is no fault of David’s. 

Other than this was a great stay!

I loved my stay at this place! The location is perfect, in the lovely Gràcia neighbourhood, only 8 minutes walk to the Sagrada Familia and very close to public transport. The house itself is also very lovely, with a beautiful new kitchen and bathroom. Highly recommended :)
David è stato eccezionale e molto preciso. La casa è veramente carina, in una zona stupenda come quella di Gràcia. Grazie di tutto!

The place is like it looks in the photos.  Bright, spacious and clean.  Although it says it is on the second floor, it is more like the 4th floor so make sure you can do stairs with a suitcase.  We loved the location as it was close to the attractions we wanted to see and we enjoyed the local vibe of the area.  The kitchen is well stocked for cooking and eating at the place.  Having the wifi was super helpful as well.  We walked everywhere and never ended up using public transit as it is about 3.4 km walk from the core of Barcelona and the walk is beautiful.  Lots of Gaudi places close by and fabulous local bars and restuarants.

Great location.  Convenient and walk-able to most of the best tourist sites. It is on a quiet residential street with markets, restaurants, and cafes nearby. Nice remodeled kitchen and bath (with a great shower). Very comfortable and clean. Made me feel like I lived in Barcelona.
Une très bonne adresse pour un séjour à Barcelone proche du centre. Votre hôte a pensé à tout pour votre bien être sur place. Idéal pour 2 ! À recommander ++++
Good location and great communication. Everything we needed for our stay

A lovely bright open apartment, with a great kitchen and amenities. Location was great and so close to Sagrada Familia and Parc Güell, not a long walk anywhere else. Great communication with the host and easy check in. Thick towels, excellent shower and Comfortable bed, Building works taking place behind flat, but didn’t bother us. 
Would recommend and stay again.

The apartment's best asset is the location but by no means does this imply it lacks somewhere else. After 5 days in BCN I truly believe Gracia is the coolest neighbourhood by far; lively, full of bars, restaurants and shops but still giving you the live-as-a-local experience which I believe wouldn't be the case in Barri Gotic or El Born. Lots of supermarkets and convenience stores a stone throw away, 10 mins walk to Sagrada Familia, a short bus ride to Guell park and 5 mins walk to L4 line metro which gets you directly to the most interesting places. The apartment is stylish, fully equipped, and looks exactly as in the pictures.  The only think to be aware of, is that it is in the 3rd floor instead of the 2nd. Although the floor is typically called Secondo, there is a mysterious mezzanine sort of thing, but still the same deal of stairs to climb.  
I did not personally meet David but the communication was excellent and the responses quick. Highly recommended.

Stylish Flat in BCN city center has a very good location. It takes no more than 5 min walking from Joanic metro station (Line 4) to the flat. There are many sights near this place - 10 minutes walk to the legendary La Sagrada Familia, and around 1,5 km from Parc Guell and Casa Museu Gaudi. The district is full of shops and restaurants. There is all necessary in the flat and in the district for comfortable stay and for very good pastime. The flat is highly recommended!

Great appartment, everything you need is there. We felt really at home.
Also the loaction is just perfect, a quit street, but close to local bakery, coffeebars and restaurants. We didn't see David in person, but replied instantly to our messages. Super easy check in and check out,  very smooth. Highly recommended!

Really great apartment. Located central, next to the metro. The apartment was very clean when We arrived. 
Good communication with David. 
Highly recommend David
Appartement charmant, propre et calme. Pas très loin de la zone sympa de Gracia, mais comptez 20 minutes de marche quand même.
This apartment is great and in a good location for exploring Gracia and visiting the Sagrada Familia. David worked with us  when we arrived later than expected and was quick to respond to messages!

name: Balmain Village Garden House
summary: Three minute walk to the heart of Balmain Village with all its cafes, pubs and restaurants.  Excellent public transport to city via bus or ferry.  Free street parking and wifi.  Airconditioning for summer or winter.
space: It is a typical terrace house built in the late 1800's. Master bedroom with ensuite (Website hidden by Airbnb) bedrooms upstairs using a large bathroom with bath.Completely restored.
description: Three minute walk to the heart of Balmain Village with all its cafes, pubs and restaurants.  Excellent public transport to city via bus or ferry.  Free street parking and wifi.  Airconditioning for summer or winter. It is a typical terrace house built in the late 1800's. Master bedroom with ensuite (Website hidden by Airbnb) bedrooms upstairs using a large bathroom with bath.Completely restored. The whole house containing two sitting rooms. Kitchen containing basics and breakfast goodies. I always greet my guests, hand over keys and give general information. I stay five minutes away and always reachable. Balmain was a maritime suburb in the mid 1900's. Now a much sort after place to live, so close to the city with harbour glimpses everywhere. Balmain is on a peninsula jutting into Sydney harbour. It’s very easy to walk around, spotting bits of the harbour everywhere.  It’s a 3 minute walk to the heart of the village, a 20 minute walk to the ferry which is a 10 minute trip to the city.
neighborhood_overview: Balmain was a maritime suburb in the mid 1900's. Now a much sort after place to live, so close to the city with harbour glimpses everywhere.
notes: Just to be aware that it is. Typical terrace with stairs. There is quite a fair bit of garden space and outdoor areas for sitting in sun.
transit: Balmain is on a peninsula jutting into Sydney harbour. It’s very easy to walk around, spotting bits of the harbour everywhere.  It’s a 3 minute walk to the heart of the village, a 20 minute walk to the ferry which is a 10 minute trip to the city.  Otherwise there is a good bus service to the city, opera house, harbour bridge, art gallery etc. There is unlimited free parking outside the house.
access: The whole house containing two sitting rooms. Kitchen containing basics and breakfast goodies.
interaction: I always greet my guests, hand over keys and give general information. I stay five minutes away and always reachable.
house_rules: I have found that my guests treat the house with great respect.

reviews.comments:
Magnifique séjour. 
La maison est super jolie, très pratique, facile à prendre en main... un vrai décor de poupées, idéal pour les familles ou plusieurs couples. Un merveilleux accueil avec boîte de chocolats et vin blanc... bref, c'était la perfection et la douceur de vivre à l'australienne !
Balmain est un quartier idéalement situé et très agréable. En ferry, on est à 15 mn de Darling Harbour ou de Circular Quay.

What a beautiful house in a beautiful area. Jennifer was a gracious host who left us a lot of information and chocolates, apples and flowers! The house is in a convenient location with Woolworths nearby which made simple food preparation a breeze after a long day.
Place was in an excellent prepared state with all amenities in working order. Jennifer made us feel especially welcome and was always available to solve any potential problems

Three old friends arrived to share Jennifer's house for 5 days. On arrival Jennifer was there to greet us. She showed us around her beautiful house, had left us information about the local area and lots of travel pamphlets. She also invited us to use anything she had left in the fridge. This was really helpful as when you fly you don't bring any extra food etc. She had also left a bottle of wine and chocolates for us to munch on. The house was immaculately clean and beautifully decorated. The backyard was also great to look out onto and had the weather been better would have been beautiful to sit out in. The house is even better that the great photo's Jennifer has supplied to Air bnb. We spent an entire day exploring the area around Balmain and found lots of interesting places to visit. We felt very safe in that area and on 2 nights we returned to the house quite late after being out exploring all day. I have no hesitation in recommending this beautiful house to anyone and I guarantee you will not be disappointed.

Jennifer went over and above the call of duty in making us feel as though we were welcome guests in her beautiful property.  She left us wine, chocolates, milk and other provisions on arrival which were such a treat as we were too tired to go to the shops.  Jenny also took the time to explain the bus and ferry routes and gave us information about where to visit.  The property was most definitely a home and I appreciated that Jenny trusted us to stay in her home and to treat it with respect, which I hope we did.  It is an honour to have someone place so much trust in another person, especially as every item in the property was so obviously a much treasured possession.  I would love to stay at this property again at some time in the future.

Very glad we chose this place. Three good size bedrooms, 2 living areas and separate well appointed kitchen/dining, private courtyard - all we could have hoped for. Our friendly and obliging host, Jennifer, met us on arrival and showed us round, clearly explaining the features of the property.  Parking outside, quiet street yet close to the main drag of Balmain makes it an excellent location.

Jennifer was a very accommodating and friendly host with a beautiful  house. We couldn't have asked for anything more from our stay. She even offered to take some of our excess baggage to the Op Shop as we were running out of time and space to pack! 
Would definitely recommend her as a host and her house as a place to stay-very comfortable and our home from home.

Charming accommodation 
With everything you could possibly need to make for a perfect holiday
Walking distance to great shops and restaurants and a short stroll to the ferry
Lovely outdoor sitting areas
Jennifer was a very welcoming and accommodating host
Would definitely  recommend
Jennifer met us at the house when we arrived and made us feel at home. The house looked just as we had viewed on the website and fulfilled our expectations. We loved the private outdoor area.

Jennifer's house is comfortable, spacious and graceful, the fully-equipped kitchen and beautiful garden are our favorite sections. Jennifer is very friendly, charming and she prepared many flesh foods for us, introduced us the information about supermarkets, restaurants and transportation. During our stay, we embarked on a ferry and enjoyed the landscape in the harbor district, then returned to the tranquil Balmain Village, which has become our important memory of Sydney.

Everything described in previous reviews is absolutely true. 
Warm welcome by Jennifer, charming house in a quiet neighborhood, very accessible to public transport to the georgeous city .
Thank you so much Jennifer, to have made our stay so easy and agreable.

Stayed for 3 nights in Jennifer's beautiful Balmain terrace. The kitchen was well stocked. We had a great stay in this beautiful house, no issues at all. I would note that the stairs are steep, which is typical for this type of house. If you have small children  staying (as we had) or people with mobility issues, you would need to take extra care.
Lovely home in a great location. So much better than staying in a hotel. Jennifer is a wonderful host who worked hard to make sure all our needs were met. Highly recommended.

Jennifer's Balmain house is an absolute delight. A lovingly decorated and comfortable house in a quiet street. Our family had a most enjoyable stay - breakfast in the tree-filled  courtyard, nicely appointed bedrooms with quality linen. We enjoyed spending time in Balmain and imagining how nice it would be to live there.

Jennifer made us feel extremely welcome. She was there to greet us when we arrived and even had a fridge stocked full of essentials for us. This wan't necessary but was greatly appreciated. As for the house itself, it was better than perfect and suited our needs down to a tee. The area is very quiet yet very close to the shops on Darling St and would be a perfect place for you to have as a base camp while exploring the city. Highly recommended.

We had a lovely stay at the Balmain Village Garden House. Jennifer was a perfect host, meeting us on arrival and making sure everything was in order. We arrived to a well-stocked pantry, fresh fruit and a bottle of wine. The location was great  - close to transport, cafes and shops.
