The house was beautifully decorated and furnished - taking us back in time. We would be very happy to come and stay again.
Jennifer was agreeable to an early arrival and was very welcoming, explaining how the house 'worked' without being intrusive.

We had a wonderful week in Balmain. Jennifer was very welcoming, the house was charming, very attractively furnished and in a perfect location close to the shops, bus stop and ferry(with a frequent minibus connection) and was very quiet. Jennifer was very generous with a well stocked fridge & pantry , shampoo, soaps etc in the bathroom and fresh flowers. 
Would love to return one day!

We stayed at the Balmain Village Garden House in July, 2016. Jennifer met us on our arrival and made us feel very welcome including a bottle of wine and some chocolates. The house is lovely, full of character and in a perfect location about 15 minutes walk from the ferry and 5 minutes from the buses. Balmain is a bustling place, with a multitude of cafes, bars and restuarents. 

The beds were comfortable, and even though it was the middle of winter we were never cold, in fact when we had the gas fire on it was very cosy indeed. The kitchen is well stocked and a supermarket is less than 5 minutes away. I don't think I could find a fault at all; everything was as described. 

The only concern would be the steepness of the stairs, common in house like this I imagine, but for a person with mobility issues the upstairs bedrooms could be difficult. The master bedroom+en-suite  and the family bathroom are downstairs however, so it might not be an issue at all. 

Highly recommended indeed.

This is a delightful gem cottage in Balmain with easy access to local cafes and walks, and near the city via bus or ferry. Jennifer had bus & ferry information, spare 'opal' transport cards, brochures and maps for us. Everything is beautifully presented, wonderful breakfast treats & welcome wine and chocolates. Perfect weekender when visiting Sydney.

Jennifer was a great host who met us on arrival and explained all to us. We loved staying at her house - it's a great location within walking distance of all Balmain facilities.  Parking was no problem.  The house itself is lovely with a great ambiance and many amenities including breakfast packs, free wi-fi cable tv.  We stayed for a week and will definitely return if our travels bring us back to Sydney.  Highly recommended.

We all absolutely loved staying in Jennifer's house. There were 6 of us staying across the 3 rooms as although the house has a cosy feel it had lots of room for group meals etc. All spotlessly clean and beautifully decorated. When we arrived Jennifer greeted us with a bottle of wine and fresh fruit, crumpets and other breakfast stuffs in the fridge. Made us feel at home right away. Balmain as an area is lovely and has lots of good food and drink options and and handy supermarket a short walk away. Couldn't recommend highly enough.
Jennifer was there to meet us and was very helpful . I loved staying at her house .

Had a wonderful long weekend at Balmain Cottage. Jennifer was very welcoming and left us breakfast, wine and chocolates. The cottage is beautiful, clean and the beds very comfortable.
There's only a five minute walk to Balmain village with many great restaurants to choose from.
Would highly recommend.

A warm and sincere greeting into a treasure of a house filled with beautiful things. The location was quiet and with close shopping and transport links. Wonderful restaurants nearby, although the kitchen is very well equipped.  Thoroughly recommended.
Jennifer's welcome is fantastic. Plenty of food, drinks and chocdolate... The2 house is lovely, cosy and really well located.

Jennifer was very welcoming and clearly puts a lot of love and care into her home.  We thought the photos didn't do it full justice and were overwhelmed with the consideration she had put into items left for us.  
As described in other reviews, the facilities are great and close to lots of amenities.  Great for exploring Balmain where there are restaurants, shops and pubs and good access to the buses which go into the city on a ten minute basis, and the ferry wharf is also available.
We thoroughly enjoyed our time at Jennifer's home and would definitely recommend it.

Jennifer responded to my emails promptly and was very helpful. The extras of breakie provisions and wine was a lovely bonus. The private outdoor area was a delight. House accurately described. Nice house lovely owner. Highly recommended.

The photos on Airbnb do not do Jennifer's house and garden justice. This is a traditional old house with all the modern comforts you would expect. Lovely quality cotton bedding. Jennifer made sure we were comfortable and even put in some deck lighting which made our three week Christmas stay all the more special. The daily copy of the Sydney Herald delivered to the front porch in time for breakfast was a bonus as were the other treats left for us. It suited our needs perfectly and we were a three generation group where the oldest person could stay on one level with the master en suite bedroom adjacent to the kitchen and family sitting rooms
We would recommend this house and the host. Rest assured any problem would be quickly resolved as Jennifer is usually only five minutes away

Just leaving after a 3 day stay in this  beautiful house. The place is flawless with great character and a lovely garden, a real home from home. Jennifer has thought of everything from cards to use local transport to the local paper delivered early each morning, she even left us fresh food for breakfast and some liquid refreshments. The location is ideal, being a short 5 min walk from Balmain shops and restaurants and 15 minute walk to the ferry, bringing you straight to circular quay under Sydneys famous harbour bridge and along the Opera house. We would highly recommend staying here and will look it up again ourselves if in the area.

Jennifer has a lovely period period home in what is like an inner city suburb. Might not feel inner city being in Balmain, but does have that feel. 

Our host is lovely and left us lots of provisions which made eating breakfast easy.

There are books to read, a daily newspaper delivered and a quick bus ride to the ferry.

A lovely time had by the four of us. Thank you.

A lovely house in a beautiful neighbourhood, within easy reach of the city centre by bus or ferry, with ample on-street parking for the car.

Jennifer ensured that the house was clean, well-presented and stocked with all the necessities and then some on our arrival. Our incoming flight was heavily delayed, yet she was still on hand to welcome us and was always available to answer questions.

Thank you for a wonderful stay!
A lovely house just a few blocks from shops and restaurants as well as the bus line. We loved everything about it.

We love Balmain and Jennifer's place is perfect for a quiet house but a short stroll to the centre.  Also the public transport is very accessible from here.  The house is very comfortable and cosy and the garden is very pleasant.
Everything you could possibly want is available. Access to Balmain shops/restaurants is 5 min walk. Easy access to city
The host canceled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jennifer's house was more than we could have hoped for. Easily big enough for 6 people and the 2 bathrooms proved so useful. The house has such a cosy feel to it, with a gas coal-effect fire in the very comfortable rear lounge. The large kitchen diner is such a great area in which to socialise and if the weather had been a bit better, we would have made more use of the beautiful garden and barbecue area. The house is situated in a lovely area of Balmain, not far from the main shopping street (including Woolworths supermarket) and numerous bars, pubs and restaurants, with great links to the city. Couldn't have wished for a better place to stay for our four-and-a-half week stay in Australia visiting our new granddaughter and her parents.

We had a great time at Jennifer's place.
Everything was perfect! We really hope to go back there sometime soon!
Thank you!

Home from home!!! Excellent facilities . Beautiful goodies for a first breakfast and a chilled bottle of wine to unwind with after our long flight. A most gorgeous private garden to enjoy the sunshine. If like me you don't want to leave as Jennifer's home better than any 5 star lodgings I have stayed in. It's in a beautiful suburb well serviced by retail shops coffee shops and restaurants. Will definitely return some day

Lovely traditional house very close to Balmain centre.

September evenings were quite cold so had to use heating.

In summer would be perfect.

Jennifer is the perfect host. Many Thanks.

This beautiful tastefully decorated home offers supreme comfort and terrific location. The garden in the backyard is an oasis of beautiful and healthy plants. A very quiet location with on street parking that was never a problem. The house is full of charm and Jennifer's bedding and towels are of the highest quality and cleanliness. Jennifer was so generous and welcoming, giving us a walk through of all that we would need to know to make our stay as comfortable as possible. The kitchen was fully stocked for our use and Jennifer had thoughtfully provided breakfast provisions for us  - which we gratefully used - enjoying a leisurely start to the day and breakfast and coffee in the garden. Position of the house is excellent - walking distance to the shopping centre, ferry and bus transport, not to mention how easy it was to access the house with the help of (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. My friends and I can not recommended this property highly enough!
Well appointed, clean and tastefully decorated. Friendly and accomodating host, the complementary breakfast and wine were a bonus. Highly recommended.

The Balmain Garden Home was perfect, the home is comfortable and beautifully decorated, it has all the amenities and very close proximity to public transport, restaurants and shops and a quick Bus or Ferry ride into the CBD. Jennifer is a wonderful host and very responsive and it was a pleasure to meet here. We hope to be able to stay here again sometime in the future. Very highly recommended.
Everything as described and much more, perfect holiday stay for six of us.

Jennifer was a wonderful  host very quick to communicate and her home was so comfortable and inviting in a perfect location. Balmain had some amazing restaurants and bars and yet only 15 minutes into circular Quay on the ferry. Jennifer kindly left us provisions for breakfast and a bottle off wine.
Highly recommended.

Jennifer has been a great host! We have enjoyed our stay at Jennifer's house for the past 7 nights. The kitchen is well equipped with utensils and other supplies like bread, milk and eggs. The interiors are based on traditional English design and we felt peaceful, warm and cosy in the house.
Highly recommended!

My siblings and I stayed here for 10 nights. This is one of the best Airbnb places we ever stayed at! The house is just beautiful with a nice garden. It has 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths. Close to public transport and shops. The kitchen is well equipped to cook a full meal. We only cooked once just because there’s so many restaurants in Sydney. Lots of towels, the bed and pillows were comfortable, the bed sheets smelled fresh and there’s even bathrobes for us to use. Wifi was fast. Jennifer was a great host. Highly recommended. Will definitely stay here again!

Great place and great hospitality. There were 3 couples in our party and we all thought it was a treat to stay there. Note bathroom is on ground floor and two bedrooms upstairs. Master bedroom has an en suite. We stayed in winter and heaters and aircon kept place warm when needed. Highly Recommended.
Jennifer was a very generous host and we were very appreciative of her lovely home. Great location in a quiet area but close to everything we needed.
Central, convenient, homely and relaxed.

A  serene home and pleasant garden perfect for a family stay. Balmain is a special part of Sydney - on its own peninsular, yet only a 12 minute bus ride into the CBD. The suburb is one of Sydney's best - with houses of original character and an extensive shopping street and supermarket nearby, and the Sydney harbour and ferry boats for alternative transport and scenic walking routes. Jennifer's sandstone house is decorated beautifully and in character with its 100+ year origins, with a light-filled kitchen that  is extremely well organised and equipped, and stocked with essentials and extra delicacies to enjoy. Jennifer is the perfect host and I guarantee you will enjoy your stay.

Great hospitaly and breakfast and wine and fresh flowers as an extra nice complimentary. Lovely garden and 4 min walk to shops, restaurants and buses to Sydney.  Quiet and very comfortable house and Jennifer is a very caring host. Looking forward to stay there again.

This is a wonderful place to stay. The amenities were great and its just a short ferry ride away to the downtown attractions. I would certainly recommend this place to anyone who likes a little bit of peace and quiet.

B&C
A very comfortable stay in a perfect location.
Jennifer’s place is a lovely period house in the center of Balmain. Fantastic host!

A lovely lovely end terrace cottage. Beautiful inside and a picturesque courtyard outside.
Jennifer was a delightful hostess greeting us on arrival and showing us around. All communication was prompt. Lots of goodies left for us. near the main street so easy for the bus to city or ferry. Loved our stay.

Jennifer ‘s house was perfect for our stay in Sydney. The house was a home away from home and we all really appreciated the breakfast supplies. Our beautiful Aunty came to visit and enjoyed the wine that Jennifer left for us. The garden is a special place to spend time in on sunny mornings and afternoons.

name: Room in Prospect Heights
summary: Large 1br in a 3br. available. Apartment is located right at Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Botanic garden. Fantastic fall spot! Room has private porch, full sized bed + futon and desk. Full kitchen + laundry included. Q/B 4/5 2/3 subway stations all a 5-7 min walk away & B48 bus right outside the apartment.  2 other girls live in this apartment but are frequently out and keep to themselves.
space: private porch, entrance to Brooklyn Botanic Garden and garden shop right across the street.
description: Large 1br in a 3br. available. Apartment is located right at Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Botanic garden. Fantastic fall spot! Room has private porch, full sized bed + futon and desk. Full kitchen + laundry included. Q/B 4/5 2/3 subway stations all a 5-7 min walk away & B48 bus right outside the apartment.  2 other girls live in this apartment but are frequently out and keep to themselves. private porch, entrance to Brooklyn Botanic Garden and garden shop right across the street. laundry, TV, internet, kitchen, bathroom as needed. Can recommend bars and restaurants in the area and in Brooklyn/ Manhattan in general Lots of bars, cafes, restaurants, and shops only a short walk up the street. Right down the street from the Brooklyn Museum- incredible shows and events. 5 min walk to Prospect Park, 10 min walk to Grand Army Plaza. Brooklyn Botanic garden right across the street. Fantastic place to visit and walk around.
neighborhood_overview: Lots of bars, cafes, restaurants, and shops only a short walk up the street. Right down the street from the Brooklyn Museum- incredible shows and events. 5 min walk to Prospect Park, 10 min walk to Grand Army Plaza. Brooklyn Botanic garden right across the street. Fantastic place to visit and walk around.
access: laundry, TV, internet, kitchen, bathroom
interaction: as needed. Can recommend bars and restaurants in the area and in Brooklyn/ Manhattan in general

name: 2BR  Lower East Side
summary: A cozy two bedroom in the lower east side. Comfortably fits 4 and is just minutes away from the amazing restaurants and bars of the LES and Chinatown.  Fully functional kitchen and in-unit washer and dryer. *AC during the summer.
space: Perfect for a small group of travelers and tourist who are here to visit the big apple! You will have access to the entire apartment, which includes two bedrooms, a kitchen, bathroom and living room.  The F train (orange line) is a 3 min walk from the apt.  Citibikes and the bus are also very close and convenient for getting around the city! * The Apartment is on the 5th floor of a typical New York, pre-war building and there is no elevator or doorman. * The apartment was recently renovated with new appliances and redone interior.  Which you will enjoy. Super fast subway ride to Midtown attractions, Times Square, Madison Square Garden (MSG), Empire State Building,Rockefeller Center and and Central Park.
description: A cozy two bedroom in the lower east side. Comfortably fits 4 and is just minutes away from the amazing restaurants and bars of the LES and Chinatown.  Fully functional kitchen and in-unit washer and dryer. *AC during the summer. Perfect for a small group of travelers and tourist who are here to visit the big apple! You will have access to the entire apartment, which includes two bedrooms, a kitchen, bathroom and living room.  The F train (orange line) is a 3 min walk from the apt.  Citibikes and the bus are also very close and convenient for getting around the city! * The Apartment is on the 5th floor of a typical New York, pre-war building and there is no elevator or doorman. * The apartment was recently renovated with new appliances and redone interior.  Which you will enjoy. Super fast subway ride to Midtown attractions, Times Square, Madison Square Garden (MSG), Empire State Building,Rockefeller Center and and Central Park. The Lower East Side is one of the most iconic neighborhoo
neighborhood_overview: The Lower East Side is one of the most iconic neighborhoods of Manhattan.  Hundreds of restaurants, bars and cafes line the colorful streets of the LES.  It's the real New York! Chinatown is also very close by with amazing markets and restaurants that make you feel like you're in different city all-together.
house_rules: No guests allowed   Clean and respectful  No shoes worn in the apartment It's illegal to hang out on the fire escape Do not open window with the Air Conditioner!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hello,

Our names are Cristina and Grady and we're excited to share our home on Airbnb.  Cris is from Girona, Spain and I'm am from Kansas and met each other down the street from our lovely apartment.  We both work in the neighborhood and enjoy going to all the amazing restaurants, shops and bars that make Lower East Side so unique and vibrant.

reviews.comments: We were 100% satisfied. Grady met us in person to explain where everything was and Cristina contacted several times throughout the week to make sure all was going well and if we needed anything. The place and neighborhood were just as advertised and in a great part of lower east side. Will definitely stay with them again if we go to Manhattan. Thanks guys!

Grady and Cristina were so sweet and even met us at the apartment to help carry our luggage up the 5 flights.  The apartment was immaculately clean and the beds were super comfy.  I would definitely stay there agin.
House was pefect for what we wanted it for. Great location. Very tidy home. Key handover and drop off is well set up. Would happily recommend this place.

We had a great time at Grady & Cristina's place!

When we arrived, we got instructions to pick up the keys at a Keycafe location not far from the apartment. Once in the apartment, we found a folder with all the information we needed and some recommended restaurants in the neighborhood.
The apartment was small, but exactly as depicted in the photos (except for the airco, you can't see it but the two rooms each have an airco). It was clean and cozy, towels and sheets were provided. 
The subway F-line was 3 blocks away (good 5 minutes walk). It's a safe neighborhood near Chinatown and close to everything in lower Manhattan.

Grady & Cristina were very responive when we needed anything and we would definitely recommend this apartment!

The home was very clean and was everything we could have hoped for in our visit! They were very helpful in making sure that we had what we needed. Would definitely recommend it for anyone staying in New York.

Appartement très sympa, deux vrais chambres avec dans chacune des clims, ce qui n'est pas négligeable en plein été à New York !
L'appartement était impeccable à notre arrivée, avec des serviettes et des draps propres.
La machine à laver et le sèche linge nous ont été très pratique aussi ! 
L'emplacement est idéal avec le métro à proximité, des commerces dont un supermarché et quelques petits restaurants.
Je recommande cet appart !
Had a fantastic time in NYC and the appartment was a good part of it: clean, well place, with great neighbourhood recommendations from Grady and Cristina :-)

Grady & Christina's communication was excellent, and they made sure we had everything we needed. I was a little annoyed that the apartment was on the 5th floor of a building with no elevator. obviously, because my other occupants were women, that didn't go well for me with luggage lol. The space was a lot smaller than I expected, but that was not really a bad thing. We did not feel cramped. Overall, its a really nice place. I saw a couple of rats, but whats New York without rats right lmao!

Tout etait parfait ! L'appartement etait propre et chaleureux. Très confortable également.
Nous avons eu un petit soucis de wifi un matin qui a été réglé très rapidement: efficacité, rapidité de Grady et Cristina. L'emplacement de l'appartement était très bien. 
Merci d'avoir si bien contribué à notre beau séjour !!!
Lovely cute apartment. Very clean. Walking distance to the subway. Very good location (Little Italy, China Town and Soho very close). Fantastic owners (very attentive with us). Big recommendation!
The apartment was just as described, very close to subway station. Easy key pick-up and drop-off. The washer/dryer was great to have.

Realmente pasamos unos días maravillosos en NYC, el apartamento es pequeño aunque muy cómodo y estupendamente equipado, Grady y Cristina son excelentes anfitriones, nos    guiaron e informaron siempre y respondieron rápidamente a cada inquietud, a tres cuadras del apartamento pasa una línea de metro que conecta con toda la ciudad, el apartamento es altamente recomendable!!
the apartment is small but very cosy and clean. Cristina and Grady are very friendly and helped us with everthing. We recommend that flat.

It's a lovely apartment in a tranquil neighborhood. Close to some nice bars and places for breakfast and lunch. Metro is on walking distance.

The apartment was very clean with nice beds. Communication with Grady and Christina was clear and they always responded quickly.

I will defenitly visit this apartment again during my next stay!

We can really recommend the apartment of Grady and Christina. It's a small but very clean  and comfortable place with everything you'll need. There are a lot of good restaurants nearby and also some grocery stores.

Be aware that the apartment is on the 5th floor without an elevator. ;)
The apartment is compact but well equipped.

We had a great time! great neighborhood, very close to everything. We walked most places or took the subway which are also near by. 

Keep in mind it is on the 5th floor with NO elevator, we knew this in advance so it wasn't an issue but bringing up the luggage was a little difficult in the narrow hallways.

The emergency alarm for the roof door went off all night our first night, I messaged Grady and Cristina at 2-3am and they responded immediately and notified the super. They werent able to turn it off until morning but I did appreciate the quick responses even tho it was very late.
Easy to stay awake in the living room/kitchen without disturbing family in the two bedrooms. Clean and fresh place. :)

Grady and Cristina were gracious hosts. Their place was clean and located close to everything. They communicated well and made me feel very welcomed. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to
others!
It was clean and in safe location. I had a comfortable stay.

The flat was amazing. It is located close to many very good restaurants and breakfast places and just a few crossroads from the next metro station. It is also in walking distance to the staten island ferry and the financial district. The flat is very clean and comfy and upon our arrival the beds were ready and a pile of fresh towels and extra blankets waited for us. Our hosts had given us many good suggestions for restaurants and things to do before arrival and were always reachable during our stay, even for small things like us not knowing how to switch on the radiator. We were also able to leave luggage after official check-out to be able to do some more sight seeing on our last day. We could not have had a more comfortable stay!

Cristina & Grady have been perfect guest! 
The apartment was nice, quiet and clean; very good location, near the metropolitan station. 
The communication has been always fast and clear.
We had a very good stay!

We had a fantastic time in New York, made better by good, clean and accessible accommodation. Communication with Grady and Cristina before the trip was fantastic, and being a group of four girls meant that the flat worked so much better for us than if we were staying in a hotel.  The flat is a 5min walk from the nearest subway and 30mins from the city centre. We explored the local area as well, East Village being walking distance, as is Brooklyn Bridge and we went to a local bar, 2 mins from their flat, which was great and made a change from the expensive and touristy bars in parts of central Manhattan. Thank you so much for letting us stay in your home

Grady and Cristina's place was perfect for what we needed. Close to The Subway and lots of cool cafes and bars. The place was spotless with lots of extra towels and blankets if we needed them. Communication between the hosts was very easy and organized and same with the check in process. Would stay again

We had a great time in Cristina and Grady's apartment. It is well stocked with great amenities and close to the subway. The apartment is cosy and warm which was great for a New York winter. Thanks guys we had a blast.
Great place and great communication during and before stay
This is a great location in an historic settlement area. Accommodation was great and hosts were really helpful

This beautiful apartment has it all.  Great location in the lower east side.  The rooms were spacious and the decor was very nice.  Yes, it's on the 5th floor and there is no elevator, but there aren't a lot of steps and the floors are close together so it's not a big deal at all, it's even a welcome little bit of exercise.  And from the 5th floor there is even a bit of a view.  The check in was very easy with the key cafe right down the street.  Cristina and Grady were very accommodating.  Modern kitchen and bathroom and appliances. Highly recommended!

We had such a nice time here! The apartment itself is exactly as pictured, and the location is great. Grady & Cristina were very welcoming and had everything prepare for us. From all the towels to laundry detergent, we had everything we needed for our stay. They even have a guest manual, which is the best thing ever. Grady & Cristina have it all when it comes to this cozy apartment! Thanks again for everything!
Appartement propre et bien placé pour visiter, transports en commun accessibles à pied, hôtes réactifs aux messages. Super.
Great location, house was comfortable. Excellent price.
Great neighborhood  night life great , restaurants and very calm .
12 Corners Coffee near by is the best thing ever!
Very easy process, great place. No real complaints!!

Great location, great flat, within walking distance from East Broadway station, line F which will take you everywhere in Manhattan... 
Nice apartment after a long day walking around in the city.
Highly recommended !

Grady & Cristina were excellent hosts and their apartment is an ideal value for people wanting to explore the city. Very close to subway system and near to a lot of really cool spots in the East Village, this apt. was everything we needed and more. Extremely clean and well cared for with an extremely painless automated check in/out process. We couldn't recommend this stay highly enough!

Great apartment and it is exactly as described and even better! Lower East Side is an amazing area with quality coffee shops, restaurants and bars and the apartment is minutes away from Metro stations which can take you everywhere. Walking distance to Chinatown and Soho as well!! 
Very clean and cozy apartment and easy automated checkin and checkout process. Also it has all the needed amenities. 

Thanks Grady and Christina

The apartment was clean, cozy and perfect for our stay. Beds comfortable, kitchen was perfect. Hosts were extremely involved in communicating with us (which I found unnecessary, but some people new to Airbnb might find reassuring). The key drop was convenient and quick. My only issue was that we were told the day before we left that they 'might' need to show the apartment with 24-hours notice. While the hosts generously offered to accept any cancellation (I assume they would have refunded us despite the strict cancellation policy setting) and were apologetic, this didn't give us enough time to find other accommodation and a frustrating experience leading up to the trip.
Les hôtes sont très sympas et réactifs mais nous étions déçus du logement car il est mal insonorisé.

Great location that is off the beaten path but provides easy access to subway. This 5th floor walk-up was perfectly clean and decorated.  Quite, comfortable and cozy, our party of 4 enjoyed cooking meals and eating out at the variety of restaurants available.  Deli's and stores were conveniently located and the neighborhood was quite at night too.  All around fantastic place!
G&C's place was very clean and comfortable. Great location for us as it was close to family. Excellent communication! Thanks!!
10/10 would recommend.
Great space -- in a very interesting part of NYC!  Loved it!

What a great stay this was! From the room and location to the decor, I enjoyed my stay with my family. The apartment was the perfect distance away from the nearest subway. The room was quiet, yet I still felt like I was in the heart of the city. The apartment is equipped with everything one might need. Thank you to the gracious hosts who checked in on my family and me frequently!

name: MAUI Oceanfront Condo. A 1 bd.1 ba.
summary: DIRECT OCEANFRONT. Oceanfront lawn, terrific views, full kitchen, washer/dryer,  granite counters, tile floors, oceanfront lanai, all supplies, beach gear,  quiet with pool, jacuzzi/spa, BBQ, quality queen bed,  free wi-fi & parking.  Nearby uninhabited 5 mile beach walk, Rooms have louvered windows /screens  that allow cooling breezes.  No smoking allowed. The neighborhood is  peaceful and scenic. Centrally located to explore all of Maui, 18 minutes to airport. Adults only.  No pets or animals.
space: Panoramic views of the ocean; ocean sounds  thoughout the condo day & nite, private 3rd floor balcony away from the pool area. Abundant free parking. Popular honeymoon quality condo: granite counters, tile floors, Egyptian cotton linens, recessed lightings.  Fully equipped kitchen.; washer, dryer,detergent, soaps, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, shampoo, conditioner, sun lotions, coffee, beach gear, binoculars for whale watching, etc.
description: DIRECT OCEANFRONT. Oceanfront lawn, terrific views, full kitchen, washer/dryer,  granite counters, tile floors, oceanfront lanai, all supplies, beach gear,  quiet with pool, jacuzzi/spa, BBQ, quality queen bed,  free wi-fi & parking.  Nearby uninhabited 5 mile beach walk, Rooms have louvered windows /screens  that allow cooling breezes.  No smoking allowed. The neighborhood is  peaceful and scenic. Centrally located to explore all of Maui, 18 minutes to airport. Adults only.  No pets or animals. Panoramic views of the ocean; ocean sounds  thoughout the condo day & nite, private 3rd floor balcony away from the pool area. Abundant free parking. Popular honeymoon quality condo: granite counters, tile floors, Egyptian cotton linens, recessed lightings.  Fully equipped kitchen.; washer, dryer,detergent, soaps, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, shampoo, conditioner, sun lotions, coffee, beach gear, binoculars for whale watching, etc. Your own private use of the entire condo. Only by phone or
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, dead end street, no crowds or traffic. Haycraft Park beach is 150 yd. walk down the sidewalk, with sandy swimming beach & a 5 mile uninhabited beach walk. Snorkeling & kayaking directly in front of resort.  Maalaea Harbor excursions, shops, and restaurants are 1 block away. The neighborhood is very peaceful and scenic. It is right On the waterfront. Centrally located to explore all Maui has to offer. Walking distance to the harbor for whale watching, fishing and snorkeling trips. There are restaurants, an aquarium, shops and a bar that serves great food just a few blocks away. At the end of our street is Sugar Beach, the best and longest barefoot walking beach on Maui.
notes: 5 night minimum stay. Abundant free parking.  Easy access via ground floor elevator. W(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)-- local mgr.
transit: Bus is one block away.
access: Your own private use of the entire condo.
interaction: Only by phone or internet.   Direct access from parking lot to elevator No front desk or check in required.
house_rules: No animals. No smoking anywhere in or near the building. No loud noises please.  Pool/lawn area is closed 9 pm to 8am.

host.host_about:
Professional  semi retired Stanford Grad interested in swimming, 
yoga, anti-aging, fitness, and meditation.
As a guest  I am pretty  quiet and relaxed, and
usually on my computer.
I am a nonsmoker., vegetarian

reviews.comments: Ron's condo is great. Its not only clean and well equipped, but also has an amazing ocean view from the patio. One day we saw sea turtles in water from the patio, which was a pleasantly surprising experience.

This place was fantastic. Great location, very clean and fully stocked with everything you could ever want. Amazing views from the lanai and it was so close to the ocean. We enjoyed many nights sat out on the lanai watching the turtles. If you are renting a car and exploring this amazing island then this condo makes a fantastic base as the location is prefect for exploring both the north and the south of the island. All the grounds, BBQ and pool area and very well maintained and clean. 10/10.

Beautiful view from the windows over looking the ocean and palm trees. Great location. You can walk down to the harbor where there are a couple stores, restaurants and coffee. Walk down the other way to a nice sandy beach. Lots of sea turtles in the water right out side. Perfect base to drive and explore the island from.

Our stay by Ron's condo was fantastic! It was not only tidy and clean, but also well equiped with anyhing you need. I have to mention the porable excursion cooler that made our trip to Hana and beach stay much more enjoyable with chilled beverages. The view of the condo was spectacular! Sitting on the lanai you can enjoy the full view of the ocean and turtles in it. The location is perfect for exploring the island either east or west, since it's in the middle.
Amazing apartment and owner!!!

Ron made our stay in Maui very easy! He made sure that we had all of the info about getting to the condo and what to expect during our stay. This location was perfect for us as we wanted something pretty central to be able to get all over the island. Right out your window there is a beach with endless turtle sightings. The beach directly in front of the condo is a little rocky but there is sandy beach you can easily walk to just a couple minutes down the road. The condo can get stuffy and the AC unit isn't the strongest but coupled with the ceiling fans we were comfortable. The complex is quiet, clean and relaxing! Would stay here again if I travel back to Maui!

Ron was very accessible and answered our emails right away. The place was in a good central location to quickly get to the airport, Kihei and Lahaina. Every day we say a lot of turtles hanging out in the water right out back. It was very clean, very quiet and had plenty of parking. The AC unit is a window unit in the living room area- which would be fine most of the year. They had record temps the week we were there so it got really hot in the bedroom (even with the fans on.) But, I'm sure any other time the small window unit would be totally fine. Cable and wifi worked great for the stormy nights we were stuck inside!  We would stay here again for sure!
Really nice house front beach, you can hear the waves from the house and the balcony..Ron was kind and east to conversation and get information. Thank you Ron!

Easy, relaxing, and stress free!  The apartment was clean, bright, open, & airy.  My wife and I got married just a few days before in Oahu and wanted to get further away for our honeymoon, Ron's place was perfect.  You're not staying in the heart of Maui but you're better off especially if you plan to do any fishing or snorkeling, most of the boats depart walking distance from your unit at the marina.  Only needed to use the AC one day and this was during an unusual hot spell in Hawaii.  Falling asleep to the sounds of the ocean is so amazingly relaxing .  Most places close early so you might want to do some grocery shopping, but Beach Bums BBQ and Ma’alaea General Store & Cafe are in the marina and totally worth checking out.  We actually missed our flight back to Oahu grabbing food from the general store...and it was worth it!  
Your view from the lanai can't be beat, you have surfers riding the fastest right in the world and sea turtles all right in front of you.
   Our only complaint is the bathroom, there is no fan and the vent does not work great, so pick up some spray or incense.

Our stay  was fantastic! The condo was clean, tidy and well equiped with anyhing you needed. There were boogie boards, snorkel gear, beach towels/chairs, cooler, just to name a few.   The view of the condo was unreal!  The sights and sounds of crashing waves were just amazing.  We sat on the lanai and had our breakfast with a full view of the ocean.  The location is perfect for going just about anywhere in Maui.  If you want nightlife and good restaurants, you're just a few miles away from downtown Kihei.  I would highly recommend Ron's condo!

We had an outstanding time in Maui at Ron Hansen's Oceanfront condo! It was (Website hidden by Airbnb) advertised (a 5 out of a 5). We had a unit that overlooked a pristine beach, with sea turtles out swimming every morning and a gorgeous view! The condo was clean, private and very quite. The barbecue area was perfect for barbecuing fresh fish while watching the sunset. The condo was close to a harbor with super restaurants (we loved the Beach Bum!) and shops within walking distance. Ron had beach supplies, blankets, bogey boards, snorkel equipment and small coolers. It was perfect in every way we had a beautiful, relaxing Hawaiian vacation. Thank you Ron!

Great Place to stay. We highly recommend this apartment. You get everything you need there.People around are very friendly, too.
We also saw a lot of turtles every day and the spa was also really great in the evening.  The communication with Ron was easy and friendly. He takes care about his guests even if he isn't around. Thank you!

We enjoyed our stay at this beautiful place.
1) central located and easy access to South Maui and airport
2) walking distance to a beach park and nice beach walk to a bird sanctuary (morning and evening are the best time)
3) Nice porch for whale watch and relax.
4) very nice stacked kitchen (common ingredients ) for cooking.
5)beach chairs, cooler and snorkeling fins in the apartment made our beach trip much more enjoyable.
We truly enjoyed our vacation here and felt like at home with all the things we needed.

Thank you again!

Rong-Rong

Ron's condo made for an amazing time in Maui. Everything came as advertised! Bed was comfortable, quiet surrounding, 15 min to airport and the gas grill and the fully equipped kitchen made for a nice low key dinner around the condo for one evening. All residents were very nice and accommodating.

My wife and I had a very positive experience staying at Ron's condo. The view was beautiful and the location was perfect. The condo was clean and had everything we could possibly need during our stay. Ron was an excellent host and I would certainly recommend to others.

Ron's generous-sized condo on Maui is beachfront, with an amazing view and the  soothing sound of the waves curling on the sand.  We had sundowners every night on the small beach in front of our apartment, watching huge Green SeaTturtles twist and turn in the surf.  .The condo itself is in very good condition, light, bright and very clean.  The kitchen is well-equipped and the wifi worked perfectly.  The pool area, hot tub and barbecue facilities were well-kept and came in handy.  There is an elevator and condo trolleys to hoist suitcases and groceries to the third floor.  It's a quiet and peaceful location.  Very relaxing.

Ron is an excellent host, very organised and a good communicator.  We enjoyed our stay and would recommend this as a very enjoyable apartment.

The condo was very quite which made for a very relaxing vacation. Location and amenities were fantastic, and there were no unexpected expenses or surprises. Ron was very accommodating which made our first stay in Maui very pleasant. On site bbqs were a great convenience and the on site staff were very helpful! Enjoyed watching the sea turtles from the balcony. And we cant forget the AMAZING VIEW!!! Unforgettable!!

I had a great time here in Maui and most of it, I must say, is thanks to my beautiful accommodations. The condo is located perfectly in between everything with only a 20 minute drive or so to wherever you would like to go. I must admit that my favorite part of the condo was waking up and walking to the patio and seeing the mountains and the beautiful ocean. If I were to go back to Maui any time soon I would definitely book this place again!

Ron's condo was on the top floor (3rd), quiet, clean, comfortable,  and had an amazing ocean front balcony. Easy and free parking for rented cars, and convenient location to explore all of Maui from!  There's limited dining or grocery places within walking distance, but no problem for us.
It was a great stay, perfect location, very well organized and very clean. We will come back.

The view was to die for. Not only full glass wall with sliding doors to the patio, but large mirrors on each side of the patio combined to create a nearly 180 degree panorama of blue sky, palm trees and ocean just a few hundred feet across the well-manicured lawn. The small town, within walking distance was laid back, with a decent burger/brew place and a couple of upscale restaurants. 

Twenty minutes from the airport and all the usual mainland amenities, Safeway, Costco, fine dining or McD's, entertainment etc.

Had trouble with the door code, called Ron, and we figured it out, and then he talked me through the entire condo mentioning where various switches were and helping me to orient immediately.

It happened to be unseasonable hot but the openness of the layout to the tradewinds helped a lot, and the AC was adequate to the task when necessary.

I'd recommend Ron and his condo unreservedly if you're looking for a beautiful, quiet place to stay, with few tourists on the street and within reach of nearly everything (except Hana of course).

Check in and out was very smooth. Do yourself a favor and be sure to read the folder included in the rental. It gives you lots of useful information about the property and what's available to you.

Specific things to note that may not have been mentioned elsewhere yet:
* You are expected to do some laundry before you check out. 
* We didn't use the AC at all. Keeping the door open and fans on kept the place nice and cool.
* There is shampoo, conditioner, bar soap provided. Some previous guests also left behind lotion and sun block.
* The pantry is stocked with the necessities (salt, pepper, oil), as well as some non-necessities like seasonings, and random things guests have left behind.
* There's coffee beans in the freezer
* There's a shelf in the building lobby that has books for borrow
Very clean nice condo. We would stay there again. We enjoyed that it was away just a little bit from town for privacy and building manager was very helpful.
Great place with great views and a fantastic location. Restaurants, activities and everything else is right by it.
The condo was clean and full with required amenities. The view from the balcony was awesome.

Rons place is perfect for singles and couples looking for an ocean side getaway with the wonderful views and access to some awesome snorkeling and turtles at Sugar beach! The convenience of being near the aquarium and Kihei was an added bonus as well. My husband and I really enjoyed our stay and the ocean waves at night!
The condo was very comfortable & had everything we needed. The views were magnificent & we had a panoramic view of the weather changes.
Ron's place was great. The view is incredible and the apartment was clean and well-stocked. Getting settled in was easy thanks to the keyless entry, too.

Ron's place was great and in a central location. Just be careful about getting caught in the afternoon traffic. 

Ron is quick to respond, nice and has some great tips on where to get rentals from. Just message him and he will gladly give you advice. 

The condo was great and had a beautiful view of the small beach and in the evenings you can see the turtles popping their heads up. i also saw some people snorkeling from the beach but its not recommended for sunbathing. The Condo was nice and clean. we didn't need to put the AC on because there was always a breeze flowing through out the condo. Ron's place was fully equipped with everything you need from cook ware, spices, and beach stuff like cooler, boogie boards, snorkel gear, beach mats, umbrella,  sunblock, etc. all you need to bring is your clothes and food to cook if you plan on eating at the condo. the bed was comfy and had plenty of pillows and blankets. 

the condo also had a pool and Jacuzzi. the pool was great for day time use but once the shade fell it was cold, so the Jacuzzi was a great in the evenings. there was also 2 grills that we used often. All in all it was a great place and great location. i would highly recommend Ron's place and we hope to be back to visit again soon.  Thank you Ron!

We just returned from spending our honeymoon at the condo and it was absolutely amazing! I wish we could have made it a two-week visit. The condo has everything you could need for fun at the beach, which is a short walk away. The ocean water was perfect as well. The view from the balcony of the condo is stunning and the breeze that flows through the unit when the windows are open is awesome. Thank you, Ron, for providing a scenic condo at an affordable price!

We stayed at Ron's place for our five year anniversary. The condo is in a great location, a very short drive away from many of the top places to go in Maui. You are walking distance from Maalaea Harbor, where there is a great aquarium and where many of the snorkeling trips depart. From the start, everything with our trip went very smoothly. Ron is a great host who is always available to answer any questions about the condo or Hawaii in general. As others have written, the view from the condo is unbelievable. There's a great sized lanai/balcony to watch the ocean from. We enjoyed many meals on the balcony. The condo complex also has a very nice pool and BBQ area. There's a very nice sandy white beach just a short walk away. As others have said, the easiest way to keep the apartment cool is to open the windows up and use fans. There is a window AC unit near the patio door that cools down the dining/living room area well, but we found that the AC's cooling does not reach the bedroom adequately and it stays fairly warm in there if the windows are not open. With the windows open, a nice breeze flows through the place. Overall, the value you get here can't be beat, nor can the view. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend the place.

The condo we stayed at had a beautiful ocean view, perfect for us as we were on our honeymoon. It was clean, quiet, and quite close to a lot of attractions. The kitchen was excellent, well stocked with utensils, dishes, etc. There were also snorkeling gear and beach stuff. The amenities in the building were good. The AC in the living room was not strong enough for the bedroom. But it didn't bother our sleep as the fan in the bedroom worked well. Ron was very helpful and excellent in communication. We enjoyed our stay and recommend it.
From the moment we walked in, we were blown away by how great this condo was. Our honeymoon was made much more special by the view and location of Ron's place.
This place was superb. It was everything we expected and more! We'd definitely consider Ron's place on our next visit to Maui.

This condo has everything you could imagine needing for a Hawaiian vacation, including boogie boards, snorkel gear and fins, beach towels. Awesome location within walking distance of the state aquarium and the wharf for Pacific Whale Foundation cruises.

The hardest part about Ron's place was how hard it was to wake up in my regular home once the vacation was over.  This place was AMAZING.  View is GORGEOUS.  Sat on balcony every night and watched the surf.  Started every morning with breakfast on balcony overlooking ocean with sun shining on us. PARADISE.  Central location was perfect.  Easy drive to Kihei and Lahaina, but great to have a quiet more secluded place to return to each night.  Beautiful long beach is a 2 minute walk. Great to have washer and dryer in the place.  Perfect, perfect, perfect! A++++
Ron’s place, only made are stay in Maui much more enjoyable. We would definitely stay here again.

Ron’s place is amazing!!  The view from the Lana’i is fabulous. There’s something magical about waking  up and falling asleep to the sound of the ocean. The location is great as well, very central  and easy to get to Kihei, Paia or Lahaina.  I’ve also never stayed in an Airbnb that was so stocked with everything from paper towels to beach chairs, boogie boards and snorkeling gear.  If that wasn’t enough it’s walking distance from a beach and  the wharf where you can go on whale watching or  snorkeling cruises.  Really great place. I would definitely stay there again next time in Maui.
It’s a very relaxing  property , nice grounds Awesome views

We stayed in Ron's condo number 318. The condo was very clean and had an amazing view right on the ocean. Everything you could possibly need is supplied for you in the condo. We cooked many meals there and all of the utensils, cooking equipment, spices, etc...that we needed were there. The condo is perfect for two people. Also, you never need the air conditioning because the breeze flows through the condo nicely. It was centrally located in Maui which made it easy to get to other parts of the island. We absolutely loved staying there and highly recommend renting from Ron as he is quick to respond to any questions or problems you may have. I look forward to booking with him again!!

Ron's place was great.  The location was perfect for travel all around the island - only 15 min to Lahaina or Kehei, and a short trip to the other side of the island.  The condo was very neat and clean, and what was especially nice is that Ron has it stocked with the every day amenities, like spices and condiments, as well as beach equipment.  With a washer/dryer inside, it was perfect. We even got greeted by sea turtles wading up to the shore just feet in front of us while sitting on the bench in front of the condo -- what an experience!

While the location may seem a bit off the beaten path, it offered great access to multiple areas of the Island. The condo complex is very well maintained and Ron's unit is well stocked for fun at the beach. The public beach just down the street is a hidden gem. Great view from the balcony of the vocano and entire south bay including many whales.

Nestled just north of Kihei and right on the water in ma’alaea harbor, you’ll find this Jem. As soon as you walk into Ron’s wonderfully located condo, you’ll be greeted with that AMAZING Maui ocean view. The windows span from wall to wall facing the ocean and leave nothing to be desired. You’ll immediately feel relaxed and want to kick your feet up on the Lanai. The unit is nicely stocked with all items you will need for your week stay. Very comfortable, clean and thoughtfully decorated. Ron was an amazing host and would not hesitate to rent again. Mahalo Ron
The views were amazing right off the  patio. Sat and whale watched for hours.

Just returned home from a week in Maui.  Really enjoyed Ron's condo - which was set with everything a person could want or need.  Fully stocked kitchen and everything you would need for a day at the beach. Very quiet surroundings and a quick walk to the beach.  It was a beautiful experience to sit on the lanai and see a momma whale with her calf in the bay every morning.

This place has a lovely view - we watched sea turtles from the balcony and enjoyed falling asleep to the sound of the waves. The condo is well stocked with both its kitchen supplies and beach gear, which includes chairs, beach towels, cooler, umbrella and snorkeling gear- everything you need! Ron is very hospitable; he was easy to communicate with, and checking in was simple. The area (and condo complex) is nice and quiet while also being very close to great food and activities in all directions- plus a nice coffee shop & delicious restaurant in walking distance; really, it's the perfect middle if you want access to everything on the island. Be ready to throw a load of laundry in the night before you leave, especially if you used multiple towels (the dryer takes a little while- not excessive, but easier to do the night before than the morning of.) We had a very comfortable, enjoyable stay and would definitely come back!
Great view, easy access, clean and fully equipped kitchen.   Great patio for morning coffee and watching 6-8 turtles frolic straight out on shoreline.
Close to everything, wonderful views, ocean literally right outside the living room window. Sea turtles were my favourite part!! They were they everyday.

This place over exceeded our expectations. Wow!

There were so many amenities available that we didn’t even think of needing until we saw them. We cooked a lot in the kitchen and anything you could think of was already available to use! 

The location was great! Quiet, not too far from other cities/the harbor for doing excursions/airport. There were other residents in separate condos, but you never hear anyone really. The waves of the ocean drown out all noise if there ever was any. 

The balcony was amazing; View of the ocean, mirrors on the balcony walls to make sure you catch every angle of the ocean. It also helped to create an illusion that you were alone in one place. I loved that. Great sunrise views. Turtles every single day! That was so cool! Coffee in the morning watching the sunrise is a must do. 

There was an A/C unit but we never used it, cause when you open all the windows the breeze races through the house and feels great! 

Honestly, there were so many positives about this place I can only come up with one negative: Having to leave. 

This is definitely a five star location! I would return anytime! Highly recommend it!

Thanks Ron!

Le condo est très propre et bien équipé. Le lit est confortable.  Il ne manque rien au condo.  La vue du balcon permet de voir les tortues.  Dormir la porte patio ouverte et entendre le bruit des vagues est juste magique.  Le condo est bien situé pour visiter l’ile.  Je le recommande à tous.

Everything you need for a nice vacation is here. It's got a nice view of a rocky beach area where you can watch the green sea turtles. Saw more here than when we went diving at Molokini and Turtle Town. A nice quiet location  close to the marina which worked well for us as our Maui Dive boat left from here and we could walk there. There was all the equipment you would need for snorkeling and going to the beach (umbrellas, chairs, mats, boards). 
It was hot and muggy at times but we got good air flow with windows and the sliding door open. On the worst day we used the air conditioner.
The pool is not very big but it was very nice. There were plenty of chairs and loungers. It was pretty quiet during our time there. We did eat in and it was nice to have the kitchen stocked with condiments and some basics. We ate out once a day usually and found ourselves heading to Kehei. 
My husband and I were very comfortable here.

Rons place is right on the water. Easy to get to from the airport about a 15-20min drive. Quiet location we were able to watch the sea turtles swim at night. The kitchen is very well stocked. We were able to cook dinner many nights. Easy walk to the harbor and the few shops there. Easy drive to Kihei and Lahaina. Unit is very clean. Free parking. Small beach on property. Short drive to Sugar beach. We really enjoyed our stay.

Wow!  Great location on the west coast of Maui!  Breath taking views of ocean, Haleakala, Lanai, Molokai and Molokini.  Every late afternoon we sat outside on the balcony and watched large numbers of sea turtles swimming.  Great location that is close to beautiful beaches, Lahaina and the harbor!  

The condo is clean and well kept.  Quiet and well maintained.  Lovely!  We hope to come back and visit again!  Thank you Ron!
Sea Turtles right out front your door.  Included all the beach toys you need for a day out! Central location to get to both sides of the island easily. Great spot!

We stayed 5 nights at Ron's place. We picked his place because of the view, location, value laundry and air conditioning. The view of Malaalea Bay is fantastic.  We were able to see sea turtles swimming just of off the beach. There are a few restaurants and shops in Malaalea but the location was convenient to drive to most places on the island.  After several days of traveling it was nice to have laundry available in the unit. Although we specifically chose someplace that had A/C we did not end up needing to use it. Ron has the place well stocked with almost everything you could use.

I was really happy about this location. 

Excellent views from balcony, well equipped with snorkeling equipment, boards, sun lotion, coffee, etc. 
Good parking situation 

Only downside: I could hear the TV through the walls from apt below to the left. 

Probably would pick the place again though
Beautiful view! We watched turtles from the balcony every morning. The space was clean and close to the beach. We would definitely stay here again.

Great place to stay in Maui. Location right off the beach gives you a beautiful view every morning. Sea Turtles can be seen all times of the day enjoying themselves in the ocean outside the condo from the balcony. Easy access to all different areas of Maui by car, nothing is too far away leaving you options of where to go each day. 

We appreciated the stuff provided in the condo for our use, be it coffee all the way to snorkeling gear, beach chairs and more. 

While A/C is available we never had to use it between the use of fans and having windows open on each side of the condo for a wonderful cross breeze. 

We would stay here again and cant wait for our return to Maui.
amazing view and easy to work with.  Answered my questions and the local area was better than any other area on the island for weather and crowds

Ron's place is a great place to stay in Maui. It has beautiful views and you can see sea turtles swimming from the balcony. The location was pretty convenient to drive to most places on the island. It was very helpful for us to have laundry available in the unit. The  place is very well stocked with everything you need.

Vue exceptionnelle sur la mer, condo et terrain très propres. Tous les équipements pour la cuisine étaient présents, même les équipements pour aller à la plage (chaise, planche de surf, apnée).  Piscine et spa très propres. Je le conseille fortement !!

Ron’s place was a perfect way to extend our stay in Maui. The condo is clean, well-equipped with everything you need and a peaceful place to wake up to every morning. We enjoyed the whales and the sea turtles and the stars. The beach is a short walk/run away and great for swimming and snorkeling. We did the Road to Hana and visited Lahaina and Kihei easily. Nice central location. Would highly recommend if you’re looking for a home base to explore Maui!
This was just as advertised, the location was great for us. Try out the grill in the common area, you will be sure to meet some nice folks. Nice quiet beach is a short walk away.

Amazing Airbnb that exceeded our expectations. Turtles swimming right outside that you can easily see from the balcony. Walking distance to an outstanding secluded beach. We saw breaching whales and a rainbow. Highly recommend to anyone!
Highly recommend. Clean, central . Great view! Would not hesitate to stay here again!

name: Double Bedroom in shared Apt by Boqueria & Ramblas
summary: Spacious bright double bedroom with private balcony in a brand renewed shared apartment located in the heart of BCN in the eclectic neighbourhood of Raval where the coolest venues are.  Walking distance from all place of interest, around the corner from Ramblas (Liceu).
space: The apartment that cannot be more centric is located at the 3rd floor and the stairs are narrow, as an expert traveller I always suggest to bring small luggage it gives you more freedom beside I provide towels, sheets, soaps and everything you need. The guest room is quite big with a private balcony, next to the entrance door and the bathroom. Balconing is not recommended as the street below is very hard :-) On the other side of the flat after the living room there is my room.  I live in the red light street, so if you don't like to see prostitutes in the street please don't choose my place or if you come do not give me a bad evaluation for the location, location is perfect and they were here before me and you.
description: Spacious bright double bedroom with private balcony in a brand renewed shared apartment located in the heart of BCN in the eclectic neighbourhood of Raval where the coolest venues are.  Walking distance from all place of interest, around the corner from Ramblas (Liceu). The apartment that cannot be more centric is located at the 3rd floor and the stairs are narrow, as an expert traveller I always suggest to bring small luggage it gives you more freedom beside I provide towels, sheets, soaps and everything you need. The guest room is quite big with a private balcony, next to the entrance door and the bathroom. Balconing is not recommended as the street below is very hard :-) On the other side of the flat after the living room there is my room.  I live in the red light street, so if you don't like to see prostitutes in the street please don't choose my place or if you come do not give me a bad evaluation for the location, location is perfect and they were here before me and you. - There
neighborhood_overview: -The apartment is located in the most characteristic street of Raval called "Robadors" (robbers street) beside the beautiful "Rambla the Raval" with Botero's cat. Raval is the most alive and eclectic neighbourhood (Barrio) of Barcelona: here you can find the coolest bars, restaurants and venues of the city. Ten years ago you probably would not have wanted to walk here, but now it is safe, a 5 star hotel opened around the corner (with free 360 views of the city at 11th floor) and the "Filmoteca" (Movies library) moved here recently. If you want a taste of the authentic Barcelona and you like multicultural and urban style, this is the place to come.  -Because we are in the red light district of Barcelona this is the most controlled place in the city.
notes: - Bed linen, towels, shower gel, shampoo, hairdryer provided. You don't need a big luggage either :-) - Please send me your flight and airline information when you book so that we can arrange a meeting time.  - Remember that there is immediate booking and restricted cancellation policy. Before booking please ask me anything you need. This is my house (with my furniture and taste) and I sublet a room per days, it is not a Bed and Breakfast. - The apartment is located on what is called the second floor but is actually the third, there is no elevator and stairs are narrow. - In the building there are other 4 families and some of them have been living here all their lives.  So please try to be as quiet as you can and be especially considerate when walking up and down the stairs. If anybody asks you: you are my friend not a tourist.  -In the city center is not easy to find a quiet place, in our street there are no cars, I have double glazers and I provide ear plugs. - In 2 years I had 3 gue
transit: - 5 minutes walk and you can take green line Liceu in Ramblas (to Park Guell and Gracia).  -In less than 10 minutes walk you are in Plaza Catalunya where you can find all transports (metro red and green, ferrocarriles, buses and night buses) to all Barcelona areas and surroundings including Airport and Tibidabo.  - If you walk 7 minutes direction west you can take purple line to Sagrada Familia.  - Monday to Saturday: big supermarket “Caprabo” behind the white building across the road and Condis and Carrefour 3 min walk. "DIA" grocery stores are opened also Sundays. - You can check my tourist and restaurant recommendation on my tourist guide on the listing and if I forget remember me to send you the link to mine too. - From the house you can also walk to Gothic (Cathedral), Raval, Born, Barceloneta (beach), Poble Sec, Eixample (Casa Batllo and Pedrera), Plaza Espanya and Montjuic everything will take less than 20 minutes because you are exactly in the middle of the city!
access: - There is only one guests room in the house and it is furnished with a double bed (135cm width), a sofa, a rack for clothes shoes and luggage, a small table and a bin, a private balcony with 2 stools and a small table. If you book for 1 or 2 people I will prepare only 1 double bed only. - Let me know in advance if you need me to prepare an extra single bed the cost is 30 euros extra at check in (unless you didnt book for 3 people in that case you have already paid for it) - The shared bathroom is located in front of your room. You have also access to a common kitchen and living room area. Feel like home!!! (Bed linens, shower gel, shampoo, toothpaste, towels and hairdryer are included). - No third party allowed
interaction: -I have started to share a room in my apartment after I was made redundant. SHARING IS CARING and actually Airbnb it is a lot of fun! I like to meet people from everywhere: if you cannot travel make the travel come to you! Feel free to ask me any questions and I will do my best to answer them and help you out!  -Don't be afraid to give me suggestions I want to make your staying the best possible and you will help me to improve my service. -If I am not at home you can reach me via the messaging tool in the Airbnb App anytime or via phone. - I am a certified Thai massage therapist book your session of 1hr before to come for only 20 euros. - I also sell vegan fresh cosmetics and food supplements let me know before to come if you are interested on trying something that I will be sure to have it, fresh products don't last long! search for tiziana-ringana in internet. - I organize an hike in Montjuic if you want to join book it: Mindfulness walk through Montjuic https://www.airbnb.co.uk/expe
house_rules: Before booking I always ask few questions to my guests to be sure they will have a good experience. In order to organize the check in. Can you please tell me your flight number and airline?  Why do u prefer Airbnb over and hotel? Do you come here on holiday work or else? Whom are you coming with? How old are you? What do u expect from your trip? Do you need 2 beds? Are you the person that will come for the check in?  There is anything you want to ask me?  Remember to agree the check in time before coming, there is no reception desk. Once you booked I will give for granted that you read and acknowledged the house description and that you accepted and will respect the following rules: HOUSE RULES-------------------HOUSE RULES ---------------HOUSE RULES---------------------- Please before booking read carefully everything I wrote in the listing and ask any question you want. Please remember you are booking a room in a private house not in a Bed and Breakfast, it is the same that sharing a

host.host_about:
I was born the 6th of February 1973 in a small village in the north east of Italy, between the Alps and the Adriatic sea. I love travelling, sharing cultures, cinema, music, outdoors activities, food and wine. I have been living abroad for long time and I finally found home in Barcelona. Since I have been enjoying Airbnb as a guest and after I was made redundant I became an host and I do my best to make my guests happy too. If you cannot travel make the TRAVELLERS come to you!  
I Welcome you to come to my place and share it with me, I will give you good tips more as a traveller than a tourist and I will take good care of you. You will live a local experience but just keep in mind that my house IS NOT A CHEAP HOTEL and that I will love you more if you respect my way of living when you are here.
I HATE WASTING so please take a good care of everything I borrow you and do not throw away things we can still use: unused tickets, maps, leaflets, travel guides and recycle as much as possible. Don't waste energy, water, paper, food, etc and keep it clean and neat. If you like consumerism, wasting, do not like recycling and sharing I think this is not the right place for you.
Finally I live in the red light street, so if you don't like to see prostitutes in the street please don't choose my place or if you come do not give me a bad evaluation for the location, location is perfect and they were here before me and you. I am a certified Thai massager do not hesitate to ask me one!
I organize an hike in Montjuic if you want to join book it: Mindfulness walk through Montjuic! Or ask me before because if you book it in a date when I have already bookings I will give you 5 euros back https://www.airbnb.co.uk/experiences/137199
If you like running you can also join us here https://abnb.me/jA2LbbytgM

reviews.comments: Tiziana is simply a delightful host! She met me at the nearby Hotel Barceló Raval and accompanied me to her precious little apartement on the third floor. The place was immaculately clean and the room beautifully prepared, and the bed most comfortable. Tiziana is charming, accomodating and speakes several languages. I enjoyed my stay thoroughly and look forward to returning there on my next trip to Barcelona.

The apartment is very nice, refurbished, very clean and confortable. The room is very big and very well aconditionated. You will enjoy your stay. It's located on Raval; a famous and popular neighborhood. Plenty a small shops and restaurants. And very near to Las Ramblas and the heart of Barcelona, beaches, port, ...
Tiziania is a perfect hostess. Always taking care of your needs and helping on discover new places on BCN. Always in very good mood and cheerfull.

It was an utterly pleasure to be hosted by Tizz. 
She was good at communicating, so it was easy to find the place. It gave a good feeling that she had everything under control.

Tizz is a warmhearted woman who shares her knowledge. A super hostess ☺

The place is located in the heart of Barcelona, and it is not far to all the sights.

Tizz is very welcoming and friendly host. I enjoyed meeting her and staying at her apartment. Apartment is very nice and new inside. It is not far to walk to the beach also easy access to the metro and to the airport bus. A good location and a good comfortable bed.

Tizz is queen of airbnb. She is absolute awesome and the perfect host one could pray for. The room is in mint condition and the apartment is in walking distance to all of a tourist's desires. Booking this place is so worth it and if I'd have to confess, being able to stay in this specific apartment may have been the seed to all my best times in Barcelona. Tizz, I am so grateful and I hope this isn't goodbye!
The host is so sweet and very accommodating , the location is convenient to get around (there's also a taxi stop that is close by) but the location is also not a comforting area
Tizz was super nice and it was easy to arrange a check-in time. Accurate listing. Nice clean room and a short walk to lots of different neighborhoods and close to a metro stop!

Très bon accueil et beaucoup d'attention de la part de Tizza qui était aux petits soins. Au-delà du sens de l'accueil des conseils utiles pour visiter la ville. La clim était la bienvenue...
Seul bémol, le quartier pas très bien fréquenté de jour comme de nuit !

Tizz was an amazing host! She is very nice and helpful and genuinely cares about her guests. Her apartment is in a very central location - easy walking distance to most sights as well as the metro. It is also a very comfortable apartment with good amenities. We hope to stay with her again the next time we are in barcelona!

Accoglienza ottima, camera comoda e spaziosa, ambiente pulito e tanta simpatia.
La descrizione dell posto è esatta e l'appartamento è veramente vicino al centro città.
Tizz è sempre disponibile e non fa mancare nulla!

Hey Tizz, thanks a lot. We had a really great time in Barcelona. It was all very uncomplicated. The flat was really clean and you were so friendly. We felt totaly compfortable. Thanks again and see you soon :) Christian

Un'esperienza al di fuori di ogni aspettativa! Con noi Tiziana, non è stata una semplice host, in lei abbiamo trovato una nuova amica.
Disponibile in tutto, accogliente come solo le persone sincere e solari sanno fare, Tiziana ci ha regalato una vacanza straordinaria!
L'appartamento si trova in una posizione invidiabile (Le Ramblas, tra i quartieri più famosi di Barcellona) e a pochi passi dai collegamenti metro, in un punto strategico da cui partire per raggiungere le altre attrazioni della città.
Pulito, accogliente, carino nella sua semplicità e dotato di ogni confort (aria condizionata, wifi, ecc...), è risultato perfettamente corrispondente alla descrizione e alle immagini dell'annuncio.
Logement très agréable et hôte hyper accueillante! Tizz nous a aidé dès que nous avions une question.
Tizz, is very charming and her place is Well located between the two Ramblas. If you need to fully enjoy Barcelona. This definetly the place to be.

Tizz was a great host, and was extremely helpful. From giving me suggestions of places to eat, to giving me advice and car rental information for my trip to Ibiza. She was great. The apartment is also conveniently located. Both the city center and beach were walkable. Couldn't have asked for anything more for my short stay in Barcelona.

Tizz' place is absolutely great. It is very cosy, the balcony is wonderful in the modning for breakfast and the apartment is situated perfectly close to the Rambla and the Harbour. On top of that Tizz is such a nice and pleasent host and the room, bathroom and kitchen is always so nice and clean. Tizz has, too, been very helpfull answering questions quickly before arrival, and when we arrived late at night she came to pick us up at the bus stop. Everything at Tizz' place worked out wonderfully well - go :)

Tizz was a great host, she welcomed us warmly and is a fun person to talk to. She really cares about her guests and made us recommendations on sightseeing plans and even once helped us out with spare shoes. We enjoyed her company a lot.

The apartment itself is newly renovated and has a nice wooden floor, very clean and modern bathroom and is generally a great cozy place to live. The only thing you should keep in mind (as Tizz already stated in the description) is that the neighborhood is quite loud and it therefore might be hard to relax for some people. Tizz provided free ear buds to against that, which made it better. The location of the apartment is really good! It is just a 2 minutes walk to La Rambla and only 5 minutes to the harbour. 

Overall, we had a great time at this place and were 100% happy with it. We can warmly recommend staying there.

Had a great stay in this apartment, Tizz was very friendly, helpful and welcoming! 

The location is perfect, just around the corner from Les Rambles and a short walk to the beach, with loads of great restaurants/bars around. Also very close to the metro and various modes of transport.

The apartment was lovely and very clean and Tizz provided us with towels and toiletries etc.

We had the best time in Barcelona, would highly recommend staying with Tizz!

My host Tizz was great! She was friendly and helpful. she thinks in advance of what you might need and treats you like family. She has a great heart. I left a week ago and we're still in touch and she helps me with any questions I have about Barcelona. The apartment is super cute. There is a balcony attached so that was a nice feature. Apt was very clean and had the things you would need. The area personally I prefer over gothik and born which is why I'll head back there for my last week in Barcelona.

We (3 persons) had a great stay at her apartment. We stayed over weekend, arriving Friday at Midnight, and Tizz picked us up at the airport, which was very very convenient.  She was friendly and helpful.
The apartment is located right in the middle of the centre, very very convenient.  The street itself is a bit lousy, but not too bad after all.  It has no elevator and only small stairs, so take care if you want to take a lot of luggage.
The apartment is small but beautiful, with a balcony, beds, clothes rack, towels, etc.  Super clean and has everything you need.
Recommended.

Tizz was a really warm and welcoming host . The communication before we arrived at BCN was really great so we found the apartment straight away. She wrote several messages asking about our arrival time and our flight number and sent us perfect description to the apartment. Just cool !!
The apartment is newly renovated and kept really clean all the time . It has a double bedroom with a balcony and an extra sofa , a living room with a new kitchen, a clean and very comfy bathroom and of course tizz's room .  We had the double bedroom with the extra sofa and I simply can say it was perfect for a couple like us .
