Tizz wasn't at home most of the time which made us few as if the apartment belongs to us ;) it's no problem to use everything in the house such as the oven or the fridge . Tizz also has some good tips for you if you have never been to Barcelona before . Especially some good restaurant tips . 
Within  a 3 minute walk from the apartment you reach La Rambla and about a 10 minutes walk to Placa Catalunya. There is even a supermarket directly across the street. 
If you really want to have a good time in such a beautiful city and also want to fell like you are actually living in Barcelona not just stepping by as a tourist  I just warmly can recommend Tizz's place.

Totally enjoyed staying with Tizz. The apartment is bright and impeccably clean and the room is a lovely private space. Tizz also made the time to come out and pick me up on the first day which made things so much simpler. We walked away from the experience as friends and I look forward to hosting her in return someday!

Tizz was an AMAZING host! She's super cool and super helpful!! Her place is even better than it was described! My boyfriend an I were so relieved,after a long day of sightseeing , to come back to a safe, homey, and EXTREMELY clean apartment! We'd DEFINETLY recommend Tizz to others as well as all of our friends traveling to Barcelona!

Tizz was great! She was always asking if we would like anything and was willing to give us advice on where to eat. She's traveled all over Europe and it was nice to chat with her about her adventures. The room was big enough for the three of us and we were very comfortable. Her place is really close to everything and an easy walk to most things, great trip great stay.

If you want to be at a good sport, a nice apartment and with a friendly host then I really recommend you Tizi! Shes a cool person and always there for you if you need anthing. Her apartment is very clean and close to the ramblas also on the way to the apartment there are many stores, which are open almost 24h so anytime you need something you just need to cross the road. I really recommend Tizi!
Tizz was really friendly, professional as Airbnb host. Flexible with check-in/out time. The place was clean and as it was described.  Reasonable price, convenient location. Highly recommend.

First of all thank you Tizz for having my boyfriend and I! Everything was awesome and we couldn't have asked for a better location than your apartment. The flat was just as pictured and very clean. The bed was super comfy and although the street was a bit noisy (almost all are in a lively town such as Barcelona) we slept very well. Tizz was a very considerate host, for example she provided ear plugs, towels and slippers. 
Concerning the neighborhood: One night our taxi driver commented that it's a "bad neighborhood", but that's only a bad reputation - we always felt safe. We would always come back, because we were super central, there lots of restaurants & bars are around the corner, and it's a 5 minute walk to Las Ramblas, a metro station and the harbor is also close by.

Tizz es muy acogedora y nos dio buenos consejos para conocer Barcelona que nos ayudaron mucho. Su apartamento es muy lindo y limpio. No tuvimos ninguna problema. Gracias, pasamos una estancia muy buena y quizas hasta la proxima!
Tizz was welcoming and warm.  I enjoyed her company and her apartment.

Tizz is an extremely accommodating, reliable and helpful hostess. Right from the start, from the minute I made my reservation to when my plane landed she made everything run smoothly and feel so easy. Her instructions we easy and her English is very good! I'm sure traveling used to be much more complicated thank this! I can only put this down to how much effort Tizz puts into making sure your stay runs as smoothly and efficiently as possible. The location of the apartment is so convenient, it's walking distance to the main attractions yet away from the touristy spots so quite safe from pick pockets. We joked that it is safer to have prostitutes around the corner than to stay on Las Ramblas with all the pick-pockets. I felt very safe in this area, with Tizz inside information you will feel like you get to experience a little bit of what it's like to live in Barcelona rather than to simply visit. I believe this is the very premise of what Airbnb was built on! Thank you Tizz, you do such a good job and were so generous. I would stay with Tizz again and highly recommend her room to friends and family and other Airbnb users, particularly for the solo female traveller!

The location of the room is really great. The appartment was clean and Tizz gave us a lot of tips where to go. You can close the blinds and it is dark in your room, so you can sleep late without sun that wakes you up.

The house is very centrally located. Just next to Ramblas, where main bars and shops are. Tizz is a very nice host, willing to help and advice for anything. She made us feel home and above all, the house is clean, neat and tidy. Highly recommanded for anybody. :)
The apartment was great. Tizz was very warm, welcoming and helpfull.

Ottima esperienza AirBnB da Tiz! L'appartamento si trova in una zona relativamente tranquilla, a due passi da tutte le attrazioni più interessanti di BCN e dalla fermata della metropolitana (Liceau). Camera spaziosa, letto comodo, appartamento super-pulito. Per qualsiasi informazione logistica/attrattiva Tiz è a disposizione con preziosi suggerimenti. Alloggio consigliato!

Great AirBnB experience! Apartment is close to the most principal attractions of BCN and Subway. If you need some informations about BCN, Tiz will helps you.
Nice room and apartment very clean. You must come to Tiz for your vacation in BCN!

Tizz was a great hostess. She made us feel very welcome, and  her presence at the apartement, her natural helpful and friendly behaviour gave us the feeling we left a friend.
The room feels very cosy and the neighbourhood very groovy and authentic, while being at a footstep from the main touristic attractions. highly recommended.

La estancia ha sido inmejorable. Nada más entrar en la casa ves que la casa está en excelentes condiciones,muy nueva y bien (Website hidden by Airbnb) habitación es amplia y cómoda y Tizz te facilita todo tipo de toallas o cosas que necesites(amabilísima). Es una chica muy cercana y nos hizo sentir verdaderamente como en casa. Sin duda alguna le ofreCemos la nuestra para cuando quiera. Un placer pasar unos días en este rinconcito del Raval. Un abrazo!
Best prepared host I ever met! Thanks a lot for the great stay and your effort to make it a good time in Barcelona. The flat was lovely and comfortable.

We had a great time at Tizz' apartment in Barcelona. She was very helpful throughout our whole journey and her apartment is located in the heart of Barcelona - so you can reach everything by foot, which is really convenient. 
We would definitely recommend her place and hope to be back anytime soon!

Tizz was so accommodating and really helpful. My flight was delayed and I unfortunately didn't arrive until 1.30am, but it was no problem at all. 
The room is very charming and quirky - great central location too! 
Thanks again!

Tizz est très sympathique et nous a mis très à l'aise  dans son appartement qui est très bien situé, près du centre de Barcelone.
Je la recommande chaleureusement.

Tizz was a great host! She is really warm and welcoming, she made check in and check out really easy and was always keen to hep. The apartment was spotlessly clean and having access to Tizz's kitchen was great. 

The location of the apartment is fantastic. We've stayed in Barcelona a few times and found this to be the best location for us. It's within easy walking distance of many local attractions in the city centre and is close to the metro so getting around to other parts of the city is really easy. It seems that everyone that writes a review for Tizz's place has to mention the fact that it's in the red light district but this seriously was not a problem at all, we walked around at night without any concerns and the street outside was really quiet at night.

Tizz was the perfect host, the apartment is lovely and in a great location. I wouldn't hesitate to stay with Tizz again, highly recommended!

We had the loveliest stay with Tizz in her great little apartment which is ideally located just a very short walk from La Rambla. 
The room was really spacious, comfortable and clean, with a small pretty balcony, perfect for my friend and I who were there for 4 nights for a city break! 
Tizz was wonderfully welcoming and had so many great recommendations for restaurants, bars and the best parts of the beach to head to. She gave us very clear directions from the airport and met us at a meeting point. 
We hope to be back again soon as we absolutely love Barcelona and would love to stay here again :)
Tizz muchas gracias por todo!

I just had 2 days in barce. The room is very nice, clean, as images. The host is so kind and helpful, even she helped us to carry heavy luggage. She often went outside, so we have full of space. The area is quite near La Rambla, just 5 minutes on walk.

The location of the apartment was ideal and had many great restaurant options close by. Safety was not a concern given the neighborhood's history. Tiziana has a very thoughtful, comprehensive guidebook with a lot of touristy and local places.  She was also very responsive, which was much appreciated when one of us got an injury and needed to go to the hospital. The downside was we were told to be extremely quiet and basically whisper or be completely silent whenever we were in front of the apartment or inside the stairwell in order to not disturb the neighbors due to AirBnb regulations in Barcelona. Considering the street was often far louder at night than we were, not really sure if it was really necessary. However, all in all, it was a good stay.

Tizz was the perfect host. She was nice, welcoming, helpful but still let us have our privacy. Couldn't have asked for more. Her appartment was cozy, very very clean, well decorated and very charming. The location was perfect.

Tizz hosts a great Airbnb for a competitive price in a super convenient part of town. She was very communicative and friendly. The apartment is clean and well-decorated. Follow her guidebook to experience awesome, local spots. Beware that this room does not have air conditioning directly venting into it. There is a fan, but my stay in late July was uncomfortably warm.

Tizz's place is perfect! She's so warming and welcoming and really makes you feel at home while Staying there. The apartment is in a perfect location and the room is great to stay in. Tizz went out of her way to recommend great places for dinner and also just talk to us. Such a great host and I recommend anyone going to Barcelona to stay here!!
Tizz is a very kind host! She gave us some very useful recommendations! Her flat was very bright and cozy. The location in the city centre but also not far away from the beach was perfect!

Tizz is a perfect host, nice, helpful, welcoming. I had a great time in Barcelona and can highly recommend this place. The location of the flat is simply perfect, the flat very clean and I was very happy to stay there for a few days. Would go there again.

Жилье чистое и соответсвует описанию, что для меня является самым важным. Шум за окном и девушки известной профессии совсем не беспокоили нас и было безопасно гулять практически в любое время суток. Очень помогли рекомендации Тизз по ресторанам и барам! Теперь у меня есть новые любимые места в Барселоне! Спасибо!
Tizz was a wonderful welcoming host, we can't wait to come back soon and enjoy more of Barcelona!

Tizz was fantastic, so helpful and thorough. As others have mentioned, very small stairs lead up to this third floor apartment. You're in fairly close quarters, but she's very respectful of your space. she also provided lots of helpful suggestions and checked in with us every day to make sure everything was ok. This apartment is an easy 10 minute walk from la Rambla but you are obviously in the red light district for the first few minutes of that ten. That being said, it never felt unsafe in any way. This was a great place to stay to explore Barcelona!

Very nice place to stay and it was very clean, convenient and close to almost everywhere. Metro station is nearby so you can take it and go anywhere! Area that place is located has bad reputation but we never felt unsafe. It actually seems one of the safest place in the city since police is around and there are cameras everywhere. 

Tizz was also very easy to talk and she always provided us very good recommendations. Overall it's a great place.

Tiziana is lovely, friendly,very helpful,full of hints And she makes You feel at home. The house is nice,Big And comfortable. The only possible downside is the area just around the flat where a few prostitutes use to work,but if you are not annoyed by that anything else is ok (very central,full of places to eat/drink, a few steps away from every attraction).

Super accueil de Tizz ! Trés bonne communication ! Emplacement idéal et proche toutes commodités ! Bilan trés positif pour une première expérience, je recommande Tizz pour tous les amoureux du voyage !!!! Une hôte qui sait recevoir et guidée. Belle rencontre humaine ! A trés bientôt.

Super clean.
Super comfortable.
Super shower.
Super central location. 

and a super friendly Host,
Thank you Tizz!

Tizz was an amazing host and her home is in a great location in the middle of the city. There is a great restaurant literally less than one block away that stays open late and the neighborhood is relatively safe. It is in the red light district so there were assumed prostitutes hanging around but I didn't see it as a problem as they were not boisterous or disruptive to our vacation. I felt very safe walking around with my wife late at night. All in all, I couldn't think of a better place to stay!
Highly recommending! Nice and clean place, good location and Tizz is such a great person:) Staying here for 3 days with all traveling tips from Tizz was definitely not enough!

Уютная комнатка. Расположение - лучше не придумаешь. До готического квартала рукой подать. Барселона ночами шумновата, однако нас шум не беспокоил. Тиз уважает личное пространство, не навязчивая, приятная хозяйка. Рекомендую.

Tizz was a great hostess, providing us with a lot of tips so that we had a chance to enjoy Barcelona more like a local. We had an amazing stay. Her apartment is very cute and we definitely recommend to anyone. Good luck with everything!
C'était très agréable de partager quelques moment de vie avec Tiziana. Son appartement est vivant et coloré, situé dans un quartier "chaud" de Barcelone.

Tizz was really responsive and made the check in process really smooth. The area - Raval is really cool with lots of bars and restaurants, we really felt like we were living like locals. Tizz is really friendly and gave us a list of recommendations on the first day, the room is nice and clean and has everything we needed for our 3 night stay. You're in close proximity to everything, especially the gothic district which was our favourite area with lots of cool bars. Thank you Tizz for letting us stay in your flat, we'd definitely be back again

El hogar de Tizz es estupendo. Alegre, acogedor, bien equipado y muy centrico. A pesar de estar en el red light district siempre nos sentimos muy seguras, incluso de noche. El Barrio del Raval es muy interesante y divertido. Tizz siempre estuvo muy pendiente de nosotras y dispuesta a ayudarnos con todo. Ha sido un auténtico placer!

Tizz is a wonderful host. She has great suggestions for restaurants and bars. She's quiet and gives you privacy and really lets you feel at home. Everything she presented in the description was 100% accurate. All in all, we had a really nice stay (my husband and I)
Ci siamo trovati benissimo da Tiziana, consiglio a tutti il suo alloggio per una visita di Barcellona

Staying at Tiziana's place was great. It's close to Plaza Catalunya, and the metro is within 5-10 minute walk depending on the line you want to take. The neighborhood was full of things to do, with great restaurants and cafes.
Tizz was an awesome host and super friendly. It was super clean and it was just like home. She had all kind of informations for restaurants, bars and events. We will definitely come again :)
Tizz was a great host and we had a lovely time staying with her

Siamo stati ospiti di Tizz per 4 notti, e ci siamo trovati davvero bene! La stanza è molto curata e luminosa, e l'appartamento è molto pulito. La posizione è ottima, a due minuti sia dalla Rambla che dalla Rambla del Raval, ed a due passi dal mitico Bar Marseilla. Tizz è stata una host gentilissima, dandoci molti consigli ed aiuti, ed al tempo stesso discreta e disponibile. Super consigliato!
Tizz fue muy amigable , el departamento super limpio y muy centrico , todo estuvo perfecto . Gracias tizz

What a fantastic place to spend our time in Barcelona! The location is absolutely perfect for being close enough to access both the touristy bits as well as more local bars and restaurants in El Raval and surrounding areas. Tizz couldn't have made the trip any easier for us, assisting us with transport tips from start to finish, and providing us with a local's insight into the nearby attractions. Hugely invaluable for our congested 5-day trip.

Thanks very much Tizz, it was fantastic and we fully intend to return in the near future.

Cheers,

Peter & Jess
I had a wonderful time in Barcelona and Tizz contributed to this a lot ! thanks a lot for everything.
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Tizz ist eie sehr aufmerksame und freundliche Gastgeberin. Die Wohnung ist sehr gepflegt und liegt sehr zentral. Gerne kommen wir wieder.

Tiziana was extremely helpful both before and during our stay, she opened up her apartment to us and gave us everything we needed! We liked the area, its vibrant, cosmopolitan and perfectly safe. I was a huge fan especially of the shutters which provided complete black out at night!

Tizz war eine sehr aufgeschlossene Gastgeberin. 
Die Lage der Unterkunft war optimal für eine Erkundung der Stadt.

Tizz is super friendly and makes you feel right at home! It's a quick walk to Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter, and the little plaza by the apartment is great as well. We found it noisy at night but Tizz provided us with ear plugs which were helpful.

La casa è  luminosa e il bagno è  più grande di quello che sembra dalle foto, non è  enorme ma ci si sta comodissimi!
Quando avevamo qualche domanda Tizz era sempre disposta a darci una mano. 
Il quartiere è molto rumoroso ma lei lo ha sempre detto chiaro, inoltre con i doppi vetri e i tappi per le orecchie (in dotazione) non si sente nulla. Noi i tappi per le orecchie non li abbiamo nemmeno usati, i doppi vetri erano sufficienti! Nel quartiere capita spesso di incontrare polizia perché tutta la zona è molto controllata, nonostante prostitute ect mi sono sempre sentita tranquilla tranne quando avevo i bagagli ma questo mi capita in tutte le città in cui sono stata.
Letto comodissimo e stanza spaziosa per due!

We did not have the best experience staying with Tizz in Barcelona for three days. We were three girls exploring Europe having a good time. We had missed our flight so we arrived later than expected for check in, but we let Tizz know so she was aware of the situation. Tizz is very adamant about  very little noise after 11. Maybe she should have restrictions on age or a curfew stated on the listing, attracting those that go to bed at 10pm. She made it seem that we did not respect her "house rules" by staying up late and talking in the room we paid to stay in. It was extremely uncomfortable. She also told us not to tell anyone that we are tourists because she is technically not allowed to have people staying with her!! This made us extremely uneasy. It was not a pleasant stay. To say the least, we were highly disappointed especially considering she is a "superhost".

Tizz was a great host. She gave clear directions and useful information before we arrived, and was easy to communicate with after we landed at the airport.
During our stay we enjoyed talking to her and she gave us many useful tips of her favourite places to go, and how to travel around the city.
She was extremely friendly and a lovely person to spend our time with whilst we were in the apartment.
Thank you for everything, Tizz, we had a great time and was a pleasure to meet you.
Neel and Jasmine
Zona peligrosa para salir de noche. Ruidos molestos en la calle.

Hemos elegido el apto de Tiz para hospedarnos y ha sido la mejor opción. El lugar es muy accesible desde el Aeropuerto y se encuentra en una.ubicación la cual permite visitar lugares emblemáticos de Barcelona. La atención de Tiz fue muy buena y nos hizo sentir como en casa. ¡Hasta una próxima ocasión!

Tizz was a flawless host who ensured we got to know the authentic side of Barcelona through her amazing recommendations and conscious way of life. 
She provided maps, immaculate local cafe/restaurant/market recommendations, each of which was better than the last, and ensured our stay was comfortable and enjoyable through constant communication. She was very accommodating and beyond thoughtful. 
Her recommendations of places to visit were amazing, we wore out our shoes walking the narrow secluded streets of Barcelona. 
The apartment location is very proximal to the Boqueria market and the public transport, but Barcelona is too beautiful to dive underground so most of the time we walked to places. The neighborhood is beautiful and vivid, and we found it perfectly safe even with an 8 year old. 
Do yourself a favor and do everything Tizz recommends. Thank you for an amazing stay, we will definitely be back!

We (3 friends) stayed for a full week in Barcelona and had a great stay at Tizz’s apartment. The travel to the apartment and the check-in procedure is very easy thanks to the detailed travel guidelines, which also include some very nice spots in the neighborhood. Furthermore Tizz is always open to give more suggestions on what to do, to visit, to eat,… The apartment is located right in the middle of the center (we only used public transport 3 times). The street itself is a bit lousy, but really not as bad as we had imagined. The apartment is small but bright and beautiful. We didn’t find it particular noisy as some reviews might suggest, although we found it hot (airco/ventilator made up for this).  As we were out most of the time we didn’t see Tizz a lot but she was friendly, helpful and most of all a very warm person. Recommended!
Hôte très sympas et l'emplacement et très centrale proche de tout très bon séjour a Barcelone grâce a Tizz
Tiziana war immer freundlich und zuvorkommend.
Ottima posizione, vicinissimo alle principali cose da visitare, consiglio specialmente per pochi giorni. Dato il quartiere poco raccomandabile e un po degradato non consiglio a coppie.

Tizz est une hôte adorable, à l'écoute et très disponible, l'appartement correspond exactement à ce qui est indiqué en description ainsi que sur les photos. Pas de mauvaises surprises donc lorsque vous arriverez sur place, bien au contraire! L'appartement est bien agencé et très bien situé dans un quartier vivant et hétéroclite, proche de nombreuses commodités, des transports en commun et des différents lieux culturels de la ville. Nous étions 3 amis et à aucun moment nous ne sommes sentis à l'étroit, l'impression d'être comme à la maison s'est installé en à peine quelques heures!  Ces vacances dépassent de loin ce que je m'étais imaginé pour être tout à fait honnête, car les conseils avisés et de bon aloi de Tizz nous ont permis de redécouvrir Barcelone sous un nouveau jour. Je recommande bien évidemment l'appartement de Tizz et je tiens à la remercier une nouvelle fois pour sa gentillesse ainsi que sa disponibilité. You know what I say that : see you soon ;) 
Regards, Julie

Tizz was a very kind host, providing us personalized and useful advices during our stay. Her apartment is super clean and welcoming.
Ideal location to visit many places by walk. 
We higlhy recommend her place !

Lovely room, near everything, a really good host :)
Sure i would go again :)

Tizz was a great host! She has been very helpful and thanks to her, we had the opportunity to discover Barcelona and the neighborhood in the right way.
Well done!

Tizz was really a lovely and helpful host. She gave me many tipps about visiting Barcelona and good restaurants. The apartment was very clean and nice. I didn't feel like a guest, but more like a friend of her. I totally enjoyed my stay with Tizz. Her Thai massage is a must! Thank you Tizz for everything again!!

Vielen Dank Tizz für die schöne Zeit in Barcelona! Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und die Lage ist sehr zentral. Die Gastgeberin ist offener und kontaktfreudiger Mensch! 2 Tage in dieser tollen Stadt war aber zu wenig..

Tizz's place is right in the centre of the action, right where you want to be! Tizz made it quite clear to me before booking that there are some prostitutes on the street out the front of her house, but I probably wouldn't have even noticed if she hadn't have pointed it out! I never felt unsafe, and it's an absolute top notch location close to las ramblas, an incredible street food market, and is walking distance to many tourist attractions. Thanks for a great stay!
Loved staying at Tizz's place. She knows all the best local spots. Very clean and great location

Tizz is really a great host, planning our arrival was so easy with her and she sent us recommendations even before with arrived. The place was clean and well located in a living district. We enjoyed our stay a lot! I recommend this place with no hesitation!

Tizz's place is near all things Barcelona. She is a perfect hostess - offering helpful tips & maps for touring, places for "cheap eats" (and good), and where to go for affordable entertainment. The place was so tidy, and the bed was very cozy. I always felt comfortable, and made a new friend!
Thanks again Tizz - it was wonderful staying with you!

Tizz is maybe the best host i've seen on Airbnb! From the first day in the city her recommendations let us discover bright, authentic and vibrant sides of Barcelona. 

Appartment is situated very well for frequent walks in the city center. Multiple cafes, grocery stores and bars are just in one or two minutes away. Our room was clean and comfortable, just as seen on  pictures. 


I would like to thank Tizz once again for these amazing five days and definetly recommend her appartment to everyone who looks for not so tourist, but more authentic experience.
Tizz is super friendly and helpful, great place to stay!

La casa de Tizz es tal cual como descrita, zona céntrica a un tiro de piedra de todos los sitios importantes. Ella le da un valor añadido a la casa por su simpatía y amabilidad.. 
volveré seguro
The space was really nice and Tizz was very welcoming and an amazing host! She gave us so many food and sightseeing tips and every single one payed off.
Great flat, very central. Very nice host.

This accommodation is in the center of the city, next to la rambla and the gothic area. Perfect to enjoy Barcelona atmosphere. Tizz is amazing, she gave us a lot information about transports, restaurants and bars, very nice w-e in Barcelona!
Tizziana is a very kind host, the flat was clean and central, perfect to visit old town and have a walk. Communication was clear, i recommand it to you !

Enjoyed spending a warm weekend away from London at Tizz’s flat in Barcelona. She was warm and friendly from the start, offering a bunch of suggestions for day trips and activities. I would definitely recommend a stay at Tizz’s place, as it’s a great value (much more so than nearby hostels that are more expensive!)

Tizz is an awesome host and her place was perfect for us. We are a young couple who spent majority of our time out in the city exploring. Tizz’s place was the perfect spot to come home to. Its very close to basically everything. A 10 minute walk to La Rambla and it’s surrounded by a bunch of food, restaurants, bars, etc. Tizz made us feel at home & at the same time, gave us all the privacy we needed. She’s an awesome person to talk with & gives great tips of local food and hang out spots. I definitely recommend staying here! Thanks Tizz!

Tizz is really nice and friendly! I had problem with payment before coming which led to the booking was automatically cancelled, after explaining the situation Tizz quickly offer us the same price for the staying! The location is great near the city centre, 5 min walk to Liceu station on the La Rambla. The apartment is very clean just as the picture showed, definitely recommended it is  good value for money!

Tizz is extremely nice and welcoming :) The room was exactly as in the description, and we loved being so well located in the city centre. Tizz also had plenty of tips of places to check out, and that truly made a difference. We had a wonderful time - highly recommended!

La description de l'appartement correspond parfaitement. propre, bien situé, bien équipé. Tizz est super accueillante et fournit des conseils pour améliorer et faciliter notre sejour. Du début à la fin elle a été aux petits soins avec nous. C'était un plaisir!
Tizz's place was in such a fantastic location! Very central and wonderful food/museums/places to visit nearby. Easy check-in and great communication. Thanks Tizz! Would stay again.

Tizz is a great host. :) Thank you for the nice stay. 
Highly recommended.
We visited Tizzs place for 3 days and loved it! All the details are exactly how the apartment and the areas are. Definitely would recommend the place for young people
L'appartement est propre et bien situé, Tizz est disponible et peux donner pas mal de conseils sur les choses à faire, les bonnes adresses.. Bon séjour !

L'appartement de Tizz est fort bien placé, à proximité des Ramblas, et donc pas très loin non plus des petites ruelles qui font le charme de Barcelone.  Nous recommandons vivement ce logement. Priscille et Laurence

Book it if you are a traveler who is alone or with a partner. This is a super booking and if you have the chance it is a great central and cool place to stay. The room is perfect for 1 or 2 people and is exactly what you see in the pictures. Tiz is a great host and person who is always fast (within the day or hour) at responding to questions or messages. At night it can get a bit loud but it is a major city and it is relatively loud everywhere, and Tiz was super cool and provided ear plugs for me and my girlfriend (personally I didn't need them and always let well). Not much to say other than if/when I come back to Barcelona I will make sure to message Tiz again.

Firstly, Tizz is a great host. 

She was completely understanding when our flight was delayed by 3+ hours and helped us out when my friend's belongings were stolen. 

It was nice being able to have light, genuine conversation with Tizz in the evening or in the morning before we both  left the appartment. 

The (Hidden by Airbnb) doc of places to eat/drink/see was incredibly useful, alongside personal reccommendations from Tizz in our conversations. 

As mentioned in previous posts, it is very noisy at night but nothing earplugs can't fix! 

Tip - come out of the appartment, turn right to the end. Turn right - the first restaurant in pink flourescent letters is amazing and cheap! Lovely cocktails for 5 Euros and tapas with a modern twist. 

Also visit the 360 rooftop bar in the big building at the end of the road on the left. 

Thank you Tizz!
Tizz is very friendly and the appartement is well situated. I'm so satisfied of my staying at Tizz's flat in Barcelona!
Tizz was warm, friendly and very helpful. And her apartment and location were exactly as specified and suited us perfectly.  Thanks for contributing to a wonderful holiday!

Great location, very clean and a superhost!
We enjoyed every moment!

Tizz was really well organized, she informed us about everything - to make  sure we knew what to expect. she even had ear pluggs for us in case the street got to loud. The area where the appartment is situated, is awesome and tizz gave good recommandation about where to go and what to do. She is a heartloving host. most the time she was out and busy - so we had much privacy in not so big flat at the same time. We had a great stay thanks to barcelona and thanks to Tizz!
Centralt beliggende i et spændende kvarter
Merci tizz pour votre hospitalité, nous avons vraiment apprécié votre appartement et son emplacement, idéal pour visiter Barcelone à pied, juste à côté de tous les transports si besoin,

Muy buena ubicación, cerca de la Rambla, del mercado de la boqueria y de estaciones de bus y metro. Todo muy limpio y ordenado. El entorno es un poco ruidoso pero es el precio de la localización. Recomendamos no llevar maletas grandes debido a que la escalera es un tanto pequeña y sinuosa. Tizz es muy hospitable.

Tizz provided lots of useful information to assist in our travel. Her home is very clean, location is very good for visiting various tourist attractions, very easy transport links, description of the area is accurate. It's safer than La Rambla after midnight but it can get noisy with restaurant opposite.  Ear plug was provided so it helped.
Great location. The room is very clean.
Helaas is het alleen één kamer. Ik had meer ruimte verwacht

Tizz war eine wundervolle Gastgeberin, hat uns herzlich empfangen und wir haben uns von Anfang an wohl gefühlt. Auch für meine Mama war es eine tolle erste Airbnb Erfahrung. Die Wohnung ist sehr zentral gelegen und überaus sauber! Der erste Eindruck von der Haustür außen täuscht, die Wohnung ist blitzeblank und mit vielen schönen Details eingerichtet. Wir kommen wieder :)

A wonderful place to stay in the centre of Barcelona. Tiz was so welcoming and helpful - no problems at all finding her apartment as she gave detailed instructions on how to get there. The room was lovely - very clean and homely. Tiz gave us lots of info about where to go and eat, all within walking distance of the apartment. Would love to come back again!
Tizz is a great host, helpful and friendly. Responses to messages quickly. Her place is as described, make sure to read all the stuff she wrote before you go and you should have a good time there.

She was very helpful, but she has so many rules and when you make mistake you should pay money... The flat was nice and clean but no air condition so the flat was super hot. The district is dirty and disgusting many hookers, drug  dealers and homeless peoples etc... And finally we were attacked by 4 local guys, they did not let us go away and they stolen the phone from my boyfriend. So I don not recommend to anyone.

On arrival check-in and travel information was available which was very helpful. The location was perfect for our trip and there were many bars and restaurants near to us. 
However we were disappointed to find only one fan in the room for three of us - which was broken - and therefore was not ideal especially during the major heatwave. In addition, despite the faulty fan, the AC was purposefully kept out of our reach which was very unhelpful especially when one of our friends was very ill from heatstroke.

Tizz is a great hostess and a very open and relaxed person. We had a great stay at her place and felt very welcome. The room was spacious, comfortable and clean. The location is good. Would highly recommend Tizz and her apartment!
Tizz was more like a friend that i haven't seen in a while. She was awesome and helpful every second of the day if needed. AWESOME location close to everything. Thank's so much Tizz!

Tiz is a fantastic host. She takes care of your stay in Barcelona with passion and kindness. Her apartment is very well located in Raval, close to major spots of interest in the city. In case you need anything during your stay, she will help you sorting everything out. Highly recommend!
Appartement très cozy! Super bien placé ! Tizz est une hôte formidable très accueillante et chaleureuse ! Elle est aussi de très bon conseil  bref, parfait !

Tizzy is a great host, the flat is located in the town centre walking distance to many attractions. The flat was extremely clean an Tizzy provide bed sheets, towels and pillows . Also she gave us a long and very valuable list of what to do where to eat how to move around . Great place, I definitely going to be back to Tizzis flat . Highly recommend

Great apartment, great location and a great time! The apartment was everything we was after and the location was perfect. So vibrant and within walking distances to pretty much everything. If you really enjoy exploring and love a quirky little neighbourhood then this is definitely the one! Tizz was wonderful too. Such a great & considerate host. Although we didn’t see much of her, she still messaged us to ensure we were ok and having a good time. My friend & I had such a fab time in Barcelona and the apartment just made it so much more special. Highly recommended!! Thank you Tizz!! Xxx
Great location and host for a true Barcelona experience.  Tizz provides a lot of info so make sure that you read it to know if this is the right place for you.
Appartamento pulito e molto accogliente.. camera con un piccolo balcone comodissimo...
Everything were the same as written in description.We enjoyed the stay. Thank you Tizz.

Tizz went above and beyond to make sure our stay was amazing! She gave plenty of great tips and had a lot of nice advice to share. She was the best Airb&b host I have ever had in regards to communication. Her place was very comfortable to stay in--we really enjoyed our time here!
Hat alles wunderbar funktioniert. Eine gute (vielleicht wegen Silvester etwas laute) Lage, wo man alles zu Fuß sehr gut erreichen kann. Tizz ist weiteres sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich.
Perfect location!!! Tizz is a kind host and you will have all that you need!

Die Kommunikation mit Tizz hat stets bestens geklappt - wir konnten sogar früher als geplant einchecken. Die Lage der Wohnung ist sehr zentral und für einen Kurzurlaub perfekt. Die Umgebung ist jedoch auch nachts stets ziemlich laut. 
Das Zimmer entspricht den Fotos, liebevoll eingerichtet und die ganze Wohnung sehr sauber! Wir haben Tizz immer nur kurz gesehen, sie ist eine sehr offenherzige und liebevolle Person.

TIZZ super accueillante.
Même si le quartier peut faire peur à première vue, il y a pleins de commerces et d'endroits à ne pas manquer.
Appartement très central, accès rapide à tout Barcelone.
Rue adjacente bruyante mais largement rattrapé grâce aux attentions de Tizz (bouchons d'oreilles).
Un grand merci

Tizz was a wonderful hostess that provided lots of wonder tips and suggestions to enjoy Barcelona. Her Apartment was very clean and had a good location. Everything that I planned on seeing and wanted to do was close by.

name: Charming apartment, Plateau
summary: Charmant appartement sur une des plus belles rues du plateau mont-royal. Vous trouverez à quelques pas boulangeries, petits restos, cafés sympas et épiceries fines. Le parc laurier est a 5 minutes de marche, le métro à 10 et des bixi se trouvent au coin de la rue. Bienvenue !
space: Peut loger confortablement 4 personnes Wifi inclus
description: Charmant appartement sur une des plus belles rues du plateau mont-royal. Vous trouverez à quelques pas boulangeries, petits restos, cafés sympas et épiceries fines. Le parc laurier est a 5 minutes de marche, le métro à 10 et des bixi se trouvent au coin de la rue. Bienvenue ! Peut loger confortablement 4 personnes Wifi inclus Wifi, Tv, quelques dvd, romans, laveuse, sécheuse, bbq sur la terrasse Nous habitons le rez de chaussée et serons disponibles s'il y a quoi que ce soit possibilité de se stationner sans vignette dans la rue
transit: possibilité de se stationner sans vignette dans la rue
access: Wifi, Tv, quelques dvd, romans, laveuse, sécheuse, bbq sur la terrasse
interaction: Nous habitons le rez de chaussée et serons disponibles s'il y a quoi que ce soit
house_rules: Désolée, pas d'animaux et pas de cigarettes à l'intérieur

host.host_about: Nous sommes le couple sympathique qui habite le Rez-de-chaussé!!

reviews.comments: Staying here was a great experience! Marie-Andree gave us a good orientation when we first got there and I was really happy that we had everything we needed from the get go - fresh towels, bedding, kitchen supplies, mini toiletries in the bathroom - and the place was spotless! It was like staying at a nice hotel. Great location close to some nice bars and restos, and Marie-Andree was lovely, and responsive right to the end. Very happy to have been the first guests here - hope many more get to enjoy the space :)

We miss Montreal already. We had such a great time there. The flat is divine. Marie-Andree and Stephane were really welcoming (and great at helping us out before and during our stay with all our questions) and the location -- The Plateau -- is superb. Lots of cute restaurants and cafes on Rue Laurier, a minute away, and more shopping and bars on Rue Mont Royal, a 10 minute walk. We couldn't have hoped for more. Thanks to Marie-Andree and Stephane for being so kind and putting so much thought into your flat. We hope to see you again soon!

We had a fantastic stay in this beautiful apartment on the Plateau. The location can't be beat, only steps away from the charming, tree-lined rue Laurier chock full of great cafés, restaurants, bakeries & grocery stores. The apartment was spotless and had everything that we could need including a great & calm back balcony spot for a nice BBQ and glass of wine (or two) at the end of the day. Thanks Marie-Andrée & Stéphane, we will definitely return again.

Marie-Andrée a été une hôte super accueillante et disponible! La facilité de communication a d'ailleurs été très appréciée. L'appartement, quant à lui, était impeccable, joli et répondait à toutes nos attentes. Il se situe dans un charmant quartier près de nombreux commerces et cafés. Nous regrettons seulement avoir manqué de temps pour profiter des environs et du BBQ qui était à notre disposition! Mes amis et moi sommes reconnaissants pour votre accueil. Au plaisir! :)

This apartment was truly charming and perfect for our recent 3 night stay in Montreal.  My teen daughter, her two friends and I all loved it.  It was spotlessly clean, decorated in a very welcoming, comfortable way, and had everything we needed for our stay.  The kitchen is so pleasant with large windows and high ceilings, perfect to enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning.  The back patio was equally inviting and we enjoyed eating breakfast and dinner there.  The pictures accurately show the apartment but can't quite do it full justice.  The neighborhood also won us over - it is a beautiful  residential street - lots of trees, easy parking (but pay attention to certain sections requiring a residential sticker), and very safe.  Rue Laurier is a 2 minute walk and full of cafes, restaurants, a grocery store, and cute shops.  The metro is about 10 minutes away by foot but a nice walk along Laurier and past the park.  We took advantage of the Bixi bikes at the corner of the block (2 minutes away) and loved exploring the city by bike - made very easy with the bike lanes and attention to cyclists all throughout the city.  Marie-Andree and Stephane could not have been nicer in welcoming us to Montreal and to the apartment.  They were quick to respond to emails before our arrival and waiting to meet us when we arrived - even an hour late after a long delay at the US/Canadian border.  We had to get right back out the door for an event and they were very helpful with metro directions.  It is very nice having them living right downstairs - very convenient if there were any questions.  The next day I texted asking if it was a good time to ask for advice on some sightseeing.  They were out to lunch but sent Marie-Andree's brother over to answer my questions and provide great recommendations.  There was fresh fruit, milk, butter and condiments in the refrigerator, and delicious coffee - very thoughtful and particularly helpful as we didn't have to go to the store right away and were able to enjoy our first morning with the food we brought and what they left for us.  All in all, we loved staying here, highly recommend it and hope to come back to Montreal and stay here again.  Our only complaint was that we couldn't stay another day or two!  Thank you Marie-Andree and Stephane!
We booked the place at the last minute without any problems and the apartment ready by the time it got there. It was very clean and exactly as it looks in the pictures. It was great.

A wonderful stay by fabulous hosts!  The apartment was immaculately clean, just as pictured.  In a great location...charming neighborhood, steps from shops cafes etc.  I will surely be back and have already recommended trips to stay here to my friends.

Très bonne prestation, le propriétaire est disponible et arrangeant.  Il nous a offert assistance à plusieurs reprises.

Notre séjour fut très agréable.
Nous avons eu  (2 adultes, 2 enfants)  un beau séjour chez Marie-andrée et Stéphane.L'appartement est superbe, propre et bien situé! Stéphane a été vraiment accueillant. On vous le recommande à 100%!

Beautiful one bedroom with den in one of the best neighbourhoods in Montreal (Petit Laurier in Plateau Mont-Royal). Hosts were quick to reply in communications and listing was exactly as per the photos. Three beds (one bedroom and two sofa beds) were comfy and the experience was hotel-like with extra blankets and pillows, toiletteries and beautiful patio at the back.

We got to stay in this beautiful apartment over the weekend and had absolutely nothing to complain about! The place was just as described, and Marie and Stéphane were great hosts. Whenever we get a chance to come back to Montreal, this will be our go-to place for accommodation! Merci beaucoup!

2 adults and 1 child visited Montreal in summer for 2 days. We enoyed the city and the nice appartment. It was near by downtown (15 min. to walk to the next subway station and with the subway 10 min.) The Rue manquette was very charming and close by we could use the restaurants, supermarket...all what we needed. We met only Stephane,  he was a very good host and he was very friendly. Marie et Stephane answered every questions per sms...thank you very much. They helped us everytime. The appartment was cozy and adequate for the price. May be the balkony were a little bit to small for us.
We recommended Marie et Stephane as good host. Thanks for all.

A wonderful couple who made us feel welcome.  Great communication via email prior to visit (we were coming from US and would not have the ability to make phone calls or access email once we crossed the border).  Beautiful space with deck access.  Fully equipped kitchen, though there were so many great restaurants 2 blocks away that we never cooked!

Marie and Stephane were such wonderful hosts. They were very accommodating, warm, communicative and responsive. We traveled with two teens who  thought too that the apartment was perfect - comfortable, very clean and ideally located. Short  walk to several great restaurants, boutiques and about ten mins to the metro. Pleasant walk to hip shopping strips and cafes. We loved exploring Montreal and will definitely be back. Thanks to our hosts who played a part in making this visit quite memorable....

The neighbourhood is very quaint and pleasant, its on a nice private street and the apartment itself is very tidy and clean. I did not meet the host but they were quick to answer any questions via the messages application on the airbnb app. 
The only complaint we really had was that the pull out couch was not very easy to unfold into a bed. Also, the lock for the door is hard to close and lock secure before leaving. 
Other than that, the place is nice and good for four people (once you unfold the bed of course).

Bon séjour à Montréal!
L'appartement est confortable et fonctionnel.
Tout ce dont on pouvait avoir besoin y était!
Quartier typique et très agréable!
Marie André et Stéphane été présent dès que nous avions besoin!
Seul petit bémol : il manque un ventilateur ( très chaud au mois de juillet)

The apartment was every bit as beautiful as advertised. The location was fantastic, the neighbourhood was gorgeous, and the people were lovely. We were greeted promptly and with open arms and had a wonderful time. Thanks for having us!

Can't say enough wonderful things about this little gem.  Great location, very clean and comfortable, and a nice bed :)  We have a little one and it was perfect for the three of us.  Marie and Stephane were gracious and available if we needed anything.  Five star!

Stéphane was there to greet us when we arrived, and gave us a brief tour of the apartment. He was super friendly, and gave us restaurant recommendations when we asked. The place looks exactly like it does in the pictures. It is very clean and bright. The bathroom is tiny but modern with everything you need. The beds were comfortable, and the rooms cozy.
I would definitely stay there again whenever I get back to Montreal.

The apartment is very clean and well furnished and completely met our needs. The location is convenient, and the neighbourhood is very pleasant, quiet and safe, with many conveniences.

 We would not hesitate to return.

Superbe appartement dans un quartier très agréable. Marie-Andrée et Stéphane ont été très accommodants et accueillants. Les chambres étaient un peu chaudes mais j'ai visité Montréal pendant une vague de chaleur inhabituelle, ce n'est donc pas imputable aux hôtes ... qui plus est Marie-Andrée et Stéphane ont prévu d'ajouter un ventilateur à l'avenir.
En résumé, je recommande !
Nous avons été accueillis chaleureusement par Marie-Andrée. L'appartement est très joli et fonctionnel avec une literie de bonne qualité. Le quartier est très sympa, calme, avec un parc à proximité.

Absolutely beautiful apartment in a lovely neighborhood!
Very friendly, easygoing hosts. 
Would definitely stay here again.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans cet appartement conforme à la description et aux photos, dans un quartier calme et en même temps proche de toutes les commodités (restaurants, métro, etc...)
Marie-Andrée et Stéphane ont été des hôtes très discrets et en même temps très disponibles lorsque nous en avons eu besoin.

Marie-Andrée et Stéphanie ont été très sympathique!  Ils nous ont bien accueilli, et leur appartement est vraiment super, l'étiquetage aux photos! 
Je recommande vivement!

Appartement très agréable et typiquement Montréalais.Bien situé sur le Plateau ,5mn du bus et 10mn du métro Laurier dans une rue calme  avec de nombreux commerces et restos à proximité .
Correspond tout à fait au descriptif du site avec une salle de bain petite (surtout le lavabo ) , mais très fonctionnelle .Beau balcon ensoleillé l l'apm.
Une adresse à retenir ; nous risquons d'y revenir bientôt !

Stéphane et Marie-Andrée nous ont chaleureusement accueillis pour notre voyage de dernière minute à Montréal. Ils étaient super réactifs et on ne manquait rien. L'appartement était très bien situé et propre... encore mieux que sur les photos.

La seule chose c'est que nous aurions préféré rester plus longtemps !

We stayed here just before the holidays and had a great experience. Everything was as described and although we didn't get much of a chance to chat with Stephane, he was very friendly and inviting. The location is great. Lots of restaurants and bakeries near by as well as a grocery store. The place was very clean and although the bathroom is small, it was totally functional and the shower had great pressure! Overall would stay here again and would definitely recommend to others.
The apartment and the neighborhood was wonderful; everything we needed inside and a good selection of restaurants and shops nearby including a grocery shop.

Our stay at the apartment of Marie-Andrée and Stéphane was perfect. The place was clean and simple but with just enough to make it convenient and give it character. The street is quiet and the neighbourhood charming. It is a great location if you want to be close to the Plateau, Mile-End and Parc Lafontaine but slightly off the main streets. There are several great restaurants and shops within an easy walk and convenient to the metro. I would definitely stay again.
The host canceled this reservation 92 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Thank you! Everything was great. we loved the space - very comfortable and charming. Thank you also for the two fans to keep us cool.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Marie-André et Stéphane. Très bel appartement. Tout est à proximité du logement  (supermarché, métro, restaurant, parc) ce qui est fort appréciable! Le quartier est super! nous l'avons beaucoup apprécié! 
Nous recommandons sans hésitation cet appartement.

Super quartier, appart typique, accueil chaleureux... Que demander de mieux pour notre arrivée au Canada! L'appartement est super, tout à disposition, le barbecue est particulièrement appréciable, beaucoup de charme et un accueil très chouette! On recommande!!

L'appartement est très bien situé à 10 min de la station laurier et à proximité de tous les commerces. La rue est calme. Le logement pour 4 personnes est suffisamment grand et  pratique et a beaucoup de charme. Niveau rapport qualité prix c'est le top je recommande vivement ce logement, merci aux propriétaires.

Marie-Andrée and Stéphane emailed us to let us know our apartment was no longer available for the days booked but they offered us another for the same price to compensate for the inconvenience. Although we did not stay in the apartment pictured, I will still review our experience. Our arrival time ended up being a bit later than originally planned however it didn't end up being an issue and Stéphane was very flexible with meet times. We met Stéphane at the apartment at arrival and he gave us a tour and the keys. The apartment was absolutely gorgeous and it was in a great location. Free parking on the street. The only negative was it was very warm inside and because of the big windows, super sunny days and lack of air conditioning it made it harder to cool down the apartment, however they did have multiple fans throughout the apartment. They were readily available to answer any questions and were easy to contact. Would definitely recommended staying in one of Marie-Andrée and Stéphane 's apartments! Would stay there again.
Our hosts were fantastic, the place was spacious, clean and we'll kept. Definitely hoping to stay there again!

The hosts were easy to communicate with and were happy to provide suggestions. The only complaint we had was some essential amenities were not available, like toilet paper, paper towels, laundry detergent, and soap. Our stay would have been great if those were provided.
Great well equiped apartment. It looks exactly as it is in the pictures. Grreat location. The apartment is perfect for a couple. Everything reachable in a walking distance. Lovely neighborhood.
Beautiful spot. Lots of character in a nice area. Quaint and comfortable. All the amenities available; (shampoo, conditioner, toiletries, towels, etc.) a definite 10/10!

Communication pre-arrival was great. We let Marie-Andree and Stephane know we would be arriving later than we originally thought; they would be out, so left a key inside.  Easy.  We found the neighborhood beautiful, and location good.  Parking was easy.  Stephane recommended a great Sushi restaurant (Tri Express) on the corner.  The apartment itself was, for the most part, comfortable. The bedroom, the bed. Plenty of closet space, hangers, surface space to put stuff. Cute kitchen. Cute shared deck with grill (we didn't use it, however). Fans were a welcome thing as it was warm and humid during much of our stay.  What wasn't expected was the  uncomfortable sofa bed: you could feel the bars of the frame whether sitting or sleeping, and the noise late at night from the very heavy-footed upstairs neighbors.  If you are a light sleeper you may also find this disruptive.  Also, the apartment was was very clean, except for the floors which seemed not to have been washed in a while which we noticed from walking barefoot.  I don't like ending on a negative note, so I'll close by saying the hosts were friendly, and responsive.

This is a fantastic apartment in a great area. It's a quick 15-minute walk to the metro, and there are lots of great restaurants and stores nearby. The apartment is in an older building with lots of historical details, including gorgeous hardwood floors. The bathroom, while small, is well appointed, and the kitchen is excellent. We really enjoyed the outside deck area for breakfast.  The host family lives right downstairs was a joy to deal with. Truly one of our best rental experiences. Very highly recommended!

Logement propre et spacieux pour 2, un peu sombre. Literie confortable. Un peu bruyant car beaucoup de travaux dans le quartier en ce moment. Mobilier un peu vieillissant, vaisselle disparate et bbq brisé, dommage... mais bien dans l'ensemble et confortable.

Great experience! Good location, a bit of a walk from the metro but close to bike share and bus. Near cute restuarants, a beautiful park, walking distance to bars. Apartment was clean and VERY well equipped. Only issue was the futon in the living room is pretty uncomfortable (especially for two adults), but would still very much recommend. Easy street parking. We never met the hosts but communication was easy. :)
Apparemment très bien situé au calme. Hôte très sympathique. Attention au stationnement en bas du logement (se renseigner auprès de l'hôte au préalable).

L'appartement est très joli, spacieux et propre, dans un quartier très agréable, proche des commerces, restaurants et du parc Laurier. Stéphane est un hôte très accueillant. Nous avons passé un séjour parfait !

Really great space! Awesome kitchen and balcony with BBQ. Great location, close to the metro and cute neighbour with restaurants and grocery store. Perfect stay and the hosts were very accommodating! Thank-you!
Appartement agréable, comme sur l'annonce. Un peu petit pour 4 mais pour les vacances on s'adapte. Propriétaire très sympa et arrangeant.  Merci Stephane.

A great flat in a nice, walkable neighbourhood with good restaurants and every convenience, including a bike share at the end of the street. Our hosts were responsive and available to show us the flat's features. We had a brief but comfortable stay and we would not hesitate to rent the flat again.

Le logement de Marie et Stéphane est très confortable, propre et bien équipé. Il est idéalement situé, dans un quartier très calme, mais près de commerces et de l'animation de la rue Mont Royal. Il est très facile de se déplacer à pied pour découvrir Montréal car les bus et métro sont à proximité (la station Laurier est à 10 mn à pied). Stéphane m'a accueillie à mon arrivée et m'a présenté le logement ainsi que les équipements. Marie et Stéphane habitent au rez-de-chaussée, et sont donc facilement joignables si besoin. J'ai passé un excellent séjour et recommande ce logement.
Great location and neighbourhood! Response rate is fast and efficient.
Excellent bed, very quiet and exceptionally located.

À notre arrivée, Stéphane était absent, mais avait convenu d'un endroit pour que nous récupérions la clé. Il est venu nous rejoindre par la suite et s'est assuré que nous manquions de rien. Il a été très accueillant et la communication a été facile à toutes les étapes de la réservation. 

L'emplacement est très bucolique, avec de belles rues pleines d'arbres et de jolies ruelles. Il y a plusieurs commerces et une épicerie à proximité et il est très agréable de se promener dans le quartier en famille. Tout près du parc Laurier où des installations sont présentes pour les jeunes enfants. 

Il manque un peu d'espace dans la cuisine pour y manger à 4, mais l'endroit est très chaleureux et accueillant. Nous avons deux enfants de moins de 4 ans et tout était bien adapté: nous n'avions pas à rendre l'endroit "kid-proof". Il y a aussi de jeunes enfants dans le voisinage, ce qui leur a tenu compagnie. Les autres locataires du bloc sont très calmes et silencieux, aucun problème de ce côté. Nous avons été en mesure de nous stationner à même la rue et avons fait nos déplacements en métro. 

En bref, ce fut une très belle expérience et je recommande chaudement le logement de Marie-Andrée et Stéphane!

Thank you for the great stay at your place. We loved the apartment and the location was fantastic. The hosts were easy to communicate with and prompt to respond to requests.

Thank you...
Great house in a superb location. I was on business trip for a long week and the house really felt like a home. Thanks again for allowing me to stay.
Thanks for having us! We loved your place for our trip Montreal.

The apartment was very comfortable and quite. Located on a beautiful street, just around the corner from many great shops and restaurants. The hosts were very welcoming. They were always available for questions and to give recommendations. The perfect spot for a MTL getaway.

This was our first long-term stay and it couldn't have been a better experience. The apartment, the neighborhood, and the hospitality of our hosts were all far above and beyond. We would not hesitate to suggest this apartment to anyone else. A++++.

I stayed in this place for 2 months (!) and it was the perfect home away from home. The best location in Montreal, great neighborhood with the trendiest cafe's and restaurants. Good transportation and close to many cultural places. The apartment is quiet and green, well designed and full of light. It was a wonderful experience I would recommend to anyone.

This is a beautiful space in an excellent neighbourhood. The hosts were extremely quick to respond and very accommodating to requests. Within a few hours they let me check in early due to a change in travel plans. The hosts gave excellent tips and are located beside a major street with quaint coffee shops, restaurants, and boutiques. There was no A/C so it got very hot (despite the use of fans) but there are blinds that can be closed to help keep the space cooler. Thanks so much for having us!

Marie and Stéphane are great hosts . They made us feel like we were in our own home . The location of the place is great . It is close to parks like la Fontaine and sir Wilfred where my 2 year old son loved to play. The Laurier metro station is 15 minutes walking distance . Many Bus stops are 2-5 minutes walking distance . We loved our stay here . The place is one of the best place to visit Montreal . Thanks for every thing
Excellent pour ceux qui veulent s'immerger dans l'ambiance du Plateau à Montréal!

name: Double Room front near Central - FREE WIFI -
summary: Double room, queen bed, desk and wardrobe. House has 6 rooms, 2 bathrooms and new kitchen with dishwasher.  Laundry with washing machine. Suit eco minded travellers and yogis.  We compost and have solar panels. Pincode entry for 24 hr access.
space: We have a small herb and vege garden and compost all our scraps.  We have rear lane access and bikes are also avail on request.  We can also give you free access to the pool across the road, only one person at a time as we have one pass.  The doors to the adjoining room were replaced with a wall in Sept 2015 so any noise issues have been addressed (see pics). We also had the place sprayed in Dec 2015 so there are less cockroaches but these are very common in Sydney so you may still see a few :)
description: Double room, queen bed, desk and wardrobe. House has 6 rooms, 2 bathrooms and new kitchen with dishwasher.  Laundry with washing machine. Suit eco minded travellers and yogis.  We compost and have solar panels. Pincode entry for 24 hr access. We have a small herb and vege garden and compost all our scraps.  We have rear lane access and bikes are also avail on request.  We can also give you free access to the pool across the road, only one person at a time as we have one pass.  The doors to the adjoining room were replaced with a wall in Sept 2015 so any noise issues have been addressed (see pics). We also had the place sprayed in Dec 2015 so there are less cockroaches but these are very common in Sydney so you may still see a few :) Guests have access to the kitchen/dining room, two bathrooms, the backyard/garden and front porch.  The house is kept very clean and the people are super friendly.   This is Sydney though so you will see cockroaches, they will not harm you but if they freak
neighborhood_overview: Redfern is great for restaurants and cafes.  There are still many housing commission flats and I recommend using Central Station rather than Redfern.  Especially at night.  We are on the border of Surry Hills.  The best side of Redfern.
notes: We live on a very busy street, it is a great location, super close to the city with a bus stop right out front.  This may not be ideal if you are a light sleeper and/or like to sleep in late.  The traffic out the front of the house is very noisy during peak hours.
transit: The bus stop out the front will take you to Circular Quay via the city so you can go to Town Hall or all at the way to the opera house.   The train station is very close too so you can easily get to the airport, the blue mountains or visit beaches on the South Coast. China town, Central Park and the CBD/ Hyde Park are within walking distance.
access: Guests have access to the kitchen/dining room, two bathrooms, the backyard/garden and front porch.  The house is kept very clean and the people are super friendly.   This is Sydney though so you will see cockroaches, they will not harm you but if they freak you out, you may prefer to stay in a high rise apartment :)
interaction: I am often traveling, especially during the colder months but I am around during Summer and am always online so you can message me anytime.
house_rules: Please take your shoes off upstairs on the carpet.  Inside slippers are okay.  Please wash your dishes immediately after use.  Please consider others who are using the space and respect our recycling and composting efforts.

host.host_about:
Yoga Teacher and filmmaker living in a big (6 bedroom) terrace between Redfern and Surry Hills, close to Central Station.
I study Japanese and love going to Japan.
I'm mostly vegetarian and am passionate about animal rights.
I love growing my own food, travelling and singing :)

reviews.comments: The room is very clean and tidy. The house is so quiet and Robbie is very polite.

The house is cozy and nice to live in with everything you need. The bedroom is clean and tidy. The host is great and welcoming. No more to ask for this price and it's within walking distance to Central. Definitely the first choice if u ever visit Sydney.

Nice room in big house - many housemates.  Unfortunately the bedroom is connected to next room by very large, thin doors with a massive gap underneath - every conversation and sound next door came blasting through. It was as if we were in the same room - could not sleep.

Great place to stay! Very conveniently located within a short walk to the Central train station and Surry Hills. The room was huge and had all the amenities you would need. Very clean bathroom with your own drawer to house your toiletries. Yoco wasn't in town but was easy to communicate with. He had everything set upon my arrival. I would stay here again.
Great location! As stated by the host, it is very close to Central Station which made traveling around Sydney an ease. Will consider staying here again if I return to Sydney!
虽然没见到房东,但是也能感觉到房东是一个很热心的人｡打扫房间的那个小哥人也超棒!!房子地理位置好,环境也不错,唯一缺点就是房子不隔音｡
This is one of my favourite places to stay in Sydney - great location, lovely house, easy check-in. Love it!
The house is near Central train station and provides all amenities you might need. However, the room seemed not to be cleaned before we checked in. And the sound insulation was poor.

Fantastic little place, awesome location. Room was clean and well appointed, great modern kitchen and beautiful little courtyard out back. Had breakfast under a blue sky around the veggie patch and ferns, really special. Yoco is friendly and efficient at communicating, has a great Eco mantra as well. Thanks!

Room is big, house is tidy, good location and has excellent wi-fi sign.
We never met Yoco, but there was always good communication with him to arrive and extend our stay.

The house wasn't far from the train station and was easy to find. Our first impressions were very good: clean, calm, modern bathroom and kitchen, ... . There were two bathrooms, one outside and one upstairs, with shelves for our stuff - very handy! The kitchen was large and fully equipped. However, in the 'value for money' department, we did hit some minor bumps. First of all, despite there hadn't been any guests staying in our room the day before our arrival, we found 3 bags of garbage in the corner. Also, our personal shelf in the kitchen cupboard and refrigerator had not been emptied. While these things may be considered the responsibility of the previous guests, we expected the owner to have done at least a quick check. Furthermore, every evening there would be quite alot of creepy crawlers on the kitchen counter and under the appliances. We informed the owner of this and he responded immediately, saying that he would send someone to check it out. Sadly, the bug problem persisted until our departure. Finally, our room and the room of our neighbouring guests were separated by wall-sized collapsable closet doors. This essentially meant that, sound-wise, we simply seemed to share a room and had to be very quiet as to not disturb eachother. While we did have a pleasant first AirBnB experience, we have to admit we had expected a bit more value for money.
Location was great. But the wall was too thin so i had to bear all the chatting noise from the next room. Not suitable for noise sensitive person.

The House was mess. Whats written about the noise from neighbours through the door is completely true. Its like sleeping with them. 

Also, We had a couple of data without toiletpaper in the house. 

There is rubbish piling up in the kichen along dirty laundry and cockroaches. 

The Owner was never there fyring our stay, and as someone else was staying in the room he had designated for us, we had to take the next one. Not the end of the World, but frustrating when the owner is not to get a hold of. He did reply, 2 days later. 

Over all, Good location, not much else.
Stayed at Yoco's house for a week and a half and it was great. Ideal location close to the city and good value. Robbie was a great host! Will definitely be booking it again next time I'm in Sydney.
Very good located and a good price for such an apartment. Would book it again!

The house was a perfect place to stay in Sydney. The rooms were all clean and tidy and cleaners came by regularly, the kitchen had everything we needed to cook up some good food (including fresh herbs outside). Robbie made us feel incredibly welcome - just make sure if you stay there you pester him to give you a guided meditation. Well worth it. If we are ever in need of a place to stay in Sydney we will be back.
Very central location. Everyone staying at the house was lovely. Room was very spacious
a good place ,so near to the central . but MY room is to close to the street
Great location, however, house had bugs running through it.

I absolutely loved my stay at Yoco house! The apartment is so nice and the best value you can get in all of Sydney! Great location close to everything you need and want! I love how important sustainability recycling and renewable energy is to the house. Highly recommend staying here!
만족했습니다.
Very well located and Yoco was  answering and available if you needed something.
房屋位置很好,距离中央车站徒步十分钟,去机场也方便｡
Good location near to central station and a cozy room :-)

My wife and I had a great weekend in Sydney. Yoco was very welcoming and a real nice guy. The position was great.. a short walk to Central station made it really easy to get around town and back again. I would definately stay here again. Thanks Yoco.
I had a nice few days here, lots of friendly people, easy going. Defiantly recommend

I had a great stay at Yoco's, it reminds me a lot the movie Auberge Espagnole with mostly europeans roommates. I didn't have the chance to meet everyone because I was very busy but I would definitely stay again at his place. Yoco was also really flexible regarding the check-in time, I was able to drop my luggage early in the morning even though the room wasn't ready yet because an another guest hadn't checked out yet, that was really convenient after a long flight from USA.

Also if you're a light sleeper, it can be loud, it's not really well soundproofing. I'm heavy sleeper it didn't disturb me.
La maison de Yocco est très bien situé. Les gens qui y vivent sont très accueillants et chaleureux, on se sent rapidement comme chez nous. Merci pour cette semaine
Comfortable and lovely home. Flexible time to check in and out.
Stayed for two nights. Lovely flat mates, close to public transit. Communication was great and very comfortable stay.
Yoco's place is close to the Central station which is very convenient.
Nice room and good location, but it was not possible to get in touch with the host.
Great place!
nice

I had a fantastic stay at The Yoco House. Big thanks to everyone for making me feel welcome. Communication and check in was easy. The room is large with a comfortable bed, WiFi is good and kitchen is well equipped. I had a car and could park it on the street on the weekend for free. Lots of good cafes and restaurants to explore in the surrounding streets.

Lovely spacious front room in a large house with ample kitchen space and friendly people staying in the house. The noise of the road was easily cancelled out with ear plugs. Very comfortable large bed. The bathroom was obviously well used by people in the house so was occasionally a bit dirty but nothing to complain about for me. Had a really enjoyable stay and would recommend, in particular for solo travellers.

Yoco is really friendly and his place is very well kept. It is really close to central and easy to get anywhere. The kitchen, bathroom, and room all were really clean. All of the others in the house were super friendly and it was a very positive, welcoming environment.
Great location and friendly atmosphere in this big group house with young international people!
Great location near Central Station. Only 15 min walk to CBD. Friendly host and the other who stayed there were kind too.
Enjoyed our stay though we did not meet Yoco nor any other Airbnb guests there.

The shared house is located about 10 minutes from the central station and perfect for a city trip. You share the house with 3 other rooms/guests. Our room was spacious and comfortable. We really enjoyed our stay and liked how well organized everything was (e.g. Marked shelfs for each room, pin code for front door).

This this home  is located very good area close to everything the home is large, well organized .  The walls could  have been done a bit more in my room but I'm not looking for perfection. I enjoyed myself there.

Nice location and really close to central railway station+bus stops. The road to the house gets quiet really early at night. Cute and spacious bedroom with a comfy big bed and air-con. However, I didn't expect so many housemates.  Worth paying for the location anyways.

The house is in a really good spot, close to Central station, Surry Hills and Redfern, so there are lots of cafes, bars and things to do nearby. The room is pretty noisy as it sits on a very busy road so probably not ideal for light sleepers.

Located very close to the city. My room was clean and as described. The kitchen was a bit untidy at times, owing to the number of people who use it. 
The house(especially the red room) can get a bit nosiy due to the traffic on Chalmer st. 
But overall a highly recommended place.
Yoco keeps improving. I feel very comfortable to be there. Thanks. 房东一直会改进,如果你需要一个安静,但是什么设施都有的地方,这是很好的房子｡
It was a pleasant stay at Yoco's house. He has the kept the house quite well. Its close to CBD and central station.
This is the place I have been 3 times.

Maison très bien située pour Sidney (10 mn Central station / 40mn à pied ou 10 mn par train à partir de Central  pour aller à Circular quay  )
Rapport qualité/prix très bon. La maison est très propre. 
Bruyant si vous êtes dans la chambre du bas située côté route.
C'est un backpaker et non une chambre chez l'habitant.

Yoco's share house is a great little alternative abode a stones-throw from the heart of Sydney. He was prompt to reply to any of my queries and was more than accommodating. Great value for money as well and definitely recommend to anyone needing a friendly place to stay.
Really nice house, great location. Would definitely visit his house again.

La maison est idéalement située pour découvrir Sydney. Le quartier est agréable et animé. La chambre est spacieuse et bien équipé. Les seuls reproches sont que la cuisine et la salle de bain n'étaient pas très propres et que nous n'avons vu personne dans cette maison pendant 4 jours. Décevant par rapport à notre envie de rencontrer des locaux ou autres voyageurs.

Good value place if you don't stay for long and are only there to sleep. As already said, it is more like a small hostel, except there is no staff to take care of things. The yogi thing seems just to be the theme. Dirty or clean-ish depending on fellow guests.

It was nice to be in a convenient location, because the room is fashionable, very close from the main station.

主要な駅からとても近く､すごく便利な場所でした!部屋もおしゃれで素敵でした｡

It was an awesome stay at Yoco's place. The location of the house is just fabulous. The house is exactly the way it is  described. I got to meet some really nice people during my stay. Although I didn't get chance to meet Yoco in person he was just a call away.  Specially when my room door got auto locked, he helped me in every possible way and made sure to call the locksmith and solve the issue. I must recommend this property specially if you are looking to stay around the city.
good place. across the road is a bus stop
수영장은 집 안에 있는게 아니라 근처 공원 내에 약 6달러 정도 유로이용이에요. 역까지 걷기 괜찮은데 바로 앞은아니에요.

It is a very nice place to stay. The location is great, it is close to everything - bus stop is just near the house, the train station is 10 minutes walk, there are a lot of supermarkets and cafes nearby.  

The house is pretty good as well. We especially enjoy our spacious room with a big desk, a heater and a kettle. It was very comfortable

Yoco's place was roomy, comfortable, in a decent neighborhood and full of other friendly guests you can meet, chat and hang out with! It's a bit far from the downtown area, about a good 30min walk if you don't mind, but thankfully right beside Central Station which can take you everywhere in and around the city.
great location, nice bedroom, quick response

name: Tranquil apartment in Nişantaşı,istanbul
summary: ses
description: ses

reviews.comments:
We had a very nice time in Ilhans apartment. The apartment itself is comfortable and cosy. It even has a small garden which is very nice to relax. Also Ilhan is such a nice guy and he told us some places to go around the apartment to eat etc.

Thanks a lot!

Die Wohnung war wunderbar ...
