Wir haben uns willkommen und in der Wohnung gleich wohl gefühlt. 
Tiefpaterre mit Hof und Katzen. Mitten drin (Besiktas zur einen Seite, Taksim zur anderen) und ganz ruhig. Wir haben gut geschlafen. Die Wohnung ist freundlich und hell eingerichtet, mit Liebe zum Detail.
Wir würden gerne wieder kommen.

Staying at Ilhan's flat was wonderful!
A true oasis inmidst the bustling city of istanbul. The flat is spacious and cool. The little private garden/terrace was also a huge plus.
Ilhan himself is extremely nice, and a great host. Communication was no trouble whatsoever, everything went smoothly. 
We had a wonderful time and would definately visit again!
Thank you, Ilhan!

We had a very good time in Ilhan´s flat. The communication was good, Ilhan added me on (Hidden by Airbnb) which was handy. Unfortunately our flight was a hour delayed, but Ilhan was patient enough to still show us the flat. 

We really felt home for one week, which I think says it all. There is a supermarket across the street, and a taxi stand few meters away. We had to walk a bit to the next tram stop, or subway station but there should be a bus stop close by I guess.

The backyard really added a lot to the relaxed atmosphere of the flat, plus the cute cats passing by was nice. It is in the lowest floor, with almost no noise from other neighbours.

Overall we really can recommend to stay in Ilhan´s flat!
Very kind host. Apartment fully met my expectations. Silent location, very central. Everything was available what is required to spend some nights in Istanbul.

We passed some nice days in Istanbul and Ilhans appartment was the right place to stay and he was a great host. The appartment is really beautiful and cosy, we immmediately felt at home at his place!
We liked the neighborhood, especially that it was close to Besiktas and also to the citycenter.
Ilhan was a nice host, he helped with everything. The flat has a great location.

Ilhan's apartment was the best Airbnb experience for me and my friend. The apartment is amazingly located and very cosy. There is an amazing green garden which gives you the feeling that you are in heaven while spending time in his living room and bedroom. There are amazing pieces of art and very nice looking objects/furniture all around the apartment and very very good bakeries and nice shops nearby. It felt exclusive to spend time in such a place and be so close to the city center. Whenever I'm in Istanbul in the future, Ilhan's apartment is gonna be my first choice without a doubt.
Brilliant apartment - great decor, big outside garden, really interesting art. Ilhan was a fantastic host, very communicative and full of tips for a great stay in Istanbul. Thank you!
Precise pictures, good Location, calm area, clean apartment,and a friendly host. What more would you expect? I recommend this place.

Konum olarak akşam çıkılacak yerlere kısa taksi mesafelerinde, ev geniş, dizaynı başarılı. Bahçesini kullanmadım ancak hava güzelken akşam dinlencesi için iyi olabilir. Türkiye ortalamasına göre başarılı bir airbnb deneyimi. Teşekkürler
İlhan ve evi, ikisi de birbirinden değerli. Merkezi, keyifli ve huzurlu. Ayrıldıktan sonra özleyeceğiniz bir yer.

Very friendly host and super nice apartment. Beautifully furnished and with a small garden.

Due to a window in the kitchen and the bedroom there is always a nice cool breeze flowing through the apartment which makes it cool despite it being hot outside. Really confortable to stay in and in a nice location to reach everything, supermarket right in front of the entrance.

Ilham foi muito atencioso e educado. Apartamento bem amplo, com todas as comodidades necessárias. Ótima localização, com supermercado em frente, e muito comércio variado.  Metrô próximo, e bastante opções de restaurantes em volta.

name: Cozy room in a fun, low-key neighb!
summary: Brand-new, full-size memory foam mattress. 3 minutes from the Graham L; walk out the door and you're in Manhattan in 15-20 minutes! Great bars, coffee places, etc on the block, a quick walk or subway away from the busier parts of Williamsburg.
space: You'll be staying in my room while I'm out of town. It's a small-ish, simple space with a partial view of the Manhattan skyline. Super close to public transportation, eateries and other hangouts. I love it, and I hope you will too! The bed is brand-new, and there's a closet and some shelf space. Make yourself at home!
description: Brand-new, full-size memory foam mattress. 3 minutes from the Graham L; walk out the door and you're in Manhattan in 15-20 minutes! Great bars, coffee places, etc on the block, a quick walk or subway away from the busier parts of Williamsburg. You'll be staying in my room while I'm out of town. The bed is brand-new, and there's a closet and some shelf space. Make yourself at home! The whole unit is 2 floors. On your floor there's a small common space, bathroom, and mini-fridge, which you'll share with 2 other guys. You'll also have access to the floor below, which has a larger living room and full kitchen; 3 guys also live down there. You'll be living with 5 20-something guys who work in creative, internet-ish fields. Interaction is very minimal, but if and when you do run into them, they're all fun dudes! It
neighborhood_overview: It's a safe, fun neighborhood that's a bit quieter than being right in the heart of Williamsburg (although you can walk there). Great bars, coffee places, restaurants, bodegas, etc within a block or two.
transit: Extremely convenient! You're 3 minutes from the Graham L, 11 minutes from the Metropolitan G.
access: The whole unit is 2 floors. On your floor there's a small common space, bathroom, and mini-fridge, which you'll share with 2 other guys. You'll also have access to the floor below, which has a larger living room and full kitchen; 3 guys also live down there.
interaction: You'll be living with 5 20-something guys who work in creative, internet-ish fields. Interaction is very minimal, but if and when you do run into them, they're all fun dudes!
house_rules: No explicit rules. Just clean up after yourself, lock the door when you leave, that kinda stuff.
